0007.en: This person was one of the original owner's three so-called best friends. They had known each other since high school and ended up as roommates after getting into Jiuzhou University together.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这个人就是原主的姐妹三巨头之一，高中就认识原主，二人一同考上九州大学后，又选到了同一个宿舍。

0007.en: She constantly praised and flattered the original owner, pretending to care while actually causing her all sorts of anxiety. This friend was a major reason the original owner was so hostile towards Su Tao.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 平日里不断地夸原主，捧原主，看似关心实则给原主制造各种焦虑，原主会敌视苏桃，少不了这姐妹从中作梗。

0007.en: The key thing was that the original owner was foolish enough to believe these friends!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 关键是原主还真就傻傻地信了这些姐妹的话！

0007.en: "I just got here, but I'll settle these scores one by one."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: 自己刚穿越，这账，还得一笔一笔算。

0007.en: After resting, Chi Xiaocheng took out a piece of paper and began to map out her plan.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 休息好了之后，池小橙拿了一张纸，盘算着接下来的计划。

0007.en: First, she had to get on Su Tao's good side before the male leads came looking for her.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 首先，她要在各大男主找上门之前，率先在苏桃那里打开局面。

0007.en: That way, if she got into trouble, she could rely on Su Tao to help.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 被找麻烦了还能依靠苏桃去解决。

0007.en: Thinking from another perspective, if she were Su Tao, and her childhood friend, who she thought had turned dark and hated her for over two years, suddenly turned out to actually be in love with her...
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 换个角度去思考，如果自己是苏桃，发小针对两年多以为是黑化厌恶自己后，忽然反转其实是爱着自己。

0007.en: But that love had turned into hate.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 但因爱生恨。

0007.en: What would you do when you realized someone you always cared about had become a yandere because of you?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 一直都重视的人，因为自己而变成了病娇，无措之下会怎么办呢？

0007.en: "I'd ask the people around me for advice!"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “询问身边的人！”

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng wrote it down.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 池小橙落笔。

0007.en: Putting herself in Su Tao's shoes and considering her personality, she knew that Su Tao would definitely seek support when she felt lost.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 她代入苏桃的视角，并套上对方的人设后，迷茫的时候一定会找一个支点寻求帮助。

0007.en: "And she wouldn't go to the male leads, because this is about me."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “而且她不会去找那些男主，因为这个事和我有关。”

0007.en: The male leads already hated her; asking them about it would only make things worse.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 那些男主本身就讨厌自己，问那种问题只怕会愈演愈烈。

0007.en: Because of her actions, Su Tao hadn't despaired and lost all sympathy for "Chi Xiaocheng" as she did in the original story, where she let the male leads kick her out of the picture.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 因为自己的表现，苏桃并未和原文一样，对于“池小橙”这个角色产生绝望，不再同情，而是任由男主们将其踢出赛场。

0007.en: Instead, she was left feeling confused and uncertain!
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 而是抱着些许迷茫与不解！

0007.en: "So, according to the original story's plot, besides me, Su Tao's other good friends are..."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “那么按照原文的设定，苏桃除了我以外关系好的朋友还有......”

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng frowned, a little troubled.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 池小橙皱着小眉毛，有些头疼。

0007.en: She had never actually read the book in her past life; she only knew about it because it was so popular.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 前世她并未真的看过这本书，只是因为这本书太火了。

0007.en: She had just come across some AI-narrated novel videos from time to time and heard bits and pieces.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 时不时会刷到一些AI小说视频，途道听说过。

0007.en: She only knew parts of the plot, not the detailed story.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 只了解部分发展，并未知道详细设定。

0007.en: "System, do something useful. Don't be so useless."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “系统，给点作用，别显得太废物。”

0007.en: Helpless, she could only place her hopes on this snarky System.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 无奈，她只能将期望放在这个只会吐槽的金手指上。

0007.en: The System replied very professionally.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 系统很是专业地回复道。

0007.en: [I recommend the host use Emotion Points to purchase the novel "From Sidekick to Center Stage: Winning Over the Male Leads." Each chapter costs 5 Emotion Points, which will allow you to understand the plot's direction.]
0007.speaker: 系统
0007.cn: 【推荐宿主用情绪值购买《炮灰女配全突突，男神全部入我怀》这本小说，每5点情绪值可以购买1章节，以此来了解故事发展走向】

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng slowly typed a question mark. "I ask you for a tip, and you give me this hardcore solution?"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: 池小橙缓缓打了个问号，“叫你支个招，你来这么硬核的？”

0007.en: "And it's 5 Emotion Points for one chapter? That's a ripoff!"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “而且5情绪值才买1章节，怎么不去抢啊！”

0007.en: She only had a dozen or so points left. Maybe because of her social media post, she had gained a few more during her hour of rest.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 她本身就只剩下十几点，可能因为朋友圈的关系，这休息的一个小时又涨了几点。

0007.en: "Can I see the novel's table of contents first?"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “我能先看看这本小说的目录吗？”

0007.en: [Yes.]
0007.speaker: 系统
0007.cn: 【可以。】

0007.en: Using the system panel, Chi Xiaocheng quickly scrolled to around Chapter 100 of the novel.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 池小橙通过系统面板，迅速翻到了小说的第100章左右。

0007.en: Sure enough, in Chapter 150, she saw the chapter title—"The Death of Chi Xiaocheng."
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 果不其然，在150章看到了章节名字——“池小橙之死”。

0007.en: "Survival is my top priority. And I need to insert myself into the later plot to make the other characters feel emotions towards me. I should buy as many of the later chapters as I can!"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “保命是第一任务，而且我要插入后面的剧情中让书里其他角色对我产生情绪，后面的章节能买尽量都买一下！”

0007.en: But who could she get Emotion Points from now?
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 不过情绪值现状态找谁提供呢？

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng thought about the novel's characters, and her eyes gradually settled on the user ID "Yang," who had just replied to her post.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 池小橙思索着小说的各个角色，视线渐渐停在了刚刚回复自己朋友圈的那个ID名叫“阳”的人。

0007.en: One of the novel's many male leads—Dongfang Yang.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 小说诸多男主之一——东方阳。

0007.en: In the original owner's memory, this person was the male lead who had the least involvement with her so far.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在原主的记忆中，这人是目前出场男主中，和原主牵扯较少的一个了。

0007.en: "He said he'd 'eat three pounds of sh*t' if it was my real face?"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “我是素颜就吃三斤翔？”

0007.en: "I wonder if a rich boy like him will keep his promise."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “也不知道作为少爷会不会信守承诺。”

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng opened WeChat and sent him a message: "Are you there?"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: 池小橙打开微信，给他发过去了一条消息，“在吗？”

0007.en: Watch and learn. This is a masterclass.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 看好了，这把教学局。

0007.en: Yang: "Chi Xiaocheng, you dare to contact me?"
0007.speaker: 阳
0007.cn: 阳：“池小橙，你还敢找上门来？”

0007.en: Apparently, he already knew that the original owner had imprisoned Su Tao.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 显然，他已经知道了苏桃被原主囚禁的事情。

0007.en: His location at that moment was a private hospital.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 这会儿的定位，正在某家私人医院呢。

0007.en: Chi Xiaocheng wanted to send a voice message to take advantage of her cute voice, but then she remembered his favorability toward her was negative, so even the best voice would only backfire.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 池小橙本想发语音利用自己的萝莉音占优，但一想对方好感度为负数，再好的声线都只会起反效果。

0007.en: So she typed, "I'm sorry. I now understand that I was wrong! I already told Su Tao that I won't bother you anymore. I just wanted to apologize to you one last time."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: 于是打字道，“对不起，我已经清楚地认识到自己错了！我和苏桃说过了，以后不会再打扰你的生活了，只是最后我想再跟你道个歉。”

0007.en: "I really realize I was wrong!"
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: “我真的意识到自己错了！”

0007.en: The yandere personality wouldn't work on these male leads.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 在这些男主面前，病娇的人设就不好用了。

0007.en: Dongfang Yang replied coldly: "Heh, so you're going to stop liking me and bothering me from today onwards, is that it?"
0007.speaker: 阳
0007.cn: 东方阳冷冷地回复道：“呵呵，今天开始就不喜欢我了，也不会烦我了是吗？”

0007.en: Although it hadn't been many times, the original owner had confessed her feelings to Dongfang Yang a few times.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 虽然次数不多，但原主还是跟东方阳表过几次白。

0007.en: Without exception.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 无一例外。

0007.en: She was rejected every time.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 全都被拒绝了。

0007.en: And because of her attitude towards Su Tao, Dongfang Yang disliked her more and more.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 而且因为原主对苏桃的态度，东方阳也愈发厌恶原主。

0007.en: Speaking of Dongfang Yang, among the many male leads, he was one of the less successful ones.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 说起东方阳，他在诸多男主中算是较为败犬的一个。

0007.en: At first, he treated the female lead like a younger sister, but he was gradually influenced by Su Tao's main character aura. With his white moonlight's powerful charm, he joined the fierce competition among the male leads.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 一开始是把女主当干妹妹来对待，慢慢地被苏桃女主光环影响，白月光的杀伤力又大，于是加入了各大男主的激烈竞争中。

0007.en: His affection for Su Tao hadn't yet reached the point of unwavering devotion, which was why Chi Xiaocheng chose to approach him first.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 对苏桃的好感度没有达到死心塌地的程度，也是池小橙率先找他的原因。

0007.en: She thought for a moment and then typed a green-tea-like message: "I'm really sorry. After Su Tao talked to me in the basement, I truly realized I was wrong. Besides, you would never like someone like me anyway. It was my fault for not knowing my place and bothering you."
0007.speaker: 池小橙
0007.cn: 想了想，编辑了一条茶言茶语的消息，“实在是对不起，在地下室里我被苏桃开导过后，真的意识到自己错了，而且你也看不上我这种人吧，是我以前没有自知之明，打扰到你了。”

0007.en: The word "basement" clearly piqued Dongfang Yang's interest.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 地下室三个字，显然提起了东方阳的兴趣。

0007.en: Two messages arrived one after another.
0007.speaker: 旁白
0007.cn: 两条消息接踵而至。

0007.en: "It's good that you understand. A person like you shouldn't be daydreaming. I could never fall for someone like you in my entire life."
0007.speaker: 阳
0007.cn: “你清楚就好，像你这样的家伙就别做什么白日梦了，我一辈子都不可能看上你这种人。”

0007.en: "Meet me at the Bamboo Cafe on campus. You have to tell me exactly what happened in the basement, every single detail!"
0007.speaker: 阳
0007.cn: “学校里的竹下咖啡厅，我在那里等你，地下室里发生了什么你必须给我一五一十地说出来！”

0008.en: Chapter 8: The Male Lead Who Was Stunned
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 第8章 看傻了的男主

0008.en: After ending the chat, Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved into a slight smile.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 结束聊天，池小橙唇角浅浅勾起。

0008.en: Mentioning Su Tao and the basement, these male leads really couldn't sit still.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 提到苏桃和地下室，这些男主果然坐不住。

0008.en: Without even guessing, Chi Xiaocheng knew that Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang were in competition, so he definitely wouldn't tell Dongfang Yang what happened in the basement.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 不用猜池小橙都知道，叶良和东方阳处于竞争关系，他一定不会告诉东方阳地下室里发生了什么。

0008.en: And Su Tao would also hide the truth about what happened in the basement from both male leads.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 而苏桃也会因为地下室发生的真实情况，而对两个男主进行隐瞒。

0008.en: To find out what happened in the basement, he'd have to go through either Ye Liang's bodyguards or through her, Chi Xiaocheng, the person involved!
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 想了解地下室发生什么，要么通过叶良的保镖，要么通过她池小橙这个当事人！

0008.en: Anyway, Dongfang Yang didn't know what the situation was.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 反正东方阳也不知道什么情况。

0008.en: What happened in the basement—couldn't she just make up whatever she wanted?
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 地下室发生了什么，还不是随便自己编？

0008.en: As long as she could ask this male lead out, then there would be a chance to gain emotion points.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 只要能将这个男主约出来，那么就有机会获得情绪点。

0008.en: With emotion points to understand the future plot and buy skills, only then could she change her cannon fodder identity.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 有了情绪点了解后面剧情，购买技能后，才能去改变自己炮灰的身份。

0008.en: When her cannon fodder identity changed, she could go pursue the female lead.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 当炮灰身份变了，就能去攻略女主。

0008.en: A perfect plan!
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 完美的计划！

0008.en: But going out, naturally she still needed to dress up a bit.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 不过出门嘛，自然还是要打扮一番。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng came to the wardrobe. There weren't too many clothes for going out inside. The summer clothes hanging there were just one dress, one JK uniform, and two sets of regular clothes for both going out and staying home.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 池小橙来到衣柜，里面外出用的衣服并没有太多，摆在那的夏装只有一条裙子，一套JK，两套外出和家居一起用的常服。

0008.en: Even including the set she had just changed out of, as a girl's wardrobe, it was quite poor.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 即便加上自己刚刚换掉的一套，作为女孩子的衣柜，也算有些贫穷了。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng glanced at the JK sailor uniform and short skirt, then decisively took down the white dress.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙看了一眼那一套JK水手服和短裙后，果断取下那条白色的连衣裙。

0008.en: "I didn't expect that on just the first day of transmigrating, I'd have to wear such formal women's clothing."
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: “没想到才穿越第一天，就要穿这么正式的女装。”

0008.en: Rustle, rustle.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 窸窸窣窣。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng took off her clothes and quickly changed into the new ones.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙褪下衣服，又迅速换上。

0008.en: Her petite figure paired with the delicate white dress decorated with lace trim had quite a gothic style. The short outfit matched with her small features made her look as cute as a doll.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 娇小的身材搭配着精致中带有蕾丝花边点缀的白色连衣裙，颇有几分哥特风格的短款衣饰配上小巧的五官，可爱得如洋娃娃一般。

0008.en: The slightly short and narrow skirt could only cover down to her knee area below her snow-white thighs.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 微微有些短窄的裙摆只能遮到雪白大腿往下的膝盖处。

0008.en: Two slender and elegant beautiful legs were exposed to the air.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 纤细优雅的两条美腿暴露在空气中。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng faced the mirror, and the intermediate acting skill given by the system activated. Her face immediately gained a pitiful and delicate weakness.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙面向镜子，系统给的中级演技技能发动，脸上霎时多了一抹我见犹怜的娇弱感。

0008.en: Her naturally beautiful face and sickly image could easily win others' favor.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 天然美丽的脸蛋、病弱的形象，能很好地搏得他人好感。

0008.en: Fine feathers make fine birds.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 人靠衣装马靠鞍。

0008.en: "Obviously just wearing any decent outfit could have national goddess-level charm, but the original owner was really stupid, actually listening to those sisters and hiding all her good points."
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: “明明随便穿一套不错的衣服就能有国民女神级别的闪光点，原主也真是笨，居然听那些姐妹的把闪光点全遮住。”

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng braided her soft tea-colored long hair into two ponytails, then found a pair of black-rimmed glasses with no prescription and put them on.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙又将自己柔顺的茶色长发编织成两条马尾辫，找到一副无度数的黑框眼镜戴上后。

0008.en: This delicate little loli gained an additional scholarly air and naturally cute temperament.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 这只娇弱的小萝莉，又增添了一丝书卷气息和天然呆的气质。

0008.en: After using white cloth to cover the wound on her palm, she went out.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 再用一圈白布将掌心的伤口遮掩后，她出门了。

0008.en: November's late autumn was somewhat lonely, and the chilly wind made Chi Xiaocheng's thin body feel a bit cold.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 11月的晚秋有些寂寥，瑟瑟凉风吹得池小橙单薄的身子有些发凉。

0008.en: The white stockings on her legs were fine, providing quite a bit of warmth.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 腿上的白丝还好，能够给予不少温度。

0008.en: Going out in just a dress was a bit careless—she should have added an undershirt.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 连衣裙出门有些草率了，应该多加一件打底衫。

0008.en: The school gate on Sunday had few people, but even so, many gazes still fell on Chi Xiaocheng.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 周日的校门口人员有些稀少，即便如此，依旧有许多目光放在池小橙身上。

0008.en: Curious, surprised, longing, appreciative.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 好奇、惊讶、向往、欣赏。

0008.en: Upon arriving at this public place, Chi Xiaocheng had already deployed her domain.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 在来到这个公众场合，池小橙就已经展开了自己的领域。

0008.en: Acting skills exploded.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 演技大爆发。

0008.en: Like a lost little white rabbit, she clutched her small crossbody bag, keeping her head half-lowered but not so much that people couldn't see her makeup-free pretty face.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 如一只迷路的小白兔，捂住自己的小挎包，半低着头又不会让人完全看不清自己素颜的俏脸。

0008.en: Then she walked straight toward Bamboo Cafe.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 而后径直地往竹下咖啡厅方向走去。

0008.en: It wasn't actually far—just turn left at the school gate, right next to a large area of various shops inside the campus. "Who's that girl? She's so cute."
0008.speaker: 陌生男1
0008.cn: 其实也不远，就在校门口左转，紧挨着一大片校园内部的各种商店。“那妹子是谁啊，好可爱。”

0008.en: "Does our school have such a cute girl? I've never seen her before."
0008.speaker: 陌生男2
0008.cn: “咱们学校有这么可爱的妹子吗，从来没见过。”

0008.en: "Could she be from another school? Looking at how she doesn't know the way, she feels like a new student."
0008.speaker: 陌生男3
0008.cn: “会不会是外校来的，看这不识路的样子，感觉是是个新生。”

0008.en: The scattered discussions from people passing by made Chi Xiaocheng, who was keeping her head down, gradually smile.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 周遭路过的些许议论声，让低头的池小橙渐渐勾起唇角。

0008.en: Changing others' impressions.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 改变他人印象。

0008.en: Influencing Su Tao through information from various channels.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 从通过各种渠道的信息去影响苏桃。

0008.en: Even noticing that some people were secretly taking photos of her profile, she didn't mind at all.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 即便注意到有些人偷拍她的侧影，她也丝毫不介意。

0008.en: Having these photos would better spread the information.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 有这些照片，才能更好地传递信息。

0008.en: Soon, she arrived outside Bamboo Cafe.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 没多时，来到竹下咖啡厅门外。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng relied on her memory and noticed Dongfang Yang sitting impatiently inside the cafe.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙凭着记忆，注意到了坐在咖啡厅里不耐烦的东方阳。

0008.en: Seeing him look over, Chi Xiaocheng quickly lowered her head.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 见对方侧目看来，池小橙连忙低下头。

0008.en: She didn't go in.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 没有走进去。

0008.en: Instead, she hesitated and lingered outside the door, as if she hadn't seen Dongfang Yang, pacing back and forth on her short legs.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 而是犹豫地在门外踌躇，仿佛没看到东方阳，迈着小短腿左右踱步。

0008.en: Her extremely conflicted and cute appearance made even the young lady at the cafe counter rest her chin on her hand and watch her with smiling eyes.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 纠结无比的可爱模样，让咖啡厅吧台的那位小姐姐都不由单手撑脸，眼含笑意地看着她。

0008.en: Dongfang Yang's completely impatient expression finally gained a touch of curiosity.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 东方阳那满脸不耐烦的神色，终于是多了一抹好奇。

0008.en: Then he sneered, "Hesitating just to enter a cafe—who knows what countryside this idiot came from."
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 随后嗤笑一声，“进个咖啡厅还要犹犹豫豫，也不知道是从哪个乡下来的笨蛋。”

0008.en: He inexplicably somewhat disliked this tea-colored hair.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 他莫名有些讨厌这样茶色的头发。

0008.en: At the same time, he didn't recognize Chi Xiaocheng.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 同时也没认出池小橙。

0008.en: Without makeup, with a different style, and the pure twin-tailed look that the original owner had never considered.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 卸了妆，换了打扮，双马尾辫的清纯风原主更是没考虑过。

0008.en: Plus the black-rimmed glasses—except for those very familiar with her, from a distance you really couldn't tell it was her.
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 外加一副黑框眼镜，除了那些很熟她的人，远看还真看不出是她本人。

0008.en: After a while, Dongfang Yang saw this 1.5-meter idiot seem to make up her mind.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 没一会儿，东方阳就见到这个1米5的笨蛋像是下了决心一样。

0008.en: She lifted her delicate face, looking at the cafe door with determined eyes.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 抬起秀脸，眼神坚毅地看着咖啡厅大门。

0008.en: Resolutely stepping forward.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 毅然决然地迈开脚步。

0008.en: But with a stumble, she almost fell flat.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 可一个踉跄，差点没来了个平地摔。

0008.en: After hurriedly entering the cafe, she looked around again.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 慌慌张张地进了咖啡厅后，又左顾右盼。

0008.en: Walking toward him.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 走向自己。

0008.en: Dongfang Yang raised an eyebrow, his gaze lingering for a moment on the white-stockinged legs beneath that skirt, then moving to Chi Xiaocheng's face as he asked in confusion, "You are...?"
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 东方阳挑了挑眉，视线在那裙摆下的白丝小腿停了一瞬，又挪到池小橙脸上，疑惑问道，“你是......？”

0008.en: He didn't remember knowing this cute, silly girl.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 他记忆中没认识过这个呆呆的可爱女生。

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng slowly removed her black-rimmed glasses and shook the strands of bangs that half-covered her eyes. Her sealed beauty immediately bloomed.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙慢慢地摘下黑框眼镜，又甩了一下半遮眼帘的缕缕刘海，被封印的颜值霎时绽放。

0008.en: She said weakly, "I... I'm Chi Xiaocheng."
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 她弱弱地说着，“我...我是池小橙。”

0008.en: "Chi Xiaocheng?!"
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: “池小橙？！”

0008.en: Dongfang Yang suddenly stood up.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 东方阳猛地站了起来。

0008.en: His face full of shock.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 满脸震惊。

0008.en: [Male lead Dongfang Yang's heart received a huge shock due to the host's transformation]
0008.speaker: 系统
0008.cn: 【男主东方阳因为宿主的变化内心受到极大震撼】

0008.en: [Emotion Points +13...]
0008.speaker: 系统

0008.en: [Emotion Points +16...]
0008.speaker: 系统

0008.en: [Emotion Points +22...]
0008.speaker: 系统

0008.en: When the system's notification sounded, Chi Xiaocheng knew she had come to the right place.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 当系统的提示声响起，池小橙就知道自己来对了。

0008.en: She nodded gently again, lowering her little head, "It's me."
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 她再度轻轻点头，垂着小脑袋，“是我。”

0008.en: Dongfang Yang was completely stunned. He couldn't believe that this person was actually Chi Xiaocheng!
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 东方阳人都傻了，他怎么也不敢相信，这个人居然是池小橙！

0008.en: The Chi Xiaocheng in his memory was hunched over, with lifeless eyes, wearing heavy makeup, and the kind where you couldn't recognize who she was just by looking at her face without seeing her hair. Her speech always carried a gunpowder-like tone.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 他记忆中的池小橙驼背、眼神萎靡、化着浓妆、单看脸不看头发根本认不出这人是谁的那种，说话还总是带着一副火药味。

0008.en: Now
0008.speaker: 旁白
0008.cn: 现在

0008.en: He looked Chi Xiaocheng up and down and slowly managed to squeeze out a confused question, "Did you... did you get plastic surgery?"
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 他上下打量了一眼池小橙，缓缓憋出一句疑惑，“你...你去整容了？”

0008.en: Chi Xiaocheng lifted her face, stared into Dongfang Yang's eyes, pouted her small mouth, and said pitifully, "I... I know I'm ugly, but you can't say that about me. I... I just took off all my makeup."
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 池小橙抬起脸，盯着东方阳的双眼嘟起小嘴，委屈巴巴地说着，“我...我知道我长得丑，但你也不能这样说吧，我...我只是把妆都卸了而已。”

0008.en: After speaking, she turned her head to the side and reached up to tuck the tea-colored strands falling by her temples behind her ear, revealing her clean and delicate profile.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 说完又侧过头，伸手将鬓角垂落的茶色发丝梳到耳后，露出白净清秀的侧脸。

0008.en: Her small cute ears were slightly pink, her long eyelashes kept blinking, and her grieved eyes seemed about to well up with tears.
0008.speaker: 池小橙
0008.cn: 小巧可爱的耳朵点点霞红，修长的睫毛不断眨巴，委屈的眼眸好似要泛出点点泪花。

0008.en: Ugly?
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 长得丑？

0008.en: Just took off makeup?
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 只是把妆卸了？

0008.en: Was this definitely the same person as the previous Chi Xiaocheng?
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 这确定和之前的池小橙是同一个人？

0008.en: At this moment, Dongfang Yang was completely confused.
0008.speaker: 东方阳
0008.cn: 这一刻，东方阳凌乱了。

0009.en: Chapter 9: Reaping Emotion Points!
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 第9章 收割情绪值！

0009.en: Sitting back in his chair, Dongfang Yang stared straight ahead, his index finger tapping rhythmically on the table in time with his shaking leg.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 坐回椅子，东方阳平视前方，食指随着抖腿的规律，很有节奏地在桌上敲动。

0009.en: The petite, pigtail-wearing girl before him kept her eyes downcast, her hands nervously clutching a corner of her skirt.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 眼前的双马尾娇小少女，垂着眼帘低着头，双手还紧张地攥着裙摆的一角。

0009.en: Reason told him that Chi Xiaocheng was faking it.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 理智告诉他，池小橙是装的。

0009.en: And it was an obvious act!
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而且是明演！

0009.en: But his experience told him that acting couldn't be this convincing. He had only seen such a drastic change in personality from veteran actors in the entertainment industry.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 可他的认知又告诉自己，演是没那么像的，这样前后大的差别，他只在娱乐圈中的一些老戏骨身上见到过。

0009.en: Besides, her cute, slightly weary face made it hard to think ill of her.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而且那张带点憔悴的可爱小脸蛋，也让人不想往坏的方向去想。

0009.en: Could she really be a different person without makeup?
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 卸了妆真就变了一个人？

0009.en: Why hadn't he noticed before that she was actually quite nice when she behaved?
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 以前怎么没发现这家伙乖巧起来其实还蛮不错的呢。

0009.en: Without even realizing it himself, his dislike for Chi Xiaocheng had faded significantly in that moment.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 连他自己都没发觉，原本对池小橙的厌恶心理，在这一刻都淡了不少。

0009.en: He pointed to the seat opposite him and said in a deep voice, "Sit."
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 他指了指对面的座位，沉声道，“坐吧。”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded timidly, smoothed her skirt, and moved to the seat.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 池小橙怯生生地点头，抚了抚裙角后，挪到了座位上。

0009.en: Her persona for the day was a timid, shy, and cute girl.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 今天她的人设是，怯懦怕生的小可爱。

0009.en: The makeup was just a form of self-protection.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 化妆只是自己的保护色。

0009.en: The increase of Emotion Points in her mind hadn't stopped. Although it was only two or three points at a time, not as much as before, Chi Xiaocheng knew.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 脑海中情绪值的增加就没停过，虽然只是两三点没之前那么多了，但池小橙知道。

0009.en: Dongfang Yang was being influenced by her.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 东方阳正被自己影响着。

0009.en: She acted like a flustered little rabbit, fidgeting restlessly. After a moment, she decided to speak first, lowering her head to Dongfang Yang. "Young Master Dongfang, please... please scold me!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 她表现得如一只慌张的小白兔，坐立不安，过了一会儿打算主动开口，便对东方阳垂下了脑袋，“东方少爷，请...请你骂我吧！”

0009.en: Dongfang Yang laughed with amusement, resting his chin on one hand as he looked at Chi Xiaocheng. "Why should I scold you?"
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 东方阳被气笑了，单手托腮地看着池小橙，“我为什么要骂你？”

0009.en: "Because... because I kept bothering you before and caused you trouble. I came to apologize, so you can scold me however you want!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “因为...因为我之前一直缠着你，给你添了麻烦，我是来道歉的，所以你怎么骂我都行！”

0009.en: Dongfang Yang raised an eyebrow. "Really? Anything?"
0009.speaker: 东方陽
0009.cn: 东方阳挑眉，“真的怎么样都行？”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng lifted one eye to glance at him worriedly. "It... it would be nice if you could be a little gentle."
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 池小橙抬起一只眸子担忧地看了一眼，“能...能轻点就好了。”

0009.en: Heh, an interesting woman.
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 呵，有趣的女人。

0009.en: Honestly, Dongfang Yang couldn't tell if Chi Xiaocheng was acting, but in his mind, the difference in her behavior was just too great.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 老实说，东方阳看不出池小橙是在演戏，但于他的认知中，这人的前后差别又太大了。

0009.en: So he asked directly, "You said Su Tao talked some sense into you in the basement, and now you've changed your ways. I feel like you're a completely different person. Tell me, how did Su Tao persuade you?"
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 他索性直接问道，“你说苏桃在地下室里开导了你，所以你知心悔改，我甚至感觉你已经换了一个人，说说看苏桃是怎么劝你的？”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded timidly. "Actually, when I kidnapped Su Tao... well, I guess you could call it kidnapping. When I locked her in the basement, I mainly wanted to warn her to stay away from you."
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 池小橙怯生生地点头，“其实我绑架苏桃...也算绑架吧，把她关在了地下室，主要还是想警告一下她，让她别离你那么近。”

0009.en: "Young Master Dongfang, you know that Su Tao is very reasonable and gentle. Even when I threatened her, she didn't get angry. Instead, she told me that I was just being misled by Xiu Hua and the others."
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “东方少爷你也明白，苏桃很明事理，也很温柔，即便我威胁她她也没有生气，反而跟我说我只是被秀花她们蛊惑了而已。”

0009.en: "Xiu Hua?" Dongfang Yang interjected curiously.
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: “秀花？”东方阳好奇地插嘴。

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng quickly passed the blame she had prepared. "She's a friend of mine. She taught me how to do my makeup and how to target Su Tao. She said that both you, Young Master Dongfang, and Young Master Ye Liang, originally liked me, but Su Tao stole you away."
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 池小橙迅速将早已准备好的锅甩出去，“她是我的一个朋友，我化妆、还针对苏桃，都是她教我的，她说无论是你东方少爷，还是叶良少爷，你们其实一开始喜欢的都是我，只是被苏桃抢走了。”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't continue, lowering her head in shame.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 池小橙没继续说下去，羞愧地低下了头。

0009.en: Dongfang Yang picked up where she left off. "So you actually believed that?"
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 东方阳顺着池小橙留的悬念接话道，“所以你就真的那么认为了？”

0009.en: "Yes." Chi Xiaocheng quickly explained, "But in the basement, Su Tao explained everything to me bit by bit. She was like moonlight within reach, shining on me and driving away the darkness. I... I can't believe I did such horrible things to her before!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “嗯。”池小橙又迅速解释，“不过在地下室的时候，苏桃跟我一点点地说清楚了，她就像触手可及的月光，照在我身上驱散了黑暗，我...我以前居然对她做了那么过分的事情！”

0009.en: "I'm not a good person!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “我真不是人！”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked like she was about to slap herself.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 池小橙一副要给自己一巴掌的样子。

0009.en: Then she went on and on, praising Su Tao.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 随后又叽里呱啦地夸奖了一大堆苏桃的好。

0009.en: Dongfang Yang enjoyed listening to it.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 听得东方阳很享受。

0009.en: Because he also thought Su Tao was perfect, and Chi Xiaocheng's words were exactly what he felt.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 因为他也觉得苏桃很完美，池小橙说的话简直夸到了他的心里。

0009.en: Once he felt that connection, he subconsciously believed the little lolita's words a bit more.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 共鸣产生了后，下意识地相信了一分这只小萝莉说的话。

0009.en: But he still spoke with disdain, "You really are incredibly stupid."
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 只是嘴上说出的话依旧不屑，“你也真是蠢得可以。”

0009.en: "S-sorry!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “对...对不起！”

0009.en: "Lift your head."
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: “头抬起来。”

0009.en: Hearing the commanding tone, Chi Xiaocheng raised her small head high, though her eyes darted around nervously.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 听到那命令一样的声音，池小橙又将小脑袋高高抬起，只是眼神不安地扫视着四周。

0009.en: Her delicate little face was fully revealed to Dongfang Yang.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 精致的小脸蛋一览无余地展露在东方阳面前。

0009.en: Although this young master had seen countless beautiful women, he had to admit that the makeup-free Chi Xiaocheng was quite easy on the eyes.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 然是这位大少爷见过美女无数，却也觉得现在纯素颜的池小橙很耐看。

0009.en: Still, she couldn't compare to Su Tao!
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 不过，还是比不上苏桃！

0009.en: He added this in his mind, then said to Chi Xiaocheng, "I'll believe you for now, but if I find out you're lying, you're dead!"
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 他心底补了一句，对池小橙道，“我姑且相信你，但要是发现你是骗我的，你就死定了！”

0009.en: "I... I won't!" Chi Xiaocheng appeared very flustered. "I know I'm not good enough for you, Young Master Dongfang. I won't bother you anymore!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “不...不会的！”池小橙表现得很是慌乱，“我知道我配不上东方少爷，以后不会再缠着你了！”

0009.en: "Good."
0009.speaker: 东方阳

0009.en: Dongfang Yang nodded deeply. After asking for more details about what happened in the basement, he was ready to send Chi Xiaocheng away.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 东方阳深深点头，又询问了一下地下室发生的具体事情，这才准备打发池小橙离开。

0009.en: But he saw the little lolita fidgeting as if she had something else to say.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 却又见这只小萝莉扭捏着好像有什么话要说。

0009.en: He asked, "Is there anything else?"
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 问道：“你还有什么事吗？”

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded lightly, took out her phone, and opened her social media feed.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头，拿出了自己的手机，又点进了朋友圈。

0009.en: It was the post where she had shared her no-makeup photo.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 那是自己发了素颜照的那一条动态。

0009.en: With a very serious expression, she said to Dongfang Yang, "Um, this photo, it's without any makeup!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 小脸很是认真地对东方阳说道，“那个，这个照片，是素颜的！”

0009.en: The corner of Dongfang Yang's mouth twitched.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 东方阳嘴角一抽。

0009.en: An hour ago, he had replied that if the photo wasn't edited, he would eat a... well, something unpleasant.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 一个多小时前，他回复照片如果不是p的就炫3斤翔。

0009.en: Was she looking for trouble?
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 找茬是吧？

0009.en: Just as he was about to curse, Dongfang Yang noticed that his reply on the post was gone.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 刚想骂人，东方阳就注意到，动态那里他的那一条回复已经不见了。

0009.en: Did she delete it first?
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 是她先删掉了？

0009.en: That's pretty thoughtful.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 还蛮贴心的嘞。

0009.en: He rubbed his nose and didn't say anything more.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 他摸了摸鼻子，也没多说什么。

0009.en: And Chi Xiaocheng, after happily reaping the last wave of Emotion Points, hurriedly left the cafe.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而池小橙，美美地收割完最后一波情绪值后，慌慌张张地离开了咖啡厅。

0009.en: From start to finish, she maintained her cute persona.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 自始至终，都保持着一个可爱的人设。

0009.en: It wasn't until her small figure disappeared at the end of the road that Dongfang Yang snorted, "All an act."
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: 直至她娇小的背影消失在道路尽头，东方阳才轻哼了一声，“装模作样。”

0009.en: He collected his thoughts and snapped his fingers.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 收回心神，又打了一个响指。

0009.en: A man in black at another table stood up respectfully and asked, "Young Master, what are your orders?"
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: 另外一桌喝咖啡的黑衣男恭敬地起身询问，“少爷，有什么吩咐。”

0009.en: "Investigate the relationship between Chi Xiaocheng and that Xiu Hua. You heard what she just said. See how much of it was a lie."
0009.speaker: 东方阳
0009.cn: “查一下池小橙和那个秀花的关系，刚刚她说的话你也听到了吧，看看她撒了多少谎。”

0009.en: "Yes, Young Master."
0009.speaker: 陌生男1
0009.cn: “好的少爷。”

0009.en: Meanwhile, Chi Xiaocheng, completely unaware that her story would be investigated, walked out of the school gate with a happy expression. "System, how many Emotion Points did I get this time?"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: 而池小橙，丝毫不知道自己说的还会被调查，正一脸开心地走出校门口，“系统，这一次我获得了多少情绪值？”

0009.en: [During this time, Dongfang Yang provided the host with 214 Emotion Points]
0009.speaker: 系统
0009.cn: 【在这期间，东方阳为宿主提供了214点情绪值】

0009.en: [The female lead, Su Tao, provided the host with 32 Emotion Points]
0009.speaker: 系统
0009.cn: 【女主苏桃为宿主提供了32点情绪值】

0009.en: [The host now has a total of 271 Emotion Points]
0009.speaker: 系统
0009.cn: 【现在宿主总共有271点情绪值】

0009.en: "Great! Purchase the content from chapters 140-160 of the novel!"
0009.speaker: 池小橙
0009.cn: “很好，购买小说中第140-160章的内容！”

0009.en: These were the chapters where her character, the cannon fodder sidekick, was written out. But according to the usual tropes in novels, when one villain exits, another one is introduced.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 这些章节，正是自己这个炮灰女配下线的内容，但按照小说中的正常套路，一个反派下线了，那么另一个反派就要上线铺垫了。

0009.en: Conflict is what drives the most emotion in a story.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 矛盾与冲突是小说中起情绪最大的点。

0009.en: These elements are needed to make the protagonist act, either willingly or unwillingly.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 有这些才能让主角主动或被动地进行事件。

0009.en: Chi Xiaocheng needed a way to secretly get close to Su Tao to carry out her plan.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 池小橙需要能暗中接近苏桃的方法，以此完成自己的计划。

0009.en: As the novel's content filled her mind, Chi Xiaocheng stood at the school gate, her eyes gradually filling with joy.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 小说的内容融入脑海，池小橙站在校门口，眼神逐渐变得欣喜。

0009.en: The first ten of these chapters described how the original Chi Xiaocheng scratched Su Tao's face and was then killed by Ye Liang after exposing her chest.
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 这二十章中，前十章写的是原主池小橙刮花了苏桃的脸，戳破她的胸后被叶良杀死的情节。

0009.en: The next ten chapters...
0009.speaker: 旁白
0009.cn: 而后十章

0010.en: Chapter 10: The Threat
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 第10章 威胁

0010.en: After the villain Chi Xiaocheng is written out in the next ten chapters, a new villain naturally has to appear to attract the readers' hatred.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 后十章反派池小橙下线后，新反派自然要上线去拉读者的仇恨。

0010.en: One of Su Tao's current best friends—Chen Qian!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 苏桃目前的闺蜜之一——陈倩！

0010.en: She's the new villain who appears in those later chapters.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 就是在后十章新出的反派。

0010.en: Chen Qian met Su Tao in college and perfectly played the part of a sweet, innocent girl.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩是上了大学才认识的苏桃，一碗绿茶端得滴水不漏。

0010.en: In front of Su Tao, she was a great friend who seemed to share everything.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 在苏桃面前是个无话不谈的好闺蜜。

0010.en: But behind Su Tao's back, she was a demon consumed by jealousy.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 在苏桃身后却是嫉妒的恶鬼。

0010.en: She and Ye Liang came from the same high school. Although her family was average, Chen Qian always wanted to date someone out of her league and had long seen Ye Liang as her boyfriend.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她和叶良是同一所高中升上的大学，虽然家境平平，但陈倩一直有吃天鹅肉的心思，早早地就把叶良视为男友。

0010.en: But just two months into college, Ye Liang was completely charmed by Su Tao.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 可升上大学，短短两个月，叶良就被苏桃迷得团团转。

0010.en: Chen Qian was furious. Why should an orphan from the countryside like Su Tao get all of Ye Liang's attention!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩恨啊，凭什么苏桃一个乡下来的孤儿能获得叶良独宠！

0010.en: In the original novel, the school basketball game was two days later.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 在原著中，两天后是校内篮球比赛。

0010.en: Dongfang Yang and Ye Liang were playing as opponents.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 东方阳和叶良作为对手出场。

0010.en: Su Tao's face had been scratched up by Chi Xiaocheng, but she still insisted on going to cheer for them both.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 苏桃原本被池小橙划烂了脸，但依旧坚持出面为二人加油。

0010.en: Chen Qian thought that with Su Tao's face ruined and her incredible beauty gone, Ye Liang couldn't possibly like her.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩认为，苏桃脸都烂了，没了那逆天的颜值，叶良不可能喜欢她。

0010.en: So she schemed to embarrass Su Tao at the game and later pushed her down the stairs, making things even worse for the already injured heroine.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 于是设计，让苏桃在篮球比赛上出丑，后面还将苏桃从楼梯上推下去，本就受伤的女主更是雪上加霜。

0010.en: "This 'best friend' is someone I can definitely use!"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “这位闺蜜完全可以利用一下！”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng clenched her fist, a wicked smile on her face.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 池小橙捏了捏拳头，脸上勾出坏笑。

0010.en: "According to the plot, she's Su Tao's roommate. It's the perfect chance to visit her dorm. If the female lead is there, I can put some pressure on her and farm more Emotion Points."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “设定中她是苏桃舍友，正好去一趟苏桃宿舍找她，女主在的话还能上一波压力多刷点情绪值。”

0010.en: Without hesitation, Chi Xiaocheng turned around and headed toward the girls' dormitory.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 说干就干，池小橙调头绕道，朝女生宿舍的方向走去。

0010.en: Tianhe Courtyard, Building 4.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 天和苑4栋。

0010.en: Her dorm was in the same building, just a bit far from Su Tao's. She was in room 513, and Su Tao was in 801.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她的宿舍也在这栋，只是和苏桃差了点距离，她在513，苏桃在801。

0010.en: Since the school wasn't far from her home, Chi Xiaocheng had permission to live off-campus and only occasionally stayed in the dorm.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 因为学校离家不远，池小橙也申请了走读，只是偶尔才住在宿舍。

0010.en: Arriving at room 801 by elevator, Chi Xiaocheng noticed the door was ajar. She peeked through the crack and saw a shocking scene.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 坐电梯来到801门前，池小橙发现门没关，偷偷开了条缝看向里面后，却发现了惊人的一幕。

0010.en: A girl was adding some kind of white powder to a cup of water!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 一位女生正在朝一个杯子中的水加某些白色粉末！

0010.en: The cup had little peach stickers on it—wasn't that Su Tao's cup?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 那杯子上贴着几颗小桃子的贴纸，可不就是苏桃的杯子吗。

0010.en: Who else could the culprit be but Chen Qian?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 始作俑者，除了陈倩还有谁？

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng secretly took out her phone.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 池小橙偷偷拿出手机。

0010.en: "Click—"
0010.speaker: 旁白

0010.en: The sound startled Chen Qian inside. "Who's there!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 声音响起，顿时惊到了室内的陈倩，“谁！”

0010.en: Seeing the small girl with pigtails, Chen Qian quickly hid the cup behind her back and snapped, "Who are you? Why are you taking pictures of me!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 见到扎着双马尾辫的娇小少女，陈倩连忙将水杯挡在身后，呵斥道，“你是谁，为什么偷拍我！”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng pushed the door open, a relaxed smile on her lips. "I was originally looking for Su Tao, but this is a nice surprise. Sister, it's not very nice to be drugging someone's drink, is it?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙推开门，唇角挂上了悠然自在的笑容，“本来我是打算找苏桃的，没想到有意外之喜，这位姐姐，给人家的水杯下药不太好吧？”

0010.en: "Who... who's drugging anything!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: “谁...谁下药了！”

0010.en: Chen Qian denied it while secretly stuffing the packet of powder into her back pocket.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩一边狡辩，偷偷地将那包药粉塞到背后的口袋里。

0010.en: She glared fiercely at Chi Xiaocheng, trying to scare her.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 恶狠狠地盯着池小橙，企图吓到她。

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly and held up her phone. "I have proof, you know."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙微微一笑，扬了扬手机，“我可是有证据的哦。”

0010.en: "You—"
0010.speaker: 陈倩

0010.en: Chen Qian remembered the camera sound from just now, and her face turned pale. After staring at Chi Xiaocheng's face for a moment, she exclaimed in shock, "You're Chi Xiaocheng?!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 陈倩联想刚刚听到的拍照声，脸色铁青，盯着池小橙的脸看了一下后，才猛地震惊道，“你是池小橙？！”

0010.en: "Who I am doesn't matter," Chi Xiaocheng said coolly. "What matters is, what do you think Ye Liang will think if I send this photo to him?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “我是谁不重要。”池小橙淡淡道，“重要的是，你说我要是把这个照片发给叶良，他会怎么想？”

0010.en: "Oh, right!" Chi Xiaocheng glanced at Su Tao's bed. "There are so many men's items up there. I wonder if someone planned to take photos and spread them around to frame Su Tao for being indecent."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “哦对了！”池小橙还看向了苏桃的床位，“上面那么多男士物品，该不会是某个人想拍照然后流传出去，嫁祸苏桃不检点吧。”

0010.en: "Gosh, if Ye Liang found out about this, he would be so angry~"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “天呐，这要是被叶良知道，一定会很生气吧~”

0010.en: "And a certain someone would never have a chance again, right?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “某个人，就再也没有机会了对吧？”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng stared directly at Chen Qian, threats spilling from her lips. "Don't even think about snatching my phone. If I scream for help, do you believe all the girls in this building will come running to see the drama?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙直勾勾地看着陈倩，威胁的话不断从嘴里吐出，“你也别想着从我手里抢走手机，我只要大喊一声救命，整栋楼的女生都会上来吃瓜你信不信？”

0010.en: Chen Qian's expression was dark. She had no idea how Chi Xiaocheng knew she liked Ye Liang.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩脸色阴沉得很，她不知道池小橙到底是哪里来的信息得知自己喜欢叶良的。

0010.en: But everything she said was exactly what Chen Qian feared.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 但她说的一切，都是陈倩担忧的。

0010.en: With no other choice, she had to give in. "What do you want, money?"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 无奈之下，只得妥协，“你想要什么，钱吗？”

0010.en: "Don't be nervous. We're on the same side."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “别紧张，我们是一条道的。”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng pulled up a chair, locked the door behind her, and said calmly to Chen Qian, "Like you, I want Su Tao to stay away from Ye Liang. You want to frame her, ruin her reputation, and win Ye Liang's affection, right?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙拉了一张椅子，同时反锁了身后的宿舍门，对陈倩淡淡道，“我和你一样想让苏桃远离叶良，你想嫁祸她让她身败名裂，得到叶良的喜欢对不对？”

0010.en: "So what if I do?"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: “是又怎样？”

0010.en: "I can help you!" Chi Xiaocheng revealed her sharp little canine teeth, a villain's signature smile on her small face. "You know my name, so you must know about my situation."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “我能帮你！”池小橙露出尖尖的小虎牙，反派的标志性笑容挂在小脸，“你清楚我的名字想必也知道我的事情。”

0010.en: "But don't you like Ye Liang too?" Chen Qian was very wary. "You're also my rival!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: “可你也喜欢叶良不是吗？”陈倩很是警惕，“你也是我的竞争对手！”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng sighed. "The problem right now is that Ye Liang is completely focused on Su Tao. You don't need to worry about whether I like him or not."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙无奈道，“现在的问题是叶良一心扑在苏桃身上，至于我喜不喜欢叶良你不用管。”

0010.en: Then, she clicked her tongue. "Whatever, why am I saying so much? You don't really think you have a choice, do you?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 说着，又啧了一声，“算了，说那么多干什么，你不会以为你还有选择的机会吧？”

0010.en: She shook her phone again.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她又摇了摇手机。

0010.en: Then she tossed over a bottle of water she had just bought. "Drink this."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 然后扔过去一瓶刚刚路上买的水，“喝了这个吧。”

0010.en: Chen Qian frowned, bending down to pick up the mineral water. "Nongfu Spring?"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 陈倩皱眉，低头捡起地上的矿泉水，“农夫山泉？”

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled slightly. "You drink first."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙微微笑了一下，“你先喝。”

0010.en: Although she didn't know what Chi Xiaocheng was planning, Chen Qian had no choice but to do as she was told.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 虽然不知道池小橙打的什么主意，但陈倩还是不得不随她说的话去做。

0010.en: But as she drank the water, she suddenly realized something was wrong. Her face went pale. "Why is this water so bitter!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩
0010.cn: 只是这瓶矿泉水入口的时候，她才猛地意识到了不对劲，脸色煞白，“这瓶水为什么会这么苦！”

0010.en: Chen Qian's eyes widened in disbelief as she looked at the packaging.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩瞪大眼睛，不可置信地看着包装。

0010.en: It was Nongfu Spring!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 是农夫山泉啊！

0010.en: And the bottle hadn't even been opened. Was it expired?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 而且这瓶水还没开封过呢，过期了？

0010.en: Of course, she didn't know that Chi Xiaocheng had already used her liquid-altering skill to change the water's taste before giving it to her.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她当然不知道，池小橙在把水给她的时候，就已经使用了加料液体的技能，改变了水的味道。

0010.en: "This is a special poison I made. I was going to save it for Su Tao, but for now, I'll use it to control you."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “这是我特殊定制的毒药，本来想留给苏桃的，现在先用来限制一下你。”

0010.en: "Poison?!"
0010.speaker: 陈倩

0010.en: "Yes," Chi Xiaocheng nodded. "You need to take an antidote once a week, or the flesh on your face will start to rot."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “对。”池小橙点头，“每周需要吃一次解药，否则的话脸上的肉就会烂掉。”

0010.en: As soon as she said that...
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 此话一出。

0010.en: Chen Qian was so scared she immediately threw the water bottle aside.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 吓得陈倩立马将矿泉水扔到一边。

0010.en: Then she covered her mouth and frantically tried to make herself vomit.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 旋即捂住嘴，疯狂地抠动自己的喉咙想进行催吐。

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng calmly picked up the half-empty bottle. "I know you want to go after Su Tao, but don't be in such a hurry. For now, just maintain your good-friend relationship with her. I'll find a way to make her leave Ye Liang."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 池小橙平静地将倒了一半水的瓶子拾起，“我知道你想对苏桃下手，但别那么着急，暂时先保持她好朋友的关系，之后我会有办法让她离开叶良的。”

0010.en: "As for the antidote," Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head and smiled sweetly, her red eyes seeming to glow. "As long as you do as I say, I'll give it to you!"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “至于解药。”池小橙歪了歪脑袋，嫣然一笑，赤红的眸子好似绽放红色的光芒，“只要你乖乖听我的话，我会给你的！”

0010.en: With that, she shook her phone again. "I need you to stay by Su Tao's side at all times and report everything she does to me. I'll add you on WeChat with a burner account later."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: 说罢，又晃了晃手机，“我需要你时刻跟在苏桃身边，无论她做什么事情你都要报备给我，一会儿我会用小号加你微信。”

0010.en: "And don't even think about resisting."
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “也别想着反抗。”

0010.en: "You don't want your face to rot and have everyone in school find out about the ugly things you've done, do you?"
0010.speaker: 池小橙
0010.cn: “你也不想脸烂掉，然后做的丑事还被全校人知道吧？”

0010.en: Watching Chi Xiaocheng turn to leave, Chen Qian's fear grew deeper.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩看着转身将要离开的池小橙，脸上的恐惧渐渐加深。

0010.en: This person was a devil!
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 这个人，简直就是魔鬼！

0010.en: She frantically started to clean up the evidence of her crime, but then something occurred to her, and she scrambled toward the door.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她慌乱地收拾起了作案的一些东西，旋即想到了什么，连滚带爬地奔向门口。

0010.en: "The hospital, I have to go to the hospital..."
0010.speaker: 陈倩

0010.en: But as soon as she opened the door, she froze.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 只是刚出门，她又愣在了原地。

0010.en: Chi Xiaocheng was leaning against the hallway railing. The breeze lifted her hair as she slowly glanced sideways, her calm gaze seeming to say, 'Going to the hospital won't help.'
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 只见池小橙倚在走廊栏杆前，微风吹起她的鬓发，缓缓侧目斜视着她的平淡视线好似在说——去医院也没用。

0010.en: Feeling all her strength leave her, Chen Qian quickly grabbed the railing for support.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩宛如失去全身力气，连忙扶住了栏杆。

0010.en: She followed Chi Xiaocheng's gaze toward the front of the dormitory building.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 又顺着池小橙的视线看向宿舍楼前方。

0010.en: A beautiful, delicate-featured girl was slowly walking toward their building.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 一位面容清秀漂亮的少女正慢慢地往这宿舍楼走来。

0010.en: It was Su Tao.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 是苏桃。

0010.en: She was back so soon?
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 她居然这么快就回来了？

0010.en: Stunned, Chen Qian turned to look back at Chi Xiaocheng.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 陈倩错愕，又转头看向池小橙。

0010.en: She saw the petite girl staring intently at Su Tao, her enchanting red eyes looking at her as if she were prey.
0010.speaker: 旁白
0010.cn: 却见这位身材娇小的少女正紧紧盯着苏桃，妖艳的赤瞳好似在看一个猎物。

0011.en: Chapter 11: An Important Plot Point, the School Basketball Game
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 第11章 重要剧情点，校内球赛

0011.en: After returning home, Chi Xiaocheng received a message from Chen Qian.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 回到家，池小橙收到了来自陈倩的信息。

0011.en: "Su Tao is already back at the dorm. She looks a bit pale and distracted."
0011.speaker: 陈倩
0011.cn: “苏桃已经回到宿舍了，脸色有点憔悴，心不在焉的样子。”

0011.en: As a spy on the same side, even though she was annoyed with Chi Xiaocheng, she was being blackmailed. So, she was willing to betray Su Tao, who was her friend on the surface.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 作为同一条战线上的内鬼，她虽然看池小橙有些不爽，可把柄被人抓在手里，也乐于出卖苏桃这个表面女友。

0011.en: Not long after they parted, she sent a message to Chi Xiaocheng to test her, wanting to find out what her true intentions were.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 刚分别没多久，就发了信息给池小橙来试探，想打探她真正的用意到底是什么。

0011.en: Seeing this, Chi Xiaocheng quickly typed a reply: "I need you to take very good care of her. For the next few days, find reasons to stay close to her and tell me if she does or thinks anything important."
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: 池小橙见状，“啪啪”地打字回复：“我需要你对她进行无微不至的照顾，这几天就尽量找理由跟在她身边，有什么行动和想法就跟我说。”

0011.en: Chen Qian: "Take very good care of her? Are you serious?"
0011.speaker: 陈倩
0011.cn: 陈倩：“无微不至地照顾她？你认真的？”

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Just do as I say."
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: 池小橙：“听我的就行。”

0011.en: Su Tao was very innocent. Since Chen Qian hadn't been exposed yet, she was definitely considered a good friend. Living in the same dorm, they would talk about many things.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 苏桃很单纯，还没暴露的陈倩绝对算是她的好友，同在一个宿舍，很多东西都会聊。

0011.en: After the emotional rollercoaster she had been through, Su Tao didn't dare to talk to Ye Liang and the others, so she needed someone to rely on for a while.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 经历了自己那样事情的大起大落后，苏桃不敢去跟叶良等人倾诉的话，就需要一个暂时的依靠。

0011.en: Chen Qian was the perfect person for that.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 陈倩就是很好的人选。

0011.en: On one hand, she could act as my spy to get information. On the other hand, she could gain Su Tao's trust. Once Su Tao believed Chen Qian was a true friend...
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 一方面可以当自己内鬼获取信息，另一方面可以拉苏桃的好感度，等苏桃以为陈倩是真正的好姐妹后。

0011.en: At a critical moment.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 在某一个关键的时间点。

0011.en: *Stab!*
0011.speaker: 旁白

0011.en: A devastating backstab would come.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 来一个绝望的背刺。

0011.en: Then, Chi Xiaocheng could step in and capture the female lead's fragile heart.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 届时她池小橙就可以上场，占据女主那脆弱的一抹心房。

0011.en: Of course, this was all part of her plan. Next, she needed to deal with the next plot point from the original novel.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 自然，这些都是她计划中的一部分，接下来，她需要应对的是原著中的下一个剧情点。

0011.en: The school basketball game!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 校内篮球比赛！

0011.en: Dongfang Yang would lead the Red Team.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 东方阳率领红队。

0011.en: Ye Liang would lead the Blue Team.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 叶良率领蓝队。

0011.en: The two would face off in the finals of the school basketball tournament!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 二者展开校内篮球比赛的决赛！

0011.en: In female-oriented novels, this kind of match was just a way to show how handsome the two male leads were. It also served to involve the female lead, creating the satisfying trope where it seems like the two male leads are competing in a game, but they are actually competing for her.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 在女频小说中，这样的比赛无非就是刻画两位男主多帅，同时作为引子将女主的关系加进去，产生一种两位男主看似在比赛，其实是在为女主竞争的爽点。

0011.en: Even though her arrival had created a butterfly effect, Su Tao would still undoubtedly go to the game to cheer for both male leads.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 即便因为自己的到来产生了蝴蝶效应，但苏桃不出意外还是会去这个比赛现场为两个男主加油。

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng was thinking about how she, as a third party, could interfere with the plot of this game.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 池小橙在考虑，如何作为第三者，插足这场比赛的剧情。

0011.en: And at the same time, get closer to Su Tao.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 同时，还能让自己与苏桃的关系更进一步。

0011.en: At the very least, she couldn't let Su Tao keep avoiding her. Chi Xiaocheng was now sending messages to Su Tao, but the female lead wasn't replying at all.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 最起码不能让苏桃继续回避自己，池小橙现在给苏桃发消息，这位女主都不做一点回复的。

0011.en: "Just in case, I should draw another skill."
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: “以防万一，再抽一个技能吧。”

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the System panel. This was another function of the system besides the store.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 池小橙看向系统面板，这是系统除了商城以外的另一个功能。

0011.en: Lottery!
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 抽奖！

0011.en: 100 Emotion Points for one draw.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 100点情绪值抽奖一次。

0011.en: 1000 Emotion Points for a ten-draw, which guaranteed at least one low-level skill.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 1000点情绪值可以进行一次十连，十连中保底获得一个低级技能。

0011.en: Skills were different from the strange items in the store. Chi Xiaocheng had experienced how powerful the System's skills were.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 技能和商城中奇奇怪怪的物品不同，池小橙体验过系统技能的强悍。

0011.en: Acting (Intermediate), Pain Reduction (Intermediate), Spiked Liquid (Beginner).
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 演技（中级）、痛感减弱（中级）、加料液体（初级）。

0011.en: The three skills she currently had, just the intermediate Acting skill alone, had been a huge help to Chi Xiaocheng.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 目前已有的三个技能，光是一个中级的演技，就给池小橙带来了莫大的帮助。

0011.en: "Go big or go home!"
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: “搏一搏，单车变摩托！”

0011.en: "Draw!"
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: “抽卡！”

0011.en: After spending another 100 Emotion Points, the System's lottery panel suddenly flashed with a golden light.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 再次花掉100点情绪值，系统的抽奖面板顿时蹦出金光。

0011.en: "I got a skill?!"
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: “出技能了？！”

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng's face lit up with surprise, "And it's an intermediate skill!"
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: 池小橙脸色惊喜，“居然还是中级技能！”

0011.en: But the moment she saw the skill's name, Chi Xiaocheng froze, and her expression turned strange.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 可看到技能名字的那一刻，池小橙不免又呆了一下，脸色变得奇怪了起来。

0011.en: "Is a skill like this really useful for my current situation?"
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: “这样的技能，对于现在我的处境来说，真的有用吗？”

0011.en: Time quickly passed to November 5th, Tuesday.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 时间很快到了11月5日，周二。

0011.en: The day of the school basketball game.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 校内篮球队比赛当天。

0011.en: To avoid the other male leads who might still be angry, and that group of two-faced friends, Chi Xiaocheng skipped classes for a day.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 为了回避可能还在气头上的其他男主，还有那群两面三刀的姐妹，池小橙逃课了一天。

0011.en: But today was the day a small climax of the plot would unfold.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 但今天是小高潮的剧情展开。

0011.en: At 5 PM, the game was scheduled to start.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 下午5点，就是比赛开打的日子。

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng left early and went to the school's outdoor basketball court.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 池小橙早早地就出了门，前往学校中的露天篮球场。

0011.en: Even though she arrived half an hour early, the area was already packed with students surrounding the court.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 即便提前了半小时到场，这里依旧被学生绕着球场围得水泄不通。

0011.en: It was clear how popular the two male leads were at school.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 可见两位男主在学校的人气有多高。

0011.en: After pretending to be lost and moving toward Su Tao's direction, a girl in the front row who had a good spot quickly shouted and waved enthusiastically at Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, over here!"
0011.speaker: 曾秀花
0011.cn: 故作迷惘地往苏桃所在的方向靠去后，没多时前排占了一个好位置的某个女生便大喊出声，对着池小橙高高招手，“小橙，这边！”

0011.en: Curious onlookers followed the sound and their mouths dropped open in surprise.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 好奇的路人循声望去，旋即惊讶地张开嘴巴。

0011.en: Today, Chi Xiaocheng had once again gone out without any makeup.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 今天的池小橙，依旧是素颜出门。

0011.en: Her slender and petite body was wrapped in a beige bear-themed sweatshirt. The soft fabric clung to her delicate curves, and the sleeves were slightly rolled up, revealing a small section of her snow-white wrists, making her look exceptionally dainty.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 她那纤细娇小的身躯包裹在一件米色小熊卫衣中，柔软的面料贴合着她玲珑的曲线，袖口微微向外翻卷，露出一小截雪白的手腕，显得格外精致。

0011.en: She still had the same pigtails from when she met Dongfang Yang, tied with delicate ribbons. The ends of her hair curled naturally, and the pigtails swayed gently behind her, adding a touch of playfulness and liveliness.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 依旧是面见东方阳时的双马尾辫，细腻的丝带束起，发尾自然卷曲，双马尾在她的背后轻轻晃动，增添了几分俏皮与灵动。

0011.en: Today, she was the cute girl next door.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 今天的她，是邻家可爱的小妹妹。

0011.en: What shocked everyone was, of course, Chi Xiaocheng's beauty. The only one present who could compare to such an adorable little lolita was the commoner campus belle, Su Tao.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 让众人震惊的自然是池小橙的颜值，如此可爱的一只小萝莉，在场唯有苏桃这位平民校花能比了。

0011.en: Perhaps because the girl's shout was too loud, it even drew the attention of the three key people on the court.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 兴许是那位女生的叫喊声太大，连带着场内三个重点人士，也投来了目光。

0011.en: Ye Liang frowned heavily, his eyes filled with disgust.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 叶良重重皱眉，眼神厌恶。

0011.en: Dongfang Yang glanced at her with interest.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 东方阳饶有兴趣地看了她一眼。

0011.en: Su Tao's eyes showed some surprise and complexity. When Chi Xiaocheng smiled at her, she quickly looked away.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 苏桃眼神有些惊讶，又有些复杂，在池小橙投去一个微笑时，慌乱地错开视线。

0011.en: As she did, she noticed a hint of disappointment flash across the little lolita's face.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 过程中，她注意到，回避的那一刻，这只小萝莉的神情也多了一抹失落。

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng squeezed through to the front and came to the girl who had just called her.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 池小橙挤到前排，来到了刚刚喊她那个女生旁边。

0011.en: One of her "friends," Zeng Xiuhua.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 她的姐妹之一，曾秀花。

0011.en: Her nose was high and her makeup was exquisite, but the muscles in her face were stiff when she spoke, a clear sign of plastic surgery.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 鼻梁挺拔，脸上的妆很精致，但说话时脸部肌肉动作很僵硬，明显整过容。

0011.en: "I knew you'd come to watch the game, Xiaocheng. I saved a spot for you."
0011.speaker: 曾秀花
0011.cn: “我就猜到小橙你肯定会来看比赛，特意给你占了个位置。”

0011.en: She pulled Chi Xiaocheng to sit beside her, about five meters away from Su Tao's prime location.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 她将池小橙拉到身边坐下，距离苏桃的绝好位置大概5米远。

0011.en: She first glanced at Chi Xiaocheng's makeup-free face, which seemed full of collagen, hiding her jealousy and dissatisfaction deep in her eyes. She asked with concern:
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 先是瞥了眼池小橙那仿佛满是胶原蛋白的素颜小脸蛋，嫉妒与不满被深深藏在眼底，她关心地问道：

0011.en: "Xiaocheng, why did you come out without makeup? A girl can't go out without makeup. You don't look good like this at all."
0011.speaker: 曾秀花
0011.cn: “小橙，出门怎么不化妆啊，女孩子出门可不能不化妆，你这样一点都不好看。”

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng forced a smile, "I ran out of makeup and have no money to buy more. I washed my face carefully with water before I left, so it's fine."
0011.speaker: 池小橙
0011.cn: 池小橙露出一个假笑，“化妆品用完了，没钱买，出门的时候我用清水仔细洗过脸了，没事的。”

0011.en: "How can that be okay? As a girl, you must dress up!" Zeng Xiuhua said in a disapproving tone. "Honestly, if you ran out of makeup, you should have just told me. Didn't I give you the last set? I have another one, I'll bring it to your dorm later."
0011.speaker: 曾秀花
0011.cn: “那怎么行，你作为女孩子必须打扮自己呀！”曾秀花一副不满的语气，“真的是，没化妆品你跟我说不就行了，上次的不也是我送给你的？我那还有一套呢，之后我送到你宿舍去。”

0011.en: Looking at that caring expression.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 看着那关怀的表情。

0011.en: Chi Xiaocheng almost threw up last night's dinner.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 池小橙差点没将隔夜饭吐出来。

0011.en: That cheap makeup, like a 30-yuan facial cleanser, had many side effects, didn't look good, and damaged the skin.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 那种廉价化妆品，就和30块左右的洗面奶一样，副作用多，不好看，还伤皮肤。

0011.en: The original owner was so foolish to actually believe her after being told such things a few times.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 原主也是蠢，这种话哄几次居然真的信了她说的。

0011.en: Although she was complaining internally, Chi Xiaocheng still wore a strained, fake smile.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 心底虽然吐槽，不过池小橙脸上还是挂着牵强的假笑。

0011.en: This made Su Tao, who was secretly watching, feel very uncomfortable.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 这让偷看着这边的苏桃感觉很不是滋味。

0011.en: The surprise she felt about Chi Xiaocheng's appearance was nothing compared to the impact of the words spoken in the basement a few days ago.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 心中那对于池小橙打扮的惊讶，远没有前几天地下室那番话语的冲击力来得大。

0011.en: Even now, she still remembered everything that happened in the basement.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 即便是现在，她也依旧记得地下室发生的那些事情。

0011.en: Including the things Chi Xiaocheng had said.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 包括池小橙说的那些话语。

0011.en: That afternoon, Chi Xiaocheng had bitten her, and the pain on her lip was still unforgettable for Su Tao.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 那天下午，池小橙咬了一下，唇边疼痛的感觉，让苏桃现在都难以忘怀。

0011.en: Why?
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 为什么？

0011.en: Because after being bitten by Chi Xiaocheng, she... got a canker sore.
0011.speaker: 旁白
0011.cn: 因为被池小橙咬了一下后，她...口腔溃疡了。

0012.en: Chapter 12 Don't You Want Some Water?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 第12章 你不喜欢喝水吗

0012.en: Whenever her tongue touched the cut inside her lip, the pain would remind Su Tao of what happened in the basement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 舌尖时常抵在唇内伤口，每次传来阵阵疼痛，苏桃都不免想起地下室发生的事情。

0012.en: Her first kiss was gone.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 初吻没了。

0012.en: She was also forced to lie to Ye Liang.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 还被迫在叶良那里撒了谎。

0012.en: Xiaocheng had become someone she didn't recognize at all, and had said things Su Tao never thought she would say.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 小橙变得完全不认识了，并说出了那种她从未想过的话。

0012.en: For the past two days, she had been thinking a lot, but she hadn't talked about it with anyone. No matter how hard she thought, she couldn't figure out why Chi Xiaocheng had become like this.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这两天，她想了很多，但都没有和其他人提起过这件事情，可怎么想也想不明白，池小橙为什么会变成这样。

0012.en: She didn't understand, she couldn't figure it out.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不理解，不明白。

0012.en: So, she decided to avoid her for the time being.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 索性先躲着。

0012.en: But to her surprise, Chi Xiaocheng actually came to the school basketball game.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可她没想到，校内篮球赛池小橙竟然来了。

0012.en: "Is she here to see me?"
0012.speaker: 苏桃
0012.cn: 她是来见我的？

0012.en: "Or is she here to cheer for Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang?"
0012.speaker: 苏桃
0012.cn: 还是说为叶良和东方阳加油？

0012.en: For some reason, another thought popped into Su Tao's mind.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 不知怎的，苏桃心中又生起了一丝别样的念头。

0012.en: "Didn't Xiaocheng say she doesn't like Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang?"
0012.speaker: 苏桃
0012.cn: ——小橙她不是说不喜欢叶良和东方阳吗。

0012.en: With this strange thought in her mind, the game started soon after. As the male leads of the novel, Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang were, of course, practically good at everything.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 带着奇怪的念头，很快比赛就开始了，叶良和东方阳作为小说男主，自然是近乎全能的存在。

0012.en: The two teams were evenly matched, and one cool shot after another made most of the girls in the audience scream with excitement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两边队伍打得难解难分，一个又一个帅气的投篮看得现场大部分女生都尖叫连连。

0012.en: Halfway through the match, Chi Xiaocheng sneaked a peek at Su Tao.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 赛程过半，池小橙偷偷看了一眼苏桃。

0012.en: She saw that Su Tao's eyes were also sparkling with excitement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只见苏桃双眼也是异彩连连。

0012.en: Although her feelings about her were complex.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她对她的思绪虽然复杂。

0012.en: It was clear that Su Tao also had a very good impression of the male leads.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可显然对几位男主也有着不少好感。

0012.en: Noticing the two unopened bottles of water beside her, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes shifted.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 注意到她身边放着两瓶未开的矿泉水，池小橙转了转眼珠子。

0012.en: She turned to a boy behind her and said with a sweet smile, "Hey, could you do me a favor?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 转身看向身后的一个男生，甜甜笑道，“小哥哥，你能帮我一个忙吗？”

0012.en: The boy was taken aback by Chi Xiaocheng suddenly talking to him, and his eyes lingered on her cute, delicate face for a couple of seconds.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生被池小橙忽然搭讪也是呆了一下，视线在那精致可爱的面容停滞了两秒。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't mind, and even gave a playful blink.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙也不介意，反倒是俏皮地眨了眨眼睛。

0012.en: The boy quickly snapped out of it and nodded nervously, "N-No problem."
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 男生连忙回神，局促地点点头，“没...没问题的。”

0012.en: "I'm a bit thirsty. Could you buy two bottles of water for me?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “我有些口渴了，你能帮我买两瓶矿泉水回来可以吗？”

0012.en: "T-Two bottles?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: “两...两瓶是吗？”

0012.en: The boy nodded blankly, secretly happy.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生呆呆地点了一下头，心中暗喜。

0012.en: He was thirsty too, so one bottle for each of them would be perfect.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 正好他也口渴了，一人一瓶刚刚好。

0012.en: The game was still going on. The boy, with the pretty girl on his mind, ran back quickly. He handed one bottle to Chi Xiaocheng, but just as he was about to open the other one, he saw her reach out for it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 比赛还在继续，心系美少女的男生很快就跑了回来，先是将一瓶递给池小橙，另一瓶刚打算拧开瓶盖，却见池小橙又伸手过来。

0012.en: He froze for a second. "What's wrong?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 他愣了一下，“怎么了？”

0012.en: "It was two bottles." Chi Xiaocheng said with an innocent face.
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “是两瓶呀。”池小橙一脸人畜无害。

0012.en: The boy looked at his friend next to him, then back at Chi Xiaocheng, confused. "Are you drinking two bottles by yourself?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 男生不解地看了眼旁边的兄弟，又看向池小橙，“你一个人喝两瓶？”

0012.en: "Oh, they're not for me. I'm giving them to Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang later."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “哦，我不是自己喝的，一会儿要送给叶良和东方阳。”

0012.en: These simple, plain words instantly made the boy's heart sink.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 朴实平淡的话语，瞬间让男生心凉了。

0012.en: I bought water for a pretty girl, and she's using the water I bought to give to other guys.
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 我买水给美少女，美少女用我买的水送给其他男人。

0012.en: "Then what does that make me?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 那我算什么？

0012.en: He numbly handed over the water. Then, he saw Chi Xiaocheng take out her small wallet and pull out a 5-yuan bill.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 呆呆地把水递过去，男生又见池小橙拿出小钱包，从中抽了一张5元钱出来。

0012.en: She placed it in his hand. "Thank you, little bro~"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 交到他的手中，“谢谢小哥哥~”

0012.en: Two bottles of water only cost four yuan.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两瓶水只要四块钱。

0012.en: She even gave him a one-yuan tip for running the errand!
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她甚至还给了一块钱的跑腿费！

0012.en: The boy felt his nose turning red and as if he was wearing a clown's frizzy wig.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生只觉得自己此刻鼻子渐渐变红，头上好似戴了一头爆炸的假发。

0012.en: His love story was over before it even began.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 爱情还没开始，就已经结束了。

0012.en: His friend next to him silently patted his shoulder and stood up. "Let's go, or Batman will be here to catch the Joker soon."
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 旁边的兄弟沉默地拍了拍男生的肩膀，站起身，“走吧，不然一会儿蝙蝠侠就要来抓小丑了。”

0012.en: Soon, the first half of the game ended.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 很快，比赛上半场结束。

0012.en: Ye Liang's blue team was in the lead.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 叶良所在的蓝队占优。

0012.en: It was break time.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 进入休息时间。

0012.en: The boys on both teams were drenched in sweat, and girls were constantly giving them water and towels, except for Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两边队伍的男生都大汗淋漓，不断有女生为他们送水和毛巾，除了叶良和东方阳。

0012.en: These two were true campus idols, famous and well-respected, so most people didn't dare to approach them.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这两位是实打实的校草，在学校名声大，威望高，常人根本不敢去接触。

0012.en: Besides, didn't everyone know they were both pursuing Su Tao?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 并且，谁不知道，他们都在追求苏桃？

0012.en: The main character was right here, after all.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 正主都还在这儿呢。

0012.en: Just as Su Tao picked up a bottle of water and was about to get up.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只见苏桃拿起一瓶水，刚好起身。

0012.en: Another small figure was faster than her.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 另一个娇小的身影比她还快。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng grabbed a bottle of water, trotted over to Dongfang Yang, and showed a silly smile. "Master Dongfang, would you like some water?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 池小橙拿起一瓶水，迈着小步子跑到了东方阳面前，露出傻傻的笑容，“东方少爷，要喝水吗？”

0012.en: She held the water with both hands, her face full of anticipation.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她双手将水捧着，面怀期待。

0012.en: It was as if this was some precious treasure.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 好似这是什么珍贵的宝物。

0012.en: Dongfang Yang chuckled and shook his head. "No, thank you."
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 东方阳轻笑了一声，又摇摇头，“不需要，谢谢。”

0012.en: Although his opinion of Chi Xiaocheng had changed, he definitely wouldn't accept water from her in front of everyone.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他虽然对池小橙有所改观，但肯定不会在众目睽睽之下接受她送的水。

0012.en: Especially not in front of Su Tao.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 特别还是在苏桃面前。

0012.en: Seeing this, the disappointment on Chi Xiaocheng's face flashed for a moment.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 见此，池小橙脸上的失望一闪而逝。

0012.en: With a burst of great acting, she let Dongfang Yang catch that trace of emotion, then forced a smile. "If you want some water, you can tell me."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 演技大爆发的她，很好地让东方阳捕捉到了痕迹后，挤出牵强的笑容，“如果要喝水的话，可以和我说哦。”

0012.en: She turned around.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她转过身。

0012.en: The System's voice echoed in her mind.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 脑海里响起系统的声音。

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +4...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +7...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +2...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: Dongfang Yang was surprised that she still dared to give him water in front of so many people, especially when Su Tao had already stood up.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 东方阳在惊讶她竟然还敢在那么多人的眼前给自己送水，明明苏桃都站起来了。

0012.en: "She's doing this on purpose!"
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 这是故意的啊！

0012.en: Of course, Chi Xiaocheng was doing it on purpose.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙当然是故意的。

0012.en: She just didn't expect to earn some Emotion Points this way.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只是她没想到这样还能赚一些情绪值。

0012.en: So, she turned around again.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 于是一转身。

0012.en: And walked towards Ye Liang.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 走向了叶良。

0012.en: That silly smile instantly turned a little fearful as she stood before him, holding out the water bottle with both hands.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那傻傻的笑容刹那间变得有些害怕，站在他面前双手将矿泉水递上去时。

0012.en: Before she could even speak.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 还未开口。

0012.en: Ye Liang slapped the water bottle to the ground.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 叶良一巴掌就将矿泉水给拍到地上。

0012.en: "How dare you show up in front of me and pretend? Get lost!"
0012.speaker: 叶良
0012.cn: “你居然还敢出现在我面前装模作样，给我滚！”

0012.en: His voice was filled with anger, and his annoyance also provided Chi Xiaocheng with 23 Emotion Points.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 声音夹带着些许怒气，因为厌烦，同样为池小橙提供了23点情绪。

0012.en: The water bottle rolled a few times and stopped at the feet of a girl with bleached-blonde hair.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 矿泉水滚了好几圈，停在了一个黄毛女生的脚下。

0012.en: She stepped on it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 一脚踩上。

0012.en: The girl looked at Chi Xiaocheng with a sneer.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 女生讥讽地看着池小橙。

0012.en: The small figure stood in the empty space cleared by the crowd, looking so wronged and helpless.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那个小小的身影站在一片被人挪腾出来的空地上，显得是那样的委屈、无助。

0012.en: Seeing this, Dongfang Yang frowned and couldn't help but say to Ye Liang, "Was that necessary? There are so many people here, watch your image."
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 东方阳见状，皱了皱眉，不免对叶良道，“没必要吧，这里人那么多呢，注意点形象。”

0012.en: Ye Liang snorted coldly. "What, Dongfang Yang, you feel sorry for this girl now? I haven't even settled the score with her yet and she dares to come near. If Su Tao hadn't stopped me, she would have disappeared from this school yesterday. Just looking at her makes me want to puke."
0012.speaker: 叶良
0012.cn: 叶良冷哼一声，“怎么，东方阳你还同情起这个家伙了，我都还没找她算账呢还敢凑过来，如果不是苏桃拦着，昨天她就该在这个学校消失了，看着她我就想呕。”

0012.en: From beginning to end, he never looked at Chi Xiaocheng directly.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 自始至终，他都没正眼看过池小橙。

0012.en: That pale, makeup-free face was pitiful, but if you don't look, how can you be charmed?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那张惨白的素颜小脸蛋很让人怜惜，但不去看，又怎么会被魅惑呢？

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked back to her seat, looking lost. She picked up the last bottle of water and slowly looked at Su Tao. "Tao Tao, do you... want some water?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 池小橙失魂落魄地回到自己的位置，又拿起最后一瓶矿泉水，慢慢看向了苏桃，“桃桃，你...要喝水吗？”

0012.en: After being rejected by two people in a row.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 连续被两个人拒绝。

0012.en: She seemed to be looking for some comfort.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她似乎在寻找心灵寄托。

0012.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng's sad expression and poor state, Su Tao wanted to take the water and comfort her.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 眼见池小橙神情和状态都很差，苏桃想将水接过并安慰一下她。

0012.en: But Ye Liang walked over from a distance, huffing coldly.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可叶良，又从远处走来，冷冷地哼了一声。

0012.en: Su Tao shrank back, glanced at him, and after hesitating, she shook her head. "Sorry, Xiaocheng, I'm not thirsty right now. I don't really want any water."
0012.speaker: 苏桃
0012.cn: 苏桃缩了缩脖子，看了一眼他后，犹豫再三还是摇了摇头，“抱歉小橙，我现在不渴，不太想喝水。”

0012.en: "Thud!"
0012.speaker: 旁白

0012.en: The water bottle she was holding fell heavily to the ground.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 被她拿在手中的矿泉水，重重地掉在了地面。

0012.en: The onlookers who were just watching the drama now looked at her with either scorn or pity.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周遭原本看戏的眼神，也渐渐变得或讥讽、或怜悯。

0012.en: "I see, so Tao Tao doesn't want water..."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “这样呀，原来桃桃不想喝水……”

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was quiet, but it was just loud enough for Su Tao to hear.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙声音不大，却又恰好传到苏桃耳中。

0012.en: She handed a bottle of water to Ye Liang, then turned her head and saw a faint smile on Chi Xiaocheng's lips. Her crimson eyes reflected the action of her handing over the water.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她拿着一瓶水递给叶良，又转过头，发现池小橙嘴角挂着若有若无的笑容，赤红的眸子倒映着她递水的动作。

0012.en: Her pupils seemed to have no light in them, completely empty.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 瞳孔好似没有高光，空洞无比。

0012.en: That dazed expression seemed to be sending Su Tao a message.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那失神的表情就仿佛在给苏桃传递一个信息。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng's world.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙的天。

0012.en: Had collapsed.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塌了。

0013.en: Chapter 13: Say That Again!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第13章 你再说一遍！

0013.en: "Host, you could win an Oscar for that performance! It was amazing. If I were the female lead, I'd get goosebumps from you staring at me like that. It's so creepy."
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【宿主，你都可以去拿奥斯卡小金人了，演得简直也太棒了，我要是女主，被你这么盯着鸡皮疙瘩都得起来，太渗人了】

0013.en: "You don't understand. This is a sign that I'm turning into a villain. Only by making Su Tao anxious and keeping her thinking about me can I continuously get Emotion Points from her and proceed with the next step of my plan."
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “你不懂，我这样的表现是黑化的前兆，只有让苏桃心神不宁，时时刻刻想着我，我才能从她身上源源不断获取情绪值，并且进行下一步的计划。”

0013.en: "I can't wait to see you outsmart the female lead! When are we starting? When are we starting!"
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【我已经迫不及待想要看到宿主你拿捏女主了，什么时候行动，什么时候行动！】

0013.en: "You're just a system. What's the rush?"
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “你一个破系统，你急什么？”

0013.en: "We're the villains here, and a villain has to look the part. If I didn't know your situation, I'd think you were a real yandere."
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【我们都是反派啊，反派当然要有反派的样子，要不是知道宿主你的情况，我都以为你真的是个病娇了】

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked into the crowd, looking dejected, and the onlookers automatically cleared a path for her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 池小橙失落地往人群中走去，围观的群众不由自主地给她让出一条出去的道路。

0013.en: With her head lowered and back hunched, her brown hair hiding her eyes, she looked utterly dejected.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 现在的她垂着头，驼着背，茶色的秀发盖过眼眸，显得是那么落魄。

0013.en: But in her mind, she was happily chatting with the System.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但在脑海中，却和系统聊得不亦乐乎。

0013.en: At the same time, Chi Xiaocheng realized that her situation at school was a bit strange.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 同时，池小橙也发现了，原主在学校的处境有些微妙。

0013.en: Thanks to her delicate and cute face, some strangers and classmates she knew were quite nice to her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 凭着这张娇弱可爱的小脸，一些路人和认识的同学，对池小橙的态度都挺好的。

0013.en: But anyone associated with the main characters like Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang treated her terribly.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但只要与叶良、东方阳等主角相关周边的人，对她的态度就极差。

0013.en: There were also some from high school who never got along with the original owner.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 还有一部分在高中时就和原主不对付的

0013.en: Just as Chi Xiaocheng was thinking and walking towards her dorm to rest, she suddenly heard a voice from a quiet path lined with bushes.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 就在池小橙一边思考一边走向自己宿舍打算休息时，就在一条尽是灌木丛的幽静小道，身后陡然传来了声音。

0013.en: "Hey, Chi Xiaocheng!"
0013.speaker: 陌生女1
0013.cn: “喂，池小橙！”

0013.en: Hearing the voice, Chi Xiaocheng stopped and slowly turned around.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 闻言，池小橙止住了身形，徐徐转身。

0013.en: A girl with blonde hair, wearing a crop top and a short skirt, walked over slowly with her hands in her pockets.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一个穿着露脐装、小短裙的黄毛女生双手插兜，慢悠悠地走了过来。

0013.en: Behind her was a gloomy-looking follower with black-framed glasses and messy hair, her head lowered.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她的身后还有一个戴着黑框眼镜，披散头发，低着头一脸阴沉的跟班。

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng frowned when she saw her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 池小橙见到她皱了皱眉。

0013.en: This was the same blonde girl from the basketball court who had stepped on the water bottle she dropped.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这人正是刚刚在球场，踩住她掉下那瓶水的黄毛女生。

0013.en: She was also a bully who had picked on the original owner in high school.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 同时也是在高中霸凌原主的一个不良少女。

0013.en: Beating up the original owner used to be a regular thing, and she had continued to bother her often during the first two months of university.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 以前对原主拳脚相加那是常态，上了大学，这两个月依旧时常找原主麻烦。

0013.en: Huang Limei gently pushed aside a small bush, slowly walked up to Chi Xiaocheng, and said with an arrogant look, "Well, if it isn't Chi Xiaocheng. Why aren't you wearing your pretty makeup today? Pretending to be innocent and delivering water, who are you trying to seduce?"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: 黄莉梅用手轻轻拨弄小树丛，慢悠悠地走到池小橙面前，一脸嚣张，“哟，这不是池小橙吗，今天怎么没化你那美美的妆啊，还装纯去送水，勾引谁呢？”

0013.en: The hostility was obvious, and her classic villain tone made Chi Xiaocheng reflect.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 敌意毫不掩饰，反派特有的语气让池小橙不由反思了起来。

0013.en: She felt that she wasn't much of a villain.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 总感觉自己不像是反派。

0013.en: This tone and expression, this must be what a real cannon fodder villain is like, right?
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这样的语气、表情才是真正的炮灰反派吧？

0013.en: Glancing at the security camera on the corner of the building, Chi Xiaocheng maintained her act.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 不动声色地瞥了眼右上小楼墙角的摄像头，池小橙还是保持了一贯的演技。

0013.en: She shrank back and said cautiously to Huang Limei, "What do you want?"
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: 缩了缩脖子后，对黄莉梅警惕道，“你想做什么？”

0013.en: "I don't like you. You got a problem with that?"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: “看你不爽，有问题吗？”

0013.en: She grabbed the collar of Chi Xiaocheng's sweatshirt and lifted her up with one hand.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她一把拽住池小橙的卫衣领口，竟是单手将她给提了起来。

0013.en: Her arm, tattooed with a butterfly, had bulging muscles, not at all like a typical girl's.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 那纹着花蝴蝶的臂膀，鼓起一块块肌肉，哪里像是一个普通的女孩子。

0013.en: This was Chi Xiaocheng's biggest weakness since she had crossed over.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这也是池小橙穿越以来绝对的弱项。

0013.en: Her body was too weak.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 身体太弱了。

0013.en: She would lose any physical fight, and even with the System, she couldn't change that overnight.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 只要涉及打架基本就是会输，即便有了系统也无法短时间改变这点。

0013.en: Huang Limei threatened Chi Xiaocheng, saying fiercely, "I'm warning you, stay away from Dongfang Yang. That's the man I've got my eyes on!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: 黄莉梅威胁着池小橙，恶狠狠说道，“我警告你，别接近东方阳，那是老子看上的男人！”

0013.en: "Pfft."
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “噗嗤。”

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng, who had been acting the whole time, couldn't help but let out a laugh.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一直演技在线的池小橙，还是没绷住笑出了声。

0013.en: To think it was because of the male lead.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 没想到居然还是因为男主。

0013.en: In this novel world, these main characters really were the source of all trouble.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 在这小说世界中，这些主角还真就是万恶之源啊。

0013.en: But in Huang Limei's eyes, Chi Xiaocheng's suppressed laugh was mocking her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可在黄莉梅眼里，池小橙这没憋住的笑就是在嘲讽她。
