0019.en: On the dormitory rooftop, Chi Xiaocheng was still sitting under the rain shelter, breathing weakly with a pale face.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 宿舍天台上，池小橙依旧坐在挡雨板下，虚弱地呼吸着，脸色有些苍白。

0019.en: She had turned off the continuous notification sounds for Emotion Points in her mind because they were too noisy, leaving only the sound of thunder and rain.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 脑海中持续不断的情绪值提示音因为太吵被她关掉，耳边此时仅剩雷声和雨声。

0019.en: But the wind was so strong that even under the shelter, droplets of water were blown onto her, soaking half of her body. Her thin T-shirt clung to her, revealing glimpses of her fair skin.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 只是风太大，即便她躲到挡雨板下，丝丝水滴依旧被风吹到身上，小半边身子已经湿掉，本就单薄的T恤愈发贴合身躯，白嫩的肌肤若隐若现。

0019.en: "System, how long has it been?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “系统，过去多久了？”

0019.en: To make her act more convincing, she had thrown her phone from the 14th floor and had no idea how much time had passed since she hung up.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 为了让戏更逼真，将手机从14楼扔下的她，已经不清楚距离挂断电话过去多久了。

0019.en: Fortunately, she still had the System.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 不过好在，还有系统。

0019.en: [About 20 minutes have passed.]
0019.speaker: 系统
0019.cn: 【差不多20分钟了】

0019.en: "By my calculations, Su Tao should be back at school by now."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “算算时间，苏桃应该回到学校了。”

0019.en: She moved her body out into the open, letting the rain soak her.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她挪动着身子，让自己暴露在雨幕下，任由雨水打湿自己。

0019.en: It was late autumn in November, and the temperature was not warm.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 11月已经深秋，气温算不上暖。

0019.en: The rain was freezing, and Chi Xiaocheng shivered uncontrollably.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 此时的雨水冰凉无比，池小橙几乎是不可控地颤抖着身子。

0019.en: Even the System felt a bit sorry for her.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 看得系统都有些心疼。

0019.en: [Host, maybe we should just forget it. Or how about we use some Emotion Points to buy something? I'm scared when you're like this.]
0019.speaker: 系统
0019.cn: 【宿主，要不还是算了吧，或者咱们先用情绪值再买点东西怎么样，你这样我害怕】

0019.en: "I haven't even said much, what's a system like you afraid of?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “我都没多说什么呢，你一个系统怕什么。”

0019.en: [If you die, I'll be gone too! Besides, Host, are you sure you're not a yandere? Your actions are scaring me.]
0019.speaker: 系统
0019.cn: 【你要是挂了，我也就没了啊，而且宿主你真的确定自己不是病娇吗，你的行为我也好害怕】

0019.en: "Aren't you a villain system? You should be cheering even if I went to kill someone. I haven't done anything yet and you're already scared. You're so useless, aren't you?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “你不是反派系统吗，就算我去杀人你也应该拍手叫好的好不好，我啥都没干呢你就害怕，也太废物了吧？”

0019.en: [QAQ]
0019.speaker: 系统
0019.cn: 【QAQ】

0019.en: Chi Xiaocheng rolled her eyes. After making sure she was completely soaked, she huddled back under the rain shelter, curling up to preserve her last bit of warmth.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 池小橙翻了个白眼，确认自己被完全淋湿了，这才再度躲到挡雨板下，蜷缩着身子以保证最后一点温暖。

0019.en: She had already completed the second step of her plan, using Emotion Points to buy and eat an energy pill.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她执行完自己计划的第二步，已经用情绪值买了一颗能量药丸吃了。

0019.en: But the weakness of this body was beyond Chi Xiaocheng's expectations; she still felt very weak even after taking the pill.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 可这具身体的虚弱出乎池小橙意料，吃了药还是感觉很虚。

0019.en: Her head ached, felt heavy, and she desperately wanted to sleep.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她感觉头很疼，很重，很想睡觉。

0019.en: But the female lead hadn't arrived yet, and the third step of her plan was the most crucial.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 可女主都没来，计划的第三步才是重中之重。

0019.en: Afraid she would pass out from weakness, she forced herself to talk to the System again. "To answer your question from before, I told you I'm playing a yandere character. If I'm going to act, I have to go all the way. Otherwise, how will I make the female lead fall for it?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: 怕虚弱到直接昏睡过去，于是又强撑着和系统搭话，“回答你刚刚的问题，都说了我这是病娇的人设，要演就要演得绝一点，不然怎么让女主陷进去呢？”

0019.en: "Besides, a real yandere wouldn't be as self-aware as I am. They don't even know they're a yandere, okay?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “而且，病娇哪里会有我这么清晰的意识，人家是病娇自己都不知道的好不好。”

0019.en: "And think about that look Ye Liang gave me this afternoon, plus the hundreds of Emotion Points I just got. I feel like he wants to bury me alive right now. I have to get more Emotion Points and keep the female lead on my side."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “再想想下午叶良那眼神，还有刚刚收到大几百的情绪值，我感觉他现在恨不得埋了我，必须多拿点情绪值，并把女主抓在手里才行。”

0019.en: Without the protection of the female lead's halo, Chi Xiaocheng was truly afraid something would happen to her!
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 没有女主光环的保护，池小橙真的怕自己会出事啊！

0019.en: Her conversation turned into a monologue.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 从聊天，变成自言自语。

0019.en: After an unknown amount of time, the rooftop door was thrown open with a "bang."
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 也不知道过了多久，天台的门“砰”地被用力推开。

0019.en: An anxious voice called out, "Xiaocheng!"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 一道焦急的声音响起，“小橙！”

0019.en: Su Tao was here!
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 苏桃来了！

0019.en: She panted, leaning against the wall to keep from collapsing from her weak legs.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她喘着粗气，扶住墙壁没让自己因腿软倒下。

0019.en: After cycling for half an hour in the storm and flooded roads, she had to climb 14 floors because of a power outage, desperately hoping to see Chi Xiaocheng in the stairwell.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 连续在暴雨和水路中蹬了半小时的自行车，又因为停电使用不了电梯，她跑回来后一口气爬上14楼，无比期望能够在楼道间看到池小橙的身影。

0019.en: The iron door slammed in the wind, and her dress was completely soaked, clinging to her skin with water droplets. Every step was exhausting.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 铁门被风肆虐，发出“咣咣”的声音，礼服已经被彻底打湿，夹带水珠贴合肌肤，她每走一步路都觉得很累。

0019.en: But even so, she stepped outside and shouted against the wind, "Xiaocheng, where are you!"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 可即便如此，她还是走出了门外，迎着风大声喊道，“小橙你在哪！”

0019.en: There was no answer from the rooftop, and she couldn't see Chi Xiaocheng.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 天台无人回应，视野里也看不到池小橙。

0019.en: But when she was downstairs, she hadn't seen any "body" or ambulance.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 可她到楼下的时候，也没发现所谓的“尸体”和救护车。

0019.en: Xiaocheng must still be okay!
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 小橙一定还没事的！

0019.en: She believed it with all her heart.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她心中无比坚信。

0019.en: Just as she was about to search the rooftop, Su Tao suddenly heard a weak but happy voice, "Taotao, are you back?"
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: 正想在天台搜上一圈，苏桃忽然听到一道虚弱又惊喜的声音，“桃桃，你回来了吗？”

0019.en: "Xiaocheng?!"
0019.speaker: 苏桃

0019.en: Following the voice, Su Tao was overjoyed to find Chi Xiaocheng hiding under the rain shelter.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 循声而去，苏桃惊喜地发现，池小橙正躲在挡雨板下面。

0019.en: Her tense body suddenly relaxed. Her legs gave way, and Su Tao fell onto Chi Xiaocheng, hugging her tightly, her voice choked with tears, "Xiaocheng, I'm so glad you're okay!"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 强撑着的身子陡然放松，腿一软，苏桃便扑在了池小橙身上，用力地搂着她，哭腔响起，“小橙，你没事真是太好了！”

0019.en: Tears mixed with raindrops streamed down her face.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 泪水夹着雨滴，顺着她的脸颊滑落。

0019.en: Leaning on her shoulder, Chi Xiaocheng felt the warmth of the embrace, a slight smile playing on her lips.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 靠在她的肩头，池小橙感受着那温暖的怀抱，唇角轻轻上扬。

0019.en: Ah~ This feeling of being loved with all one's heart is so warm.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 啊~这种被全身心爱着的怀抱，真是太温暖了。

0019.en: That was what she felt inside, but her acting was still on point.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 心中是一番感受，但她的演技没有下线。

0019.en: Worry and fear flowed towards Su Tao along with her weak sobs, "I... I'm sorry, Taotao. The 14th... 14th floor was too high... I didn't dare to jump. I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry..."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: 担忧害怕的情绪随着她的柔弱的哭声一同涌向苏桃，“对...对不起桃桃，14...14楼太高了，我不敢跳下去，对不起对不起对不起......”

0019.en: Hearing this, Su Tao's heart ached.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 听到这话，苏桃心中一疼。

0019.en: She knew Chi Xiaocheng had misunderstood her.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她知道是池小橙误解了自己的话。

0019.en: But she didn't blame her. She felt more self-reproach, because she hadn't been clear and almost got Xiaocheng killed.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 但她没有怪她，更多的是自责，因为她没说清楚，差点害死了小橙。

0019.en: Filled with guilt, Su Tao took a deep breath, cupped Chi Xiaocheng's face, and gently wiped away her tears with her thumb, saying,
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 内心被愧疚占据，苏桃深呼吸了一口气，伸手捧住池小橙的脸蛋，拇指温柔地将泪水揩去，说道：

0019.en: "You don't have to say sorry. It's my fault, I didn't explain clearly. Anyway, as long as you're okay, Xiaocheng, everything's fine..."
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: “不用说对不起，是我的错，是我没说清楚，总之小橙你没事就好，没事就好...”

0019.en: Chi Xiaocheng sniffled, her voice still weak and tearful, "Taotao isn't mad at me? I... I did so many wrong things before, and now I've made Taotao worry, I..."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: 池小橙滋溜一下鼻子，依旧是柔弱的哭腔，“桃桃不会怪我吗，我...我以前做了那么多错事，现在还让桃桃担心了，我......”

0019.en: "Shh!"
0019.speaker: 苏桃

0019.en: Su Tao pressed her long index finger to Chi Xiaocheng's lips, her forehead gently touching hers. "How could I be mad at Xiaocheng?" she said softly. "Everyone makes mistakes. And you're trying to change now, aren't you? We agreed to have a talk tonight."
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 苏桃修长的食指抵住了池小橙的唇瓣，额头轻轻贴上她的额头，温柔道，“我怎么会怪小橙呢，谁都有做错的时候，小橙现在已经要改正了不是吗，我们约好了今晚要聊一下的呢。”

0019.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled through her tears, then began to grope around frantically.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 池小橙破涕为笑，转而又带些许慌张地伸手在旁边摸索。

0019.en: Su Tao asked curiously, "What are you looking for?"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 苏桃好奇问道，“找什么呢？”

0019.en: "A gift."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “礼物。”

0019.en: "A gift?" Su Tao didn't understand what Chi Xiaocheng meant, but then she remembered something. "By the way, Xiaocheng, what did you want to tell me on the rooftop?"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: “礼物？”苏桃不明白池小橙说的话，忽地想起什么，“说起来，小橙约我上天台是想跟我说什么？”

0019.en: "It's about what happened during the day." Chi Xiaocheng fumbled for a moment and finally found the bottle, beautifully wrapped with a ribbon, and carefully handed it to Su Tao. "During the day, you and Ye Liang were like that, you wouldn't even drink my water..."
0019.speaker: 池小橙
0019.cn: “是白天的事情。”池小橙摸索了一下，终于找到了用缎带精心包装的瓶子，小心翼翼地递到苏桃手中，“白天桃桃跟叶良那样子，喝水都不喝我的......”

0019.en: Su Tao was stunned for a moment.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 苏桃愣了一下。

0019.en: Then she said, half-amused and half-exasperated, "It was all because of that? Xiaocheng, you're really..."
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 转而哭笑不得地说着，“就因为这个事情啊，小橙你真的是......”

0019.en: You're so silly.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 真的是太傻了。

0019.en: She didn't notice anything unusual about Chi Xiaocheng. She just thought that giving her a gift late at night because of what happened during the day was Chi Xiaocheng's way of apologizing.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她倒也没意识到池小橙的不对劲，只是觉得大晚上特意因为白天的事情送自己礼物，在池小橙视角里是对自己的道歉。

0019.en: Does it feel a bit like she's jealous?
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 怎么感觉有点像吃醋了呢？

0019.en: She took the gift. It was too dark to see Chi Xiaocheng's expression.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 她接过礼物，天很黑看不到池小橙的表情。

0019.en: But Su Tao could vaguely feel the anticipation in her eyes.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 但苏桃隐隐能感觉到，对方眼神期待。

0019.en: She said softly, "I'll accept this gift, but Xiaocheng has to be good and listen. Let's go back to the dorm first, okay?"
0019.speaker: 苏桃
0019.cn: 她柔声说道，“我收下这份礼物，小橙就要乖乖听话，我们先下楼回宿舍去，好吗？”

0019.en: "Okay~"
0019.speaker: 池小橙

0019.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was very obedient, seemingly softer than usual, with the sweet and sticky quality of a loli.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 池小橙声音很乖巧，似乎比平时还要软，带上了萝莉特有的点点腻和糯。

0019.en: This reminded Su Tao of Chi Xiaocheng in middle school.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 这倒是让苏桃想起了初中时候的池小橙。

0019.en: The current Xiaocheng has become more like she used to be.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 现在的小橙，倒是变得和以前差不多呢。

0019.en: Although she's worrying, she's also kind of cute?
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 虽然很让人担心，但也怪可爱的？

0019.en: Su Tao didn't think too much about it and accepted the gift as Chi Xiaocheng wished.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 苏桃没有细想，也就顺着池小橙的意思，收下了礼物。

0019.en: Suddenly, a loud "BOOM" was accompanied by a flash of lightning.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 忽然，“轰隆”一声响起，伴随雷声到来的，是刺眼的闪电。

0019.en: As if to illuminate the entire dark world, the lightning dispelled the fog before Su Tao's eyes, and the so-called gift came into view.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 仿佛要将整个黑暗的世界照亮，闪电的出现驱散了苏桃眼前的迷雾，所谓的礼物，也映入眼帘。

0019.en: Su Tao's pupils contracted violently, and she suddenly felt the raindrops on her skin sting like icy needles.
0019.speaker: 旁白
0019.cn: 苏桃瞳孔猛地收缩，霎时感觉滴到身上的雨珠如寒芒般刺痛皮肤。

0020.en: Chapter 20: I've become like this all because of you~
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 第20章 我变成这样，都是因为你呢~

0020.en: It was supposed to be a beautiful moment of resolving misunderstandings, opening up to each other, and sharing warmth.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 本应该是解开误会，相互交心，相互温存的美好的展开。

0020.en: But that was shattered the moment she saw the gift-bearer's demonic eyes and chilling smile.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 却在看到拿着礼物那人妖异的瞳孔和渗人的笑容时，被轰得支离破碎。

0020.en: The scene from the basement instantly flashed through her mind.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 脑海中霎时想起了地下室的那一幕。

0020.en: Restrained, unable to move.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 被限制，动弹不得。

0020.en: Her face was held firmly as words of madness and love were whispered into her ear.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 强行掐住脸颊，她在自己耳边说着包含疯狂与爱的话语。

0020.en: The same strange methods.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 同样奇怪的方式。

0020.en: The same wrong expressions of affection.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 同样不对的表达。

0020.en: But in Chi Xiaocheng's eyes, such a gift was just ordinary love.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 但在池小橙眼里，那样的礼物就是普通的爱。

0020.en: But Su Tao didn't understand. This was the twisted logic of a yandere: love could be expressed in any way.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 而苏桃不清楚，这就是病娇畸形的认知，爱是可以用任何方式去展现的。

0020.en: Su Tao quickly threw the gift aside, her eyes filled with terror.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃连忙将礼物扔到一边，眼神惊恐无比。

0020.en: Earlier tonight, she had wanted to jump from the building because of a single sentence.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 今晚因为她的一句话想从楼上跳下去。

0020.en: And now she was talking about giving a gift.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 现在又说什么送礼物。

0020.en: As her breathing became difficult from the shock, Su Tao's mind was a complete mess.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 伴随着因为惊骇而产生的呼吸困难，苏桃脑子乱成一团。

0020.en: The cold raindrops stinging her skin kept her from losing her senses like she had in the basement.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 打在身上的冰凉雨滴刺痛着肌肤，让她不至于像地下室那样失去理智。

0020.en: A thread of reason remained in her mind, wondering why Chi Xiaocheng was doing this.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 脑海中仍有一丝的理性，思考着池小橙为什么要这样做。

0020.en: What could the gift be?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 礼物会是什么？

0020.en: The box is wrapped so beautifully?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 包装的盒子这样精致？

0020.en: And the motive?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 动机呢？

0020.en: Suddenly, Su Tao remembered something Chi Xiaocheng had said in the basement: "You can only like me, Taotao."
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 忽地，苏桃想到了在地下室时，池小橙对她说过的一句话：你只能喜欢我哦桃桃

0020.en: Could that be the reason?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 难道是因为这个？

0020.en: But this is too extreme!
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 可这样也太极端了！

0020.en: Countless questions flashed through her mind, and then she smelled a fragrance other than mud and dust.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 脑海中闪过无数问题，此刻鼻尖又闻到了除泥尘以外的香味。

0020.en: "Don't you like it?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: “不喜欢吗？”

0020.en: A soft question whispered in her ear.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 耳边，传来细软的询问声。

0020.en: Su Tao stiffly turned her head, wet strands of hair covering half of her eyes, hiding a flicker of terror.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃僵硬地侧过脸，沾着水的缕缕秀发盖住了半边眸子，遮掩住眼神的一抹惊恐。

0020.en: A bolt of lightning flashed, once again illuminating the dark night.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 一道闪电划过，再度照亮了这个乌黑的夜晚。

0020.en: It was just for an instant, but Su Tao still noticed Chi Xiaocheng's crimson eyes glowing red in the flash.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 仅仅只有一瞬，苏桃还是注意到了，池小橙那本就赤红的眼眸，在闪电的映衬下好似绽放着红芒。

0020.en: The soft voice ignored her fear and continued, "Taotao didn't like the mineral water today, so you don't like this either?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 细软的声音并没有照顾她那惊恐的感受，继续萦绕在耳边，“白天的矿泉水桃桃不喜欢，这个也不喜欢吗？”

0020.en: "Oh, I see now."
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: “哦，我明白了。”

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng showed a look of sudden realization, her voice becoming twisted, "Could it be that Taotao prefers Ye Liang's gift?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 池小橙露出恍然大悟的表情，熟练地扬起那妖异的笑容，声线逐渐病态，“桃桃难道更喜欢叶良的礼物？”

0020.en: Ye Liang?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 叶良？

0020.en: Why bring up Ye Liang again?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 为什么又提到了叶良？

0020.en: Su Tao's mind couldn't even process it before Chi Xiaocheng made her next move.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃脑子甚至都没转过来，池小橙就已经又有所行动了。

0020.en: "Taotao, can you just say you like me?~"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: “桃桃，能说一句喜欢我吗~”

0020.en: A warm breath tickled her nose, and another flash of lightning revealed Chi Xiaocheng leaning in close, her eyes deep and dark.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 鼻尖传来一阵温热的气息，又是一道闪电划过，池小橙正凑在自己面前，眼神幽深。

0020.en: Like a predator staring at its prey, her crimson pupils flickered with a demonic light in the darkness.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 就像是盯着猎物一样，赤红色的瞳孔在黑夜中不断闪烁妖异的光芒。

0020.en: Was it really as simple as saying she liked her?
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 真的只是一句喜欢那么简单吗？

0020.en: Looking at that smiling expression, Su Tao's eyes filled with fear, the previous gentleness gone.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 看着那笑吟吟的眼神，苏桃眼神中渐渐多了一抹害怕，再也没了刚刚的温柔。

0020.en: Only now was she truly convinced that Chi Xiaocheng's behavior in the basement was no accident.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 直到现在，她才真正确信，地下室时的池小橙，那样的表现不是偶然。

0020.en: She was acting the same way again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 现在又和之前一样了。

0020.en: This version of Xiaocheng felt like a stranger to her.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 这样的小橙，让她感到陌生。

0020.en: "Taotao, why are you looking at me like that? Didn't you say you wouldn't hate me?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: “桃桃，为什么用那样的眼神看着我呢，你不是说不会讨厌我的吗？”

0020.en: "If you don't hate me, doesn't that mean you like me?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: “不讨厌我，难道不是喜欢我吗？”

0020.en: The soft voice gradually became resentful, making Su Tao's heart tighten again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 细软的声音渐渐幽怨，又让苏桃心中一紧。

0020.en: She had a gut feeling that if she couldn't calm Chi Xiaocheng down, she might really "go down" as she understood it.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她隐隐有一种感觉，接下来如果不能将池小橙安抚下来，恐怕她真的会像刚刚那样，在她的理解中——下去！

0020.en: She swallowed hard and bit her tongue sharply.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 咽了一口唾沫，又强行咬了一下舌尖。

0020.en: She forced down the discomfort in her throat, using the pain to stay clear-headed.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 忍下喉咙中的不适，以疼痛来让自己清醒。

0020.en: Su Tao forced a strained smile at Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, I... of course I don't hate you, it's just..."
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 苏桃对池小橙挤出一个牵强的笑容，“小橙，我...我当然不讨厌你，就是……”

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng pulled her hand back again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 池小橙又抽回了手。

0020.en: She slowly raised her head, staring intently into Su Tao's eyes in the darkness, "If you don't like me... does that mean Taotao likes Ye Liang?"
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 缓缓抬头，在黑夜中用微小的视线死死地盯着苏桃的双眼，“不喜欢我，难道……桃桃喜欢叶良？”

0020.en: As she asked, her hands moved without hesitation.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 询问出口，手中的动作一点不慢。

0020.en: She gently caressed Su Tao's cheek, her thumb rubbing against the skin, feeling like a needle prick that made Su Tao tremble.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 轻轻抚上了苏桃的脸颊，拇指揩拭摩挲，指尖刮在肌肤，就像针刺一样令苏桃感到胆颤。

0020.en: Su Tao quickly took out her phone and turned on the flashlight.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃连忙拿出手机打开了手电筒。

0020.en: Her pupils contracted, and her hand trembled, dropping the phone to the ground.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 瞳孔猛然收缩，手一抖手机掉到了地上。

0020.en: The flashlight lit Chi Xiaocheng's pretty face from below.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 手电筒自下而上，照在池小橙的俏脸。

0020.en: She wore a demonic, twisted smile, her eyes filled with what she thought was love!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她扬着妖异的笑容，笑容病态，眼神自以为包含爱意！

0020.en: Little did she know, in Su Tao's eyes, such love was terrifying, and those beautiful eyes seemed to glow red.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 殊不知这样的爱意，在苏桃眼里却恐怖无比，那双漂亮的眸子，像是要绽放红芒。

0020.en: Horror.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 惊悚。

0020.en: Fear.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 害怕。

0020.en: Rapid breathing.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 呼吸急促。

0020.en: Su Tao's mind was once again in chaos.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃脑子再度乱作一团。

0020.en: Just then, she met Chi Xiaocheng's bewitching crimson eyes again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 恰逢此时，又对上池小橙的妖艳赤瞳。

0020.en: She didn't speak, but raised her hand again, holding a photo of her and Ye Liang together.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她没说话，但手又举了起来，手心中，拿着一张她和叶良在一起拍的照片。

0020.en: Even though rainwater was trickling down her face and over her lips, Su Tao still felt her lips were dry.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 明明雨水顺着脸颊滑落嘴唇，但苏桃还是觉得嘴唇很干。

0020.en: Rip—the photo was torn to shreds, as if to tear her and Ye Liang apart.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 撕拉——照片被撕个粉碎，又像是要将她和叶良一起撕烂。

0020.en: Su Tao had no time to think, she only knew that if she didn't stop her, this twisted side of her might get even worse!
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃来不及多想，只知道不制止的话，她这样病态的一面可能会更严重！

0020.en: Biting her tongue hard again, Su Tao quickly grabbed Chi Xiaocheng's hand, her voice cracking, "Xiaocheng, please don't be like this, I've never hated you, and I never chose Ye Liang over you, please believe me!"
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 再度用力咬了一下舌尖，苏桃连忙将池小橙拿到的手给钳住，声音有些崩溃，“小橙，你别这样好吗，我从来没有讨厌过你，也没有因为叶良而放弃你，你相信我好吗！”

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng seemed not to hear her, showing a silly, satisfied smile.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 池小橙好像没听到这句话一样，露出个傻傻而又满足的笑容。

0020.en: She leaned her cheek closer.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 将脸颊凑了过去。

0020.en: Su Tao's breathing grew more rapid; this pretty face was so lovely, yet now it frightened her.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃呼吸愈发急促，明明这张俏脸是那样的可爱，现在却让她感到害怕。

0020.en: Looking up, she met Chi Xiaocheng's expectant crimson eyes again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 抬起头，又对上池小橙期待的赤瞳。

0020.en: It was as if she was urging her to hurry.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 就好像在催促她快点一样。

0020.en: Urging her to quickly show her affection.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 催促她快点表现出对自己的喜欢。

0020.en: Su Tao clenched her jaw, shut her eyes tightly, her body trembling and stiff, but she gathered all her strength.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 苏桃一咬牙，紧紧地闭上了双眸，颤颤巍巍身体僵硬，但还是鼓足了力气。

0020.en: She had to take the initiative to show her affection, to prove she was more important than Ye Liang.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 她不得不主动去表达对她的喜欢，证明她大于叶良。

0020.en: With the rain, she could feel nothing but softness.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 伴随着雨水，除了柔软什么也感受不到。

0020.en: But the memory of Chi Xiaocheng's twisted eyes still terrified her.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 但想起池小橙病态的眸子，依旧让她感到害怕无比。

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng watched with satisfaction, a hint of excitement on her face.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 池小橙满足地看着这一幕，脸上多了一丝兴奋。

0020.en: After tonight, Su Tao would never ignore her again, right?
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 今晚过后，想必无论如何苏桃都不会再忽视自己了吧？

0020.en: She will definitely try to understand why I became like this, and during that time, she will protect me, even from those male leads.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 她一定会去了解自己为什么会变成这样，在这期间，即便是在那些男主面前，她也一定会维护我。

0020.en: Yes, that's it!
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 没错，就是这样！

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng no longer looked sad and pitiful.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 池小橙哪里还有刚刚的伤心可怜样。

0020.en: She lowered her head, bringing her nose to Su Tao's damp hair, enjoying the faint, fresh scent.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 小脑袋低下，鼻尖凑到了苏桃湿漉漉的秀发前，享受着那淡淡的清香。

0020.en: Her face was entranced, the corners of her lips turned up, like a hunter watching its prey walk into a trap.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 面色如痴如醉，唇角上扬，好似一个猎人，看着猎物逐渐步入自己的圈套。

0020.en: I finally completed the third step.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 终于坚持着完成了这第三步。

0020.en: I'm at my limit, both physically and mentally.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 无论是身体还是精神，都已经到极限了呢。

0020.en: Perfect, I can faint in her arms.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 正好，可以晕在她的怀里。

0020.en: Taotao, this time, I've become like this because of you again.
0020.speaker: 池小橙
0020.cn: 桃桃呀，这一次，我也是因为你才变成这样的呢

0020.en: Chi Xiaocheng gradually relaxed, and a wave of sleepiness washed over her.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 池小橙心中渐渐放松，倦意也涌了上来。

0020.en: "Thump," she fell onto Su Tao.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: “噗通”一下，倒在了苏桃的身上。

0020.en: Pinned by the small body, Su Tao belatedly lifted her head and frantically grabbed Chi Xiaocheng's shoulders, "Xiaocheng!"
0020.speaker: 苏桃
0020.cn: 被娇小的身子压住，苏桃后知后觉地抬起头，惊慌地扶住了池小橙的肩膀，“小橙！”

0020.en: BOOM—
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 轰隆——

0020.en: The thunder roared again.
0020.speaker: 旁白
0020.cn: 雷声，又响了起来。

0021.en: Chapter 21: Heaven is Knocking at the Door
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 第21章 老天爷在敲门

0021.en: Drip~ Drip~
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 滴答~滴答

0021.en: The rain gradually lessened. Dongfang Yang closed his umbrella, shook off the raindrops from his body, and rushed into the girls' dormitory.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 雨势渐小，东方阳关掉伞，抖了抖身上的雨便冲进了女生宿舍。

0021.en: Fortunately, there was a power outage at the time, so he moved quickly and no one noticed him.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 好在此时停电，他溜得快倒也没人发现。

0021.en: After being stuck in traffic for half an hour and receiving a phone call from Su Tao, he finally arrived here.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 堵车半小时，接了苏桃一个电话后他终于来到了这里。

0021.en: His mood was as gloomy as the dark clouds above. He knew something very serious had happened tonight.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 心情就如同这乌云一样低沉，他知道今晚发生了很严重的事情。

0021.en: It was also the first time he had seen Su Tao so anxious.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 也是第一次看到苏桃会那么着急。

0021.en: But the person making her anxious wasn't him!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 可让她着急的对象，竟然不是自己！

0021.en: Moreover, he still didn't know what exactly had happened. He had just been used as a tool all evening.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 况且他还不知道到底发生了什么，只是当了一晚上的工具人。

0021.en: First, he had to watch Ye Liang show off. When he finally had a chance to make his presence known, he got stuck in traffic and couldn't even help Su Tao. When he finally reached the school, Su Tao called asking him to go to the girls' dormitory to help?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 先是看叶良装逼，好不容易能刷一下存在感结果路上堵车，帮都没帮到苏桃，好不容易到了学校，接到苏桃的电话说要上女生宿舍帮忙？

0021.en: And he was helping Chi Xiaocheng!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 帮的还是池小橙的忙！

0021.en: He felt like he was just a tool.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 感觉自己就像是一个工具。

0021.en: This made Dongfang Yang strangely jealous.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这让东方阳莫名地吃醋。

0021.en: Even though the target of his jealousy, Chi Xiaocheng, was a girl.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 即便吃醋的对象池小橙是个女生。

0021.en: "But after tonight, Su Tao will definitely have much better feelings toward me, right?"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “不过今晚过去，苏桃一定会对我好感大增的吧？”

0021.en: Dongfang Yang climbed the stairs, thinking with anticipation.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 东方阳爬着楼梯，不由期待地想道。

0021.en: Then he reached the rooftop.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 然后到了天台。

0021.en: Without even opening his umbrella, he hurriedly searched for Su Tao's figure.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 连伞都不打，急匆匆寻找苏桃的身影。

0021.en: Then his smile froze.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 紧接着，他笑容僵住了。

0021.en: Under the rain shelter, he saw two beautiful girls huddled together.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 只见挡雨板下，两个美少女相互挨在一起。

0021.en: Su Tao was holding Chi Xiaocheng, who was curled up in a ball, in her arms. As if afraid she might catch cold, Su Tao was doing her best to wrap her arms around the petite girl, actively exposing half of her own body to the rain to help shield Chi Xiaocheng from the raindrops blown in by the wind.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 苏桃将蜷缩成一团的池小橙搂在怀里，好似怕她会感冒，尽自己最大的努力将这一只娇小的萝莉环住，并自己主动让出半边身子淋雨，好能帮池小橙遮住被风带进的雨滴。

0021.en: Both seemed to have fallen asleep from exhaustion, and the water droplets had made their hair stick together.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 二人似乎都因为疲惫而睡着，水珠将二人的秀发都贴在了一起。

0021.en: Watching the two beautiful girls cuddling together, Dongfang Yang had to admit.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 看着两位美少女相互依偎，东方阳承认。

0021.en: He was bitter with jealousy.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他酸了。

0021.en: This kind of romantic drama scene should be between the male lead and female lead, right? What gave Chi Xiaocheng the right?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这种玛丽苏剧情的展开，应该是放在男主和女主身上才对的吧，她池小橙凭什么？

0021.en: Did I get the wrong script?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 难不成我拿错剧本了？

0021.en: Though his heart was in turmoil, Dongfang Yang quickly woke Su Tao up. "Su Tao, wake up. Don't sleep here, you'll catch cold!"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 心中波澜万千，但东方阳还是很快将苏桃给叫醒，“苏桃，醒醒，别在这里睡了，会感冒的！”

0021.en: Being tapped on the shoulder, Su Tao suddenly woke up.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 被拍了一下肩膀，苏桃猛然惊醒。

0021.en: Instinctively, she shouted, "Xiaocheng!"
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: 下意识地就大喊了一声，“小橙！”

0021.en: Feeling the burning softness in her arms, Su Tao felt much more at ease. "She's still here, that's good."
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: 感受着怀里的滚烫的柔软，苏桃安心了不少，“人还在，没事就好。”

0021.en: This scene made Dongfang Yang's expression even uglier.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 这样一幕，让东方阳脸色更难看了。

0021.en: He was so jealous his face was twisted!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 嫉妒到面部扭曲！

0021.en: He had been pursuing Su Tao for three months and hadn't even held her hand!
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他追求了苏桃三个月，手都没牵过啊！！！

0021.en: Fortunately, the darkness hid his expression.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 好在夜色将他表情藏住。

0021.en: Dongfang Yang took a deep breath, calmed his emotions, and comforted himself that Chi Xiaocheng and Su Tao had a good relationship as best friends, so being close was nothing unusual.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 东方阳深吸一口气，平复自己心情，自我安慰池小橙和苏桃关系好，是闺蜜，亲密一点也没什么。

0021.en: Girls, after all - this was normal.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 女孩子嘛，这样很正常。

0021.en: He reached out and pulled Su Tao to her feet. "Come on, let's go down first."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 他伸出手，将苏桃给拉了起来，“走吧，我们先下去。”

0021.en: "Mm." Su Tao leaned against the wall and looked at Chi Xiaocheng. "My legs are a bit numb. Could you help me?"
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: “嗯。”苏桃扶着墙壁，又看向池小橙，“我腿有些发麻，麻烦你帮忙一下。”

0021.en: "No problem."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “没问题。”

0021.en: Dongfang Yang crouched down and was about to pick up Chi Xiaocheng, but when he saw colors on the ground that were different from the clear rainwater, his eyes widened.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 东方阳蹲了下来，顺势就想将池小橙给抱起，可见到地上有别于雨水清透的颜色，又瞪大了眼睛。

0021.en: "What is this?"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “这是什么？”

0021.en: He asked in confusion, and immediately noticed there were many marks on Chi Xiaocheng's hands.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 他发出疑惑的声音，顿时就发现了池小橙的手上有不少痕迹。

0021.en: He had no idea how such marks had gotten there.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 完全不知道这样的痕迹，是怎么弄上去的。

0021.en: Had she bumped into something, or had someone hurt her?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 是磕碰到了哪里，还是说被人伤害了？

0021.en: He took a deep breath and looked at Su Tao. "Is this what you meant by life-threatening danger? She wanted to leave this world forever?"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 他深吸一口气，看向苏桃，“这就是你说的生命危险吗，她想永远离开这个世界？”

0021.en: Su Tao was silent for a moment. "Let's take Xiaocheng to the hospital first. I'll explain to you later."
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: 苏桃沉默了一下，“先带小橙去医院吧，我一会儿给你解释。”

0021.en: "Alright!"
0021.speaker: 东方阳

0021.en: He easily picked up Chi Xiaocheng, and the two quickly went downstairs.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 轻松将池小橙抱起，二人迅速下了楼。

0021.en: After getting her into the car, they both finally breathed a sigh of relief.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 又送到车上后，这才双双松了口气。

0021.en: Dongfang Yang calmly started the car. "Let's go to the nearest hospital first. My private hospital is too far from here, and she has a high fever now. If we delay, something might happen."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳冷静地点火启动，“先送去离这里最近的医院吧，我的私人医院离这里太远了，她现在高烧，拖下去怕出事。”

0021.en: Su Tao sat beside Chi Xiaocheng, holding her hand. "I hope there won't be traffic jams."
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: 苏桃就坐在池小橙的身边，握住她的手，“希望不要堵车。”

0021.en: "If there's another traffic jam, I'll directly call for a helicopter!"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “再堵车，我直接叫人开飞机过来！”

0021.en: Dongfang Yang said fiercely, turning on the headlights and quickly driving away from the school.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 东方阳恶狠狠地说了一句，打着车灯迅速驶离学校。

0021.en: Getting to the hospital would still take some time, and he couldn't help but glance at the rearview mirror.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 前往医院还需要一点时间，他又不禁朝后视镜看了眼。

0021.en: He saw Su Tao constantly using tissues to care for Chi Xiaocheng, first drying the water from her hair and neck, then wiping away the cold sweat that had appeared.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 只见苏桃不断用纸巾给池小橙整理，先将头发和脖子上的水擦干，又给她擦去溢出的冷汗。

0021.en: Her eyes showed heartache, and her movements were gentle.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 眼含心疼，动作温柔。

0021.en: Dongfang Yang looked away and asked, "We'll be at the hospital in a few minutes. Now can you tell me what's going on? And how did Chi Xiaocheng get hurt?"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳收回视线，问道，“到医院还要几分钟，现在可以跟我说说是什么情况了吧，池小橙的伤又是怎么回事？”

0021.en: Su Tao paused her movements and bit her lower lip.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 苏桃停了停动作，咬住下唇。

0021.en: Chi Xiaocheng was gradually returning to normal, but that scene seemed engraved in her soul.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 池小橙已经渐渐正常，可那样的一幕仿佛铭刻在了灵魂中。

0021.en: She slowly said, "My mind is also very confused. I haven't had much contact with Xiaocheng these past two months, and I don't know what happened to her. These marks on her hands - she did them all to herself."
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: 她缓缓道，“我脑子也很乱，这两个月我都没怎么和小橙接触，也不知道她发生了什么事情，她手上的这个，都是她自己弄的。”

0021.en: After thinking for a long time, Su Tao still hid the fact that Chi Xiaocheng had given her gifts.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 思考许久，苏桃还是隐瞒了池小橙送礼物给她的事情。

0021.en: She was clear about Dongfang Yang's feelings for her.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她清楚东方阳对自己的感情。

0021.en: Speaking of such disturbing things, she was afraid he would react as extremely as Ye Liang had.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 说出那样渗人的事情，害怕他会和叶良一样过激。

0021.en: But even saying half of such things was very shocking.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 可这样的事情，即便说一半，也很让人惊骇了。

0021.en: Dongfang Yang had seen many strange things, but even so, his eyes showed some shock. "You're saying Chi Xiaocheng has always had tendencies toward self-harm?"
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳见过许多奇怪的事情，然是如此，眼神也有些震惊，“你是说，池小橙一直有自我伤害的倾向？”

0021.en: The disturbing marks on those small, tender hands were heartbreaking to look at.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 小手那白嫩上的违和，看着就让人揪心。

0021.en: Speaking of this, Dongfang Yang suddenly remembered something and said, "Wait, maybe it wasn't voluntary. Maybe she was forced."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 说着，东方阳又想起了什么，忽地道，“等一下，没准不是自愿的，可能是被逼的。”

0021.en: "Forced?" Su Tao was stunned.
0021.speaker: 苏桃
0021.cn: “被逼的？”苏桃愣了一下。

0021.en: She knew it should have been Chi Xiaocheng's own choice, and it was for her sake.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她清楚那应该是池小橙自愿的，而且还是为了她。

0021.en: But why would Dongfang Yang come to such a conclusion?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 但东方阳为什么会得出这样的结论？

0021.en: Dongfang Yang explained, "Actually, yesterday I had someone investigate what happened to Chi Xiaocheng these past two months. Perhaps without your protection, she's been having a hard time these two months."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳解释道，“其实在昨天，我让人调查了一下池小橙身上这两个月发生的事情，兴许是没有了你的庇护，她这两个月一直过得不如意。”

0021.en: Su Tao frowned.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 苏桃皱了皱眉。

0021.en: Dongfang Yang: "Setting aside her targeting you, outside of those matters, Chi Xiaocheng has actually been in a state of long-term bullying."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳：“暂且不提她针对你的事情，在这些事情外，池小橙其实一直都处于一个被长期霸凌的状态。”

0021.en: "Her home is near here, right? And her high school isn't far either. Although she entered university, her high school relationships never changed. Since she's a day student, when she goes home she's often blocked by delinquent girls."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “她的家在这附近对吧，高中也离这里不远，虽然进入了大学，可高中的人际关系一直都没变，她又是走读，往日回家经常被不良少女堵门。”

0021.en: "And at school, there are also several guys who got in through connections. She gets bullied at school, and then gets blocked when she goes home. Someone as foolish as her would easily develop psychological trauma."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: “而在学校里，也有几个家伙是靠关系进来的，学校里被人欺负，回家还要被人堵，她那样的蠢货很容易留下心理阴影的。”

0021.en: Dongfang Yang sighed. "If she was forced, it wouldn't be strange for her to harm herself."
0021.speaker: 东方阳
0021.cn: 东方阳呼了一口气，“如果说她是被逼的，会伤害自己也不奇怪了。”

0021.en: After hearing this, Su Tao gradually fell silent.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 苏桃听后，渐渐沉默了。

0021.en: Without doubt, Dongfang Yang had found her a very good excuse.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 毫无疑问，东方阳给她找了一个很好的借口。

0021.en: Su Tao was clear that Chi Xiaocheng becoming like this was largely because of herself. Before, she had just subconsciously avoided thinking about what happened in the basement, unwilling to think about it.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 苏桃是清楚的，池小橙会变成这样很大原因还是自己，之前她只是潜意识地回避地下室发生的事情，不愿去想。

0021.en: But just now, holding Chi Xiaocheng.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 可刚刚抱着池小橙。

0021.en: While waiting for Dongfang Yang to arrive under the rain shelter, feeling the fragile body in her arms gradually warming up, Su Tao also calmly recalled the words she had said in the basement.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 在挡雨板下等候东方阳到来时，感受着怀里娇弱的身躯渐渐升温，苏桃也冷静地回忆了一下地下室她说的话。

0021.en: "Taotao, the one I've always liked is you!"
0021.speaker: 池小橙
0021.cn: ——桃桃，我一直喜欢的是你啊！

0021.en: "You always told me that I was your most precious friend, your most important person, the person you liked most!"
0021.speaker: 池小橙
0021.cn: ——你一直跟我说，我才是你最珍贵的朋友，是你最重要的人，是你最喜欢的人！

0021.en: "Since you said all that to me, why did you betray me!"
0021.speaker: 池小橙
0021.cn: ——既然你都这样跟我说了，为什么又要背叛我！

0021.en: Leaning against the seat, Su Tao's throat felt choked up.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 靠在座椅，苏桃喉咙有些哽咽。

0021.en: She looked at the cloudy sky, and lightning seemed to fall along her line of sight, saying to her:
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 她看向乌云密布的天空，闪电好似顺着她的视线落下，并对她说：

0021.en: You gave her hope, guided her thoughts, and when she was hopelessly in love with you, attached to you, dependent on you, you brought her despair.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 你给了她希望，引导着她的思想，在她无可救药地喜欢你、眷恋你、依赖你时，你却又给她带去绝望。

0021.en: If that's the case, why do you still care about her?
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 既然这样，你为什么还要在意她呢？

0021.en: The rainwater struck the windows like heaven's hand knocking at the door, telling her to quickly open it and send Chi Xiaocheng away.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 雨水拍打窗户，好似老天爷的手在敲门，让她赶紧开门，将池小橙送走。

0021.en: The howling wind seemed to whisper in Su Tao's ear: rather than the girl beside you living through this miserable life, it would be better for her to return and end it all.
0021.speaker: 旁白
0021.cn: 呼啸的风声仿佛在苏桃耳边低语：身旁的女孩与其度过这凄惨的人生，不如归去一了百了。

0022.en: Chapter 22: Don't Worry, I'm Not Really a Yandere
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 第22章 放心，我又不是真的病娇

0022.en: My head hurts so much, I'm so tired, it feels like my body is falling apart.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 头好疼，好累，感觉身子要散架了一样。

0022.en: Pale light fell from above, shining on a clean white hospital bed. Chi Xiaocheng's thin and delicate body was covered by layers of white sheets. The smell of disinfectant in the air and the weakness from her body made her slowly wake up.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 苍白的灯光从头顶洒下，照在一张洁白的病床上，池小橙纤细娇小的身体被层层覆盖的白色被单掩映，空气中消毒水的味道和身体带来的虚弱，让她悠悠转醒。

0022.en: "How long was I unconscious?"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “我昏迷了多久？”

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't speak out loud, but asked the System in her mind while squinting her eyes, trying to get used to the hospital lights.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙并未开口，在脑海中询问着系统，同时眯着眼睛，尽量适应医院的光线。

0022.en: She might be unconscious, but the System wouldn't be.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 她会昏迷，但系统不会。

0022.en: [Host was unconscious for three hours. It's now 1 AM. Host is in Jiuzhou City Third People's Hospital. Su Tao and Dongfang Yang brought you here]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【宿主昏迷了三个小时，现在是凌晨1点，宿主在九州市第三人民医院内，是苏桃和东方阳带你过来的】

0022.en: "There's one extra person beyond what I planned. Dongfang Yang is that kind of smart and warm-hearted cheerful guy, right? Having him around Su Tao makes things a bit difficult. A romantic moment between just the two of us would be much better."
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “比计划中多了一个外人，东方阳是那种有点脑子又热心肠的开朗大男孩人设吧，他在苏桃身边可难办了点啊，这种时候二人世界才是最好的。”

0022.en: The System heard Chi Xiaocheng's complaint and couldn't help but fall silent for a moment.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 系统听到池小橙的抱怨，不由沉默了一下。

0022.en: [Host, at a time like this, you're still thinking about such things! I told you to get more energy, but you didn't listen. Otherwise, you wouldn't have fainted from weakness!]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【宿主，都什么时候了你竟然还在想这种事情，叫你多补充点能量你不听，否则也不至于虚弱到晕倒啊！】

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng opened her eyes and stared blankly at the ceiling.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙睁开了眼睛，呆呆地看着天花板。

0022.en: A smile appeared on her lips, "I have to put on a complete show. I showed Su Tao all those injuries on purpose. If my body was still as strong as a bull, wouldn't people get suspicious? I can fool Su Tao, but I can't fool the doctors."
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 唇角扬起笑意，“做戏要做足嘛，我那么多伤故意给苏桃看，身体如果还健壮如牛，岂不是被人怀疑，瞒得过苏桃瞒不过医生们。”

0022.en: [But you didn't have to hurt yourself so badly! Doesn't it hurt?]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【但你也不用下手那么狠吧，不疼吗？】

0022.en: "It actually hurts quite a bit," Chi Xiaocheng replied. "If I didn't have the pain reduction skill, I probably couldn't have kept going. The intermediate acting skill is truly amazing. Without this acting ability, this action wouldn't have been so effective."
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “其实挺疼的。”池小橙答道，“如果没有痛感减弱这个技能，我恐怕根本坚持不下去吧，中级演技确实无敌，没有这个演技这次的行动效果就没那么大了。”

0022.en: After all, her performance back then was indeed quite shocking.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 毕竟那时自己的表现确实有点惊悚了。

0022.en: She was afraid Su Tao wouldn't be able to accept it.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 就怕苏桃不能接受。

0022.en: If Su Tao could have a thought like "I must side with Xiaocheng, or she might get into trouble" every time she sees Ye Liang in the future, that would be perfect!
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 要是以后苏桃每次看到叶良，能够产生一种“必须偏向小橙，否则她可能会出事”这样的想法，就太棒了！

0022.en: "System, how many Emotion Points do I have now?"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “统子，现在我有多少情绪值了？”

0022.en: [2135 points. Su Tao provided 1400 points for the host, and the rest came from Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang, with Ye Liang providing nearly 500 points]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【2135点，其中苏桃为宿主提供了1400点，剩下的则是由叶良和东方阳提供，其中叶良提供了近乎500点】

0022.en: "Ye Liang probably hates me to death, right?"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “叶良恐怕恨死我了吧？”

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng had read this part of the story before.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙之前是看过现在的这段剧情。

0022.en: In the original story, even after Su Tao's face was scratched, she still attended the cruise party. Not only did she show off and gain recognition from Ye Liang's parents, but she also met a male lead who was a divine doctor that had been practicing in the mountains for 20 years.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 原著中，苏桃在被划烂了脸后，依旧参加了游轮的宴会，不仅装逼打脸取得了叶良父母的认可，还结识了一位在深山修炼20年的神医男主。

0022.en: After all, this was an extremely Mary Sue female-oriented novel. The more male leads there were, the more love-hate drama there would be, and the more readers would like it.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 毕竟是玛丽苏到极点的女频文，男主越多，爱恨纠纷就越多，读者也就越喜欢。

0022.en: Without a doubt, the divine doctor male lead would also fall in love with Su Tao for some reason later, and use some ridiculous ability like the "Thirteen Needles of Taiyi" from urban novels to gradually heal the female lead.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 毫无疑问，神医男主也会在后续因为某种事情喜欢上苏桃，并施展都市小说中所谓狗血的“太乙十三针”一样的能力，逐渐治好女主。

0022.en: Even setting aside the later plot, this party was extremely important to Ye Liang, as it concerned his status and reputation in the capital.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 即便抛开后面的剧情不谈，这场宴会对于叶良来说也是重中之重，关乎到他在京城那边的身份和颜面。

0022.en: But now, she had completely ruined it all.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 可现在，被自己全部破坏掉了。

0022.en: "Adding the last party, I'm afraid we're really going to become enemies!"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “加上上次的宴会，怕不是要真的结仇啊！”

0022.en: [You were too impulsive, host. The male leads have plot armor. We villains can't fight them head-on!]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【太冲动了宿主，男主们有光环笼罩，我们反派不能硬刚啊】

0022.en: "I was indeed a bit impulsive," Chi Xiaocheng nodded, looking back on it.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “确实冲动了点。”池小橙马后炮地点点头。

0022.en: But when she thought of Su Tao breaking down and begging her on the rooftop, then bowing down in submission, Chi Xiaocheng couldn't help but get excited.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 但一想到苏桃在天台上崩溃地哀求自己，并俯身顺从的一幕，池小橙就忍不住兴奋起来。

0022.en: "Although I was impulsive, it was totally worth it!"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “虽然冲动，但很值啊！”

0022.en: Besides, over two thousand Emotion Points were enough for her to do two ten-pulls!
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 况且两千多情绪值，足够她进行两次十连抽了！

0022.en: She had personally experienced how powerful the System's skills were. For her, the more of these things, the better.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 她算是亲身体验过系统技能的强悍了，这东西对自己来说简直是越多越好。

0022.en: She wasn't in a rush to draw cards right now. What caught Chi Xiaocheng's attention was the girl lying by her bedside.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 抽卡暂时不急，眼下让池小橙上心的，是伏在床边的女孩。

0022.en: Su Tao sat on a small stool with her hands folded, half of her pretty face resting on her arms, sleeping by Chi Xiaocheng's bedside like this.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 苏桃坐在一张小凳子上，双手交叠，半边俏脸贴在手臂，就这样伏在池小橙的床边睡着了。

0022.en: But that wasn't the main point. The main point was her overly flushed face and the fever patch on her forehead.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 但这不是重点，重点是过于红润的脸色和额头的一抹退烧贴。

0022.en: She had a fever.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 她发烧了。

0022.en: [Ever since bringing you to the hospital, except for taking a shower and changing clothes, she hasn't left your side. Later, when she discovered she had a fever of 39 degrees, she quickly took some medicine and continued sitting here. She must be exhausted]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【自从把你送到医院，除了洗澡换了套衣服外就寸步不离地守在这里，后来发现发烧39度整，匆忙吃了点药后又继续坐在这里，想必是累坏了】

0022.en: "Aren't you a villain system? Aren't you happy to see her suffering like this?"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “你不是反派系统吗，看到她这样受苦你不高兴？”

0022.en: [Host, you don't understand. The villain plotlines I want aren't this kind of plotline]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【宿主你不懂，我想要的反派桥段不是这种桥段】

0022.en: While bickering with the System, Chi Xiaocheng felt more relief and warmth in her heart.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 和系统拌嘴的同时，池小橙心中更多的其实是安心和温暖。

0022.en: After bringing her to the hospital, Su Tao could have gone to rest, and it would have been good enough to rush over and show concern the moment she woke up.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 送自己来医院以后其实就可以去休息了，最好就是自己醒来后第一时间赶过来关心。

0022.en: Before fainting, Chi Xiaocheng thought that level of care would already be very good.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 在昏倒前，池小橙认为这样的照顾已经很不错了。

0022.en: Who could have imagined that even with a high fever, Su Tao would still stay by her side?
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 谁能想到，即便高烧，苏桃竟然依旧在自己身边守着。

0022.en: No wonder people say the female lead is everyone's beloved white moonlight.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 要不为什么说女主是万人迷的白月光呢？

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng struggled to reach out her hand and gently touched Su Tao's cheek.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙艰难地伸出手，轻轻抚上苏桃的半边侧脸。

0022.en: The temperature was a bit high, but her skin was incredibly smooth. The sensation was so lovely that she couldn't bear to let go.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 温度有些高，但肌肤细腻无比，传来的阵阵触感让人爱不释手。

0022.en: A few strands of black hair fell down, and with the light shining on them, she was already breathtakingly beautiful without any makeup. If she dressed up properly, how many people could resist her charm?
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 几缕乌黑的秀发垂下，配上灯光的映衬，不施粉黛便已倾国倾城，要是好好打扮一下，又有几个人能抵挡得住她的魅力呢？

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng herself was also very pretty, but the word "cute" could already sum up her appearance quite well.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙自己也很漂亮，但可爱二字就已经可以将她的外表概括得差不多了。

0022.en: But Su Tao was different. Even after that stunning first glance, she was the type who became more beautiful the more you looked at her.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 可苏桃不一样，惊鸿一瞥后亦是越看越耐看的类型。

0022.en: "System, do you think that one day I might be like those male leads, and after staying by Su Tao's side for a long time, I'll helplessly fall in love with her?"
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “统子，你说有一天会不会我也和那些男主一样，在苏桃身边待久了，就无可救药地喜欢上她？”

0022.en: [Doesn't the host like the female lead now?]
0022.speaker: 系统
0022.cn: 【宿主现在不喜欢女主吗？】

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't answer.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙没有回答。

0022.en: Because she knew clearly in her heart that she didn't have that kind of romantic passion and love for Su Tao.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 因为她心里清楚，自己对苏桃是没有恋人般的冲动和喜欢的。

0022.en: If she truly liked her and loved her, she wouldn't have done something that "hurt" her like what just happened.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 如若自己喜欢她、爱她，也就不会做出像刚刚那样“伤害”到她的举动了。

0022.en: After all, she wasn't really a yandere.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 毕竟自己又不是真的病娇。

0022.en: But apart from being influenced by the original owner's memories, she had only known this female lead for two or three days since crossing over.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 不过除了受原主的记忆影响外，自己穿越而来，顶多也才和这位女主认识两三天而已。

0022.en: Lost in her thoughts, Chi Xiaocheng enjoyed touching Su Tao's smooth cheek. Perhaps she used a bit too much force, as the resting Su Tao slowly woke up.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 伴随着心中思绪，池小橙享受着她温润的侧脸，似乎是用力了一些，小憩的苏桃悠悠转醒。

0022.en: She reacted quickly, and when she came to her senses, she had already grabbed Chi Xiaocheng's small hand. "Xiaocheng, are you okay? How do you feel?"
0022.speaker: 苏桃
0022.cn: 她反应很快，回过神来时已经抓住了池小橙的那只小手，“小橙你没事吧，感觉身体怎么样？”

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng showed a genuinely satisfied smile, "I'm fine, thank you, Taotao."
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 池小橙露出发自内心的满足笑容，“我没事，谢谢你桃桃。”

0022.en: Su Tao let out a sigh of relief and got up to tuck the blanket around Chi Xiaocheng.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 苏桃呼了一口气，起身就要为池小橙将被子盖好。

0022.en: Perhaps because she was also very weak, she stumbled and almost fell.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 兴许是她自己也很虚弱，一个踉跄差点没摔倒。

0022.en: After covering her forehead and taking a moment to recover, Su Tao helped Chi Xiaocheng arrange the messy blanket, and at the same time touched her forehead. "The fever hasn't gone down yet..."
0022.speaker: 苏桃
0022.cn: 捂着额头缓了好一会儿后，苏桃才帮池小橙将乱掉的被子盖好，同时伸手摸了一下她的额头，“烧还没退......”

0022.en: "I'm just a little tired, that's all. I'm fine," Chi Xiaocheng shook her head gently, her tea-colored hair swaying with the movement. "Being able to see Taotao staying by my side all along feels really good."
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: “只是有些累而已，我没事的。”池小橙轻轻摇头，茶色的秀发随之摇曳，“能够看到桃桃一直守在我身边，真好。”

0022.en: Hearing this, Su Tao's eyes dodged a little when she looked at Chi Xiaocheng.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 苏桃闻言，看向池小橙的眼神躲闪了一下。

0022.en: All along.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 一直

0022.en: She caught the key point in Chi Xiaocheng's words.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 她抓到了池小橙话语中的重点。

0022.en: At the same time, she also heard that this sentence had a slightly meaningful tone.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 同时也听出了这一句话的语气稍微有些意味深长。

0022.en: She still hadn't completely sorted out everything that happened on the rooftop.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 天台上发生的一切，她至今都没完全捋顺。

0022.en: She hesitated for a moment, then avoided the topic by turning her gaze toward the door. "You... you should rest first. I'll go call the doctor."
0022.speaker: 苏桃
0022.cn: 她踌躇了一下，规避地将视线扭向了门口，“你...你先休息，我去喊医生过来。”

0022.en: "Mm~"
0022.speaker: 池小橙

0022.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded gently, making a cute humming sound.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头，发出可爱的鼻音。

0022.en: Her red eyes reflected Su Tao's frail figure as she left.
0022.speaker: 旁白
0022.cn: 赤瞳中倒映着苏桃离去的孱弱背影。

0022.en: Very obedient, and very happy.
0022.speaker: 池小橙
0022.cn: 很乖，也很开心。

0023.en: Chapter 23: Let the Female Lead Fall in Love with Me
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第23章 让女主爱上我

0023.en: Soon after, Su Tao walked in with the doctor, and Dongfang Yang came along with them.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 没多时，苏桃就带着医生走了进来，随着一起来的还有东方阳。

0023.en: He wasn't staying up late because he was worried about Chi Xiaocheng, but because he was worried about Su Tao.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这大半夜没睡他当然不是担心池小橙，而是担心苏桃。

0023.en: Now that he saw Chi Xiaocheng wake up, he could finally persuade Su Tao to get some proper rest.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 如今见池小橙醒来，他也终于能劝苏桃去好好休息。

0023.en: The doctor stepped forward first, observed Chi Xiaocheng's complexion, then checked some of the instruments connected to her before asking, "How are you feeling physically right now?"
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 医生率先走了上来，观察了一下池小橙的脸色后，又查了下连在她身上的部分仪器，这才询问道，“现在感觉身体怎么样？”

0023.en: "Not bad." Chi Xiaocheng answered honestly, "My head feels a bit swollen and dizzy, my whole body is weak and powerless, it's even hard to lift my hand, and I'm a little cold, my breathing is warm, no coughing or phlegm."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “还行。”池小橙如实回答道，“头有点昏胀，浑身虚弱无力，抬个手都有点难，另外稍微有点冷，呼吸是热的，不咳嗽也没有痰。”

0023.en: The doctor nodded, "You were already physically weak, and now the main problem is your high fever. Apart from that, there are no other serious issues. You need more rest and nutrition. Let's keep you in the hospital for a few days to see how things go."
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 医生点了点头，“你本来就体虚，现在主要的问题是高烧，除此之外没有什么其他严重性的问题，需要多休息，多补充营养，先住院几天看看情况吧。”

0023.en: "Don't stop taking the medicine." After the doctor finished speaking, he remained silent for a while, then glanced at Su Tao and Dongfang Yang, and said hesitantly, "Also, about the injury on your hand... please don't do such things again."
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: “药不能停。”医生说完，沉默了好一会儿后，又瞥了眼苏桃和东方阳，还是犹豫地说道，“另外你手上的伤......这种事情以后不要再做了。”

0023.en: The doctor looked up at the IV drip connected to Chi Xiaocheng, then hurried out to adjust the medication based on her waking condition.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 医生抬头看了一眼连着池小橙的吊瓶后，又匆匆出去根据醒来的情况进行重新配药。

0023.en: As soon as he left, Su Tao gently sat back down on the small stool beside the bed.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 他一走，苏桃又温柔地坐在了床边的小板凳。

0023.en: Dongfang Yang leaned against the table with a playful expression, "So, tell us, what's really going on with you?"
0023.speaker: 东方阳
0023.cn: 东方阳则倚靠在桌子边，一脸玩味的表情，“说说看吧，你到底是什么情况？”

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng glanced at Dongfang Yang and turned her little head to the side, "I don't want to talk about it."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 池小橙看了眼东方阳，将小脑袋扭到一边，“不想说。”

0023.en: "You—"
0023.speaker: 东方阳

0023.en: Dongfang Yang pressed his lips together in a smile, took a deep breath, "You little troublemaker, after causing such a big scene tonight, are you planning to say nothing at all? Su Tao even got a high fever because of you, and Ye Liang probably wants to kill you."
0023.speaker: 东方阳
0023.cn: 东方阳抿着笑容，深吸了一口气，“你这家伙，今晚闹了那么大的事情还打算什么都不说吗，苏桃因为你都发高烧了，叶良恐怕杀了你的心都有了。”

0023.en: "I'm sorry..."
0023.speaker: 池小橙

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng hung her head again, looking toward Su Tao, her voice becoming soft and gentle.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙又垂着脑袋，看向了苏桃，声音也软糯了下来。

0023.en: This apology was meant for Su Tao.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这句话是对苏桃说的。

0023.en: Her pair of red eyes had lost their usual enchanting quality, with misty moisture making people's hearts soften.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 一对赤瞳没有往日的妖艳，丝丝水雾弥漫让人心中一软。

0023.en: Su Tao gently took one of Chi Xiaocheng's hands and turned to Dongfang Yang, "Alright, stop talking for now. Let Xiaocheng rest first."
0023.speaker: 苏桃
0023.cn: 苏桃温柔地牵住了池小橙的一只手，回头对东方阳说道，“好了你先别说了，先让小橙休息吧。”

0023.en: Dongfang Yang looked at the two of them helplessly and sighed deeply, "Fine, Su Tao, you should hurry up and rest too. Your health isn't much better than this troublemaker Chi Xiaocheng's."
0023.speaker: 东方阳
0023.cn: 东方阳无奈地看了眼二人，长叹一口气，“算了，苏桃你也赶紧休息吧，你的身子不比池小橙这家伙好到哪去。”

0023.en: "Mm-hmm, I'll stay with Xiaocheng a bit longer. Once she falls asleep, I'll go to sleep."
0023.speaker: 苏桃
0023.cn: “嗯嗯，我再陪一会儿小橙，等她睡着了我就去睡。”

0023.en: Her room was right next door, and she knew in her heart that she should comfort Chi Xiaocheng's emotions first.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 她的病房就在隔壁，她心底清楚现在应该率先安抚池小橙的情绪。

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng certainly wanted to sleep too—she was both tired and sleepy—but with Su Tao beside her, she wanted to spend more time looking at this girl who was taking care of her despite having a high fever.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙当然也很想睡，又累又困，只是苏桃在身边，她又想多看看这位顶着高烧也要照顾自己的少女。

0023.en: She had some things she wanted to say to Su Tao.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 心中倒是有些话想和苏桃说。

0023.en: But with Dongfang Yang here, Chi Xiaocheng gave up on that idea.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只是东方阳在这，池小橙也就熄了这个心思。

0023.en: After the doctor came to change her IV drip, she couldn't hold on any longer and fell asleep as Su Tao gently coaxed her.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 在医生过来换吊瓶后，她终究是没能撑下去，被苏桃哄着睡着了。

0023.en: After confirming that Chi Xiaocheng was really asleep, Su Tao stood up, gently tucked her little hand under the blanket to cover it, and softly smoothed the messy hair that had fallen across her cheek.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 确认池小橙真的睡着了，苏桃这才站起身，轻轻将她的小手塞到被子里盖住，又柔和地为她将散乱垂落到脸颊边的秀发抚平。

0023.en: Only then did she quietly leave the room with Dongfang Yang.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这才带着东方阳，悄悄地出了门。

0023.en: Then, covering her head and enduring the weakness and discomfort in her body, she said, "Dongfang Yang, thank you so much for tonight. Without you, I really wouldn't have known what to do."
0023.speaker: 苏桃
0023.cn: 而后捂着脑袋，强忍身体上的虚弱与不适，“东方阳，今晚谢谢你了，没有你的话我真的不知道怎么办。”

0023.en: Throughout this whole ordeal, he had really helped so much.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 一路走来，他真的帮了太多了。

0023.en: Being praised and thanked by Su Tao, Dongfang Yang's lips curved up slightly, and his heart filled with a touch of sweetness, "Since it's something related to you, I can't just sit back and do nothing. You should rest well first. I'll arrange for someone to look after you both."
0023.speaker: 东方阳
0023.cn: 被苏桃夸奖感谢，东方阳唇角轻轻上扬，心中不由多了一抹甜蜜，“既然是跟你有关的事情，我也不能坐视不管，你先好好休息吧，我会吩咐人照看你们的。”

0023.en: "Mm, I'll treat you to dinner another day."
0023.speaker: 苏桃
0023.cn: “嗯，改天我再请你吃饭。”

0023.en: "Okay."
0023.speaker: 东方阳

0023.en: If Su Tao had been sick alone, and Dongfang Yang had been so dedicated in accompanying and caring for her, she might have developed much stronger feelings for Dongfang Yang.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 如是苏桃一个人生病，东方阳又如此尽心尽责地陪伴与关心，她恐怕会对东方阳好感大增。

0023.en: But right now, all her thoughts were focused on Chi Xiaocheng.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 只是现在她的一门心思都在池小橙身上。

0023.en: Her feelings toward Dongfang Yang were more of gratitude.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 对东方阳更多是感激之情。

0023.en: With matters of the heart, her mind was too chaotic to think about these things.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 儿女情长，她脑子乱到都没去想这些事情。

0023.en: Supporting herself against the wall, she walked into her room, but couldn't fall asleep for a long time.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 扶着墙走入病房，却是久久不能入睡。

0023.en: The next morning at 8 AM, Chi Xiaocheng, who had rested for a night, was woken up by a young nurse, who then helped her wash up, change her medication, and eat breakfast.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 第二天早上8点，休息了一晚的池小橙被一位小护士叫醒，又在她的帮忙下洗漱、换药、吃早餐。

0023.en: By the time everything was ready, it was already 9 o'clock, and after eating, her complexion looked much better.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 一切就绪后已经9点，吃过东西后她的脸色好了许多。

0023.en: Her energy and spirit were incomparable to last night.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 精气神也绝非昨晚可比。

0023.en: She leaned against the bed, idly playing with her phone, "All things considered, at least during these few days I'm hospitalized, I'll be safe. Ye Liang won't make things difficult for me either, but I need to prepare for after I'm discharged."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 她靠在床上，无所事事地拨弄着手机，“算下来，至少在我住院的这几天，还是安全的，叶良也不会为难我，但也要为出院之后做些准备。”

0023.en: "And with Su Tao, these few days are an important opportunity to build good feelings, so I need to think of a way."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “还有苏桃那里，这几天是刷好感度的重要机会，也得想个法子才行。”

0023.en: At this moment, the System in her mind suddenly spoke up.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 这时，脑海中的系统忽然出声。

0023.en: [Host, I have a plan that can turn this dark situation bright again]
0023.speaker: 系统
0023.cn: 【宿主，我有一计，可使局势幽而复明】

0023.en: [The female lead can't let go of you at all now. Based on the host's actions yesterday, you can completely continue being yandere during these days to deepen Su Tao's impression of you]
0023.speaker: 系统
0023.cn: 【女主现在完全放不下你了，按照宿主昨天的行动，完全可以在这些天继续病娇下去，加深苏桃对宿主的印象】

0023.en: [You don't even need to build good feelings. With the female lead's personality, the host just needs to show an attitude of "if you don't listen to me, I'll die," and you'll surely be able to control her completely. During this process, you can also do more PUA]
0023.speaker: 系统
0023.cn: 【甚至不用刷好感，以女主的人设，宿主只需要表现出你不听话我就去死的态度，想必能狠狠拿捏她，这个过程再多多进行PUA】

0023.en: [Hehehe...]
0023.speaker: 系统

0023.en: Listening to the System's words, Chi Xiaocheng couldn't help but roll her eyes, "How many Soul Hall elders did you eat? Your tone is so arrogant."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 听着系统的话，池小橙不由翻了个白眼，“你一下吃几个魂殿长老啊，口气那么大。”

0023.en: She helplessly explained her thoughts, "Using yandere actions to bind Su Tao now is just a temporary method. As a friend, she definitely won't just sit there and take it, but will try to understand me and correct me. If I keep threatening to die in front of her every day, what will happen when time goes on?"
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 她无奈解释自己的想法，“现在这样用病娇的行动去束缚苏桃只是一时的方法，作为朋友她绝不会坐以待毙，而是会想办法去了解我、纠正我，我天天在她面前要死要活的，时间长了又怎么办？”

0023.en: "So building good feelings is essential."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “所以刷好感是刚需。”

0023.en: "The first step is to make Su Tao care about me, to put me in a position higher than the protagonists like Dongfang Yang and Ye Liang. This point has shown some effect from the 'death misunderstanding' I deliberately created last night."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “第一步是让苏桃在意我，将我放在比东方阳、叶良等主角还要高的位置，这一点能有所见效，是我昨晚故意弄的‘死亡误会’产生的。”

0023.en: "Once time passes, she'll calm down. What I need to do now is strike while the iron is hot."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “时间一过她会冷静下来的，现在要做的是趁热打铁。”

0023.en: "I need to make her realize that I'm very cute, that I'm her one and only. Only by making her fall in love with me can I truly gain the protection of the female lead's halo."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “要让她意识到我很可爱，是她的唯一，只有让她爱上我，这样我才能真正得到女主光环的庇护。”

0023.en: [But we're the villain, shouldn't we do more villainous things?]
0023.speaker: 系统
0023.cn: 【可我们是反派啊，不应该做点更反派的事情？】

0023.en: "How vulgar!" Chi Xiaocheng snorted softly, "I never said I was a villain. Although my plan is a bit extreme, my starting point is fine. Look at Su Tao's mid-to-late story arc."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “低俗！”池小橙轻哼一声，“我可没说我是反派，我虽然计划极端了点，但出发点没问题，你看苏桃的中后期剧情。”

0023.en: "She gets killed by a heaven-sent supporting female character, betrayed by the male lead, her relatives and friends die, and finally ends up dying from self-harm."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “被天降女配爆杀，男主背叛，亲人朋友死亡，最后落得个自残而死的下场。”

0023.en: "I'm not doing this for selfish desires, but to save her, so I have no choice but to take this extreme route!"
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “我不是为了一己私欲，而是为了救她所以才不得不走极端的路线！”

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng spoke with great righteousness.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙说得大义凛然。

0023.en: What yandere evil little loli?
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 什么病娇邪恶小萝莉？

0023.en: Please, my moral compass is super straight, okay!
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 拜托，我三观超正的好不好！

0023.en: Just as she was getting excited talking with the System, Chi Xiaocheng's phone suddenly vibrated.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 正和系统谈得上头，池小橙手机忽然震动了一下。

0023.en: It was actually a message from Chen Qian to her alternate account.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 竟然是陈倩发给自己小号的一条消息。

0023.en: "What exactly did you do to Su Tao? She actually sent me a message early this morning asking such strange questions?"
0023.speaker: 陈倩
0023.cn: “你到底对苏桃做了什么，她竟然大清早发消息问我这么奇怪的问题？”

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow, showing a pleased expression.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙眉毛一挑，面露喜色。

0023.en: It had only been two days since she had won over Chen Qian and placed her beside Su Tao, but the effect was already showing.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 将陈倩收服并放在苏桃身边才两天，没想到作用这么快就来了。

0023.en: Perfect timing—she could start the next step of her plan!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刚好她的下一步计划可以展开了！

0024.en: Chapter 24: Do You Know About Yandere?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 第24章 你知道病娇吗？

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng had thought about this long before winning over Chen Qian.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 早在收服陈倩前，池小橙就想过。

0024.en: Su Tao must be completely confused when facing her right now, and because of her special situation, she wouldn't talk to Ye Liang, Dongfang Yang, or others about it. This meant she would definitely look for other people to ask about her condition.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苏桃此时面对自己肯定一头雾水，由于自己的特殊性她不会和叶良东方阳等说，那么势必会找其他人询问自己的情况。

0024.en: Now that they had just entered university two months ago, among the supporting characters who had good relationships with Su Tao, Chen Qian, who was still undercover, was one of them.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 如今刚入大学两个月，和苏桃关系好的配角里，还在潜伏的陈倩就是其中一个。

0024.en: As long as Su Tao asked Chen Qian about her, she would have a lot of room to operate.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 只要苏桃询问陈倩有关自己的事情，那么自己的可操作空间就很大了。

0024.en: Thinking of this, Chi Xiaocheng sent a message to Chen Qian, "What did she tell you?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 想到这里，池小橙发消息给陈倩道，“她跟你说了什么？”

0024.en: Chen Qian replied, "She said some strange things, like if someone who was normally fine suddenly became weird, having episodes and asking what oranges taste like and stuff."
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“说的东西奇奇怪怪的，说什么如果有个人本来挺正常的，忽然变得奇怪了起来，又是发病又是问橙子什么味道什么的。”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "You're playing such a big game, and what does she mean by what she said?"
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“你玩这么大，而且她说的又是啥意思？”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Why do you think it's me?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙：“你为什么认为是我？”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "You told me to stay hidden around her just to deceive her, right? Just tell me directly how you want me to respond to her."
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“你让我在她身边不要露头不就是为了骗她吗，你直接说让我怎么回她吧。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng felt a bit embarrassed.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙微微汗颜。

0024.en: Was it that obvious?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 有那么明显吗。

0024.en: She sent over a WeChat ID, "Tell Su Tao to add this account. This is a professional psychologist."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 她推了一个微信号过去，“你让苏桃加这个号，这个是专业的心理医生。”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "A psychologist?"
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“心理医生？”

0024.en: "Just say it's someone you know, someone reliable."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “反正你就说是你认识的熟人，很可靠就行。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng quickly switched to a different WeChat account and logged into another one of her alternate accounts.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙迅速切换了一个微信分身，然后登上了自己的又一个小号。

0024.en: This psychologist was exactly the account she had created. Whether it was the content in the friend circle or the contacts, she had disguised everything very well.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这个心理医生正是她搞的号，无论是朋友圈的内容还是联系人，都被她伪装得很好。

0024.en: As for where she got these skills, she had to thank the system's single draw last time - Hacker (Intermediate).
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 至于哪里来的手段，这就要归功于上次系统单抽出的一个技能——黑客（中级）。

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng originally didn't think this skill would be very useful. The original owner was just an ordinary student, and she was already grateful she didn't start with debt. She didn't have money to buy a series of hacking tools.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙原本没觉得这个技能有多大用处，原主只是普通学生，没有开局负债她已经很庆幸了，根本没钱买一系列的黑客工具。

0024.en: Without even a botnet, what kind of hacker could she be?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 肉鸡都没有，当什么黑客？

0024.en: But thinking about it again, even without tools, she had already gained the corresponding knowledge. She could still do some basic disguising of her information without any problems.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 可转念一想，即便没有工具，已经得到了相应的知识，她对自己的信息做一些基础的掩饰还是没问题的。

0024.en: Like creating this fairly perfect psychologist alternate account.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 比如整了这个比较完美的心理医生小号。

0024.en: And like how she knew her changes would be investigated by Dongfang Yang, Ye Liang, and others, so she spread a lot of information that could cover up her strange behavior.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 又比如她清楚自己的变化会被东方阳和叶良等人查，所以往外散布了不少能够掩盖自己变得奇怪的信息。

0024.en: For example, bullying!
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 比如八零！

0024.en: The original owner had always been bullied, and Chi Xiaocheng could completely use being bullied to explain her psychological changes.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 原主一直都有被欺负，池小橙完全可以用被欺负来解释自己的心理变化。

0024.en: With Su Tao's character, if she was being bullied, she would definitely blame herself for not protecting her well, right?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 以苏桃的人设，自己被欺负，肯定会自责没保护好我吧？

0024.en: Although Chen Qian didn't know why Chi Xiaocheng wanted to do this, she still followed her instructions and recommended this psychologist's WeChat to Su Tao.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 陈倩虽然不知道池小橙为什么要那样做，但还是按照她的说法，将这个心理医生的微信推荐给了苏桃。

0024.en: Then she found several more reasons.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 接着又找了几个理由。

0024.en: Before long, Su Tao added Chi Xiaocheng's alternate account.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 没多久，苏桃就加上了池小橙的小号。

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked sideways at the wall on the right, as if she could see Su Tao sitting on the hospital bed holding her phone, with a cute expression and slightly furrowed eyebrows.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙侧目看向右边的墙壁，似乎见到了苏桃坐在病床上拿着手机，微皱秀眉的可爱模样。

0024.en: A shallow smile curved at the corners of her lips as she sent the first message.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 唇角浅浅地扬起一个笑容，率先发了消息过去。

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Hello (handshake)."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“你好（握手）。”

0024.en: Peach: "Hello, Doctor. I'm very sorry to bother you."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“医生您好，非常抱歉打扰到您。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "It's fine. As a doctor, it's normal to help patients solve their problems, especially since you were recommended by my distant niece. Just tell me what the problem is."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“没事，作为医生为患者排忧解难是正常的，更何况你还是我那远房侄女推荐来的，有什么问题就先说吧。”

0024.en: Peach: "It's like this - I have a friend who has someone around her who has become very strange because of certain things. Let me organize my words and try to explain it to you as briefly as possible."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“是这样的，我有一个朋友，因为某些事情她身边有个人变得非常奇怪，我稍微整理一下语言，尽量简短一点跟您说。”

0024.en: Seeing this message, Chi Xiaocheng burst out laughing.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 看到这条消息，池小橙“噗嗤”一下，笑了出声。

0024.en: The classic "I have a friend."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 经典你有一个朋友。

0024.en: "Peach, being this innocent makes you very easy to deceive."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “桃桃，这么单纯可是很容易被骗的呀。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng decisively exposed Su Tao's disguise, "Miss Peach, I'm a doctor, and we're two strangers. Maybe you think I'm not skilled enough and we should just delete each other. There's no need to be secretive. If you don't tell me honestly, how can I analyze it specifically?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙果断拆穿了苏桃的伪装，“桃子小姐，我是医生，咱们又是素不相识的两个人，兴许你认为我水平不行，咱们就互删了，没必要遮遮掩掩的，你不如实告诉我，我怎么具体分析呢？”

0024.en: This long sentence made Su Tao in the next room blush.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一串长句，让隔壁病房的苏桃面红耳赤。

0024.en: She instinctively didn't want to face Chi Xiaocheng's strange condition.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 她下意识地不想去面对池小橙那样奇怪的状态。

0024.en: This kind of thing was hard to talk about.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这种事情说起来又不太好。

0024.en: "Sigh, she even recommended her distant uncle to help me. I can't let down her good intentions!"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “唉，她都推荐她的远房叔叔帮我了，我也不能辜负她的一片好意啊！”

0024.en: So Su Tao calmed down.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 于是苏桃放平了心态。

0024.en: And started chatting with Chi Xiaocheng, this "Dr. Cheng," about what had happened recently.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 和池小橙这位“成医生”聊起了这段时间发生的事情。

0024.en: First the basement, then the rooftop.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 先是地下室，然后是天台。

0024.en: And she emphasized that Chi Xiaocheng had quite serious self-harm tendencies.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 并且着重说明了池小橙有较为严重的自我伤害倾向。

0024.en: Finally, she asked, "Doctor, why do you think she became like this?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 最后，她询问道：“医生，您认为她为什么会变成那样呢？”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng pretended to think for a while, then typed, "A person's huge personality change must happen after experiencing something unacceptable, and then gradually changes occur."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙假装思考了好一会儿，打字问道，“一个人的性格的巨大转变一定是发生了某些不可接受的事情后，才会渐渐产生变化的。”

0024.en: "Has your friend experienced any disappointment because of something you did?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “你那个朋友，有因为你的某种事情而产生过落差吗？”

0024.en: Su Tao immediately thought of Chi Xiaocheng saying she liked her when she saw this message.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苏桃看到这条消息，瞬间就想到了池小橙说的喜欢她。

0024.en: So she replied, "Yes, we grew up together since childhood. Back then she was bullied, and I helped her. She had some psychological problems at that time and felt very insecure."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 于是回道，“有的，从小时候开始我们一起长大，当时她被人欺负，是我帮了她，那个时候她就有点心理问题，很没安全感。”

0024.en: "So I often told her things like 'you're the most important person to me' and 'I will never leave you' to comfort her, though I actually meant it."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “所以我经常会跟她说一些诸如‘你是我最重要的人’、‘我是永远不会离开你的’之类这样的话安慰她，虽然实际上我也是这么想的。”

0024.en: "There were no problems for many years, but now in university, quite a few boys are pursuing me. She misunderstood because of this and started self-harming, saying things like she likes me and telling me not to look for others."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “很多年都没什么问题，现在上了大学，有不少男生追求我了，她因为这个事情产生了误会，于是就自我伤害着说什么喜欢我，让我别去找别人之类的这种话。”

0024.en: "Doctor, is it possible that Xiaocheng developed wrong feelings for me?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “医生，有没有可能是小橙她对我产生了错误的感情啊？”

0024.en: Wrong feelings?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 错误的感情？

0024.en: Of course not.
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 当然没有了。

0024.en: I really like you, Peach!
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 我可是超喜欢桃桃你啊！

0024.en: Sighing in her heart, Chi Xiaocheng typed back seriously, "That's also possible. Long-term lack of love and insecurity can make someone mistake dependence for liking."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 在心底感叹一句，池小橙一脸正经地打字回道，“也有这个可能，长期缺爱，没有安全感，会误将依赖认为是喜欢。”

0024.en: Peach: "I thought so too. After all, we're both girls, and her saying she likes me really gives me a headache."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“果然是这样的吧，毕竟我们两个都是女孩子，她说喜欢我什么的，实在是让我有些头疼。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "But that possibility is very small. Based on what you said about her forcing you to say you like her and wanting to jump off a building, I think she might really like you."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“但那种可能性很小，按照你说的她强迫你说喜欢她，又想要跳楼，我觉得她可能是真的喜欢你。”

0024.en: Peach: "Huh?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“啊？”

0024.en: Peach: "But... but we're both girls."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“可...可是我们俩都是女生。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "That's not the point."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“这不是重点。”

0024.en: Peach: "This... this isn't the point?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“这这...这还不是重点吗？”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "I've treated countless patients, and there are many who have problems with same-sex feelings. In my opinion, it's very normal. As long as there's love, gender can also be crossed."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“我接待过无数病人，因为同性感情问题的多了去了，在我看来很正常，只要有爱，性别照样可以跨越。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "That's getting off topic. The point is your Xiaocheng's condition."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“说远了，重点是你那个小橙的病情。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Based on my years of experience, she most likely can't live without you. This is an unhealthy psychological disorder, as serious as common depression."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“以我多年的经验来看，她十有八九是离不开你了，这是一种不健全的心理疾病，严重程度堪比常见的抑郁症。”

0024.en: In the next room, Su Tao was stunned. Because she was completely led by Chi Xiaocheng's topic, she didn't even notice some flaws in the chat messages.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 隔壁房间，苏桃呆了一下，因为彻底被池小橙引导了话题，甚至没注意到聊天消息中的一些漏洞。

0024.en: She just anxiously asked, "Doctor, please don't keep me in suspense."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 只是着急问道，“医生，您就别卖关子了。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Miss Peach, don't be anxious. I don't know if you've heard of people called 'yandere'?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“桃子小姐你先别着急，不知道你有没有听说过病娇这类人？”

0024.en: "Yandere?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “病娇？”

0025.en: Chapter 25: Have you ever liked her?
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 第25章 你喜欢过她吗？

0025.en: This was the first time Su Tao had heard this term.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃还是第一次听到这个词。

0025.en: She hadn't been exposed to ACG culture, nor had she grown up in a stable environment like ordinary people.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 她没接触过泛ACG文化，也不像普通人一样安定地长大。

0025.en: She had been an orphan since childhood, often having to struggle for survival. Before she found Chi Xiaocheng, she lived with an old grandmother who collected garbage.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 从小就是孤儿，还经常要为生活而奔波，在没捡到池小橙之前，她都是跟一个捡垃圾的老奶奶一起过。

0025.en: The old grandmother's son didn't care for her, and she had no grandchildren. Her legs weren't good, so living together with Su Tao was mutually helpful. Because of the grandmother's guidance, Su Tao became very sensible at a young age.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 老奶奶儿子不管她，也没有孙子，腿脚不便，跟她一起也算是相互照顾，正因为老奶奶的教导，她小小年纪就很懂事。

0025.en: But the old grandmother died early. After helping Su Tao through the most difficult period, she passed away.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 只是老奶奶走得早，带她熬过了最艰难的一个时期后，就撒手人寰。

0025.en: Later, in elementary school, she met Chi Xiaocheng who was being bullied.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 接而在小学遇到了被霸凌的池小橙。

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng's family was also very poor, but they still accepted her.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 池小橙家同样很贫穷，但还是接纳了她。

0025.en: After that, besides working part-time jobs, she focused on studying hard. Her childhood happiness mostly came from Chi Xiaocheng. Every time she heard the cute little girl behind her calling her "sister," she felt it was all worth it.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 之后她除了打工外就是努力学习，儿时偶尔的快乐还是池小橙带来的，每次听到身后有个可爱的小家伙喊着她姐姐，她就觉得不管怎样都值。

0025.en: Even now, her hobbies were still reading books and listening to music.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 直到现在，她的兴趣爱好依旧是看书听音乐之类的。

0025.en: She didn't watch dramas, read novels, or play games, let alone watch video streams. Her internet use was mostly for reading news.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不刷剧，不看小说，游戏也不玩，更别说什么视频直播了，接触互联网更多还是看新闻。

0025.en: When Chi Xiaocheng mentioned the concept of "yandere," she immediately went online to search for it.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 当池小橙提出病娇的概念时，她立马就上网去搜了。

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng wasn't in a hurry during this time, slowly waiting for Su Tao's response.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 期间池小橙也不着急，慢慢等苏桃回复。

0025.en: In the next hospital room, Su Tao stared at the search results in shock.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而在隔壁病房，苏桃看着搜出来的信息，目瞪口呆。

0025.en: "Based on how Xiaocheng has been acting, it really seems like what the doctor called 'yandere'?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “按照小橙表现出来的模样，好像真的是医生说的病娇？”

0025.en: "This is actually considered a cute trait online!"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “这在网上居然还是萌属性！”

0025.en: Su Tao was stunned.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃傻眼了。

0025.en: Whether it was the basement or the rooftop, she deeply felt the terror of Chi Xiaocheng's strange state.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 无论是地下室还是天台，她都深感池小橙那奇怪状态的恐怖。

0025.en: But from internet users' perspective, this was apparently a lovable trait in the 2D world.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 可在网友看来，这居然是属于二次元中的讨人喜欢的属性。

0025.en: She looked at the explanation and read it word by word: "Abnormal twisted psychology caused by deformed love, with tendencies toward possessiveness and extreme thoughts or behaviors, leading to extreme words and actions beyond normal understanding..."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 她看着注释，一字一字念了出来，“畸形的爱所产生的病态扭曲心理，有点偏向占有欲又有极端的思想或行为，从而做出超乎常人理解的过激言行......”

0025.en: "Extreme words and actions refer to crazy love confessions, exclusiveness, stalking, destroying what they can't have, self-harm, and other extreme behaviors."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “过激言行又指疯狂示爱、排他、跟踪、得不到就毁掉、自伤等极端行为。”

0025.en: "Hiss!"
0025.speaker: 苏桃

0025.en: Su Tao thought carefully - wasn't this exactly like Xiaocheng?
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃仔细想了想，小橙不就是这样的吗。

0025.en: Love confessions, exclusiveness, self-harm - it was a perfect match!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 示爱、排他、自伤，简直完美符合！

0025.en: "How do these twisted internet users think this is cute? Does nobody have anyone who loves them?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “这样的扭曲网友到底是怎么觉得是萌点的，难道大家都没有人爱吗？”

0025.en: Then Su Tao searched whether yandere could be cured.
0025.speaker: 旁白
