0031.en: Unlike traditional twin tails, these two strands swayed with her movements, giving off the pure charm of a girl next door.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 不似传统的双马尾，这别出的两抹随主人姿态晃动，邻家小妹的清纯油然而生。

0031.en: She walked over, deliberately staying out of Dongfang Yang's line of sight.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她走过去，故意在东方阳的视野外。

0031.en: Then she jumped out, "Boss, are you waiting for me?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 然后跳了出来，“老板，在等我吗？”

0031.en: Your little cutie has suddenly appeared!
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 你的小可爱突然出现！

0031.en: Dongfang Yang was startled, and those words immediately popped into his head.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 东方阳被吓了一跳，脑海中紧接着出现了这几个字。

0031.en: He cleared his throat, fist to his lips. "The AC just turned on in the cafe and it's a bit hot. I was just getting some fresh air while they adjust the temperature."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 他握拳放在唇边，轻咳了一下，“咖啡厅里刚开了空调有点热，正在调温，我在外面吹吹凉风而已。”

0031.en: "I see..." Chi Xiaocheng said, staring straight at him. "I would have been very happy if you said you were waiting for me!"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “这样啊...”池小橙感叹一声，直勾勾地盯着他，“如果老板说在等我的话，我会很开心的！”

0031.en: Meeting her expectant gaze, Dongfang Yang's heart skipped a beat for no reason.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 对上的期待的视线，东方阳没来由地心底一慌。

0031.en: He quickly scoffed, "Don't be so full of yourself, you idiot. It's just a coincidence."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 旋即轻哼着嘲笑道，“别自作多情了你个蠢货，只是凑巧遇上你而已。”

0031.en: With that, he walked into the cafe first.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 说罢，他率先走进咖啡厅。

0031.en: Following behind him, Chi Xiaocheng had a playful smile on her face.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 跟在他背后的池小橙则扯出点点玩弄的笑容。

0031.en: A little tsundere. You think I can't handle you with a direct approach like that?
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 小傲娇，这样的直球还拿捏不了你？

0031.en: When they got to the cafe, Dongfang Yang started explaining the job to Chi Xiaocheng. "Your job is to just sit here. You can take money, chat with customers, and if you don't know how to make coffee, just have Chu San help you."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 来到咖啡厅，东方阳就给池小橙介绍起了工作，“你的任务呢，就是没事在这里坐着，收钱也好陪客人聊天也好，调咖啡你不会的话就让褚三帮你。”

0031.en: The honest-looking man waiting at the counter smiled at Chi Xiaocheng. "Hello, Miss. My name is Chu San."
0031.speaker: 褚三
0031.cn: 在吧台候着的憨厚汉子对池小橙微微一笑，“小姐您好，我叫褚三。”

0031.en: Dongfang Yang waved his hand. "No need to be so formal. She's just another worker."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 东方阳摆摆手，“不用那么客气，她也是个臭打工的。”

0031.en: Then he looked at Chi Xiaocheng again. "For now, it's just the two of you in the cafe. If you don't understand something, ask Chu San. I don't care what you do, but don't run my cafe into the ground, got it?"
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 然后又看向池小橙，“目前咖啡厅就你们两个，有不懂的就问褚三，你干什么我管不着，但别把我这咖啡厅弄倒闭了，知道了吗？”

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded meekly. "Boss, can I use my phone at work?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 池小橙弱弱点头，“老板，我能上班玩手机吗？”

0031.en: Dongfang Yang's mouth twitched. "As long as it doesn't interfere with your work."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 东方阳嘴角一抽，“不允许耽误工作。”

0031.en: "Okay."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “好的。”

0031.en: So that means I can use it.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 那就是可以玩的了。

0031.en: It seemed like he was just looking for an excuse to let her pay off her debt; he probably never expected her to actually run this cafe.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 怎么看都是找个理由让自己还债，恐怕他就没指望自己经营这家咖啡厅。

0031.en: His main goal was to give himself a reason to help her pay her debt and to protect her.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 给自己找个理由还债，庇护自己才是最主要的。

0031.en: Even if his starting point was the female lead, Su Tao.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 即便出发点是因为女主苏桃。

0031.en: But Dongfang Yang's opinion of her had clearly changed.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 但东方阳对自己的观感，显然改变。

0031.en: Sighing internally, Chi Xiaocheng bowed again and said seriously, "Thank you, Young Master Dongfang. I'll do my best!"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 心中感叹，池小橙再度鞠躬，很是认真道，“谢谢东方少爷，我会努力的！”

0031.en: This 'thank you' was from the heart.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这句谢谢是发自内心的。

0031.en: He wasn't a bad person, he just had a different position than her.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这人并不坏，只是和自己的立场不同。

0031.en: Don't worry, Dongfang Yang, I'll take good care of Taotao for you!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 东方阳你放心吧，我会替你好好照顾桃桃的！

0031.en: In the future, whether we're kissing or in bed, I'll silently say your name in my heart and thank you for your contribution, just to make you feel included.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 以后无论是亲嘴还是在床上，我会在心中默念一声你的名字并感谢你的付出，让你也有点参与感。

0031.en: Dongfang Yang had come to the cafe mainly to show Chi Xiaocheng around. Now that the introductions were done, he was planning to leave.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 东方阳来咖啡厅，主要也是让池小橙认识一下这里的情况，现在介绍完毕，他便打算离开。

0031.en: But before he left, he mentioned the hospitalization. "Although I don't know what you and Su Tao are hiding from me, I hope you'll be more rational, and don't break Su Tao's heart. Especially what happened last time, don't be so willful again."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 不过临走时，还是对池小橙提了一嘴住院的事情，“虽然我不知道你和苏桃有什么是瞒着我的，但也希望你做任何事情的时候理智一点，别伤了苏桃的心，特别是上上次的事情，别再任性了。”

0031.en: Hearing this, Chi Xiaocheng's heart skipped a beat.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙听完，心里一惊。

0031.en: She quickly nodded like a chicken pecking at rice.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 连忙小鸡啄米般点头。

0031.en: 'Last time' referred to the basement incident.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 上上次，指的是地下室。

0031.en: He still suspects me!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 还是被怀疑了！

0031.en: Although his impression of her had improved, his doubts had clearly not disappeared.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他对自己的观感虽然好了不少，但心中的疑惑明显没有减少。

0031.en: "I need to prove that my emotional breakdown and psychological problems were because I was bullied. I need a source of despair to be the root of my yandere personality."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “我被欺负所以情绪崩溃并出现心理问题的这个理由，得证实一下才行，我需要堪比绝望的压抑来作为病娇的源头。”

0031.en: For a moment, Dongfang Yang's suspicious glance and Si Chen's snake-like eyes flashed through her mind.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 一瞬间，脑海闪过东方阳刚刚的一抹怀疑，还有司辰眼镜蛇般的眼神。

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng began to plot, recalling the people who used to bully the original owner.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙心中盘算，脑海逐渐回忆曾经欺负过原主的一些人。

0031.en: She took out her phone and sent a WeChat message to someone named "Liu Guijia."
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她拿出手机，给一个ID备注“刘桂嘉”的人发去了微信消息。

0031.en: "Liu Guijia, when are you going to pay me back?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “刘桂嘉，什么时候还我钱？”

0031.en: Right now, I'm just a weak and helpless little lolita!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 现在的我，可是软弱可欺的小萝莉啊！

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng slowly looked up, a fierce glint in her rational eyes.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙缓缓抬头，理智的双眼透出一抹狠戾。

0032.en: Chapter 32: Former "Sisters"
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 第32章 昔日的“姐妹”

0032.en: Liu Guijia, like Huang Limei, was one of the three main bullies who targeted the original owner in high school.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘桂嘉和黄莉梅一样，是高中时期欺负原主的三巨头之一。

0032.en: Although she only got into a vocational college, she was also in Jiuzhou City. In the original owner's memory, Liu Guijia had troubled her several times in the past two months.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 如今虽然只考了一个大专，但却也在九州市，记忆中这两个月刘桂嘉找了好几次原主麻烦。

0032.en: It was always verbal insults, and if she dared to resist, they would beat her up and force her to hand over her money.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 每次都是语言上的侮辱，敢反抗就打一顿，然后逼她把钱交出来。

0032.en: This could already be considered a crime, but the original owner didn't dare to call the police or fight back. The oppressive environment had twisted her, and Su Tao's situation just happened to be the final straw, becoming an outlet for her frustration.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这已经可以定性为犯罪了，奈何原主不敢报警，也不敢反抗，压抑的环境使她变得扭曲，恰巧苏桃的事情又撞枪口上，于是被她以作发泄的源头。

0032.en: Even so, Su Tao still treated the original owner gently, trying to change her for the better, which shows the charm of the "white moonlight" character.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 然是这样，苏桃依旧温柔地对待原主，想感化她，可见白月光人设的魅力。

0032.en: *Since I already have a conflict with them, how should I get bullied?*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 本就和自己有矛盾，那应该怎么被欺负呢？

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the message she had sent and smiled playfully.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙看着自己发去的消息，玩味地笑了笑。

0032.en: As expected, Liu Guijia sent a message back, "Sure, I'll wait for you at your place?"
0032.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0032.cn: 果不其然，刘桂嘉发了消息过来，“可以啊，我在你家等你？”

0032.en: "Okay."
0032.speaker: 池小橙

0032.en: *They used to bully me on the way home, but now they dare to come directly to my house.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 之前欺负自己还是在回家的路上，这下倒好，竟然敢直接跑到自己家里。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't have to guess to know that the other person was laughing out of anger.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙不用猜就知道，对方已经被气笑了。

0032.en: For someone who had been bullied for so long to suddenly ask for money back, the first reaction would naturally be to find it ridiculous.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 长期被欺负的家伙，忽然跟自己说要求还钱，第一反应自然是觉得可笑。

0032.en: *"What kind of trash are you to dare to fight back?"*
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 什么档次的小垃圾，竟然还敢反抗了？

0032.en: *"It seems you haven't been taught enough of a lesson."*
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 看来是还没教训够。

0032.en: —If she were in their shoes, Chi Xiaocheng would have thought the same thing. But it didn't matter; she was going home this time specifically to *be* bullied.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: ——换位思考下，池小橙肯定也会这样想，但没关系，这次回家就是奔着被欺负去的。

0032.en: *But if no one knew I was being bullied, the plan wouldn't be as effective.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 但如果没人知道自己被欺负，这次计划效果就没那么强了。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng thought for a moment, then glanced at the simple-looking man behind the counter.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙稍微思考了一下，又看了眼吧台的憨厚汉子。

0032.en: She said slowly, "Well, I'll go home and prepare today. I'll come for my first official shift tomorrow?"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 缓缓道，“那我今天先回去准备准备，明天我来正式上岗？”

0032.en: Chu San nodded, "Okay."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三点了点头，“好的。”

0032.en: "Mhm, I'll go back and study up on the relevant information. Let's add each other on WeChat, so you can contact me if anything comes up."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “嗯嗯，我回去学习一下这些相关的知识，我们加一下微信吧，有什么事情你可以联系我。”

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng took the initiative to add Chu San on WeChat, then returned to her seat to pack her things. She waved with a smile, "I'll have to trouble Uncle Chu San to watch the store alone today. Bye-bye~"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 池小橙主动加了褚三的微信，而后又回到自己的座位收拾东西，笑吟吟地招手，“今天就麻烦褚三叔叔一个人看店啦，拜拜~”

0032.en: Waving her small hand, Chi Xiaocheng left the shop with a light spring in her step.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 挥着小手，池小橙脚步轻快地出了店门。

0032.en: The uncle watched her with a gentle expression, "I wish I had such a cute daughter too."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 看得大叔一脸温柔，“我要是也有这么可爱的一个女儿就好了。”

0032.en: Unfortunately, he was 35 now and didn't even have a wife.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 可惜他现在35了，连老婆都没有。

0032.en: After accepting the friend request on WeChat, Chu San continued to wait at the counter. With his sharp eyes, he suddenly spotted a handkerchief on the table Chi Xiaocheng had just left.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 微信点击同意好友，褚三继续在吧台候着，眼尖的他，忽然在池小橙刚刚的桌上发现一块手帕。

0032.en: It was pink and orange, with little cartoon oranges printed on it, and seemed to carry the faint, sweet scent of a young girl.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 粉橙相间，上面还印着一个个卡通的小橙子，好似残留独属于女孩子的淡香。

0032.en: He walked over, puzzled, and blinked. "Did the young lady from just now leave this? It seems she forgot to take it."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 疑惑着走了过去，褚三眨了眨眼，“刚刚那位小姐留下的吗，看来是忘记拿了。”

0032.en: "She's coming again tomorrow, so I'll just leave it here for now."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: “她明天也会过来，先放着吧。”

0032.en: Reaching out to pick up the handkerchief, Chu San suddenly frowned again. "But what if this is something important? Maybe I should let her know."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 伸手将手帕拿起，褚三忽然又皱了皱眉，“可万一这是什么比较重要的东西，要不还是知会她一声吧。”

0032.en: Changing his mind, Chu San sent a message to Chi Xiaocheng.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 心中改变了想法，褚三给池小橙发去了消息。

0032.en: It wasn't until more than ten minutes later, when Chi Xiaocheng was almost home, that he received a reply.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 一直拖到十几分钟后，池小橙即将到家了，他才收到消息的回复。

0032.en: The reply was a voice message, her tone anxious. "Sob... I thought I lost this handkerchief. It was left at the cafe, that's great, that's really great."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 发来的是一条语音，语气很是着急，“呜呜呜我还以为这条手帕不见了呢，原来是落在了咖啡厅，太好了，真是太好了。”

0032.en: She patted her chest, looking relieved.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她拍着小胸脯，一副松了口气的模样。

0032.en: Holding the handkerchief, Chu San felt something was a bit off and asked nervously, "Is this item very important to you?"
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三拿着手帕，感到一丝异样，紧张询问道，“这个东西对你很重要吗？”

0032.en: "Yes, it's a gift I plan to give to someone. Right now... I'm too busy. Uncle Chu San, could I trouble you to bring it to me?"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “嗯嗯，这是我打算送给别人的礼物，现在的话...我忙不过来，褚三叔叔能麻烦你帮我送过来吗？”

0032.en: Just after sending that voice message, Chi Xiaocheng added another sentence.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这一条语音才发出去，池小橙又补了一句。

0032.en: "Actually, that's no good, it would be too much trouble for you. I'll send you the address, could you call a flash delivery for me? I'll pay for it. Thank you, Uncle Chu San!"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “这样也不行，太麻烦你了，我发地址给你，你帮我叫个闪送吧，钱我出就行，谢谢褚三叔叔！”

0032.en: After saying that, she sent a location pin.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 说完，一个定位发了过来。

0032.en: It included the floor and room number.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 并附上了楼层和房间。

0032.en: Listening to her words, a warm feeling grew in Chu San's heart.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 褚三听着这几句话，心中暖意渐增。

0032.en: *What a considerate little girl, thinking it would be a bother for him to deliver it and asking for a flash delivery instead.*
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 多懂事的小家伙，觉得自己送麻烦还叫闪送。

0032.en: *She's so cute, why does the young master always call her a little fool?*
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 明明很可爱，少爷为什么总说他是小蠢货呢？

0032.en: Chu San didn't understand, but he glanced at the empty cafe and replied, "It's alright, I'll bring it over to you. No need to call a delivery service. Just wait for me for a little bit."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三不懂，但看了眼毫无客人的咖啡厅，便回复道，“没事，我给你送过去吧，也不用再多叫个闪送，你稍微等我一会儿。”

0032.en: "Okay, okay, sorry to trouble you."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “好的好的，麻烦你了。”

0032.en: After the exchange, Chu San took the handkerchief and was about to close the shop when he saw Su Tao walking in from outside. "Uncle Chu, are you heading out?"
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: 话语结束，褚三拿着手帕就打算关门，却见苏桃从外面走了过来，“褚大叔，这是要出门吗？”

0032.en: Chu San made a gesture of greeting typically used for noble ladies and said respectfully, "Ah, Miss Su. Miss Chi Xiaocheng left a handkerchief here, and I was just about to return it to her."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三比了个问候贵族小姐才会做的手势，恭敬道，“原来是苏小姐，池小橙小姐在我这里落了一条手帕，我正准备给她送回去呢。”

0032.en: "Oh... Xiaocheng isn't here?" Su Tao had thought Chi Xiaocheng was there and wanted to see the environment where she would be working.
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: “额...小橙不在这吗？”苏桃还以为池小橙在，想看看她之后上班的环境呢。

0032.en: Chu San answered patiently, "She just came here with the young master to check things out. They left less than half an hour ago."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三耐心回答，“刚刚和少爷来这里看了下情况，刚离开不到半小时。”

0032.en: "I see. I was just on my way to find Xiaocheng anyway. I can deliver it for you."
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: “这样啊，我正好要去找小橙，我帮你送过去吧。”

0032.en: "Well..." Chu San hesitated.
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: “这......”褚三犹豫了一下。

0032.en: Su Tao said with a smile, "Don't worry, Uncle. Xiaocheng and I have already reconciled. Otherwise, she wouldn't be with Dongfang Yang, right?"
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: 苏桃笑着说道，“叔你放心吧，我和小橙已经和解了，不然她也不会和东方阳一起是不？”

0032.en: She used to often vent to Dongfang Yang about Chi Xiaocheng at the cafe, so over time, Chu San had heard the general story.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她以前经常在咖啡厅和东方阳倾诉池小橙的事情，长久下来，褚三也听了个大概。

0032.en: Hearing Su Tao say that, he felt relieved. "Then I'll have to trouble you, Miss Su."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 听到苏桃那么说，也就放心了下来，“那麻烦苏小姐了。”

0032.en: Taking the handkerchief, Su Tao felt a strange sensation. The comfortable fabric felt as if she were stroking Chi Xiaocheng's soft little hands.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 接过手帕，苏桃心中有些微妙，舒适的布料让她好似在摩挲池小橙的细软小手。

0032.en: It was the first time she had ever felt something so peculiar.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她还是第一次感觉这么奇妙。

0032.en: Little did she know, this was all due to the "Cinderella" effect of the handkerchief. Whoever held it would involuntarily think of Chi Xiaocheng herself.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 殊不知，这都是手帕中“灰姑娘”的效果，拿到手的人会不由自主地联想到池小橙本人。

0032.en: Meanwhile, Chi Xiaocheng had already arrived at her apartment complex.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 而另一边，池小橙已经到了小区。

0032.en: She put her phone away with peace of mind.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 安心地将手机放好。

0032.en: *The audience is ready.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 观众已经准备好了。

0032.en: She patted her cheeks and stepped into the elevator.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她拍了拍小脸，走进电梯。

0032.en: She took off the hairpin that held her hair in low pigtails and messed up her hair by scratching it vigorously.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 将别着秀发两端浅马尾的发夹取下，又狠狠地挠了几下头发。

0032.en: She clicked her tongue and pouted with dissatisfaction. "Sometimes having hair that's too smooth and being pretty isn't a good thing. It's hard to tone down my aura."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 她啧了一声，不满嘟嘴，“有时候头发太柔顺，长得漂亮也不好，气质有点难降下来啊。”

0032.en: Before going out, she had specially styled her hair to make a good impression on Dongfang Yang.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 出门前她为了以好的印象去拉东方阳好感，可是特意打理了一下。

0032.en: Now, facing the people who bullied the original owner, she needed to appear weak to make them push their luck.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 现在面对欺负原主的人，需要体现出软弱才能让她们得寸进尺。

0032.en: Having no other choice, Chi Xiaocheng put on her hoodie, then rubbed the hood vigorously to create static electricity. In no time, her hair was a mess.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 没办法，池小橙把卫衣的帽子盖上，然后狠狠摩擦帽子产生静电，没一会儿头发就乱糟糟的。

0032.en: But even so, it couldn't hide her cuteness.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 可即便如此，也掩盖不了自身的可爱。

0032.en: But it was enough.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 但已经足够了。

0032.en: The elevator doors opened.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 电梯门打开。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng, wearing her hood, slouched her body slightly.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙戴着卫帽，稍微佝偻了一下身子。

0032.en: *Acting, begin!*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 演技，展开！

0032.en: She looked completely like a timid, delicate, and harmless girl.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 完全一副胆怯娇弱的无害女孩。

0032.en: As she stepped out of the elevator, she saw two girls waiting in the hallway.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 走出电梯门，她便看到有两个女生在楼道这里等着了。

0032.en: They wore revealing clothes that showed their stomachs and thighs, had bleached-blond highlights, smoked, had lip piercings, heavy eyeshadow, and various chains characteristic of delinquent girls.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 露着肚子和大腿的小尺度衣服，挑染一头黄毛，吸烟、唇钉、重重的眼影，此外还有不良少女特有的各种链子装饰。

0032.en: *Now that's the classic image of a villain.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 这才是经典的反派印象啊。

0032.en: *Looking at myself, also a villain, I have no presence at all.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 再看看自己，同样是反派，一点气势都没有。

0032.en: She walked into the hallway, the "da da" sound of her canvas shoes echoing crisply.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她走入楼道，布凡鞋踏出“哒哒”的声音吟唱清脆。

0032.en: The blonde leader, Liu Guijia, looked at Chi Xiaocheng, her head held high with a mocking smile. "Well, well, if it isn't our dear little Xiaocheng, back home."
0032.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0032.cn: 为首的黄毛，刘桂嘉看向池小橙，高高地抬着脑袋，扬起讥讽的笑容，“哟，我们可爱的小橙回来了呀。”

0033.en: Chapter 33: Stepping on a Landmine
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 第33章 踩雷

0033.en: Liu Guijia leaned against the wall, watching Chi Xiaocheng with a teasing look. She played with her phone while kicking the companion squatting beside her.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 刘桂嘉倚在墙边，眼神玩味地看着池小橙，把玩着手机，同时用脚踢了一下身边蹲在地面上的同伴。

0033.en: The follower, wearing black-rimmed glasses with her hair down, froze. With a gloomy expression, she quickly put her phone away.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 戴着黑框眼镜，披散头发，低着头一脸阴沉的跟班愣了一下，顿时收起手机。

0033.en: She stood up, head bowed, and stared blankly at Chi Xiaocheng.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 站起身垂着头，无神地盯着池小橙。

0033.en: Her sinister gaze made people even more afraid of Liu Guijia, the one in charge.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 阴鸷的视线让人不由更加惧怕刘桂嘉这位主导者。

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng composed herself and pulled her hoodie down, covering the top half of her face. Her red eyes glowed faintly in the shadow of the hood.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 池小橙定了定神，伸手揩住帽檐，将卫衣的兜帽拉低，小半张脸被遮住，赤瞳的眸子仅在兜帽的阴影中闪烁一丝丝的红芒。

0033.en: When facing bullies like them, the weaker you act, the more they take advantage.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 面对这样的霸凌者，越是软弱，她们越会得寸进尺。

0033.en: Knowing this, Chi Xiaocheng timidly walked toward Liu Guijia.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 池小橙正是清楚这点，畏畏缩缩地走向了刘桂嘉。

0033.en: With her head lowered and a strand of hair peeking out from her hood, she held out a small hand and said nervously, "Money... give me my money back..."
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 垂着脑袋，任由一撇秀发从兜帽钻出垂下，伸出小手，紧张兮兮地说道，“钱...把我的钱还给我......”

0033.en: Liu Guijia chuckled.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 刘桂嘉笑了笑，

0033.en: She was about to snap back with a sarcastic comment but was quickly pulled back by her follower.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 当即就想发怒嘲讽，却迅速被跟班拉住。

0033.en: Liu Guijia turned her head, annoyed. "What are you doing?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 刘桂嘉不爽地转头，“干嘛？”

0033.en: The follower pointed to a corner of the hallway where a red light was glowing.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 跟班沉着散发，指尖指了指楼道的一个角落，角落里正散发红光。

0033.en: Liu Guijia's pupils narrowed, and her tense shoulders relaxed. She pointed to the door and said, "Since you're here, why not invite us in? It's freezing outside. The snow is late this year, and it will be snowing in a few days. Isn't it too cold?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 刘桂嘉瞳孔收缩了一下，紧绷的肩膀松弛了下来，指着房门，“来都来了，不请我们进去再说吗，外面可是冷得要死啊，今年雪来得慢了些，再有几天就下雪，太冷了吧？”

0033.en: As she spoke, both she and her follower stepped away from the door.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 说话时，她和那位跟班都让出了门口的位置。

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng glanced at a camera in the hallway. It was installed by the property management, and every floor had a few to prevent any incidents.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 池小橙瞥了眼楼道的一个摄像头，那是小区物业装的，每一层的楼道都会有几个，防止出意外。

0033.en: It would have been perfect if they had started something right there.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 如果对方在这里动手就再好不过了。

0033.en: But it didn't matter. Chu San would come find her because of the handkerchief anyway.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 不过也无所谓，反正褚三会因为手帕找过来的。

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng opened the door and walked in. After Liu Guijia and her follower were inside, she pushed the door almost closed, leaving a small crack.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 池小橙开了门走进去，等刘桂嘉和她跟班都进去后，便掩住了门，留了一条缝没有关紧。

0033.en: Once inside, Liu Guijia carelessly opened the refrigerator, grabbed a bottle of Coke, and plopped down on the sofa as if she owned the place.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 一同走了进去后，刘桂嘉大手大脚地打开了冰箱，从里面拿了一瓶可乐出来，像是在自己家，一屁股坐在了沙发上。

0033.en: She crossed her legs and remarked, "It's incredible. We both come from poor backgrounds, so why do you have such a nice house in such a great location?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 翘起二郎腿，自顾自地感叹着，“真是不可思议，你说同样是底层出身的，为什么你就能在这么好的地段拥有这么好的房子呢？”

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng said nothing, simply watching her open the Coke and take a drink.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 池小橙沉默不语，只是看着她打开可乐，喝了一口。

0033.en: Then, she slowly walked in front of her, lifted her head, and asked, "Can you return my money now?"
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 而后缓缓走到她的面前，扬起小脑袋，“现在可以还钱了吧。”

0033.en: "Heh." Liu Guijia turned to look down at Chi Xiaocheng. "Sure, how much do you want me to pay back?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: “呵。”刘桂嘉转了个身，高高在上地看着池小橙：“可以呀，你想让我还多少呢？”

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng bit her lip, and her timid expression was reflected in Liu Guijia's eyes. "Three... three years. Not counting middle school... you... you just need to give me back seven thousand!"
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 池小橙咬了一下嘴唇，这样的小表情倒映在刘桂嘉的瞳孔中，“三...三年，不算初中的那些，你...你还我七千块就好了！”

0033.en: Liu Guijia sighed. "Seven thousand, huh? I didn't even realize I had taken that much from you."
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 刘桂嘉感叹了一声，“七千啊，没想到我都找你要了那么多钱了吗？”

0033.en: Even she found it hard to believe.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 连她自己都觉得不可思议。

0033.en: After all, Chi Xiaocheng was just as poor as her. Her family couldn't even afford her tuition, and she only knew that her brother, who was out making a living, was the one giving her money.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 毕竟池小橙和她一样，穷得要死，家里甚至都没钱给她交学费，只知道是她那个出去混社会的哥哥一直给她钱。

0033.en: She looked at Chi Xiaocheng with a sneer. "Pay you back?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 她看着池小橙，眼神中露出一抹讥讽，“还钱？”

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked shocked and took a step back in fear. "What... what do you mean? Are you not going to pay me back? You said you would!"
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 池小橙仿佛心中震惊，后怕地退了一步，“你...你什么意思，你是不想还钱了吗，你说过会还给我的！”

0033.en: "Ha!" Liu Guijia covered her mouth with her thumb and forefinger, trying to hold back her laughter.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: “呵！”刘桂嘉拇指与食指张开，捂住嘴巴，一副憋笑的模样。

0033.en: Then she put her hand on her forehead, pushed up her bangs, and burst out laughing. "Hahahaha, you're actually asking me for money?!"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 又将手捂在额头，撑起刘海，大笑了起来，“呵哈哈哈哈，你竟然说还钱？！”

0033.en: "Hahahaha, are you trying to kill me with laughter?" She raised her head and a fist, asking rhetorically, "When did you get the guts to defy me? Who gave you the courage?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: “哈哈哈哈哈你是要笑死我吗。”她扬起头颅，高高地举起拳头，似问非问，“你是什么时候有这个胆子反抗我的呢，谁给你的勇气？”

0033.en: "Was it Liang Jingru?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: “梁静茹吗！”

0033.en: A sharp cry rang out.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 尖锐的喊叫声响起。

0033.en: "Bang—!"
0033.speaker: 旁白

0033.en: A heavy punch landed on Chi Xiaocheng's face.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 重重的一拳打在了池小橙的脸上。

0033.en: The force of the blow sent a gust of wind that blew back Chi Xiaocheng's hood. She fell to the ground, tumbling twice before hitting a chair.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 强大的力道带起劲风，将池小橙的兜帽掀开，她整个人也向地面倒去，翻滚两圈后砸到了一张椅子前。

0033.en: The blow was heavy, and her face hurt a lot.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 力道很重，脸很疼。

0033.en: Even with reduced pain sensitivity, Chi Xiaocheng's face burned. The pain was no less than the self-inflicted injuries from her plan.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 即便有着痛感减弱，池小橙也依旧感觉脸部火辣辣的，这样的疼痛不亚于自己计划时的自伤。

0033.en: But... it was bearable.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 但...也算能够忍受。

0033.en: She didn't let anger cloud her mind; the pain made her more rational.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 她没有让愤怒冲昏头脑，疼痛让人愈发理智。

0033.en: All she had to do was wait for Chu San to bring the handkerchief. The harder Liu Guijia hit her, the more credible her reason for "becoming a yandere due to bullying and self-harm" would be.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 只要等到褚三将手帕送来就行了，她下手越狠，自己“因为被霸凌而自我伤害并成为病娇”的一部分理由就越能站住脚。

0033.en: This punch was also part of the plan, so there was no need to be angry.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这一拳也在计划之中，根本没必要生气。

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng was very clear-headed. The moment she looked up, her calm eyes became nervous, fearful, and delicate, her lips trembling uncontrollably. "You... how could you do this!"
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 池小橙门清得很，抬起头的瞬间，冷静的眼神变得紧张、恐惧、娇弱，嘴唇止不住的颤抖，“你...你怎么能这样！”

0033.en: She held her cheek and tasted something salty in her mouth.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 她捂住脸颊，感觉嘴里有些咸腥。

0033.en: The punch had made her mouth bleed.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这一拳让她口腔已经有些出血。

0033.en: This taste was really unpleasant.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这样的味道，真不好受。

0033.en: A demonic glint flashed in her eyes. Seeing Liu Guijia stand up, Chi Xiaocheng's body began to tremble slightly.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 妖异在她眼中一闪而过，眼见刘桂嘉站了起来，池小橙身子都开始微微颤抖。

0033.en: It was as if her past fears were flooding back.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 仿佛昔日的恐惧涌上心头。

0033.en: The girl flicked her yellow hair and walked toward Chi Xiaocheng. "Honestly, I never thought you'd dare ask for your money back. This is perfect."
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 少女扬了下黄色的头发，一步步走向池小橙，“说真的，我也没想到你竟然敢找我还钱，现在正好。”

0033.en: She crouched down in front of Chi Xiaocheng.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 来到池小橙面前，她蹲了下来。

0033.en: She grabbed a handful of her brown hair.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 一把扯住那茶色的长发。

0033.en: Yanking her head up, she said, "You've been hiding from me for half a month. It's time to remind you who's the boss."
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 将其脑袋扯起，“你躲了我半个月了，是该让你记一下，到底谁是主人。”

0033.en: "Slap—!"
0033.speaker: 旁白

0033.en: Another slap landed on Chi Xiaocheng's face. The soft feeling and crisp sound on her palm made Liu Guijia frown.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 又是一巴掌甩在了池小橙的脸上，掌心传来柔软的触感与脆响，让刘桂嘉皱了皱眉。

0033.en: At this point, Chi Xiaocheng should be crying and begging her to stop.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这个时候，池小橙应该流着鼻涕和眼泪跪求自己别继续打了才对。

0033.en: What's with this calm reaction?
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 这么平淡的反应是什么意思？

0033.en: Is she looking down on me?
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 看不起我？

0033.en: And this face...
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 而且这张脸

0033.en: "Tsk!"
0033.speaker: 旁白

0033.en: She slapped her again. "Always this face, always this face! Why do you get to be so beautiful and have a delicate look that everyone likes, why!"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 她又是一巴掌甩了过去，“总是这张脸，总是这张脸！你凭什么长得那么好看，一副娇弱的样子那么让人喜欢，为什么！”

0033.en: "Zing—"
0033.speaker: 旁白

0033.en: She pulled a small knife from her lower back, held it to Chi Xiaocheng's face, and sneered, "Chi Xiaocheng, what do you think would happen if I scarred your face?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 她从后腰拔出小刀，抵到了池小橙的脸前，狞笑道，“池小橙，你说我要是把你的脸刮花会怎么样？”

0033.en: Chi Xiaocheng's pupils shrank, fear showing on her face, and she shook her head, trying to struggle.
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: 池小橙瞳孔一缩，害怕的情绪浮现在脸上，摇着脑袋就要挣扎。

0033.en: Seeing this, Liu Guijia's face finally showed a satisfied expression. She said to the follower behind her, "You, go check if the windows are closed. It would be bad if she screamed."
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 见状，刘桂嘉脸上终于浮现出了满意的神色，对身后的跟班道，“你，去看一下窗户关紧没有，她要是喊出来可就不妙了。”

0033.en: The follower was squatting on the floor, leaning against the sofa, knees bent, arms wrapped around herself, trembling as if she were experiencing the same abuse as Chi Xiaocheng.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 跟班蹲在地上，背靠沙发，双膝蜷曲，双手环住，好似体验到和池小橙一样虐待，浑身颤抖不止。

0033.en: Noticing no movement behind her, Liu Guijia frowned with displeasure and said sharply, "What, didn't you hear me?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 见身后没动静，刘桂嘉不满地皱眉，戾道，“怎么，没听到我的话吗？”

0033.en: "Ye... yes!"
0033.speaker: 陌生女1

0033.en: The follower nodded and hurried to the large open window on the balcony.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 跟班点了点头，慌忙地跑向阳台开着的大窗。

0033.en: Liu Guijia watched with satisfaction, then turned back to Chi Xiaocheng. "See that? You should be just like her, not daring to glare at me."
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 而刘桂嘉，满意地看着这一幕，又转头看向池小橙，“看到了吗，你应该也变成和她一样，而不是现在还敢跟我瞪眼。”

0033.en: She didn't notice the calmness hidden in Chi Xiaocheng's eyes. The cold back of the blade slid across her cheek as Liu Guijia delivered her victor's speech, "I'm also curious. After training you for three years, how have you not become a dog? Who gave you hope?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 她没注意到池小橙隐藏在眼神中的镇静，冰冷的刀背划过脸颊，刘桂嘉表述着胜利者的宣言，“我也很好奇，训了你三年，你怎么还没变成一条狗，是谁给你的希望呢？”

0033.en: Her eyes shifted, thinking.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 眼神转动，思考。

0033.en: They finally landed on a photo of two people under the TV.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 最终定格在电视机下的一张双人照片上。

0033.en: She sneered, "Was it that bitch, Su Tao?"
0033.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0033.cn: 她冷笑一声，“是苏桃那个婊子？”

0033.en: "Bang—!"
0033.speaker: 旁白

0033.en: A small hand tightly gripped Liu Guijia's wrist. A pair of red pupils contracted, like a cat protecting its food.
0033.speaker: 旁白
0033.cn: 一只小手，死死地钳住了刘桂嘉的臂腕，一对赤红的瞳孔收缩，好似护食的猫咪。

0033.en: "Say that again and see what happens."
0033.speaker: 池小橙
0033.cn: “你再说一遍试试？”

0034.en: Chapter 34 Premonition of Blackening
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 第34章 黑化前兆

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng's strength was not great, but it clamped Liu Guijia's arm painfully.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙的力气不大，却钳得刘桂嘉臂腕疼。

0034.en: Those crimson eyes were like the vertical pupils of a mad cat, instilling fear.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 那赤红的眸子好似发了疯的猫咪竖瞳，让人感到恐惧。

0034.en: Liu Guijia was also startled. She suddenly tightened her grip on Chi Xiaocheng's hair, gritting her teeth and roaring, "What did you say? How dare you talk back to me?!"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 刘桂嘉也被吓到了，扯着她头发的手陡然用力，愤怒地咬牙吼道，“你说什么，你竟敢反驳我？！”

0034.en: "Don't you know who's in charge here? Say one more word and I'll scratch your face!"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “你是不清楚谁才是这里的主人吗，再多说一句信不信我划烂你的脸！”

0034.en: "Slap—!"
0034.speaker: 旁白

0034.en: Another heavy slap landed on Chi Xiaocheng's face.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 又是重重的一巴掌，抽在了池小橙的脸上。

0034.en: Her face gradually reddened, and faint crimson lines seeped from the corner of her mouth. Her disheveled hair covered half of her eyes, making Chi Xiaocheng's expression unreadable.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 面庞渐红，丝丝鲜红从嘴角溢出，垂下的秀发遮住了半只眼眸，让人看不出池小橙的表情。

0034.en: After the slap, Liu Guifang's anger, which had arisen from fear of that gaze, gradually dissipated.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 一巴掌下去，刘桂芳也渐渐散去了因为害怕那样眼神而产生的怒气。

0034.en: She sneered, "No matter how much you glare, you're still trash."
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 她冷笑一声，“再怎么瞪人，不也还是那个垃圾。”

0034.en: "I suppose Su Tao is the one who gave you courage, right?"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “想必给你勇气的就是苏桃吧？”

0034.en: She snorted coldly, her tone venomous, "She's just like you, a piece of trash. She pretends to be pure, spreading her unbearable stench everywhere, hmph!"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 她冷哼一声，语气怨毒，“她和你一样，不是个东西，装得一副清纯，到处散发那无处安放的狐臭，哼！”

0034.en: "If I couldn't beat her, she'd be a dog just like you and that guy behind me."
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “要不是我打不过她，她早就和你，还有我身后那家伙一样，成一条狗了。”

0034.en: She spat on the floor, but didn't notice Chi Xiaocheng's face growing increasingly grim.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 她吐了一口唾沫到地板，却没注意到池小橙的脸色愈发阴沉。

0034.en: She continued, "She relies on her good looks to seduce others, it's disgusting. But I see she seems to care about you a lot."
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 继续说着：“仗着自己长得好看，到处去勾引别人，恶心死了，不过我看她好像非常在意你的样子。”

0034.en: Saying that, she lifted Chi Xiaocheng's face and hooked her chin, "Tell me, if I use you to threaten Su Tao, what will she do? Will she care about you?"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 说着，又扬起池小橙的脸，勾住她的下巴，“你说，我要是用你来威胁一下苏桃，她会怎么样呢，会不会关心你呢？”

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng slowly opened her eyes, a pair of cat-like vertical pupils glowing crimson in the dim room. Her voice was hoarse, "I want to know the answer to that question too..."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 池小橙幽幽睁眼，一对似猫般的竖瞳在昏暗的房间中散发红芒，声音嘶哑，“你这个问题的答案，我也想知道啊......”

0034.en: "What did you say?"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “你说什么？”

0034.en: Liu Guijia frowned.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 刘桂嘉皱了皱眉。

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng laughed, crimson lines spilling from the corner of her mouth, flowing down her chin. She no longer maintained the fragile act of being bullied and wronged.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙笑了出来，唇角溢出红色银线，淌着下巴流下，她再也没保持被欺负而委屈的娇弱演技。

0034.en: It was as if she had forgotten her plan.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 好似忘记了自己的计划。

0034.en: "Don't you want to scratch my face? Why don't you just do it?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “你不是想划烂我的脸吗，你为什么不直接动手呢？”

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng leaned closer, reaching out to clamp Liu Guijia's hand again. The strength came from nowhere.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙将脸凑近了一些，伸手再度钳住了刘桂嘉的一只手，力量不知从何而来。

0034.en: She forcefully pried open Liu Guijia's hand that was pulling her hair.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 硬生生地将刘桂嘉扯着头发的手掰开。

0034.en: She moved even closer to her, their noses mere millimeters apart.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 进一步凑到她的面前，二人鼻尖仅是毫厘之差。

0034.en: "You... what are you doing?" Liu Guijia was frightened by her gaze and involuntarily took a step back.
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “你......你干什么？”刘桂嘉被她的眼神吓到了，不由自主地后撤了一步。

0034.en: What kind of eyes were those?
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 那是一双怎样的眼睛？

0034.en: The pupils were not human-like, but eerily vertical, glowing with a blood-red light. Just looking into them instilled fear.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 不似人类的瞳孔，有些妖异地竖了起来，好似散发如血般殷红的光，仅是对视就不由感到恐惧。

0034.en: Like a fierce wolf protecting its cubs.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 像是正在护着孩子的恶狼。

0034.en: No, that's not right!
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 不，不对！

0034.en: It was more like the gaze of a small wolf pup fiercely protecting its injured mother.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 更像是母亲受伤，尚是幼子的小奶狼死死护着母亲的眼神。

0034.en: Out of biological instinct.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 出于生物的本能。

0034.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng took another step closer, and the knife in Liu Guijia's hand poked her face.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 然而池小橙，却是再靠近了一步，刘桂嘉握着的刀子，戳到了脸上。

0034.en: It made a small cut.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 扎出一个小小的伤口。

0034.en: It bled.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 见红了。

0034.en: It was not the vibrant red that flowed when she was beaten.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 和被殴打时流出的艳丽不一样。

0034.en: It was Chi Xiaocheng who actively approached and caused the injury, coupled with those eerie crimson pupils, it was terrifying.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 是池小橙主动靠近而出伤的，加上那妖异的赤瞳，渗人无比。

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng exhaled a warm breath, reaching out to touch the knife, as gently as if caressing a lover, "What, are you scared? Or are you just bluffing?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 池小橙呼出热气，伸手摸上了那个刀子，温柔得像在抚摸恋人，“怎么，不敢吗，还是说你说的话只是唬人呢？”

0034.en: "You... don't come any closer!"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: “你...你别过来！”

0034.en: Liu Guijia suddenly sat on the ground, holding the knife forward with both hands.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 刘桂嘉猛地坐到了地上，双手举刀向前。

0034.en: This was a self-protective posture.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 这是自我保护的姿势。

0034.en: She was scared.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 她怕了。

0034.en: She even had a feeling that if she really pushed the knife forward, Chi Xiaocheng would actively meet it!
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 她甚至有一种感觉，如果自己真的将这把刀向前推去，池小橙会主动去迎合！

0034.en: There was no fear in this person's eyes.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 这家伙眼中没有一丝害怕。

0034.en: How could this be someone who had been bullied for three years?
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 这哪里像被欺凌了三年？

0034.en: Aura is a very strange thing, especially when facing the unknown and counter-intuitive situations, the human brain will temporarily enter a self-protection state.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 气场是很奇妙的一种东西，特别在面对未知、反常理的事情时，人的大脑会短暂地进入自我保护状态。

0034.en: Commonly known as... crashing.
0034.speaker: 旁白

0034.en: It's like when a person faces death, everyone knows they should run, but fear permeates their entire body, making them unable to move an inch.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 就像人面临某种死亡，谁都知道要赶紧跑，可是恐惧弥漫全身，动不了分毫。

0034.en: Liu Guijia felt that way now.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 刘桂嘉现在就有这样一种感觉。

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙的眼神。

0034.en: It seemed like she wanted to...
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 好像想

0034.en: Eat people!
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 吃人！

0034.en: The tables had turned.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 攻守易型。

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled grimly, "Liu Guijia, you're also someone who bullies the weak and fears the strong. I called you here today specifically to let you bully me. Those slaps and that punch were powerful, I'm very satisfied!"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 池小橙狰狞笑着，“刘桂嘉，你也是个欺软怕硬的家伙啊，今天我本来就是让你欺负才喊你来的，你那几巴掌，那一拳力道很足，我很满意！”

0034.en: "But!" Chi Xiaocheng took a step forward, "You said something about Tao Tao that made me very unhappy. Although I'm not a yandere, and I don't really like her, she's currently my only reliance for survival."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “但是啊！”池小橙往前靠了一步，“你说桃桃让我很不开心，虽说我不是病娇，也不算喜欢她，但她可是目前我活下来的唯一依靠。”

0034.en: "Conquering the female lead is such a great achievement!" Chi Xiaocheng muttered to herself, her expression gradually becoming excited, "For minor characters and cannon fodder like us, we're only meant to pave the way for the main characters. But do you know, even so, Tao Tao will still shine her light on us minor characters."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “攻略女主那是多大的成就啊！”池小橙自言自语，表情逐渐兴奋，“像我们这种小配角、炮灰，只有给主角铺垫的份，但你知道吗，即便如此，桃桃还是会对我们这些配角洒下光芒。”

0034.en: "It's precisely because she knew what the original owner did was so excessive, yet Su Tao still forgave me and treated me gently. What a wonderful girl she is."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “正是知道原主做了那么过分的事情后，苏桃还原谅我并温柔地对待我，这是多么棒的一个女孩子。”

0034.en: "Unlike the person I once loved, who betrayed me even after I gave my all."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “而不像我曾经爱过的人，付出了一切之后，依旧背叛我。”

0034.en: "You don't know what it feels like to have a hollowed-out heart filled again, do you?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “被挖穿的心房被人堵上的感觉你是不知道吧？”

0034.en: "Bullying the kind-hearted?!"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “欺善者？！”

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng stood up and suddenly grabbed Liu Guijia's small knife.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙站了起来，猛地抓住了刘桂嘉的小刀。

0034.en: Liu Guijia frantically tried to pull the knife out, "Let go of me!"
0034.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0034.cn: 刘桂嘉惊慌地想将小刀抽出，“你放手！”

0034.en: The small knife remained motionless, its tip firmly gripped by Chi Xiaocheng.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 小刀纹丝不动，刀尖被池小橙握紧。

0034.en: Warm liquid flowed from her palm to her wrist, and Liu Guijia was shocked to find that she couldn't pull the knife back.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 温热的液体从掌心涌到手腕，刘桂嘉震惊地发现，自己无法将小刀抽回来。

0034.en: Doesn't she feel pain?
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 她不疼吗？

0034.en: With a "clink," the hilt slipped from her grasp.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: “噌”的一下，刀柄脱手而出。

0034.en: The small knife was now held reversed in Chi Xiaocheng's hand, and drops of red dripped from its tip, filling the air with a pungent smell.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 小刀被池小橙反握在手中，点点红色从尖端滴落，空气弥漫的味道刺鼻。

0034.en: "You don't even dare to make a move?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “动手你都不敢的？”

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng sneered, lifting the hair from her forehead. The tip of the knife rested on her forehead, just above her eyebrow.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙冷笑一声，将自己额前的秀发撩起，刀尖抵在眉毛上方的额线。

0034.en: "Sizzle—"
0034.speaker: 旁白

0034.en: A vivid red line, dripping with blood, was drawn from above her left eyebrow to her right.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 一道鲜红淋漓的直线，自左眉毛上方，划到了右边。

0034.en: The liquid that emerged was like water droplets clinging to glass, sliding over her eyelids and down her cheeks.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 涌出的液体如同坠在玻璃上的水珠，滑落过眼帘，淌到脸颊。

0034.en: At this moment, Chi Xiaocheng's face was radiant and terrifying.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 此时的池小橙，满脸瑰丽，渗人无比。

0034.en: Her strange vertical pupils reflected a vivid red color, and a bizarre smile played on her lips, "If you don't make a move, how will others know I was bullied when they arrive?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 奇怪的竖瞳折射出鲜红的色彩，唇角扬起怪异的笑容，“你不下手，一会儿别人来了，怎么才能知道我是被欺负的呢？”

0034.en: "As for you!" Chi Xiaocheng took a large stride forward and straddled Liu Guijia's legs, looking down at her, "It's fine that you hit me, but why did you say so much? Are you venting your emotions as a victor?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “倒是你！”池小橙大跨步向前，骑在了刘桂嘉腿上，居高临下，“打我就算了，为什么要说那么多话呢，宣泄你作为胜利者的情绪吗？”

0034.en: She played with the small knife in her hand, and the crimson drops fell onto Liu Guijia's skin, burning hot.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 把玩手中小刀，珠红滴落在刘桂嘉的皮肤，滚烫无比。

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng said leisurely, "Actually, I think one thing you said was quite right. I also really want to know what kind of reaction Tao Tao would have if I used my life as a threat."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 池小橙悠然道，“其实，你有一句话我觉得挺对的，我也很想知道要是以我的生命作为威胁，桃桃会有什么样的反应。”

0034.en: But there's one thing I think is wrong.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 但也有一句话我认为不对。

0034.en: Her eyes suddenly sharpened, "You said you wanted to train Tao Tao into a dog?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 她的眼神，陡然犀利，“你说要将桃桃训成一条狗？”

0034.en: "Don't you know, she's mine!"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “你难道不知道吗，她是我的！”

0034.en: "Even if she turns into a dog, she's still mine!"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “就算是变成狗，也是我的！”

0034.en: In this world, only the female lead can protect me from the other male leads and allow me to survive.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 这个世界，唯有女主能让自己免受其他男主的针对，成功存活。

0034.en: This is a destiny that must be changed, the fate of a villainous cannon fodder!
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 这是必须要改变的，作为反派炮灰的宿命！

0034.en: "Hey, you, close the window. I'm afraid she'll scream too loudly later."
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: “那个谁，把窗关上，我怕她一会儿叫得太大声了。”

0034.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked coldly at the disheveled, gloomy-faced follower.
0034.speaker: 旁白
0034.cn: 池小橙冷冷地看向那个披散着头发，面容阴沉的跟班。

0034.en: Then she stuck out her tongue and licked the blade, "How about you try the taste of hitting me just now?"
0034.speaker: 池小橙
0034.cn: 接而伸出小舌，舔了一下刀身，“要不，让你也试试刚刚打我的滋味，怎么样？”

0035.en: Chapter 35 Not Like Acting
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 第35章 不像演的

0035.en: Fear, trembling, her back was soaked with cold sweat at some point.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 恐惧、颤抖，背后不知何时被冷汗浸湿。

0035.en: Liu Guijia could actually feel that Chi Xiaocheng's body hadn't changed at all. She only needed to exert a little force to subdue this sickly girl.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 刘桂嘉其实能感觉到，眼前的池小橙在身体上没有任何变化，她只需要稍微用力，就能将这病弱的家伙制服。

0035.en: But her body was completely out of control.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 可是身体就是不受控制。

0035.en: She couldn't move at all!
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 完全动不了！

0035.en: Eerie crimson vertical pupils, her face covered in crimson like a trickling stream, a small tongue licking the cold blade, as if tasting her own flavor.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 妖异赤红的竖瞳，满脸殷红如细流涓涓而下，小舌舐在散发寒芒的刀身，好似品尝自己的味道。

0035.en: I'm going to die, I'm going to die, I'm going to die, I'm going to die, I'm going to die!
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: 要死要死要死要死要死！

0035.en: Liu Guijia's hands trembled, but she couldn't muster any strength. Her gaze flickered, searching around, casting a pleading look at the disheveled, knee-hugging follower.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 刘桂嘉颤抖着手，却升不起一丝力气，她视线颤抖着四下寻找，向披头散发，抱膝的跟班投去求助的目光。

0035.en: But the scene before her eyes made her pupils contract once more.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 可眼前出现的画面，却让她瞳孔再一度收缩。

0035.en: The follower was squatting on the ground, staring intently at her. Liu Guijia noticed that the follower's face, hidden by her hair, was no longer gloomy.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 跟班蹲坐在地，死死地盯着她这边，刘桂嘉注意到，她散发下脸不再阴沉。

0035.en: Instead, she wore a look of obsession, her eyes shining with a light Liu Guijia had never seen before.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 而是露出某种痴迷的笑容，双眼是她从未见过的亮光。

0035.en: —She wouldn't help her.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: ——她不会来帮自己的。

0035.en: Liu Guijia felt despair.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 刘桂嘉如是感到绝望。

0035.en: Indeed, she was also like Chi Xiaocheng. Why would she help herself at this moment?
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 也是，她毕竟也是和池小橙一样的存在，为什么会在这一刻出手帮自己呢？

0035.en: "Clearly, we're all the same, all dogs!" Perhaps anger rushed to her head, giving Liu Guijia a little strength back.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: “明明都是一条，都是一条狗！”兴许是愤怒冲上头脑，让刘桂嘉恢复了一点力气。

0035.en: She gritted her teeth and glared at Chi Xiaocheng, trying to scare her, "If you have the guts, kill me now, otherwise you'll be dead later. Not just you, but Su Tao too, that b*tch..."
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: 咬牙狰狞地看着池小橙，企图吓坏她，“有本事你现在就杀了我，否则之后你就死定了，不只是你，还有苏桃，那个婊......”

0035.en: Before she could finish, she felt a sharp pain in her thigh.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 她还未说完，大腿就感受到了剧烈的疼痛。

0035.en: Intimidation turned into provocation.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 恐吓变成了激怒。

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng half-squatted, half-knelt in front of her, a faint smile playing on her lips, "I didn't hear what you said. Can you speak louder?"
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: 池小橙半蹲半跪在她面前，嘴角萦绕浅笑，“我没听到你说什么，能不能再大声点呢？”

0035.en: "The windows are all closed, you know~"
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “窗户，都关好了哦~”

0035.en: [Host, calm down!]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【宿主，冷静啊！】

0035.en: At this moment, the system couldn't help but intervene.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 此时，系统也忍不住出声干涉了。

0035.en: [If something goes wrong, we, as villains, will have no chance of turning things around. Even the female lead's halo won't save us!]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【出事的话，咱们作为反派就彻底没有翻身的可能了啊，即便是女主光环也保不住啊！】

0035.en: "Don't worry, System."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “放心统子。”

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng's calm voice echoed in her mind.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 池小橙镇定的声音在脑海中响起。

0035.en: The system breathed a sigh of relief.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 系统听后，这才松了口气。

0035.en: [It's good that you're still rational, Host. You scared me to death. I thought you had lost your mind because of the female lead, Su Tao.]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【宿主你理智还在就好，吓死本系统了，都以为你因为女主苏桃而失去理智了呢】

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled, replying in her mind, "Why would I lose my mind? You're being ridiculous."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: 池小橙笑了笑，在脑海中回道，“我为什么会失去理智呢，你也是搞笑。”

0035.en: "Actually, I personally know that although I transmigrated here and am bound to you, to be honest, from what I've learned from the memories, the original owner didn't actually die. I just took over her body."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “其实我个人也清楚，虽然穿越到了这里，还绑定了你，但老实说从记忆中得知，原主其实是没死的，只是我鸠占鹊巢。”

0035.en: "Occasionally, when I act abnormally, I believe it's because the original owner's lingering thoughts are influencing me."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “偶尔我出现反常的行为，我认为是原主仍然残留的思想影响着我。”

0035.en: Her analysis was as rational as she claimed.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 她的分析就如同她说的一样理智。

0035.en: "It's like now, you think I'm impulsive because she mentioned Su Tao, but I know that's not the case."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “就好像现在，你以为我是因为她说苏桃而冲动，但我自己知道并不是。”

0035.en: "It's the original owner's lingering thoughts influencing me. She was bullied for three years and hated Liu Guijia immensely."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “是原主残留的思想影响到了我，她被欺凌了三年，无比憎恨这个刘桂嘉。”

0035.en: "Even when she was bullied, she didn't dare to resist. She didn't have the courage."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “即便被欺负，她也不敢反抗，是没有那个勇气。”

0035.en: "But I'm different!"
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “但我不一样！”

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes sparkled, "I'm not afraid of her, so the original owner's lingering thoughts are influencing me to seek revenge."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: 池小橙目光囧囧，“我不怕她，所以原主的残存思维影响着我要复仇。”

0035.en: "That's the main reason I'm like this now. In reality, my rationality hasn't broken down at all, and I haven't been influenced by Su Tao."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “这才是我现在这样的主要原因，实际上我理智一点都没断，更没被苏桃影响。”

0035.en: While chatting with the system in her mind, she unconsciously uttered, "After all, I said it, I'm not really a yandere."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: 心中与系统聊天，唇角却不由自主地说了一句出来，“毕竟我说过了，我又不是真的病娇。”

0035.en: [But Host, you really don't seem to be acting.]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【可是宿主，你真的不像演的】

0035.en: [How come I, as the system, didn't detect the original owner's thoughts and soul?]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【原主还有思维和灵魂在作为系统的我怎么没检测出来呀】

0035.en: [I'm so scared QAQ]
0035.speaker: 系统
0035.cn: 【我好怕QAQ】

0035.en: "If you could detect subconscious things, you wouldn't be so useless."
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: “潜意识的东西你要是能检测出来，那你也不会这么废物了。”

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng replied to the system, but in Liu Guijia's eyes, she was talking to herself.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 池小橙回答着系统的话，可在刘桂嘉眼里看来，她就是在自言自语。

0035.en: The fear that had already accumulated completely overflowed.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 原本就积满了的恐惧，彻底溢出。

0035.en: She widened her eyes, pointing a trembling finger at Chi Xiaocheng in horror, and even ignoring the pain in her leg, she whispered, "Crazy... crazy..."
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: 她瞪大着眼睛，惊骇地伸出一只手指着池小橙，甚至不顾腿上的疼痛，轻声呢喃着，“疯了...疯了...”

0035.en: What kind of inexplicable words was she saying?
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 说的到底是什么莫名其妙的话。

0035.en: "So she's already crazy, no wonder... no wonder..."
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: “原来已经疯了，难怪...难怪.......”

0035.en: "Hahaha, hahahahaha!" Liu Guijia shed tears and burst into laughter, "So she's already crazy, no wonder she's like this, no wonder... hahahahaha..."
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: “哈哈哈，哈哈哈哈哈！”刘桂嘉流出眼泪，大笑了起来，“原来是已经疯了，难怪会这样，难怪...哈哈哈哈哈哈......”

0035.en: But in reality, who was the crazy one?
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 可实际上，疯的人到底是谁呢？

0035.en: Perhaps the wild laughter reached outside, and hurried footsteps echoed in the corridor.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 兴许是这张狂的笑声传到了外面，走廊此时传来了一阵急促的脚步。

0035.en: Her small ears twitched.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 她的小耳朵动了一下。

0035.en: A strange smile appeared on her lips.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 唇角勾出莫名的笑容。

0035.en: She pulled out the knife that was stuck in her leg and patted Liu Guijia's face with her blood-stained hand.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 一把将插在她腿上的刀子拔出，沾着红色的手拍了拍刘桂嘉的脸蛋。

0035.en: The sticky touch brought the laughter to an abrupt halt.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 黏稠的触感，令笑声戛然而止。

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng grinned, "Don't be like that. You're the bully, you know~"
0035.speaker: 池小橙
0035.cn: 池小橙咧嘴一笑，“别这样嘛，你才是欺凌者哦~”

0035.en: The knife was placed in her hand.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 刀子，塞到了她的手里。

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng suddenly lay down to the side.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 池小橙又陡然往旁边一躺。

0035.en: "Bang—"
0035.speaker: 旁白

0035.en: Her tea-colored hair spread out as she fell into the warm crimson.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 一头茶色秀发飘散，她倒在了温热的殷红中。

0035.en: And Liu Guijia knelt before her, rigidly holding the small knife in both hands.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 而刘桂嘉，则跪坐在她面前，双手僵硬地握着小刀。

0035.en: Her face was filled with horror.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 满脸惊骇。

0035.en: Even the gloomy-faced follower squatting behind her was full of doubt.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 就连那个蹲坐在后面的跟班，都满眼疑惑。

0035.en: Doubting Chi Xiaocheng's actions.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 疑惑池小橙的行动。

0035.en: Why would she do this?
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 为什么要这样做呢？

0035.en: The next second, her doubts were answered.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 下一秒，她的疑惑就得到了回答。

0035.en: The door, which had been left ajar, was suddenly kicked open.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 原本遮掩没锁紧的大门，猛地被打了开来。

0035.en: "Xiaocheng! What happened?!"
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: “小橙！发生什么事了！”

0035.en: Su Tao panted slightly. After getting out of the elevator, she heard an inexplicable laugh. At first, she thought someone was having a fit, but then she realized it was coming from Chi Xiaocheng's suite.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 苏桃微微喘息，在出了电梯她就听到了莫名的笑声，起先还以为是谁在发癫，可听下来却发现，竟然是池小橙的套房传出的。

0035.en: And the voice was strangely familiar.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 而且这声线，莫名地熟悉。

0035.en: She rushed over without stopping, and the sight that greeted her made her pupils contract.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 马不停蹄地跑来，映入眼帘的景象，让她瞳孔收缩。

0035.en: Chi Xiaocheng was facing away from her, lying in a pool of crimson, and directly in front of her, Liu Guijia was holding a small knife, her gaze eerily directed towards them.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 只见池小橙背对着她，倒在一摊殷红，而她的正对面，刘桂嘉正握着小刀，视线幽幽地看向这边。

0035.en: Far behind, there was also a girl with hair almost covering her face, squatting, her eyes seemingly radiating adoration.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 远远的身后，还有着一个头发几乎盖住脸颊的女孩子，她的双眼仿佛散发着崇拜的目光。

0035.en: Anyone who didn't know the situation would misunderstand this scene.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 任谁不了解情况，看到这一幕都会误解。

0035.en: Su Tao was no exception.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 苏桃也是如此。

0035.en: She clenched her fists and stepped forward, "Liu Guijia, what did you do to Xiaocheng?!"
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: 她攥紧了拳迈步走了过去，“刘桂嘉，你对小橙做了什么！”

0035.en: Liu Guijia's eyes widened, and with a "clatter," she dropped the knife, backing away in fear, "I... I didn't do anything. It was all Chi Xiaocheng. It was all her!"
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: 刘桂嘉陡然瞪大眼睛，“哐当”一声将刀子扔开，害怕地后退着，“我...我什么都没做，一切都是池小橙干的，都是她干的啊！”

0035.en: "Do you think I'll believe you?"
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: “你觉得我会信吗？”

0035.en: "What can I do if you don't believe me!" Liu Guijia shrieked, "She's like this herself, she's staging it, she's crazy, what does it have to do with me..."
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: “你不信我有什么办法！”刘桂嘉大声嘶吼，“明明是她自己这样的，是她在自导自演，是她疯了，跟我有什么……”

0035.en: Su Tao took three steps in two.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 苏桃三步并作两步。

0035.en: "Bang—!"
0035.speaker: 旁白

0035.en: A punch knocked Liu Guijia over.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 一拳，将刘桂嘉打翻过去。

0035.en: "Ahhhhhh!"
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: “呃啊啊啊啊啊！”

0035.en: Su Tao ignored Liu Guijia's cries.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 苏桃不顾刘桂嘉的呐喊。

0035.en: She knelt down in distress, disregarding the mess, and tried to help Chi Xiaocheng up.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 心疼地蹲了下来，不顾脏乱，想要将池小橙扶起。

0035.en: But the moment she saw her face, her pupils contracted again.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 可见到脸颊的那一刻，又是瞳孔收缩。

0035.en: Su Tao's voice was filled with suppressed anger, "Liu Guijia, if anything happens to Xiaocheng, you..."
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: 苏桃的声音，压抑着愤怒，“刘桂嘉，如果小橙出什么事，你......”

0035.en: "Crazy, they're all crazy!"
0035.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0035.cn: “疯了，都疯了！”

0035.en: Before she could finish, Liu Guijia covered her head and fled towards the door.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 话音未落，刘桂嘉捂着头，逃似的冲向门口。

0035.en: "Hiss—" Su Tao made a move to stop her, but her rationality forced her to calm down.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: “嘶——”苏桃作势就想阻止，理智还是让她强行冷静了下来。

0035.en: A faint voice came from beside her, "Um, should we call an ambulance first?"
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 身旁幽幽传来声音，“那个，先叫救护车吧？”

0035.en: It was the gloomy-faced girl.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 是那个脸色阴沉的女生。

0035.en: After saying that, she followed Liu Guijia's footsteps and quickly left the room.
0035.speaker: 旁白
0035.cn: 说完这句话后，便跟着刘桂嘉的脚步，迅速出了房间。

0035.en: Su Tao remained silent, then quickly took out her phone, "Hello, Dongfang Yang? Can you send your doctor over?"
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: 苏桃沉默，连忙拿出手机，“喂，东方阳吗，能不能让你的医生来一趟。”

0035.en: "The address is... Xiaocheng's house."
0035.speaker: 苏桃
0035.cn: “地址是......小橙家里。”

0036.en: Chapter 36 Split Personality
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 第36章 割裂的人设

0036.en: "Tao Tao, is that you?"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: “桃桃，是你吗？”

0036.en: As soon as Su Tao hung up the phone, Chi Xiaocheng slowly woke up from her "coma."
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苏桃电话刚挂断，池小橙便从“昏迷”中幽幽醒来。

0036.en: Her voice was hoarse, with a hint of a sob.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 声音嘶哑，带着哭腔。

0036.en: Su Tao's expression softened, and she asked with concern, "Xiaocheng, don't speak yet. You're still injured. Dongfang Yang's doctor will be here soon."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 苏桃脸色一软，心疼地询问道，“小橙，先别说话，你还有伤，一会儿东方阳的医生就来了。”

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng forced a smile, "It's okay, Tao Tao. My forehead hurts a little, and my face too, but otherwise I'm fine."
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 池小橙笑容牵强，“没事的桃桃，就是额头有点疼，脸也有点，其他的话还好。”

0036.en: "Face..."
0036.speaker: 旁白

0036.en: Su Tao then noticed, gently wiping away the water stains on Chi Xiaocheng's face, that there was a clear bruise.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苏桃这才注意到，轻轻抹去脸上的水渍，脸上有一个明显的拳印。

0036.en: She gently brushed aside Chi Xiaocheng's hair and saw a wide but not deep gash on her forehead, still oozing a faint red.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 又轻轻抚开池小橙的秀发，这才见到，额头上那一道幅度广、却又不深的沟壑，此时依旧有着冒出点点润红。

0036.en: Su Tao gasped, forcing herself to calm down.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苏桃倒吸了一口气，强迫自己冷静下来。

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng had been observing Su Tao's subtle expressions and could easily guess what she was thinking.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 池小橙一直注意着苏桃的小表情，哪能猜不到她想的什么。

0036.en: With a nervous yet relieved tone, she asked, "That, Tao... Tao Tao, my face, it's okay, right? If it becomes ugly, will you... will you abandon me?"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 挂着紧张又庆幸的语气，询问道，“那个桃...桃桃，我的脸，应该没事吧，如果变得不好看了，你...你会不会不要我了？”

0036.en: Her lips trembled, as if she was about to cry, "She just... just said she wanted to scratch my face. If I hadn't dodged that knife, I would have really... really been disfigured, boohoohoo..."
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 她嘴唇哆嗦，好似要哭出来，“她刚刚...刚刚说想划烂我的脸，如果不是我躲过了那一刀，就真的...真的破相了呜呜呜.......”

0036.en: "Tao Tao, please... please don't abandon me!"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: “桃桃你...你别不要我啊！”

0036.en: Panic, helplessness, her acting in full swing, Chi Xiaocheng's tears streamed down.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 惊慌、无措，演技全开，池小橙泪如雨下。

0036.en: Su Tao, who had been rational, immediately felt a surge of anger when she heard this!
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 原本还理智的苏桃，听到这话，顿时怒火心中烧！

0036.en: She reached out and grabbed an apple nearby, squeezing it with force as if to vent her emotions.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 伸手抓住了旁边的一只苹果，像是发泄情绪一样，手臂用力。

0036.en: "Thump!"
0036.speaker: 旁白

0036.en: The apple was crushed.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苹果被捏爆了。

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng, who had been pretending to cry, was stunned.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 原本在装哭的池小橙不由呆了一下。

0036.en: She knew Su Tao had some fighting ability.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 她知道苏桃有点武力值。

0036.en: But wasn't this a bit too much?
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 但这是不是太超标了点？

0036.en: How did the original owner manage to knock Su Tao out and lock her in that dark room?
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 原主之前到底是怎么把苏桃弄晕关在小黑屋的啊？

0036.en: But despite the shock, the act couldn't stop.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 不过震惊归震惊，戏不能断。

0036.en: The crying had to continue.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 哭还得继续哭。

0036.en: It wasn't until Su Tao gently wiped away her tears that Chi Xiaocheng slowly whimpered, "Tao Tao?"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 直至苏桃温柔地揩拭眼泪，池小橙这才慢慢呜咽了起来，“桃桃？”

0036.en: Su Tao showed a reassuring smile, "Relax, when did I ever say I'd abandon Xiaocheng?"
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 苏桃露出让人安心的笑容，“安心，我什么时候说过不要小橙了呢？”

0036.en: "Don't ever think such things again." After a warning, Su Tao checked her up and down again, confirming that Chi Xiaocheng only had a scratch on her forehead and some lingering marks on her face, but was otherwise fine.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: “这种话以后不许再想了。”叮嘱一句，苏桃又上下检查了一下，确认池小橙只是额头划伤，脸部有些许未褪去的痕迹外，其他还好。

0036.en: Helping Chi Xiaocheng to a chair, Su Tao said softly, "Xiaocheng, wait a moment, I'll give you some simple treatment."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 将池小橙扶到椅子上，苏桃柔声道，“小橙你稍等，我帮你简单处理一下。”

0036.en: With that, she walked towards the cabinet under the TV, skillfully opened it, and took out the emergency first-aid kit.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 说罢，她朝着电视机下面的柜台走去，熟练地打开柜子，将里面的紧急医药箱拿了出来。

0036.en: However, as she was choosing the medicine, she couldn't help but pause.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 只是在挑选药品时，她又不免愣了一下。

0036.en: This scene seemed to have happened frequently in the past.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 现在的这一幕，好像以前时常发生过。

0036.en: Ever since Xiaocheng moved in during her third year of high school, there was a period of cohabitation where Xiaocheng would occasionally come back injured.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 自从小橙步入高三，开始在这边居住后，有一段同居的时间，小橙偶尔回来是带伤的。

0036.en: She just said she fell, could it be...
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 她只是说自己摔的，难不成

0036.en: Su Tao's heart sank. She took the disinfectant, cotton swabs, and gauze and walked towards Chi Xiaocheng, "The disinfection process might sting a little, bear with it, okay?"
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 苏桃心中沉了一思，拿着消毒的药品和棉签纱布就走向池小橙，“消毒的过程可能稍微有点疼，忍一下知道吗？”

0036.en: "It's fine, I'm used to it!"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: “没事的，我习惯了的！”

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng obediently closed her eyes and tilted her head slightly.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 池小橙乖巧地闭上眼睛，稍稍抬起头。

0036.en: The system's intermittent voice echoed in her mind.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 脑海中响起系统断断续续的声音。

0036.en: [Emotion points +3...]
0036.speaker: 系统

0036.en: [Emotion points +5...]
0036.speaker: 系统

0036.en: [Emotion points +10...]
0036.speaker: 系统

0036.en: She knew that Su Tao had experienced a significant emotional fluctuation because of her words, which was captured by the system.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 她清楚苏桃因为自己的话产生了不小的情绪波动，所以被系统捕获到。

0036.en: Unfortunately, emotion points would gradually decrease with the adaptability of the various protagonists.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 可惜的是，情绪值会随着各路主角们的适应性逐渐递减。

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng couldn't repeatedly exploit the same situation to farm emotion points.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 池小橙不能通过同一种事情反复去卡bug刷情绪值。

0036.en: For example, when she played the victim, Su Tao's initial heartache would generate a lot of emotion points.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 比如她的卖惨，苏桃起初心疼情绪值会加很多。

0036.en: Later, even if she played the victim again and Su Tao felt the same heartache, the emotion points gained would be much less.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 后来再卖惨，即便同样心疼，但增加的情绪值就会弱很多。

0036.en: Considering everything, every single point was crucial!
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 盘算下来，每一点都至关重要啊！

0036.en: Stop the bleeding, apply medicine, and temporarily wrap her forehead with gauze.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 止血，上药，暂时用纱布缠住额头。

0036.en: Su Tao was not a professional doctor, but she had learned some basic first aid.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苏桃不是专业的医生，只是学过一些普通的应急方法。

0036.en: The exact situation would have to wait for a real doctor's assessment.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 具体情况如何，还得等真正的医生判断。

0036.en: Speak of the devil, and he shall appear.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 说曹操曹操就到。

0036.en: The already open door was pushed open, and Dongfang Yang quickly walked in with two doctors. His first reaction was the pool of crimson on the floor, and his pupils contracted, "Hey, what's going on?"
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: 本就没关的房门被打开，东方阳带着两位医生迅速走了进来，第一反应是地上的一摊殷红，不由瞳孔一缩，“喂，这是什么情况？”

0036.en: Su Tao stood up and explained, "It's some bad girls from Xiaocheng's high school who were bothering her. When I arrived, Xiaocheng was already injured. Taking care of Xiaocheng was more important, so I didn't chase after them."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 苏桃起身，解释道，“是小橙高中时候的一些不良少女找她麻烦，我到的时候小橙已经受伤了，照顾小橙要紧，那群人跑了我就没有去追。”

0036.en: Dongfang Yang gestured to the two doctors.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 东方阳眼神示意了两位医生。

0036.en: The two doctors nodded.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 两个医生点了点头。

0036.en: They exchanged glances, and the female doctor handed the medicine box to the male doctor, taking on the task of examining Chi Xiaocheng.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 二人对视一眼，女医生将药箱交给了男医生，担任起了给池小橙检查的工作。

0036.en: "There's a little bleeding, and her face has suffered trauma. Fortunately, there's no problem inside her mouth, but to prevent swelling and pain, she'll need external application. For now, she should eat light foods, and she'll recover."
0036.speaker: 医生
0036.cn: “稍微有点出血，脸部遭受创伤，好在口腔内部没什么问题，但为了防止脸部肿痛，也需要进行外敷，最近以清淡的吃食为主，养一养就好了。”

0036.en: The female doctor's words made everyone present breathe a sigh of relief.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 女医生说的话，让在场的几人全都松了口气。

0036.en: Immediately after, Su Tao arranged, "Xiaocheng, rest for a bit, then go take a bath."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 紧接着，苏桃便安排道，“小橙你休息一下，然后去洗个澡吧。”

0036.en: At this, Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao, her face full of anticipation, "Tao Tao, can you help me wash?"
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 这时，池小橙看向苏桃，面露期待，“桃桃你能帮我洗吗？”

0036.en: Dongfang Yang raised an eyebrow when he heard this.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 东方阳闻言，微微挑眉。

0036.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao's clothes, which were also dirty from the emergency treatment. She simply said, "Why don't we wash together? I got your clothes dirty too, Tao Tao."
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: 池小橙看向了苏桃的衣服，因为刚刚给她做应急处理，衣服也很脏，索性直接道，“要不我们一起洗吧，因为我还把桃桃你的衣服弄脏了。”

0036.en: Dongfang Yang's mouth twitched continuously.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 东方阳嘴角不断抽搐。

0036.en: His gaze darted between Chi Xiaocheng's face and Su Tao's face.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 视线在池小橙脸上和苏桃脸上闪转腾挪。

0036.en: If it were before, Su Tao would have agreed without hesitation.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 如果是之前，苏桃会毫不犹豫地答应。

0036.en: But knowing about Chi Xiaocheng's strange feelings for her, and her yandere tendencies.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 可得知池小橙对自己奇怪的感情，还有那样的病娇。

0036.en: Reason told Su Tao not to agree to this request.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 理智告诉苏桃，不能答应这个请求。

0036.en: She smiled, pursing her lips, "How about we let the doctor sister help? As a doctor, she definitely knows where not to get wet."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 她抿嘴笑道，“要不让医生姐姐帮忙吧，作为医生她肯定清楚哪里不能碰水。”

0036.en: Seeing this, Dongfang Yang stepped forward and nodded, "If you're recovering, you can wash yourself. Isn't your small place too cramped for two people?"
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: 东方阳见状，站出来点头，“如果恢复身体的话自己洗也行的，你们这小破地方，两个人不挤吗？”

0036.en: "Okay... okay." Chi Xiaocheng looked a little disappointed, but she didn't disobey.
0036.speaker: 池小橙
0036.cn: “好...好吧。”池小橙表现得有些失落，但也没忤逆。

0036.en: Seeing this, Su Tao rubbed her temples, a headache forming. Not only was there the issue with the bad girls, but Xiaocheng's yandere tendencies were also a big problem. If Dongfang Yang wasn't here, would she have forcefully insisted on washing together?
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 苏桃见状，头疼地揉了揉眉心，不止是这次不良少女的事情，小橙的病娇也是一大问题啊，如果东方阳没在这里，她会不会强硬地想自己和她一起洗呢？

0036.en: With an apologetic look, she said to Dongfang Yang, "Thank you for your trouble this time. Why don't you sit down for a bit? I'll clean up the floor."
0036.speaker: 苏桃
0036.cn: 她怀着歉意，对东方阳说道，“这次也麻烦你了，要不你先坐一下吧，我处理一下地板。”

0036.en: Like a diligent wife, she put on an apron and skillfully began to do housework.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 如一位勤恳的妻子，穿上围裙后熟练地做起了家务活。

0036.en: Dongfang Yang went out, looked up at the camera in the corridor, and said to the bodyguard, "Let's go to the property management to check the surveillance footage."
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: 东方阳出门，抬头看向走廊的摄像头，对楼道的保镖说道，“我们去物业看一下摄像头。”

0036.en: Upon arriving at the property management office, with his status as a young master, the security guard naturally wouldn't stop him.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 来到物业，以他大少爷的身份，保安自然不会拦。

0036.en: Before long, he saw the scene on the monitor where Chi Xiaocheng and Liu Guijia met.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 没多时，就见到监控上，池小橙和刘桂嘉相见的那一幕。

0036.en: Facing such a bad girl, Chi Xiaocheng on the screen was timid and didn't even dare to look at the other party.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 面对这样的不良少女，画面中的池小橙畏畏缩缩，连看都不敢去看对方。

0036.en: "She's really stupid."
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: “确实蠢得可以。”

0036.en: Dongfang Yang nodded, not noticing anything unusual about Chi Xiaocheng.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 东方阳点点头，没看出什么池小橙的异样。

0036.en: However, there was one thing he didn't understand.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 倒是有一点他不明白。

0036.en: He turned to the bodyguard behind him and asked, "What did you see from Chi Xiaocheng?"
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: 转头看向身后的保镖，问道，“你从池小橙身上看到了什么？”

0036.en: The bodyguard paused, "She seems to be used to being bullied. She doesn't look like someone who would demand money back."
0036.speaker: 保镖
0036.cn: 保镖愣了一下，“应该是被欺负惯了，这哪里像是让对方还钱的样子。”

0036.en: "Yes, her personality is very weak." Dongfang Yang stroked his chin, "But what I don't understand is, if she's so weak, why did she dare to commit such a taboo act and kidnap Su Tao?"
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: “是的，她性格很懦。”东方阳摸了摸下巴，“但我不解的是，她那么懦，为什么当初敢犯大忌去绑架苏桃？”

0036.en: "Ye Liang is surely much more terrifying than these bad girls, right?"
0036.speaker: 东方阳
0036.cn: “叶良总比这群不良少女恐怖多了吧？”

0036.en: He had felt something was off after he calmed down. Chi Xiaocheng's reason for sacrificing herself for Su Tao seemed a bit flimsy.
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 之前冷静下来他就觉得不对了，池小橙那个为了苏桃而献身的理由，有点站不住。

0036.en: She acted too weak. Who gave her that impulsive courage?
0036.speaker: 旁白
0036.cn: 她表现得太懦了，那样冲动的勇气，是谁给的？

0037.en: Chapter 37 Dispelling Doubts
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 第37章 打消怀疑

0037.en: However, this might also be because his understanding was not comprehensive enough.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 不过这也有可能是自己了解得不够全面。

0037.en: After all, Dongfang Yang had indeed changed his opinion of Chi Xiaocheng quite a bit, and he didn't believe that this stupid, clumsy, and cowardly person he saw was faking it.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 说到底，他东方阳确实对池小橙改观了不少，也不认为自己看到的这个又蠢又笨还懦得一笔的家伙是装的。

0037.en: He paid more attention to details.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 他比较注重细节。

0037.en: Coincidentally, some details didn't make sense.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 恰巧一些细节上的事情，说不通。

0037.en: At this moment, there were two knocks on the door of the monitoring room.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 这时，监控室的门被敲了两下。

0037.en: Dongfang Yang looked back and saw Su Tao, wearing an apron to cover the crimson stains, walk in, "How is it?"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 东方阳回头看去，看到是穿着围裙遮掩鲜红痕迹的苏桃走了进来，“怎么样了？”

0037.en: Dongfang Yang stepped aside, pointing to the monitor, "The cause was Chi Xiaocheng asking that blonde girl for money. The blonde girl's hostility was quite obvious, but Chi Xiaocheng was too timid and still let the other party into the house."
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳侧身让了个位置，指着监控，“起因是池小橙找那个黄毛还钱，黄毛眼神的敌意挺明显的，但池小橙太懦了，还是让对方进了家里。”

0037.en: The result, needless to say.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 结果嘛，不必多说。

0037.en: The monitor couldn't record the sounds inside the house, but occasionally, one or two laughs could be heard.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 监控录不到进了房子后的声音，只是偶尔能听到一两道笑声传出。

0037.en: "Su Tao, what do you think?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: “苏桃，你怎么看？”

0037.en: Dongfang Yang pulled up a chair and sat down to think.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 东方阳拉了一张椅子，坐下思考。

0037.en: Su Tao suppressed a hint of anger in her eyes, then let out a long sigh and said, "Xiaocheng probably wanted to pay you back, that's why she asked Liu Guijia for money. But I didn't know Xiaocheng borrowed so much from her!"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 苏桃眼中压抑着些许怒火，长长地吐了口气后，说道，“小橙应该是想还钱给你吧，所以才会找刘桂嘉要钱，不过我也不清楚小橙居然借了她那么多！”

0037.en: That was seven thousand!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 那可是七千啊！

0037.en: Over three years, it might not seem like much, but Chi Xiaocheng's family was poor, and her current frailty was due to early malnutrition.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 三年下来可能看着不算多，可池小橙家本身就没钱，如今那么瘦弱，还是因为早期营养不良造成的。

0037.en: But who knew, Dongfang Yang wasn't concerned about that. "I mean, what do you think of Chi Xiaocheng's contrast?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 可谁知，东方阳在意的却不是这点，“我的意思是，你怎么看池小橙的反差？”

0037.en: Su Tao was stunned for a moment, "What do you mean?"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 苏桃愣了一下，“什么意思？”

0037.en: "I won't beat around the bush." Dongfang Yang adjusted the monitor, pausing at the scene where Chi Xiaocheng timidly shrank her neck and entered the door with Liu Guijia and her follower.
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: “我也不绕弯子了。”东方阳调动监控，停在了池小橙畏惧地缩着脖子，和刘桂嘉还有跟班一起进门的那一幕。

0037.en: He said, "We previously learned that Chi Xiaocheng was willing to risk her life for you, and even showed hostility towards Ye Liang, and for a while, even towards me. But after interacting with her, you and I both know she's so weak. So, where did she get the courage to confront Ye Liang? Who gave it to her?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 说道：“我们前面了解到，池小橙为了你打算连命都豁出去，甚至各种敌视叶良，有一段时间还敌视我，可接触下来你我都知道，她那么软弱，那么她去怼叶良的勇气呢，谁给的？”

0037.en: "You know, if you hadn't stopped Ye Liang in the basement last time, Chi Xiaocheng would probably have been in trouble, right?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: “要知道，上次地下室如果不是你阻止叶良，池小橙恐怕已经出事了吧？”

0037.en: Su Tao lowered her head, as if thinking, and nodded slightly.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 苏桃低下脑袋，像是在思考一样，轻轻点头。

0037.en: Her information was different from Dongfang Yang's.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 她和东方阳的信息量不一样。

0037.en: She knew very well.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 她清楚得很。

0037.en: Chi Xiaocheng's courage came from her!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 池小橙的勇气，来源于她！

0037.en: Xiaocheng is a yandere. When it comes to herself, she becomes impulsive and irrational. Perhaps it's because of this that she dared to confront Ye Liang, even disregarding his status.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 小橙是病娇，有关自己的事情都会变得冲动、缺乏理智，兴许正是因为这点，她才会去硬怼叶良，甚至无视她的身份。

0037.en: But here with Liu Guijia...
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 但在刘桂嘉这里

0037.en: Dongfang Yang continued, "There's another very important question. Although I've been considerate of your feelings and haven't asked, I still can't understand how Chi Xiaocheng kidnapped you. You could easily subdue her with one hand, right?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳又道，“还有一个很重要的问题，虽然我一直照顾你们的情绪没有问，但我怎么也想不明白，池小橙怎么把你绑架的，你一只手就能轻松制服她吧？”

0037.en: Su Tao lowered her head and remained silent for a moment.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 苏桃低着头，沉默了一下。

0037.en: "As for the kidnapping, that's my fault." Su Tao sighed, explaining the situation at the time, "Didn't I owe Ye Liang a favor from last time? He insisted I go to a banquet with him. I thought it was just to show my face and have a meal, so I agreed."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “绑架这个的话，是我的错。”苏桃叹了一口气，说出了当时的情况，“我不是因为上次的事欠了叶良一个人情吗，他说什么都要我去和他参加一个晚宴，寻思只是去露个脸吃个饭，我也就答应了。”

0037.en: "After that, Xiaocheng found me and said she knew she had been wrong before and wanted to reconcile with me."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “那之后，小橙就找到了我，说是知道自己之前做错了，要和我冰释前嫌。”

0037.en: Dongfang Yang nodded, "And then?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳点头，“嗯，然后呢？”

0037.en: "Then she said that as an apology, she even bought me coffee." Su Tao sighed, "I didn't think much of it at the time and listened to her. I don't know what happened after I drank it."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “然后她说为了道歉，还特意买了咖啡给我。”苏桃叹了口气，“我当时也就没多想，听她的了，喝下去之后发生什么我就不清楚了。”

0037.en: "When I woke up, I was already locked in the basement."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “醒来就已经被关在了地下室里。”

0037.en: Strands of hair fell from her temples, sliding down her cheeks.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 几缕秀发从鬓角垂下，滑落脸颊。

0037.en: Because she was looking down, a few bangs covered her eyes, making her expression unreadable.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 因为低头，稍许刘海遮住眼睛，让人看不清她的眼神。

0037.en: The sunlight reflecting on her from outside the window gradually faded.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 窗外映照在她身上的阳光，渐渐淡去。

0037.en: Su Tao continued, "As for the courage you mentioned, Dongfang Yang, to confront Ye Liang, it should have been given by me..."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 苏桃继续说道，“至于东方阳你说的冲撞叶良的勇气，应该是我给的吧......”

0037.en: "You?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳

0037.en: Dongfang Yang was a little surprised. This was something he had never considered.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 东方阳有些错愕，这是他完全没想过的。

0037.en: "Yes." Su Tao put her hands behind her back, looked up, and smiled helplessly and indulgently, "She's done a lot of things these past two months, but I've never blamed her. Haven't I been trying to persuade both you and Ye Liang?"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “是啊。”苏桃背着手，抬起头，笑容无奈且宠溺，“她这两个月做了很多事情，但我一次都没有怪过她，无论是你还是叶良，我都有在劝不是吗？”

0037.en: Dongfang Yang paused, as if recalling something.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 东方阳愣了一下，好似回忆起了什么。

0037.en: Indeed, whenever he used to dislike Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao would always try to mediate.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 他以前对池小橙不喜的时候，确实苏桃都会劝解。

0037.en: "So that's it..."
0037.speaker: 东方阳

0037.en: He murmured, and the doubts in his heart gradually unraveled.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 唇角呢喃，心中的疑惑渐渐解开。

0037.en: It was her tolerance that gave Chi Xiaocheng courage.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 是她的包容，给予了池小橙勇气。

0037.en: Dongfang Yang looked at Su Tao again, "Then about her being bullied..."
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳又看向苏桃，“那她被霸凌这事......”

0037.en: At this, Su Tao clenched her fists.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 说到这里，苏桃顿时攥紧了拳头。

0037.en: Anger flashed in her eyes.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 眼中浮现怒火。

0037.en: She stared intently at Liu Guijia on the monitor, "I know that blonde girl. She was a bad girl in high school, her grades were terrible, and she bullied the weak everywhere to feel important."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 紧紧盯着监控里的刘桂嘉，“这个黄毛我认识，高中时候的一个不良少女，成绩烂到没边，到处欺负弱小找存在感。”

0037.en: "Before, she also bullied Xiaocheng, but after I beat her twice, she got scared."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “以前，她也欺负小橙，但被我揍了两顿后，就怕了。”

0037.en: "After that, she never appeared in front of me again."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “之后也没出现在我的面前。”

0037.en: "I originally thought she had settled down, but now it seems she's been retaliating against Xiaocheng behind my back for a long time!"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “我本来以为，她是息事宁人，现在看来，她是在背后长期报复小橙！”

0037.en: "And I knew nothing about any of this."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “而这一些，我全都不清楚。”

0037.en: Su Tao's voice gradually became remorseful, "Before, Xiaocheng would occasionally have scrapes when she came home. She was always clumsy, so she said she fell, and I didn't think much of it."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 苏桃语气渐渐愧疚，“以前，小橙回家的时候身上偶尔会有擦伤，她总是笨笨的，所以她说是摔的，我也没多想。”

0037.en: "She would smile foolishly and tell me not to worry. At the time, I just thought she was very sensible and truly good."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “傻傻地笑着说让我不要担心，我当时就觉得，她很懂事，真的很好。”

0037.en: "Now it seems those injuries were from being bullied."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “现在看来，那样的伤，是被欺负的。”

0037.en: Dongfang Yang took a deep breath, "Then why didn't she ever tell you? That blonde girl said seven thousand over three years, meaning she was bullied for three years?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳轻轻吸了口气，“那她为什么一直没有告诉你，那个黄毛说三年七千块，被欺负了三年？”

0037.en: "She probably didn't want to implicate me?"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: “她可能是不想连累我吧？”

0037.en: Afraid of getting hurt herself, afraid of being bullied like her, so she hid whatever harm she suffered, and came home smiling foolishly, saying—I'm fine, don't worry.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 怕自己受伤，怕自己和她一样被欺负，所以无论受到什么伤害都隐瞒下来，回到家傻傻地笑着说——我没事，不用担心。
