0037.en: Thinking back carefully, all she showed him was a smile!
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 仔细回想，她展现在自己面前的，只有笑容啊！

0037.en: Su Tao glanced at Dongfang Yang, who was still surprised, hesitated for a moment, and then said softly, "Also, perhaps because of these things I didn't know about, Xiaocheng developed some psychological issues. Then, being misled again, led to what happened these past two months."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 苏桃多看了眼处在惊讶之中的东方阳，犹豫了一下，浅浅说道，“还有就是，可能因为这些我不知道的事情，小橙落了一点心理问题，此前再被诱导，于是就发生了这两个月的事情。”

0037.en: At these words, Dongfang Yang suddenly understood.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 此话一出，东方阳恍然大悟。

0037.en: Everything made sense now.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 这样一切就说得通了。

0037.en: No wonder he felt that Chi Xiaocheng's personality had changed so drastically. It turned out there were so many hidden reasons he didn't know about.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 难怪他会觉得，池小橙表现出来的前后性格差异那么大，原来还有这么多他不清楚的隐情。

0037.en: Thinking of the large pool of crimson on the floor when he first entered the room, Dongfang Yang sighed inwardly.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 又想到刚刚进屋时地上的一大摊鲜红，东方阳心中叹了口气。

0037.en: It seemed he had misunderstood Chi Xiaocheng.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 看来，是自己误会池小橙了。

0037.en: The faint lingering suspicion immediately vanished.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 原本还存在的淡淡怀疑，顷刻解开。

0037.en: He should try to persuade Ye Liang. Chi Xiaocheng was also a pitiful person.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 回头劝一劝叶良吧，池小橙也是个可怜的家伙。

0037.en: Dongfang Yang saw that Su Tao was a little down and comforted her, "Although the process was a bit convoluted, the outcome is good, isn't it?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: 东方阳见苏桃情绪有点低落，安慰道，“虽然过程曲折了一点，但终归结果是好的是不是？”

0037.en: "Chi Xiaocheng isn't like she was two months ago, she's become normal, hasn't she?"
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: “池小橙现在，也没和前两个月那样了，变得正常了不是吗？”

0037.en: Reconciled with Su Tao.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 跟苏桃和解。

0037.en: Reconciled with himself too.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 跟自己也和解。

0037.en: The only one left was Ye Liang, right?
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 剩下的就是叶良了吧？

0037.en: But hearing these words, Su Tao felt a pang in her heart, "Yes, she's become... normal."
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 可这话听在苏桃耳里，却让她有些揪心，“是啊，变得...正常了呢。”

0037.en: Her smile was forced, and her eyes revealed a hint of unease.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 笑容有些牵强，眼神透露着些许不安。

0037.en: "Let's not talk about this anymore." Dongfang Yang said, "Regarding those who bullied Chi Xiaocheng, how do you want to deal with them? Or should I do it? I'll investigate them thoroughly and make them disappear."
0037.speaker: 东方阳
0037.cn: “不提这个了。”东方阳道，“关于那些欺负池小橙的人，你想怎么处理她们，要不我来吧，我去把她们查个底朝天然后让她们消失。”

0037.en: The swift and decisive methods of a powerful family.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 大家族的雷霆手段。

0037.en: It was too easy to send a few people to Siberia to plant potatoes.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 送几个人去西伯利亚种土豆实在是太简单了。

0037.en: However, Su Tao shook her head.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 然而苏桃却摇了摇头。

0037.en: The anger in her eyes was no longer suppressed, "Dongfang Yang, you've already helped me a lot, so I won't trouble you. They dared to treat Xiaocheng like this, I want to teach them a lesson myself!"
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 眸中怒火不再压抑，“东方阳你已经帮我很多了，就不麻烦你了，她们敢这样对待小橙，我要亲手教训她们！”

0037.en: Thinking of Chi Xiaocheng's sobbing cries when she was afraid of losing her, Su Tao involuntarily clenched her fists.
0037.speaker: 旁白
0037.cn: 想到池小橙刚刚害怕失去自己时的嚎啕大哭，苏桃不由自主地攥紧拳头。

0037.en: No one can bully my Xiaocheng!
0037.speaker: 苏桃
0037.cn: 谁也不能欺负我的小橙！

0038.en: Chapter 38 Su Tao: Is Xiaocheng Really a Yandere?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 第38章 苏桃：小橙她真的是病娇吗？

0038.en: Su Tao's execution was strong. Whenever she had an idea, as long as there were no other important matters hindering her, she would act on it.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 苏桃的行动力很强，每当有想法时，只要没其他重要的事情阻碍她，那么她就会对自己的想法为之付出行动。

0038.en: Just like now.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 就像现在。

0038.en: After settling Chi Xiaocheng, she immediately took a bus.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 安顿好池小橙后，便马不停蹄地乘上了公交。

0038.en: The destination was her former high school.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 目标是曾经的高中。

0038.en: More precisely, a house in a messy alley near the high school.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 准确来说，是高中附近一条乱巷里的一户人家。

0038.en: In the evening, Liu Guijia sat limping in her dilapidated small house, typing something on her phone, her face extremely grim.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 傍晚，刘桂嘉正瘸着腿坐在破旧的小房子内，在手机内输入着什么，脸色阴寒无比。

0038.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao... I'll make you pay sooner or later!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “池小橙，苏桃...我早晚要让你们好看！”

0038.en: She gritted her teeth in hatred, then looked at the gloomy follower kneeling beside her.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她咬牙怨恨，又看向了跪在一边阴沉的跟班。

0038.en: She grabbed her hair, "You b*tch, why didn't you help me in the room just now?"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 一把揪住了她的头发，“你这贱婢，刚刚在屋子里为什么不帮我？”

0038.en: The girl was forced to look up, her face covered in scars. She gritted her teeth, her body trembling, unable to speak.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 女孩被迫仰着头，脸上疤痕一道又一道，她咬着牙，身子颤抖得说不出话。

0038.en: Seeing this, Liu Guijia angrily slapped her, cursing, "Useless!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉见状，泄愤地甩去了一巴掌，怒骂道，“废物！”

0038.en: "You're going to Qiu Li's place later, right? Remember to tell that guy to call everyone. I'm going to kill those two b*tches the day after tomorrow... no, tomorrow!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “一会儿你要去邱丽那边是吧，记得跟那家伙说，让她把人都喊一下，老娘后天...不，明天就要去干死那两个贱货！”

0038.en: Her fists clenched, her knuckles cracking.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 拳头握紧，指骨噼里啪啦地响着。

0038.en: She had over a dozen delinquents under her, plus her two sisters. With forty or fifty people rushing over, no matter how strong Su Tao was, could she beat so many people?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她手底下光是不良，就有十几号人，加上两位姐妹，四五十号人冲过去，她苏桃一个人再怎么厉害，能打赢这么多人？

0038.en: After being slapped, the follower seemed to have gotten used to it and didn't get angry. Instead, she weakly said, "We can't beat Su Tao."
0038.speaker: 跟班
0038.cn: 挨了一巴掌，跟班似乎早已习惯，没有生气，反而弱弱地说着，“我们打不过苏桃的。”

0038.en: "Are you boosting their morale and dampening our own?"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “长他人志气，灭自己威风？”

0038.en: Liu Guijia's face twisted. She simply kicked the follower aside and stood up, angrily saying, "If Chi Xiaocheng hadn't gone crazy just now and scared me, I would have definitely fought her!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉脸色扭曲，索性一脚把跟班踹到一边，站起身怒道，“如果不是刚刚池小橙疯了，搞得我被吓了一跳，我多少也要跟她比划比划！”

0038.en: Just then, hurried footsteps suddenly sounded outside the door.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 恰逢此时，门外忽然响起急促的脚步声。

0038.en: A delinquent girl in a tattered leather jacket burst in, "N-not good, boss, Su Tao's here!"
0038.speaker: 不良少女
0038.cn: 一个穿着破烂皮衣的不良少女闯了进来，“不...不好了大姐头，苏桃打过来了！”

0038.en: "What?!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉

0038.en: Liu Guijia stood up with a "whoosh," but then gasped in pain as she twisted her leg.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉“噌”地站了起来，却又因为扭到腿，疼得倒吸了一口凉气。

0038.en: She quickly asked her subordinate, "How did Su Tao get here? This place is at least an hour's drive from Jiuzhou University, right?"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 她连忙问这个小弟，“苏桃怎么会过来这边，咱们这里离九州大学至少一个小时的车程吧？”

0038.en: "I don't know, sis!" The subordinate cried, "She... she seems to be here for revenge. We're all adults in college, why is she risking her life?!"
0038.speaker: 不良少女
0038.cn: “不知道啊姐！”这位小弟哭着道，“她...她好像是来报仇的，大伙都大学是成年人了，她玩什么命啊！”

0038.en: Liu Guijia swallowed.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉咽了一口唾沫。

0038.en: Revenge.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 报仇

0038.en: She was here to avenge Chi Xiaocheng!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她是给池小橙报仇的！

0038.en: Run?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 跑？

0038.en: This was her home, her base. If she ran now, what would her two sisters think?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 这里是自己家，是大本营啊，这时候如果跑，另外两个姐妹会怎么想？

0038.en: Liu Guijia took a deep breath, her eyes turning fierce, "Go gather all the sisters. Su Tao is just one person. Can she really beat more than a dozen of us?"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉深吸一口气，眼神变得狠戾了起来，“你去把姐妹们都召集起来，她苏桃就一个人，难道还打得过我们十几个人？”

0038.en: "Today, I'm going to have a showdown with her!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “今天我非要跟她掰掰手腕！”

0038.en: As soon as she finished speaking, the door was gently pushed open, and a cold voice slowly sounded, "Oh? Is that so?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 话音刚落，房门就被轻轻推开，冷淡的声音缓缓响起，“哦？是吗？”

0038.en: "Su Tao!"
0038.speaker: 报信小弟
0038.cn: “苏桃！”

0038.en: The subordinate who had brought the news exclaimed in surprise. After looking her up and down and seeing that she was completely unharmed, he closed his eyes and fainted.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 报信的小弟惊讶出声，上下打量见她完全无伤后，眼睛一闭昏了下去。

0038.en: Su Tao glanced at the subordinate and said lightly, "Get out. I'm only here for Liu Guijia today."
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 苏桃瞥了眼那小弟，淡淡说道，“出去，我今天只找刘桂嘉。”

0038.en: The fainted subordinate immediately opened his eyes wide, smiled awkwardly at Su Tao, and scrambled out the door.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 已经昏了的小弟顿时瞪大眼睛，对苏桃讪讪一笑，连滚带爬地溜出大门。

0038.en: Only Liu Guijia and her follower remained in the room.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 房间仅剩刘桂嘉和她的跟班。

0038.en: The latter shrank into a corner, her bangs covering her eyes, curiously watching Su Tao.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 后者缩到了角落，一头刘海遮住眼睛，好奇地看着苏桃。

0038.en: Liu Guijia, meanwhile, gritted her teeth and questioned Su Tao, "What do you mean?"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 而刘桂嘉，咬着牙质问苏桃，“你什么意思？”

0038.en: "What, you hit Xiaocheng just now, and now you're pretending to be innocent?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: “怎么，刚刚你打了小橙，现在反倒要装无辜？”

0038.en: Su Tao's face was cold. Her purpose in coming here was simple.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 苏桃冷着脸，她来这里的目的很简单。

0038.en: It was to get justice for Chi Xiaocheng.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 就是给池小橙找回公道。

0038.en: Or, to put it more directly, revenge!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 或者更直白一点，报仇！

0038.en: If it weren't for today's incident, she wouldn't even have known that Chi Xiaocheng had been bullied by this person for three years.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 要不是今天的意外，她甚至都不知道，池小橙居然被这家伙欺凌了三年。

0038.en: "It seems you haven't learned your lesson from high school, have you?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: “看来高中的教训你还没吃够啊？”

0038.en: Liu Guijia gritted her teeth, her voice resentful, "I just said, I didn't do anything to Chi Xiaocheng, at most I punched her once, I didn't do anything else!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉咬着牙，语气怨恨，“我刚刚说了，我没对池小橙做什么，最多就是打了她一拳，其余的我什么都没干！”

0038.en: Then, she pointed to her bandaged leg, "Even this, Chi Xiaocheng poked it!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 说完，又指着自己打了绷带的腿，“就连这个，还是池小橙戳的！”

0038.en: Su Tao looked at her as if she were an idiot, "Do you think I'll believe that? I can tell at a glance that your injury was an accident when Xiaocheng resisted. Do you take me for a fool?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 苏桃看傻子一样看着她，“你觉得我会信吗，你这伤我一看就知道是小橙反抗时的意外，你当我是傻子？”

0038.en: Liu Guijia's eyes widened.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉瞪大眼睛。

0038.en: At the time, she was clearly the victim!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 当时的情况，明明她才是受害者好不好！

0038.en: Liu Guijia understood now. Su Tao didn't care about the so-called truth at all. She was here to seek revenge.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉算是明白了，苏桃根本不在乎所谓的真相，她自己来找自己报仇的。

0038.en: Could she run?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 还能跑吗？

0038.en: There was no chance!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 根本没机会！

0038.en: Liu Guijia took a deep breath, no longer afraid, and stood directly in front of Su Tao, saying in a deep voice, "Since that's the case, let's settle this. Don't think I'm really afraid of you!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉深呼吸一口气，不再畏惧，而是直直地站在苏桃面前，沉声道，“既然如此，那就手底下见真章吧，别以为我真的怕了你！”

0038.en: After Liu Guijia finished speaking, she suddenly lowered her waist.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉说完，猛地沉腰。

0038.en: "Don't think I'm still that ignorant delinquent from high school. I've learned a few moves from my brother who's in the underworld. Su Tao, just die!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “别以为我还是高中那个一窍不通的小不良，我可是跟我那混道上的哥哥学过几招的，苏桃你就受死吧！”

0038.en: She immediately performed a set of military boxing in place.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她直接在原地甩了一套军体拳。

0038.en: It was truly powerful and imposing.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 那叫一个虎虎生风，气势汹涌。

0038.en: "Su Tao, die for me!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: “苏桃，给我死！”

0038.en: She took a step forward!
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 一步迈出！

0038.en: "Bang—!"
0038.speaker: 旁白

0038.en: Then she was knocked down by Su Tao's punch.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 然后她就被苏桃一拳干倒了。

0038.en: Liu Guijia covered her face and squatted on the ground, her head buzzing.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉捂着脸蹲在地上，脑袋嗡嗡的。

0038.en: "That's it?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: “就这？”

0038.en: Su Tao grabbed her sleeve and pulled her up, "You've been messing around for three years in high school, and you're still in this dilapidated place in college. If it weren't for today's incident, I wouldn't have known you've been bullying Xiaocheng for so long!"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 苏桃抓着她的衣袖，提了起来，“高中混了三年，大学了还在这老破地，要不是今天的事情，我还真不知道你欺负了小橙这么久！”

0038.en: Liu Guijia said aggrievedly, "Before, it was fine, but today she was clearly bullying me!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉委屈道，“之前就算了，今天明明她在欺负我！”

0038.en: "Still stubborn?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: “还在嘴硬？”

0038.en: Su Tao didn't hold back and immediately launched a combination of punches.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 苏桃没客气，直接就是一套组合拳下去。

0038.en: Liu Guijia was completely beaten to tears.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 彻底将刘桂嘉打得涕泪直流。

0038.en: Her yellow hair was already dirty. She cried out loudly, "I told you, you don't believe me. If I don't say anything, you'll think I'm stubborn. What can I do? At first, she asked me for money, and I didn't want to give it to her, so I punched her. Who knew she would suddenly go crazy!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 后者一头黄毛早已脏掉，她哭着大声喊道，“说了你又不信，不说你又觉得我倔，我能怎么办啊，一开始她让我还钱，我不想还就打了她一拳，谁知道她忽然就疯了！”

0038.en: Liu Guijia was also scared of being beaten. She said whatever came to mind, her voice choked with grievance, "She kept saying she was the victim, and then something about being a yandere. I felt like she was going to kill me at the time. Why don't you believe me?!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉也是被打怕了，想到什么说什么，声音哽咽委屈，“一边说着什么她才是受害者，一边又说病娇什么的，我当时都感觉她要杀了我了，为什么你就是不信啊！”

0038.en: At this moment, where was her earlier spiritedness?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 此刻的她哪里还有刚才的意气风发？

0038.en: But Su Tao, indeed, stopped at these words.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 但苏桃，却切实地因为这一番话而停下了手。

0038.en: She frowned deeply, her face puzzled, "You just said Xiaocheng mentioned something about a yandere?"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 深深皱着眉毛，脸色不解，“你刚刚说，小橙说了病娇什么的？”

0038.en: Liu Guijia wiped away a tear and nodded, "She was on top of me, playing with that knife and talking to herself. You don't believe me when I tell you, and you keep beating me and telling me to tell the truth. Are you even human?!"
0038.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0038.cn: 刘桂嘉抹了一把眼泪，点点头，“当时她骑在我身上，拨弄着那把刀一直自言自语，说了你又不信，还一直揍我让我说实话，你是人吗！”

0038.en: Su Tao scratched her cheek, a hint of guilt instinctively flashing in her heart.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 苏桃挠了挠脸颊，心中本能地闪过一抹愧疚。

0038.en: But then she thought, this person is utterly evil, she doesn't need to feel guilty at all.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 可转念一想，这家伙无恶不作，自己完全不需要愧疚。

0038.en: Right now, there was something more important.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 眼下，倒是有更重要的事情。

0038.en: So she grabbed her by the collar and said fiercely, "Tell me everything that happened in that room, from beginning to end!"
0038.speaker: 苏桃
0038.cn: 于是一把揪过她的衣领，恶狠狠道，“将房间里发生的事情，一五一十地告诉我！”

0038.en: Xiaocheng was a yandere, she knew that.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 小橙是病娇，这点她是知道的。

0038.en: But what puzzled her was why Chi Xiaocheng would actively mention the word "yandere"?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 可让她百思不得其解的是，池小橙为什么会主动提到病娇这个词？

0038.en: If she herself was aware of what a yandere was, could she still be one?
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 既然她本人意识到了什么是病娇，那她还能是病娇吗？

0038.en: She vaguely felt that what happened to Chi Xiaocheng was far more complicated than she had imagined.
0038.speaker: 旁白
0038.cn: 她隐隐觉得，发生在池小橙身上的事情，远没有自己想的那么简单。

0039.en: Chapter 39: You Raised a Yandere and Didn't Know It?
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 第39章 你养的病娇，你不知道？

0039.en: After a harsh beating, Liu Guijia was no longer stubborn.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 被狠狠揍了一顿，刘桂嘉也不再倔着脾气。

0039.en: She sat on a chair, wiped her face with a tissue, and recounted what happened in Chi Xiaocheng's room with a sense of grievance.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 坐到一张椅子上，用纸巾擦了一下脸后便委屈地讲述着池小橙房间里发生的事情。

0039.en: She glossed over the part where she bullied Chi Xiaocheng, avoiding the worst details.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 避重就轻，她略过了自己欺负池小橙的那一段。

0039.en: She got straight to the point, "I wasn't going to do anything to her, I just scared her. Then I said that neither Chi Xiaocheng nor you were any good."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: 直接说了重点，“本来我就没打算对她怎么样，就是吓了一下她，然后我说池小橙和你都不是什么好东西。”

0039.en: "After that, Chi Xiaocheng seemed to go crazy."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “在那之后，池小橙就像是疯了一样。”

0039.en: "She kept saying that it was okay to curse her, but not you, and she even ran towards my knife. I said sooner or later... I'd beat you like a dog, and Chi Xiaocheng said that even if you were a dog, you could only be her dog and have nothing to do with me."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “一边说什么骂她可以，但不能骂你，还往我刀子上撞过来，我说迟早......迟早把你打成一条狗，那池小橙还说就算你是狗，也只能是她的狗，跟我不能有关系这样的话。”

0039.en: "Then, she snatched my knife."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “然后，抢了我的刀。”

0039.en: "After stabbing my thigh, she cut her own forehead and told me to hurry up and do it, saying she was the real victim."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “给我大腿来了一刀后，又往自己额头划了一下，说什么让我赶紧动手，她才是被害者这种话。”

0039.en: "Finally, she muttered to herself that she wasn't a yandere."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “最后又自言自语地说什么她又不是病娇。”

0039.en: Just thinking about it made Liu Guijia feel a lingering fear.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 刘桂嘉光想想，都有点后怕。

0039.en: She shrank back and said, "Then you came into the house and started hitting me without saying a word. I'm the real victim in all of this, okay!"
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: 又缩了缩脖子，“再后来就是你来到房子里面，二话不说就打我，这个过程中，我才是受害者好不好！”

0039.en: Su Tao frowned, "You're not lying to me?"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 苏桃皱了皱眉毛，“你没在骗我？”

0039.en: Hearing this, Liu Guijia's blood pressure shot up. Ignoring the bright red marks on her face, she stood up and yelled, "If I don't say anything, you think I'm stubborn. When I tell you, you don't believe me. If I'm lying, may my whole family die!"
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: 刘桂嘉一听，血压都上来了，甚至不顾脸上的鲜红，直起身怒骂道，“不说你觉得我嘴硬，说了你又不信，我要是骗你我死全家！”

0039.en: Su Tao rubbed her chin and asked, "What was Xiaocheng's state at that time? What was her expression like?"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 苏桃摸了摸下巴，又问，“那当时小橙的状态呢，表情之类的是什么样的？”

0039.en: "Well..." Liu Guijia recalled calmly. "It felt like she became a different person. Her tone was frantic, her face was flushed, and her eyes were a bit like a cat's. In short... it was terrifying!"
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “这......”刘桂嘉冷静地回忆了一下，“感觉像是变了个人，语气疯狂，脸色潮/红，眼睛有点像猫的那种，总之就......很恐怖！”

0039.en: She wasn't lying about that.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这点她倒是没骗人。

0039.en: Su Tao remembered that Chi Xiaocheng had been in a similar state in the basement and on the rooftop.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃印象中，无论是地下室还是那次天台，池小橙也是这样的状态。

0039.en: She tentatively called it her "yandere mode."
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她姑且称之为病娇形态。

0039.en: Normally, she was quite normal, but once her bottom line was crossed, she would become morbidly insane.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 平时还算正常，可一旦触碰到她的底线，整个人就会变得病态癫狂。

0039.en: But here was the problem.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 但问题就在这里。

0039.en: She had crammed a lot of information about yanderes.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她恶补过了病娇的知识。

0039.en: Without a doubt, the state Chi Xiaocheng had shown before—self-harm, seeking death—was the typical "sickness" of a yandere.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 毫无疑问，池小橙此前所展现的状态，就是病娇的那种“病态”，自我伤害、一心求死等。

0039.en: But another major characteristic of a yandere is that they are good at pretending!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 可病娇另一大特点是，善于伪装！

0039.en: And Dr. Cheng had said that yanderes usually don't know they are yanderes.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 并且成医生说过，病娇通常情况下，是不知道自己是病娇的。

0039.en: Xiaocheng knew she was a yandere.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 小橙知道自己是病娇。

0039.en: And she even said she wasn't a yandere.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 还说自己不是病娇。

0039.en: Yet, she displayed all sorts of morbid behaviors.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 却又表现出种种病态的一面。

0039.en: So the question was...
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 那么问题来了。

0039.en: Is she a yandere or not?
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她到底是不是病娇？

0039.en: Su Tao never knew Chi Xiaocheng was capable of such acting.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃可从来不知道池小橙还有这样的一份演技。

0039.en: "This is a headache."
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 陈倩点头，当了一周的二五仔已经习惯了，“昨晚她们只通了10分钟的电话聊的什么不知道，但我一大清早就见到苏桃出门了，可能是去找司辰。”

0039.en: Su Tao rubbed her temples, realizing she couldn't figure it out on her own.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃揉了揉眉心，她发现自己一个人想不出个所以然来。

0039.en: Seeing it was getting dark outside, she took out her phone and looked at Liu Guijia. "Transfer the seven thousand you owe Xiaocheng to me now."
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 见门外天色渐晚，便拿出手机，看向刘桂嘉，“欠小橙的那七千块扫过来。”

0039.en: Liu Guijia's face stiffened. "I... I don't have any money. I only have three hundred on me."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: 刘桂嘉脸色一僵，“我...我没有钱，身上就三百块。”

0039.en: Su Tao cracked her knuckles, making a popping sound, and asked slowly, "If you don't have money, then how do you plan to solve this?"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 苏桃松动了一下指骨，发出一阵噼里啪啦的声音，缓缓问道，“钱都没有，那你想怎么解决？”

0039.en: "I... I..." Liu Guijia looked flustered, afraid Su Tao would hit her again. Without thinking, she blurted out, "Can I use my body?"
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “我...我......”刘桂嘉神色慌乱，生怕苏桃再度出手打自己，思绪几乎不过脑子，直直说道，“我用身体还可以吗？”

0039.en: She shrank back. "Your relationship with Chi Xiaocheng must be special, since you were able to train her into that state. If you don't mind, I..."
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: 她缩了缩脖子，“你和池小橙的关系肯定不一般吧，毕竟你能把她训成那个鬼样子，你要是不介意的话，我......”

0039.en: "Stop!"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: “打住！”

0039.en: Su Tao stood up and backed away with a look of disgust. "Take a look at yourself. Don't disgust me."
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 苏桃一脸恶寒地起身后退，“也不看看自己什么样，你别恶心我。”

0039.en: Comparing the two girls...
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 同样是女孩子，对比之下。

0039.en: Liu Guijia was simply a toad.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 刘桂嘉简直就是癞蛤蟆。

0039.en: When it came to being cute, Xiaocheng was the best.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 论可爱还得是小橙。

0039.en: The image of Chi Xiaocheng's cute face and sweet smile appeared in her mind, and Su Tao felt much more relaxed.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 脑海中浮现池小橙可爱的脸蛋和乖巧甜蜜的笑容，苏桃心中轻松了不少。

0039.en: She took a breath. "One month. If you can't come up with the money, I'll be back. If I find out you're still bullying weaker people, you can expect to spend the rest of your life in jail!"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 她呼了一口气，“一个月，拿不出这些钱我还会再过来的，要是被我知道你还去欺凌弱小，就等着一辈子蹲牢里吧！”

0039.en: With that, Su Tao prepared to leave.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 说罢，苏桃就打算离开。

0039.en: But her sharp eyes noticed a small figure huddled in the corner.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 可眼尖的她，注意到角落边还缩着一个小小的身影。

0039.en: She looked as small as Chi Xiaocheng.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 看着和池小橙一样娇小。

0039.en: Her clothes were ragged, and her hair and exposed skin were filthy.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 衣衫褴褛，头发和裸在外的肌肤也脏乱无比。

0039.en: She shot a fierce glare at Liu Guijia, walked over to this little follower, and extended her hand.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她恶狠狠地瞪了一眼刘桂嘉，走到这个小跟班旁边，伸出了手。

0039.en: Her smile was like moonlight shining down. "Don't worry, she won't dare to bully you anymore. My name is Su Tao, what's yours?"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 笑容像洒下的月光，“放心吧，以后她不敢再欺负你的，我叫苏桃，你叫什么？”

0039.en: However, to Su Tao's surprise, the girl in front of her shrank back again.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 然而出乎苏桃意料的是，眼前这个女孩竟是再度缩了缩身子。

0039.en: She quickly shook her head and didn't take the outstretched hand.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 迅速摇了摇头，没有去触摸她伸出的手。

0039.en: Su Tao thought the girl was just scared.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃本以为对方是被吓到了。

0039.en: But then she heard her weak voice, "Thank you."
0039.speaker: 陌生女1
0039.cn: 却又听到她发出软弱的声音，“谢谢。”

0039.en: Then she shook her head again.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 紧接着再度摇头。

0039.en: This time, it was a clear refusal.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这一次，是明确的拒绝。

0039.en: She must have been a victim of bullying too, yet she refused her help.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她应该也是被欺凌的人，居然这样拒绝自己。

0039.en: A bit strange.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 有点怪。

0039.en: But Su Tao didn't interfere further; she respected everyone's choices.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 但苏桃也没过多干涉，她尊重每个人的选择。

0039.en: Before leaving, a thought suddenly struck her. She looked back at Liu Guijia. "By the way, why do you think Xiaocheng became like that, like you said, crazy?"
0039.speaker: 苏桃
0039.cn: 临行前，脑子忽然想到什么，回眸看向刘桂嘉，“对了，你觉得小橙为什么会变成那样，就是你说的疯了似的。”

0039.en: "Huh?" Liu Guijia covered her face and looked at Su Tao as if she were an idiot. "Wasn't it your doing? The dog you raised... no, the person you brought along, you don't know why she became like this?"
0039.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0039.cn: “蛤？”刘桂嘉捂着脸，看傻子一样看着苏桃，“不是你造成的吗，你养的狗......不对，你带的人为什么会变成这样你不知道？”

0039.en: Getting her answer, Su Tao sighed.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 得到回答，苏桃叹了口气。

0039.en: She walked out the door.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 走出门外。

0039.en: The sun had set, and the moon, peeking through the clouds, began to dance with the stars.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 夕阳已经落下，月亮透过云层，开始与星星共舞。

0039.en: Winter was approaching, and the days were getting darker faster.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 即将入冬，天黑得越来越快。

0039.en: And colder.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 也越来越冷了。

0039.en: Su Tao breathed out a puff of warm air and walked slowly into the dark alley.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃呼了一口热气，缓缓走入深巷。

0039.en: The next morning, after a night of rest, Chi Xiaocheng woke up holding her head.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 次日清晨，休息了一晚的池小橙捂着脑袋起床。

0039.en: "System, what are my Emotion Points at?"
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: “系统，情绪值多少了？”

0039.en: This was something she checked every morning when she woke up.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这是她每天起床都会确认的事情。

0039.en: By checking the time and amount of Emotion Points provided by the main characters, she could estimate if anything important had happened.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 通过各大主角提供情绪值的时间和数量，来估测是否发生了什么重要的事情。

0039.en: [Replying to Host, 754 points.]
0039.speaker: 系统
0039.cn: 【回宿主，754点】

0039.en: [Yesterday evening, both the female lead Su Tao and the male lead Ye Liang provided a sum of Emotion Points.]
0039.speaker: 系统
0039.cn: 【在昨天傍晚，女主苏桃和男主叶良都分别提供了一笔情绪值】

0039.en: It wasn't easy for her to get Emotion Points quickly without causing a major scene; usually, it was just three or five points at a time.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 她不主动整大活的情况下，想快速获得情绪值可不简单，平时就算有也是三五点。

0039.en: Now it had suddenly increased by several hundred points?
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 现在居然直接加了几百点？

0039.en: "What happened yesterday evening?"
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: “昨天傍晚发生了什么？”

0039.en: Su Tao was understandable; she was probably just worried about her, which generated Emotion Points.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 苏桃还好，无非就是在意自己的事情，所以产生情绪值。

0039.en: But as for Ye Liang, she had been in the hospital for a few days and hadn't left home since returning. Hiding away didn't seem to be a solution.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 倒是叶良，自己住院几天，回家又不出门，一直躲下去似乎不是办法。

0039.en: *Ding-dong~*
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: “叮咚~”

0039.en: Her phone chimed.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 手机响了一下。

0039.en: Chi Xiaocheng picked up her phone. It was a message from Chen Qian on WeChat: "Chi Xiaocheng, it's been seven days. You promised me the antidote. I'm starting to get a rash on my face. Hurry up and give me the antidote!"
0039.speaker: 陈倩
0039.cn: 池小橙拿起手机，是陈倩从微信发来的消息：“池小橙，今天已经是第七天了，说好的给我解药呢，我脸上开始长痱子了，你快给我解药啊！”

0039.en: Only then did Chi Xiaocheng remember that she had promised to give Chen Qian a so-called antidote every week.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这时池小橙才想起来，约好了每周给一次所谓的解药陈倩。

0039.en: But in reality, the bottled water she had "spiked" was just mineral water.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 可实际上，之前加料的矿泉水也只是矿泉水而已。

0039.en: A rash... a hormonal imbalance or an allergy?
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 长痱子...内分泌失调还是过敏？

0039.en: Chi Xiaocheng typed back, "Don't worry. I asked you to keep an eye on Su Tao. How is that going?"
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: 池小橙打字回道，“别着急，这段时间让你关心苏桃，现在怎么样了？”

0039.en: Chen Qian: "That girl is so dumb. She believes anything I say. Plus, with what you said about recommending a psychologist to her, she trusts me completely now."
0039.speaker: 陈倩
0039.cn: 陈倩：“那家伙也是蠢，随便说点什么就信了，加上上次你说推给她心理医生的事情，现在别说有多信任我了。”

0039.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Good. Keep it up. It would be best if you become her best friend who she tells everything to. By the way, she went back to the dorm last night, right? Do you know what she did in the evening?"
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: 池小橙：“可以，你继续发展，最好成为她无话不谈的好朋友，另外昨晚她回宿舍了吧，知道她傍晚的时候去做了什么吗？”

0039.en: Chen Qian: "I'm not sure. She seemed pretty tired when she came back. But she talked to Si Chen on the phone for ten minutes before bed. I don't know what they talked about."
0039.speaker: 陈倩
0039.cn: 陈倩：“不太清楚，她回来的时候好像挺累的，不过睡觉前和司辰聊了十分钟的电话，内容我不知道是什么。”

0039.en: "Si Chen?"
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: “司辰？”

0039.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow. An image of a sinister, glasses-wearing man appeared in her mind.
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 池小橙挑眉，脑海浮现了一个戴眼镜的阴险男人形象。

0039.en: He was also one of the important male leads in the novel, and his character type was one that Chi Xiaocheng found very difficult to deal with!
0039.speaker: 旁白
0039.cn: 这也是小说中重要的男主之一，并且他的人设类型，恰巧是池小橙非常难对付的那种！

0039.en: Chi Xiaocheng sent a message to Chen Qian, "Meet me at Moonlit Cafe. I'll bring you the antidote."
0039.speaker: 池小橙
0039.cn: 池小橙发消息给陈倩，“去月见咖啡厅等我，我拿解药给你。”

0040.en: Chapter 40 You Can Only Be Mine!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 第40章 你只能是我的！

0040.en: After casually buying a bottle of mineral water on the roadside, Chi Xiaocheng quickly arrived at the Moonlight Cafe.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 随手在路边买了一瓶矿泉水，池小橙很快赶到了月色咖啡厅。

0040.en: At this time, her head was still wrapped in gauze to conceal her identity.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 此时她的头上还围着一圈纱布掩人耳目。

0040.en: Covered by her tea-colored hair, it looked like a headscarf, giving her sweet and lovely appearance a vibrant touch.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 被茶色的秀发盖过，就好似一条头巾，让清甜可爱的她，多了一股元气的感觉。

0040.en: Yesterday's hoodie was stained with blood and sent for washing. Chi Xiaocheng didn't have any autumn clothes, so she reluctantly wore a sailor suit, with an extra T-shirt underneath for warmth.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 昨天的卫衣染血拿去洗了，池小橙也没有入秋穿的衣服，无奈穿了一件水手服，为了保暖，里面多穿了一件T恤。

0040.en: Already cute, this sailor suit was like a layer of stars draped over her, making it impossible to look away.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 本就可爱的她，这一件水手服就像是在身上披了一层星星，让人无法挪开目光。

0040.en: It was truly a case of prioritizing cuteness over warmth.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 属实是要可爱不要温度。

0040.en: Walking into the cafe, she saw Chen Qian anxiously waiting there.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 走进咖啡厅，她便见到陈倩焦急地等在了那里。

0040.en: After a glance, she greeted Butler Chu at the counter, "Good morning, Uncle Chu San, I'm here for work."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 瞥了一眼后，向吧台的褚三打招呼道，“褚三叔叔早上好呀，我来上班了。”

0040.en: Butler Chu smiled, "The prices at our cafe are very high. Although it's next to the school, there aren't many customers in a day. Miss Chi can just find a place to rest. I'll watch over things here."
0040.speaker: 褚三
0040.cn: 褚三笑了笑，“咱们咖啡厅的定价都很高，虽然开在学校旁边，但一天也不会有几个客人，池小姐随便找个地方休息就行，这里我看着就好了。”

0040.en: Sure enough, Dongfang Yang sent her here just to pass the time.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 果然啊，东方阳让自己来这里就是混日子的。

0040.en: She had been to the cafe twice and hadn't seen a single customer.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 两次来咖啡厅，都没见到一个客人。

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng glanced at the price list.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙瞥了眼价格表。

0040.en: Good heavens, the cheapest cup of coffee was over 100 yuan!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 好家伙，最便宜的一杯咖啡，100多块！

0040.en: She had less than 300 yuan in total. If she bought winter clothes, she wouldn't even have money for food.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她浑身上下就300块不到，买过冬的衣服的话甚至都没饭吃。

0040.en: Sighing inwardly, Chi Xiaocheng walked towards Chen Qian.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 心中叹一口气，池小橙走向了陈倩。

0040.en: Sitting in front of her, she handed over the mineral water, "Drink."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 坐在她面前，将矿泉水递了过去，“喝吧。”

0040.en: Chen Qian looked at the bottle of Nongfu Spring and instinctively shivered, "Is this the antidote?"
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: 陈倩看着这一瓶农夫山泉，下意识就是抖了一下，“这是解药？”

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng said lightly, "You'd better speak softly. I've checked, there are no cameras here, but it's not good to be too loud."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 池小橙淡淡道，“你说话最好小声点，我看了这里没有摄像头，但太大声可不好。”

0040.en: Butler Chu was Dongfang Yang's man.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 褚三可是东方阳的人。

0040.en: If it weren't for the elegant background music, they would probably be able to hear them even if they spoke softly.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如果这里不是有着优雅的背景音乐，她们说话再小声恐怕都能听到。

0040.en: Chen Qian swallowed, carefully examining the bottle of mineral water.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陈倩咽了一口唾沫，仔细翻看了一下这瓶矿泉水。

0040.en: The bottle cap was unopened, and the label hadn't been touched.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 瓶口未开封，标签的纸也没动过。

0040.en: Even the production date was clearly visible.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 甚至生产日期都清清楚楚。

0040.en: It looked exactly like a bottle of mineral water just bought from a convenience store.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 怎么看都像是刚从小卖部买的矿泉水。

0040.en: "Is this really the antidote?"
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “这真的是解药？”

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng said, "It's temporary. This is a two-week supply. You only need to drink half a bottle at a time. It's a disguise, just like last time. If you don't believe me, try the taste."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 池小橙道：“暂时性的，这是两周的量，你一次喝半瓶的量就行了，和上次一样是伪装，不信你试试味道。”

0040.en: Chen Qian was half-skeptical. She twisted open the cap and sniffed.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陈倩半信半疑，拧开瓶盖嗅了一下。

0040.en: No smell.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 没什么味道。

0040.en: She took another sip.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 又喝了一口。

0040.en: "A little sweet?"
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “有点甜甜的？”

0040.en: The taste was like grape juice.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 味道像葡萄汁。

0040.en: The last time she drank bitter poison.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 上次喝的毒药是苦的。

0040.en: Tasting a different flavor, Chen Qian no longer doubted and drank half the bottle in one gulp.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 尝到不同的味道，陈倩不再怀疑，“吨吨吨”地就喝了半瓶。

0040.en: After finishing, she let out a long sigh of relief.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 完后才长舒一口气。

0040.en: She felt a little better, less sleepy, whether it was psychological or not.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 不知道是不是心理作用，她确实感觉自己状态好了点，没那么困了。

0040.en: Seeing her finish, Chi Xiaocheng asked, "Tell me about Su Tao and Si Chen."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 见她喝完，池小橙询问道，“说说苏桃和司辰的事情。”

0040.en: Chen Qian nodded, already used to being a double agent for a week, "I don't know what they talked about during their 10-minute call last night, but I saw Su Tao leave early this morning. She might be going to see Si Chen."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: 陈倩点头，当了一周的二五仔已经习惯了，“昨晚她们只通了10分钟的电话聊的什么不知道，但我一大清早就见到苏桃出门了，可能是去找司辰。”

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow when she heard the word "leave," "Was she dressed up?"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 池小橙听到“出门”二字，眉毛一挑，“有精心打扮过吗？”

0040.en: "Uh..." Chen Qian didn't understand why Chi Xiaocheng asked that, but she answered truthfully, "No, she just wore a down jacket and left."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “额......”陈倩不明白池小橙为什么这样问，还是如实答道，“这个倒没有，穿了一件羽绒衫就出门了。”

0040.en: "Then it's not a date."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: “那看来不是去约会。”

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng murmured. She was really afraid that Su Tao would go on a date with one of the male leads.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙呢喃了一下，她还真怕苏桃去和某个男主约会。

0040.en: In her eyes, Su Tao was already hers.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 在她眼里，苏桃已经是她的了。

0040.en: She would never allow these male leads to touch her.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 就决不允许这些男主染指。

0040.en: But that unconscious murmur made Chen Qian's eyes look strange.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 可那无意识的呢喃，却让陈倩眼神奇怪了起来。

0040.en: But she didn't think much of it and continued, "Besides last night, the day before yesterday, Su Tao also had lunch with Si Chen. When she returned to the dorm, I subtly asked her, and she said that Si Chen had studied psychology and she just asked him a few questions."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: 但也没多想，继续说道，“除了昨晚，还有就是前天苏桃也和司辰一起吃了个午饭，当时她回到宿舍我旁敲侧击地问了一下，她说司辰兼学过心理学，问他一点问题而已。”

0040.en: Upon hearing this, Chi Xiaocheng's sense of crisis immediately increased!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙闻言，心中顿时危机感大增！

0040.en: At this critical juncture.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 在这个关键的节点。

0040.en: Si Chen also had the bonus of psychology.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 司辰又有心理学的buff加成。

0040.en: She must have been asking about her yandere tendencies!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她问的肯定是和自己病娇有关的话题！

0040.en: She quickly asked, "And then?"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 急忙询问，“然后呢？”

0040.en: "Then I don't know." Chen Qian pouted, "Although I tried to stay by her side as you told me, when she was with those young masters, I didn't have a chance to follow. We're not in the same circle."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “然后我就不知道了。”陈倩努了努嘴，“虽然我听你的话尽量在她身边，可她接触那些大少爷的时候，我就没机会跟着了，我和她都不是一个圈子的。”

0040.en: This was indeed a problem.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 这倒是个问题。

0040.en: Chen Qian couldn't enter the upper circles.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陈倩进不了上层的圈子。

0040.en: If she didn't have some connection with Su Tao, Dongfang Yang probably wouldn't even look at her.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 自己如果不是和苏桃有点关系，想必东方阳也不会看自己一眼。

0040.en: As an informant, she was useful, but not much.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 作为眼线，她有作用，但不多。

0040.en: "Did anything else happen this week?"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: “这周还发生了什么其他的事情吗？”

0040.en: Chen Qian frowned, thinking for a moment, then suddenly remembered something, "I almost forgot, there's one thing related to you."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: 陈倩皱着眉毛思考了一下，忽然想到了什么，“差点忘了，倒是有一件事和你有关。”

0040.en: "What?"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: “什么？”

0040.en: "I found out when you were hospitalized. I was going to tell you when you were discharged, but I almost forgot." Chen Qian slowly said:
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “是在你住院的时候发现的，我本来想等你出院就告诉你，差点忘了。”陈倩缓缓说道：

0040.en: "I heard you angered Ye Liang and ruined his banquet. Su Tao, to apologize, agreed to be Ye Liang's maid for three days. The date is the 15th, Wednesday."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “听说你惹到了叶良，搅和了她的宴会，苏桃为了道歉，答应去当叶良三天的女仆，时间的话是15号，周三。”

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "¿"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 池小橙：“¿”

0040.en: Her originally crimson eyes suddenly became deep and terrifying, "Tao Tao is going to be Ye Liang's... maid?"
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 她本来赤红的双眼，陡然变得幽深恐怖了起来，“桃桃要去给叶良...当女仆？”

0040.en: For some reason, Chen Qian felt that Chi Xiaocheng was particularly terrifying at this moment. After swallowing, she nodded, "According to Su Tao, it seems she made Ye Liang lose face at that banquet, and then Ye Liang forcefully demanded that she be his maid for three days."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: 不知为何，陈倩感觉此时的池小橙尤为恐怖，咽了一口唾沫后点了点头，“按照苏桃的说法好像是，她让叶良在那什么宴会落了面子，然后叶良强势要求她当三天女仆。”

0040.en: "Also, it seems she said that this would make Ye Liang calm down and stop targeting you."
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “还有就是，好像还说这样能让叶良消气，让他不要针对你之类的。”

0040.en: "Hehe... hehehehe..."
0040.speaker: 旁白

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng sneered.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙冷笑了起来。

0040.en: She wondered why Ye Liang hadn't come to find her all these days. So this was why.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 我说为什么这么些天了，叶良都不来找自己，原来还有这一桩事。

0040.en: In the original novel, there was no such plot development.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 原著中，接下来的剧情可没这一出。

0040.en: Her butterfly effect was flapping faster and faster.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 自己蝴蝶的翅膀扇得越来越快了。

0040.en: Considering her condition, Su Tao would definitely not tell her about this, and even other informed people would be warned by Su Tao not to tell her.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 考虑到自己的病情，苏桃肯定不会和自己说这件事，甚至其他知情者也会被苏桃告诫不要说给自己听。

0040.en: If it weren't for Chen Qian, she wouldn't even know that Su Tao was being taken advantage of by Ye Liang!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如果不是陈倩，苏桃被那叶良吃干抹净了自己都不知道！

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng thought for a moment, then reached into her pocket.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙想了想，伸手放进口袋。

0040.en: Then she took out a small pill and threw it to Chen Qian, "You did well. This is your reward."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 然后拿出了一颗小药丸扔给了陈倩，“你做得很好，这是给你的奖励。”

0040.en: "What is this?"
0040.speaker: 陈倩
0040.cn: “这是什么？”

0040.en: Chen Qian picked up the small pill.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陈倩拿起小药丸。

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng said expressionlessly, "It's a black technology that can help you remove blackheads from your nose. It works in half a day."
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 池小橙面无表情：“能够帮你去鼻子上黑头的黑科技，半天见效。”

0040.en: "Really?!"
0040.speaker: 陈倩

0040.en: Chen Qian's skin wasn't very good, and she always had to apply thick foundation when she went out.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 陈倩皮肤不怎么好，每次出门化妆都要盖厚厚的粉底。

0040.en: She had witnessed Chi Xiaocheng's power, and if this thing was real...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她算是见识过了池小橙的厉害，如果这东西是真的话

0040.en: Her face was filled with joy. She wasn't afraid that Chi Xiaocheng was lying to her, and immediately swallowed it.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她一脸欣喜，也不怕池小橙是骗她的，当即就吃了下去。

0040.en: [Detected supporting character Chen Qian generating gratitude towards the host.]
0040.speaker: 系统
0040.cn: 【检测到配角陈倩对宿主产生感激的情绪】

0040.en: [Emotion points +7]
0040.speaker: 系统
0040.cn: 【情绪值+7】

0040.en: "This..."
0040.speaker: 旁白

0040.en: It was an unexpected surprise.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 倒是意外之喜。

0040.en: This pill itself cost 30 emotion points in the system, and Chi Xiaocheng used it to win people over.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 这颗药丸在系统那本身就30点情绪值，池小橙用来收买人心用的。

0040.en: She had forgotten that, according to the system's settings, any named character in the original work, whether protagonist or supporting character.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她倒是忘了，系统的设定中，只要是原著中有名有姓的人物，无论是主角还是配角。

0040.en: Could generate emotion points!
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 都能产生情绪值！

0040.en: And Chen Qian happened to be a rather important cannon fodder villain.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 而陈倩，恰巧就是一个还算重要的炮灰反派。

0040.en: She was still worried that she had no trump card against Ye Liang.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 她还愁自己没有底牌对抗叶良呢。

0040.en: If that's the case...
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 如果是这样的话

0040.en: Chi Xiaocheng took out her phone and looked at her contacts.
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 池小橙拿出手机，看向了一众联系人。

0040.en: Then she slowly tapped on the ID with the note "Invincible Brother."
0040.speaker: 旁白
0040.cn: 随后缓缓点到了备注“天下无敌的哥哥”的ID下。

0040.en: Just wait, Tao Tao, I will definitely save you from Ye Liang.
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 等着吧桃桃，我一定会把你从叶良手里拯救出来。

0040.en: You are mine!
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 你是我的！

0040.en: You can only like me!
0040.speaker: 池小橙
0040.cn: 你只能喜欢我！

0041.en: Chapter 41 The Villainous Brother is a Peach-Orange Shipper?
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 第41章 反派哥哥竟是橙桃党？

0041.en: "Boss, the place is ours!"
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: “老大，场子拿下了！”

0041.en: In an underground pub in Lizhi City, a burly henchman wearing a gold chain and black clothes dragged a man in a suit to a one-armed, scarred man.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 荔枝市的一家地下酒馆，一位戴着金链，身着黑衣的健壮小弟拖着西装男来到一个独臂疤脸男的身边。

0041.en: The henchman spat on the floor and threw the man in the suit in front of him, "This guy is quite arrogant. He says he's from the Ye family and can send us flying with a wave of his hand. What a joke."
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: 小弟吐了一口唾沫到地板，将西装男一把甩到面前，“这家伙还挺嚣张，说是什么叶家的人，挥挥手就能把哥几个给掀飞，真是笑掉大牙。”

0041.en: The man in the suit, who was a manager of the pub, had half his face swollen. He spoke with a missing front tooth, "Let me go! I'm Young Master Ye Liang's man. You thugs really don't know your place. You dare to provoke the Ye family's young master? If you don't let me go, disaster will strike you tomorrow!"
0041.speaker: 负责人
0041.cn: 倒地的西装男是酒馆的一个负责人，他脸肿了一半，开口说话还能看到少了颗大门牙，“放开我！我是叶良少爷的人，你们这群混混真是不知天高地厚，敢惹叶家大少，不放了我明天你们就会大祸临头！”

0041.en: The henchman heard this and pointed at the manager, laughing, "What kind of Young Master Ye family? What are you pretending for? Are you writing a novel here?"
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: 小弟闻言，指着负责人哈哈大笑，“什么勾八叶家大少，装什么装，你搁这写小说呢？”

0041.en: With that, he was about to kick him again.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 说罢，又是打算一脚踹过去。

0041.en: "Alright, don't make it too difficult for him."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “行了，也别太为难人家。”

0041.en: Chi Song lit a cigarette, then shook his amputated arm and looked at the manager, "I know Young Master Ye Liang. He's still at the same school as my little sister. But his roots are in Jiuzhou City, right? Lizhi City is as chaotic as Gotham."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 池松点了一根烟，又抖了抖断臂的那只肩膀，看向了负责人，“叶良少爷我还是知道的，现在还跟我小妹一个学校呢，但他的根基在九州市吧，这荔枝市乱得跟哥谭一样。”

0041.en: "What, does the famous Young Master Ye family also want to get involved in the gray industry?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “怎么，大名鼎鼎的叶家大少也想染指灰色产业？”

0041.en: He exhaled a puff of smoke, and the scar on his left cheek twitched with his facial muscles, making Chi Song look extremely fierce.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吐出一口烟圈，左脸的刀疤随脸部肌肉颤动，将池松衬得凶狠无比。

0041.en: But hidden beneath his fierce appearance was a helpless sigh.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 可藏在凶狠的外貌下，是无奈的叹息。

0041.en: He knew that his little sister liked Ye Liang, which made him extremely worried.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他是知道的，自家小妹喜欢叶良，这让他无比发愁。

0041.en: He was uneducated, but he also knew that their social classes were vastly different.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他没文化，但也知道二人的阶级天差地别。

0041.en: Even if Ye Liang liked his little sister, the people behind him would probably not agree.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 那叶良就算是看上了小妹，他背后的的人也多半不会同意。

0041.en: Not to mention, from his little sister's perspective, their family background was a mess.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 更别说在小妹视角上，家境一塌糊涂。

0041.en: Her brother was an uneducated thug who mixed with society, and her parents had farmed for decades without any education.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 哥哥是个没文化混社会的渣仔，父母耕了几十年的田没一点文化。

0041.en: "Alas!"
0041.speaker: 旁白

0041.en: Deep in thought, this big man sighed.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 情到深处，这位大汉子叹了一口气。

0041.en: The henchman saw this and thought Chi Song was unhappy with the manager. He grabbed the manager and lifted him up, "Boss, should we kill this guy?"
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: 小弟见状，还以为是池松看这个负责人不爽，一把手将他提了起来，“老大，要把这家伙干掉吗？”

0041.en: The manager's pupils contracted when he heard this!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 负责人闻言，瞳孔一缩！

0041.en: His body trembled uncontrollably.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 身子不由自主地颤抖了起来。

0041.en: Chi Song waved his hand, "Didn't you hear what Brother Long said? Just teach him a lesson, don't kill him. Also..."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 池松摆摆手，“没听到龙哥说的什么吗，教训一下就行了，别闹出人命，另外......”

0041.en: He was about to say something else when his phone in his pocket suddenly rang.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他还想说些什么，裤兜里的手机顿时响了起来。

0041.en: The henchman frowned in displeasure, "Which audacious fellow dares to call you, boss, at this time?"
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: 小弟不满皱眉，“哪个吃了熊心豹子胆的家伙，竟敢在这个时候打电话给老大你？”

0041.en: Chi Song took out his phone and looked at it.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 池松拿出手机看了一下。

0041.en: It was a WeChat call, and the caller's note was—Little Sister!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 微信通话，来电的人备注是——小妹！

0041.en: Chi Song was so startled that he almost dropped his phone.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 吓得池松差点没拿住手机。

0041.en: "Boss, who is it?"
0041.speaker: 小弟
0041.cn: “老大，是谁啊？”

0041.en: The henchman leaned closer, but Chi Song kicked him away, "Get lost! You're the audacious one, daring to talk about others like that!"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 小弟凑了过来，却被池松一脚踹开，“滚蛋，你才吃了熊心豹子胆，敢这样说别人！”

0041.en: After saying that, he wiped his phone on his clothes and was about to answer.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 说完，拿着手机擦了擦衣服，正想点击接通。

0041.en: Then he nervously looked down.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 又慌张地低头看了眼。

0041.en: At this moment, he was wearing a tank top, and his bulging muscles, accentuated by tattoos, looked particularly terrifying.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 此时的他，就穿了个大背心，隆起的肌肉映衬着纹身，尤为恐怖。

0041.en: "You, lend me your shirt!"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “你，把身上的衬衫借我一下！”

0041.en: He pointed at a white shirt on one of the henchmen.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他指着一个小弟身上的白衬衫。

0041.en: He put his phone aside, praying that the caller wouldn't hang up too quickly, and then frantically changed his clothes.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 手机放到一边，祈祷着来电对象别那么快挂电话，又手忙脚乱地换衣服。

0041.en: Meanwhile, Chi Xiaocheng, waiting in the cafe, was dumbfounded.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 而另一边，在咖啡厅等着的池小橙人已经傻了。

0041.en: The system's notifications kept ringing in her mind.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 脑海中不断响起系统的提示音。

0041.en: [Supporting character Chi Song is experiencing nervousness, excitement, worry, and other emotions because of the host.]
0041.speaker: 系统
0041.cn: 【配角池松因为宿主产生紧张、激动、担忧等情绪】

0041.en: [Emotion points +16...]
0041.speaker: 系统

0041.en: [Emotion points +22...]
0041.speaker: 系统

0041.en: [Emotion points +29...]
0041.speaker: 系统

0041.en: She couldn't help but look at the WeChat note again.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 她不由多看了眼微信备注。

0041.en: Invincible Brother.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 天下无敌的哥哥。

0041.en: She originally didn't believe it.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 她本来是不信的。

0041.en: Now...
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 现在

0041.en: I declare, my brother is truly invincible!
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 我宣布，哥哥真的天下无敌！

0041.en: This was just one call, and it hadn't even connected yet, but the emotion points her brother provided were no less than those from the protagonists!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 这才是一个电话啊，甚至都没接通，哥哥提供的情绪值不比那几个主角少！

0041.en: After waiting for a while, and after providing two hundred emotion points, Chi Song finally answered the phone.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 等了好一会儿，在提供了两百点情绪值后，池松终于接听了电话。

0041.en: He was wearing a white shirt, leaning against a wall with a beauty poster, and looked at Chi Xiaocheng from the side, seemingly intentionally concealing his empty arm.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 他穿着一件白衬衫，背靠一处贴着美女海报的墙壁，侧身看向池小橙，似乎有意掩饰另一边空荡荡的手臂。

0041.en: A simple smile hung on his face, completely unlike the triad boss he had been moments ago, "Little sister, have you had breakfast? What made you think of calling your brother?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 憨厚的笑容挂在脸上，哪里还有刚刚一副混黑涩会大哥的模样，“小妹，吃早饭了没，怎么想起给哥打电话来了？”

0041.en: Having gained a batch of emotion points, Chi Xiaocheng was in a good mood, and a natural smile hung on her lips, "Because I missed you, big brother!"
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 收获了一批情绪值，池小橙心情不错，笑容自然挂在嘴边，“因为想哥哥了呀！”

0041.en: The destructive power of a girl's smile was immense.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 女孩子笑容的杀伤力是极大的。

0041.en: Chi Song was stunned for a moment, then tears almost welled up in his eyes from emotion.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 池松先愣了一下，旋即感动得泪水都快要流了出来。

0041.en: Wasn't he working so hard outside for his sister?
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 在外面累死累活地打拼，可不就是为了妹妹吗？

0041.en: She had indeed become much more sensible after going to college!
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 上了大学，果然变得懂事多了啊！

0041.en: Chi Song wiped the corner of his eye, revealing a warm smile, "Whenever little sister misses her brother, she can call me anytime."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 池松抹了抹眼角，露出暖洋洋的笑容，“只要小妹想哥，随时都能给哥打电话的。”

0041.en: As he spoke, he noticed the gauze wrapped around Chi Xiaocheng's head, "Little sister, what happened to your forehead? Were you bullied again?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 说着，他注意到了池小橙头上缠着的纱布，“小妹，你的额头怎么了，又被人欺负了？”

0041.en: Chi Xiaocheng quickly shook her head, "It's nothing, I just fell earlier and scraped a bit of skin."
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 池小橙连忙摇头，“没事，是之前摔了一跤，擦破了点皮。”

0041.en: "That's good." Chi Song breathed a sigh of relief, then asked with concern, "And your living expenses? Is it enough? I have some money here. I'll transfer two thousand to you later."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “那就好。”池松松了口气，又关心问道，“那生活费呢，还够用吗，哥这里有还有点钱，一会儿我给你转两千。”

0041.en: Chi Xiaocheng was about to say no, but then she remembered that she couldn't even afford winter clothes now, so she nodded, "Thank you, big brother."
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 池小橙本来想开口说不要，但一想到自己现在连过冬的衣服都买不起，于是便点了点头，“谢谢哥哥。”

0041.en: Then she added, "Brother, give me your address. I'll buy you two clothes."
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 转而又道，“哥哥你给个地址我吧，我买两件衣服给你。”

0041.en: "Okay!"
0041.speaker: 池松

0041.en: Chi Song was touched, and again provided a wave of emotion points.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 池松心中感动，又是提供了一波情绪值。

0041.en: Back and forth, the two chatted for over ten minutes, and Chi Xiaocheng had already gained nearly 500 emotion points.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 一来二去，二人闲聊十多分钟，池小橙已经收获将近500点情绪值了。

0041.en: She couldn't exploit the system bug, and her brother's emotion points from joy and emotion were gradually reaching their limit.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 卡不了系统bug，哥哥在欣喜和感动这方面的情绪值逐渐到了极限。

0041.en: "Speaking of which, little sister, how are things with you and Ye Liang?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “说起来，小妹你和那叶良怎么样了？”

0041.en: "Uh..." Chi Xiaocheng didn't expect him to ask this question, so she cautiously said, "Ye Liang and I don't have much to do with each other anymore. Because of some things, it's not very pleasant now."
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: “额......”池小橙没想到他会问这个问题，于是小心翼翼地说道，“我和叶良已经没什么关系了，因为某些事情，现在闹得不那么愉快。”

0041.en: Chi Song's eyes lit up when he heard this, "You don't like Ye Liang anymore?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 池松闻言，双眼一亮，“你不喜欢叶良了？”

0041.en: "Uh... Brother, do you want me to be with Ye Liang?"
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: “额...哥哥你希望我跟叶良在一起？”

0041.en: "No, no, of course not." Chi Song sighed, "Actually, I told you before, little sister, that we're not in the same league as those young masters. As your brother, I'm a bit selfish. You're my only little sister. Forget about you dating, I wouldn't even want you to get married in the future."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “不不不，当然不是。”池松感叹道，“其实我之前就跟小妹你说过了，咱们和那些少爷不是一路人，身为哥哥的我又有点私心，我就你一个小妹，别说你谈恋爱了，以后都舍不得你嫁人。”

0041.en: "Brother thinks Su Tao is quite good."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “哥觉得，苏桃就挺不错的。”

0041.en: "Ah?"
0041.speaker: 池小橙

0041.en: Chi Xiaocheng was dumbfounded, providing a huge amount of emotion points for her brother.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 池小橙傻眼了，狠狠地为哥哥提供情绪值。

0041.en: Chi Song lightly coughed, "Brother doesn't interfere, you're free to date. But, I've watched you grow up, and even though I haven't found a wife yet, I can tell that Su Tao girl is a bit possessive of you. You're so cute, if you work hard, maybe you can..."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: 池松轻咳了一声，“哥不干涉啊，你自由恋爱，但是呢，这一路下来哥也是看着你长大的，虽然哥也没讨老婆，但看得出来苏桃那丫头对你有点占有欲，你那么可爱，努努力没准能......”

0041.en: "Of course, brother advocates free love. I'll support whoever you like. Well, brother has to go collect some vegetables, so I won't chat with you anymore."
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “当然啊，哥倡导自由恋爱，你喜欢谁哥都支持，那什么哥还要去收菜，就不陪你聊了啊。”

0041.en: "Beep beep beep—"
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: “嘟嘟嘟——”

0041.en: Hanging up the call, Chi Xiaocheng was still a bit dazed.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 挂断通话，池小橙现在还有些恍惚。

0041.en: Her brother being a siscon was understandable, after all, she was so cute. The original owner's unpopularity only applied to a few male leads. Before college, the original owner was very well-behaved and cute.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 哥哥有点妹控，她是能理解的，毕竟自己那么可爱，原主不讨人喜也只体现在几个男主身上，在上大学前，原主还是非常乖巧可爱的。

0041.en: But she didn't expect her brother to be a yuri fan.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 只是她没想到，哥哥竟然是个百合厨。

0041.en: "If I remember correctly, his relationship with Su Tao seems pretty good."
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: “没记错的话，他跟苏桃关系好像挺好的。”

0041.en: For a long time when they were young, Su Tao lived with the original owner and shared a room with her. Chi Song was also like a half-brother to Su Tao.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 小时候很长一段时间，苏桃都是寄住在原主家里，和原主同房共枕，池松也算是苏桃的半个哥哥。

0041.en: She thought for a moment and decided to put some pressure on Su Tao.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 她想了想，决定给苏桃来点压力。

0041.en: So she messaged her brother, "Brother, I don't have any objections to Sister Su Tao. If you think it's okay, I can try it. But I don't know if Sister Su Tao likes me. Brother, why don't you sound her out?"
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: 于是对哥哥发消息道，“哥，苏桃姐姐的话我倒是没什么意见，你觉得可以的话我也不是不可以试试，但我不知道苏桃姐姐喜不喜欢我，哥要不你去探探她的口风？”

0041.en: "Alright!"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “好嘞！”

0041.en: "Remember to be discreet!"
0041.speaker: 池小橙
0041.cn: “记得隐秘一点！”

0041.en: "Don't worry, even my big brother praises me for being meticulous in my rough work!"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “你放心，我大哥都夸你哥我办事，粗中有细！”

0041.en: Chi Song assured her.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 池松表示妥妥的。

0041.en: Then, Su Tao, who was still walking with Si Chen, received this message.
0041.speaker: 旁白
0041.cn: 然后，还在和司辰一起散步的苏桃，就收到了这样一条消息。

0041.en: "Xiao Tao, do you like my sister?"
0041.speaker: 池松
0041.cn: “小桃，你喜欢我妹妹吗？”

0042.en: Chapter 42 The Reason She Likes You
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 第42章 她喜欢你的原因

0042.en: At Linghu Park, Su Tao was walking when she suddenly froze the moment she took out her phone.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 菱湖公园，苏桃原本还在迈步，却在拿出手机的一瞬间，陡然怔在了原地。

0042.en: Beside her, Si Chen, wearing glasses, had his hands in his pockets. His sharp eyes showed a hint of curiosity as he glanced at her, "Why did you stop?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 旁边戴眼镜的司辰双手插兜，犀利的眸子在侧目时多了一抹好奇，“怎么停下来了？”

0042.en: "A message from one of my brothers has left me a little... at a loss."
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “我一个哥哥发来了一条消息，稍微地让我有些...不知所措。”

0042.en: Su Tao held up her phone and showed it to Si Chen.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 苏桃端起手机，递给司辰看。

0042.en: Si Chen pushed up his glasses, "Aren't you an orphan? You have a brother? And what does he mean by that question?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰推了推眼镜，“你不是孤儿吗，还有哥哥的？还有他问的这是什么意思？”

0042.en: Su Tao put down her phone and looked up at the sky.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 苏桃放下手机，抬头看天。

0042.en: "He's Xiaocheng's brother. For a while when I was little, I lived at Xiaocheng's house, and Brother Chi Song took good care of me. Although our relationship was formed because of Xiaocheng, he watched me grow up, so he's like a half-brother to me."
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “他是小橙的哥哥，我小时候有一段时间是住小橙家里，池松哥他对我也很照顾，我们的关系虽然是因为小橙缔结起来的，但看着我长大，也算是我半个哥哥了。”

0042.en: "And then I don't understand why Brother Chi Song would ask such a question!"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “然后就是我不懂，池松哥他为什么会问这样的问题！”

0042.en: She ruffled her hair, feeling like so many things had happened recently that she was going bald.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 她抓了抓秀发，感觉最近事情发生得太多，都要变秃了。

0042.en: Si Chen said, "This must be related to Chi Xiaocheng, asking if you like his sister... wait a minute!"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰道，“这肯定跟池小橙有关吧，问你喜不喜欢他妹妹...等一下！”

0042.en: Si Chen found the blind spot and looked at Su Tao in shock, "You told me before that Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere, and about all the excessive things she did to you. I never understood her motive."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰发现了盲点，震惊地看向苏桃，“前面你跟我说了池小橙是病娇，并且对你做的那些过分事情，我一直没想明白，她的动机是什么。”

0042.en: "And you wouldn't tell me, always finding it hard to speak."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “而你也不肯跟我说，总是难以启齿的样子。”

0042.en: "Now I understand." Si Chen suddenly realized, "Chi Xiaocheng became a yandere because she likes you?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “现在我算是明白了。”司辰恍然大悟，“池小橙会变成病娇，是因为她喜欢你？”

0042.en: Su Tao scratched her cheek, turning her face away in embarrassment.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 苏桃挠了挠脸颊，不好意思地别过脸。

0042.en: Soon, she turned back, spreading her hands as if seeking resonance, "You also think it's strange, right? I'm also a girl, why would she fall in love with me?"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 很快又转了回来，摊开双手似要求共鸣，“你也觉得很奇怪对吧，我也是女孩子，她为什么会喜欢上我呢？”

0042.en: Si Chen's mouth twitched, "It's not unlikely that she'd fall in love with you, is it?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰嘴角抽搐了一下，“她喜欢上你的可能性并不小吧。”

0042.en: Su Tao: "???"
0042.speaker: 苏桃

0042.en: "We're friends, aren't we? Why are you still speaking up for Xiaocheng?"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “我们才是朋友吧，你怎么还帮小橙说话呢？”

0042.en: Si Chen walked towards the pavilion helplessly, "A well-known psychology professor at Cornell University once conducted a large-scale survey on sexual orientation. Among absolute heterosexuals, the male proportion is higher than the female, but among bisexuals, the female proportion is higher than the male."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰无奈地往亭子走去，“康奈尔大学知名心理学教授曾做过大规模的性取向调查，在绝对异性恋中，男性比例要高于女性，但在双性恋中，女性的比例要高于男性。”

0042.en: "Women are naturally drawn to strength. Why do many young girls in middle and high school who are in early relationships often get involved with delinquents? Because at that time, their minds are not yet mature, and they don't consider things like careers or future prospects."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “女性天生慕强，为什么很多初中、高中的早恋女生多数都喜欢和一些小混混勾搭在一起，因为那时的她们思想还未成熟，不会去考虑所谓的职业、前途等。”

0042.en: "Being able to fight, being powerful, and acting a bit more mature than their peers is considered excellent in the eyes of some."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “会打架，很厉害，表现得比同龄人成熟一点，在部分人眼里就是优秀。”

0042.en: "We cannot view children with an adult mindset. Family reasons, social environment, and the breadth of exposure all influence a person's thinking."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “我们不能以成年人的思维去看待小孩子，家庭原因、社会环境、接触面广泛与否，都会影响人的思维。”

0042.en: "You once told me that Chi Xiaocheng was rescued by you after being bullied. At that time, she had no friends, and even the teachers didn't favor her. Your appearance became her only."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “你曾经跟我说过，池小橙是被霸凌后你救下来的，那时的她没有朋友，甚至老师都不偏袒她，你的出现就成了她的唯一。”

0042.en: Si Chen held up one finger, then extended a second.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 司辰竖起一根手指，紧接着又伸出第二根。

0042.en: "Secondly, as a companion who grew up together, you are the dominant party. A child's adoration, longing, outward focus, and dependence can easily lead to negative changes due to learning incorrect knowledge."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “其次，作为一起长大的同伴，你是强的主导方，小孩子的崇拜、憧憬、向外、依赖，很容易因为学习错误的知识而产生不正向的变化。”

0042.en: "For example, watching a melodramatic romance drama."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “比如看一部狗血的爱情剧。”

0042.en: "What the TV says about 'forever together' is the beautiful confession between the male and female leads; after watching the drama, if you say a few things like that in reality, you'll definitely be misunderstood."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “电视上说什么永远在一起，是里面男女主相互表白的美好；看过电视剧后，现实里你学着电视上说两句这个，铁定也会被误会。”

0042.en: "And a very important point." Si Chen looked Su Tao up and down, and said helplessly, "You're too beautiful."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “还有很重要的一点。”司辰上下打量了一眼苏桃，无奈道，“你长得太好看了。”

0042.en: Su Tao paused, "Does that count?"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 苏桃顿了一下，“这也算？”

0042.en: "Although you're easily swayed and indecisive, you're decisive in your actions, and it's normal for someone with high beauty to be popular with both sexes, isn't it?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “你虽然耳根子软没什么主见，可行事上是飒爽的性子，颜值高男女通吃不是很正常吗？”

0042.en: Su Tao was speechless for a moment, "This..."
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 苏桃一时语塞，“这......”

0042.en: Si Chen bent another finger, "Look, you became Chi Xiaocheng's object of dependence, you gave her a sense of security, and you occasionally said some ambiguous sweet nothings, holding hands and growing up together, pinky promises for a hundred years."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰再度掰了一下手指，“你看啊，你成为池小橙依赖的对象，又给了她安全感，还时不时说一些让人误会的情话，手牵手一起长大，拉钩上吊一百年。”

0042.en: "Forget about Chi Xiaocheng being a girl, even if she were an alien, she'd have other thoughts!"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “别说池小橙是女孩子了，她就算是外星人，也得产生点别的想法！”

0042.en: Si Chen sighed, "Miss Su Tao, this is a society of free love. One day, Chi Xiaocheng will scroll through Douyin, play some anime, and a lot of yuri content will be pushed to her. At the age of first love, who can resist that?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰叹了一声，“苏桃小姐，现在是自由恋爱的社会，哪天池小橙刷个抖音，玩点二次元，大把大把的百合内容推给她，情窦初开的年纪，谁顶得住这个？”

0042.en: The more Su Tao listened to Si Chen's analysis, the more she sweated, "You... don't say anymore. You're putting too much pressure on me!"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 苏桃越是听司辰分析，就越是汗流浃背，“你...你别说了，你这样说得我压力好大！”

0042.en: Si Chen glanced at her lightly, "See, you're avoiding it again."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰淡淡看了她一眼，“你看，你又在逃避了。”

0042.en: "I..." Su Tao pouted aggrievedly, "I came to you to analyze whether Xiaocheng is a yandere or not, don't change the subject!"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “我......”苏桃委屈地嘟起小嘴，“我来找你，是分析小橙到底是不是病娇的好不好，别扯开话题！”

0042.en: "Ah, yes, yes, yes."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “啊对对对。”

0042.en: Si Chen shrugged and chose to comply.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 司辰耸耸肩，选择了顺从。

0042.en: He sat on the chair with one hand propping his chin, "So, why do you think she's not a yandere anymore?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 单手托腮坐在了椅子上，“所以呢，你为什么又觉得她不是病娇了？”

0042.en: Su Tao sat opposite him, her expression serious.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 苏桃坐在他对面，摆正了脸色。

0042.en: She summarized and repeated what Liu Guijia had said earlier.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 将刘桂嘉先前说的话，总结并复述了一遍。

0042.en: And added her own analysis, "Normally, yanderes don't know they're yanderes, but Xiaocheng said something like that. This has already formed a paradox!"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 并附上自己的分析，“通常来说，病娇都不知道自己是病娇的，小橙却说出那样的话，这已经形成一种悖论了！”

0042.en: Si Chen propped his chin with one hand and said speechlessly, "The fact that you can ask such a question means you want me to answer that she's not actually a yandere, right?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰单手托腮，无语道，“你能问出这种问题，不就是想让我回答她其实不是病娇吗？”

0042.en: "I didn't..."
0042.speaker: 苏桃

0042.en: "Stop!" Si Chen reached out and interrupted Su Tao, "I've studied psychology, and although I've only scratched the surface, I can tell that you just can't believe Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere, so you're stubbornly trying to prove otherwise."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “打住！”司辰伸出手，打断了苏桃，“我兼修过心理学，虽然只学了点皮毛，但也能看出你就是不敢相信池小橙是病娇，所以才钻牛角尖地想要求证。”

0042.en: Su Tao was anxious, "But it's really a paradox!"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 苏桃急了，“可确实悖论了呀！”

0042.en: Si Chen: "Then do you want me to tell you that Chi Xiaocheng kidnapping you, confessing madly to you, self-harming, and threatening to jump off a building, it's all an act, just to play with you?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰：“那是不是要我这样跟你说，池小橙绑架你，疯狂表白你，自我伤害，闹跳楼，一切都是演的，就为了耍你玩？”

0042.en: "From the moment Chi Xiaocheng confessed to me out of jealousy for you, I felt that she was very twisted."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: “从池小橙因为吃你醋表白我的那次起，我就感觉到她这个人很扭曲了。”

0042.en: He and Su Tao were just ordinary opposite-sex friends, and still are. He didn't understand why Chi Xiaocheng was jealous at that time.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 他和苏桃就一普通异性朋友，截至现在也依旧如此，他都不明白当时池小橙为什么要吃醋。

0042.en: Si Chen still remembered. At the beginning of the semester, he ran into Su Tao and helped her move some luggage, and then Chi Xiaocheng became hostile towards him.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 司辰现在还记得呢，开学那会他偶遇苏桃，就顺手帮她搬了点行李，结果就被池小橙敌视了。

0042.en: Hostility was fine, but then she inexplicably came to confess, which really confused Si Chen.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 敌视就敌视吧，但后面莫名其妙跑过来表白，属实是把司辰整不会了。

0042.en: Although it only happened once.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 虽然就那么一次。

0042.en: But since she was hostile to me, why did she choose to "retaliate" by confessing?
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 可既然敌视我，为什么选择的“报复”会是表白呢？

0042.en: She was dressed like a ghost, and Si Chen didn't like it. One look scared him away.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 化妆成那个鬼样子，司辰也不喜欢，一个眼神就吓走了。

0042.en: After discussing this, Su Tao, under Si Chen's layer-by-layer analysis, finally hung her head like a defeated dog, "Okay, I still can't quite believe that Xiaocheng is a yandere and that she likes me."
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: 聊到这里，苏桃在司辰一层层的剥丝抽茧下，终于是如败犬般垂下了脑袋，“好吧，我还是不太敢相信小橙是病娇，并喜欢我的这个事实。”

0042.en: Si Chen looked at Su Tao's dejected appearance and sighed inwardly, "If you really want to confirm it, there are currently two methods you can try."
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰看着苏桃的丧气样，心中不由叹了口气，“非要证实的话，目前有两种方法可以尝试一下。”

0042.en: "What methods?"
0042.speaker: 苏桃
0042.cn: “什么方法？”

0042.en: Su Tao's eyes lit up.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 苏桃双眼亮了一下。

0042.en: She still had a tiny bit of hope that Chi Xiaocheng wasn't a yandere.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 她心底依旧有那么一丢丢的希望，希望池小橙不是病娇。

0042.en: She hoped it was all an act.
0042.speaker: 旁白
0042.cn: 希望这都是她演的。

0042.en: Si Chen said lightly, "The first method: in a couple of days, aren't you going to be Ye Liang's maid? Tell Chi Xiaocheng that you're going to part ways with her, and then see her reaction. Do you dare to try it?"
0042.speaker: 司辰
0042.cn: 司辰淡淡道，“第一种，过两天你不是要去给叶良当女仆吗，和池小橙表明要和她分道扬镳，然后看看她的反应，敢不敢试试？”

0043.en: Chapter 43 Whitewashing Weakens by Three Points, Blackening Strengthens Tenfold
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 第43章 洗白弱三分，黑化强十倍

0043.en: Dare she?
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 敢不敢？

0043.en: Su Tao sat blankly on the stone bench, one hand on the stone table, her fingertips feeling a chill.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃呆坐在石凳上，一只手放在石桌，触及的指尖感受到一丝冰凉。

0043.en: The sun was warm and the sky was cloudless.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 明明阳光温暖，万里无云。

0043.en: Yet she felt as if she had fallen into an ice cellar.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 她却感觉如坠冰窟。

0043.en: Try.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 试试。

0043.en: Just these two words made Su Tao imagine several scenarios of Chi Xiaocheng's yandere transformation.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 光是这两个字，就让苏桃脑补了好几种池小橙病娇化的状态。

0043.en: She said worriedly to Si Chen, "Last time, because Ye Liang took me to a cruise banquet, I had to pretend to be his girlfriend to support him at the banquet. After Xiaocheng found out about this..."
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: 她担心地对司辰道，“上一次，就因为叶良带我去参加游轮晚宴，我要在晚宴上假装他女朋友给他撑场子，这事被小橙知道后。”

0043.en: "She vaguely showed suicidal tendencies."
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: “她就隐约有了自我了断的倾向。”

0043.en: Su Tao recalled the scene on the rooftop.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃又回忆起了天台时的场景。

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng hugged her, tears and rain mixing, falling onto her dress.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙抱住自己，泪水和雨水掺杂，打在自己的礼裙上。

0043.en: She cried and blamed herself, saying in fear—the 14th floor is too high, I don't dare.
0043.speaker: 池小橙
0043.cn: 她一边哭，一边自责害怕地说着——14楼太高了，我不敢。

0043.en: She was unharmed, but her phone had fallen downstairs and shattered.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 人没有事，但手机已经掉到楼下被摔烂。

0043.en: Su Tao even imagined Chi Xiaocheng standing on the edge of the rooftop.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃甚至脑补出池小橙站在天台边沿的模样。

0043.en: Trembling, urging herself to jump, her survival instinct struggling.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 不断颤抖地催促她自己跳下去，求生的本能又在挣扎。

0043.en: Su Tao didn't know what happened during the process, or what kind of psychological struggle Chi Xiaocheng went through.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 过程发生了什么，池小橙又经历了怎样的心理搏斗，苏桃并不清楚。

0043.en: But that shattered phone seemed to display the ending of "Chi Xiaocheng" in another timeline.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 但那摔了个粉身碎骨的手机，仿佛在展示另一条世界线中“池小橙”的结局。

0043.en: Both fortunate.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 既庆幸。

0043.en: And afraid.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 又害怕。

0043.en: This was how Su Tao felt at the time.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这就是苏桃当时的感受。

0043.en: Even now, recalling those scenes, she occasionally trembled uncontrollably.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 即便现在，回忆起那一幕幕，也偶尔会止不住地颤抖。

0043.en: Si Chen sighed beside her, "So, you don't dare?"
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: 司辰在一旁叹气，“所以，是不敢吗？”

0043.en: Su Tao pursed her lips and nodded, "I'm afraid she'll become extreme again."
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: 苏桃抿着嘴，点了点头，“我怕她再次变得极端。”

0043.en: "That's why I said you're avoiding it, you're afraid." Si Chen took off his glasses and gently wiped the lenses with a cloth, "According to your thoughts, if Chi Xiaocheng isn't a yandere, then no matter how extreme she gets, she won't threaten her own life."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “所以才说你是在逃避，是在害怕。”司辰摘下眼镜，从怀里拿出一块布轻轻擦拭镜片，“按照你的想法，池小橙如果不是病娇，那么她再极端，也不会威胁到自己的生命。”

0043.en: "If she really died, you wouldn't see her again."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “要真死了，就再也见不到你了。”

0043.en: "As for self-harm, I can't say for sure."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “自我伤害这方面的话，我就说不准了。”

0043.en: Saying that, he snapped his fingers, "Then let's use the second method. I'll go and test her for you."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: 说着，又打了个响指，“那就用第二种方法吧，我去帮你试探一下她。”

0043.en: Su Tao looked up, "Test?"
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: 苏桃抬头，“试探？”

0043.en: "Yes." Si Chen nodded, "I'll pretend to be your love rival in front of Chi Xiaocheng and directly tell her that I'm going to take you away and bring you back to the capital."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “嗯。”司辰点头，“我会假装在池小橙面前成为你的情敌，直言要把你抓走带回京城。”

0043.en: "After all, you keep saying she's a yandere, but I've heard it but never seen it. With close contact, I can observe her expressions, movements, and demeanor, and basically come to a conclusion."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “毕竟你一直说她是病娇怎么样的，我听在耳里却没见过，近距离接触，我稍微观察一下她的表情动作神态，就基本能有个结论了。”

0043.en: Even the best acting can't fake micro-expression changes, right?
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 再好的演技，也假装不了微表情的变化吧？

0043.en: Su Tao pursed her lips, hesitating, "Will there be any danger?"
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: 苏桃抿嘴，犹豫不决，“会不会有危险？”

0043.en: "She's a 1.5-meter tall girl. What kind of danger do you think she can bring me?"
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “她一个1米5的小女孩，你觉得能带给我怎样的危险？”

0043.en: Si Chen was 1.9 meters tall.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 他司辰1米9。

0043.en: A 40-centimeter height difference, how could he lose?
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 40公分的身高差，怎么输？

0043.en: Su Tao had no other choice. Her mind was in a mess, and she could only agree to Si Chen's proposal for now.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃也没有其他办法，脑子乱得很，最终只能先应下司辰的提案。

0043.en: She took out her phone again, lost in thought.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 又拿出手机，怔怔出神。

0043.en: Should she ask Doctor Cheng again?
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 要不，再问问成医生吧？

0043.en: She clicked into the chat page with Chi Song, and that question was still there, waiting for her answer—Xiao Tao, do you like my sister?
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 点进和池松的聊天页面，那句提问还停滞在那，等候她的回答——小桃，你喜欢我妹妹吗？

0043.en: Her heart was filled with countless emotions, but none of them were love.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 心中情感万千，却唯独没有喜欢。

0043.en: Su Tao exhaled, intending to answer truthfully.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃呼了口气，打算如实回答。

0043.en: But at this moment, Si Chen suddenly spoke from beside her, "It's snowing."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: 却在此时，一旁的司辰忽然开口，“下雪了。”

0043.en: Su Tao looked up in surprise, finding that the sun had been covered by clouds at some point, and fine silver flakes were falling from the sky.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃惊讶抬头，发现太阳不知道什么时候被乌云挡住，丝丝细银从天空飘落而下。

0043.en: "The first snow in Jiuzhou City, it's a bit late."
0043.speaker: 司辰
0043.cn: “九州市的第一场雪，有点晚呢。”

0043.en: Su Tao exhaled a warm breath, and lowered her head to send the few words in the chat box.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 苏桃呼出一口带着烟雾的热气，低头将聊天框中的几个字发了出去。

0043.en: "Sorry, Brother Chi Song, I've always treated Xiaocheng like a sister."
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: “抱歉池松哥，我一直把小橙当妹妹来对待。”

0043.en: A gust of wind came, blowing snowflakes onto Su Tao.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 一阵风袭来，带着雪花吹到了苏桃身上。

0043.en: She shivered, her hair swaying.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 她抖了抖身子，秀发摇曳。

0043.en: "So cold."
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: “好冷。”

0043.en: Inside the cafe, Chi Xiaocheng received a transfer from her brother.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 咖啡厅内，池小橙收到了哥哥的转账。

0043.en: 2145 soft currency.
0043.speaker: 旁白

0043.en: Coupled with the system notification that just sounded.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 加上此刻系统响起的提示。

0043.en: [Supporting character Chi Song is experiencing happiness because of the host.]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【配角池松因为宿主产生了幸福情绪】

0043.en: [Emotion points +12]
0043.speaker: 系统

0043.en: The precise non-integer change, feeling happy because of her sister's smile, Chi Xiaocheng could be sure that these two thousand yuan were probably all her brother had.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 精确的非整数零钱，因为妹妹的笑容而感到幸福，池小橙可以确信，这两千多块钱，也许就是哥哥身上的全部家当了。

0043.en: "That's really good." Chi Xiaocheng sighed, feeling the money burning a hole in her hand.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: “真好啊。”池小橙感叹一声，这钱拿在手里反倒感觉有些烫手。

0043.en: The original owner was gone, and she didn't have much affection for this brother. She had never experienced such selfless care as an orphan in her previous life.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 原主已经不在了，自己对这位哥哥的感情也没多少，这样付出一切的关心，前世是孤儿的她根本没体验过。

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng was not heartless.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙也不是没心没肺的人。

0043.en: Only by changing her cannon fodder bad ending could she save herself, save Su Tao, and fulfill Chi Song and her family!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 唯有改变自己的炮灰坏结局，才能拯救自己，拯救苏桃，成就池松和家人！

0043.en: "System, how many emotion points do I have now?"
0043.speaker: 池小橙
0043.cn: “系统，情绪值现在有多少了？”

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes became determined.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙眼神变得坚定了起来。

0043.en: [Replying to host, 1236 points.]
0043.speaker: 系统

0043.en: "One ten-pull!"
0043.speaker: 池小橙
0043.cn: “来一发十连！”

0043.en: She was still too weak now, and most of the time she was very passive.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 自己现在还是太弱了，绝大部分时候都很被动。

0043.en: The weak and pitiful persona was only useful to some people. If she encountered an accident, she would still be very dangerous.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 软弱可怜的人设只对某一部分人有用，真遇到意外，她还是会非常危险。

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng desperately wanted to improve herself.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙迫切地想要提升自己。

0043.en: With a wave of her small hand, she flipped over all ten cards.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 小手一挥，将十张卡牌全部翻开。

0043.en: And this time, to Chi Xiaocheng's delight, one of the ten cards glowed orange-red.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 而这次，让池小橙狂喜的是，十张卡牌中，竟然有一张卡牌散发着橙红色的光芒。

0043.en: This was... a high-level skill!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这是...高级技能！

0043.en: [Host drawing cards...]
0043.speaker: 系统

0043.en: [Obtained Hacker Toolset *1 (common hacking and protection tools for hackers)]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【获得黑客工具组*1（普通黑客通用的骇入工具和保护工具）】

0043.en: [Obtained Nutritious Pickled Cabbage Beef Noodles *3 (total 3 boxes, 10 packs per box, contains trace nutrients, no side effects on the body, note: pickled cabbage is stepped on by a white-haired beautiful girl)]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【获得营养酸菜牛肉面*3（共计3箱，一箱10包，内含微量营养，对身体无任何副作用，注：酸菜是白毛美少女踩的）】

0043.en: [Soft Bone Powder *4 (ingestion can make bones soft, body weak and unable to resist, lasts for half an hour)]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【软骨粉*4（食用可令人骨头酥软，浑身无力无法反抗，持续时间半小时）】

0043.en: [Congratulations to host for obtaining active skill: Pseudovoice (Beginner)]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【恭喜宿主获得主动技能：伪声（初级）】

0043.en: [Pseudovoice (Beginner): Host can actively learn and change into others' voices, regardless of gender.]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【伪声（初级）：宿主可以主动学习并变化成他人的声线，无论男女】

0043.en: [Congratulations to host for obtaining passive skill: Blackening (Advanced)]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【恭喜宿主获得被动技能：黑化（高级）】

0043.en: [Blackening (Advanced): As the saying goes, whitewashing weakens by three points, blackening strengthens tenfold. The host will blacken when angry. Depending on the host's level of anger, combat power will increase by 3-10 times. The angrier, the higher the combat power increase.]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【黑化（高级）：所谓洗白弱三分，黑化强十倍。宿主在愤怒状态下会黑化，依据宿主愤怒的程度，战斗力提升3-10倍，越是愤怒，提升的战斗力越高。】

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes became strange.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙眼神变得奇怪了起来。

0043.en: After drawing cards a few times, she understood that the items given by the system were just accessories, and the real main prize was the skills.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 抽过几次卡，她算是明白了，系统给的物品只是陪衬，真正大头的还是技能。

0043.en: She wouldn't even mention Pseudovoice. For her current situation, she could think of very few uses for it.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 伪声就不说了，对于现在的自己来说，她能想到的用处挺少。

0043.en: The advanced Blackening skill could increase her combat power, which was great, but why was it a passive skill?!
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 黑化的高级技能可以加自身战斗力算很好，可为什么是被动技能！

0043.en: "Do I have to be furious to become powerful?"
0043.speaker: 池小橙
0043.cn: “难道我必须大怒，然后才能变得厉害起来？”

0043.en: [That's not it, Host.]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【并不是的宿主】

0043.en: The system explained.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 系统给出了解释。

0043.en: [If you genuinely dislike someone, or if you're smiling but suppressing anger in your heart, you're also in an angry state. The minimum increase is 3 times. If you're consumed by anger, you'll reach 10 times combat power.]
0043.speaker: 系统
0043.cn: 【你发自内心看某个人不爽，又或者你脸上笑眯眯，但心底压抑着怒火，这时的你也处于愤怒状态，最低增幅3倍，倘若你被愤怒冲昏头脑，将会达到10倍战斗力】

0043.en: Now Chi Xiaocheng understood. Her basic physical abilities were the most important.
