0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 这下池小橙懂了，自己的身体基础能力，才是重中之重。

0043.en: The stronger she was, the stronger she would become after the amplification.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 本身越厉害，增幅之后的自己就会越强。

0043.en: "I still feel like it's not very useful."
0043.speaker: 池小橙
0043.cn: “感觉用处还是不算大啊。”

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng sighed inwardly. She felt that she was very rational, and being consumed by anger was unlikely to happen to her.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙心中叹气，她觉得自己理智得很，被愤怒冲昏头脑这种事情很难发生在自己身上。

0043.en: "Let's think about how to make money."
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: “还是想想怎么搞钱吧。”

0043.en: With a "ding-dong," her phone suddenly rang.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: “叮咚”一声，手机声音忽然响起。

0043.en: It was her alternate account as Doctor Cheng.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 是自己作为成医生的那个小号。

0043.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes flickered, and she looked at the message from Su Tao in surprise.
0043.speaker: 旁白
0043.cn: 池小橙眼神闪烁了一下，吃惊地看着苏桃发来的消息。

0043.en: "Doctor Cheng, do you think a yandere would know they're a yandere?"
0043.speaker: 苏桃
0043.cn: “成医生，你说病娇会知道自己是病娇吗？”

0044.en: Chapter 44 Doctor Cheng: This Old Man Knows Yanderes Best
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 第44章 橙医生：老夫最懂病娇了

0044.en: At the same time, another message followed.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 与此同时，另一条消息接踵而至。

0044.en: Chen Qian: "Chi Xiaocheng, what does Su Tao mean by this? Did you pretend to be a yandere to train her?"
0044.speaker: 陈倩
0044.cn: 陈倩：“池小橙，苏桃问的这是什么意思，你装成病娇去调教她了？”

0044.en: The screenshot Chen Qian sent was exactly the same as the question on her Doctor Cheng alt account.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 陈倩发过来的截图，赫然和自己成医生小号上的问题一样。

0044.en: Would a yandere know they are a yandere?
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 病娇会知道自己是病娇吗？

0044.en: "That's not right!"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “不对呀！”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng gently tapped the table with her finger, "Su Tao actually suspects if I'm really a yandere. This isn't right, is it?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙手指轻轻敲击着桌面，“苏桃居然会怀疑我是不是真的病娇，这不对吧？”

0044.en: It was the basement, then the rooftop, plus Liu Guijia's incident. After her combination of moves, Su Tao should have been completely disoriented, otherwise she wouldn't have blindly sought out her, Doctor Cheng.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 又是地下室又是天台，加上前面刘桂嘉的事情，自己一套组合拳下去，苏桃早就找不到北了，不然也不会盲目地去找自己这个成医生。

0044.en: But why is she doubting now?
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 可现在怎么还怀疑起来了？

0044.en: She didn't immediately reply to Su Tao with her alt account, but instead replied to Chen Qian, "Find out what's going on?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 没有立刻用小号回复苏桃，而是先回复了陈倩，“你打探一下是什么情况？”

0044.en: A few minutes later, Chen Qian sent several screenshots directly.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 几分钟后，陈倩直接发过来了几个截图。

0044.en: Because of their good relationship, Su Tao told Chen Qian many things, including what Liu Guijia said.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 因为二人关系好，苏桃把很多事情都说给了陈倩听，其中就包括了刘桂嘉说的话。

0044.en: Chen Qian: "How should I reply to her?"
0044.speaker: 陈倩
0044.cn: 陈倩：“我要怎么回她？”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Just say you don't understand either, and tell her to ask your uncle, the psychologist."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙：“你就说你也不懂，让她去问你那个心理医生的叔叔。”

0044.en: After sending the message, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes became strange.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 发完消息，池小橙眼神变得奇怪了起来。

0044.en: "System, did I say those words when I was being bullied by Liu Guijia?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “统子，我在被刘桂嘉霸凌的时候，有说过那种话吗？”

0044.en: [Host, correction, you were bullying Liu Guijia.]
0044.speaker: 系统
0044.cn: 【宿主，纠正一下，是您在霸凌刘桂嘉】

0044.en: "Don't interrupt, I was clearly the victim."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “别打岔，我分明是受害者。”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng had no recollection.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙完全没有印象。

0044.en: She considered herself a rational person. Now that she had transmigrated into cannon fodder, she was even more cautious. It was impossible for her act of pretending to be a yandere to be exposed.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 她自认是理智型人格，如今穿越成炮灰，更是三思而后行，自己假装病娇这种事情，不可能会暴露的呀。

0044.en: Let alone coming from her own mouth.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 更别说从自己口中道出。

0044.en: [Host, you did say those words at the time. I thought you said them on purpose, and had other plans.]
0044.speaker: 系统
0044.cn: 【宿主，你当时确实说了这些话，我还以为是你故意说给她听，有什么别的打算呢】

0044.en: "Did I really say that?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “真的说了？”

0044.en: [Yes, not only did you say you weren't a yandere, you also mentioned something about male and female leads.]
0044.speaker: 系统
0044.cn: 【真的，不仅说了你自己不是病娇这种话，还提了一嘴什么男女主这样的话】

0044.en: "Hiss..."
0044.speaker: 旁白

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng gasped, "I actually have no memory of it!"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙倒吸一口凉气，“我自己居然没有任何印象！”

0044.en: [Perhaps you entered a yandere state, consumed by anger?]
0044.speaker: 系统
0044.cn: 【可能您进入了病娇状态，愤怒冲昏头脑？】

0044.en: "Nonsense, I'm not a yandere. I was still communicating with you at the time. That's impossible."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “瞎说，我又不是病娇，当时还和你交流呢，这是不可能的事情。”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng lowered her head in thought, "I suspect that the original owner's lingering thoughts influenced me."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙低头思索，“我猜测，应该是原主残存的思维影响到了我。”

0044.en: "Although it's cute, soul transmigration really does have an impact."
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: “虽然很可爱，但魂穿果然会被影响啊。”

0044.en: The system stopped speaking, and after Chi Xiaocheng sorted out the clues, she probably guessed Su Tao's purpose.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 系统没再说话了，而池小橙捋清楚脉络后，大概也猜到了苏桃的目的。

0044.en: She asked Si Chen, then Chen Qian, and now Doctor Cheng.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 问了司辰，又问陈倩，现在还问成医生。

0044.en: "She doesn't want to believe I'm a yandere. She's avoiding it, she's scared. When she was with me, she was so gentle. I thought she was slowly falling for me."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: “她是不想相信我是病娇啊，在逃避，在害怕，在我面前时那么温柔，我还以为已经慢慢地将心思扑在我身上了呢。”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes flashed red, and her alt account replied, "Why do you ask? What happened?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙双眼闪过一丝红芒，小号回复道，“为什么这么问，发生什么事了？”

0044.en: "It's like this..."
0044.speaker: 旁白

0044.en: Su Tao told Doctor Cheng in detail about Liu Guijia's words, and also mentioned a method Si Chen gave her.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 苏桃事无巨细地和成医生说了刘桂嘉的那番话，同时又说出了司辰给的一个办法。

0044.en: While serving as Ye Liang's maid for three days to repay his kindness, she would pretend to part ways with Chi Xiaocheng and see what her reaction would be, to determine if she was a yandere!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 去给叶良当三天女仆报恩的同时，假装和池小橙分道扬镳，看看她会产生什么样的反应，以此来确定她是不是病娇！

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng narrowed her eyes.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙眯了一下眼睛。

0044.en: If it weren't for her Doctor Cheng alias, she wouldn't have known that Su Tao had such intentions.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 要不是有成医生这个马甲，她还真不知道，苏桃竟然还有这样的打算。

0044.en: But clearly.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 但显然。

0044.en: She was still hesitating.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 还在犹豫中。

0044.en: In that case, let's add some fuel to the fire!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 既然如此，那就给你加把火！

0044.en: Doctor Cheng: "Normally, yanderes don't know they're yanderes, but there are a few rational micro-yanderes who vaguely feel that something is wrong with them, that they are too disgusting, to the point of hating themselves."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: 成医生：“常理来说，病娇是不知道自己是病娇的，但也有少量个例比较理智的微病娇，她们隐约会感觉到自己不对劲，过于恶心，以至厌恶自己。”

0044.en: Doctor Cheng: "If you're worried, you can also use this method to test it."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: 成医生：“你要是不放心，也可以用这种方法测试一下。”

0044.en: Su Tao: "But I'm afraid of problems."
0044.speaker: 苏桃
0044.cn: 苏桃：“可我怕出问题。”

0044.en: Doctor Cheng: "Just stay by your friend's side at all times and soothe her emotions."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: 成医生：“只要你时刻待在那位朋友的身边安抚她的情绪就好了。”

0044.en: Doctor Cheng: "But there are two points to note."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: 成医生：“但有两点需要注意。”

0044.en: Su Tao: "Please tell me."
0044.speaker: 苏桃
0044.cn: 苏桃：“您说。”

0044.en: Doctor Cheng: "Your Xiaocheng seems to be a mild yandere. First, you need to pay attention to her reaction to your pretense. Perhaps she won't harm you, but she will definitely harm herself, so you must try your best to soothe her emotions and temporarily go along with her wishes."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: 成医生：“你那位小橙看情况是属于轻度病娇，首先你要注意的是她因为你的假装而做出的反应，或许她不会伤害到你，但她一定会伤害自己，所以你要尽力安抚她的情绪，暂时顺着她的想法。”

0044.en: "Secondly, there's Ye Liang. It's not out of the question that you might need to soothe Xiaocheng's emotions for a few days. During this period, it's best not to let your friend come into contact with Xiaocheng, lest her condition worsen. You need to handle these aftermaths in advance."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: “其次就是那位叶良，不排除你可能需要安抚小橙几天的情绪，期间最好不要让你的这种朋友接触到小橙，以免她恶化，这样的后事你需要提前处理好。”

0044.en: "Then you can test her."
0044.speaker: 成医生
0044.cn: “那时你就可以试探她了。”

0044.en: The message was sent, and Chi Xiaocheng didn't receive a reply from Su Tao for a long time.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 消息发了过去，池小橙久久未收到苏桃的回信。

0044.en: After several minutes of apparent struggle, Su Tao finally replied with one word: "Doctor Cheng, is this really okay?"
0044.speaker: 苏桃
0044.cn: 似乎是纠结了好几分钟，苏桃终于回了一个字：“成医生，这样真的没问题吗？”

0044.en: She needed the courage to act.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 她需要行动的勇气。

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved upwards, and she immediately typed, "Don't worry, this old man knows yanderes best!"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙唇角上扬，立刻打字，“你放心，老夫最懂病娇了！”

0044.en: Coincidentally, Chi Xiaocheng also didn't want Su Tao to be Ye Liang's maid.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 正好，池小橙也不想苏桃去当叶良的女仆。

0044.en: Oh no, she absolutely couldn't be Ye Liang's maid!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 哦不对，是绝对不能去当叶良的女仆！

0044.en: Tao Tao, for the next few days, just stay with me.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 桃桃，接下来这几天，就好好地跟我在一起吧

0044.en: Next, Chi Xiaocheng began to plan for her scheme. The two thousand yuan her brother transferred, besides buying two sets of clothes, would come in handy.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 接下来，池小橙开始为自己的计划做打算，哥哥打来的两千块，除了买两套衣服以外，正好用得上。

0044.en: In the blink of an eye, two days passed.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 眨眼间，时间过去两天。

0044.en: Under Chen Qian's report, Chi Xiaocheng learned that Su Tao would be going to Ye Liang's house tomorrow night.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 在陈倩这个二五仔的汇报下，池小橙得知，在明天晚上，苏桃就要去叶良家了。

0044.en: And she also used Doctor Cheng's account to find out that Su Tao would ditch Ye Liang and choose to use this opportunity to test if she was really a yandere!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 而她又用成医生的账号，套出了苏桃会鸽掉叶良，而选择利用这一次机会来测试自己是否真的是病娇！

0044.en: Since you want to test, then test me thoroughly!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 既然要测，那就狠狠地测我吧！

0044.en: As evening approached, the setting sun was crimson like blood. Chi Xiaocheng left school and walked along the path near her home.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 临近傍晚，夕阳如血般殷红，池小橙出了学校，迈步在近家的小道上。

0044.en: Suddenly, a tall figure blocked her path.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 忽地，一个高大的身影挡在面前。

0044.en: He stood tall and robust, wearing only a white shirt to show off, even in late autumn.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 站姿挺直，身形壮硕，即便深秋也只是一身耍帅的白衬衫。

0044.en: His reserved face, his glasses reflecting the dazzling sunlight.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 那张内敛的面庞上，眼镜正因为夕阳折射出刺眼的光芒。

0044.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, can we talk?"
0044.speaker: 司辰
0044.cn: “池小橙，我们能聊聊吗？”

0044.en: The person who came was Si Chen!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 来的人是司辰！

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng's internal alarm bells rang loudly, and she instinctively took a step back, "Is there... something?"
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙心中警铃大作，下意识地就后退了一步，“有...有什么事情吗？”

0044.en: At this moment, she looked up slightly, meeting Si Chen's sharp eyes behind his glasses.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 此时的她，微微抬头，对上了司辰眼镜下锐利的双眸。

0044.en: Like a venomous snake, looking down at its prey.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 如一条毒蛇，在俯视猎物。

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng quickly lowered her head.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙迅速低下脑袋。

0044.en: Her eyebrows, hidden by her bangs, furrowed slightly as she constantly pondered Si Chen's intentions.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 刘海遮住的秀眉微皱，脑子不断思考司辰的目的。

0044.en: Si Chen, Su Tao, test, yandere.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 司辰，苏桃，测试，病娇

0044.en: Damn it, this person's background is that he studied psychology. The probability of my intermediate acting skills being exposed is very high!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 完蛋，这人的设定是修过心理学，自己中级的演技被识破的概率很大！

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng decided to avoid him. She pulled the hood of her hoodie over her head and slowly said, "Sorry, Young Master Si Chen, I have something to do, so I'll be leaving first."
0044.speaker: 池小橙
0044.cn: 池小橙打算规避，将卫衣的兜帽盖在脑袋上，缓缓说道，“抱歉司辰少爷，我还有事，就先走了。”

0044.en: "Don't rush!"
0044.speaker: 司辰
0044.cn: “别急啊！”

0044.en: Si Chen chuckled, "It's about Su Tao. Since you like her, aren't you going to talk to me?"
0044.speaker: 司辰
0044.cn: 司辰轻笑说道，“是有关苏桃的事情，你既然喜欢她，就不打算跟我聊聊吗？”

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "!"
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙：“！”

0044.en: Su Tao actually told him that I like her?!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 苏桃竟然连我喜欢她这种事都说了？

0044.en: Or did this person guess it?!
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 还是说是这个人猜出来的！

0044.en: "There's nothing to be surprised about. I was just testing you, and I didn't expect you to actually like Su Tao." In Si Chen's glasses, her small figure was reflected, "You subconsciously covered your head with your hood, you're afraid of me, and your body trembled, proving I was right."
0044.speaker: 司辰
0044.cn: “没什么好惊讶的，我不过是试探你一下，没想到你居然真的喜欢苏桃。”司辰眼镜中，倒映着这小小的身子，“你下意识地用兜帽遮住脑袋，是在怕我，身子抖了一下很震惊证明我说对了。”

0044.en: "There are too many people here. How about we talk in the alley?"
0044.speaker: 司辰
0044.cn: “这里人多眼杂，我们去小巷子里聊聊怎么样？”

0044.en: Si Chen put his hands in his pockets and turned directly.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 司辰双手插兜，径直转身。

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at his huge back and clenched her hands slightly.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙看着他巨大的背影，微微攥紧了手。

0044.en: Then she put her hand in her pocket, and soon, she exchanged a fruit knife from the system store.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 而后将手插入口袋，没多时，就从系统商城兑换了一把水果刀。

0044.en: With the knife in hand, she felt much more at ease.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 刀握在手，她安心了许多。

0044.en: Chi Xiaocheng lowered her eyes and slowly followed.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 池小橙敛下眼眸，缓缓跟了上去。

0044.en: The setting sun cast a long shadow of Si Chen.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 夕阳洒下，将司辰的背影拉得很长。

0044.en: The small girl gradually approached, hiding in the dark shadow.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 那娇小的少女，渐渐贴近，藏在了黑暗的影子中。

0044.en: Ps: It seems there are more readers on weekends. While everyone is on holiday, I'll update two chapters tomorrow morning, and add one more chapter tomorrow night. You can also leave suggestions for the plot in the comment section. I love copying comments.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: Ps：周末看的人好像多一些，趁着大家都放假，明早更两章，明天晚上再多加更一章吧，对剧情有什么建议也可以在评论区说的，我最喜欢抄书评了

0044.en: Also, I'm updating steadily every day. Please give me some small gifts.
0044.speaker: 旁白
0044.cn: 另外每天都在稳定更新，求点小礼物

0045.en: Chapter 45 Blackening
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 第45章 黑化

0045.en: The two walked one after another, slowly reaching the depths of the alley.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 两人一前一后，慢慢地走到了这巷子深处。

0045.en: It was extremely messy here, with a musty smell emanating from everywhere. In the dim shadows, besides the occasional meow, only the sound of the wind remained.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 这里杂乱无比，四处散发着发霉的味道，昏暗的阴影中除了偶尔能听到几声猫叫，就只剩下了风声。

0045.en: Si Chen stopped and turned around.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰停下了脚步，转过身。

0045.en: He habitually looked straight ahead, then his gaze dropped.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 习惯性地目视前方，视线接着才向下。

0045.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng still wearing her hood and shrinking her shoulders cautiously, he said lightly, "Don't worry, as a descendant of the Si family, I wouldn't bring you to a place like this to lay hands on you. I just want to talk to you about something."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 见池小橙依旧戴着兜帽，警惕地缩着肩膀，他淡淡道，“你放心吧，我作为司家的血脉，不至于把你带到这种地方动手动脚，只是有些事情想和你聊聊而已。”

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng's vigilance did not diminish. She took a step back.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙警惕不减，后退了一步。

0045.en: Her body pressed against the wall, her right hand remaining in her hoodie pocket.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 身子贴住墙壁，右手始终放在卫衣的兜里没有取出。

0045.en: Si Chen shrugged helplessly, "Seriously, you even confessed to me before, saying you liked me. Do you really need to be so afraid of me?"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 司辰无奈耸耸肩，“真的是，你之前还向我表白说喜欢我呢，至于那么怕我吗？”

0045.en: He brought Chi Xiaocheng here not to tease her, but to verify something.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 他带池小橙来这，自然不是调侃她，而是为了验证那件事。

0045.en: So he spoke frankly, "You like Su Tao, I'm not wrong about that, am I?"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 索性也就敞开天窗说话，“你喜欢苏桃，这一点我没说错吧？”

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng frowned, but still nodded, "So what?"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: 池小橙皱着眉毛，但还是点了点头，“是又怎样？”

0045.en: In front of this person, the delicate pretense she used with Dongfang Yang was useless.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 在这个人面前，面对东方阳时那样娇弱的伪装就没用了。

0045.en: Every expression, every movement, would be seen through by him.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 一丝表情，一个动作，都会被他看破。

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng could only use her "true nature" to face those snake-like eyes.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙也只得用自己的“本性”，去面对那如毒蛇般的双眼。

0045.en: Si Chen spread his hands and chuckled, "Nothing, I just have something to tell you."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 司辰摊开双手，轻笑道，“没什么，只是有一点想告诉你。”

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙挑眉。

0045.en: Then her pupils suddenly became vertical.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 继而瞳孔在一瞬间竖了起来。

0045.en: Si Chen, who had been smiling gently, suddenly bent down and leaned closer to her. His lips tightened, and his eyes, like knives, pierced directly into Chi Xiaocheng.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 只见原本还温和挂着笑容的司辰，陡然弯腰贴近了她些许，唇角敛下，眼神如刀子般直刺池小橙。

0045.en: The setting sun was behind Si Chen.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 夕阳背对着司辰。

0045.en: At this moment, his shadow completely enveloped Chi Xiaocheng.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 这一刻，他的影子将池小橙尽数笼罩。

0045.en: Forcing her into darkness.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 强迫着她陷入黑暗。

0045.en: Finally, this male lead uttered a threatening low voice, "Chi Xiaocheng, I warn you, Su Tao is my woman!"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 终于，这位男主发出威胁的低沉声线，“池小橙，我警告你，苏桃是我的女人！”

0045.en: "What did you say!!!"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “你说什么！！！”

0045.en: Instantly, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes underwent an eerie transformation. A pair of vertical pupils, like those of a fierce stray cat, pierced directly into Si Chen.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 霎时，池小橙的双眸发生了妖异的变化，一对竖瞳如流浪的凶狠野猫，直直刺向司辰。

0045.en: Even though she was enveloped in darkness, these vertical pupils seemed to emit a defiant light.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 明明她已被黑暗笼罩，这一双竖瞳，却好似在散发抗拒的光芒。

0045.en: One hand had already tightly gripped the small knife in her hoodie pocket.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 一只手，已经紧紧地攥紧了上衣口袋的小刀。

0045.en: Constantly exerting force.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 不断用力。

0045.en: A strange feeling arose in Si Chen's heart. For a moment, he actually felt fear.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 奇异的感觉在司辰心中升起，他一瞬间竟是感到了恐惧。

0045.en: The fear of a weak human being stared down by a fierce tiger!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 弱小的人类，被凶狠的老虎盯上那种恐惧！

0045.en: Si Chen then thought, he's 1.9 meters tall, and now he's startled by a 1.5-meter loli?
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 旋即司辰便想到，自己1米9，如今居然被一个1米5的小萝莉给吓了一跳？

0045.en: The shame and anger in his heart overshadowed his fear. He straightened up and said lightly, "I said, Su Tao is my woman."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 心中的羞愤盖过了恐惧，他直起身淡淡道，“我说，苏桃是我的女人。”

0045.en: As he spoke, he observed Chi Xiaocheng's state.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 一边说，他一边注意着池小橙的状态。

0045.en: He found that this small figure just hung her head, making no movement.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 发现这个娇小的家伙只是垂着脑袋，没有任何动作。

0045.en: He scoffed inwardly.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 他心中呵了一声。

0045.en: If she were a true yandere, she would have already attacked me by now.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 如果是真病娇，这个时候已经要对我动手了。

0045.en: Is she acting because of my identity?
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 因为我的身份在演？

0045.en: It seems Su Tao's worries were unfounded.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 看来苏桃的担忧并无道理啊。

0045.en: Si Chen decided to add more fuel to the fire and see her reaction.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰打算再给池小橙加把火，看看她的反应。

0045.en: So he took a step back, extended one hand, and starting from his pinky, he tightened his fingers one by one, forming a fist.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 于是主动后退了一步，将一只手伸出，从小拇指开始，一根根手指收紧，握拳。

0045.en: It was as if the world was in his grasp.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 好似世界都在他的掌握。

0045.en: At this moment, snowflakes fell from the sky, as if to cooperate with his actions.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 此时空中雪花飘下，就好像在配合他的动作。

0045.en: Si Chen's tone was mocking and slow: "What, what's so surprising about this? Su Tao is such a perfect woman, everyone would like her, right? You wouldn't think Su Tao would like you, would you?"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 司辰语速讥讽且缓慢：“怎么，这有什么好惊讶的，苏桃那么完美的女人，是个人都会喜欢的吧，你该不会认为，苏桃会喜欢你吧？”

0045.en: "Don't be ridiculous. You're a girl, what advantage do you have to attract Su Tao?"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “别搞笑了，你一个女生，能有什么优势去吸引苏桃呢？”

0045.en: "Su Tao is already mine." His voice gradually deepened, putting pressure on her.
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “苏桃早就已经是我的人了。”他声线渐渐沉了下来，给人压力。

0045.en: "Some time ago, you were recovering in the hospital, and Su Tao came to me to talk."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “前段时间，你在医院养伤，苏桃来找我谈心。”

0045.en: "When you were bullied, Su Tao came to me again to confide her troubles."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “当你被欺负后，苏桃又来找我倾诉烦恼。”

0045.en: "Do you remember that time at the school gate? You should have seen me then. We were..."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “还记得上次在校门口的时候吗，你应该看到我了吧，我们那个时候......”

0045.en: "On a date~"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: “在约会哦~”

0045.en: He slowly uttered the last few words in a malicious tone, curious about Chi Xiaocheng's reaction.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 语气恶劣地将最后几个字缓缓吐出，他好奇地等待池小橙的反应。

0045.en: But he found that this small loli still hung her head, one hand in her pocket.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 却发现，这只娇小的萝莉依旧是垂着脑袋，一只手插在兜里。

0045.en: Her body trembled slightly, but she made no further movement.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 只是身子微微有些颤抖，却也没更多的行动。

0045.en: Si Chen raised an eyebrow, his eyes surprised.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰眉毛一挑，眼神惊讶。

0045.en: She's so tolerant, it seems she's not a yandere after all!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 这么能忍，看来不是病娇了啊！

0045.en: Finally, after a long wait, Chi Xiaocheng, who had remained motionless, finally spoke.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 终于，等候许久，一直没有动作的池小橙终于出声了。

0045.en: "You're lying to me!"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “你在骗我！”

0045.en: Her voice was a little hoarse, as if suppressing something.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 她声音有些嘶哑，好似在压抑什么。

0045.en: Snowflakes fell on Chi Xiaocheng, but quickly melted.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 雪花飘落到池小橙的身上，却又迅速消融。

0045.en: A cloud covered half of the sunlight shining on her, casting her small shadow long on the wall.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 一片云朵，遮住了映在她身上的半边阳光，将她娇小的影子，长长地洒在墙壁。

0045.en: Si Chen laughed and concluded, "Chi Xiaocheng, stop pretending!"
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 司辰笑了出声，许下定论，“池小橙，别装了！”

0045.en: "You're lying to me!!"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “你在骗我！！”

0045.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng didn't respond to him, her voice just deepened a bit.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 然而池小橙没回应他，只是声音更沉了一分。

0045.en: Si Chen scoffed, "So what if I'm lying to you? But I heard that Su Tao is going to be Ye Liang's maid. The girl you like is going to be tainted by someone else."
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 司辰嗤笑一声，“我是在骗你又怎么样，可我听说，苏桃要去给叶良当女仆，你喜欢的女孩啊，可要被别人染指了。”

0045.en: If she didn't get angry at this, then this yandere was truly fake.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 这要是都不生气，那这病娇就真的是假的了。

0045.en: Si Chen showed a triumphant expression.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰露出胜券在握的表情。

0045.en: However, the next second.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 然而下一秒。

0045.en: His expression turned to shock.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 表情变成了惊愕。

0045.en: Si Chen felt a pain in his calf, and his whole body was pushed against the wall by a huge force.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰只感觉小腿一疼，整个人便被一股巨力推撞到了墙壁上。

0045.en: Immediately after, both his legs hurt again, so weak that he couldn't stand, and he sat directly on the floor.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 紧跟着双腿又是一疼，软得无力站立，直直地坐在地板。

0045.en: He, 1.9 meters tall, could only look up at Chi Xiaocheng now!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 1米9高的他，此时只能仰望池小橙！

0045.en: "You—"
0045.speaker: 司辰

0045.en: Before he could finish, a small knife, carried by the wind, struck!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 话音未落，一柄小刀裹挟风势袭来！

0045.en: Si Chen almost instinctively turned his head.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰几乎是下意识地瞥过头。

0045.en: "Thump—"
0045.speaker: 旁白

0045.en: Dust splattered from the wall, and the small knife embedded itself three inches deep.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 墙壁溅出泥粉，小刀入墙三分。

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng propped herself against the wall with one hand, and with the other, she gripped the small knife embedded in the wall. She leaned close to Si Chen, her pair of cat-like crimson vertical pupils eerie and terrifying.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙一手撑住墙壁，一手握紧嵌在了墙壁的小刀，就这样贴近司辰，一对如猫般的赤红竖瞳，怪异又骇人。

0045.en: A line of blood, belatedly, appeared on Si Chen's left cheek.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 血线，后知后觉地在司辰左脸划开。

0045.en: It was as red as paint on a wall, trickling out and flowing down.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 鲜红得如上墙的油漆，涓涓溢出、流淌而下。

0045.en: "You are, lying to me!"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “你在，骗我！”

0045.en: A hot breath hit Si Chen's face. The person in front of him was no longer that delicate loli.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 一口热气，打在了司辰的脸上，眼前的人哪里还是那只娇弱的小萝莉。

0045.en: She was like a wild beast.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 活脱脱地像一只野兽。

0045.en: The grin revealed not fangs, but tusks!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 狞笑所露出的不是虎牙，而是獠牙！

0045.en: "Gulp~"
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: “咕噜~”

0045.en: Si Chen's Adam's apple bobbed, his eyes filled with horror.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 司辰喉结滚动，眼神惊骇。

0045.en: Sweat and warm crimson liquid dripped onto the ground, melting the accumulated snow beneath his feet.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 汗水与温热鲜红的汁液滴落在地，融化了脚下的积雪。

0045.en: He, who prided himself on being rational and calm, couldn't help but feel his heart race.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 自诩理智、冷静的他，此刻也不免心跳加速。

0045.en: He turned his gaze and glanced at Chi Xiaocheng's small hand propped against the wall.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 他侧过视线，瞥了眼池小橙撑在墙壁的那只小手。

0045.en: His shoulder moved, and he immediately wanted to resist and stop Chi Xiaocheng.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 肩膀一动，当即就想反抗并制止池小橙。

0045.en: But what he didn't expect was.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 只是让他没想到的是。

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng was faster than him!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙比他更快！

0045.en: She reached out and pressed down hard on his shoulder, making a "snap" sound.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 伸手将他的肩膀用力一摁，“啪嗒”的一声响起。

0045.en: His back shoulder hit the wall heavily, and a piercing pain shot through him. His entire right arm felt like it had lost control.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 后肩重重地撞在墙壁，一股钻心的疼痛传来，整条右手臂仿佛都失去掌控。

0045.en: His shoulder was dislocated!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 肩膀脱臼了！

0045.en: Why was Chi Xiaocheng so strong?!
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙的力气为什么那么大！

0045.en: That hand pressing on his shoulder felt as heavy as a thousand pounds.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 那只按住他肩膀的手，好似千斤重。

0045.en: "Tao Tao is mine."
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “桃桃是我的。”

0045.en: Chi Xiaocheng's faint voice sounded.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 池小橙微弱的声音响起。

0045.en: With a "clang," the small knife was pulled out of the wall and then fiercely nailed into the wall just two inches from Si Chen's skin.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: “铮”的一下，小刀从墙壁拔出，又猛猛地钉在了离司辰肌肤只有两寸的位置。

0045.en: From the corner of his eye, he could even feel the cold glint emanating from the blade.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 他视线余光，甚至能感受到刀身散发的寒芒。

0045.en: "Tao Tao is mine!"
0045.speaker: 池小橙
0045.cn: “桃桃是我的！”

0045.en: This time, Chi Xiaocheng's voice was suppressed, yet also frenzied.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 这一次，池小橙声音似压抑，又似癫狂。

0045.en: Si Chen's breathing became ragged, and his lips felt dry.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 看得司辰呼吸急促，嘴唇发干。

0045.en: A voice of regret echoed in his heart.
0045.speaker: 旁白
0045.cn: 懊悔的声音在心中响起。

0045.en: This... is a yandere?
0045.speaker: 司辰
0045.cn: 这...就是病娇？

0046.en: Chapter 46 Host, Be Normal, This System is Scared
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 第46章 宿主你正常点，本系统害怕

0046.en: It's over, it's over, it's over, it's over!
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 完蛋完蛋完蛋完蛋！

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng seemed to have lost her mind.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 池小橙看起来好像失去理智了。

0046.en: She wouldn't really kill me, would she?!
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 她不会真的要杀死我吧！

0046.en: Si Chen only felt the small knife almost touching his face. Although crimson had already dripped from his chin, he felt no pain at all.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰只感觉那把小刀几乎要贴住自己的脸，明明鲜红已经从下巴滑落，但他却丝毫没感到疼痛。

0046.en: Only a bone-chilling coldness.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 只有如刺骨般的冰冷。

0046.en: Si Chen's eyes darted, looking at Chi Xiaocheng's face.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰转动着眸子，瞄向了池小橙的脸。

0046.en: On her fair and slightly flushed cute face, a pair of strange vertical pupils stared intently at him. Strands of tea-colored hair hung down her cheeks, like sharp, thin steel wires.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 白净又微微熏红的可爱脸蛋上，一双奇异竖瞳死死地盯着他，缕缕茶色秀发垂到脸颊，好似一根根尖锐细小的钢丝。

0046.en: He felt extremely nervous.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 他感觉紧张无比。

0046.en: Si Chen's mind raced. He knew he couldn't stay in this stalemate, otherwise, if Chi Xiaocheng suddenly moved the knife, it would be bad!
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰大脑迅速转动，知道现在不能僵持下去，否则池小橙忽然挪动一下刀就不妙了！

0046.en: Trying his best to relax his body and suppress any possible aggression, Si Chen chuckled dryly, "Well... Chi Xiaocheng, I was just lying to you. Actually, I..."
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: 尽量将身体松弛下来，收敛任何可能的攻击性，司辰干笑道，“那什么...池小橙，我刚刚都是骗你来着，其实我......”

0046.en: "Hiss—"
0046.speaker: 旁白

0046.en: As he spoke, he gasped, the tip of the knife almost sliding upwards along his line of sight. Strands of his hair were neatly cut, finally stopping at his ear.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 他说着便倒吸了一口凉气，刀尖几乎顺着他的视线向上划去，他的缕缕头发被利落切断，最终停在了耳朵处。

0046.en: Scared, Si Chen quickly said, "Actually, I don't like Su Tao at all. I support you and Su Tao being together! I've disliked that little b*stard Ye Liang for a long time. Su Tao being Ye Liang's maid was also forced!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: 吓得司辰连忙语气迅速说道，“其实我根本不喜欢苏桃，我是支持你和苏桃在一起的啊，我看叶良那小逼不顺眼很久了，苏桃去给叶良当女仆其实也是被逼的！”

0046.en: "I can help you solve this!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “我能帮你解决这件事情！”

0046.en: He finished this string of words in almost three seconds.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 几乎是在三秒内将这一串话说完。

0046.en: Si Chen didn't even dare to breathe, feeling his hairs stand on end and goosebumps all over his body.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰连大气都不敢喘，只感觉汗毛竖起，浑身布满鸡皮疙瘩。

0046.en: Finally, he saw the red light in Chi Xiaocheng's eyes recede a little, "You're lying to me?"
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: 终于，他看到池小橙眼中的红光褪去了些许，“你在骗我？”

0046.en: "This time I'm not lying to you!" Si Chen directly sold out Su Tao, "This time I'm helping Su Tao test if you really like her, that's why I said that. Su Tao is afraid that your love for her is fake!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “这次我没在骗你！”司辰直接将苏桃出卖了，“我这次是帮苏桃试探一下你是不是真的喜欢她，所以才这么说的，苏桃怕你对她的爱是虚假的啊！”

0046.en: "She's mine! I like her more than anyone!"
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: “她是我的！我比任何人都要喜欢她！”

0046.en: The dagger was pulled out and stabbed into the wall again.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 匕首抽出，又是刺在了墙上。

0046.en: Si Chen nodded like a pecking chick, "Yes, yes, yes. I wasn't sure before, but now I feel it. Su Tao and I are just ordinary friends. I like petite, cute girls. I really don't like her!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: 司辰如小鸡啄米般点头，“对对对，之前我不清楚，现在我已经感受到了，我和苏桃就是普通朋友，我喜欢的是身材娇小，长相可爱的女生，我真不喜欢她！”

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng frowned again, "You mean, you think Tao Tao isn't pretty or cute?"
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: 池小橙又皱了皱眉，“你的意思是，你觉得桃桃不好看，不可爱？”

0046.en: "Of course not!" Si Chen was very obedient, "Su Tao and you are the most beautiful in the world! You two are a perfect match! What kind of scoundrel is Ye Liang, daring to compete with you for Su Tao!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “当然不是！”司辰很从心，“苏桃和你都是世界第一漂亮，你们俩才是绝配啊，那叶良是什么小瘪三，竟然也敢跟你抢苏桃！”

0046.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, I swear to God, I'm on your and Su Tao's side!"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “池小橙我对天发誓，我是站在你和苏桃这边的！”

0046.en: After a heartfelt and sincere speech, Chi Xiaocheng finally calmed down.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 一番掏心掏肺的真挚话语，终于让池小橙渐渐冷静了下来。

0046.en: The knife against him was withdrawn.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 抵住他的刀收回。

0046.en: The hand that had been pressing on his shoulder also retracted. It was no longer harmless as before, but the dazzling red light in her eyes had faded.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 按住他肩膀的那一只手，也缩了回去，并非和刚刚一样人畜无害，只是眼神中刺眼的红芒，淡了下去。

0046.en: Those strange vertical pupils were also gradually receding.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 那奇异的竖瞳，也在渐渐消退。

0046.en: Without Chi Xiaocheng's coercion, Si Chen was too weak to support himself with his hands and almost fell directly.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 失去了池小橙的逼迫，司辰无力用手撑住地面，差点没直接倒下。

0046.en: At the same time, he felt extremely lucky.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 同时心中无比庆幸。

0046.en: Fortunately, she wasn't an incurable, severe yandere.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 还好，不是无可救药的重度病娇。

0046.en: She still had some rationality left.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 她是残存一些理智的。

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng stood aside, quietly watching Si Chen, appearing somewhat obedient, "You have a way to prevent Su Tao from being Ye Liang's maid?"
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: 池小橙站在一边，就这么静静地看着司辰，显得有些乖巧，“你有办法让苏桃不去当叶良的女仆？”

0046.en: Si Chen swallowed again, "Ye Liang demanded Su Tao be his maid simply because he was stood up at the last cruise banquet. I can use my family to create some trouble for him, so he won't have time to bother Su Tao."
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: 司辰又咽了一口唾沫，“叶良要求苏桃当他女仆，无非是因为上次游轮晚宴被鸽了，我可以利用自己的家族给他制造点麻烦，让他无暇顾及苏桃就好了。”

0046.en: "Good!"
0046.speaker: 池小橙

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng responded, not caring what Si Chen thought, just assuming he had decided to help her.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 池小橙应了一声，也不管司辰怎么想，就当他决定帮自己了。

0046.en: Then, she glanced at his face, half-stained with crimson.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 然后，看了眼他被鲜红染了一半的脸。

0046.en: She took out a pack of tissues from her small bag.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 从挎着的小包拿出一包纸巾。

0046.en: She walked two steps to his side, "Here."
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: 两步走到他的身边，“给你。”

0046.en: "And..." She activated her acting skills, deliberately turning her head away to create a contrast of returning to normal, and whispered like a mosquito, "I'm sorry."
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: “还有......”她演技发动，故作别扭地将头转向一边，营造自己恢复正常的反差感同时，声如蚊蝇，“对不起。”

0046.en: After saying that, she threw the tissues on the ground.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 说了这么一句后，纸巾扔到地上。

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng pulled her hood over her face and walked out of the alley with small steps.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 池小橙又将兜帽盖住脸，小步地往巷子外走去。

0046.en: Leaving Si Chen sitting on the ground, staring blankly at her staggering figure as she left.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 独留司辰坐在地上，怔怔地看着她离去的踉跄背影。

0046.en: Then he picked up the tissues, and for some reason, her fair side profile, turning away awkwardly and apologizing, appeared in his mind.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 而后拿起纸巾，不知为何脑海浮现出了她刚刚别扭转头并道歉的白净侧脸。

0046.en: "This guy... seems pretty good when she's normal."
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “这家伙...正常下来好像还蛮不错的。”

0046.en: "Hiss—"
0046.speaker: 旁白

0046.en: "It hurts so much! She looks so frail, where does she get so much strength?"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “疼死我了，她身子看着弱不禁风的，到底哪来那么大的力气。”

0046.en: Si Chen endured the belated pain, wiping his face and glasses with a tissue. Just as he was about to take out his phone to call a bodyguard, he suddenly froze.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰一边强忍后知后觉袭来的疼痛，一边用纸巾擦拭脸颊和眼镜，就在拿出手机打算喊一个保镖过来的时候，忽地愣在了原地。

0046.en: His mind was filled with Chi Xiaocheng's pathological changes.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 脑海中满是池小橙刚刚病态时的变化。

0046.en: Then, a look of disbelief appeared in Si Chen's eyes, "Could it be..."
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: 旋即，司辰眼神多出了一抹难以置信，“难道......”

0046.en: "Her purpose in approaching Su Tao and wanting to control her is also that?"
0046.speaker: 司辰
0046.cn: “她接近苏桃，想把苏桃抓在手里的目的，也是那个？”

0046.en: If that's the case...
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 如果是这样的话

0046.en: Si Chen took a deep breath, seemingly making a choice between Chi Xiaocheng and Su Tao.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 司辰深吸了一口气，心中似乎在池小橙和苏桃二人抉择着什么。

0046.en: Soon, before night fell, Chi Xiaocheng quickly returned home.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 很快，趁着夜色还未降临，池小橙迅速回到了家里。

0046.en: Then, like Si Chen, her legs gave way and she sat directly on the cold floor, letting out a long sigh, "Finally... I should have gotten through it."
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 紧接着如司辰一样，双腿一软直接坐到了冰凉的地板上，并长吁了一口气，“终于...混过去了应该。”

0046.en: [Uh... Host, were you acting just now?]
0046.speaker: 系统
0046.cn: 【额...宿主你刚刚是演的？】

0046.en: "Nonsense." Chi Xiaocheng retorted speechlessly, "Why do you always question me, System? What else could I be besides acting?"
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: “废话。”池小橙无语吐槽，“你这系统怎么老是质疑我，我除了是演的还能是什么？”

0046.en: [But I feel like you were about to kill him just now. If he hadn't turned his head, you would have stabbed him in the face, right?]
0046.speaker: 系统
0046.cn: 【可我感觉，你刚刚都像是要杀了他，如果不是他侧过了头，就扎到脸了吧？】

0046.en: "I calculated it precisely before stabbing. Si Chen's identity is so sensitive, and he has the male lead's halo. It's not that easy for something to go wrong. If I couldn't make him lose his mind first, he would definitely see through my act."
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: “我是算准了才刺的，司辰身份那么敏感，又有男主光环，哪有那么容易出事，如果我不能让他先失去理智，就一定会被他看出我是演的。”

0046.en: "There was nothing else I could do."
0046.speaker: 池小橙
0046.cn: “这也是没办法的事情。”

0046.en: Saying that, Chi Xiaocheng got up and walked towards her room with a calm expression.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 说着，池小橙起身，脸色平淡地往自己房间走去。

0046.en: The system stopped speaking.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 系统闻言，也不再吱声。

0046.en: It just thought to itself.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 只是暗暗想到。

0046.en: Can a person's acting really portray anger so well?
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 人的演技，真的能将愤怒演得那么好吗？

0046.en: The blackening skill's multiplier was 7 times just now!
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 刚刚黑化技能，发动的倍率可是7倍啊！

0046.en: But the host also looked quite normal. She could even talk to Si Chen just now.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 不过宿主她看着确实也蛮正常的，刚刚还能和司辰对话呢。

0046.en: Maybe this system is overthinking it.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 没准是本系统想多了。

0046.en: Resting, showering, and ordering takeout, Chi Xiaocheng gradually shed her fatigue.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 休息，洗澡，再点个外卖，池小橙渐渐将自己身上的疲惫散去。

0046.en: At the same time, she calculated the time. After waiting for a long time, she didn't receive any messages from Chen Qian, so she knew that Su Tao wouldn't come to confront her tonight.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 同时算着时间，等了许久，也没见陈倩来消息，就知道今晚苏桃是不会来摊牌了。

0046.en: Tomorrow night was her time to go to Ye Liang's place.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 明天晚上才是她去叶良那边的时间。

0046.en: Perhaps she would have to wait until tomorrow.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 兴许要等到明天吧。

0046.en: Chi Xiaocheng pondered, went to bed early, and after eating a sleep chocolate she got from a previous draw, she fell into a deep sleep.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 池小橙心中盘算，早早地就上了床，吃了一颗上次抽奖出的睡眠巧克力后，陷入沉睡。

0046.en: The next morning, with the alarm clock ringing, Su Tao woke up early.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 次日清晨，伴随闹钟的响起，苏桃早早地起了床。

0046.en: Her hair was disheveled, and her eyes were sleepy.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 秀发披散，眼神惺忪。

0046.en: She let out a long yawn and then noticed that someone in the dorm was up even earlier than her, "Qianqian, good morning."
0046.speaker: 苏桃
0046.cn: 她打了个长长的哈欠，才注意到宿舍有人比自己起得还早，“倩倩，早上好啊。”

0046.en: Chen Qian was sitting on her bed playing with her phone and greeted Su Tao, "Morning, Su Tao. Up so early? Are you going to Young Master Ye's place?"
0046.speaker: 陈倩
0046.cn: 陈倩坐在床上玩手机，对苏桃打招呼，“早啊苏桃，起那么早，是要去叶少爷那边了？”

0046.en: Su Tao smiled and shook her head, "I have something more important today. I'm not going to Ye Liang's."
0046.speaker: 苏桃
0046.cn: 苏桃笑着摇了摇头，“今天有更重要的事情，叶良那我就不打算去了。”

0046.en: Chen Qian's eyes flickered, "Is it about Chi Xiaocheng?"
0046.speaker: 陈倩
0046.cn: 陈倩双眼闪烁了一下，“是池小橙的事情？”

0046.en: "Yes." Su Tao nodded, then smoothed her hair, "I don't know why, but I always feel a little uneasy. Do you think if I say that to Xiaocheng, her reaction will be too extreme?"
0046.speaker: 苏桃
0046.cn: “是啊。”苏桃点头，又顺了一下自己的秀发，“不知道为什么，心里总有点不安，你说我要是对小橙那样说，她反应会不会过激啊？”

0046.en: "Relax. Is she going to imprison you or something?" The danger in Chen Qian's smile flashed and disappeared, "If anything happens, you can call me anytime, I'll help you!"
0046.speaker: 陈倩
0046.cn: “安心，难不成她还会囚禁你不成？”陈倩笑容中的危险一闪而逝，“如果有什么事情你可以随时打电话给我，我会帮你的！”

0046.en: "Okay, thank you, Qianqian."
0046.speaker: 苏桃
0046.cn: “嗯，谢谢你倩倩。”

0046.en: Su Tao patted her face, revealing a spirited smile.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 苏桃拍了下小脸，露出精神的笑容。

0046.en: Chen Qian: "You're welcome. We're best friends, after all."
0046.speaker: 陈倩
0046.cn: 陈倩：“别客气，我们是最要好的闺蜜嘛。”

0046.en: She got out of bed and washed up.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 下床，洗漱。

0046.en: After quickly getting ready, Su Tao walked to the dorm corridor.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 迅速整理好自己后，苏桃走到宿舍走廊。

0046.en: Looking up at the sky, for some reason, the uneasiness in her heart subtly grew.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 抬头望天，不知为何，心中的不安隐隐增大。

0046.en: The sky was overcast today, and there might be heavy rain.
0046.speaker: 旁白
0046.cn: 今日乌云密布，恐有暴雨。

0047.en: Chapter 47 Since You're Already Here (Bonus Chapter)
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 第47章 来都来了（加更）

0047.en: Cold wind silently swept through the winter campus. Dry branches swayed in the wind, making faint rustling sounds.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 寒风在冬日的校园中无声地穿梭，干枯的树枝在风中摇曳，发出轻微的沙沙声。

0047.en: Stepping out of the dormitory, Su Tao clearly felt that the sky was even gloomier than she had imagined.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 出了宿舍，苏桃才清晰地感觉到，这天空，比她想的还要阴沉。

0047.en: Beneath her thick gray tights, her boots crunched on the accumulated snow. Su Tao's gaze swept over the passersby, occasionally meeting the admiring glances of some girls.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 厚厚的灰色裤袜下，短靴踩在积雪上面，苏桃视线略过来往的行人，偶尔会对上某一些女生爱慕的视线。

0047.en: Popular with both genders.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 男女通杀

0047.en: Su Tao couldn't help but recall what Si Chen had told her.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 苏桃不由想到了司辰对自己说的那一番话。

0047.en: In the past, she would never have misunderstood these glances.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 换作以前，她是绝对不会误会这些视线的。

0047.en: But now, she couldn't ignore them.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 可现在，她却无法忽视。

0047.en: Because one of those girls was Chi Xiaocheng.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 因为诸多女生的其中一人，是池小橙。

0047.en: Was it her acting as a yandere?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 是她扮演的病娇？

0047.en: Or was it truly as Si Chen said, that the misunderstanding between her and me caused her to become a real yandere?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 还是说真的如司辰那样，是我和她产生的误会，致使她成为真的病娇？

0047.en: She couldn't figure it out.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 想不通。

0047.en: But the answer should be revealed today.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 但答案，也该在今天揭晓了。

0047.en: She first went to see her counselor, took three days off, and then went to find Ye Liang.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 她先是去找了辅导员，请了三天的假后，又去找叶良。

0047.en: She took a taxi to the bottom of his company building.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 打了个车，来到对方公司楼下。

0047.en: "Miss Su." The security guard recognized Su Tao and bowed slightly, "Are you here to see Young Master?"
0047.speaker: 保安
0047.cn: “苏小姐。”保安认出了苏桃，微微鞠躬，“您是来找少爷的吗？”

0047.en: "Is Ye Liang free now?"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “叶良现在有空吗？”

0047.en: "I'm very sorry, Miss Su." The security guard replied, "Due to some unexpected circumstances, Young Master flew to Lizhi City last night and won't be back until tomorrow at the earliest."
0047.speaker: 保安
0047.cn: “很抱歉苏小姐。”保安回答道，“因为出了某些意外，少爷昨天晚上就坐飞机去荔枝市了，最快也要明天才能回来。”

0047.en: "Young Master asked me to tell you that the agreed-upon matter will be postponed for now, and he'll contact you when he's free."
0047.speaker: 保安
0047.cn: “少爷让我转告您，关于约定的事情暂时往后搁置，等他空下来再说。”

0047.en: Su Tao frowned slightly and pressed, "What happened?"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃皱了皱秀眉，追问道，“发生什么事情了？”

0047.en: The security guard shook his head, "Young Master didn't tell me, he just asked you to wait."
0047.speaker: 保安
0047.cn: 保安摇头，“少爷也没跟我说，只是让您先等着。”

0047.en: "This guy..." Su Tao kicked the snow under her feet in dissatisfaction, pouted, and swallowed her displeasure.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: “这家伙......”苏桃不满地踢了一下脚下的雪地，嘟了嘟嘴，还是将不满咽到了肚子里。

0047.en: She said to the security guard, "Then I won't bother you. If Ye Liang comes back, please ask him to call me."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 对保安说道，“那就不打扰你们了，叶良要是回来的话，你再让他打电话找我吧。”

0047.en: "Yes, Miss Su."
0047.speaker: 保安
0047.cn: “好的苏小姐。”

0047.en: Bidding farewell to the security guard, Su Tao thought it over and still felt annoyed. She bent down and rolled up a snowball.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 道别保安，苏桃思来想去，还是觉得气不过，弯腰低头卷起一个雪球。

0047.en: As if the snowball was Ye Liang, she threw it heavily against the wall.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 仿佛将这雪球当成了叶良，重重甩到了墙上。

0047.en: "Both of them are so self-willed, they don't understand how to be considerate at all."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “一个两个的都这样我行我素，一点都不懂体谅人。”

0047.en: Last time at the cruise banquet, she was the one who broke the appointment first, causing Ye Liang to waste a lot of money and connections. The compensation of being his maid for three days was also at his strong request, and Su Tao had no choice but to agree.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 上次游轮宴会，是她失约在先，让叶良浪费了大量金钱和人脉，当他三天女仆的补偿，也是在他强硬的要求下，苏桃没办法才答应下来。

0047.en: For these three days.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 为了这三天。

0047.en: She had to humble herself and switch shifts with colleagues at her part-time job, working overtime.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 在兼职那边低声下气地和同事调班，加班。

0047.en: She gave her school counselor a lot of excuses and signed a guarantee before being granted leave.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 和学校辅导员扯了一大堆的理由，签了保证书才给请假。

0047.en: She also had to deal with the occasional gossip.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 还要处理时不时会传出的八卦。

0047.en: She even had to hide it from Chi Xiaocheng, begging everyone she knew not to reveal this matter.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 甚至要瞒着池小橙，拜托各个认识她的相关人士不要将这件事情透露出去。

0047.en: Coupled with the mental pressure from this yandere loli, Su Tao hadn't slept well for several nights.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 加上这位病娇萝莉给的精神压力，苏桃已经好几个晚上没睡好觉了。

0047.en: She originally planned to use this opportunity to test Chi Xiaocheng.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 她原本打算，用这次机会测试一下池小橙。

0047.en: If she was really a yandere, then she would listen to Doctor Cheng and try to appease her.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 如果她真的是病娇，那就听成医生的，下点心思安抚一下。

0047.en: If she wasn't a yandere, and it was all an act, then after they clarified things, she would go and be Ye Liang's maid.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 如果她不是病娇，是演的，那么二人说清楚后，她再去当叶良的女仆。

0047.en: But now, he just left.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 结果现在，说跑就跑了。

0047.en: Su Tao put her phone in her pocket and sighed deeply, "Forget it, this is fine too. I'll focus on Xiaocheng. If she's really a yandere and reacts to what I say..."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃揣进兜里，将手机拿出，长长地叹了口气，“算了，这样也好，把心思放在小橙身上，她真的是病娇，并对我说的话产生反应的话......”

0047.en: Su Tao recalled the scene when she was coaxing Chi Xiaocheng in the hospital last time.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 苏桃想起上次在医院哄池小橙时的场景。

0047.en: She murmured softly, "If I hug her and say some nice things, and then express my expectations, she'll go along with my wishes, right?"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 轻声呢喃，“抱一抱她然后说点好话，说出期望后她就会顺着我的想法去做的吧？”

0047.en: "Because she likes me, she'll listen to me?"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “因为她喜欢我，所以会听我的话？”

0047.en: "From what I've learned online, that's how it works."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “从网上了解好像就是这么回事。”

0047.en: But Doctor Cheng said it was okay to try, so it must be fine!
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 不过成医生都说可以去试试了，那就肯定没问题！

0047.en: Su Tao suppressed the uneasiness in her heart.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 苏桃将心中的不安压下。

0047.en: Seeing the sky darken and rain about to fall, she hurried towards Chi Xiaocheng's neighborhood.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 眼见天变黑即将下雨，她匆匆忙忙地往池小橙小区走去。

0047.en: "Boom—"
0047.speaker: 旁白

0047.en: A dull thunderclap sounded. Nearing the neighborhood, Su Tao looked up at the sky, covered her head, and started running.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 沉闷的雷声响起，临近小区，苏桃抬头看了下天，捂着脑袋迈步跑了起来。

0047.en: "Oh, rain, fall slower!"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “哎雨下得再慢点啊！”

0047.en: She ran in with big strides, finally entering the building where Chi Xiaocheng lived just before the downpour.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 迈大步跑了进去，终于是在暴雨降下前进入了池小橙所在的那栋楼。

0047.en: Su Tao had barely stepped inside the building when the torrential rain began to pour down.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 苏桃几乎是前脚刚躲进楼内，倾盆大雨随之降下。

0047.en: The strong wind seemed to want to drag her out of the building, blowing rain furiously through the door.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 狂风好似要将她从这栋楼中拽出，带着雨疯狂往门内吹去。

0047.en: Seeing this, Su Tao quickly retreated a few steps inside the building.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 见状，苏桃迅速地往楼内退了几步。

0047.en: Her heart still pounding.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 心有余悸。

0047.en: The rain came so suddenly and heavily that even with an umbrella, she would probably get half-soaked.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 这雨说来就来，这么大就算是打伞，恐怕也要被淋湿半边身子。

0047.en: "Oh, right, I should tell Si Chen."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “对了，跟司辰说一声吧。”

0047.en: Su Tao turned around and walked towards the elevator, sending a message to Si Chen, "Si Chen, I'm going to Xiaocheng's house to try out that idea we talked about."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃转身，走向了电梯，同时给司辰发去消息道，“司辰，我去小橙家试试看上次我们说的那个想法了哦。”

0047.en: "Don't go!!!"
0047.speaker: 司辰

0047.en: Si Chen replied instantly.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 司辰瞬间秒回。

0047.en: Three exclamation marks fully displayed the person's horror.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 三个感叹号将当事人的惊恐展露无遗。

0047.en: Su Tao blinked in confusion, "Why? Did you already test it, Si Chen?"
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃不解地眨了眨眼，“为什么啊，难道司辰你已经测试过了？”

0047.en: Last time, Si Chen proposed two methods.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 上次司辰提了两个方法。

0047.en: She didn't agree to the first method, so Si Chen went to test it alone for her.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 她没答应第一个方法，所以司辰才会为了她，独自去测试一下。

0047.en: Su Tao thought Si Chen hadn't acted yet because she hadn't heard from him.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 一直没消息苏桃都以为司辰还没行动呢。

0047.en: By the time he replied, Su Tao had already stepped into the elevator.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 等他回复时，苏桃已经迈步走进了电梯。

0047.en: Si Chen: "Uh... actually, I've already tested it. How should I put it, Chi Xiaocheng is indeed a bit of a yandere."
0047.speaker: 司辰
0047.cn: 司辰：“额......其实我已经测试过了，怎么说呢，池小橙确实有点病娇。”

0047.en: Si Chen: "So you don't need to go. Stimulating her like that, it wouldn't be good if there was any danger."
0047.speaker: 司辰
0047.cn: 司辰：“所以你不用去了，那样刺激她，万一有危险就不好了。”

0047.en: Su Tao: "Is that so? I always feel like you're hiding something from me."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃：“是吗，我总感觉你有什么事瞒着我。”

0047.en: The elevator door opened, and Su Tao slowly walked to Chi Xiaocheng's door, then glanced at the tightly closed window on the other side.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 电梯门打开，苏桃慢慢走到了池小橙的门前，又侧目看向另外一边关紧的窗户。

0047.en: The strong wind and rain were like a large hand, anxiously slapping the window, as if telling her not to enter this door.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 狂风暴雨好似一只大手，焦急地拍着窗户，好似让她不要进这个门。

0047.en: Si Chen: "I'm worried about you."
0047.speaker: 司辰
0047.cn: 司辰：“我这是在担心你。”

0047.en: Su Tao lowered her head and typed, "It's fine, I'm already here."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃低下了头，打字回复道，“没事，来都来了。”

0047.en: "If anything happens, call me again."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: “如果有什么事情你再给我打电话吧。”

0047.en: After sending the last message to Si Chen, Su Tao stopped looking at her phone and put it in her pocket.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 对司辰发去了最后一句，苏桃不再看消息，将手机揣进兜里。

0047.en: She used her index finger to tidy her bangs and pressed the doorbell.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 伸出食指整理了一下自己的刘海，按响门铃。

0047.en: "Ding-dong~"
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: “叮咚~”

0047.en: The door opened, and a wisp of tea-colored hair playfully peeked out, followed by that adorably mischievous little face.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 大门打开，一抹茶色的发梢俏皮地钻出，紧接着是那张可爱到犯规的小脸。

0047.en: She seemed to be checking if the person outside was a bad guy, her small head peeking out just a little.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 似乎是在确认门外来的是不是坏人，小脑袋探出一点点。

0047.en: Seeing that it was Su Tao, her face lit up with surprise, "Tao Tao!"
0047.speaker: 池小橙
0047.cn: 见到是苏桃后，脸色惊喜，“桃桃！”

0047.en: "Come in, come in, it's cold outside."
0047.speaker: 池小橙
0047.cn: “快进来快进来，外面冷。”

0047.en: The joyful and sweet voice warmed Su Tao's heart.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 欣喜开心的软萌声线让苏桃心中一暖。

0047.en: Thinking of those young masters who were quite close to her, their way of showing concern was just asking "Are you okay?" In comparison, Xiaocheng was simply an angel.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 想想那几位和自己关系不错的大少爷，关心人就是问候一声“你没事吧”，对比之下，小橙简直就是天使。

0047.en: She looks so normal, how could she be a yandere?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 这看着蛮正常的，怎么会是病娇呢？

0047.en: Su Tao tapped her boots and walked into the room, "Xiaocheng, the air conditioning is on, it's so warm."
0047.speaker: 苏桃
0047.cn: 苏桃掂了掂靴子，走进房门，“小橙开着空调啊，真暖和。”

0047.en: Because I knew you were coming today.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 因为知道你今天要来呀

0047.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled inwardly, not answering. Instead, she took out a pair of slippers, "Change your shoes first, then I'll pour you a cup of hot tea, Tao Tao. It must be cold outside with the wind and rain, right?"
0047.speaker: 池小橙
0047.cn: 池小橙心中笑了笑，没有回答，反而拿出了一双拖鞋，“先换鞋吧，然后我去给桃桃你斟一杯热茶，外面又刮风又下雨的，一定冷坏了吧？”

0047.en: Without waiting for a reply, she took Su Tao's hand again, clasped it, and brought it to her mouth.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 说完不由分说地又牵过苏桃的一只手，合拢握住放到嘴边。

0047.en: She gently exhaled a warm breath.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 轻轻哈出一口热气。

0047.en: Her cute face looked up again, with that foolish yet satisfied smile, "Warm, isn't it?"
0047.speaker: 池小橙
0047.cn: 可爱的俏脸再度抬头，是那傻傻又满足的笑容，“暖和吧？”

0047.en: Looking at Chi Xiaocheng like this, Su Tao's heart suddenly ached.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 看着这样的池小橙，苏桃心口忽然有些抽疼。

0047.en: She's so good to me. If I tell her about Ye Liang and the maid thing later, she'll probably be very sad, right?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 她对我那么好，我要是一会儿跟她说叶良和女仆的事情，她应该会很伤心吧？

0047.en: It's a little... unbearable.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 有点...不忍心。

0047.en: But no one knew whether this cute face was real or an act.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 但谁也不知道，这副可爱的面容，到底是真的，还是装的。

0047.en: Is cuteness her true nature?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 可爱是她的本性？

0047.en: Or is yandere her true nature?
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 亦或者病娇才是本性？

0047.en: Sorry, Xiaocheng!
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 抱歉了，小橙！

0047.en: Su Tao's resolve hardened. Her small feet shuffled into the house in slippers.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 苏桃心中坚定了下来，小脚踩着拖鞋，走进屋内。

0047.en: But she didn't notice Chi Xiaocheng standing by the door, a faint smile on her lips, pressing a button on the electronic lock.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 却没注意到，池小橙站在门边，唇角挂着浅浅的笑容，伸手按了一下电子锁的某个按键。

0047.en: The sound of gears turning echoed.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 轴承转动的声音响起。

0047.en: The door was locked.
0047.speaker: 旁白
0047.cn: 门，反锁了。

0048.en: Chapter 48 Brief Tenderness
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 第48章 短暂的温存

0048.en: After doing all that, Chi Xiaocheng joyfully came to Su Tao's side, "Tao Tao, what would you like to drink? Is black tea okay?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 做完这一切，池小橙欢雀地来到了苏桃身边，“桃桃，喝点什么，红茶可以吧？”

0048.en: "Yes, thank you, Xiaocheng, for the trouble."
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: “嗯，谢谢麻烦小橙了。”

0048.en: Returning to this familiar house, Su Tao felt completely relaxed, whether it was because of the air conditioning or the many memories here.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 回到这个熟悉的房子，不知道是因为这个空调，还是这里曾经也有不少回忆，苏桃坐在沙发，感觉浑身轻松。

0048.en: She watched Chi Xiaocheng squatting by the cabinet under the TV, her small bottom sticking out as she searched for the black tea that she didn't know where it was. Su Tao couldn't help but find it amusing.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她看着池小橙蹲在电视机下的柜子，撅起小屁股在那找着不知放哪去了的红茶，不由感觉好笑。

0048.en: "That's strange, I remember the black tea was here, right?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: “奇怪了，我记得红茶是放这里的呀？”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng rubbed her head, making a silly and cute sound.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 池小橙摸了摸脑袋，发出蠢萌的声音。

0048.en: Su Tao couldn't help but remind her, "It's in the cabinet on the right, isn't it? We put it there together when we tidied up. Did you forget already?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 苏桃忍不住提醒道，“是在右边的那只柜子吧，当时我们一起收拾放进去的，这就忘了？”

0048.en: "Is that so?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: “是吗？”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't turn her head, but instead went to another cabinet to look.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 池小橙没回头，转而又到另一只柜子翻看。

0048.en: Su Tao leaned back on the sofa, watching her gently.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 苏桃就这样双手倚在沙发，温柔地看着她。

0048.en: Her gaze suddenly fell upon a small trinket, "This thing is still here?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 视线中，忽然注意到了一个小玩意，“这东西还在这里啊？”

0048.en: She reached out.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她伸出手。

0048.en: Next to the box holding the remote control, hung a small necklace, with a delicately crafted peach at its end.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 在装着遥控器的抽盒旁，挂着一条小项链，项链顶端是一个做工精致的桃子。

0048.en: They bought this when they went to the park together during the summer vacation of their third year of high school, tricked by a bad uncle.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这是她们在高三暑假时一起去公园的时候，被一个坏大叔诓骗买的。

0048.en: This little thing cost 30 yuan.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这小东西花了30块钱。

0048.en: Yet, it could be bought for 5 yuan at a toy store outside.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 明明在外面玩具店5块钱就能买到手了。

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't even turn her head, as if she knew what Su Tao was talking about, "Because I like everything about Tao Tao. This little thing is our memory, of course I wouldn't throw it away."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 池小橙头都没回，仿佛知道苏桃说的是什么，“因为有关桃桃的一切我都喜欢呀，这小东西可是我们的回忆，我当然不会扔了。”

0048.en: Words that would make one blush came out of her mouth as if they were commonplace.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 令人面红耳赤的话语在她口中，仿佛就是家常便饭。

0048.en: But such casual words were not teasing or playful.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 但这样随意的话语又不是调侃和嬉闹。

0048.en: They were just like those focused and solemn confessions.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 同样与那些专注郑重的表白一样。

0048.en: Full of endless love.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 饱含万千爱意。

0048.en: Su Tao felt a little uncomfortable inside and skipped the topic, "Did you find the black tea?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 苏桃心底有点不是滋味，略过了这个话题，“红茶找到了吗？”

0048.en: "Found it!"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: “找到了！”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng held a small can, "It's hidden so deep. Wait a moment, I'll go boil some water."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 池小橙拿着一个小罐子，“藏得好深，你稍等一会儿，我去烧水。”

0048.en: She was like a clumsy idiot who didn't know how to do housework. After a flurry of activity, she finally poured the water into a cup.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她就好像一个不懂家务事的笨蛋，一阵手忙脚乱后，终于将水倒进杯子里。

0048.en: However, just as she picked up the cup.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 然而，却又在拿起杯子那一刻。

0048.en: Her hand trembled.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 手一抖。

0048.en: The boiling hot water immediately spilled onto her arm.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 滚烫的开水顿时洒在手臂。

0048.en: In the kitchen, Chi Xiaocheng screamed, attracting Su Tao's attention.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 在厨房，池小橙尖叫了一声，引来苏桃的关注。

0048.en: The girl anxiously ran from the sofa.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 少女着急地从沙发上跑了过去。

0048.en: What met her eyes was a reddened arm and steaming water stains on the floor.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 入目便是红了一块的手臂和地上冒着热气的水渍。

0048.en: She immediately washed the handkerchief she carried with cold water and, while treating the burn, couldn't help but scold, "Seriously, you burned yourself again. How can you be so careless?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 她立刻将随身带着的手帕用冷水清洗，处理之余不由责备道，“真的是，又烫伤了，怎么这么不小心啊。”

0048.en: "S-sorry." Chi Xiaocheng bit her lower lip, tears as big as beans seemingly about to squeeze out of her eyes.
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: “对...对不起。”池小橙咬着下唇，豆大的泪水好似要从眼眶挤出。

0048.en: Seeing this, Su Tao's heart softened, and her scolding tone also softened.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 苏桃见状，心中一软，责备的语气也缓和了下来。

0048.en: She took Chi Xiaocheng's hand, "Let's go out first, I'll treat you."
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 她牵着池小橙的手，“先出去吧，我帮你处理一下。”

0048.en: She made Chi Xiaocheng sit on the sofa, while she knelt in front, gently wiping her forearm with a towel, her eyes focused and gentle.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她让池小橙坐在沙发，自己则蹲在前面，眼神专注且温柔地用毛巾擦拭小臂。

0048.en: "Does it hurt?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: “疼吗？”

0048.en: Su Tao asked softly.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 苏桃柔声询问。

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng shook her head, "It doesn't hurt."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 池小橙摇了摇头，“不疼。”

0048.en: As she spoke, she stared intently at Su Tao's pretty, fair face, then her gaze fell on her focused movements, and her eyes couldn't help but show a hint of satisfaction.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 说话间，紧紧盯着苏桃那俏丽白净的脸蛋，视线又落在她那专注的动作，眼神不禁多了一抹满足。

0048.en: [Host, did you burn yourself on purpose?]
0048.speaker: 系统
0048.cn: 【宿主，故意烫伤的吧？】

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng just curled her lips, not answering.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 系统在脑海中出声询问。

0048.en: Who knows if it was intentional.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 池小橙只是勾起唇角，没有回答。

0048.en: I'm just a clumsy little guy, just like the original owner.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 谁知道是不是故意的呢。

0048.en: Isn't it normal to get hurt?
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 我和原主一样，只是个笨手笨脚的小家伙。

0048.en: Only then will Tao Tao care about me and feel sorry for me.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 受伤不是很正常吗？

0048.en: Unconsciously, Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved into an eerie smile, like a hunter looking at its prey, as she stared at Su Tao, who was squatting in front of her, treating her injury.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 只有这样，桃桃才会在意我，心疼我啊

0048.en: When Su Tao's gaze fell upon her, Chi Xiaocheng quickly transformed into a pitiful, self-reproaching little girl.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 不知不觉，池小橙唇角扬起了一个看待猎物般的妖异笑容，就这么盯着蹲在前方为自己处理伤势的苏桃。

0048.en: She sobbed and asked, "Tao Tao, am I... am I very clumsy?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 待到苏桃视线投来，池小橙迅速变成了自责委屈的小可怜。

0048.en: Su Tao applied gauze to Chi Xiaocheng, then stood up and patted her head with a smile, "Yes, you've always been clumsy. Boiling water is going to be your lifelong enemy. You've been burned a few times before, haven't you? You never learn."
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 抽泣着询问道，“桃桃，我...我是不是很笨啊？”

0048.en: "Sorry..."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 苏桃给池小橙上了一下纱布，起身笑着拍了拍她的脑袋，“是，你一直都很笨，开水都要成为你的一生之敌了，以前也被烫伤过几次吧，不长记性。”

0048.en: "Then be careful next time, okay?" Su Tao said with concern. After putting away the first-aid kit, she went to clean the kitchen.
0048.speaker: 苏桃

0048.en: Then she skillfully brewed tea.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: “那就下次注意，知道吗？”苏桃关切地说了这一句话，将医药箱放好，便去打扫厨房。

0048.en: "Xiaocheng, what would you like to drink?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 再轻车熟路地泡茶。

0048.en: "Whatever you like~"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: “小橙喝点什么？”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng's answer made Su Tao's hand, holding the cup, tremble.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: “听你的~”

0048.en: Then she heard Chi Xiaocheng's voice again, "I can drink anything, as long as Tao Tao likes it."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 池小橙的回答让苏桃拿杯子的手抖了一下。

0048.en: Su Tao's lips curved into a smile.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 继而又听到池小橙的声音，“我喝什么都行的，桃桃你喜欢就好啦。”

0048.en: She's always been like this, so cute.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 苏桃唇角勾起一抹笑容。

0048.en: It's truly puzzling that such cuteness also has a pathological side.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她一直都是这样啊，可可爱爱。

0048.en: A cup of coconut juice and a cup of hot black tea were brought out together.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这样的可爱居然还有病态的一面，真让人不解。

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat obediently on the sofa, her two slender legs not reaching the ground, her feet in white socks dangling, looking very cute.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 一杯椰汁，一杯热红茶，一同端了出去。

0048.en: This scene reminded Su Tao of the time before she graduated from high school.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 池小橙乖巧地坐在沙发上，两条纤细小腿够不着地，脚丫穿着白袜一晃一晃的，很是可爱。

0048.en: At that time, Brother Chi Song had just gotten this house, and both of them were surprised and curious.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这样的一幕，不由让苏桃想起高三还未毕业那会儿。

0048.en: Every weekend, they would live together here for two days.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 当时池松哥刚得到这一套房子，二人又是惊喜又是好奇。

0048.en: At that time, Chi Xiaocheng was just like this. She would cook in the kitchen, and Chi Xiaocheng would obediently sit here watching TV.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 每到周末就在这里同居两天。

0048.en: It was as if she was constantly watching her.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 那时的池小橙就是现在这样，她在厨房煮饭，池小橙就乖巧地坐在这里看电视。

0048.en: Whenever she looked over, this cute little one would respond with a warm and healing smile.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 好像在时刻关注着她。

0048.en: Is such a Xiaocheng really a yandere?
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 每当她投来视线，这可爱的小家伙都会报以温暖又治愈的笑容。

0048.en: Su Tao, relaxed by the brief warmth, remembered her purpose for being here again.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这样的小橙，真的是病娇吗？

0048.en: To test!
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 因为短暂的温馨而放松的苏桃，再度想起自己来这里的目的。

0048.en: She wanted to confirm whether this warmth was a fleeting illusion or an eternal truth.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 试探！

0048.en: "Boom—"
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 她要确认这样的温馨是短暂的假象，还是永久的真实。

0048.en: Thunder sounded outside, interrupting Su Tao's thoughts. She came back to her senses, and as she walked towards Chi Xiaocheng, the smile on her face gradually stiffened.
0048.speaker: 旁白

0048.en: Don't hesitate, Su Tao!
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 外面雷声响起，打断了苏桃的猜想，她回过神来，走向池小橙时，脸上的笑容渐渐僵硬。

0048.en: This is all for Xiaocheng's good.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 不能犹豫啊苏桃！

0048.en: If she's a yandere, she must be treated, otherwise something will happen sooner or later.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 这都是为了小橙好。

0048.en: She came to Chi Xiaocheng's side, placed both the orange juice and black tea on the table, and just as she was about to speak, she saw Chi Xiaocheng pull out a packet of powder from her embrace.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 如果她是病娇，就必须得治才行，不然迟早要出事。

0048.en: "Tao Tao, want to add some of this?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 她来到池小橙身边，将橙汁和红茶都放在了桌上，刚想开口，就见池小橙从怀里掏出一包粉末。

0048.en: Su Tao looked at the grayish-white powder curiously, "What is this?"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: “桃桃，要加点这个吗？”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng poured a glass of plain water beside her, then added a little of the powder into it, saying lightly, "This was prescribed at the hospital. The doctor uncle said it's a benign medicine that can regulate the body and dispel fatigue. You can drink it like a beverage, and he told me to add a little whenever I drink water."
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 苏桃好奇地看着那一包灰白色的粉末，“这是什么？”

0048.en: Then, she looked at Su Tao's slightly pale face, "Tao Tao, your complexion looks a bit off. You must be very tired these past few days, why don't you add some too?"
0048.speaker: 池小橙
0048.cn: 池小橙在旁边倒了一杯白开水，跟着倒了一点进去，淡淡道，“这是当时在医院开的，医生叔叔说属于良性药，能调理身体，驱散疲劳，可以当饮料喝，让我平时喝水的时候就加一点。”

0048.en: Seeing that Chi Xiaocheng had prepared it for herself, Su Tao didn't think much of it, "Thank you, Xiaocheng."
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 说着，又看向苏桃那稍稍憔悴的脸蛋，“桃桃你脸色有点差哦，这几天很累吧，要不也加一点？”

0048.en: "You need to rest well."
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 看到池小橙都给她自己准备了，苏桃也就没多想，“谢谢小橙。”

0048.en: The powder slowly poured into the black tea.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: “要好好休息才行呢。”

0048.en: Chi Xiaocheng then picked up the glass of coconut juice and took a small sip.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 粉末，缓缓倒进红茶。

0048.en: The sound of rain hitting the window, Chi Xiaocheng narrowed her eyes in enjoyment.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 跟着池小橙拿起那一杯椰汁，轻轻抿了一口。

0048.en: Su Tao held the black tea, seemingly hesitating about something.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 耳边雨声拍打窗户，池小橙享受地眯起了眼睛。

0048.en: For a moment, both of them fell silent.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 苏桃捧着红茶，似乎在犹豫什么。

0048.en: The strong wind lashed against the window, and a ghostly howling sound poured in through the cracks, making one's hair stand on end.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 一时间二人都沉默了下来。

0048.en: For some reason, the light seemed to dim a little.
0048.speaker: 旁白
0048.cn: 狂风拍打窗户，从缝隙中涌入如鬼嚎般的“呼呼”声，让人不禁毛骨悚然。

0048.en: Su Tao held the black tea and turned to look seriously at the girl with tea-colored hair beside her, "Xiaocheng, I have something to tell you!"
0048.speaker: 苏桃
0048.cn: 不知怎的，灯光似乎都暗了一点。

0049.en: Chapter 49 I'm Playing a Yandere, Not a Madman
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 第49章 我扮演的是病娇，不是疯子

0049.en: Don't hesitate.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 不要犹豫。

0049.en: Don't feel pity.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 不要产生恻隐之心。

0049.en: Su Tao tightly gripped the teacup she was holding, feeling her heart race.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 苏桃用力攥紧了捧着的茶杯，感觉心跳加快。

0049.en: In the reflection of her pupils, Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head and smiled sweetly, "Tao Tao, what's wrong?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 瞳孔的倒影中，池小橙歪了歪脑袋，嫣然一笑，“桃桃，怎么啦？”

0049.en: Strands of hair fell from beside her ear, swaying in the air.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 缕缕秀发自耳侧垂下，荡在空中。

0049.en: Her smile was cute and happy.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 她的笑颜，可爱而又幸福。

0049.en: But who knew if this side was just a facade?
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 但谁又知道这样的一面是不是表象呢？

0049.en: Since she had decided, she would do it!
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 既然决定了下来，那就去做！

0049.en: Su Tao suddenly chugged the black tea in her hand.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 苏桃猛地将手中红茶一口闷。

0049.en: A warm current surged through her body. She used it to muster her courage, and her eyes suddenly became firm.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 一股暖流涌入身体，她借此鼓起勇气，眼神猛地坚定了起来。

0049.en: She said very seriously to Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, tonight, I'm going to be Ye Liang's maid!"
0049.speaker: 苏桃
0049.cn: 很是认真地对池小橙说道，“小橙，今天晚上，我要去给叶良当女仆了！”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng's mouth slightly opened. The coconut juice was still in her hand. This wasn't the first time she heard this news, but coming from Su Tao's mouth, it seemed to have a different flavor.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙微微张嘴，那椰汁还拿在手中，她不是第一次听到这个消息，但从苏桃嘴里说出来，好像又有不同的味道。

0049.en: Her pink lips, lacking moisture, began to dry and stiffen. The highlights in her eyes seemed to be gradually diminishing.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 粉唇缺少水分开始变得干巴、僵硬，眼神高光似在渐渐减少。

0049.en: "Why?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “为什么？”

0049.en: The indifferent voice betrayed no emotion.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 淡漠的声线听不出情感。

0049.en: Because the last banquet caused him a lot of trouble, and as an ordinary person, she had no money or connections, so she could only compensate him in the way he expected.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 因为上次宴会，给他造成了不少的麻烦，自己这样的普通人又没钱没人脉，只能以对方期望的方式去补偿。

0049.en: This was the fundamental reason, but Su Tao knew she couldn't say that.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 这是根本原因，但苏桃知道，自己不能这么说。

0049.en: Saying that would be like explaining, and she would have to keep explaining under his constant questioning.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 这样说就像是解释，在她的不断追问下就要不断解释。

0049.en: She had to make a definitive statement!
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 必须一锤定音！

0049.en: Su Tao took a deep breath, "Because I like... because I also have a good impression of Ye Liang, and I don't dislike this matter, so I agreed!"
0049.speaker: 苏桃
0049.cn: 苏桃深吸了一口气，“因为我喜欢......因为我也对叶良有好感，我不讨厌这个事情，所以我答应了！”

0049.en: She ultimately didn't say the word "like."
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: “喜欢”二字，她终究没有说出来。

0049.en: Whether it was deception or genuine feeling, she couldn't really say she liked Ye Liang.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 无论是欺骗还是真实感情，她对叶良也确实说不上喜欢。

0049.en: Just as she said, there was a hint of fondness and longing for the opposite sex.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 就如说出的话，有着对异性的一丝好感与憧憬。

0049.en: "So, Xiaocheng, I'm sorry I can't accompany you for the next few days."
0049.speaker: 苏桃
0049.cn: “所以小橙，很抱歉接下来几天不能陪你了。”

0049.en: After Su Tao finished speaking, it felt as if a heavy stone had fallen from her heart, and she felt much lighter.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 苏桃说完，心中仿佛有一块沉重的石头落下，整个人都轻松了不少。

0049.en: Don't provoke her too much—according to Doctor Cheng, this should be fine, right?
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 不要过多刺激她——按照成医生说的话，现在这样应该还好吧？

0049.en: Just as she finished speaking, her hand was suddenly grabbed by Chi Xiaocheng.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 刚刚说完，她的手就陡然被池小橙给抓住了。

0049.en: A hint of pain came, making Su Tao secretly alarmed.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 一丝痛楚传来，让苏桃暗暗心惊。

0049.en: When did Xiaocheng's strength become so great?
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 小橙的力气，什么时候这么大了？

0049.en: Looking up, she noticed that Chi Xiaocheng's state was very wrong at this moment.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 抬头望去，她才注意到，此时的池小橙状态很不对。

0049.en: Her breathing was rapid, her shoulders trembling, like a drowning person grasping at the last straw, "But didn't we agree to be together forever?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 呼吸急促，肩膀在颤抖，好似落水的人，抓着最后一根稻草，“可是我们不是说好了吗，要永远在一起。”

0049.en: "Why are you still going to Ye Liang?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “你为什么还要去找叶良？”

0049.en: "Sorry, Xiaocheng." Su Tao threw off Chi Xiaocheng's arm.
0049.speaker: 苏桃
0049.cn: “抱歉小橙。”苏桃一把甩开池小橙的手臂。

0049.en: Then she stood up. She wanted to observe Chi Xiaocheng's reaction further. Her current reaction was still within expectations.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 跟着站了起来，她要进一步观察池小橙的反应，现在的反应还在预料之中。

0049.en: "No, you can't~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “不可以呢~”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice, as faint as a mosquito, caught Su Tao's attention.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙低如蚊蝇的声音引起了苏桃的注意。

0049.en: She thought Chi Xiaocheng would get up and stop her, but she didn't expect Chi Xiaocheng to just sit on the sofa, still holding the glass of coconut juice.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 她本以为池小橙会起身阻止她，却没想到池小橙只是坐在沙发，双手依旧捧着那杯椰汁。

0049.en: Her smile was incredibly complex, "Tao Tao, you can't go to Ye Liang's place~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 脸上的笑容复杂无比，“桃桃，不可以去叶良那里呢~”

0049.en: "He will hurt you, he will abandon you, he will play with your feelings. In this world, only I truly like you wholeheartedly."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “他会伤害你的，会抛弃你的，会玩弄你的感情，这个世界只有我，才是全心全意地喜欢你。”

0049.en: "So... you can't go~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “所以...不可以去呢~”

0049.en: After saying that, she gave her a sweet smile.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 说罢，对她抿出了一个甜甜的笑容。

0049.en: But this sweetness seemed to be laced with poison.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 只是这一份甜，好似掺杂剧毒。

0049.en: Su Tao frowned and took a step to leave, but as soon as she extended one foot, a sudden weakness spread through her body.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 苏桃皱了皱眉，迈步就打算离开，可一只脚刚伸出，身子陡然传来了一阵虚弱感。

0049.en: She quickly covered her head, propping herself up on the armrest of the sofa, "W-what's going on?"
0049.speaker: 苏桃
0049.cn: 她连忙捂住自己的脑袋，撑住沙发扶手，“怎...怎么回事？”

0049.en: "Hehe, this is sleeping tea~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “嘻嘻，这个是昏睡红茶哦~”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng put down the orange juice in her hand and happily opened her arms, waiting for her.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙将手中橙汁放下，幸福地张开双手，怀抱候人。

0049.en: Her head began to feel dizzy, her limbs gradually weakened, and a heavy drowsiness made Su Tao unable to hold on any longer.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 脑袋开始昏胀，四肢渐渐无力，沉沉的困意让苏桃再也坚持不住。

0049.en: From the corner of her eye, she saw the glass of plain water that Chi Xiaocheng hadn't touched.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 眼角的余光，看到了池小橙根本没喝过的那杯白开水。

0049.en: "Xiao..."
0049.speaker: 苏桃

0049.en: Before the word "cheng" could be uttered, her entire body fell towards Chi Xiaocheng.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: “橙”字未说出口，整个人便已经向着池小橙倒去。

0049.en: With a faint fragrance, the girl fell into her embrace.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 伴随着淡淡清香，少女入怀。

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng buried her nose in Su Tao's hair and took a light sniff.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙将鼻尖埋在她的秀发，轻轻吸了一口。

0049.en: She brought her small mouth close to Su Tao's earlobe and slowly said, in Su Tao's remaining consciousness, "Tao Tao, you can't leave me~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 小嘴凑近她的耳垂，在苏桃仅剩的意识中，缓缓说道，“桃桃，你不能离开我哦~”

0049.en: "You're too tired. Get a good rest with 6 hours of deep sleep."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “你太累了，6小时的深度睡眠，就好好休息吧。”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng gently placed Su Tao on the sofa, and snorted with a sinister look in her eyes, "Tao Tao, Tao Tao, since you already know I'm a yandere, why are you still testing me? Don't you know yanderes can't be tested?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 池小橙轻轻将苏桃放在沙发上，眼神阴柔地哼了一声，“桃桃呀桃桃，既然已经知道我是病娇了，为什么还要试探呢，难道不知道病娇是不能试探的吗？”

0049.en: Testing means death. Is this a joke that can be made?
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 试试就逝世，这是能开的玩笑？

0049.en: She stood up and stretched, "It's only because I'm a fake yandere. If I were a real yandere, Tao Tao, you would have been in trouble long ago. And that Ye Liang too, although he's a young master, a real yandere would have directly dragged him down with her."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 她站起身伸了个懒腰，“也就我是假病娇，要真病娇的话桃桃你早就出事了，还有那叶良也是，虽说是大少爷，但真病娇直接就要跟他同归于尽了。”

0049.en: [So, Host, what's next? Are you going to hold her captive?]
0049.speaker: 系统
0049.cn: 【那么宿主，接下来怎么办，软禁她吗？】

0049.en: "Of course I wouldn't do such a thing. It's just that Tao Tao is too tired, so I'm letting her get some good sleep. We don't do anything illegal."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “我当然不会去做那种事情，现在也只是看桃桃太累了，让她好好睡一觉而已，咱们不干犯法的事情。”

0049.en: "We've eliminated the estrangement between sisters and repaired our relationship. Su Tao took leave specifically to stay at my house for three days to take care of my illness. Isn't this part of daily life? System, don't make it sound so bad."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “我们消除了姐妹间的隔阂，修复关系，苏桃是请假特意在我家住三天照顾我病情，这不是日常生活中的一部分吗，系统你别说得那么难听。”

0049.en: "I'm doing this for Tao Tao's own good."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “我这也是为了桃桃好。”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng said, her eyes gradually turning cold, "She can't go to Ye Liang's place. Even if this plot isn't in the original novel, I know what will happen next."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 池小橙说着，眼神又渐渐阴寒了下来，“她可不能去叶良那里，就算原著没有这个情节我都知道接下来会发生什么。”

0049.en: Three days as a personal maid, living in his house, with some unexpected events at night, and then some sparks flying. Thinking about it with the melodramatic mindset of a female-oriented novel, these might even be considered mild.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 三天贴身女仆，住在他家，晚上来点意外，再摩擦出点什么火花，以女频文的狗血思维去想，这些可能还是轻的了。

0049.en: No one can touch my Su Tao!
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 谁也不能染指我的苏桃！

0049.en: "All of this is to prevent her from having a tragic ending like in the original plot."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “这一切，都是为了不让她和原剧情一样那么悲剧啊。”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng sighed, picked up Su Tao with difficulty, and slowly carried her to her room.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙感叹了一声，吃力地将苏桃抱起，慢慢转到了自己的房间。

0049.en: She placed her on the bed, covered her with the blanket, her movements incredibly gentle, "At least 6 hours. Get a good rest~"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 放在床上，盖好被子，动作温柔无比，“至少6个小时呢，好好休息吧～”

0049.en: At this moment, the system in her mind spoke.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 这时，脑海中的系统出声了。

0049.en: [Host, don't you think this is a good opportunity?]
0049.speaker: 系统
0049.cn: 【宿主，你不觉得这是个好机会吗？】

0049.en: "What good opportunity?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “什么好机会？”

0049.en: [We're villains. Now the female lead Su Tao is powerless. You know~]
0049.speaker: 系统
0049.cn: 【我们是反派啊，现在女主苏桃手无缚鸡之力，你懂的～】

0049.en: "What, now you remember you're a villain system?" Chi Xiaocheng rolled her eyes. After spending these past few days together, because of Su Tao's beauty and pure personality, plus the delicate care she received in the hospital for a few days.
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “怎么，现在想起你是个反派系统了？”池小橙翻了个白眼，这些天的相处，因为苏桃的颜值和白月光的性格，加上医院时几天精致的呵护。

0049.en: It was true that she somewhat liked this female lead from the novel.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 她确实有些喜欢这位小说女主不假。

0049.en: But she disdained doing such things.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 但她不屑于做那种事情。

0049.en: This would be a defilement of Su Tao!
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 这是对苏桃的玷污！

0049.en: She was playing a yandere, not a madman.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 扮演的是病娇，不是疯子。

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat on the edge of the bed, reaching out to tidy Su Tao's disheveled hair, and said to the system, "Su Tao has a heart problem. She's avoiding and afraid of the fact that I'm a yandere. Now she can't even look at me directly, so how can she fall in love with me?"
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 池小橙坐到床边，伸出手为苏桃整理凌乱的秀发，对系统说道，“苏桃她有心病，她在逃避、害怕我是病娇的这个事实，现在她都不能正视我，又谈何喜欢上我呢？”
