0049.en: "The reason I hold such importance in her heart is because the original owner had a very good relationship with her, and they relied on each other since childhood, making her unwilling to easily abandon the original owner. It's this emotion that restrains her."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “我在她心中的分量之所以大，还是因为原主跟她关系很好，从小相依为命让她不想轻易抛弃原主，正是用这份情感牵制了她。”

0049.en: "In terms of romantic affection, Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang probably rank higher than me in her heart."
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: “单论恋爱一方的好感度，叶良和东方阳在她心中估计都要比我高。”

0049.en: Chi Xiaocheng knew very well that if Su Tao didn't change her attitude towards her, then even if she continued to be sick, she wouldn't like her.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 池小橙心里门清得很，如果苏桃不改正对待自己的态度，那么再病下去，她也不会喜欢自己。

0049.en: She would only constantly seek methods of treatment, agree with her, and reminisce about past beautiful memories.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 只会不断地寻求治疗的方法，附和自己并回顾着曾经美好的记忆。

0049.en: Thinking of returning to the intimate sisterly relationship they had as children.
0049.speaker: 旁白
0049.cn: 想着回到儿时那般亲密的姐妹关系。

0049.en: That won't do. You should fall completely in love with me!
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 这样可不行呢，你应该全心全意地爱上我才是！

0049.en: No, not should, but must!
0049.speaker: 池小橙
0049.cn: 不，不是应该，而是必须！

0050.en: Chapter 50 Her Time Can Only Be Hers (Bonus Chapter)
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 第50章 她的时间，只能有她（加更）

0050.en: Su Tao needed three days of rest, so naturally, she couldn't let the outside world discover anything amiss.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 苏桃要休息三天，自然不能让外界发现不对的地方。

0050.en: These pre-arranged six hours were Chi Xiaocheng's preparation time.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 这预先留下的六小时，就是池小橙的准备时间。

0050.en: Only after she was fully prepared could she properly cherish her Tao Tao without any disturbances.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 只有准备完毕后，她才能在没人打扰的前提下，好好和她的桃桃温存。

0050.en: Otherwise, if discovered, her fate would be miserable.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 否则被发现的话，她的下场会很惨。

0050.en: Take one step, look three steps ahead.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 走一步，看三步。

0050.en: Not fighting battles she wasn't confident in, this was Chi Xiaocheng's consistent way of doing things.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 不打没把握的仗，这就是池小橙一直以来的行事风格。

0050.en: Although playing a yandere, the final outcome of faking death in front of Su Tao was also good, but given the current level of affection, even if she died, Su Tao wouldn't be heartbroken.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 虽然扮演病娇，最终的结局是假死在苏桃面前也不错，但以目前的好感度而言，自己就算死了，苏桃也做不到撕心裂肺。

0050.en: This death would not become an eternal pain in her heart.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 这份死亡更无法成为她心中永远的痛。

0050.en: Thinking this, Chi Xiaocheng picked up Su Tao's phone.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 如是想着，池小橙拿过苏桃的手机。

0050.en: Looking at the phone, she found that many people had sent her messages.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 看向手机，发现有不少人给她发来了消息。

0050.en: "Hmm... as for the phone password..."
0050.speaker: 池小橙

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng glanced at Su Tao's fingers, guessed, and entered six digits.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 池小橙瞥了一眼苏桃的手指，连猜带蒙，输入了6个数字。

0050.en: The phone screen paused.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 手机屏幕顿了一下。

0050.en: Unlock successful!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 解锁成功！

0050.en: The moment the password was correct, Chi Xiaocheng's gaze towards Su Tao became even more eager.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 密码正确的那一刻，池小橙看向苏桃的眼神，更加渴望了。

0050.en: "The password is actually my birthday. Tao Tao, Tao Tao, how can I ignore you like this?"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “密码居然还是我的生日，桃桃呀桃桃，你这样子，让我怎么置你于不顾呢？”

0050.en: With the phone unlocked, Chi Xiaocheng looked at the WeChat messages.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 手机解锁，池小橙看向了微信消息。

0050.en: There were three people at the top.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 置顶一共有三个人。

0050.en: The first, Xiaocheng.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 第一个，小橙。

0050.en: The second, Doctor Cheng.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 第二个，成医生。

0050.en: The third, Ye Liang!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 第三个，叶良！

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng stared intently at the third name, her eyes growing colder.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 池小橙紧紧盯着第三个人的名字，眼神寒了一分。

0050.en: Then she turned to look at Su Tao, her eyes filled with resentment.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 而后又扭头看向苏桃，眼神幽怨。

0050.en: None of the top contacts were herself. It seems Tao Tao still needs some training.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 置顶的所有人居然不是自己，看来桃桃还需要调教呢

0050.en: She looked at her phone again and found that many messages were just meaningless chats. Several frequently chatted names were probably other friends.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 又看向手机，发现很多消息都是没什么营养的聊天，好几个经常聊的名字应该是其他朋友。

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng secretly memorized these names, then paid attention to some important information.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 池小橙暗暗将这几个名字记在心里，这才注意一些重要的信息。

0050.en: First, Si Chen. He sent seven or eight messages to Su Tao, all telling her not to come to him to test if she was a yandere.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 首先是司辰，他连续发了七八条信息给苏桃，话里说的都是让她别去找自己测试是否病娇。

0050.en: It seemed Si Chen was scared by her and firmly believed that she was a yandere.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 看来司辰是被自己吓到，并且对自己是病娇这个事情深信不疑了。

0050.en: But these messages...
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 不过这些消息。

0050.en: She didn't like them.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 她看着不爽。

0050.en: Since you're on my side, why aren't you persuading Su Tao to come over?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 既然站在我这边，为什么不是把苏桃给劝过来？

0050.en: What she said last time was all empty talk!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 上次说的，全是空话！

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng typed a reply using Su Tao's phone, "I'm fine, don't worry."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 池小橙用苏桃的手机敲字回复道，“我没事，放心吧。”

0050.en: "Okay, done."
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: “OK，搞定。”

0050.en: Without waiting for Si Chen's reply, Chi Xiaocheng repeated the process, replying to other people who greeted her one by one.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 也不等司辰回复，池小橙又如法炮制，将其他问候的人一一回复。

0050.en: She tried her best to imitate Su Tao's tone, slowly eliminating potential threats for these three days.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 尽量假装着苏桃的语气，慢慢地，排除可能会影响这三天的威胁。

0050.en: After finishing everything, she used her own phone to send a message to Chen Qian, "Pay attention these days. If anyone looks for Su Tao, or if she has anything unfinished, help her deal with it."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 完事后，又用自己的手机，发消息给陈倩，“这些天你注意一下，如果有谁找苏桃，或者她有什么没完成的事情，你帮忙处理一下。”

0050.en: Chen Qian replied instantly, "What do you mean? I'm already your double agent, and now you want me to help Su Tao?"
0050.speaker: 陈倩
0050.cn: 陈倩秒回：“你什么意思啊，我都给你当二五仔了，现在还要我去帮苏桃？”

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Was the blackhead removal pill I gave you last time effective?"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 池小橙：“上次给你吃去黑头的药丸有效吗？”

0050.en: Chen Qian: "You have more?"
0050.speaker: 陈倩
0050.cn: 陈倩：“你还有？”

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "This time it's for skin beautification. If you do well, I'll give it to you next time I give you medicine."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 池小橙：“这次是美肤的，做得好下次给药的时候一起给你。”

0050.en: Chen Qian: "Chi Xiaocheng, you know me. I've always been Su Tao's good sister. Helping her with things is my duty!"
0050.speaker: 陈倩
0050.cn: 陈倩：“池小橙你是知道我的，我一直是苏桃的好姐妹，帮她处理事情，义不容辞！”

0050.en: After dealing with everything, Chi Xiaocheng began to arrange her room.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 处理完全部事情后，池小橙便着手开始摆弄自己的房间。

0050.en: She took out the self-adhesive stickers she bought with emotion points from the system. After pulling the curtains, she completely sealed the windows except for a few breathing holes.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 她拿过来从系统那化情绪值买的自动粘合贴纸，将窗帘拉好后，除了几个呼吸孔外又将窗户完全封死。

0050.en: Visibility to the outside, zero!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 对外可见度，零！

0050.en: Next, she removed the wall clock and the small alarm clock on the table, and even Su Tao's wristwatch.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 紧接着，是将墙壁上挂钟和桌子的小闹钟拿掉，连带苏桃的女士腕表，一块摘了出去。

0050.en: [Host, what are you doing?]
0050.speaker: 系统
0050.cn: 【宿主，你这是在干什么？】

0050.en: "Of course, I'm preparing for Tao Tao to rest well. With the windows open and it so bright outside, how can she sleep?"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “当然是为了让桃桃好好休息做准备呀，窗户开着外面那么亮，怎么睡觉？”

0050.en: "If there are too many alarm clocks, she'll look at the time too much, and looking at the time too much will cause stress, which is also not good."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “闹钟多了时间就会看得多，时间看多了会有压力的，这样也不好。”

0050.en: Although there were only three days.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 虽然只有三天时间。

0050.en: But Chi Xiaocheng had a lot of tasks.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 但池小橙的任务可不少。

0050.en: Her goal was simple: to change Su Tao's perception of her within these three days.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 她的目标只有一点，在这三天内，让苏桃对自己改观。

0050.en: Not to correct this yandere.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 不是去纠正这个病娇。

0050.en: But to make her realize that her yandere tendencies could no longer be corrected!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 而是要让她意识到，自己的病娇已经无法纠正了！

0050.en: If it couldn't be corrected, then she could only accept it, embrace it, and like it.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 无法纠正，那就只能去接受，去拥抱，去喜欢。

0050.en: To love!
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 去爱！！！

0050.en: Eliminate her sense of time.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 消除掉她的时间观念。

0050.en: Remove all entertainment content from the room, then fill the entire house with memories of the original owner and Su Tao.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 去掉房间内的所有娱乐内容，然后把整个屋子都塞满原主和苏桃的回忆物。

0050.en: Add many books about yandere yuri literature.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 增添许多病娇百合文学的书籍。

0050.en: Even feeding her would have to be done by herself.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 甚至连吃饭都只能自己去喂

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng felt excited just thinking about it.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 想想池小橙就觉得兴奋。

0050.en: Controlling the female lead and making her fall hopelessly in love with herself.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 将女主掌控在自己手里，然后让她无可救药地爱上自己。

0050.en: It might not be achievable in a short time, but as long as she moved towards this goal, Chi Xiaocheng felt full of motivation.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 短时间可能做不到，但只要朝着这个目标前进，池小橙就感觉动力满满。

0050.en: "Tao Tao, we have a lot of time~"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “桃桃，我们时间很长哦~”

0050.en: The sound of rain outside grew louder, but the room was incredibly quiet.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 窗外雨声渐大，然而房间却安静无比。

0050.en: The room, which Chi Xiaocheng had spent a lot of time tidying up, now had almost nothing but essential items like tables, chairs, and a bed.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 被池小橙花了不少时间整理的屋子，此时除了桌椅床等必要物品外，基本没其他的东西。

0050.en: On the table were a few books, carefully selected by Chi Xiaocheng.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 桌上摆了几本书，是池小橙精心挑选。

0050.en: The content was all about yandere intimacy.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 内容全是与病娇贴贴有关。

0050.en: One thing to note is that the protagonists in the books acted very yandere, but never mentioned the words "yandere."
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 有一点需要注意的是，书中主角表现得很是病娇，但从未提过“病娇”这两个字。

0050.en: Claustrophobia, depression, loneliness, panic. These countless emotions can only be resolved by your beloved Xiaocheng.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 幽闭、压抑、寂寞、慌张，这样无数种情绪，只能通过你最爱的小橙来排解哦

0050.en: Time flew by, and gradually, Su Tao woke up.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 时间一晃而过，渐渐地，苏桃醒了。

0050.en: It was evening, but Chi Xiaocheng had tried it. The system's medicine was very potent. She had slept for six hours after taking it.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 此时时间是傍晚，但池小橙试过，系统的药很顶，她吃过后睡了六个小时。

0050.en: When she woke up, she felt like she had slept for a month, her whole body feeling refreshed.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 醒来后感觉睡了一个月一样，浑身酸爽。

0050.en: One hundred times the energy, but she had to wait for the after-effects to pass.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 百倍的精神，要等后劲过了才行。

0050.en: And Su Tao was currently in the midst of those after-effects.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 而现在的苏桃，正处在那后劲之中。

0050.en: Her head was heavy, her body weak. She tried to cover her head, but found that for some reason, she couldn't exert any strength in her hands.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 脑袋昏沉，浑身无力，她想伸手捂一下脑袋，却发现不知为何，自己的手使不上一丝力气。

0050.en: What time is it now?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 现在是什么时候了？

0050.en: What did Xiaocheng do to me?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 小橙对我做了什么？

0050.en: What happened after that cup of black tea?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 那杯红茶之后，又发生了什么？

0050.en: Su Tao blinked hard, and her vision slowly returned.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 苏桃用力地眨巴了一下眼睛，视线终于慢慢恢复。

0050.en: What met her eyes was Chi Xiaocheng, sitting astride a chair, her hands resting on the armrests, her chin resting on her arms, watching with a smile.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 入眼是池小橙，她正跨坐在椅子上，双手枕在扶手，下巴倚在手臂上，面含笑意地看着。

0050.en: "Did you sleep well?"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “睡得舒服吗？”

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng's question made Su Tao quickly recall the scene.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 来自池小橙的询问，让苏桃迅速回忆起了当时的场景。

0050.en: She wanted to move, but still couldn't exert any strength.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 想行动，却依旧使不上力气。

0050.en: She could only lie on the bed, turning her head to look at Chi Xiaocheng.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 只得躺在床上，侧头看着池小橙。

0050.en: Her throat was very dry, as if smoking.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 喉咙渴得厉害，如冒烟一般。

0050.en: Su Tao coughed dryly, licked her dry lips, and then looked at Chi Xiaocheng and asked, "Xiaocheng, what... what did you do to me?"
0050.speaker: 苏桃
0050.cn: 苏桃干咳了一声，舔了舔发干的嘴唇后，看着池小橙问道，“小橙，你...你对我做了什么？”

0050.en: "Nothing?" Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head cutely, "I just thought you were too tired, Tao Tao, and wanted you to get some good rest."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “什么也没做呀？”池小橙可爱地歪着脑袋，“就是觉得桃桃你太累了，想让你好好休息。”

0050.en: Rest?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 休息？

0050.en: Here?
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 在这里？

0050.en: Su Tao looked around. The room was clean and simple, and the windows were completely sealed with unknown black cloth.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 苏桃看了眼四周，房间整洁简朴，窗户被不知名黑布封死。

0050.en: Recalling what she knew about yanderes, her heart sank.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 回想起对病娇的了解，心中一沉。

0050.en: But even so, she didn't lose her mind.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 不过即便如此，她也没失去理智。

0050.en: Anyway, Xiaocheng is very weak. After she regains her strength, she can just subdue her and talk to her properly.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 反正小橙很弱的，自己恢复力气后，再制服她和她好好聊聊就行了。

0050.en: Yes, don't provoke her, and don't mention anything that just happened. Just slowly change the subject and distract her.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 对，不要刺激她，也不要提任何刚刚的事情，就这样慢慢扯开话题引开她注意就好了。

0050.en: Thinking of this, Su Tao forced a smile, "Xiaocheng, I'm a little thirsty. Can I have some water?"
0050.speaker: 苏桃
0050.cn: 想到此处，苏桃扯出一个笑容，“小橙，我有点口渴，能让我喝点水吗？”

0050.en: Most importantly, regain strength.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 重要的是，恢复力气。

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled, "Of course you can."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 池小橙抿嘴一笑，“当然可以呀。”

0050.en: She had experienced the feeling of a smoky throat after waking up, so she had prepared a cup of warm water early. She walked to Su Tao's bedside, "But you can't get up now, how will you drink?"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 她体验过起床后嗓子冒烟的感觉，早早准备了一杯温水，走到苏桃的床边，“可是你现在起不来欸，要怎么喝呀？”

0050.en: Su Tao opened her mouth, "I should be able to do it slowly."
0050.speaker: 苏桃
0050.cn: 苏桃张开了嘴巴，“让我慢慢来应该也可以的吧。”

0050.en: After speaking, she saw Chi Xiaocheng raise her small head, smiling eerily, "No, Tao Tao is sick and needs care. You should say—Xiaocheng, feed me some water."
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: 说完，却见池小橙扬起小脑袋，笑容妖异，“不对哦，桃桃生病了，需要人照顾才行，你应该说——小橙喂我点水喝才对。”

0050.en: Su Tao blinked, and said with a dry laugh, "Then Xiaocheng, can you feed me some water?"
0050.speaker: 苏桃
0050.cn: 苏桃眨了眨眼，干笑着说道，“那小橙，你能喂我点水喝吗？”

0050.en: "Of course~"
0050.speaker: 池小橙
0050.cn: “当然可以啦~”

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head back and poured half a cup of water into her mouth.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 池小橙仰头，将半杯水倒入自己嘴里。

0050.en: Then she sat on the edge of Su Tao's bed.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 又坐到苏桃的床边。

0050.en: "Xiao... Xiaocheng?"
0050.speaker: 苏桃

0050.en: Su Tao's pupils contracted, as if she had guessed what Chi Xiaocheng was about to do, and her breathing became unnaturally rapid.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 苏桃瞳孔收缩，好似猜到了池小橙想做什么，呼吸不自然地急促了起来。

0050.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly.
0050.speaker: 旁白
0050.cn: 池小橙浅浅一笑。

0050.en: "Ugh—!"
0050.speaker: 苏桃

0051.en: Chapter 51 Love Her, Give Her Everything
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第51章 爱她，就把一切都给她

0051.en: Her dry throat was soothed, and a warm current seemed to flow through her entire body.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 干哑的嗓子得到舒缓，暖流好似涌向全身。

0051.en: The water was gradually finished.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 水渐渐喝完了。

0051.en: But her breathing became increasingly difficult.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 但呼吸却是越来越难受。

0051.en: No... I can't breathe anymore.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 不行...快要呼吸不了了。

0051.en: "Hoo-ha—"
0051.speaker: 旁白

0051.en: Finally, just as she reached her limit, Su Tao's vision cleared again. She gasped for air, tears seemingly welling up in her eyes, and looked at Chi Xiaocheng with difficulty.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 终于在临近极限的时候，苏桃眼前再度一片清明，她大口大口地呼吸着，眼角似乎含着些许泪水，就这样艰难地看着池小橙。

0051.en: The small loli blinked, seemingly understanding Su Tao's meaning.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 娇小的萝莉眨了眨眼，似乎读懂了苏桃的意思。

0051.en: She smiled faintly, "Tao Tao, do you want to ask why? Because I like you!"
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: 浅浅笑道，“桃桃想问为什么吗，因为我喜欢你呀！”

0051.en: "There's still half a glass of water left."
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “还有半杯水哦。”

0051.en: Su Tao's chest heaved continuously. She shook her head and said, "No need, I'm not thirsty... no need."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: 苏桃心口前不断起伏，摇着脑袋道，“不用了，我不渴了...不用了。”

0051.en: "No!"
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “不行！”

0051.en: Her body was weak, and she couldn't refuse Chi Xiaocheng's feeding. Soon, her breathing became difficult again.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 浑身乏力的她根本无法拒绝池小橙的投喂，很快呼吸便再度困难了起来。

0051.en: The time was short, yet long.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 时间很短，也很漫长。

0051.en: By the time Su Tao regained consciousness, Chi Xiaocheng had already placed a small incense burner on the table.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 等苏桃意识恢复时，池小橙已经拿着一个小香炉放到了桌上。

0051.en: "Tao Tao, you're sick, so you can't leave until you're well. I've tried this little gadget, and it can help you relax your body. Now, just rest assured~"
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “桃桃，你生病了，在病好之前都不能离开哦，这个小玩意呢，我试过了，能让你很好地放松身体，接下来就安心休息吧~”

0051.en: After saying that, she picked up a stack of books as if tidying up the room and walked towards the door.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 说完，像是收拾屋中物品一样，将一摞书抱了起来走向房门。

0051.en: The stack of books was heavy, and Chi Xiaocheng swayed as she walked.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 那一摞书很重，池小橙走起路来摇摇晃晃。

0051.en: One of the books suddenly fell from her arms, but she didn't seem to notice.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 其中一本陡然从她怀中掉下她似乎都没发现。

0051.en: She continued to walk forward until she left the room.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 依旧往前走去，直至离开房间。

0051.en: It was then that Su Tao gradually regained a little strength.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 也是这时，苏桃才渐渐恢复了一点力气。

0051.en: But only a little. She could barely get up. She felt like she couldn't even lift a kettle of water now.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 但也只是一点，能够勉强起身，她感觉自己现在连一壶水都提不起来。

0051.en: Su Tao leaned against the headboard, covering her head with a headache, frowning to herself, "What exactly is going on? Am I... being restricted by Xiaocheng now?"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: 苏桃倚在床头，头疼地捂着自己脑袋，自言自语地皱眉，“这到底是怎么个情况，我现在算是...被小橙限制了？”

0051.en: Her fingers unconsciously brushed her lips, forcing herself to think rationally.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 手指不经意间抚过嘴唇，强迫自己理智思考。

0051.en: After a while, when she could get out of bed, she began to observe the room.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 过了一会儿，可以下床后，便观察起了这个房间。

0051.en: "From the layout, it's undoubtedly Xiaocheng's room."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “从布局来看，毫无疑问是小橙的房间。”

0051.en: "The windows are sealed, with breathing holes."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “窗户被封死了，留有呼吸孔。”

0051.en: "There's no way to see outside through the breathing holes. From the sound, the rain has already lessened."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “也没办法通过呼吸孔看外面的情况，听声音现在雨已经变小了。”

0051.en: "How long have I been asleep? Has this rain been continuous, or is it the second rain that has been falling for a long time?"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “我到底睡了多久，这是一直没停过的雨，还是说已经下了很久的第二场雨？”

0051.en: After checking, Su Tao slumped back onto the bed, her gaze fixed on the only exit—the door.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 检查过后，苏桃颓废地坐回床上，视线放在了这里唯一的出口——房门。

0051.en: But would Xiaocheng let her out?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 可小橙会让自己出去吗？

0051.en: Why would she do this?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 她为什么这样做？

0051.en: After much thought, Su Tao could only force a bitter smile of regret.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 思来想去，苏桃只得露出一个后悔的苦笑。

0051.en: Because of the test.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 因为测试。

0051.en: In this situation, whether she was playing a yandere or not, she could easily cover it up, right?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 这样的境地，她无论是否扮演病娇，都能很好地遮掩过去吧？

0051.en: Su Tao got up and picked up the book Chi Xiaocheng had dropped on the floor.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃起身，将地上池小橙掉下来的那本书捡起。

0051.en: "What a careless fellow, full of flaws."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “真是个粗心的家伙，破绽百出。”

0051.en: She looked at the title.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 看向书名。

0051.en: "Love Her, Give Her Everything"
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 《爱她，就把一切都给她》

0051.en: The cover showed two girls embracing, surrounded by blood-red roses.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 封面是两个女生相拥，周遭绽放着血色的玫瑰花。

0051.en: "Does Xiaocheng usually read romance light novels like this?"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “小橙平时喜欢看这样的恋爱轻小说吗？”

0051.en: Since she had nothing to do, she might as well learn about Xiaocheng's preferences.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 闲来无事，正好也了解一下小橙的喜好。

0051.en: Although she was restricted, Su Tao was still relatively calm. She knew that Chi Xiaocheng wouldn't harm her, and she could easily subdue her once she recovered.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 虽然被限制，苏桃心中也还算平静，她深知池小橙不会害自己，而等自己恢复，也能轻易制服她。

0051.en: She just had to wait a little longer.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 稍微等等就好了。

0051.en: She opened the table of contents, and the content shocked Su Tao!
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 翻开目录，里面的内容让苏桃触目惊心！

0051.en: Chapter 1: I like you.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第一章：我喜欢你。

0051.en: Chapter 2: I love you!
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第二章：我爱你！

0051.en: Chapter 3: Love you, love you, love you, love you, love you!
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第三章：爱你爱你爱你爱你爱你！

0051.en: Chapter 4: Hand, do you like it?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第四章：手，喜欢吗？

0051.en: Chapter 5: It hurts a little, but the porridge, is it delicious?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第五章：有点疼呢，但粥，好吃吧？

0051.en: Chapter 6: Do you still like me, even though I'm so incomplete?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第六章：这样残缺的我，你依旧喜欢吗？

0051.en: Chapter 7: You said you were just coaxing me?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第七章：你说你只是在哄我？

0051.en: Chapter 8: Are you afraid of me?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第八章：你在害怕我吗？

0051.en: Chapter 9: It's okay, I love you.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第九章：没关系，我爱你。

0051.en: Chapter 10: Forever together.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 第十章：永远在一起。

0051.en: —End.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: ——结束。

0051.en: "What... what is this!"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “这...这到底是什么！”

0051.en: Her hand trembled, and Su Tao was so scared that she couldn't even hold the book.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 手一抖，苏桃吓得连书都拿不住。

0051.en: The content described in this book was undoubtedly about yanderes!
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 这书里讲述的内容，毫无疑问就是病娇吧！

0051.en: At this moment, Su Tao couldn't help but recall what Si Chen had said.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 这时，苏桃不由想到司辰说过的话。

0051.en: A person's personality can change due to social environmental factors. With more exposure, at a naive age where they can't distinguish right from wrong, they will unconsciously lean towards that side.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 人的性格会因为社会的环境因素等而改变，接触得多了，处在懵懂的年龄分不清好坏，便会无意识地朝着那边靠拢。

0051.en: Even yearn for it.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 甚至憧憬。

0051.en: Su Tao swallowed hard, "Xiaocheng has been... reading this kind of book for a long time?"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: 苏桃重重地咽了一口唾沫，“小橙很久以前...都在看这种书？”

0051.en: No, maybe the table of contents is just a gimmick.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 不，没准目录只是噱头。

0051.en: Su Tao picked up the novel and casually opened a page.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃拿起小说，随意翻开一页。

0051.en: The content was: The female lead asked the second female lead what she liked about her, and the second female lead replied that she liked soft little hands. The next day, the female lead cut off her own hand, wrapped it in diamonds and crystals, made it into a specimen, and gave it to the second female lead.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 内容是：女主问女二喜欢她身上的什么，女二回答说喜欢软软的小手，第二天女主就把自己的手砍了下来，用钻石和水晶包裹镶嵌，制成标本送给了女二。

0051.en: Horrifying!
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 毛骨悚然！

0051.en: Su Tao felt cold sweat break out on her back. This scene seemed familiar.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃只感觉背后冷汗浸出，这样的一幕，好像似曾相识。

0051.en: "Creak~"
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: “咯吱~”

0051.en: The door opened.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 房门打开。

0051.en: Su Tao immediately hid the book behind her back, and a hint of fear appeared in her eyes as she looked at Chi Xiaocheng.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃立刻将书藏到了身后，看向池小橙的眼神中，多了一丝害怕。

0051.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao, tilting her head in confusion, "Tao Tao, why are you looking at me like that? You're sick, and I'm taking care of you."
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: 池小橙看着苏桃，疑惑地歪了歪脑袋，“桃桃，你为什么用这种眼神看着我呢，你生病了，我在照顾你呢。”

0051.en: Saying that, she walked in holding a bowl of soup.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 说着，端着一碗汤走了进来。

0051.en: "Time to eat."
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “吃饭了哦。”

0051.en: Her demeanor was perfectly normal, as if she was truly taking care of a sick person.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 她的表现，无比正常，就好像真的在照顾一个病人。

0051.en: Su Tao's smile stiffened. She stared intently at the bowl of soup in front of her, the hand holding the book behind her back trembling slightly.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃嘴角的笑容僵硬，死死地盯着面前这一碗汤，背后拿着书的手微微颤抖。

0051.en: "Xiaocheng... actually, I... I'm not very hungry yet. How about we chat instead?"
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “小橙……其实我…我还不算很饿，要不我们聊聊天怎么样？”

0051.en: "Not hungry?" Chi Xiaocheng's meaningful gaze flashed and disappeared. She smiled innocently, "Tao Tao must be hungry after sleeping for so long. Come on, let's eat first. The takeout I just ordered should be delicious."
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “不饿吗？”池小橙眼神的意味深长一闪而逝，扬起单纯的笑容，“桃桃睡了那么久肯定饿的啦，好啦先吃饭啦，刚点的外卖应该很好吃。”

0051.en: Su Tao let out a long sigh when she heard this.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 苏桃闻言，长长呼了口气。

0051.en: She was so nervous that she had forgotten that the Chi Xiaocheng she knew couldn't cook.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 太紧张以至于她都忘了，自己认识的那个池小橙是不会做饭的。

0051.en: Indeed, that was a novel after all.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 也是哈，那毕竟是小说。

0051.en: It was a novel after all.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 毕竟是小说

0051.en: Secretly wiping away cold sweat, Su Tao heard Chi Xiaocheng ask again, "Tao Tao, have you regained some strength? Can you eat by yourself, or do you need me to feed you?"
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: 暗暗擦了一下冷汗，苏桃就又听到池小橙询问，“桃桃力气恢复了一点吧，可以自己吃吗，还是需要我喂？”

0051.en: "No... no need." Su Tao thought of the scene where she was fed water just now and quickly waved her hand, "I'll eat by myself."
0051.speaker: 苏桃
0051.cn: “不...不用。”苏桃想到了刚刚喂自己喝水的一幕，连忙摆手，“我自己吃就行了。”

0051.en: However, what puzzled her was that a long time seemed to have passed, yet why hadn't her strength recovered?
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 不过让她奇怪的是，时间好像已经过去很久了吧，为什么自己的力气还是没恢复？

0051.en: She was still only able to move with difficulty.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 依旧是只有能够勉强行动的程度。

0051.en: Before she could think further, Chi Xiaocheng had already pulled up a chair and sat opposite her, her hands obediently placed on her thighs, her crimson pupils looking at her expectantly.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 来不及多想，池小橙已经搬来了一张椅子，就这样坐在她的对面，双手乖巧地放在大腿，赤红色的瞳孔期待地看着她。

0051.en: As if she wanted to watch her drink the soup first, then eat.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 好似要看着她先喝汤，再吃饭。

0051.en: After such a long time, Su Tao was indeed hungry.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 过去这么久，苏桃确实也饿了。

0051.en: She could only regain her strength by eating.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 吃饱了才能恢复力气。

0051.en: Su Tao scooped up the old hen soup with green onions and carefully sniffed it.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 勺子舀起带着葱花的老母鸡汤，苏桃小心翼翼地嗅了一下。

0051.en: There was no strange smell. It was indeed like the kind from outside shops, with a lot of MSG, smelling strong.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 没其他的怪味，确实和外面店家的那种一样，放不少味精，闻起来浓。

0051.en: She blew on it a few times to cool it down.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 小嘴吹了几下热气。

0051.en: And brought it to her mouth.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 送到嘴里。

0051.en: But... the moment it entered her mouth, Su Tao's hands trembled violently.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 只是...在送进嘴里的那一瞬，苏桃双手猛地一抖。

0051.en: The spoon fell to the floor with a clinking sound.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 勺子掉到地板，发出“叮铃”的响声。

0051.en: Her terrified gaze fell upon Chi Xiaocheng. The small loli had, at some point, leaned forward slightly.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 惊恐的视线看向池小橙，眼前这只娇小的萝莉不知何时身体微微前倾。

0051.en: Her knees were pressed against her thighs, and her hands cupped her face, smiling as she looked at her.
0051.speaker: 旁白
0051.cn: 双膝抵着大腿，双手托腮就像是捂住自己的脸蛋，笑容盈盈地看着她。

0051.en: "Why aren't you eating, Tao Tao... is it not delicious?"
0051.speaker: 池小橙
0051.cn: “怎么不吃了，桃桃...是不好吃吗？”

0052.en: Chapter 52 She is a True Yandere!
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 第52章 她是真正的病娇！

0052.en: Perhaps there was a problem with her taste buds.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 兴许是味觉出现了问题。

0052.en: Or perhaps the high pressure was too terrifying.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 又或者是过于高压感到可怕。

0052.en: Even though it was a bowl of old hen soup, Su Tao found it hard to swallow.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 明明是一碗老母鸡汤，苏桃却感觉难以下咽。

0052.en: Sweet, sour, bitter, spicy, as if countless flavors were combined, coupled with Chi Xiaocheng's slightly eerie, strange smile.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 酸甜苦涩辣，仿佛无数种味道容纳在了一起，在配上池小橙那带着点点妖异的怪笑。

0052.en: Scene after scene flashed rapidly through her mind.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 脑海中一幕幕画面迅速闪过。

0052.en: In the basement, Chi Xiaocheng leaned into her ear, emphasizing that she couldn't like Ye Liang, questioning why she would abandon her.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 地下室，池小橙伏在耳边强调着她不能去喜欢叶良，质问为什么要抛弃她。

0052.en: On the rooftop, she forced herself to say she liked her, the thunder roaring in the rainy night.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 天台上，她强迫着自己去说喜欢她，雨夜雷声轰鸣。

0052.en: That obsessed face kept repeating to her—we must be together forever.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 那张痴迷的脸蛋不断地对她重复——我们要永远在一起

0052.en: Like a black and white television with a bad signal, scene after scene played and accelerated, accompanied by hoarse, grating sounds.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 仿佛信号不良的黑白电视机，脑海中的一幕幕伴随着嘶哑刺耳的声音播放、加速。

0052.en: Her heart beat faster and faster, and gradually, only the roaring after the sonic boom remained, lingering endlessly.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 心跳愈渐加快，耳边渐渐只剩下音爆后的轰鸣声，萦绕不断。

0052.en: Everything that happened seemed to be just a momentary trance.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 发生的一切，好似都只是一瞬的恍惚。

0052.en: Until Chi Xiaocheng's voice sounded, "What's wrong, Tao Tao?"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 直至池小橙的声音响起，“怎么了吗，桃桃？”

0052.en: Su Tao suddenly looked up, her lips trembling, but she still didn't say that the chicken soup tasted like a combination of chili, bitter gourd, vinegar, and many other seasonings.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃陡然抬头，嘴唇发颤，还是没把这鸡汤像是加了辣椒、苦瓜、酸醋等多种调料综合的味道说出。

0052.en: What kind of restaurant was this? The food was completely dark cuisine!
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 这到底是什么店家，做的东西完全就是黑暗料理了吧！

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head in confusion, picked up a piece of chicken with chopsticks, "It tastes fine, normal flavor."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 池小橙不解地歪了歪脑袋，拿筷子夹起一块鸡肉，“感觉没问题呀，正常的味道。”

0052.en: That's not right, could it be that my taste buds are having a problem...
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 不对吧，难道真的是我的味觉出现了问……

0052.en: Before she could recover, on that cute, doll-like face, a pair of crimson vertical pupils, completely opposite to human eyes, stared at her obsessively, her smile as eerie as ever.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她还没回神，那张可爱如洋娃娃般的面庞上，一对与人类截然相反的赤红竖瞳，正痴痴地看着她，笑容一如既往的妖异。

0052.en: "Boom—"
0052.speaker: 旁白

0052.en: Thunder roared outside the sealed window, just like that night on the rooftop.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 封闭的窗外响起惊雷，就好似天台的那个晚上。

0052.en: The crimson rainy night, whether it dispelled the darkness or dyed it even deeper.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 鲜红的雨夜，不知是驱散了黑暗，还是将黑暗染得更加浓沉。

0052.en: Xiaocheng... is a true yandere!
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 小橙她...是真正的病娇！

0052.en: Perhaps she herself didn't know, she contradicted herself, and even might have two personalities, but undoubtedly.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 或许她自己不知道，自己都自相矛盾，甚至可能有两个人格，但毫无疑问。

0052.en: From this moment on, Su Tao could confirm that Chi Xiaocheng—
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃从这一刻开始，可以确信，池小橙——

0052.en: Is a yandere!
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 就是病娇！

0052.en: Fear and dread spread from her spine throughout her body, and her breathing seemed to become difficult.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 恐惧和害怕的情绪，从脊背蔓延全身，呼吸仿佛都变得困难。

0052.en: It wasn't that her taste buds had a problem, but that Xiaocheng had a problem. She had actually become a yandere!
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 不是自己的味觉出现了问题，而是小橙出现了问题，她竟然已经病娇化了！

0052.en: In her ear, Chi Xiaocheng's disappointed voice sounded again, "Tao Tao doesn't like the takeout I ordered, does that mean she doesn't like me?"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 耳边，再次响起池小橙失望的声音，“桃桃原来不喜欢我点的外卖，那意思就是不喜欢我？”

0052.en: She turned her head in disappointment, standing up like a puppet.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她失望地转头，如木偶般站起身。

0052.en: Su Tao thought of the novel she had just read, which seemed to have a similar plot.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃想到了刚刚看的小说中，好似也有同样的情节。

0052.en: She quickly shouted, "No!"
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: 连忙大喊道，“没有！”

0052.en: "Of course I don't dislike Xiaocheng. I actually... haha, it's because the takeout is too delicious, I just liked it for a moment."
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: “我当然没有不喜欢小橙，我实际上是……哈哈是因为外卖太好吃了，一时间有些喜欢。”

0052.en: Su Tao's smile was stiff and bitter. She quickly picked up the bowl and praised Chi Xiaocheng while eating.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃笑容僵硬苦涩，迅速拿起碗，一边吃饭一边赞扬池小橙。

0052.en: There was nothing she could do. She had to say she liked Xiaocheng.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 没办法的，必须去说喜欢小橙才行。

0052.en: This was the pressure Chi Xiaocheng brought. If she didn't say she liked her, she would become a yandere.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 这就是池小橙带来的压力，如果不去说喜欢她就会变成病娇。

0052.en: It made her feel as if her throat was being squeezed little by little, making it difficult to breathe.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 莫名让人感到像是被一点点掐住脖子，难以呼吸。

0052.en: I'm just pretending to like Xiaocheng, just pretending to like her, just to humor her. There's nothing I can do, right...
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 我只是假装喜欢小橙，只是假装喜欢她，为了迎合她而已，没办法的对吧……

0052.en: Su Tao comforted herself inwardly, enduring her fear of Chi Xiaocheng, and with difficulty finished this dinner.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃如是心底安慰着自己，强忍对池小橙的恐惧，艰难地吃完了这一顿晚饭。

0052.en: She forced a smile, "Thank you, Xiaocheng."
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: 笑容挤出，“谢谢小橙。”

0052.en: But this smile was extremely forced. Rather than a smile, it was more like Su Tao forcefully changing her facial muscles to appease this little one who seemed to have lost her mind.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 只是这笑容牵强无比，与其说是笑容，更不如说是苏桃硬生生地强迫自己改变面部肌肉，来安抚眼前这个似乎已经失去理智了的小家伙。

0052.en: As Su Tao said this, Chi Xiaocheng "indeed" returned from that strange state.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃这样一说，池小橙“果然”从那奇怪的状态回归。

0052.en: Smiling brightly, extremely cute, "Mm, as long as Tao Tao likes it~"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 笑意盎然，可爱至极，“嗯，桃桃喜欢就好~”

0052.en: Her strange vertical pupils returned to normal, and the crimson in her eyes gradually faded.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 奇异的竖瞳又恢复了正常人那般，眼中的猩红都渐渐淡去。

0052.en: Su Tao felt very uncomfortable eating this entire takeout meal, as if it wasn't normal human food at all, with no normal taste.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 这一整顿外卖，苏桃吃得都感觉非常难受，仿佛这就不是正常人的食物，一点正常的味道都没有。

0052.en: After eating half, Su Tao felt it was hard to swallow, and quickly pushed the rest away.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 吃一半，苏桃就感觉难以下咽了，连忙将剩下的推了出去。

0052.en: "Actually, I'm not very hungry. This is enough. By the way, how long have I been asleep?"
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: “其实不是很饿的，吃这些够了，说起来我睡着多久了？”

0052.en: She quickly changed the subject, feeling her taste buds protesting.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她连忙转移话题，感觉味蕾在发出抗议。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng just picked up the bowl and shook her head slightly, "I don't know how long it's been, Tao Tao. Since you're full, I'll come back in an hour~"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 池小橙只是将碗端了起来，浅浅摇头，“过去多久我也不知道哦，既然桃桃吃饱了，那我一个小时后再过来吧~”

0052.en: After saying that, she didn't give Su Tao a chance to ask further and happily walked out the door.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 说完，也不给苏桃继续询问的机会，开心地往门外走去。

0052.en: Until the moment the door closed.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 直至房门关上的那一瞬。

0052.en: Su Tao suddenly grabbed the corner of the nearby table, half-bent over, looking down at the ground, one hand clutching her heart, gasping for breath.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃才猛地抓住了旁边桌子的一角，半躬身子，低头看向地面，一手攥紧心脏，大口大口地喘息着。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng's pressure was too great.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 池小橙给的压力太大了。

0052.en: The takeout from the restaurant was also dark cuisine.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 店家的外卖也是黑暗料理。

0052.en: Even when she was a child, picking up trash to eat alone, she had never felt so uncomfortable eating a meal.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 就算是小时候，她孤苦一人去捡垃圾吃，也没有这顿饭吃得那么难受。

0052.en: Su Tao had a headache, and what she couldn't understand even more was, what was Chi Xiaocheng's purpose in keeping her in this room?
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃有些头疼，更想不明白的是，池小橙将自己安置在这个屋子中，目的到底是什么？

0052.en: She didn't know, and didn't dare to look at that novel. After hiding it under the pillow, she lay weakly on the bed, her eyes lost in thought.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她不清楚，又不敢去看那本小说，藏在枕头下后，便无力地躺在床上，双眼出神。

0052.en: Six hours of rest had greatly relieved her body.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 长达6小时的休息让她的身体很好地得到缓解。

0052.en: But now, the mental impact was far greater than the physical.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 只是现在，精神上的冲击远比身体上的要高。

0052.en: "One hour..." Su Tao murmured, "Later, if Xiaocheng's emotions are stable, should I ask again?"
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: “一小时......”苏桃嘴里呢喃，“一会儿，如果小橙情绪稳定，再问一下吧？”

0052.en: She silently counted the time in her heart, but when she felt about 15 minutes had passed, the door opened.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她心里默默算着时间，然而在她感觉隐隐过去15分钟的时候，门开了。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng struggled to carry a bucket of water, swaying as she walked in.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 池小橙吃力地提着一桶水，摇摇晃晃地走了进来。

0052.en: "Tao Tao, it's time to take a bath."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “桃桃，该洗澡了哦。”

0052.en: Towel, shampoo, body wash, change of clothes.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 毛巾，洗发水、沐浴乳、换洗的衣服

0052.en: Everything was ready.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 一应俱全。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng placed all the accompanying items on the floor and smiled gently at Su Tao, "Sorry, the bathroom is broken, so you'll have to manage in the room. It's okay if the floor gets wet, I'll clean it up later."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 池小橙将配套的东西都放在了地上，对苏桃轻轻一笑，“抱歉哦卫生间坏了，就麻烦你在房间解决啦，地板湿了也没关系哦，我一会儿会打扫的啦。”

0052.en: Su Tao's smile stiffened once more.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 苏桃笑容再一度僵住了。

0052.en: She could already confirm that Chi Xiaocheng just wanted to keep her here.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 她已经可以确信，池小橙就是想将自己一直安置在这里。

0052.en: Strength...
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 力气

0052.en: Still couldn't be mustered.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 还是使不上。

0052.en: Did an hour pass so quickly?
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 一小时这么快就过去了吗？

0052.en: Why hadn't she regained her strength after so long?
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 为什么过去那么久了，还是没能恢复力气？

0052.en: It seemed that seeing Su Tao not moving, Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head blankly, then suddenly thought of something, and her face immediately turned red.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 似乎是见苏桃没有行动，池小橙又呆呆地歪了一下脑袋，旋即想到了什么，脸立刻红了起来。

0052.en: She glanced away, saying shyly, "D-do you... do you want me to help you bathe, Tao Tao? This... isn't this too fast? Oh, I'm so shy..."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 视线瞥到一边，害羞地说道，“难...难道，桃桃是想让我帮你洗澡吗，这...这会不会太快了，哎呀好害羞......”

0052.en: "No... no need, I'll do it myself."
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: “不...不用了，我自己来就行。”

0052.en: Someone else bathing her, and in such an open, almost empty room, the intense shame even overshadowed the uneasiness in Su Tao's heart.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 别人给自己洗澡，还是在这样开阔、几乎空无一物的房间，强烈的羞耻感甚至压过了苏桃心中的一抹不安。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng placed her index finger on her lips and smiled mysteriously, "Then I'll come back later, in... half an hour."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: 池小橙食指抵在唇边，神秘一笑，“那我一会儿再来哦，时间是...半个小时。”

0052.en: "Wait, Xiaocheng!"
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: “等一下小橙！”

0052.en: Su Tao called out to Chi Xiaocheng, "After you've showered, can we... can we talk properly?"
0052.speaker: 苏桃
0052.cn: 苏桃叫住了池小橙，“一会儿洗完澡，我们...我们能好好聊聊吗？”

0052.en: "Okay!"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “好呀！”

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng responded and slowly walked out the door.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 池小橙应了一声，缓缓出了门外。

0052.en: Looking at the drizzling sky, she happily walked towards the sofa.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 看着小雨淅沥沥的天空，心情美好地迈步走向沙发。

0052.en: [Host, you actually gave up such a good opportunity. You're not villainous enough.]
0052.speaker: 系统
0052.cn: 【宿主，这么好的机会你居然会放弃，一点都不够反派】

0052.en: "You don't understand, System. Su Tao is currently at a stage where, since we're both girls, it's not a big deal anyway. Even if I said I'd help her bathe, she would only overthink things related to my yandere tendencies."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “统子你不懂，现在苏桃处于一个，同为女孩子反正也没什么的阶段，就算说我帮她洗澡，她也只会在那里胡思乱想些和我病娇有关的事情。”

0052.en: "Physical contact like that needs to wait until she becomes curious about me."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “身体接触这样的事情啊，需要等她对我产生好奇。”

0052.en: "Only when she blushes at the thought of 'why is Xiaocheng so special, even though we're both girls?' is what you call a good opportunity."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “有了‘同样是女孩子，为什么小橙的会那么特别呢’的想法而会脸红后，才是你所谓的好机会。”

0052.en: "Such things cannot be allowed for Tao Tao to adapt to in advance."
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “这样的事情，可不能让桃桃提前适应呢。”

0052.en: "After all, I need her to realize that I, as a girl, am also unique!"
0052.speaker: 池小橙
0052.cn: “毕竟要让她意识到，我作为女孩子，也是独一无二的！”

0052.en: That glass of water today, she must have realized my softness, right?
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 今天的一杯水，想必她已经意识到我的柔软了吧。

0052.en: Chi Xiaocheng took out an item she got from the system's gacha.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 池小橙拿出了从系统抽奖得到的物品。

0052.en: Delicate Soft Candy: Consuming it can make skin more delicate.
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 细腻软糖：服用可以让皮肤更加细腻。

0052.en: So next, how about something more profound?
0052.speaker: 旁白
0052.cn: 那么接下来，更深刻点如何？

0053.en: Chapter 53 You Must Receive Treatment Properly~
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 第53章 要好好接受治疗才行呢~

0053.en: Ever since she drew this soft candy that could make her skin more delicate, Chi Xiaocheng hadn't eaten it.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 自从抽到这颗能让皮肤变得更细腻的软糖，池小橙一直都没有吃。

0053.en: She wanted to save it for Su Tao, at a certain point in time, to make her even more perfect.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 想留给苏桃，在某一个时间点，让她能够更加完美。

0053.en: "Plans can't keep up with changes."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “计划赶不上变化啊。”

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng threw the candy into her mouth, then picked up a mirror from the counter.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 池小橙将糖扔进了嘴里，然后从柜台桌面拿起一个镜子。

0053.en: The change was instantaneous. Under the warm light, her skin seemed to glow even more.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 变化是在一瞬间的，暖洋洋的灯光映衬下，肌肤好像更有光泽了。

0053.en: She reached out and touched her arm.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 伸手触碰了一下手臂。

0053.en: Silky, tender, fair, delicate.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 丝滑、嫩软、白皙、细腻。

0053.en: Any photo she took would probably be mistaken for having a beauty filter.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 随便拍个照片恐怕都会被人认为是开了美颜。

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng then reached out and touched her lips. She felt no change from the sensation on her fingertips.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 池小橙又伸手点向了自己的唇，从指尖传来的触感她觉得好像没什么变化。

0053.en: "But all of this, let Tao Tao experience it~"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “不过这一切，都让桃桃来体验吧~”

0053.en: "To make you like me more, I'm willing to become more perfect."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “为了你更喜欢我，我愿意变得更完美。”

0053.en: The eerie glow in Chi Xiaocheng's pupils flashed and disappeared. She looked down at the time; only five minutes had passed.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 池小橙瞳孔中的妖异一闪而逝，低头看了眼时间，现在才过去五分钟。

0053.en: [Host, isn't there a guest room next door with a private bathroom? Wouldn't that room be better? Now it's troublesome for the female lead Su Tao to take a bath, and it's troublesome for you too. Isn't this putting the cart before the horse?]
0053.speaker: 系统
0053.cn: 【宿主，隔壁客房有一间是带独卫的吧，那间房间不是更好吗，现在这样女主苏桃洗澡都很麻烦吧，对你来说也麻烦，是不是本末倒置了？】

0053.en: "A private bathroom won't do." Since Chi Xiaocheng was doing this, she naturally had her own plans.
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “独卫不行的。”池小橙既然做，当然早就有自己的打算。

0053.en: So she patiently explained to the system, "In my plan, Tao Tao can't be allowed to touch water I haven't touched alone. And although my room has been cleaned, the layout hasn't changed, which can perfectly evoke her beautiful memories."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 于是耐心给系统解释，“在我的计划中，可不能让桃桃她独自接触我没碰过的水，而且我的房间虽然清理过了，但布局没改，可以很好地勾起她曾经的那美好回忆。”

0053.en: "The process of learning is the growth of knowledge. I've transformed from a clumsy idiot who scored zero to an extremist who scores sixty. Only when she realizes I can no longer be a clumsy idiot will she accept my current growth."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “学习的过程就是知识的增长，我从以前那个考零分的笨蛋变成现在考六十分的极端人士，当她发现我再也不能变成笨蛋后，才会接受我现在的成长。”

0053.en: "When she is willing to actively teach me, the plan will be half successful."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “什么时候她愿意主动教我学习，计划就算成功了一半。”

0053.en: [This... is this only half?]
0053.speaker: 系统
0053.cn: 【这...这才一半吗？】

0053.en: "Otherwise?" Chi Xiaocheng's eyes were deep, and her tone was excited, "I love her wholeheartedly, and she should love me wholeheartedly too!"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “不然呢？”池小橙目光幽深，语气兴奋，“我爱得她死心塌地，她也应该爱我死心塌地啊！”

0053.en: With that, Chi Xiaocheng looked at the time again.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 说罢，池小橙又看了眼时间。

0053.en: Fifteen minutes had passed.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 过去15分钟了。

0053.en: Half an hour was given for bathing.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 洗澡给的时间是半小时。

0053.en: She got up and walked over to knock on the door, "Tao Tao, half an hour is up. I'm coming in~"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 她起身，走过去敲了敲门，“桃桃，半小时到了哦，我进来了哦~”

0053.en: "Wait!"
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: “等一下！”

0053.en: Through the crack in the door, she could hear the rustling sound of clothes being put on.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 就着门缝，耳边能听到窸窸窣窣的穿衣声。

0053.en: After a while, a hesitant voice came from inside, "O-okay..."
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: 又过了一会儿，里面才响起纠结的声音，“可...可以了。”

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved upwards as she opened the door.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 池小橙唇角上扬，将门打开。

0053.en: Seeing Su Tao wearing a bear T-shirt, she couldn't help but smile foolishly with happiness, "We're wearing matching clothes, like a couple's outfit~"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 见到苏桃身上穿的小熊T恤，不由露出幸福的傻笑，“咱们穿在一起，就像是情侣装呢~”

0053.en: Su Tao's smile gradually faded when she heard this.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃闻言，笑容渐渐收敛。

0053.en: This was a shirt she found in the closet. They used to live together, so she left three sets of clothes here.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 这是她在衣柜翻到的衣服，曾经二人同居常住，她便留了三套衣服在这里。

0053.en: She bought it with Chi Xiaocheng back then.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 那还是当初和池小橙一起买的。

0053.en: The same style, the same color, bought in pairs. It was originally a testament to their good relationship, but at this moment, it was misunderstood as a couple's outfit.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 同款、同色，一买就是两件，原本是她们关系好的证明，却在此刻被误会成了情侣装。

0053.en: Was this a boomerang from the past hitting her?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 这算曾经的回旋镖打到自己么？

0053.en: While she was lost in thought, Chi Xiaocheng had already finished cleaning the floor with a mop. After returning, she sat in front of Su Tao, smiling, "So, Tao Tao, what do you want to talk about?"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 胡思乱想的时间，池小橙已经拿着拖把将地板处理完毕，再度回来后，才坐到苏桃面前，笑吟吟地看着她，“那么桃桃，你想聊什么呢？”

0053.en: Su Tao suppressed her thoughts and looked at her, sitting upright, "Xiaocheng, why... why are you doing this?"
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: 苏桃压下心里的想法，正襟危坐地看着她，“小橙，你...你为什么要这样做？”

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head in confusion, "Why am I like this... Because Tao Tao is sick, and I'm taking care of Tao Tao."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 池小橙疑惑地歪头，“为什么这样的......因为桃桃生病了，我在照顾桃桃呀。”

0053.en: "I'm not sick!" Su Tao emphasized, "You're the one who's sick, Xiaocheng. Besides, if you keep me here to take care of me, people outside will look for me. It's easy for something to go wrong. You should let me out."
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: “我没病！”苏桃咬重了字眼，“病的是小橙你，况且你把我安置在这里照顾，外面也会有人找我的，这样很容易出事，你还是让我出去吧。”

0053.en: "It's okay." Chi Xiaocheng shook her head indifferently, "As long as I can be with Tao Tao, it doesn't matter. Even if Ye Liang comes looking..."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “没关系的。”池小橙一点都不在意地摇头，“只要能和桃桃你在一起，怎么都没关系，就算叶良找来......”

0053.en: Suddenly, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes glowed red, "At worst, I'll die with him!"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 霎时，池小橙眼睛绽放红芒，“大不了我跟他同归于尽！”

0053.en: After saying that, she looked at Su Tao obsessively, "Tao Tao, don't worry, I will never let him hurt you~"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 说罢，又痴迷地看着苏桃，“桃桃，你放心，我绝对不会让他伤害你的~”

0053.en: The one who will be hurt is you!
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 会被伤害的人，是你啊！

0053.en: Su Tao was anxious, but she also understood that even if Chi Xiaocheng could communicate, it was limited to ordinary topics.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃心中着急，但也明白了，池小橙即便能够沟通，也仅限于普通的话题。

0053.en: Once she mentioned herself, or Ye Liang and others, she would become paranoid, and nothing she said would be useful.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 一旦提到自己，提到叶良等人，她就会变得偏执，说什么都没用。

0053.en: Su Tao was a little anxious, "Then if I'm sick and you're taking care of me, how can I get well and be discharged?"
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: 苏桃有些焦急，“那我生病被你照顾，我怎么样才能病好，才能出院？”、

0053.en: "Tao Tao has a heart problem, it needs to be treated." Chi Xiaocheng's smile didn't fade, "Naturally, when Tao Tao falls in love with me, she can be discharged!"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “桃桃是心病，得治。”池小橙笑容不减，“自然是桃桃什么时候喜欢上我，就能出院了呀！”

0053.en: "Tao Tao has a good impression of Ye Liang now, right?"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “现在的桃桃对叶良有好感对吧？”

0053.en: "No."
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “不行呢。”

0053.en: "Tao Tao doesn't like me at all now, right?"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “现在桃桃根本不喜欢我对吧？”

0053.en: "There's nothing I can do. Tao Tao used to like me so much, but now she says she has a good impression of Ye Liang. She's very sick~"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “没办法呢，桃桃以前那么喜欢我，现在就说对叶良有好感，病得很重呢~”

0053.en: "Tao Tao!" Chi Xiaocheng's tone gradually became pathological, revealing her aggressive yet cute little fangs, "You can only like me!"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “桃桃！”池小橙语气逐渐病态，露出满是攻击性的可爱小虎牙，“你只能喜欢我一个人！”

0053.en: "Oh, I seem to be excited again." Chi Xiaocheng seemed to realize something, returning to normal, her bared fangs transforming from aggressive to subtly cute.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: “哎呀，好像又激动了呢。”池小橙好似意识到了什么，恢复正常，展露的小虎牙从攻击变成了含蓄的可爱。

0053.en: Su Tao saw all of this, and her heart felt very uncomfortable.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃将这一切都看在眼里，心里很不是滋味。

0053.en: She was truly a yandere.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 她是真的病娇。

0053.en: Communication... completely ineffective.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 沟通......完全无效。

0053.en: A feeling of helplessness surged through her. Su Tao looked up, but her peripheral vision caught Chi Xiaocheng's cute little face.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 无助的感觉涌上心头，苏桃抬着头，视线余光却瞥向池小橙的可爱的小脸。

0053.en: How long has she been here?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 在这里被安置多久了呢？

0053.en: How long has she slept?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 又睡了多久？

0053.en: Based on her fatigue when she woke up, it should have been two days, right?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 按照起床时的疲惫来算，应该是有两天了吧？

0053.en: What about outside? Have the three people who know the inside story—Doctor Cheng, Qianqian, and Si Chen—already come looking for her through their own channels?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 外面又怎么样了，成医生、倩倩、司辰，知道内情的三人是不是已经通过自己的渠道来找自己了呢？

0053.en: At this point, there was only one thing to do!
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 为今之计，只有一个！

0053.en: Su Tao clenched her fists.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃攥紧了拳头。

0053.en: She still hadn't regained much strength, but subduing the weak little Xiaocheng should be possible.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 依旧没恢复什么力气，但只是制服柔弱的小橙，应该有机会。

0053.en: Su Tao secretly scrutinized the completely harmless Chi Xiaocheng. Her arms were delicate and fair, looking like they had no strength.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃暗暗审视了一下完全人畜无害的池小橙，那手臂细嫩白皙，看着没什么力气。

0053.en: She could try.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 可以一试。

0053.en: But—
0053.speaker: 旁白

0053.en: Failure would further provoke Xiaocheng!
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 失败的话一定会进一步刺激小橙！

0053.en: Su Tao's eyes slowly became firm.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 苏桃眼神慢慢变得坚定。

0053.en: Will she win?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 会赢吗？

0053.en: In a flash, Su Tao suddenly attacked, her hand grabbing towards Chi Xiaocheng's shoulder!
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 迅雷耳目间，苏桃猛地出手，手掌陡然向池小橙的肩膀擒去！

0053.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng just tilted her head and easily caught Su Tao's hand.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 然而，池小橙只是歪了一下脑袋，轻松将苏桃的手给抓住。

0053.en: She pushed back, effortlessly pressing Su Tao onto the bed.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 往后一推，顺势将苏桃压在了床上。

0053.en: She was bound to lose.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 包输的。

0053.en: Her disheveled hair scattered, Su Tao's eyes filled with shock.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 絮乱的秀发散落，苏桃眼神满是惊愕。

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng's smile seemed to have everything under control, "Tao Tao is really disobedient. Didn't I tell you? I've tried it. This little thing can help you regulate your body very well. Why are you still trying to be rough when you're sick?"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: 池小橙的笑容仿佛一切尽在掌握，“桃桃真是不乖呢，我不是说过了吗，我试过了，这个小东西可以很好地帮你调节身体呢，生病怎么还想动粗呢？”

0053.en: Her expression gradually froze.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 表情渐渐凝固。

0053.en: Her head stiffly tilted to the side, her eyes staring at the table in horror.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 脑袋僵硬地歪到一边，视线惊恐地看着桌面。

0053.en: Su Tao: "That incense burner..."
0053.speaker: 苏桃
0053.cn: 苏桃：“那个香炉......”

0053.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled, everything unspoken.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 池小橙笑了笑，一切尽在不言中。

0053.en: "How does a doctor treat a disobedient patient?"
0053.speaker: 池小橙
0053.cn: “病人不听话，医生会怎么对待？”

0053.en: A clear tear slowly flowed from Su Tao's eye.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 一行清泪，缓缓从苏桃眼角流下。

0053.en: Although she resisted immensely in her heart, Su Tao herself didn't notice that the human body is miraculous precisely because it cannot be fully controlled.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 纵使心里抗拒无比，但苏桃自己都没注意到，人的身体之所以奇妙，就是因为无法全然控制。

0053.en: Her breathing and heartbeat gradually accelerated.
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 她的呼吸与心跳，渐渐加速。

0053.en: Ps: Please give me gifts, free ones are also fine
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: Ps：求求礼物呀，免费的也可以

0053.en: How about a bonus chapter rule? Grandmaster certification +1 bonus chapter, and the number of bonus chapters increases with the value of gifts, with no upper limit?
0053.speaker: 旁白
0053.cn: 补个加更规则怎么样，大神认证加+1更，往上的礼物价值递增加更的数量，不设上限？

0054.en: Chapter 54 Repeated Despair
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 第54章 不断重复的绝望

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Tao Tao, time to eat!"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙：“桃桃，吃饭啦！”

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "You're sick and weak now. How about some soup?"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙：“你现在生病了身体虚弱，喝点汤怎么样？”

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Are you thirsty? Do you want water? Do you need me to feed you?"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙：“口渴了吗，要喝水吗，需要我喂吗？”

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Or do you want something else to drink?"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙：“还是说你想喝其他的？”

0054.en: Perhaps there was a problem with her taste buds, as all the food tasted strange.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 或许是她的味觉出现了问题，所有的食物味道都怪异了起来。

0054.en: Su Tao's eyes were a little vacant, and she didn't know how much time had passed. Sometimes she felt time passed quickly, and sometimes it was an unbearable torment.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 苏桃眼神有些空洞，更不知道时间过去了多久，有的时候觉得时间好像过得很快，有时候又煎熬无比。

0054.en: Every time she faced Chi Xiaocheng's pathological and strange side, it reminded her of the basement and rooftop scenes.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 每次面对池小橙那病态怪异的一面，都会让她想到地下室与天台的一幕。

0054.en: Feeling lost and helpless.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 感到彷徨无措。

0054.en: She was even more unable to figure out how to cure Chi Xiaocheng's yandere tendencies.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 更加无法思考到底要怎样才能治好池小橙的病娇。

0054.en: Mental exhaustion was, after all, a heavier burden than physical exhaustion.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 精神上的疲惫，终究是比身体上的沉重负荷。

0054.en: With a "creak," Chi Xiaocheng opened the door and walked in again.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: “吱呀”一声，池小橙又开门走了进来。

0054.en: Su Tao didn't know how much time had passed, so she asked, "Xiaocheng, what time is it now?"
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 苏桃不知道过了多久，便询问道，“小橙，现在什么时候了？”

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng blinked, "I don't know, but Tao Tao, your complexion is very bad. Did you rest well?"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙眨了眨眼睛，“不清楚欸，不过桃桃你的脸色很差哦，有好好休息吗？”

0054.en: The question was avoided.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 问题被回避了。

0054.en: It was indeed like this.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 果然也是这样啊。

0054.en: Su Tao smiled self-deprecatingly, as if giving up resistance, and lay down on the bed resignedly, "How much longer will this last, Xiaocheng?"
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 苏桃自嘲地笑了笑，好似放弃反抗一样，认命地躺在了床上，“这样还要多久呢，小橙？”

0054.en: "Until you fall in love with me~"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “直到你喜欢上我为止~”

0054.en: This answer, this conversation, had happened countless times.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 这样的回答，这样的对话，不知道多少次了。

0054.en: Saying that, she climbed onto the bed.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 说着，便爬上了床。

0054.en: Su Tao looked at Chi Xiaocheng strangely, "What are you going to do this time?"
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 苏桃奇怪地看了眼池小橙，“这次要做什么？”

0054.en: Every time Chi Xiaocheng came in, she had some purpose, but this time she came empty-handed and did nothing.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 每次池小橙进来，都带着某些目的，这次却空着手，什么都没做。

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao's tired and spiritless eyes and said expectantly, "This time, I'm also treating you, Tao Tao. When you accept me and like me, the treatment will stop."
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙看了眼苏桃疲惫又没有精神的双眼，期待地说道，“这次也是治疗桃桃你呀，等你什么时候接受我了，喜欢我了，治疗才会停哦。”

0054.en: Saying that, she took out a sleeping eye mask from her pocket.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 说着，从口袋拿出一个休息用的眼罩。

0054.en: She also took out a pair of earplugs that would prevent external disturbances, also for resting.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 又拿出一对让人能够不受外界影响，同样是休息用的耳塞。

0054.en: Suddenly, the world became quiet.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 世界一刹那安静了下来。

0054.en: The bright light turned off, and the dazzling light in the darkness also disappeared without a trace.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 明亮的灯一关，黑暗中会有的一抹刺眼光影也消失得无影无踪。

0054.en: Only a faint figure could be seen.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 依稀只能见到有个人影。

0054.en: Unable to see, unable to hear.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 目不能视，耳不能闻。

0054.en: Su Tao could even hear her own heartbeat.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 苏桃甚至能够听到自己的心跳声。

0054.en: The oppressive heavy breathing was also felt more clearly than usual.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 压抑无比的沉重呼吸，感受得也比往常更加清楚。

0054.en: Su Tao lay on the sickbed, weak and frail, unable to do anything.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 苏桃躺在病床，生病的她虚弱无比，什么都做不了。

0054.en: Time passed bit by bit. Su Tao's heart beat faster and faster, her nerves taut.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 时间一点一滴地流逝，苏桃心跳也愈渐加快，精神紧绷。

0054.en: "Ugh—"
0054.speaker: 苏桃

0054.en: A signal came from Chi Xiaocheng.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 来自池小橙的信号传来。

0054.en: Unable to adapt, unwilling to bear.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 无法习惯，不想承受。

0054.en: Once... once... once... and again
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 一次...一次...一次...又一次

0054.en: She was cared for as a patient.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 她作为病人，被照顾着。

0054.en: Hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate, hate!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌讨厌！

0054.en: Why do this, why do this, why do this, why do this, why do this, why do this, why do this!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 为什么要这样做为什么要这样做为什么要这样做为什么要这样做为什么要这样做为什么要这样做为什么要这样做！

0054.en: Xiaocheng, what are we, what are we, what are we, what are we, what are we, what are we!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 小橙，我们到底是什么我们到底是什么我们到底是什么我们到底是什么我们到底是什么我们到底是什么！

0054.en: Friends, sisters, best friends, friends, sisters, best friends, friends, sisters, best friends!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜朋友姐妹闺蜜！

0054.en: "I like you~"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “我喜欢你哦~”

0054.en: Suddenly, the earplugs were removed, and a confession filled with deep affection came from her ear.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 忽然，耳塞被摘了下来，耳边传来饱含浓浓爱意的表白。

0054.en: "Tao Tao, I like you~"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “桃桃，我喜欢你呢~”

0054.en: Again? Just like before.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 又来了吗，和刚刚一样

0054.en: Su Tao's face became increasingly haggard, and her complexion worsened.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 苏桃面容变得愈发憔悴，脸色也更差了。

0054.en: The light turned on.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 灯开了。

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng stood aside, her smile undiminished.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 池小橙站在一边，笑意不减。

0054.en: It was still a little lacking.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 果然还是差点意思啊。

0054.en: One day had passed. She used her skills to change the taste of all the food Su Tao could access, and the result was this.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 时间已经过去一天了，她利用技能将苏桃能接触到的所有食物，全部换了口味，而结果就是现在这样。

0054.en: The continuous high pressure and psychological impact finally caused her to have a huge reaction.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 持续的高压和心理影响，终于是让她产生了巨大反应。

0054.en: Words of concern came from Chi Xiaocheng's mouth, and she gently patted Su Tao's back, actively taking the broom and mop to clean up.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 关心的话语从池小橙嘴里说出，又温柔地拍着苏桃后背，主动拿扫把拖把处理。

0054.en: Like a gentle, caring wife.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 就像是顾家的温柔小娇妻。

0054.en: Su Tao took all this in, her expression complex.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 苏桃将这一幕都收在眼里，神色复杂。

0054.en: After finishing, Chi Xiaocheng thoughtfully brought toiletries.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 等处理完，池小橙又贴心地拿来了洗漱用品。

0054.en: Everything was done, and she left without saying a word.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 一切完毕，也不说话，就这样出了门。

0054.en: Leaving her alone in the room again.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 将她再度安置在这房间中。

0054.en: Alone.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 独自一人。

0054.en: After leaving the room, Chi Xiaocheng stretched.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 出了门，池小橙才伸了个懒腰。

0054.en: The sky outside was incredibly dark. The rain, which had lasted for a day and a night, finally stopped.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 外面的天空昏暗无比，持续了一天一夜的雨终于停了。

0054.en: Excluding the first night, this was the first night of Su Tao's three-day leave.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 不算一开始的那个晚上，此时是苏桃请假三天中的第一个夜晚。

0054.en: "From her perspective, at least two or three days have passed, right?"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “在她视角中，最起码过去两三天了吧？”

0054.en: "But the plan is going smoothly, and there's no one in the way."
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “不过计划还算顺利，碍事的人也没有。”

0054.en: In her interpersonal relationships, after a day, everyone was fine except for Si Chen, who asked a few more questions.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 在她的人际关系处理中，一天下来，除了司辰会多问几句，其他人都相安无事。

0054.en: Chen Qian was an even more perfect double agent, blocking a large number of classmates and friends who came to look for Su Tao.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 陈倩更是完美的二五仔，挡住了一大堆来找苏桃的同学朋友。

0054.en: But because of this, Chi Xiaocheng hadn't slept for almost a day and a night.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 但也因为这个，池小橙也快一天一夜没睡了。

0054.en: She finally confirmed Su Tao's condition, ate the last sleep chocolate, and fell into a deep sleep.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 她最后确认了一下苏桃的状态，吃了最后一枚睡眠巧克力，沉沉睡去。

0054.en: Six hours passed in the blink of an eye for her.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 6小时的时间在她这里一眨眼就过去了。

0054.en: But for Su Tao, it felt like years.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 可于苏桃而言，度日如年。

0054.en: She realized that Chi Xiaocheng hadn't come for so long, it might be night, but she couldn't fall asleep no matter what.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 她意识到池小橙这么久没来，可能是晚上了，但她却怎么也睡不着。

0054.en: Her body was tired, her mind exhausted.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 身体很累，精神很疲惫。

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng left her a piece of bread, but when she bit into it, Su Tao still found it incredibly dry and hard to swallow.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 池小橙给她留了一份面包，可咬下去时，苏桃依旧觉得干涩无比，难以下咽。

0054.en: Why!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 为什么！

0054.en: Why is it like this!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 为什么会这个样子！

0054.en: No matter what it is, everything tastes like a mixture of countless flavors, like the most unpalatable thing in the world. Has my sense of taste gone wrong?!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 不管什么东西，味道都像是无数种味道的混合，仿佛世界上最难吃的东西，难道自己的味觉已经出现问题了吗！

0054.en: Fatigue surged through her, and she finally couldn't bear it, falling into a daze with the lights on.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 疲惫涌上心头，最终没熬住，亮着灯光昏昏沉沉睡去。

0054.en: But she felt like she had only slept for a short while when the door opened again.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 可是她感觉睡了才没一会儿，房门又开了。

0054.en: "Tao Tao, time to get up~"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “桃桃，该起床了哦~”

0054.en: Outside, it was two in the morning.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 外面的时间，是凌晨两点。

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked into the room with toiletries and a bucket of bath water.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 池小橙拿着洗漱的用具和一桶洗澡水走进房间。

0054.en: After waking Su Tao, she went out again.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 叫醒苏桃后，又出去。

0054.en: The pressure from the environment was already sufficient. There was no need for extra words; she would overthink things on her own.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 如今环境给的压力已经很足了，完全不需要多余的话语，她自己就会去多想。

0054.en: And Su Tao, seeing this bucket of bath water, felt as if she had seen a lifeline.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 而苏桃，看到这一桶洗澡水，却像是看到了救命稻草。

0054.en: Her tired, dull eyes lit up.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 沉寂疲惫的眸子，亮起了光。

0054.en: No matter what food it was, it tasted strange and hard to swallow. This bath water wasn't food, so it must be...
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 无论什么食物都味道古怪难以下咽，这洗澡水不是食物，对这一定

0054.en: She climbed out of bed and quickly knelt before the bucket, scooping up a ladle of water with both hands.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 她从床上爬下，赶忙跪到水桶前，双手捧起一瓢水。

0054.en: "Gulp~"
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: “咕噜~”

0054.en: Water droplets slid from her cheeks down her chin, then gradually flowed to her neck.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 水珠从脸颊滑落下巴，又渐渐淌到脖颈。

0054.en: Silence, despair.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 寂静、绝望。

0054.en: The bath water, too...
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 洗澡水，也一样……

0054.en: Time continued to pass.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 时间继续流逝。

0054.en: Another new cycle.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 又是新的轮回。

0054.en: Eating, drinking water, eating fruit, small cakes with cream.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 吃饭、喝水、吃水果、带奶油的小蛋糕

0054.en: Ahhhhhhh!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

0054.en: Everything in the world was incredibly unpalatable. Why did such food have a mixture of sour, sweet, bitter, spicy, and salty flavors at the same time?!
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 世界上所有的东西都无比难吃，为什么那样的食物会同时带有酸甜苦辣咸的味道混合啊！

0054.en: The pressure exploded, but Su Tao didn't explode with virtue. She only felt like she was going crazy.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 压力拉爆，苏桃没有爆美德，她只感觉自己都快要疯了。

0054.en: Eating and vomiting, vomiting and eating.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 吃了吐，吐了吃。

0054.en: The gnawing pain of an empty stomach was even harder to bear.
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 空腹的绞痛更是难以忍耐。

0054.en: This is... a yandere!
0054.speaker: 旁白
0054.cn: 这就是......病娇！

0054.en: Finally, she couldn't take it anymore. When Chi Xiaocheng brought food again, she grabbed her sleeve and almost pleaded, "Xiaocheng... is there anything else that tastes different? Please... please..."
0054.speaker: 苏桃
0054.cn: 终于，她忍不住了，在池小橙又一次送食物来的时候，抓着她的袖子近乎哀求着说道，“小橙...有其他味道的东西吗，求...求你了......”

0054.en: "Yes!"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: “有呀！”

0054.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao with a smile, her slender index finger pointing to her pink lips, and whispered, "Didn't Tao Tao notice? This... tastes different~"
0054.speaker: 池小橙
0054.cn: 池小橙笑眯眯地看着苏桃，纤细的食指点在了自己的粉唇，悄声问道，“难道桃桃没注意到吗，这个...是其他味道的哦~”

0055.en: Chapter 55 The Love of a Yandere, Unique (Bonus for Kira)
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 第55章 病娇的爱，独一无二（为kira加更）

0055.en: Humans have limits.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 人是有极限的。

0055.en: The more suppressed, the harder it is to think.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 越是压抑，就越是难以思考。

0055.en: Just like a drowning person, once they touch that straw, they will cling to it desperately. Even if they cannot surface, they will hold onto that last hope and drag the straw into the water.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 就如落水的人，一旦触碰到那一根稻草，就会死死地抓住，即便无法浮出水面，也会抱着最后的希望，去将这根稻草拽入水里。

0055.en: It took almost two days to set up such an environment. The straw Chi Xiaocheng left was naturally something that could completely change Su Tao's perception and make her obsessed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 花了差不多两天的时间设下这样的环境，池小橙所留的稻草，自然是能让苏桃对彻底改观并迷恋的东西。

0055.en: Girls are such creatures.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 女孩子就是这样的生物。

0055.en: Thin, delicate, soft, sweet, like the most beautiful product in the world, incredibly alluring.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 纤薄，粉嫩，柔软，甜美，好似世界上最美好的产物，诱人无比。

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng's previous punishments were not few.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 此前池小橙的惩罚并不少。

0055.en: But Su Tao resisted wholeheartedly, her mind completely elsewhere.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 但苏桃一心抗拒，心思完全不在这方面上。

0055.en: Confusion, disgust. Even if the touch was pleasant, Su Tao's subconscious would block this feeling. Her heart was like an iron door, completely sealed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 不解、厌恶，即便触感很好，苏桃潜意识也会将这一份感受给封锁，她的内心好似有一扇铁门，全然封死。

0055.en: In that environment, how could she feel Chi Xiaocheng's beauty?
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 在那样的环境下，哪里会感受池小橙的美妙呢？

0055.en: But now, she had actively opened the door to her heart.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 但现在，心门被她主动打开了。

0055.en: Unable to bear the loneliness of being alone.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 无法忍受独自一人的寂寞。

0055.en: Unable to bear the endless cycle of days.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 无法忍受日复一日的轮回。

0055.en: When she realized that no matter what, the food was unpalatable, and even more disgusting than excrement, she would react in that way.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 当她意识到无论怎样食物都不好吃，甚至会比粪便还要恶心后，就会产生那样的反应。

0055.en: As long as there is hope, people will not collapse.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 留有希望，人就不会崩溃。

0055.en: What's more...
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 更何况

0055.en: That's the female lead!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 那可是女主啊！

0055.en: A white moonlight, with her own halo.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 白月光，自带光环。

0055.en: If she collapsed so easily, how could she become the only perfect existence in the novel?
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 如果那么容易崩溃的话，又怎么能成为小说中唯一完美的存在呢？

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng's index finger was still touching her lips. While waiting for Su Tao to act, her smile gradually became expectant.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 池小橙食指依旧点着嘴唇，在等待苏桃行动的同时，笑容也渐渐期待了起来。

0055.en: She didn't even realize that her originally calm crimson eyes had unconsciously become eerie.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 连她自己都没有觉察，原本还算平静的赤瞳，不知不觉地妖异了起来。

0055.en: Her face took on an unnatural flush, as if intoxicated.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 面色多了一抹不自然的潮/红，如痴如醉。

0055.en: And such a change was extremely obvious in Su Tao's eyes.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 而这样的变化，在苏桃眼中是极其明显的。

0055.en: Normally, she would be scared, she would be afraid, she would think about how to soothe Chi Xiaocheng's emotions and make her transform from a yandere state back into the normal, cute Xiaocheng.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 往常的她会害怕，会恐惧，会想着如何安抚池小橙的情绪，并让她从病娇状态转换为正常的可爱小橙。

0055.en: But now, in her eyes, there was only the thin, cherry-blossom pink of her fingertips.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 但如今，她的眼里，尽是那指尖薄薄的樱花色。

0055.en: That was the only sweetness different from the food.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 那是唯一区别于食物的甘甜。

0055.en: Taking a step forward, Su Tao pulled Chi Xiaocheng.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 一步迈出，苏桃伸手将池小橙一扯。

0055.en: Her eyes closed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 双眼闭上。

0055.en: Her movements were greedy and clumsy.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 动作贪婪而生涩。

0055.en: After an unknown period, when rationality surged into her mind, she met Chi Xiaocheng's satisfied smile.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 也不知过了多久，理智涌上心头后，她对上了池小橙满足的笑容。

0055.en: Her eyes were dazed, "Do you like it?"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 她眼神痴迷，“喜欢吗？”

0055.en: Su Tao's throat was choked, unable to speak.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 苏桃喉咙哽咽，说不出话。

0055.en: Her gaze was somewhat dull, as if she was surprised and unable to comprehend what she had done.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 目光有些呆滞，好似对自己所做的事情惊讶得难以理解。

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng was not in a hurry. She slowly retreated to the door and brought in a bowl of rice.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 池小橙也不着急，慢悠悠地退到了门边，将一碗米饭端了上来。

0055.en: She leaned close to Su Tao's ear and gently licked her earlobe, "I like it very much, Tao Tao. This is a reward~"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 凑到苏桃耳边，轻舔耳垂，“我很喜欢哦桃桃，这是奖励~”

0055.en: A tingling sensation ran through Su Tao's earlobe, bringing her back to her senses quickly.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 耳垂传来触电般的感觉，让苏桃迅速回神。

0055.en: Looking up again, she found that Chi Xiaocheng had already left.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 再抬头一看，发现池小橙已经出去了。

0055.en: This was time deliberately left for her to think.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 这是故意留给她的思考时间。

0055.en: Su Tao swallowed, and after hydrating, she felt a pang of hunger in her stomach.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫，补充水分后感觉肚子饿得发慌。

0055.en: She was afraid that this rice would be just as unpalatable, just as a hybrid mix of sour, sweet, bitter, and salty, just as dark cuisine.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 这米饭，她怕一样的难吃，一样是酸甜苦辣咸的杂交混合，一样是黑暗料理。

0055.en: Forget it, it doesn't matter. Am I going to starve myself to death if I don't eat?
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 算了，无所谓了，不吃难道还把自己饿死吗？

0055.en: Su Tao smiled obscurely, scooped up a spoonful, and took a small bite.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 苏桃晦涩地笑了笑，舀起一勺轻轻吃了一口。

0055.en: A normal, rich aroma spread from her tongue, and a line of hot tears flowed down.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 正常浓厚的香味自舌尖传递，一行热泪流下。

0055.en: "The taste is... normal."
0055.speaker: 苏桃
0055.cn: “味道是...正常的。”

0055.en: She ate ravenously, disregarding her image.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 她不顾形象地狼吞虎咽了起来。

0055.en: Only then did her eyes gradually clear.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 直至最后，眼神才渐渐恢复了清明。

0055.en: "Heh, a reward, huh..."
0055.speaker: 苏桃

0055.en: She couldn't help but think of the two answers Doctor Cheng had given her.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 她不由想到了成医生给她说过的两个答案。

0055.en: It was also the question she asked when she first met Doctor Cheng.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 也是她刚认识成医生时问的问题。

0055.en: If she confirmed that Xiaocheng was indeed a yandere and couldn't be cured, what should she do?
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 如果确认小橙真的是病娇，又无法解决的话，要怎么办呢？

0055.en: Doctor Cheng answered like this.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 成医生是这样回答的。

0055.en: A: If you don't want to move to another city and want to completely get rid of her, it's best to send her to a mental hospital. Keep her under strict supervision, just like how internet addiction schools treat internet addiction. Extreme methods for extreme people.
0055.speaker: 成医生
0055.cn: A：如果不想换个城市又想彻底摆脱她的话，将她送进精神病院最好，严加看管，就像网瘾学校戒网瘾一样，极端的方法应对极端的人。

0055.en: B, since you can't resist, try to enjoy it. The love of a yandere is unique!
0055.speaker: 成医生
0055.cn: B，既然无法反抗，那就尝试享受吧，病娇的爱，独一无二！

0055.en: Su Tao's expression became complex.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 苏桃眼神复杂了起来。

0055.en: She didn't like it.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 不喜欢。

0055.en: But.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 但。

0055.en: She didn't hate it that much either.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 好像也没那么讨厌。

0055.en: And all her emotional changes were transmitted to Chi Xiaocheng's phone through a hidden camera in the room.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 而她的一切神情变化，都通过房间的一个隐秘摄像头，传到了池小橙的手机中。

0055.en: Seeing her expression recover quite a bit, and then sitting there with her knees hugged, thinking, Chi Xiaocheng knew that her plan had succeeded.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 看她神色恢复不少，又抱膝坐在那思考，池小橙就知道，自己的计划成功了。

0055.en: The first step was successful.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 成功了第一步。

0055.en: "That's great~"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: “真棒啊~”

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng licked her lips, so excited that she danced with joy.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 池小橙舔了舔唇瓣，兴奋得手舞足蹈。

0055.en: Normally, the system would have started complaining by now, but not hearing its voice made Chi Xiaocheng feel unaccustomed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 往常，这个时候系统就应该出声吐槽了，现在没听到声音，反倒让池小橙不习惯。

0055.en: "System, how many emotion points are there in total?"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: “统子，一共多少情绪值了？”

0055.en: In just two days, Su Tao alone provided so many emotion points!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 短短两天，苏桃一个人就提供了那么多情绪值！

0055.en: It was a win-win!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 简直是双赢！

0055.en: "You're usually quite talkative, but now you're not saying anything. Shouldn't you express some opinion about Su Tao?"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: “平时你倒是挺话痨的，这时候居然就不说话了，你不应该发表一点对苏桃的意见吗？”

0055.en: [I'm afraid you'll kill me if I say the wrong thing.]
0055.speaker: 系统
0055.cn: 【我怕说错话你就把我给刀了】

0055.en: You're my only cheat, my helper!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 你可是我唯一的金手指啊，我的助力！

0055.en: Why would you think that?!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 为什么会有这种想法！

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng said, "But your acting skill is really good. It's only intermediate level, but it's so powerful. I can perform with ease. Si Chen didn't notice anything wrong last time, and Su Tao was completely fooled by me this time."
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 池小橙道：“不过你的演技技能真好用啊，才中级就那么厉害，我表演起来得心应手，上次司辰没看出不对劲，这次苏桃也完全被我骗过去了。”

0055.en: [Th-thank you for the compliment.]
0055.speaker: 系统
0055.cn: 【谢...谢谢夸奖】

0055.en: Next, Chi Xiaocheng completely immersed herself in studying with Su Tao.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 接下来，池小橙彻底沉浸在了和苏桃的学习中。

0055.en: Normally, the food was still unpalatable. Only when Su Tao actively asked for it would Chi Xiaocheng give her a reward.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 平时的食物还是难以下咽，只有苏桃主动索求后，池小橙才会赋予奖励。

0055.en: In addition, Chi Xiaocheng did not interfere with Su Tao's sleep one night, allowing her to sleep for 8 hours. This female lead, who was on the verge of collapse, also regained much of her usual composure and rationality.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 加上池小橙在晚上没有干预苏桃的一次睡眠，让她睡足8小时后，这位差点崩溃了的女主，也恢复了不少往日的从容与理智。

0055.en: It was as if she had completely adapted to life as a patient.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 好似彻底习惯成为病人的生活。

0055.en: Su Tao was still that radiant white moonlight who treated her gently.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 苏桃还是那位散发光芒，对她温柔以待的白月光。

0055.en: Just like that, two days passed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 就这样，两天时间过去了。

0055.en: Only one day remained until Chi Xiaocheng's original three-day plan.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 离池小橙原定的三天，也仅剩最后一天。

0055.en: A person disappearing from society for two days, even if Chi Xiaocheng tried to conceal it, would eventually be noticed.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 一个人几乎从社会消失两天，即便池小橙有心掩饰，也终究避免不了被人发现不对劲。

0055.en: The rational and astute Si Chen was one of them.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 理智机敏的司辰，就是其中一个。

0055.en: After chatting through messages several times, on the morning of the third day, he decisively called Su Tao.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 发消息聊了好几次后，在第三天的清晨，果断打了电话给苏桃。

0055.en: The familiar ringing sound outside the door made Chi Xiaocheng, who was chatting with Su Tao, pause.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 熟悉的铃声在门外响起，让正在陪苏桃聊天的池小橙愣了一下。

0055.en: In the latter's surprised gaze, she slowly walked out, "Tao Tao, wait a moment. I'll answer the phone for you."
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 在后者惊诧的眼神中，慢慢走了出去，“桃桃等一会儿哦，我去帮你接个电话。”

0055.en: At this moment, Su Tao belatedly realized something.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 此时苏桃才后知后觉地想到一件事情。

0055.en: How many days had passed since the beginning?
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 距离一开始，过去多少天了呢？

0055.en: For the first time, she felt the terrifying adaptability of humans.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 她第一次，感受到了人的适应性的可怕。

0055.en: And Chi Xiaocheng, after closing the door and picking up the phone, maintained her calm expression.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 而池小橙，在关上门拿起电话后，平淡的脸色不变。

0055.en: "Cough, cough."
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: “咳咳。”

0055.en: She coughed twice and cleared her throat.
0055.speaker: 旁白
