0055.cn: 轻咳两声，捏了一下嗓子。

0055.en: Pseudovoice skill, activate!
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 伪音技能，启动！

0055.en: "Hello? Is this Si Chen?"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: “喂？是司辰吗？”

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng imitated Su Tao's tone, producing an identical voice.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 池小橙学着苏桃的语气，发出了一模一样的声线。

0055.en: Last time, when Ye Liang called, Chi Xiaocheng used this voice to dismiss him.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 上一次叶良打来电话，都被池小橙用这一套声线打发了。

0055.en: Facing Si Chen, she became even calmer.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 面对司辰，她愈发冷静。

0055.en: Si Chen heard the voice and seemed relieved. He asked, "Su Tao, where are you now?"
0055.speaker: 司辰
0055.cn: 司辰听到声音，似乎松了口气，问道，“苏桃，你现在在哪呢？”

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng calmly replied, "I'm at Xiaocheng's house. She's sick, and I'm taking care of her."
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 池小橙淡定回答道，“我在小橙家里，她生病了，我在照顾她呢。”

0055.en: Si Chen: "Really?"
0055.speaker: 司辰
0055.cn: 司辰：“真的吗？”

0055.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Ah? Why do you ask?"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 池小橙：“啊？为什么这么问啊？”

0055.en: Everything was logical and reasonable. Even the rhetorical question was something Chi Xiaocheng had carefully studied.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 一切都合情合理，即便是回答的反问，也是池小橙仔细研究过的。

0055.en: However, after hearing this rhetorical question, Si Chen remained silent for a while.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 然而，司辰听到这个反问后，却沉默了好一会儿。

0055.en: After more than 10 seconds, Si Chen suddenly said, "Su Tao, I like you. Be my girlfriend."
0055.speaker: 司辰
0055.cn: 10多秒后，司辰冷不伶仃地说了一句，“苏桃，我喜欢你，当我女朋友吧。”

0055.en: Then, Chi Xiaocheng's act broke.
0055.speaker: 旁白
0055.cn: 然后，池小橙破功了。

0055.en: Her disguise instantly shattered, and a cold glint flashed in her crimson eyes. She almost uncontrollably rasped in her original voice, "Try saying that again?!"
0055.speaker: 池小橙
0055.cn: 伪装瞬间撕破，赤红的双眼闪过一抹寒芒，几乎是不可控地嘶哑着原本的声线，“你再说一遍试试？！”

0056.en: Chapter 56 One Finger
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 第56章 一根手指

0056.en: The tender voice was particularly harsh, like a small beast driven to desperation, frantically displaying aggression.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 稚嫩的嗓音格外刺耳，仿佛一只被逼入绝境的小兽，疯狂地展示着攻击性。

0056.en: Even though Si Chen was mentally prepared, he was still startled by the voice.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 然是司辰已经有了心理准备，也还是被这声音吓了一跳。

0056.en: He quickly chuckled a few times into the phone, his voice sounding guilty, "Well, that was a joke. I guessed it was you, Chi Xiaocheng. I'm not here for Su Tao this time. I specifically came for you!"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 在电话中连忙干笑几声，语气心虚，“那什么，开个玩笑，我猜到是池小橙你了，我这次不是来找苏桃的，我是特意来找你的！”

0056.en: Si Chen seemed to know how to respond. Before Chi Xiaocheng could have another outburst, he quickly said, "You like Su Tao, right? Su Tao and I have a good relationship. I can be your inside man and help you win over Su Tao. How about it?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰似乎知道怎样应对，趁着池小橙还没有下一轮的爆发，迅速说道，“你喜欢苏桃对吧，我和苏桃关系不错，我可以当你的内应帮你攻略苏桃，怎么样？”

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng's hoarse tone did not diminish, "You two have a good relationship?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 池小橙嘶哑的语气并未因此减弱，“你们关系不错？”

0056.en: "Uh, cough cough, I mean, a normal friendship. I swear I've never liked Su Tao!"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “额咳咳，我指的是，普通朋友的关系，我发誓我绝对没有喜欢过苏桃！”

0056.en: "But you just said you wanted Su Tao to be your girlfriend!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “可你刚刚说想让苏桃当你女朋友！”

0056.en: "Oh, that's my alter ego acting up. Why can't I control my mouth?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “哎呀这是我第二人格作祟，这嘴怎么就管不住呢？”

0056.en: Along with the voice, there were two crisp slaps. "Regarding Su Tao, how about we talk seriously and rationally?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 声音传来的同时，还有“啪啪”两声清脆的掌嘴，“事关苏桃，我们还是认真理智地谈谈，怎么样？”

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng considered herself not a yandere, and excellent at emotional control.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 池小橙自问不是病娇，对情绪控制一流。

0056.en: Reason took over her mind. She sat on the sofa, decided to drop the act, and asked, "What do you mean by teaming up?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 理智占据大脑，她坐到了沙发上，索性不演了，询问道，“你说的联手，是什么意思？”

0056.en: Si Chen said, "Actually, you know Su Tao's true identity, right?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰道：“其实你也知道苏桃的真实身份吧？”

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng paused, then subconsciously asked, "True identity?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 池小橙顿了一下，下意识反问，“真实身份？”

0056.en: "You don't know?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “你不知道？”

0056.en: Si Chen's tone also revealed obvious surprise. His risky decision to abandon Su Tao and choose Chi Xiaocheng was something he had considered for a long time.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 司辰语气也能听出明显的错愕，他冒险抛弃苏桃，选择池小橙可是想了很久的决定。

0056.en: Why did it sound unreliable now?
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 怎么现在听起来这决定有点不靠谱？

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng realized something and quickly said to Si Chen, "Wait a moment."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 池小橙意识到了什么，连忙对司辰道，“你等一下啊。”

0056.en: With that, she quickly opened the system page, "System, I want to see the table of contents of the original novel."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 说罢，迅速打开了系统页面，“统子，我要看小说原著的目录。”

0056.en: To be honest, Su Tao was a classic tragic female lead from a tomato orphanage background. Chi Xiaocheng couldn't find anything useful from the original owner's memories either.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 说实在话，苏桃是经典的番茄孤儿院出来的悲惨式女频女主背景，从原主的记忆中池小橙也没找到什么有用的东西。

0056.en: She really didn't know what hidden identity Su Tao had.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 她还真不知道苏桃有什么隐藏身份。

0056.en: After searching through the table of contents, she finally found some clues in the chapters between 650 and 700.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 在目录一番寻找，终于在第650章到第700章之间的目录看出一些门道。

0056.en: 50 chapters, totaling 250 emotion points.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 50个章节，总计要花250点情绪值。

0056.en: If she could get Si Chen's help with this, it would be a small price to pay for her current situation!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 如果能以此得到司辰的助力的话，对如今的自己来说，小钱！

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng decisively purchased it, and the content of the original novel flooded into her mind like memories.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 池小橙果断购买，小说原著的内容如记忆般涌入脑海。

0056.en: She suddenly understood.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 她恍然大悟。

0056.en: This part of the story was also a melodramatic female-oriented plot.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 这一段内容也是很狗血的女频剧情。

0056.en: Su Tao angered Ye Liang because of the divine doctor male lead. Ye Liang, in the book, was set up as a jealous type, so to punish Su Tao, he made her live in his doghouse and bullied her in various ways.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 苏桃因为神医男主惹怒了叶良，叶良在书中又是顶级醋坛子设定，为了惩罚苏桃就让她住自己家的狗窝，各种欺负她。

0056.en: After all, with the domineering CEO persona, many female readers liked this kind of popular plot where the pampered little wife is forced into submission.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 毕竟霸总人设，不少女生读者喜欢这种喜闻乐见的小娇妻被强宠的桥段。

0056.en: But anyone who writes novels knows that conflict creates interest, and sweetness is just a seasoning.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 但写小说的都知道，激发矛盾才有看点，糖只能作为调味剂。

0056.en: Coincidentally, at this time, Su Tao's true identity was revealed. She was not an orphan, but had a war god father abroad.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 恰巧这个时候，苏桃的身世之谜被解开，她其实不是孤儿，而是有一个战神老爹在国外。

0056.en: When the war god father returned and heard that his daughter was living in a doghouse, he unleashed a hundred thousand mercenaries in a fit of rage!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 战神老爹回归，听闻女儿竟住狗窝，一怒之下十万雇佣兵倾巢而出！

0056.en: The father and the male lead Ye Liang became enemies, and another round of love-hate entanglement and mutual slaughter ensued.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 老爹和男主叶良敌对，又是一阵爱恨情仇相互厮杀。

0056.en: Si Chen's appearance in the plot was rare, but Chi Xiaocheng could infer Si Chen's purpose based on the cause and effect. He wanted to use Su Tao's father's influence to help him regain his position as the Si family heir!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 其中司辰出现的剧情较少，但池小橙也能根据前因后果推测出司辰的目的。他想借苏桃老爹的势力，帮他夺回司家继承人的位置！

0056.en: Indeed, in the eyes of such people, so-called friends are essentially an exchange of interests.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 果然在这种人眼里，所谓朋友，本身就是利益的交换。

0056.en: But if that's the case...
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 只是这样的话

0056.en: Tao Tao is mine.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 桃桃是我的。

0056.en: Her father, who dotes on his daughter, would also be on her side.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 她老爹宠女儿也会站在自己这边。

0056.en: She also had the system and could read the original novel. Helping Si Chen was not a problem.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 自己又有系统，又能读原著小说，帮个司辰，不是问题。

0056.en: Adhering to the principle of drawing a big picture first, Chi Xiaocheng picked up her phone and said to Si Chen, "You're talking about Su Tao's father, right? I know."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 秉着先画大饼的原则，池小橙拿起手机对司辰说道，“你说的是苏桃老爸的事情对吧，我知道。”

0056.en: "You really know!" Si Chen's voice relaxed, "Chi Xiaocheng, you're acting so strangely. I guess you want Su Tao to fall hopelessly in love with you, right? I can help you."
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “你果然也知道！”司辰声音松了口气，“池小橙，你表现得那么奇怪，我猜测你应该是想让苏桃无可救药地爱上你吧，我可以帮你。”

0056.en: "Normally, I can lurk around Su Tao and guide her, helping you win her over. In return, after you win over Su Tao, you'll use her father's influence to help me return to the Si family. How about it?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “平时可以潜伏在苏桃身边引导她，帮助你拿下苏桃，而你则是要在拿下苏桃后，借用她老爸的势力帮我重回司家，怎么样？”

0056.en: "This is a good collaboration, isn't it? Her father won't be back in the country for a while. Before that, I'll fully support you. If you think I'm also problematic, you can choose not to help me later, and you won't lose anything!"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “这样的合作不错吧，她老爸至少还要一段时间才会回国，在那之前，我全力帮你，如果你认为我也有问题，大可在之后不帮我，你也不会有任何损失！”

0056.en: "Moreover, you're alone against Ye Liang, and it's hard to stand firm. Although my influence isn't great, I can distract some of his energy."
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: “而且，你一个人应对叶良也孤木难支，我势力虽然不大，但可以牵扯他一部分精力。”

0056.en: It must be said that Si Chen's proposal was hard to refuse.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 不得不说，司辰的提议很难让人拒绝。

0056.en: As a rational character who also studied psychology, he had a firm grasp of Chi Xiaocheng's current situation.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 作为兼修心理学的理智型角色，他将池小橙目前的处境拿捏得死死的。

0056.en: After saying this, Si Chen began to calculate in his mind.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 说出这一番话后，司辰心中便开始盘算。

0056.en: Although Chi Xiaocheng was an uncontrollable yandere, after two interactions, he gradually found a way to control her.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 虽然池小橙是个病娇不可控，但两次接触下来，也逐渐找到了拿捏她的点。

0056.en: That was Su Tao!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 那就是苏桃！

0056.en: As long as he kept using Su Tao as an excuse, he could manipulate her rationality and guide her actions. Once he tested her bottom line...
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 只要不断借用苏桃作为借口，就能够拉扯她的理智，引导她的行动，当试探出她的底线后

0056.en: Such an irritable lunatic was much easier to control than the intelligent Su Tao.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 这样一个易怒的疯子，可比有头脑的苏桃好控制多了。

0056.en: But this thought had barely appeared when he heard Chi Xiaocheng's suspicious voice on the phone, "Are you really going to listen to everything I say?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 只是这想法才出现没一会儿，他就听到了池小橙电话中怀疑的声音，“真的什么都听我的吗？”

0056.en: Si Chen pushed up his glasses, a hint of shrewdness flashing in his eyes, "I, Si Chen, always keep my word."
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰推了推眼镜，一丝精芒闪过，“我司辰向来说话算话。”

0056.en: "Then... what's the price?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “那...代价呢？”

0056.en: As Chi Xiaocheng's faint voice sounded, Si Chen was stunned, "What price?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 随着池小橙幽幽的声音响起，司辰愣了一下，“什么代价？”

0056.en: "This transaction is not equal." Chi Xiaocheng's voice seemed to have lost its initial normalcy, "Without you, I can still win over Tao Tao. I like her, and she will only like me!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “这样的交易，并不等价呢。”池小橙的声音好似没了一开始的正常，“没有你，我照样可以拿下桃桃，我喜欢她，她也只会喜欢我！”

0056.en: Si Chen quickly said, "I can also help you restrain Ye Liang, and there's also Dongfang Yang. With me here, I can better help you manage Su Tao's interpersonal relationships and situation. This is already an exchange."
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰连忙说道，“我也可以帮你牵制叶良，况且还有东方阳那家伙呢，有我在，能更好帮你整理苏桃身边的人际关系和情况，这已经是交换了。”

0056.en: "But, I don't like that you said you wanted Tao Tao to be your girlfriend~"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “可是啊，我不喜欢你说想让桃桃当你女朋友这件事呢~”

0056.en: "In the alley, and that call just now, you don't think I've forgotten, do you?"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “小巷子里，还有刚刚的电话，你不会以为我忘了吧？”

0056.en: "She's mine..."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “她是我的...”

0056.en: "She's mine."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “她是我的。”

0056.en: "She's mine!!!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “她是我的！！！”

0056.en: "Saying such things, and you want me to trust you?!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “说着那样的话，你让我相信你？！”

0056.en: Her voice became increasingly cold, and one could even hear a faint, hoarse growl that only small beasts would make.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 声线愈发阴冷，甚至能听到些许小兽才会发出的嘶哑吼叫。

0056.en: Si Chen reached out and touched the side of his face. The scar left in the alley had not yet faded.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 司辰伸手摸了一下侧脸，这一道疤当初在小巷里留下，现在都还没消去。

0056.en: He thought the matter would be over.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 本以为事情会就此揭过。

0056.en: He never thought Chi Xiaocheng would still remember it!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 没成想池小橙竟还记在心里！

0056.en: Si Chen closed his eyes and thought for a moment. He let out a long sigh and asked, "Then what do you want me to do? I swear I don't like Su Tao. Saying those words was just to test you for Su Tao. All of this... was instigated by Su Tao!"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰闭眼思考了一下，长吁一口气询问道，“那你想要我做什么，我发誓我不喜欢苏桃，说那种话都是替苏桃试探你，这些都......都是苏桃指使的！”

0056.en: "I won't allow you to talk about Tao Tao like that!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “我不允许你这样说桃桃！”

0056.en: "She wouldn't do such a thing!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: “她才不会做那种的事情！”

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng's tone was cold and firm, "It must have been you who misled her!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 池小橙语气冰冷坚定，“一定是你诱导的她！”

0056.en: At these words, Si Chen was so angry that he almost smashed his phone.
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 此话一出，司辰气得差点没将手机摔烂。

0056.en: Yandere, yandere!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 病娇病娇！

0056.en: This is simply impossible to communicate with!
0056.speaker: 旁白
0056.cn: 这特喵根本就无法沟通！

0056.en: Suddenly, Chi Xiaocheng said coldly, "One finger."
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 忽地，池小橙冷不伶仃说道，“一根手指。”

0056.en: Si Chen was stunned, not hearing clearly, "What did you say?"
0056.speaker: 司辰
0056.cn: 司辰愣了一下，没听清，“你说什么？”

0056.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was hoarse, "I want one of your fingers as a gift for apologizing to Tao Tao!"
0056.speaker: 池小橙
0056.cn: 池小橙嘶哑着声音：“我要你的一根手指，来当作你给桃桃道歉的礼物！”

0057.en: Chapter 57 Chi Xiaocheng's Three-Step Plan
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 第57章 池小橙的三步计划

0057.en: One finger.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 一根手指

0057.en: Hearing this, not only Si Chen, but even the system felt it was a bit too much.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 听到这话，不说司辰，就连系统都觉得有些过了。

0057.en: It couldn't help but ask worriedly.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 不免担心地问道。

0057.en: [Host, Si Chen is still a young master. Even if he's down and out, his influence is not small to us. If he chooses to side with Ye Liang, wouldn't it backfire?]
0057.speaker: 系统
0057.cn: 【宿主，司辰怎么说也是一位少爷，他再落魄对于我们来说势力也不小，如果他选择站在叶良那边的话，会不会适得其反？】

0057.en: [You're a bit too impulsive.]
0057.speaker: 系统
0057.cn: 【您有些太冲动了】

0057.en: "No, I'm very rational." The eerie red in Chi Xiaocheng's pupils did not diminish, "Si Chen is too dangerous. I'm testing whether he's trustworthy."
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “不，我理智得很。”池小橙瞳孔中妖艳的红色未减，“司辰这个人太危险了，我是在试探他值不值得信任。”

0057.en: "If he cuts off his finger without hesitation, it means he can do anything to achieve his goal, even harm himself. Such a person, for profit, will definitely betray me. Si Chen cannot be kept!"
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “若他毫不犹豫地砍掉自己的手指，说明他为了达到目的，可以不择手段，哪怕伤害自己，这种人为了利益，也一定会背叛我，司辰不可留！”

0057.en: "If he gives up, it means Si Chen is weak and incompetent, unable to withstand tests. He will betray me with a little torture. Si Chen cannot be kept!"
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “如果他放弃，说明司辰软弱无能，经不起考验，一旦用点刑就会背叛，司辰不可留！”

0057.en: "If he uses someone else's hand to replace his own, it means he is cold-blooded and inhumane. Si Chen cannot be kept!"
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “如果他用别人的手来代替自己，说明他冷漠无情，毫无人性，司辰不可留！”

0057.en: If such a person is placed next to Su Tao, will he be her inside man, or will he become someone else's inside man in the future?
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 这样的人放在苏桃身边，到底是作为自己的内应，还是未来会成为别人的内应？

0057.en: The male leads in female-oriented novels are not to be trifled with.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 女频文的小说男主，可不是省油的灯。

0057.en: If Si Chen found out that she wasn't a yandere, would he still choose to side with her instead of Su Tao?
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 要让司辰发现自己不是病娇的话，他还会这样选择投向自己，而不是选择苏桃吗？

0057.en: Pressure must be applied!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 压力，必须给上！

0057.en: And Si Chen also felt the pressure from Chi Xiaocheng. Holding his phone, he felt a chill rush to his head, and his scalp tingled!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 而司辰却是也感受到了池小橙给的压力，拿着手机的他只觉得一股寒气直冲脑门，头皮发麻！

0057.en: He had witnessed the ruthlessness of a yandere.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 病娇的狠，他也算见识过了。

0057.en: He repeatedly warned himself to control the extent of his interaction with the yandere.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 心中一再告诫自己，一定要拿捏那个度再去和病娇交流。

0057.en: But he still didn't expect Chi Xiaocheng to be so vengeful!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 可他还是没想到，池小橙竟然那么记仇！

0057.en: His finger... he himself felt scared.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 手指...他自己都感到害怕。

0057.en: But Su Tao's mysterious old man was the only help he had found in years!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 可苏桃的神秘的老爹，却是自己几年来能找到的唯一助力了！

0057.en: Si Chen glanced at the fruit knife on the table, then took a deep breath.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 司辰看了眼放在桌上的水果刀后，深呼吸了一口气。

0057.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, can I apologize in a different way?"
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: “池小橙，我能不能换一种方式道歉？”

0057.en: The scar on his face was already enough of a problem for him. He couldn't accept losing another finger.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 脸上的刀疤对他影响就已经够大了，再缺一根手指他无法接受。

0057.en: So he said to Chi Xiaocheng, "I can carve words on my back with a knife, and I'll definitely keep my distance from Su Tao from now on. This is truly, truly the last time!"
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: 于是便对池小橙说道，“我可以用刀在背后刻字，并且以后绝对跟苏桃拉开距离，这次真的真的是最后一次了！”

0057.en: It seemed that without shedding some blood, this yandere Chi Xiaocheng couldn't be appeased.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 不流点雪，看来是无法摆平池小橙这病娇了。

0057.en: The little thought of controlling Chi Xiaocheng through Su Tao, which had just arisen, also vanished without a trace.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 原本升起的以苏桃控制池小橙的小心思，也消失得无影无踪。

0057.en: One accident could lead to losing everything!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 一个意外，就可能全盘皆输啊！

0057.en: The yandere's actions were too unpredictable.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 病娇的行动方式，过于不可预判了。

0057.en: Si Chen's suggestion was unexpected by Chi Xiaocheng, but she still agreed. She was weak and isolated, and the help of this male lead was indeed indispensable.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 司辰的提议在池小橙意料之外，但她还是同意了，自己势孤力薄，这位男主的助力确实不能缺少。

0057.en: After hanging up the phone, Si Chen sat on the chair and let out a long sigh.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 电话挂断后，司辰坐在椅子上，长叹了一口气。

0057.en: He knocked on the table, and a bodyguard entered, "Young Master, what are your orders?"
0057.speaker: 保镖
0057.cn: 敲了敲桌子，门口进来一位保镖，“少爷，有什么吩咐？”

0057.en: "Help me write a few words on my back."
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: “帮我在背上写几个字。”

0057.en: The bodyguard was stunned for a moment, then turned to leave, "Okay, Young Master, I'll go get a pen."
0057.speaker: 保镖
0057.cn: 保镖愣了一下，转身就要往外走，“好的少爷，我去拿笔。”

0057.en: "No need." Si Chen pointed to the small knife on the table, "Just carve it with a knife. You can use some force, I can bear it."
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: “不用。”司辰指了指桌上的小刀，“用刀刻就行了，可以用点力，我能忍住。”

0057.en: The bodyguard's face twitched, and he tremblingly picked up the small knife.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 保镖的面庞抽动了一下，颤颤巍巍地拿起小刀。

0057.en: He wouldn't be thrown into the river for carving words, would he?
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 他该不会刻字就被沉江里吧？

0057.en: After much hesitation, the bodyguard still asked, "Young Master, do you really want to carve it? It will hurt a lot."
0057.speaker: 保镖
0057.cn: 犹豫再三，保镖还是问道，“少爷，真的要刻吗，很疼的。”

0057.en: Si Chen unbuttoned his shirt and replied, "Don't worry, I won't blame you."
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: 司辰一边解开衬衫，一边回道，“放心，我不会怪你的。”

0057.en: Bodyguard: "Then... serve the country faithfully?"
0057.speaker: 保镖
0057.cn: 保镖：“那......精忠报国？”

0057.en: Si Chen: "..."
0057.speaker: 旁白

0057.en: He glanced at the bodyguard faintly, and after a long silence, he said decisively, "Never love Tao. Just these four words."
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: 他幽幽地看了一眼保镖，沉默许久后，决然道，“永不爱桃，就这四个字吧。”

0057.en: He had been in contact with Su Tao for about three months, and he actually had a good impression of this cheerful and beautiful girl.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 接触苏桃差不多三个月，他心底其实是对这位开朗漂亮的女生有点好感。

0057.en: But for that position, this little affection could only be personally erased by him!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 但为了那个位置，这点好感，也只能由自己亲自抹杀了！

0057.en: His resolve turned into determination. Si Chen grabbed the corner of the table and shouted to embolden himself, "Come on!"
0057.speaker: 司辰
0057.cn: 决然化作坚定，司辰伸手抓住了桌角，大吼了一声壮胆，“来！”

0057.en: Before long, a pig-like scream came from the office.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 没多时，这办公室中就传出了杀猪般的叫声。

0057.en: Later, a rumor spread from unknown sources—it was said that Young Master Si Chen was gay and had an office romance with a group of bodyguards in suits!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 后来，一则谣言不知从何而来——传闻司辰少爷是男同，与一众西装保镖产生办公室恋情！

0057.en: Naturally, these were all later stories.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 自然，这都是后话了。

0057.en: After dismissing Si Chen, Chi Xiaocheng looked at her room again.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 池小橙在打发了司辰后，又重新看向自己的房间。

0057.en: Today was the last day. Tomorrow, Su Tao's leave from various places would end.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 今天是最后一天，明天苏桃在各个地方的请假就结束了。

0057.en: After disappearing for three days, Chi Xiaocheng couldn't let her stay at her house any longer, no matter what.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 消失三天，无论怎样池小橙都不能继续让她住自己家里。

0057.en: In the evening, it was time to end this beautiful time.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 傍晚，该结束这一段美好的时光。

0057.en: "Reluctant, somehow."
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “莫名不舍啊。”

0057.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked towards the room, sighing inwardly.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 池小橙往房间走去，心中感慨。

0057.en: She thought, how wonderful it would be if it could always be like this, being confined in a small room with Su Tao, leaning on each other for a lifetime.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 她想，如果能永远这样下去该多好，和苏桃一起被关在一个小房间，相互依偎一辈子。

0057.en: [Host, your goal hasn't been achieved yet, has it? Is half a day enough?]
0057.speaker: 系统
0057.cn: 【宿主，这次的目的还没达到吧，半天够么？】

0057.en: "Barely."
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: “勉勉强强吧。”

0057.en: In Chi Xiaocheng's plan, the first step was to change Su Tao's mindset.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 池小橙的计划中，首先是让苏桃改变心态。

0057.en: She couldn't have the idea of treating the yandere and turning her back into the good sister she was when she was little. If that idea persisted, that feeling would never turn into love.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 不能有那种去治疗病娇，将她变回小时候那样的好姐妹关系的想法，这样的想法一直存在的话，那份感情就永远不会变为喜欢。

0057.en: Currently, this step was almost complete.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 目前来说，这一步已经进行得差不多了。

0057.en: Once she, as Doctor Cheng, subtly guided her, treating the yandere would turn into enjoying the yandere.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 等自己用成医生的身份诱导一下，去治疗病娇就会变成去享受病娇。

0057.en: And the second step, naturally, was to make Su Tao not resist her.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 而第二步，自然是让苏桃不要抗拒自己。

0057.en: From the change in taste of food to her being the only one.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 从食物开始的味觉变化，再到自己是唯一。

0057.en: Undoubtedly, this step was the most successful.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 毫无疑问，这一步是最成功的。

0057.en: The blurring of external time, the oppressive space, and the extremely distorted feeding. Two days outside probably felt like a week to Su Tao.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 对外界时间的模糊，压抑的空间和极端扭曲的投食，外面过去两天在苏桃看来恐怕已经过去差不多一周了。

0057.en: Everything she encountered was under Chi Xiaocheng's deliberate guidance.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 接触到任何事情，都在池小橙的刻意引导。

0057.en: The food looked fresh, but it was actually rotten, coupled with the oppression brought by her yandere transformation.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 食物看着新鲜，但其实也是腐坏的，加上她病娇化所带来的压抑。

0057.en: Nothing around her was normal.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 身边就没有任何东西是正常的。

0057.en: Such a Tao Tao, when tense, would find it difficult to think, and would instinctively grasp Chi Xiaocheng as her last straw.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 这样的桃桃，紧绷起来就会难以去思考，反而会下意识抓紧池小橙这最后一根稻草。

0057.en: After three days, coupled with Chi Xiaocheng's active and forceful treatment, there had been dozens of sessions of varying lengths.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 三天下来，加上池小橙主动的强势治疗，已经有长短不一的几十次了。

0057.en: And after Su Tao stopped resisting her, it was time for the final step of the plan.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 而在苏桃不抗拒自己后，就该是最后一步计划了。

0057.en: To make her develop romantic feelings for her!
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 让她对自己产生恋人方向的好感！

0057.en: Spending three days in torment to fall in love with someone was a wild fantasy, so Chi Xiaocheng set her goals very low.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 在折磨中花三天时间去喜欢一个人，这实在是异想天开，所以池小橙将目标放得很低。

0057.en: As long as Su Tao was conflicted and had a good impression of her, that would be enough.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 只要让苏桃对自己纠结、有好感，那就足够了。

0057.en: Now, it was time to carry out this step in the last half day.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 现在，正是要在最后半天去进行这一步。

0057.en: Then, naturally, let her out.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 然后，顺势放她出来。

0057.en: As she planned this in her mind, Chi Xiaocheng opened the door, only to see Su Tao standing by the door, looking guilty and startled.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 心中如是打算着，池小橙开门，却见苏桃正站在门边，一副被吓到的心虚模样。

0057.en: She was eavesdropping.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 她在偷听。

0057.en: Unfortunately, the room's soundproofing was excellent.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 可惜，房间的隔音非常好。

0057.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly, "Tao Tao, what are you doing?"
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: 池小橙浅浅笑道，“桃桃在干嘛呢？”

0057.en: Su Tao quickly took a step back, guiltily shifting her gaze away, "N-nothing, I was just wondering when you'd be back."
0057.speaker: 苏桃
0057.cn: 苏桃迅速退了一步，心虚地将视线移到一边，“没...没什么，在想小橙你什么时候回来呢。”

0057.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't expose her lie, but instead happily took her hand, "Tao Tao, do you like me that much? You were looking at me with such scared eyes just now."
0057.speaker: 池小橙
0057.cn: 池小橙也不戳穿她的谎言，而是高兴地牵过她的手，“桃桃就那么喜欢我吗，明明之前用那么害怕的眼神看着我。”

0057.en: Su Tao was speechless for a moment. She didn't know how to explain.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 苏桃一时语塞，她不知怎样解释。

0057.en: Even now, she still felt a little afraid of Chi Xiaocheng.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 即便现在，对池小橙依旧带了一点害怕。

0057.en: But beyond the fear, there was a complex mixture of various emotions.
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 但区别于害怕之外，更多的是各种情绪交杂在一起的复杂。

0057.en: Was there still a possibility for her to leave now, or would she be stuck here for the rest of her life?
0057.speaker: 旁白
0057.cn: 如今的自己，真的还有出去的可能吗，还是说一辈子都要在这里？

0058.en: Chapter 58 The Beginning of Su Tao's Fall (Bonus for Deoxys)
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 第58章 苏桃沦陷的开始（为代欧奇希斯加更）

0058.en: Wait, a chance to get out?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 等等，出去的机会？

0058.en: Su Tao suddenly realized that she wasn't completely without a chance to leave.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃忽然想到，自己并不是完全没有机会出去。

0058.en: The continuous high pressure and her constantly unrecovered strength had almost made Su Tao forget something Chi Xiaocheng had said before.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 连续不断的高压，始终无法恢复的力气，让苏桃都快忘了池小橙之前说过的一件事。

0058.en: Fall in love with her.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 喜欢上她。

0058.en: Then she could leave!
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 就可以出去！

0058.en: Although the yandere Chi Xiaocheng was a bit terrifying, that was only at the beginning. In the following days, when Su Tao had to accept the situation and start obeying Chi Xiaocheng.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 虽说病娇的池小橙有些可怕，但那也仅限于一开始的时候，后面的这些日子，苏桃不得不接受现状开始顺从池小橙的时候。

0058.en: She found that she occasionally had normal moments.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 发现她偶尔也有正常的时候。

0058.en: So, could she pretend to like her according to her previous line of thought?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 那么是否就可以按照之前的思路，去假装喜欢她呢？

0058.en: As for what would happen after she got out, she would think about that later.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 至于出去之后的事情，那就之后再想吧。

0058.en: Thinking of this, Su Tao suddenly saw the light.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 想到这，苏桃茅塞顿开。

0058.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng looking completely normal at the moment, her heart settled.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 见池小橙此时也是一副正常无比的样子，心中大定。

0058.en: Yes, as long as she didn't provoke her.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 是的，只要不刺激她就好。

0058.en: Su Tao reached out a hand and cautiously asked, "Xiaocheng, can I touch your head?"
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 苏桃伸出一只手，小心翼翼地问道，“小橙，我能摸摸你的头吗？”

0058.en: "You want to touch my head?!" Chi Xiaocheng's voice was filled with surprise. She pulled Su Tao's hand and walked towards the bed, "Tao Tao, come here."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “要摸头吗？！”池小橙语气惊喜，拉着苏桃的手就往床边走去，“桃桃到这边来。”

0058.en: "Yes, you sit on the edge of the bed."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “对，你坐在床边。”

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng directed Su Tao, "Then Tao Tao, open your arms."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 池小橙指挥着苏桃，“然后桃桃，把手张开。”

0058.en: "Like this?"
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: “这样吗？”

0058.en: Su Tao somewhat frantically opened her arms towards Chi Xiaocheng.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃有些慌忙地将双手张开，面向池小橙。

0058.en: "Then... here I come!"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “那...我来咯！”

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng took a step back, then launched herself into her open arms.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 池小橙后退了一步，对准她张开的怀抱就是一个飞扑。

0058.en: The softness in her embrace, far from hurting her, made Su Tao feel very comfortable.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 柔软入怀，被这样撞了一下非但不疼，苏桃反倒觉得很舒服。

0058.en: However, thinking of Chi Xiaocheng's yandere state, a hint of fear still surfaced in her heart.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 只是想到池小橙病娇的状态，一丝丝的恐惧还是浮现心里。

0058.en: But soon, it was dispelled by Chi Xiaocheng.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 不过很快，就被池小橙驱散。

0058.en: "Alright, Tao Tao, you can pat my head for as long as you want."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “好了桃桃，摸头的话多久都可以哦。”

0058.en: Su Tao also reacted, reaching out to stroke her hair.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃也反应了过来，伸手抚上她的秀发。

0058.en: Her tea-colored hair cascaded down to her waist, spreading out. It was thick and incredibly soft, feeling like silk, making Su Tao unable to let go.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 茶色的秀发垂到腰间，披散开来，发量很足又柔顺无比，摸起来像丝绸，让苏桃爱不释手。

0058.en: Feeling the warmth and softness in her embrace, Su Tao couldn't help but sigh.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 感受着怀里的温度和柔软，苏桃心中不免感慨。

0058.en: It seemed that since their quarrel during the summer vacation after high school graduation, it had been four months, and she hadn't properly hugged her.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 好像自从高中毕业的暑假闹别扭后，一直到现在，4个月了都没有好好地抱过她。

0058.en: This feeling was as comfortable and reassuring as ever.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这样的感觉，一如既往的舒适、安心。

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng buried herself in her embrace, her voice full of longing, "Tao Tao's embrace is so comfortable, so warm, I love it~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 池小橙埋在怀里，声音充满了眷恋，“桃桃的怀抱好舒服，好温暖，好喜欢~”

0058.en: Being confined in the room for so many days, Su Tao smiled naturally for the first time, "You always used to say that too."
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 被关在屋子里那么多天，苏桃第一次露出了自然的微笑，“以前的你，也总是这样说。”

0058.en: "But there are differences from before, aren't there?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “但和以前也有不同的地方呀？”

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng chuckled, "It's become softer and more comfortable~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 池小橙嘿嘿一笑，“变得更软更舒服了呢~”

0058.en: The small action made Su Tao's face flush, "Alright, that's an illusion, Xiaocheng, stop messing around."
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 小小的动作，让苏桃脸色红了红，“好了，这是错觉，小橙别闹。”

0058.en: "Shy?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “害羞了？”

0058.en: "We're both girls, what's there to be shy about!"
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: “都是女孩子有什么好害羞！”

0058.en: Su Tao rubbed the small head in her palm vigorously, but soon stopped.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃用力搓了一下掌心的小脑袋，可没一会儿又停了下来。

0058.en: Her body remained still.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 身体呆呆不动。

0058.en: Yes, they were both girls, why should she be shy?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 对啊，都是女孩子，为什么要害羞呢？

0058.en: It used to be like this too.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 明明以前，也是这样的。

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng's constant "love" confessions ultimately made her feel something different from ordinary friends.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 池小橙一直以来“喜欢”的表白，终究是让她产生了区别于普通朋友的异样感受。

0058.en: And once such emotions erupted, they would be unstoppable.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 而这样的情感一旦迸发，就会无法停止。

0058.en: Speaking of which, Xiaocheng's hair is even better than before.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 说起来，小橙的头发比以前还要好呢。

0058.en: It smells so good too.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 味道也好香。

0058.en: Her whole body was soft.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 整个人软乎乎的。

0058.en: This touch was like a child who had never been exposed to wind and rain.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这种触感就像是没有经过风吹雨晒的小孩子。

0058.en: Her embrace, her smile, could heal hearts.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 她的怀抱，她的笑容，都可以治愈人心。

0058.en: While enjoying the moment, Chi Xiaocheng moved her head and emerged from her embrace.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 正在享受之际，池小橙动了动脑袋，从怀里钻出。

0058.en: She gently closed her eyes and slightly raised her head, "Tao Tao, give me a kiss~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 就这样轻轻闭上了眼睛，将脑袋微微抬起，“桃桃，咬个嘴子~”

0058.en: Although she had tried many things these past few days, this was the first time she had experienced such close proximity and direct sensation.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这些天虽然没少因为各种事情去尝试，可这么近的距离，这么直观的感受，还是第一次。

0058.en: This is actually... not right, is it?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这样其实...不对的吧？

0058.en: A voice in Su Tao's heart told her that Chi Xiaocheng was someone she had grown up with and relied on, and that her feelings were twisted and pathological.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃心里有一个声音告诉自己，池小橙是相依为命、一起长大的存在，她的这份感情是扭曲、病态的。

0058.en: Don't do this!
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 不能这样去做！

0058.en: Don't do this!
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 不要这样去做！

0058.en: But... if she didn't do this, if she didn't obey her, she wouldn't be able to get out, would she?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 可...不这样做，不去顺从她，就出不去了吧？

0058.en: If she didn't even dare to do this, how could she pretend to like her?
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这样都不敢去做，那怎么假装喜欢她呢？

0058.en: Yes, I'm just pretending to like her.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 是的，我只是在假装喜欢她而已。

0058.en: Anyway... I've gradually gotten used to it.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 反正...已经渐渐习惯了。

0058.en: Whether it was active or evasive, this time, without the pressure of Chi Xiaocheng's yandere transformation, Su Tao still chose to comply.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 不知是主动还是逃避，这一次没有池小橙病娇化的压力，苏桃依旧选择了顺从。

0058.en: The struggle in her heart gradually increased.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 心中的挣扎渐渐增加。

0058.en: And soon turned into enjoyment.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 又很快变成了享受。

0058.en: This was the only... love she had experienced these past few days.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 这是这些天唯一的……喜欢。

0058.en: "Tao Tao, can I touch your head?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “桃桃，我能摸一下你的脑袋吗？”

0058.en: After both had finished enjoying, Chi Xiaocheng stood on the bed again, looking at Su Tao eagerly.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 在双方都结束了享受，池小橙又站到床上，兴致冲冲地看着苏桃。

0058.en: Su Tao was now certain that the current Chi Xiaocheng was the normal and cute Xiaocheng.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 苏桃此时确信，现在的池小橙，就是那个正常又可爱的小橙。

0058.en: So she was also very relaxed, smiling and nodding, "My hair might not be as great as yours."
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 所以她也很放松，微笑着点了点头，“我的头发可能没有你的那么棒。”

0058.en: "Who said that? I like everything about Tao Tao."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “谁说的，桃桃的一切我都喜欢。”

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng reached out her small hand and placed it on Su Tao's head, her face filled with satisfaction, "Speaking of which, I've never touched Tao Tao like this before. It's like treating a small pet, it makes me feel at ease."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 池小橙伸出小手，放在了苏桃的脑袋上，面露满足之色，“说起来，一直都没有这样抚摸过桃桃呢，就像是在对待小宠物一样，让人感到安心。”

0058.en: As she spoke, Chi Xiaocheng seemed to realize she had said something wrong and immediately blushed, explaining, "Ah, I didn't mean to treat Tao Tao as a pet. It's just... how should I put it, because I like you, so..."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 说话间，池小橙好像觉得自己说错话了，立马红着脸解释，“啊我也不是要把桃桃当宠物啦，就是那个...怎么说呢，因为我喜欢你，所以......”

0058.en: "In this limited life, I want to try all positions, all identities with you."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “在有限的生命里，想和你尝试所有的立场，所有的身份。”

0058.en: "Of course, that also includes the roles of master and pet."
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “当然，也包含主人和宠物的身份

0058.en: "Hehehe~~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “诶嘿嘿~~”

0058.en: Chi Xiaocheng brought her small face close to Su Tao's and asked curiously, "What kind of pet does Tao Tao like?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: 池小橙将小脸蛋凑到苏桃面前，好奇地问道，“桃桃喜欢什么样的宠物呢？”

0058.en: "Cats?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “猫猫？”

0058.en: "Dogs?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “狗狗？”

0058.en: "Or..." A small hand, with its index finger pointing at her own cheek, her face expectant, "Do you~ like~ me~?"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “还是说......”一只小手，伸出食指指着自己的脸颊，面色期待，“喜~欢~我~？”

0058.en: Her cuteness was within reach.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 她的可爱近在咫尺。

0058.en: At the same time, these words came from her heart.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 同时这份话语也发自内心。

0058.en: The current Xiaocheng was undoubtedly in a normal state, but her yandere tendencies seemed to have merged into her normalcy.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 现在的小橙，毫无疑问是正常的状态，可她的病娇，好似也融入了常态中。

0058.en: Her alluring voice was like a little succubus. As long as she nodded in agreement, she could have a cute little pet.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 勾人的声线好似一只小魅魔，只要点头答应，就可以获得一只可爱的小宠物。

0058.en: Su Tao pursed her lips and slowly asked, "If I say I like Xiaocheng, will Xiaocheng really listen to me?"
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 苏桃抿了抿唇，缓缓问道，“如果我说喜欢小橙，小橙就真的会听我的话吗？”

0058.en: "Of course!" Chi Xiaocheng nodded foolishly, "As a pet, I definitely have to listen to Tao Tao, Master~~~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “当然呀！”池小橙傻傻地点头，“作为宠物，那我肯定要听桃桃的话呀，主人~~~”

0058.en: The alluring loli voice was sweet and sticky, with a long trailing sound.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 诱人的萝莉声线甜腻，尾音拉得长长的。

0058.en: Anyone else would probably have fallen at this moment.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 换任何一个人，可能在此刻就已经沦陷了。

0058.en: Su Tao swallowed, her gaze shifting, "I... I still prefer cats."
0058.speaker: 苏桃
0058.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫，视线挪开，“我...我还是喜欢猫吧。”

0058.en: "Is that so?" Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head, then leaned closer to her, making cat paw gestures with both hands, "Meow~ Meow~~"
0058.speaker: 池小橙
0058.cn: “是吗？”池小橙歪了歪脑袋，又凑到了她的面前，两只小手比作猫爪子的动作，“喵~喵~~”

0058.en: So... so cute.
0058.speaker: 旁白
0058.cn: 好...好可爱。

0059.en: Chapter 59 You Already Like Me a Little~
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 第59章 你已经有点喜欢我了哦~

0059.en: Chi Xiaocheng herself was very cute.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 池小橙本身就很可爱。

0059.en: But besides passersby, everyone who looked at her had a slight filter.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 只是除了路人以外，看她的人都带上了些许滤镜。

0059.en: Just like Su Tao, having grown up with her, how could she not know Chi Xiaocheng's beauty?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 就像是苏桃，从小一起长大她能不知道池小橙的颜值吗？

0059.en: She was just used to it, always standing from an older sister's perspective, taking her beauty for granted, and seeing her cute actions as clumsiness.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 她只是习惯了，一直站在姐姐的角度上，颜值上的可爱当作理所当然，行为上的可爱又视为笨拙。

0059.en: But under Chi Xiaocheng's subtle influence during this period, the cuteness she now perceived.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 可在池小橙这段时间的潜移默化下，如今觉察的可爱。

0059.en: Was the kind that belonged exclusively to girls.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 便是独属于女孩子的那种。

0059.en: Detached from her "older sister" perspective.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 脱离了她“姐姐”身份的视角。

0059.en: At this moment, Su Tao herself didn't realize that her heart had been stirred.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 这一刻连苏桃自己都没感受到，她的心，被牵动了。

0059.en: Turning her gaze away, Su Tao gently pushed Chi Xiaocheng out of her embrace. Somewhat flustered, she sought a point of escape, "N-next time, Xiaocheng, don't say that. How could I bear to treat you as a pet? You'll always be my good little sister."
0059.speaker: 苏桃
0059.cn: 视线侧开，苏桃将池小橙轻轻推离怀中，有些慌乱的她寻找逃避的支点，“下...下次小橙你别这么说了，我又怎么舍得把你当宠物呢，你永远是我的好妹妹。”

0059.en: Chi Xiaocheng blinked, then touched her lips with her index finger again, asking with a giggle, "Is it really just a good little sister?"
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: 池小橙眨了眨眼，食指又点在了唇瓣，笑嘻嘻地询问道，“真的只是好妹妹吗？”

0059.en: Or rather, given the circumstances, could she still be a "good little sister"?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 或者说的是，都这样了，还能是“好妹妹”吗？

0059.en: "I'm very greedy, you know~"
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: “我呀，可是很贪心的呢~”

0059.en: Chi Xiaocheng came in front of Su Tao again, burrowing into her embrace.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 池小橙又来到了苏桃身前，钻入她的怀中。

0059.en: Su Tao was about to say something when Chi Xiaocheng pressed her index finger against her lips, "Tao Tao, don't speak. Can I sleep in your arms?"
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: 苏桃刚想说些什么，被池小橙用食指抵住了嘴唇，“桃桃别说话，让我在你的怀里睡一觉好么？”

0059.en: "Xiaocheng..."
0059.speaker: 苏桃

0059.en: "I can feel it." Chi Xiaocheng hugged Su Tao tightly, her voice soft, "Tao Tao, you already like me a little, don't you? Your eyes look different now. When I wake up, Tao Tao can be discharged~"
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: “我感觉得到的哦。”池小橙将苏桃搂得紧紧的，声音轻柔，“桃桃心底已经有点喜欢我了吧，你看我的眼神都不一样了呢，等我睡醒，桃桃就可以出院了~”

0059.en: "Discharged..."
0059.speaker: 苏桃

0059.en: Su Tao murmured these two words.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃嘴里呢喃着这两个字。

0059.en: Does being discharged mean she can leave here?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 出院的意思是，能够离开这里了吗？

0059.en: She couldn't remember how long it had been, but it should be about a week, right?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 时间多久已经不记得了，但应该是一周左右吧？

0059.en: In just one week, I fell in love with Xiaocheng?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 仅仅是一周时间，我喜欢上了小橙？

0059.en: Su Tao felt the warmth in her embrace, her expression complex.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃感受着怀中的温暖，面色复杂。

0059.en: No, perhaps it's been more than a week.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 不，或许已经不止一周了。

0059.en: And, I don't like Xiaocheng.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 而且，我也没喜欢小橙。

0059.en: I'm just pretending to like her.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 只是假装喜欢她而已。

0059.en: She was fooled by me.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 她被我骗了。

0059.en: That's why she said such things.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 所以才会说出这样的话。

0059.en: Just sleep, and everything will be back to normal when you wake up.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 睡一觉吧，睡醒了一切就会恢复原样了。

0059.en: Su Tao held the small body and lay down on the bed together. She closed her eyes, wanting to sleep, but she couldn't.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃抱着这娇小的身子，一起躺在床上，闭上眼睛想睡，可怎么也睡不着。

0059.en: Chi Xiaocheng's words kept echoing in her mind.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 脑海始终萦绕着池小橙说的那一句话。

0059.en: —You already like me~
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: ——你已经喜欢上我了哦

0059.en: Even if it was just a little.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 即便那只是一点点。

0059.en: When a person realizes something that is independently different from their inner self and dares not accept, they will constantly think about it and defend themselves.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 当人意识到某一件独立区别于自己内心，不敢去接受的事情时，就会时时刻刻地想着，并为自己辩解。

0059.en: This is all protection from the subconscious.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 这都是潜意识作出的保护。

0059.en: In reality, Chi Xiaocheng knew better than Su Tao herself.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 而实际上，池小橙比苏桃本人还要清楚。

0059.en: There wasn't much love, at most some good feelings.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 喜欢当然没多少，充其量有了一些好感。

0059.en: The continuous pathological state for several days, followed by a sudden change to being obedient and cute, created a strong contrast that impacted Su Tao's heart and misled her feelings.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 持续几天的病态到现在的忽然变乖，变的可爱，强烈的反差冲击苏桃的内心，并误导她的感受。

0059.en: And at this point, Chi Xiaocheng only needed a slight inducement.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 而到这时，池小橙只需要稍微诱导。

0059.en: She could make Su Tao misunderstand herself further.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 就可以让苏桃进一步自我误会。

0059.en: She would constantly think about this, constantly deny herself in her heart. Over time, the image of Chi Xiaocheng in her mind would never fade.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 她会不断地去想这个事情，不断地在心中自我否认，久而久之，脑海中她池小橙的身影就再也无法褪去。

0059.en: No need for Cinderella's handkerchief.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 不用灰姑娘的手帕。

0059.en: This effect was also achieved!
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 也达到了这种效果！

0059.en: The incense burner with the soft bone powder was still working, but the room door was open.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 加了软骨散的香炉还在发挥作用，但房间门却是开着的。

0059.en: Su Tao desperately wanted to get out of here. She just wanted to get her phone and see what had happened outside for the past week or so.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃无比渴望从这里出去，现在她就想拿到自己的手机，看看外面这一周多，发生了什么情况。

0059.en: Why hadn't anyone come looking for her?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 为什么没人来找自己。

0059.en: It was understandable that Doctor Cheng didn't know her actual situation.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 成医生不知道自己实际情况也就罢了。

0059.en: What about Si Chen?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 司辰呢？

0059.en: What about Chen Qian?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 陈倩呢？

0059.en: After Ye Liang returned, he should have looked for her, right?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 叶良回来之后，应该也会找自己的吧？

0059.en: Why was there no movement for so many days?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 为什么这么多天，一点动静都没有？

0059.en: But noticing Chi Xiaocheng, who seemed to be sound asleep in her arms, her anxious heart slowly calmed down.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 可注意到怀里似乎已经熟睡了的池小橙，她焦躁的内心，又慢慢平复了下来。

0059.en: These past few days, Xiaocheng must have been very tired too, right?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 这些天，小橙应该也很累吧？

0059.en: Xiaocheng's voice just now wasn't as energetic as usual.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 小橙刚刚说话的声音都没有平时那样有精神了。

0059.en: And the food... Su Tao forced herself to endure the discomfort in her heart and gradually analyzed it.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 而且食物……苏桃强忍心里的不适，渐渐地也分析了出来。

0059.en: Taking water as an example, as long as it was fed through Xiaocheng's small mouth, the taste not only didn't change, but also had an alluring sweetness.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 以喝水举例，只要通过小橙小嘴投喂的，味道不仅没变，反而有种诱人的甘甜。

0059.en: This also proved that Su Tao's sense of taste was not broken.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 这也证明，她苏桃的味觉没坏。

0059.en: Those strange, rotten-tasting things might just be dark cuisine specially made by the outside vendors.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 那些怪异的像是腐烂了的味道的东西，可能就是外面店家特制的黑暗料理。

0059.en: But why was this happening? Was Xiaocheng hinting to me in this way that she was actually the most wonderful one?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 但这又是为什么呢，小橙是以这样的方式，暗示我其实她才是最美好的那个吗？

0059.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng sound asleep, Su Tao couldn't help but touch her head.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 见池小橙熟睡，苏桃忍不住摸了摸她的脑袋。

0059.en: But after reaching out, she felt a little scared.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 可伸手后又感觉有些害怕。

0059.en: The love of a yandere was a bit too heavy and extreme.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 病娇的爱，有些过于沉重和极端了。

0059.en: But could she blame Xiaocheng?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 可这能怪小橙吗？

0059.en: Su Tao smiled bitterly.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃苦笑。

0059.en: If she hadn't tested her, this wouldn't have happened, would it?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 如果不是自己测试她，就不会发生这样的事情了吧？

0059.en: She knew she was a yandere, but she still couldn't believe it, and even used Ye Liang to provoke her.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 明知道她是病娇，心里却还不敢相信，还用叶良去刺激她。

0059.en: Now that this had happened, it was all her own fault.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 如今发生这样的事情，都是咎由自取。

0059.en: And she even caused Xiaocheng to enter a yandere state, harming her already frail body.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 还害得小橙进入了病娇状态，伤害她那本就孱弱的身子。

0059.en: In self-reproach, Su Tao's embrace around Chi Xiaocheng became even gentler.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 自责间，苏桃搂着池小橙的动作更轻柔了。

0059.en: If Chi Xiaocheng knew that Su Tao attributed all the responsibility to herself, she would sigh again.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 如果让池小橙知道苏桃将一切责任都归功于自己，一定会再度感叹。

0059.en: This is the female lead of the white moonlight type!
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 这就是白月光系的女主啊！

0059.en: Just being by her side makes people unconsciously fall in love.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 只是待在她身边，就会让人不知不觉地去喜欢。

0059.en: So, to prevent her from flirting around, she must be kept firmly by her side.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 所以为了不让她沾花惹草，就必须牢牢锁在身边才行呢

0059.en: Sunlight streamed in from outside the window, but it couldn't penetrate the cracks in the window. The room remained dark even after the lights were turned off.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 窗外阳光洒下，却透不过窗户的缝隙，房间内在熄灭了灯光，依旧一片黑暗。

0059.en: Su Tao slept and woke, woke and slept.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃睡了醒，醒了睡。

0059.en: But she found that it never reached the next day.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 却发现怎么也没到第二天。

0059.en: Her mind was hazy, and she was even more exhausted.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 昏昏沉沉的精神，更加疲惫。

0059.en: Every minute, every second, was an unbearable torment.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 每一分每一秒，都煎熬无比。

0059.en: The only comfort was the soft warmth in her arms, and the occasional gentle snoring that dispelled her depression.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 唯一的安慰，就是怀里那柔软的温暖，耳边时不时传来的轻鼾驱散她的压抑。

0059.en: Chi Xiaocheng silently told her: No matter when, I will always be by your side.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 池小橙无声地告诉着她：无论何时，我永远都在你身边。

0059.en: Darkness, it seemed, was no longer so terrifying.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 黑暗，好似也没那么可怕了。

0059.en: After an unknown period, Chi Xiaocheng, who was resting in Su Tao's arms, slowly woke up.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 不知过了多久，枕在苏桃怀中的池小橙终于悠悠转醒。

0059.en: She sat up and rubbed her sleepy eyes, "What time is it? Tao Tao, why didn't you wake me up?"
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: 起身揉了揉惺忪的睡眼，“几点了，桃桃你怎么不叫我起床啊？”

0059.en: She used to say the same thing when she overslept and was almost late for high school.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 曾经上高中，睡过头快迟到的时候，她也这样说。

0059.en: Every movement, every plain word, seemed to evoke memories in her heart.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 每一个动作，每一句平淡的话语，好似都能勾起心中的回忆。

0059.en: Su Tao turned on the light beside her, "I don't know what time it is either. It should be morning, right?"
0059.speaker: 苏桃
0059.cn: 苏桃在一旁打开了灯，“我也不知道什么时候了，应该早上了吧？”

0059.en: "Oh, right." Chi Xiaocheng reacted, pulling Su Tao's hand and walking towards the door, "Since Tao Tao is well, you can be discharged now."
0059.speaker: 池小橙
0059.cn: “对哦。”池小橙反应了过来，拉着苏桃的手往门口走去，“既然桃桃已经病好了，那就可以出院啦。”

0059.en: Like a trapped bird, finally seeing the dawn of freedom.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 如同一只被困的鸟，终于看见了自由的曙光。

0059.en: Su Tao's steps were heavy yet expectant. The moment she stepped out of the room, a dazzling sunlight almost blinded her.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 苏桃脚步沉重而期待，在迈出房间的那一刻，一道刺眼的阳光让她几乎无法睁眼。

0059.en: The afterglow reflected from the window glass gradually faded, and Su Tao squinted her eyes and walked to the window.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 从窗户玻璃上折射而来的余晖渐渐淡去，苏桃这才眯住眼睛，走到了窗边。

0059.en: The rosy glow spread like fire, dyeing the clouds red.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 霞光如火焰蔓延，染红了云层。

0059.en: Was that the morning sun?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 那是朝阳？

0059.en: Or the setting sun?
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 还是夕阳？

0059.en: The afterglow sprinkled on her face. The warm light intertwined with dark memories. Su Tao dazedly picked up the phone Chi Xiaocheng had already placed on the table.
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 余晖洒在她的脸庞上，温暖的光线与阴暗的记忆交织一起，苏桃迷茫地拿过了池小橙早已放在桌边的手机。

0059.en: "Time..."
0059.speaker: 苏桃

0059.en: Less than three days have passed?!
0059.speaker: 旁白
0059.cn: 才过去不到三天？！

0060.en: Chapter 60 Having Both Sickness and Cuteness is True Yandere
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 第60章 有病有娇，才是病娇

0060.en: Less than three days?!
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 竟然才三天不到吗！

0060.en: Su Tao even thought a week had passed.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃甚至以为时间已经过去了一周了。

0060.en: Her hand, holding the phone, trembled continuously, as if her strength hadn't recovered.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 她像是力气还没恢复一样，拿着手机的手在不断颤抖。

0060.en: Her slender index and middle fingers, in disbelief, covered her lips.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 纤细修长的食指与中指，难以置信地捂到了唇上。

0060.en: Three days, meaning excluding the first day when she almost gave up.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 三天，也就是说去掉自己近乎放弃的第一天。

0060.en: Only two days later, she actually thought a week had passed!
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 后面只是两天，自己竟然认为已经过去要一周了！

0060.en: Every time Xiaocheng said it was a certain time, she always felt that time passed too quickly.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 每次小橙说某些时候到了，她总会觉得时间流逝得有些过于快了。

0060.en: She felt it especially clearly when she took a bath. Xiaocheng would say half an hour, but she felt like only ten minutes had passed before Xiaocheng came in.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 再洗澡的时候感觉尤为清楚，说半小时，实际上她感觉过去十分钟池小橙就已经进来了。

0060.en: The oppressive environment made her feel terrified, and her confusion about the outside world made her uneasy, coupled with the dark cuisine.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 压抑的环境让她感到惊恐，对外界的迷茫又让她不安，加上那黑暗料理。

0060.en: And the only comfort was Chi Xiaocheng herself.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 而唯一的安慰，反倒是池小橙本身。

0060.en: She had both a pathological, terrifying side; and then she would turn around and become so cute.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 既有着病态、让人恐惧的一面；转身又变得那样的可爱。

0060.en: This made Su Tao feel even more that it wasn't how wonderful Xiaocheng was when she wasn't yandere.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 这更让苏桃感受到，不是病娇化的小橙是有多美好。

0060.en: But could such a yandere really be cured?
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 只是那样的病娇，真的能治疗吗？

0060.en: Su Tao mechanically turned to look at Chi Xiaocheng. The small figure was tinkering with something by the sofa.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃机械般的转头看向池小橙，娇小的身影正在沙发边捣鼓着什么。

0060.en: Only by liking her could she leave the room.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 只有喜欢她，才能从房间里出来。

0060.en: Indeed, if she didn't go to that extent, how could she pretend to like her?
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 也是，不做到那种程度的话，又怎么假装喜欢她呢？

0060.en: This was unavoidable.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 这都是迫不得已。

0060.en: Su Tao composed herself and clicked into WeChat, finding many messages that had been replied to one by one. The reasons were bizarre, but she had already taken leave before she left, and no one suspected her disappearance for these three days.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃定了心神，又点进了微信，发现许多发来的消息，都被一一回复，理由千奇百怪，但她离去前都请好了假，也没人怀疑她这三天消失的事情。

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng handled it very carefully.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 池小橙处理得很细心。

0060.en: Besides restricting her, she didn't affect her life in any way.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 除了限制她本人，没在她生活上有任何影响。

0060.en: Everything happened.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 什么都发生了。

0060.en: And yet, nothing seemed to have happened.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 又好像什么都没发生什么。

0060.en: A secret is a secret because it is hidden deep in the heart, unseen by others, yet constantly oppressing the soul. Once revealed, it is like a flood bursting its banks.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 秘密之所以是秘密，是因为它藏在心底最深处，无人窥见，却时刻压迫着灵魂，一旦被揭露，便如同洪水决堤。

0060.en: "Tao Tao."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “桃桃。”

0060.en: Amidst her chaotic thoughts, Chi Xiaocheng's voice sounded.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 心思缭乱间，池小橙的声音响起。

0060.en: Su Tao looked over. The small loli had already turned around, holding a sachet embroidered with an orange pattern, "This is for you."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 苏桃投去视线，娇小的萝莉已经转过身，手里拿着一个绣了橙子图案的香囊，“这个给你。”

0060.en: Su Tao took the sachet and found it had a very pleasant and familiar scent.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃接过香囊，发现是一种很好闻又很熟悉的味道。

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng explained, "This sachet helps soothe the mind, reduce fatigue, and aids sleep."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 池小橙解释道，“这个香囊有助于舒缓精神，减少疲惫，同时有助睡眠。”

0060.en: The moment she saw the sachet, Su Tao couldn't help but think of the incense burner, and her hand holding the sachet trembled slightly.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 看到香囊的那一刻，苏桃就不免想到那个香炉，拿着香囊的手都不禁抖了一下。

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng understood Su Tao's thoughts and smiled faintly, "Don't worry, I didn't tamper with this. Tao Tao has been very tired these three days, and probably hasn't slept well, right?"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 池小橙清楚苏桃的心思，浅浅笑道，“放心吧，这个东西我没做手脚哦，这三天桃桃也很累，都没怎么睡过好觉吧？”

0060.en: "I'm sorry~"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “对不起哦~”

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng lowered her head, as obedient as a child who had done something wrong.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 池小橙低着头，乖巧得像是个做错事的小孩。

0060.en: Su Tao held the sachet. Whether it was psychological or not, she did feel some relief from her fatigue.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃拿着香囊，不知是不是心理作用，确实感觉自身的疲惫缓解了一些。

0060.en: And she also liked the scent of the sachet.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 而且香囊散发的味道，她也很喜欢。

0060.en: It made her feel at ease.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 让人心安。

0060.en: "I believe you."
0060.speaker: 苏桃
0060.cn: “我相信你。”

0060.en: Su Tao clutched the sachet and reached out to stroke Chi Xiaocheng's head, "I'm also at fault for what happened these past few days. I'm sorry, Xiaocheng."
0060.speaker: 苏桃
0060.cn: 苏桃揣住香囊，又伸手摸了摸池小橙的脑袋，“这次的事情其实我也有错，对不起小橙。”

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng lowered her head, seemingly trembling slightly from the comfort of being stroked.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 池小橙低着头，似乎因为摸头而太舒服，有些稍许地微微颤抖。

0060.en: Su Tao hesitated for a long time, then seriously said to Chi Xiaocheng, "So, for what happened these past few days, let's... let's pretend it never happened, okay?"
0060.speaker: 苏桃
0060.cn: 苏桃纠结了许久，还是对池小橙认真道，“所以这几天的事情，我们...就当作没发生过好吗？”

0060.en: "Mm~"
0060.speaker: 池小橙

0060.en: A mosquito-like response sounded, and Su Tao showed a relaxed smile, "Then Xiaocheng, I'll go back now, okay?"
0060.speaker: 苏桃
0060.cn: 如蚊蝇般的应和声响起，苏桃露出了放松的笑容，“那小橙，我就先回去咯？”

0060.en: "Sachet... remember to keep it with you."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “香囊...记得带在身上。”

0060.en: "Okay."
0060.speaker: 苏桃

0060.en: The complex emotions at play made Su Tao involuntarily quicken her steps towards the door. Even as she squatted down to put on her shoes in the entryway, she felt too guilty to look back at Chi Xiaocheng.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 复杂的心情作祟，让苏桃不由加快了出门的脚步，即便蹲在玄关穿鞋，也心虚得不敢回头去看池小橙。

0060.en: She was afraid that if she looked back, she would be caught in this dark room again.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 生怕回头看上一眼，就又被抓到这小黑屋里。

0060.en: And precisely because she didn't look back, she didn't see Chi Xiaocheng's flushed, excited face and possessive eyes.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 也正是没回头，她没看到池小橙潮/红激动的脸色和充满占有欲的眸子。

0060.en: "System, I was the one who kept her at home and did such excessive things to her, yet she still voluntarily took all the responsibility and was so gentle with me."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “统子，明明是我将她安置在家里，对她做那么过分的事情，而她依旧主动包揽所有责任，那么温柔地对我。”

0060.en: "This is the white moonlight~!"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “这就是白月光啊~！”

0060.en: "She's truly likable."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “真是让人喜欢。”

0060.en: Looking at Su Tao's back as she put on her shoes, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes couldn't help but show reluctance.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 看向苏桃穿鞋的那背影，池小橙眼中不由浮现不舍。

0060.en: An inexplicable urge arose in her heart.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 心中没来由地有一种冲动。

0060.en: To keep Su Tao in her home like this, and for it to last forever.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 就这样将苏桃安置在自己的家里，然后永远这样下去。

0060.en: Shoes on, clothes draped, Su Tao opened the door. The coldness, different from the room's warmth, rushed in.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 鞋子穿好，衣服披上，苏桃打开了大门，区别于房间内的寒冷扑面而来。

0060.en: Along with the fresh air, this coldness made her feel refreshed.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 伴随着新鲜的空气，这份寒冷让她感到畅快。

0060.en: "Finally, I can leave."
0060.speaker: 苏桃
0060.cn: “终于可以离开了。”

0060.en: At this moment, would Xiaocheng be reluctant?
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 此时此刻，小橙会是不舍吗？

0060.en: An emotion rose in Su Tao's heart. As she turned to close the door after stepping out, she subconsciously glanced at Chi Xiaocheng.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃心中升起一股情绪，出去后在转身关门的那一刹那，下意识地瞥了一眼池小橙。

0060.en: What kind of eyes were those?
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 那是一双怎样的眸子？

0060.en: Within the crimson, reluctance, affection, longing, and loss were intertwined.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 赤红之中，不舍、喜欢、眷恋、失落掺杂一处。

0060.en: Su Tao strangely felt Chi Xiaocheng's emotions.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 苏桃奇怪地能感受到池小橙身上的情绪。

0060.en: Her affection for her was not just an act.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 她对她的喜欢，并非逢场作戏。

0060.en: "Click—"
0060.speaker: 旁白

0060.en: The door closed.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 门关了。

0060.en: The pretty figure disappeared at the end of the hallway. Chi Xiaocheng let out a long sigh and sat on the sofa, "It's a pity three days is still too short. How great would it be if I had a week."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 俏丽的身影消失在玄关尽头，池小橙长长呼了口气，坐到了沙发上，“可惜三天还是太短了啊，要是有个一周的时间该多好。”

0060.en: [Host, you collected a total of 2185 emotion points from the female lead Su Tao these three days. After deducting the 1000 emotion points required for the mental sachet, plus the remaining emotion points from before, you now have 1215 points. Do you want to draw cards?]
0060.speaker: 系统
0060.cn: 【宿主，您这三天一共从女主苏桃身上收集到了2185点情绪值，扣除精神香囊所需的1000点情绪值后，加上之前剩下的情绪值现在还有1215点，要抽卡吗？】

0060.en: "Not yet, save them for later."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “暂时先不抽，留着备用。”

0060.en: 1200 points, it seems like a lot, but it can be used up quickly.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 1200点，看着多，不过也是一下子就可以用完。

0060.en: These days, she had already spent hundreds of emotion points just from the shop.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 这些天，光是从商城消费的情绪值就好几百点了。

0060.en: The incense burner that made Su Tao weak, the yandere light novel she secretly took, and all the various items used to decorate the room were all purchased from the system.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 让苏桃浑身无力的香炉，被她偷偷带走了的那本病娇文学轻小说，布置房间所用的各种东西，全是在系统中购买。

0060.en: [But Host, this sachet doesn't seem very necessary, it's so expensive.]
0060.speaker: 系统
0060.cn: 【不过宿主，这个香囊感觉没太必要吧，这么贵】

0060.en: "Of course it's necessary. Before, every time I saw Su Tao, her face was more or less tired. She had to study, work part-time, and would be bothered by those male leads with various things. It's probably normal for her not to sleep well."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “当然有必要了，之前每次见到苏桃，她脸上或多或少都带点疲惫，她要学习，要打工，还会被那几个男主烦各种事情，恐怕睡不好是常态。”

0060.en: "Her complexion has become even more haggard these past three days."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “这三天下来脸色更是憔悴了不少。”

0060.en: "Even so, she still forced herself to talk to me with a smile."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “即便这样，她还是强撑着身子和笑容跟我聊天。”

0060.en: "My heart aches!"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “我心疼啊！”

0060.en: "If this continues, even if I don't do anything to her, she'll collapse sooner or later. What's more, because I changed the plot, she doesn't seem to have met that divine doctor male lead yet. How long can she last without anyone helping her regulate her body?"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “再这么下去，就算我不对她做任何事情，也迟早会垮，更何况因为我改变了剧情，她似乎还没认识那个神医男主，没人帮她调理身体又能撑到什么时候？”

0060.en: Giving gifts was just a side note, caring was the real intention.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 送礼物只是顺便，关心才是真的。

0060.en: "Moreover, this can better establish my yandere persona." Chi Xiaocheng walked towards the balcony, seeing Su Tao's back as she walked towards the community gate from the high-rise building.
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “而且，这能够更好地把我病娇的人设给立起来。”池小橙往阳台边走去，从高楼能看到苏桃正往小区门口走去的背影。

0060.en: It was as if she was talking to the system, and also to herself, "Yandere, yandere. Only sickness without cuteness cannot attract people."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 像是说给系统听，又像是自言自语，“病娇病娇，只有病没有娇可无法吸引人。”

0060.en: "Killing people, stabbing people, locking them in dark rooms, even eating people, using love and affection as excuses to vent dark psychology. This isn't yandere, it's insanity. The yandere formula isn't kill, kill, kill and eat, eat, eat."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “砍人、刀人、关小黑屋、甚至吃人，用喜欢和爱作为借口去宣泄黑暗的心理，这不是病娇而是神经病，病娇的公式可不是杀杀杀和吃吃吃。”

0060.en: "Sickness makes people conflicted, cuteness makes people likeable. Having both sickness and cuteness is true yandere."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “病是让人纠结，娇是让人喜欢，有病有娇才是病娇。”

0060.en: "If I only put pressure on Su Tao and show my terrifying side, even if I can retain her with the affection she has for the original owner, what will be the final outcome?"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “倘若我只给苏桃压力，展现恐怖的一面，即便能利用她心中对原主的那份感情留住，但最后的结局会是什么呢？”

0060.en: "She will collapse, she will not be able to bear it, she will think I am crazy, and finally go crazy, or be broken by me. There are countless side branches, but the one I like will never be reached."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “她会崩溃，会承受不住，会认为我是疯子，最后疯掉，或者被我玩坏，支线无数条，唯有喜欢的那一条永远无法达到。”

0060.en: "This is not what I want."
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: “这可不是我想要的。”

0060.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao's back, her eyes growing colder, "So, another step to make her like me is to eliminate all the people around her who are in the way, one by one!"
0060.speaker: 池小橙
0060.cn: 池小橙眼神看着苏桃的背影，眼神愈渐冰冷，“所以想要她喜欢我的另一步，就是将她她身边碍事的人，一个接着一个全部排除！”

0060.en: From afar, a man was talking to Su Tao at the community security booth.
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 远远看去，一个男人正在小区保安亭处和苏桃聊天。

0060.en: Ye Liang!
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 叶良！

0060.en: This guy actually came directly to her neighborhood!
0060.speaker: 旁白
0060.cn: 这个家伙竟然直接来到了自己住的这小区里！

0061.en: Chapter 61 Crisis, Ye Liang Arrives! (Bonus for Bling Bling Black Cat)
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 第61章 危机，叶良到来！（为布灵布灵的黑猫加更）

0061.en: At the community entrance, even Su Tao didn't expect to run into Ye Liang here.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 小区门口，就连苏桃都没想到，竟然会在这里撞上叶良。

0061.en: He was in a suit, clearly just off work.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 他一身西装，明显是刚刚下班。

0061.en: Upon seeing Su Tao, the word "displeasure" was written directly on his face, "Why didn't you listen to me?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 见到苏桃后，“不满”两个字直接写在了脸上，“为什么不听我的话？”

0061.en: Su Tao shrank her neck and quickly took out her phone to check her chat history with Ye Liang.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 苏桃缩了缩脖子，连忙拿出手机看了一眼和叶良的聊天记录。

0061.en: It turned out that for these three days, Ye Liang had been sending messages from time to time. The unimportant ones were perfunctorily replied to by Chi Xiaocheng.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 原来这三天，叶良都时不时发来消息，一些不重要的被池小橙敷衍了。

0061.en: Questions asked many times were all brushed off by Chi Xiaocheng with the excuse of "being sick and needing care."
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 问过很多次的问题，都被池小橙以一个“生病了需要照顾”的理由搪塞过去了。

0061.en: And this morning, Ye Liang had sent her a commanding message.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 而今天一早，叶良就命令式地给她发去了消息。

0061.en: Demanding her to meet him at his company.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 要求去他公司见他。

0061.en: At that time, Su Tao was still in the room, so Chi Xiaocheng naturally refused as usual.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 那会儿苏桃还在房间里呢，池小橙当然是一如既往地拒绝了。

0061.en: And the consequence seemed to be that she angered this lord.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 而后果，似乎就是惹怒了这位爷。

0061.en: Ye Liang strode forward, his voice deep like muffled thunder, "What are you doing looking at your phone? Why didn't you listen to me?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 叶良跨步上前，声音沉如闷雷，“看手机做什么，为什么不听我的话？”

0061.en: Su Tao pursed her lips, looked directly at Ye Liang, and followed the lie Chi Xiaocheng had woven, "Didn't I tell you, Xiaocheng is sick and I'm taking care of her."
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: 苏桃抿了抿嘴，抬头直视叶良，也顺着池小橙编织的谎言，“我不是说了吗，小橙生病了我在照顾她。”

0061.en: "Just because of that, you didn't come to my company?" Ye Liang reached out to grab Su Tao's shoulder.
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: “就因为这个所以你不来我公司？”叶良伸手就要去抓苏桃的肩膀。

0061.en: But unexpectedly, Su Tao actually took a step back to dodge.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 却没想到，苏桃竟然主动后退了一步，进行躲避。

0061.en: The domineering Ye Liang raised his head, even more displeased, and his hand reached out again with force.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 强势的叶良抬高了脑袋，更不爽了，那只手再度重重擒了过去。

0061.en: "Slap—!"
0061.speaker: 旁白

0061.en: This time, it was slapped away by Su Tao without hesitation.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 这次，更是被苏桃毫不犹豫地拍开。

0061.en: Ye Liang said in a deep voice, "What do you mean?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 叶良沉着声音，“你什么意思？”

0061.en: "What do *you* mean!" Su Tao retorted, not bowing her head at all in the face of Ye Liang's tall and strong body.
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “你又是什么意思！”苏桃出声反驳，面对叶良高大健壮的身体，却一点都没有低头。

0061.en: Ye Liang took a step forward, "Say that again?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 叶良一步踏前，“你再说一遍？”

0061.en: "Say what's wrong!" A hint of tears welled up in Su Tao's eyes, as if venting the pressure she had endured these past few days, she shouted directly, "What do you mean, just because of this, is it wrong for me to take care of Xiaocheng when she's sick?!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “说怎么了！”苏桃眼中泛出一丝泪花，好似宣泄这几天所承受的压力，直直地喊道，“什么叫就因为这个事情，小橙生病了我照顾她有问题吗！”

0061.en: "She has hands and feet, does she need you to take care of her?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: “她有手有脚的，需要你照顾？”

0061.en: "You have hands and feet, so why do you want me to go to your company and be your maid?!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “你有手有脚的，那为什么要我去你公司，当你女仆！”

0061.en: Su Tao stubbornly raised her head, "Yes, you think Xiaocheng is hindering you, and she left a bad impression on you. You don't like her, but can you please not consider my feelings for her from your own perspective?!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: 苏桃倔强地抬着头，“是，你觉得小橙阻碍了你，她也给你留了不好的印象，你不喜欢她，但能不能不要在你自己的视角去考虑我对她的感情！”

0061.en: "When you need me, you summon me, when you don't, you dismiss me. You asked me to compensate you by being your maid for three days. I agreed. I took time to learn how to be a maid, to prepare necessary things, to ask for leave, to humbly discuss scheduling with my colleagues and boss!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “需要我了就呼之即来，不需要我就挥之即去，让我补偿你当三天女仆，我答应你了，抽出时间去学习怎么当个女仆，去准备必要的事情，去请假、低声下气地和打工的同事还有老板商量排班！”

0061.en: "Oh, you were free for those three days, so you just told me to go, and I went. Did you ever consider me?"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “哦，你是那三天有空了，所以让我去我就去，你有考虑过我吗？”

0061.en: "I had everything arranged, and when I went to your company to find you, you just left someone to say you were busy and told me to keep waiting?"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “我一切都排好了，去你公司找你你就留一个人说有事，让我继续等着？”

0061.en: "You didn't even send me a message on WeChat beforehand to explain!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “你甚至都没提前在微信上给我发一条消息解释！”

0061.en: Su Tao held up her phone and wiped the tears from the corner of her eyes with the back of her hand, "With you like this, what right do you have to talk about Xiaocheng? And I'm not your subordinate, don't order me around like you order your servants!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: 苏桃举着手机，又用手背抹了一下眼角的泪水，“就这样的你，又有什么资格说小橙，而且我不是你的谁谁谁，别像命令你那些下人一样命令我！”

0061.en: The more Su Tao thought about it, the angrier she got, and she even brought up her past grievances against Ye Liang.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 苏桃越想越气，连带以前对叶良的不满都说了出来。

0061.en: Ye Liang frowned, clenching one hand tightly. He knew that what Su Tao said was all true.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 叶良皱着眉毛，一只手攥得很紧，他清楚苏桃说的这些其实都对。

0061.en: But his pride and years of being in a superior position made him unable to tolerate others defying him like this.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 可心中的自尊与常年来上位者习惯，他看不得别人这样忤逆他。

0061.en: He retorted in a deep voice, "How many times have I told you, I have plenty of money. Even at school, the principal wouldn't dare touch you if I said a word. I can give you time and money!"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 沉着声音反驳苏桃道，“我跟你说过多少次了，钱我有的是，就算是在学校我一句话校长也不敢动你，时间和钱我都可以给你！”

0061.en: "Why are you still working so hard?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: “你还去努力个什么？”

0061.en: "Working hard part-time, studying hard, facing those so-called friends who have no future and only know how to waste time, aren't you working hard for a better future?"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: “辛苦做兼职，努力去学习，面对那些没有前途只知道混日子的所谓朋友，你努力不就是为了更好的前途吗？”

0061.en: "Everything you want, I can give you!"
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: “你要的这些，我全都可以给你！”

0061.en: As long as you're my girlfriend, what can't you get?
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 只要当我女朋友，有什么是你得不到的？

0061.en: This last sentence, Ye Liang didn't have time to say it, and it choked in his throat.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 这最后一句，叶良来不及说出口，便哽咽在了嘴里。

0061.en: Because he noticed Su Tao looking at him with tears in her eyes and disappointment, "You keep saying you like me, but you don't even know what I want."
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: 因为他注意到，苏桃一边落泪一边失望地看着他，“你口口声声说喜欢我，却连我想要什么都不知道。”

0061.en: Ye Liang was struck by lightning, standing rooted to the spot, extending his hand blankly.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 叶良如遭雷击，站在原地怔怔地伸出手。

0061.en: "Slap—"
0061.speaker: 旁白

0061.en: "You're not as good as Xiaocheng at all!"
0061.speaker: 苏桃
0061.cn: “你根本不如小橙！”

0061.en: Su Tao slapped his hand away and walked out of the community gate without looking back.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 苏桃拍开了他的手，头也不回地走出小区门口。

0061.en: In her mind, Chi Xiaocheng's obedient smile appeared.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 脑海中，浮现出池小橙乖巧的笑容。

0061.en: Three days.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 三天时间。

0061.en: In the first two days, she experienced confusion, suppression, and fear, and even Chi Xiaocheng's various coercions.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 前两天，她经历过迷茫，经历了压抑与恐惧，甚至经历了池小橙的种种强迫。

0061.en: But at the last moment today, she was happy, warm, and at ease.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 可今天的最后时刻，她是幸福、是温暖、是安心的。

0061.en: Head pats, hugs, chats. The brief tenderness was like returning to the time when they relied on each other as children.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 摸头、怀抱、聊天，短暂的温存就如同回到了儿时相依为命的时光。

0061.en: Simple and likable.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 平淡而让人喜欢。

0061.en: This was exactly what she had always longed for.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 这正是她一直心心念念的。

0061.en: Both saying they liked her, but compared to Xiaocheng, he was far inferior.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 同样是说着喜欢，比起小橙，差劲多了。

0061.en: No comparison, no harm.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 没有对比，就没有伤害。

0061.en: Su Tao was like this, and so was Ye Liang.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 苏桃如此，叶良也是如此。

0061.en: He stood there blankly, his mind filled with Su Tao's parting words.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 他就这么呆呆地站在原地，脑海中满是苏桃临别前的话语。

0061.en: —You're not as good as Xiaocheng at all.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: ——你根本不如小橙。

0061.en: He remembered the banquet where they argued, with thunder and rain.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 他又想起了吵架的那个晚宴，雷雨交加。

0061.en: —To me, Xiaocheng is more important than you!
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: ——对我来说，小橙比你更重要！

0061.en: Chi Xiaocheng! Chi Xiaocheng!
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 池小橙！池小橙！

0061.en: It's Chi Xiaocheng again!
0061.speaker: 叶良
0061.cn: 又是池小橙！

0061.en: As if sensing someone's gaze, Ye Liang suddenly looked up at the 5th floor directly in front of him.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 似乎是觉察到了某个人的视线，叶良猛地抬头看向正前方的5楼。

0061.en: On the balcony, Chi Xiaocheng's small figure stood there.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 阳台上，池小橙那小小的身影正站在那。

0061.en: Her hands were clasped behind her back, and her lips were curled upwards.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 双手别在身后，唇角翘起。

0061.en: As if mocking his distress.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 好似在嘲弄着他的落魄。

0061.en: "This guy..."
0061.speaker: 叶良

0061.en: Ye Liang lowered his eyes and walked directly towards Chi Xiaocheng's location.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 叶良沉下了眼眸，径直朝池小橙所在的方向走去。

0061.en: Grandpa Zhang, who was cracking sunflower seeds at the security booth, sighed, "Youth is truly wonderful."
0061.speaker: 张大爷
0061.cn: 在保安亭嗑着瓜子的张大爷见状，不由感叹一声，“年轻真好。”

0061.en: But unlike the old man's ease, seeing Ye Liang walking towards her, Chi Xiaocheng wasn't flustered yet, but the system was.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 但不同于大爷的安逸，眼见叶良朝自己这走来，池小橙还没慌，系统先慌了。

0061.en: [Host, what should we do? Ye Liang is coming directly. He's the male lead who poses the biggest threat to us right now. Should we just lock the door and keep him outside?]
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 【宿主，怎么办啊，叶良直接过来了，他可是目前对咱们威胁最大的男主啊，要不要直接锁门把他关在外面？】

0061.en: Chi Xiaocheng put the knife back into the system space, her eyes calm, "I'll have to face Ye Liang sooner or later. There's no escaping it."
0061.speaker: 池小橙
0061.cn: 池小橙将手中的刀放回了系统空间，眼神平静，“迟早要面对叶良的，躲不过。”

0061.en: [Then let's quickly spend all our emotion points? Draw a skill to protect ourselves first!]
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 【那咱们快点把情绪值花完？抽个技能自保先！】

0061.en: "Don't rush." Chi Xiaocheng asked, thinking, before Ye Liang came up, "System, what would happen if I stabbed Ye Liang?"
0061.speaker: 池小橙
0061.cn: “别急。”池小橙趁着叶良还没上来，低头思考着问道，“统子，你说我要是把叶良给刀了会怎样？”

0061.en: [You can't do that. He's the male lead. The world's will would definitely intervene. And he's walking straight towards us. If something happens, we, the villainous cannon fodder, will be directly eliminated.]
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 【做不到的吧，这可是男主，世界意志肯定会干预的，而且人家直勾勾地走过来，出事的话咱们这反派炮灰直接GG了】

0061.en: [Self-preservation, try not to provoke him, that's the best.]
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 【自保，尽量别惹他，才是最好的】

0061.en: "That's true!"
0061.speaker: 池小橙
0061.cn: “倒也是啊！”

0061.en: Stabbing someone is too fanciful.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 刀了人家什么的，太异想天开了。

0061.en: [So, Host, how about a draw first?]
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 【所以宿主，先抽个奖？】

0061.en: "What's there to be afraid of?" Chi Xiaocheng wasn't flustered at all, "If Ye Liang gets rough later, just say something to provoke me and make me blacken. I'll beat him down with 10 times my combat power!"
0061.speaker: 池小橙
0061.cn: “怕啥。”池小橙一点都不慌，“一会儿叶良要是动粗，你就说点激怒我的话让我黑化，我战力翻10倍直接将他揍趴！”

0061.en: Host, I provoked you. Are you sure the first person you stab after blackening won't be me?
0061.speaker: 系统
0061.cn: 宿主，我激怒了你，你黑化后确定第一个刀的不是我？

0061.en: "Alright, System, don't worry. I probably have a plan in mind."
0061.speaker: 池小橙
0061.cn: “好啦统子你放心，我心底大概有计划了。”

0061.en: Chi Xiaocheng calmly turned and looked towards the door.
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 池小橙淡淡转身，看向门口。

0061.en: And at this moment, the door was hit with a "thump."
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 而也是在此时，房门“咚”的一声被撞响。

0061.en: Ye Liang, he's here!
0061.speaker: 旁白
0061.cn: 叶良，来了！

0062.en: Chapter 62 System, Why Isn't Your Blackening Skill Working?
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 第62章 统子，你黑化技能怎么没用啊

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng unhurriedly walked over. The moment she opened the door, she saw Ye Liang standing directly in front of her, his aura like muffled thunder, extremely oppressive.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙不紧不慢地走了过去，开门的一瞬间，便见叶良直直地站在面前，气势如闷雷，压抑无比。

0062.en: Su Tao, at 1.66 meters, was no match for Ye Liang, who was 1.86 meters.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 1米66的苏桃可不比1米86的叶良。

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng truly had to crane her neck to see Ye Liang's expression.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙是真的要仰着头，才能看到叶良的表情。

0062.en: "Chi Xiaocheng?"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: “池小橙？”

0062.en: Ye Liang looked down at that cute, unadorned face. His words, which had originally been spoken in anger, now carried a hint of surprise and doubt.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 叶良低头看着那张不施粉黛的可爱小脸，原本愤怒着开口的话，都在此刻带了一丝惊疑。

0062.en: Although Chi Xiaocheng had given him water during the last basketball game, Ye Liang had never truly looked at her.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 上次篮球比赛池小橙虽然送过水，但叶良从未正眼看她一下。

0062.en: In today's society, where appearance matters, this face, enhanced by the delicate soft candy, glowed with a radiance that made Ye Liang momentarily unsure if this person was the one he knew.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 颜值社会的当下，这张被细腻软糖加持过的脸蛋，肌肤都泛出光泽，让叶良一时间不确定这人到底是不是自己认识的那家伙。

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng showed no intention of hiding anything. Instead, she smiled happily at Ye Liang, "I saw you from upstairs just now. Come in."
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 而池小橙没有丝毫掩饰的意思，反而对叶良扬起了开心的笑容，“我刚刚在楼上就看到你了，进来吧。”

0062.en: The intermediate acting skill quietly activated.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 中级的演技技能，悄悄地启动了。

0062.en: Ye Liang frowned and stepped in. Without even changing his shoes, he stood in the entryway, staring intently at Chi Xiaocheng, "Are you Chi Xiaocheng?"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 叶良皱着眉毛迈步而进，连鞋子都没换，就这样站在玄关直勾勾地盯着池小橙，“你是不是池小橙？”

0062.en: "It's me."
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “是我。”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded with a smile.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙笑眯眯地点头。

0062.en: If this smile were directed at Dongfang Yang, that cynical and arrogant young master would probably have already been captivated.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 这笑容要是放在东方阳那里，那位玩世不恭的傲娇大少爷恐怕已经要被拿捏了。

0062.en: But in Ye Liang's eyes, it was like mockery.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 可放在叶良眼中，就像是嘲弄一样。

0062.en: In an instant, his anger flared up.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: “噌”的一下，他的火气就上了起来。

0062.en: He stepped forward, leaned down, and glared, "You, what kind of bewitching potion did you give Su Tao?!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 迈步向前，俯身怒目，“你这家伙，到底给苏桃灌了什么迷魂药！”

0062.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng's smile didn't diminish, and she didn't even flinch. "Ye Liang, what do you mean?"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 然而池小橙却笑意不减，甚至连一丝眼神的躲闪都没有，“叶良你这是什么意思呢？”
