0062.en: "Heh!" Ye Liang sneered, "You targeted Su Tao for months, and repeatedly disrupted my relationship with her. Suddenly, you claim to have repented. Only that idiot would believe you because of her nostalgic filter. Do you think you can fool me?"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: “呵！”叶良冷笑一声，“针对了苏桃几个月，又无数次捣乱我和她的关系，忽然说幡然悔改，也只有那个笨蛋会因为回忆滤镜而相信你，你觉得你能骗过我？”

0062.en: "Do you really think I won't touch you just because Su Tao speaks for you?!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: “你真以为有苏桃为你说话我就不敢动你？！”

0062.en: Ye Liang extended a hand, slowly clenching it into a fist starting from his pinky finger. He stared into Chi Xiaocheng's crimson eyes and said word by word, "This is my last warning to you. If you dare to appear in front of Su Tao and me again, I have ways to make you disappear!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 叶良伸出一只手，从小拇指开始轻轻握成拳头，盯着池小橙赤红的双眸一字一字道，“这是我对你最后的一次警告，再敢出现在我和苏桃面前，我有的是办法让你消失！”

0062.en: As the CEO and young master of a prominent family, it was effortless for him to cause Chi Xiaocheng an accident.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 作为大家族的总裁兼少爷，让池小橙发生意外出事再简单不过了。

0062.en: He hadn't done anything to Chi Xiaocheng because of Su Tao's protection.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 他一直没对池小橙做些什么，就是因为苏桃的维护。

0062.en: But Chi Xiaocheng's audacity had already touched his bottom line!
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 但池小橙的得寸进尺，已经触及到他的底线！

0062.en: The authority of a superior poured out without reservation. He wanted to see the same fear and terror on Chi Xiaocheng's face as before, to break her disguise.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 上位者的威势毫无保留地倾泻而出，他想从池小橙脸上看到和以前一样害怕恐惧的情绪，以打破她的伪装。

0062.en: But after he finished speaking, Chi Xiaocheng didn't even blink.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 可话说完了，池小橙甚至眼睛都没眨一下。

0062.en: But her eyes had gradually grown cold, and the normal person portrayed by her intermediate acting skills was slowly receding, "Don't."
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 但眼神已经渐渐冷了下来，中级演技所表现出来的正常人被渐渐收敛，“不要。”

0062.en: "What did you say?"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: “你说什么？”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng narrowed her eyes, "I said, I refuse!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 池小橙眯了眯眼，“我说，我拒绝！”

0062.en: With a "whoosh," Ye Liang's raised hand quickly grabbed Chi Xiaocheng.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: “腾”的一下，叶良原本举起的手迅速朝池小橙抓去。

0062.en: In an instant, he clamped her neck and effortlessly lifted her into the air.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 仅是一瞬间就钳住了她的脖颈，不费吹灰之力地将她给提到空中。

0062.en: Her feet couldn't touch the ground. Chi Xiaocheng's face flushed slightly as her breathing became difficult.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 脚不能着地，池小橙因为呼吸变得困难脸色也微微红润了起来。

0062.en: But there was still no fear or terror on her face. Instead, her smile became even more sinister, "Ye Liang, if you have the guts, strangle me to death right here!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 但她脸上依旧没有害怕和恐惧，笑容反倒愈发狰狞，“叶良，有本事你现在就把我掐死在这里！”

0062.en: Ye Liang exerted a little more force with his hand, his expression quickly changing. Finally, he threw Chi Xiaocheng to the ground, "My matters with Su Tao are none of your business!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 叶良的手稍微用力了一下，脸色迅速变化，最终一把将池小橙摔到地上，“我和苏桃的事情，由得到你来干预！”

0062.en: "I think you are..."
0062.speaker: 叶良

0062.en: Before he could finish, he was interrupted by Chi Xiaocheng.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 话还未说完，就被池小橙给打断。

0062.en: "Why can't I interfere?"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “我为什么不能干预？”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng coughed twice, clutching her neck as she climbed up from the ground. Her crimson eyes stared intently at Ye Liang.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙轻咳了两声，捂着脖子从地上爬了起来，赤红的眸子死死地盯着叶良。

0062.en: She was like a trapped beast in despair, constantly gasping for breath. Her grim and terrifying smile on that cute face was so incongruous.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 她就像一个陷入绝境的困兽，不断喘息着粗气，狰狞恐怖的笑容放在这张可爱的俏脸，是那么的违和。

0062.en: She was like a yandere now.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 她现在就像一个病娇。

0062.en: It was just that her crimson eyes, which should have glowed red, didn't, making her seem to lack something. She had the aura but lacked a certain charm.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 就是那对本应绽放红芒的赤瞳没有发光，让人看着少了点味道，光有气势却少了一分神韵。

0062.en: But Ye Liang was still stunned by Chi Xiaocheng's roaring words. His eyebrows furrowed, "I've told you many times, it's impossible for me to like someone like you. Your obstruction of me and Su Tao will only make me hate you more!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 可叶良还是被池小橙这句嘶吼般的话给镇住了，眉毛紧锁，“我说过了，我是不可能看上你这种家伙了，你这样阻挠我和苏桃只会让我更讨厌你！”

0062.en: His tone wasn't as aggressive as before.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 他语气没刚刚那么冲。

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng's abnormal state was obvious to anyone.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙状态的不对劲，是个人都能感受得出来。

0062.en: This guy, saying this, likes me to this extent?
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 这家伙这样说，喜欢我到这种程度？

0062.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng burst into laughter, her voice gradually becoming frenzied, "Yes! It doesn't matter if you like me or not. I didn't expect you to like me, but Su Tao is different!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 然而池小橙却是大笑了起来，声音渐渐癫狂，“对！你喜不喜欢我没关系，我也没指望你会喜欢我，可苏桃不一样！”

0062.en: "Only her, you are not allowed!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “唯有她，你不许！”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng roared, as if she suddenly thought of something, and froze for a moment, "Oh, right, now's a good opportunity."
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 池小橙大吼着，好像忽地想到了什么，呆滞了那么一下，“对啊，现在就是好机会啊。”

0062.en: Apparently, her frenzy scared Ye Liang. This young master, who had seen many things, had a bad premonition, and his scalp tingled.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 显然，她的癫狂将叶良吓到了，这位见过不少世面的少爷心中有了不妙的预感，头皮有些发麻。

0062.en: He instinctively took a step back, "What are you talking about?"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 下意识地就后退了一步，“你到底在说些什么？”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng tilted her head and smiled. The hand that had been behind her back slowly extended.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙歪头一笑，一直放在身后的手，渐渐伸了出来。

0062.en: In her hand was a delicate fruit knife.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 手中拿着的，是一把精致的水果刀。

0062.en: "Ye Liang!" Chi Xiaocheng's voice carried a forced hatred, "How about you stay here forever? That way, you'll never be able to get close to Tao Tao."
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “叶良！”池小橙声音多了一丝有些牵强的恨意，“不如你永远留在这里怎么样，这样你就永远也无法接近桃桃了。”

0062.en: She stood still, slightly hunched, as if about to charge.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 她站在原地，微微弓腰，一副要冲上去的模样。

0062.en: Ye Liang reacted quickly, immediately adopting a defensive stance.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 叶良反应很快，这一瞬间就摆出了防卫的动作。

0062.en: But...
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 但

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't charge forward immediately.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙却没在第一时间冲上来。

0062.en: She anxiously shouted to the system in her mind, "System, my performance should be very angry right now. Blackening, blackening! I should be acting very blackened now, activate the skill for me, otherwise I can't beat Ye Liang!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 她心里着急地对系统喊道，“统子，我现在的表演应该很愤怒啊，黑化呢黑化呢，我现在演得应该很黑化了吧，你给我点一下技能啊，不然我打不过叶良啊！”

0062.en: Unexpectedly, the system did not respond to Chi Xiaocheng.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 出乎意料的是，系统并没有出声回答池小橙。

0062.en: For a moment, she was full of momentum, neither advancing nor retreating.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 一时间，她鼓足了气势，上也不是不上也不是。

0062.en: Finally, Chi Xiaocheng gritted her teeth and continued to exert the remaining heat of her acting.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 最终，池小橙还是一咬牙，继续发挥着演技的余热。

0062.en: "Ye Liang, you stay here!"
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “叶良，你就留在这里吧！”

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng exaggeratedly rushed forward. As soon as she got close to Ye Liang, before she could stab him, he easily blocked her attack.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙浮夸地就冲了上去，刚贴近叶良，这一刀还没捅下，就被他轻易抵住了攻势。

0062.en: At the same time, he kept cursing, "Chi Xiaocheng, are you crazy?!"
0062.speaker: 叶良
0062.cn: 同时不断怒骂道，“池小橙，你疯了吗！”

0062.en: "Yes, I'm crazy! I'll cut off your hands and feet, so you can't take a single step out of this house, and then you'll never be able to get close to Su Tao!" Chi Xiaocheng trembled, trying to exert force. She wanted to feign anger and then blacken, but found that the system's skill did not successfully trigger.
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: “是啊，我疯了，我会砍断你的手脚，让你一步也踏不出这个房子，这样你就无法再靠近苏桃了！”池小橙颤抖着手想用力，她想伪装愤怒然后黑化，却发现系统的技能并没有成功触发。

0062.en: With a gentle push, she stumbled back several steps.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 被轻轻一推，就倒退了好几步。

0062.en: Chi Xiaocheng wasn't sure what was happening. She could trigger the blackening skill when facing Si Chen, but why did it fail when facing the even more unpleasant Ye Liang?
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 池小橙不太清楚什么情况，明明面对司辰时都能激发黑化技能，怎么面对更加让人不喜的叶良，却失败了。

0062.en: She wanted to try again.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 她想再试一次。

0062.en: But as soon as she took a step, her left foot tripped over her right.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 可才迈开一步，左脚便绊到了右脚。

0062.en: She fell to the ground in a flat fall.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 一个平地摔，倒在地上。

0062.en: The small knife also flew out of her hand.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 小刀也跟着脱手而出。

0062.en: Coincidentally, no matter how Chi Xiaocheng swung the knife, she couldn't touch Ye Liang. Now that the small knife flew out, it just happened to stab him in the thigh.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 好巧不巧，池小橙怎么挥刀都无法碰到叶良，如今小刀飞出，恰巧扎在了叶良的大腿上。

0062.en: This gloomy young master's face immediately showed a twisted expression of pain.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 这位阴沉的大少爷，脸上顿时出现了扭曲的疼痛。

0062.en: With a deviation from the plan, Chi Xiaocheng's expression couldn't help but stiffen.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 和计划出现偏差，池小橙脸色不免也有些僵硬。

0062.en: The system was not working, and this time she was truly powerless.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 系统不给力，这次是真成了手无缚鸡之力了。

0062.en: She originally wanted to play a yandere, then blacken. Even if she couldn't keep Ye Liang forever, she wanted to make him afraid of her.
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 她本身想扮演病娇，然后黑化，即便无法将叶良永远留下，也要让他害怕自己。

0062.en: But where was her acting that Si Chen couldn't see through? Where was her blackening with ten times the combat power?
0062.speaker: 旁白
0062.cn: 可我那司辰都看不破的演技呢，我那十倍战力的黑化呢？

0062.en: System, come out and save me! Your skill isn't working!
0062.speaker: 池小橙
0062.cn: 统子，出来救一下啊，你的技能不灵了！

0063.en: Chapter 63 Her Yandere Target is Su Tao!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 第63章 她病娇的对象，是苏桃！

0063.en: In Chi Xiaocheng's original script, she was pretending to be a yandere.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 在池小橙原来的剧本中，是她假装扮演病娇。

0063.en: She would act angry, blacken by about 3 times, and fight back and forth with Ye Liang.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 演出愤怒的感觉，黑化个3倍左右和叶良打得有来有回。

0063.en: Or she could blacken even more, making him feel a little intimidated, thereby temporarily ignoring his relationship with Su Tao, and incidentally harvesting a wave of emotion points.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 或者可以黑化得更多一点，让他对自己有些心悸，从而暂时忽略自己与苏桃的关系，顺便收割一波情绪值。

0063.en: This way, Ye Liang's attention would shift from Su Tao to herself. It would be best if it created an effect where he felt she was not to be trifled with, and even he, the son of destiny, had to retreat.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 这样，叶良的注意力就会从苏桃身上转移到自己这里，如果产生一种自己不好惹，连他这个气运之子也要退避三舍的效果是最好的。

0063.en: What Chi Xiaocheng wanted was to first change Ye Liang's perception of her. He had always disliked her and would constantly target her.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 池小橙要的就是先将叶良对自己改观，他一直厌恶自己只会不断针对。

0063.en: If he was scared, and she then deliberately showed estrangement from Su Tao, he might ignore her.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 如果他怕了，自己再故意表现出和苏桃疏远，没准会被他忽略。

0063.en: As long as he didn't interfere too much with her role as Su Tao's "ordinary female friend," Chi Xiaocheng would have plenty of opportunities to bend her cute Tao Tao.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 只要他不过多干涉自己作为苏桃的“普通女性朋友”，那么池小橙就有大把的机会将她可爱的桃桃掰弯。

0063.en: But Chi Xiaocheng never expected that the content performed by her intermediate acting skills would be something even she herself could barely maintain.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 但池小橙怎么也想不到，这中级演技所表演出来的内容，连她自己都快要装不下去了。

0063.en: Could it be that Ye Liang's male lead halo was too strong, greatly weakening this skill?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 难不成是叶良的男主光环太强，把这个技能大削了吗？

0063.en: Her acting in front of Su Tao and Si Chen was perfectly fine, and she was playing a yandere in both cases. Why was it full of flaws this time?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 明明平时在苏桃和司辰面前的演技，没有任何问题，同样是扮演一个病娇，这次怎么就破绽百出了。

0063.en: Plans couldn't keep up with changes. She didn't expect the system to malfunction at this critical moment!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 计划赶不上变化，她也没想到，这个时候系统出岔子啊！

0063.en: Now the knife had slipped from her hand and stabbed him in the thigh.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 如今刀脱手还扎中了人家大腿。

0063.en: Forget it, just faint.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 算了，继续晕吧。

0063.en: Chi Xiaocheng peacefully closed her eyes. One hand was hidden under her abdomen due to her posture, ready to buy another small knife from the system store in case of an accident.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 池小橙安详地闭上双眼，一只手因为姿势被藏在了腹部下，随时准备从系统商城里再买一把小刀以防出现意外。

0063.en: Alas, the system has failed me!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 唉，统子误我啊！

0063.en: [Host, the acting skill has actually been in use and has never stopped. You can't blame me for this!]
0063.speaker: 系统
0063.cn: 【宿主，演技技能其实一直在使用中，从未停过，这你不能怪我啊！】

0063.en: "Then I was so angry, why didn't I blacken?"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: “那我那么愤怒了，为什么没黑化？”

0063.en: [I don't know!]
0063.speaker: 系统
0063.cn: 【母鸡啊！】

0063.en: And can feigned anger count as anger?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 而且演的愤怒，能算愤怒？

0063.en: The system stated that it didn't want to take the blame.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 系统表示他不想背锅。

0063.en: Since things had come to this, Chi Xiaocheng's "fainting" after falling flat on the ground had become a fact.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 事已至此，池小橙平地摔后的“晕”，已经成了事实。

0063.en: And Ye Liang, after a burst of pain, gritted his teeth and looked at Chi Xiaocheng with lingering fear, "This guy, she's actually a yandere."
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: 而叶良，经过一阵疼痛之后，咬紧牙关眼神后怕地看着池小橙，“这个家伙，竟然还是个病娇。”

0063.en: Ye Liang knew a little about anime, but not much.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良懂点二次元，但不多。

0063.en: He never thought of killing Chi Xiaocheng. At most, it was intimidation and control. But he didn't expect this guy to actually try to kill him.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 他没想过对池小橙下杀手，充其量也就是恐吓和控制，却没想到，这家伙竟然想对自己下杀手。

0063.en: She wants to keep me here forever?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 她想把我永远留在这里？

0063.en: Hiss—
0063.speaker: 旁白

0063.en: Ye Liang's anger gradually faded. The pain made him regain his rationality and focus on treatment.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良眼中的愤怒渐渐淡去，疼痛使得他恢复了理智，并将精力放在治疗上。

0063.en: After calling his private doctor and a simple treatment, he looked at Chi Xiaocheng, who was being helped to the sofa by the female doctor and was in a daze.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 打电话通知了私人医生过来，简单处理过后，才看向被医生小姐扶到沙发上昏睡的池小橙。

0063.en: Ye Liang tapped his finger on the table, his eyes fixed on Chi Xiaocheng's cute face.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良食指就这么敲在桌子，眼睛一动不动地盯着池小橙的可爱小脸。

0063.en: She doesn't look like it.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 不像。

0063.en: Not at all!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 完全不像！

0063.en: She was completely different from the Chi Xiaocheng he remembered, who was short, clumsy, and had more foundation on her face than dirt on his shoe soles.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 简直和他记忆中那个又矮又挫，脸上粉底比鞋底污渍还厚的池小橙天差地别。

0063.en: If it weren't for the fact that it was too bizarre to think that way, Ye Liang would rather believe that this person had completely changed from the inside out, rather than face the reality that Chi Xiaocheng was a yandere beauty.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 如果不是那样想太离奇，与其面对池小橙是病娇美少女的事实，叶良更会觉得这家伙是不是从里到外都换了一个人。

0063.en: Humans are visual creatures.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 人都是视觉动物。

0063.en: When beauty surpasses a certain level.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 当颜值超越一定程度后。

0063.en: Short becomes petite.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 矮就变成了娇小。

0063.en: Clumsy becomes adorably clumsy.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 挫就变成了蠢萌。

0063.en: The madness that repeatedly hindered her development with Su Tao transformed into an extreme, pathological love.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 一次又一次阻挠她与苏桃发展的疯癫，一跃化身成病态到了极致的喜欢。

0063.en: Is it because she likes me that she used to target Su Tao like that, and even broke off her sisterly relationship with Su Tao?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 正因为她喜欢我，所以以前才会那样去针对苏桃，甚至与苏桃诀别姐妹关系？

0063.en: And now, why is she approaching Su Tao again?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 而如今，重新接近苏桃，又是为了什么？

0063.en: Ye Liang kept thinking, his face still extremely gloomy.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良不断思索，脸色依旧阴沉无比。

0063.en: One of the main reasons he fell in love with Su Tao was her unique temperament, different from ordinary girls.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 他会喜欢上苏桃的一大原因，就是苏桃有着与普通女孩不一样的气质。

0063.en: Gentle, meticulous, strong, unyielding to money and power, sacred like a moonlight, making people look up to her, unable to harbor any blasphemous thoughts.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 温柔、细心、坚强、不为金钱和权势折腰，神圣得像一轮月光，让人望而不及，生不出一丝亵渎的心思。

0063.en: Ye Liang believed that such a girl was unique in the world.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 这样的女孩子，叶良认为在世界上是独一无二的。

0063.en: But now, the person lying on the sofa in front of him was someone cherished by the girl he considered unique.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 可现在，眼前躺在沙发上的这家伙，反倒是他认为独一无二的少女所重视的人。

0063.en: Looking at Chi Xiaocheng, Ye Liang's face grew even gloomier.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 看着池小橙，叶良的脸色也愈发阴沉。

0063.en: Ye Liang sat in the living room until dark.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良一坐，就在客厅坐到了天黑。

0063.en: No one knew what he was thinking, but Chi Xiaocheng felt immense pressure.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 谁也不知道他在想什么，但池小橙压力却巨大无比。

0063.en: She had been waiting for Ye Liang to leave, then she would wake up and pretend nothing happened.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 她一直在等叶良走，然后睡醒蒙混过关。

0063.en: But this guy kept waiting for her to wake up.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 可这家伙，却一直在等着自己睡醒。

0063.en: Chi Xiaocheng held on for another half an hour, but had no choice but to wake up. As soon as she sat up, she met his deep eyes, which made her feel a little guilty.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 池小橙又撑了半个小时，没办法只能先醒来，一坐起就对上那深沉的眸子，让她有些心虚。

0063.en: Ye Liang raised an eyebrow, "From your expression, have you returned to normal? What, you don't want to keep me here?"
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: 叶良挑眉，“看你的眼神，是恢复正常了？怎么，不想把我留下了吗？”

0063.en: Chi Xiaocheng lowered her head, not daring to speak.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 池小橙低了低头，没敢接话。

0063.en: Ye Liang snorted coldly, "Tell me, since you dislike Su Tao so much, what's your purpose in approaching her?"
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: 叶良冷哼了一声，“说吧，你既然那么讨厌苏桃，又接近她到底有什么目的。”

0063.en: "Purpose?" Half of Chi Xiaocheng's eyes were covered by her bangs. She pretended to look sinisterly at Ye Liang, "Of course, it's to snatch her away from you!"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: “目的？”池小橙半边眸子被刘海遮住，就这样故作阴鸷地看着叶良，“当然是为了把她从你身边抢走了！”

0063.en: "Snatch... snatch away?"
0063.speaker: 叶良

0063.en: Ye Liang was stunned for a moment, as if he didn't understand what Chi Xiaocheng meant.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良愣了一下，好像没听懂池小橙这话的意思。

0063.en: Chi Xiaocheng chuckled, "Yes, you care about Su Tao a lot, don't you? I'll snatch her away from you and make her my possession!"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: 池小橙呵呵笑道，“是啊，你很在意苏桃吧，我会把她从你身边抢走，然后把她变成我的所有物！”

0063.en: Ye Liang heard this and stood up with a "whoosh," "Snatch her away? You? A girl?"
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: 叶良闻言，“唰”地一下站了起来，“抢走她？你？一个女生？”

0063.en: "So what? No matter what, you can't be with her!"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: “那又怎么了，无论如何你都不能和她在一起！”

0063.en: "Heh, hahahaha!" Ye Liang covered his face and laughed loudly, looking at Chi Xiaocheng mockingly, "You actually came up with such a method. Su Tao isn't that kind of girl. She'll only like me, and she'll definitely marry me in the future."
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: “呵，哈哈哈哈哈！”叶良捂脸大笑，嘲讽地看着池小橙，“真亏你能想出这种办法啊，苏桃可不是那种女生，她只会喜欢我，未来也肯定会嫁给我。”

0063.en: Chi Xiaocheng's crimson eyes suddenly became deep, with a hint of madness spreading, "What did you say?!"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: 池小橙赤红的眸子陡然变得幽深，隐约有一丝疯狂蔓延，“你说什么？！”

0063.en: Her entire aura was completely different from before. It was as if if Ye Liang said one more word, Chi Xiaocheng would rush forward and fight him again!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 整个人的气势和先前判若两人，好似叶良再多说一句，池小橙就会冲上去再次和他拼命！

0063.en: Ye Liang himself didn't expect Chi Xiaocheng to react so strongly when Su Tao was mentioned.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良本人都没想到，提到苏桃池小橙竟然会有那么大的反应。

0063.en: I just mentioned her, and you look like you're about to blacken.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 我只是提一下她，你就一副要黑化的样子。

0063.en: Do you like me that much?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 难道就那么喜欢我？

0063.en: Ye Liang's eyes became even more complex. He was a little unsure how to deal with Chi Xiaocheng.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 叶良的眼神更增添了一抹复杂，他有些拿捏不准要如何处理池小橙了。

0063.en: Warn her?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 警告她？

0063.en: Looking at her, it seems useless no matter what.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 看这样子，怎么都没用吧。

0063.en: Be harsh with her?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 对她下狠手？

0063.en: It would be fine if Su Tao didn't find out, but once Su Tao caught wind of it, their already strained relationship would probably completely break down.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 不被苏桃发现还好，一旦被苏桃发现苗头，本身就闹得很僵的关系怕不是彻底决裂。

0063.en: At that time, if Dongfang Yang or Si Chen took advantage of the situation, Ye Liang would have no chance.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 届时东方阳或者司辰那两个家伙趁虚而入，他叶良就再也没有机会了。

0063.en: Hiss—
0063.speaker: 旁白

0063.en: Or maybe... just ignore her?
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 要不就......不管她了？

0063.en: No, that won't do. I'm not sure what she'll do to Su Tao!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 不，不行，不确定她到底会对苏桃做出什么样的行动！

0063.en: Even if she likes me, I must eliminate her. The dangerous factor of a yandere is still too great!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 就算她喜欢我，那也必须排除掉，病娇的危险因素还是太大了！

0063.en: Ye Liang's eyes became fierce. He stood up and tried to pressure Chi Xiaocheng, replying to her previous words, "I said, you stinky woman, stop thinking about Su Tao. She's mine!"
0063.speaker: 叶良
0063.cn: 叶良视线狠辣了起来，起身就要压迫池小橙，回答着她刚刚的话，“我说，你一个臭女人，就别惦记着苏桃了，她是我的！”

0063.en: His possessiveness towards Su Tao was no less than Chi Xiaocheng's.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 他对苏桃的占有欲，也并未比池小橙要小。

0063.en: However, this sentence was like a knife, piercing through a thin layer of Chi Xiaocheng's acting.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 然而，这一句话，就仿佛一把刀，刺破了池小橙身上一层淡淡的演技。

0063.en: The emotions that had been hidden suddenly erupted. Her crimson eyes gradually turned into eerie and aggressive vertical pupils.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 原本还隐藏的情绪骤然迸发，赤瞳的眸子渐渐转为妖异而又具有攻击性的竖瞳。

0063.en: "Ye Liang!"
0063.speaker: 池小橙
0063.cn: “叶良！”

0063.en: With a "clink," Chi Xiaocheng grabbed the knife and took a step forward, stabbing directly towards Ye Liang's waist.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: “噌”地拿刀，池小橙一步踏向前，直直朝着叶良的腰子刺去。

0063.en: Only then did Ye Liang slowly react.
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 直至此时，叶良才缓缓反应过来。

0063.en: This guy, she was acting just now!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 这家伙，刚刚是演的！

0063.en: Her yandere target is Su Tao!
0063.speaker: 旁白
0063.cn: 她病娇的对象，是苏桃！

0064.en: Chapter 64 Tearing Off the Facade, Until Death Do Us Part (Bonus for Night into Starry Sky)
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 第64章 撕破脸皮，不死不休（为夜入星繁加更）

0064.en: In a sudden shock, the small knife, aimed directly at his waist, had already struck. Its speed was so fast that Ye Liang didn't even have time to counter and subdue her.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 骤惊之际，那一柄直直捅向腰间的小刀已经袭来，速度快到叶良甚至来不及反手制服。

0064.en: He barely managed to pull back and twist his waist, but his suit was still cut open at the waist, and a trickle of crimson flowed from the tip of the knife.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 堪堪撤身扭腰，可腰间的西装依旧被划开了一道口子，一缕鲜红的丝线顺着刀尖泛出。

0064.en: "You!"
0064.speaker: 叶良
0064.cn: “你这家伙！”

0064.en: Ye Liang turned sideways, lowering his head slightly, and met Chi Xiaocheng's vertical pupils, which glowed with a hint of crimson.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 叶良侧着身，稍稍低头，就对上了池小橙那泛着点点猩红的竖瞳。

0064.en: Like a fierce, maddened cat!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 似凶狠发了狂的猫咪！

0064.en: In a fleeting moment, Chi Xiaocheng tossed the knife into the air, and with a sidestep, her other hand instinctively caught the small knife and, with an inward thrust, stabbed directly at Ye Liang again.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 稍纵即逝间，池小橙的刀往空中一抛，一侧身另一只手便无师自通地接过了小刀，并以内插的方式，再度直直刺向叶良。

0064.en: Her body was small, and her movements were agile.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 她身子娇小，动作敏捷。

0064.en: However, Ye Liang, as the male lead, was not a pushover. After being startled, he reacted and, with a forceful slap, pushed away Chi Xiaocheng's knife-wielding hand.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 然而叶良作为男主，也不是软柿子，受惊后反应了过来，一巴掌就借着力将池小橙握刀的手给推开。

0064.en: At the same time, he quickly retreated two steps.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 同时迅速地后撤两步。

0064.en: Adjusting his posture.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 调整姿势。

0064.en: Like an enraged lion, "I originally didn't want to touch you because of Su Tao's desperate pleas, but you still dared to snatch Su Tao from me. You brought this upon yourself!"
0064.speaker: 叶良
0064.cn: 如一只暴怒的雄狮，“本来看在苏桃的苦苦哀求下我不想动你，结果你还敢跟我抢苏桃，这是你自找的！”

0064.en: How much of a threat could a 1.5-meter loli be?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 一个1米5的小萝莉能有多大威胁？

0064.en: With such soft attacks and strength, since he, Ye Liang, could subdue her once, the second time would be just as easy!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 就刚刚那样软绵绵的攻击和力气，他叶良既然能一次将她钳住，那么第二次也一样简单！

0064.en: Taking a big stride, Ye Liang reached out high and straight.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 大步迈出，叶良高高在上地直直伸手。

0064.en: He wanted to grab Chi Xiaocheng's neck again, like capturing a dragon, but when his eyes met her soft little hand, his expression changed drastically.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 如擒龙般想再度掐住池小橙的脖子，可撞上他眼中那软绵绵的小手时，脸色惊变。

0064.en: The small hand easily grabbed Ye Liang's wrist, and no matter how hard he tried, he couldn't move an inch forward.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 小手轻而易举地抓住了叶良的手腕，任他怎么用力都无法前进分毫。

0064.en: Why was her strength so great?!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 她的力气，为什么会那么大！

0064.en: She wasn't like this just now!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 明明刚刚还不是这样！

0064.en: Amidst his shock, a "click" sounded, followed by a hoarse scream.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 震惊之余，“咔哒”一声响起，旋即是一道嘶哑的尖叫。

0064.en: "Ugh—!"
0064.speaker: 叶良

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng dislocated his entire arm by twisting his wrist.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 一整条手臂被池小橙顺着手腕拧得脱臼。

0064.en: No, no, no!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 不对不对不对！

0064.en: Ye Liang retreated in horror, cold sweat pouring from his face, his breathing extremely disordered.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 叶良惊恐地后撤着，脸上冷汗溢出，气息紊乱无比。

0064.en: This guy is so small, why does she have so much strength?!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 这家伙那么瘦小，为什么会有那么大的力气！

0064.en: And...
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 而且

0064.en: Ye Liang looked at Chi Xiaocheng, who was walking towards him step by step, and couldn't help but swallow.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 叶良看向一步步走来的池小橙，不由咽了一口唾沫。

0064.en: At this moment, her tea-colored long hair was disheveled, partially covering her face. Only one eye remained under her messy bangs, its pupil vertical, glowing with a hint of crimson.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 此时的她，茶色长发散乱披下，小半遮住了脸颊，仅余下一只眸子在散乱的刘海下，瞳孔高竖，绽放点点红芒。

0064.en: The hand holding the small knife hung limply, and drops of crimson liquid flowed from the tip of the knife.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 握着小刀的手无力地自然垂下，点点鲜红的液体顺着刀尖流下。

0064.en: Tick-tock.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 滴答滴答。

0064.en: The liquid dripped, staining the floor with a vibrant red rose.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 液体垂落，在地板染出一朵艳红的玫瑰。

0064.en: Then it was covered by a huge shadow. Her small feet stepped on the vibrant red roses, walking towards him step by step.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 然后又被巨大的阴影覆盖，小脚就这样踩着朵朵艳红玫瑰，一步步向他走去。

0064.en: Blackening: Eight times!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 黑化：八倍！

0064.en: "Tao Tao, she's mine!"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “桃桃，她是我的！”

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng murmured softly, then with a "whoosh," she darted out again.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 池小橙一句呢喃低声说完，“噌”地一下又窜了出去。

0064.en: "Damn it!"
0064.speaker: 叶良
0064.cn: “该死！”

0064.en: Ye Liang almost scrambled towards the door, shouting loudly, "What are you doing out there? Get in here and help!"
0064.speaker: 叶良
0064.cn: 叶良几乎连滚带爬地朝着门口跑去，同时大声喊道，“你们还在外面干什么，还不进来帮忙！”

0064.en: The door outside had been left open, and the bodyguards were dutifully standing guard outside.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 外面的房门一直没关，保镖恪尽职守地在外面当门神。

0064.en: Upon hearing Ye Liang's voice, the man in the suit outside suddenly burst in.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 听到叶良的声音后，在外面的西装男才陡然闯入。

0064.en: It was the same man in the suit who had chased Chi Xiaocheng in the basement.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 正是当时地下室追到了池小橙的那个西装男。

0064.en: He glanced at the blackened Chi Xiaocheng, then saw his young master clutching an arm and fleeing in a panic, with a long, bleeding wound on his waist.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 他瞥了眼黑化的池小橙，又见自家少爷捂着一条手臂慌张逃跑，腰间还划了好长一道染红的伤口。

0064.en: Ye Liang glared at the man in the suit, "What are you looking at? Go kill that guy!"
0064.speaker: 叶良
0064.cn: 叶良怒目看向西装男，“还看什么，你快去把那家伙干掉！”

0064.en: "Ah? Me?"
0064.speaker: 西装男

0064.en: The man in the suit met Chi Xiaocheng's strange vertical pupils and immediately felt a surge of fear.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 西装男对上了池小橙奇异的竖瞳，顿时心生恐惧。

0064.en: One of the effects of cat pupils is to instill fear in those who meet their gaze.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 猫瞳的效果之一，便是让对视的人产生恐惧。

0064.en: This guy is clearly not right!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 这家伙显然不对劲吧！

0064.en: The man in the suit felt his scalp tingle. Without a word, he picked up Ye Liang and ran, "Young Master, let's go to the hospital first. I've been in this business for many years, and I disdain hitting women!"
0064.speaker: 西装男
0064.cn: 西装男只觉得头皮发麻，二话不说扛起叶良就跑，“少爷，咱们还是先去医院吧，我从业多年，不屑打女人！”

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't chase after them until they left. She only recovered belatedly, then collapsed exhausted by the entrance.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 直至他们离开，池小橙都没有追出去，只是后知后觉地恢复，旋即力竭地倒在了玄关门口边。

0064.en: Her eyes gradually regained rationality. Chi Xiaocheng breathed a sigh of relief, "I was impulsive."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: 双眸渐渐恢复理智，池小橙呼了口气，“冲动了啊。”

0064.en: [Host, have you recovered?]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【宿主，你恢复了？】

0064.en: "I was fine to begin with." Chi Xiaocheng poked her head out and glanced at the corridor camera, "It's a good thing the blackening skill worked at the critical moment. It's so annoying when it works sometimes and not others."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “我本来就没什么事。”池小橙探出小脑袋，瞥了眼走廊的摄像头，“还好关键时刻黑化技能起效果了，时灵时不灵的，真让人难受。”

0064.en: "System, do you think it's because Ye Liang mentioned Su Tao, and his male lead halo was diluted by the female lead halo, that I was able to activate the blackening skill at the critical moment?"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “统子，你说会不会是因为叶良提到了苏桃，她的男主光环被女主光环冲淡后，所以我才能在关键时刻发动黑化技能？”

0064.en: [Host, is there a possibility that you yourself haven't realized that you are actually a little... I mean, a little bit yandere, which is why you can trigger the blackening skill?]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【宿主，有没有一种可能，其实你自己都没发现你其实稍微...我是说稍微，稍微有一点病娇，所以才能触发黑化技能？】

0064.en: "Huh?" Chi Xiaocheng scoffed, "Can't I tell if I'm a yandere myself? Whether it's the dependence, possessiveness, exclusion, or other types I've displayed, I've consciously acted them out, okay?"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “哈？”池小橙嗤笑一声，“我是不是病娇我自己能不知道吗，无论是我表现出来的依存、独占、排除等几个类型，都是我有意识演的好不好。”

0064.en: "Of course I'm not a yandere."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “我当然不是病娇了。”

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng waved her hand, her face normal, "Alright, don't mention this anymore. I know my own situation. Instead, whether it was last time or this time, after the blackening skill is triggered, I become very weak. What's going on?"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: 池小橙摆摆手，一脸正常，“行了，这个事你就别提了，我自己的情况我知道，倒不如说无论是上次还是这次，黑化技能触发后，我都会变得很虚弱，这是什么情况？”

0064.en: [Although blackening multiplies the host's combat power, it essentially compresses the body's potential. After the blackening state is removed, it will feedback negative weakness to the body based on the multiplier.]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【黑化虽说会成倍增强宿主战力，但本质也是压缩身体的潜能，黑化状态消除后会根据倍率反馈负面的虚弱给身体的】

0064.en: "So that's it."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “原来如此。”

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng exhaled again, her expression becoming complex, "Rather, the real trouble is yet to come. This blackening skill, besides making me weak afterwards, also affects my rationality. Otherwise, I wouldn't have been so impulsive just now."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: 池小橙又呼了一口气，脸色变得复杂了起来，“倒不如说，接下来才是真的麻烦，这黑化技能除了会让我事后变得虚弱外，还会影响我的理智，否则我刚刚也不会那么冲动了。”

0064.en: "Now, Tao Tao might not even be able to protect me."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “现在，桃桃可能都保不住我。”

0064.en: Given the situation just now, it's no exaggeration to say that she's now in a fight to the death with Ye Liang!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 就刚刚的情况，毫不夸张地说，已经和叶良不死不休了！

0064.en: A cannon fodder villain, directly confronting one of the male leads?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 一个反派炮灰，直面男主之一？

0064.en: "It's truly a difficult challenge."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “真是个艰难的挑战啊。”

0064.en: [Host, you should act as soon as possible. Ye Liang's character will definitely seek revenge. How about letting the female lead Su Tao help?]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【宿主，还是尽早行动吧，叶良的人设绝对会报复的，要不让女主苏桃去帮忙一下？】

0064.en: "Impossible!" Chi Xiaocheng's voice was firm, "Last time, that guy took an inch and wanted Tao Tao to be his maid. Now that we've torn off the facade, he'll definitely restrict Tao Tao!"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “不可能！”池小橙声音坚决，“上次那家伙就得寸进尺想让桃桃当她女仆了，这下撕破脸皮，他绝对会限制桃桃的！”

0064.en: "However, this is also an opportunity..."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “不过，这也是个机会......”

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng took out her phone, murmuring as she looked at Su Tao's WeChat profile picture.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 池小橙拿出手机，呢喃的同时看向了苏桃的微信头像。

0064.en: She and Ye Liang had fallen out, and the conflict had intensified.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 自己和叶良闹掰，矛盾激化。

0064.en: As the object of contention, Su Tao, despite intentionally not getting involved, would ultimately have to make a choice.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 作为被争夺的苏桃，尽管有意不让她掺和，可最终肯定逃不开一样抉择。

0064.en: Choose herself?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 是选自己？

0064.en: Or choose Ye Liang, who she still had some good feelings for?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 还是选仍有些好感的叶良？

0064.en: Tao Tao, you can't choose Ye Liang!
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: 桃桃啊，你可不能选叶良呢！

0064.en: A red light flashed in Chi Xiaocheng's eyes, and she flipped to Doctor Cheng's alt account.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 池小橙眼中红芒一闪而逝，翻过了成医生的小号。

0064.en: She had a new plan, a plan to make Su Tao and Ye Liang fall out!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 她有了个新的计划，让苏桃和叶良闹翻的计划！

0064.en: "But before that, I need bodyguards."
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “不过在那之前，我需要保镖。”

0064.en: [Bodyguards?]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【保镖？】

0064.en: The system expressed confusion.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 系统发出疑惑。

0064.en: [Host, although you have 1635 emotion points left after adding the few hundred provided by Ye Liang just now, you can't buy people in the shop. Should you ask the other male lead, Si Chen?]
0064.speaker: 系统
0064.cn: 【宿主，虽说你加上刚刚叶良提供的几百情绪值还有1635点，可商城里买不出人哦，找另一个男主司辰吗？】

0064.en: "Si Chen is not trustworthy for now." Chi Xiaocheng shook her head and clicked on a person's WeChat.
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: “司辰暂时还信不过。”池小橙摇了摇头，点进了一个人的微信。

0064.en: She typed and sent a message, "Brother, I'm being bullied. Can you bring some people back to help me?"
0064.speaker: 池小橙
0064.cn: 打字发送消息，“哥，我被欺负了，你能带点人回来帮我吗？”

0064.en: The message was received and replied almost instantly.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 消息收到后，几乎秒回。

0064.en: Invincible Brother: "Okay, I'll be home at midnight tonight."
0064.speaker: 天下无敌的哥哥
0064.cn: 天下无敌的哥哥：“好，今晚凌晨我会到家的。”

0064.en: Looking at the few words of reply, Chi Xiaocheng's heart warmed.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 看着寥寥几字的回复，池小橙心中一暖。

0064.en: To be honest, she didn't want to involve her brother.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 说实话，她不想牵扯自己的哥哥进来。

0064.en: But...
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 但

0064.en: Plans can't keep up with changes!
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 计划赶不上变化啊！

0064.en: Chi Xiaocheng then switched to Doctor Cheng's alt account and slowly edited a message to send to Su Tao.
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 池小橙又划到了成医生的小号，缓缓编辑了一条消息发给苏桃。

0064.en: So, between me and Ye Liang, Tao Tao, will you choose me?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 那么接下来，我和叶良之间，桃桃你会不会选我呢？

0064.en: Will you, or will you?
0064.speaker: 旁白
0064.cn: 是会呢，还是会呢？

0065.en: Chapter 65 Find a Psychologist for Xiaocheng
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 第65章 给小橙找个心理医生

0065.en: It seemed like a telepathic connection. Chi Xiaocheng had just sent a message of concern to Su Tao using her Doctor Cheng account.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 似乎是心有灵犀，池小橙刚用成医生的账号给苏桃发去了关心询问的消息。

0065.en: Su Tao also sent a worried message at the same time, "Doctor Cheng, I've confirmed that Xiaocheng is really a yandere. She even locked me in the house these past few days. What should I do?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 苏桃也在同一时间发来了担忧，“成医生，我确认了小橙真的是病娇，这些天她还把我关在了房子里，我要怎么办啊？”

0065.en: "She's probably still in a daze."
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: “她恐怕还处在迷茫中吧。”

0065.en: Chi Xiaocheng put Ye Liang's matter aside. Her mind recalled Su Tao's sweet, thin lips, and she couldn't help but smile.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 池小橙将叶良的事情搁置到一边，脑海回忆到了苏桃那甜美的薄唇，不由自主就勾起了笑容。

0065.en: "If something like this happened, even the closest person, Tao Tao, probably wouldn't dare to speak of it. Chen Qian, who used to have a good relationship with her, Si Chen, who claimed to be a friend, or anyone else she didn't know."
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: “发生这样的事情，即便是最亲近的人桃桃恐怕都不敢说，往日关系还算不错的陈倩，自诩是朋友的司辰，又或者其他自己不知道的谁谁谁。”

0065.en: "Anyone in reality, she probably wouldn't tell them about this, because if she did, I would be subjected to strange looks, and in severe cases, even be taken away."
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: “凡是现实中的人，她恐怕都不会将这件事说出，因为说出去后我会遭受异样的眼光，严重点甚至会被抓走。”

0065.en: "Ah~ even after experiencing such a thing, she's willing to keep the secret for me~"
0065.speaker: 池小橙
0065.cn: “啊~即便遭遇这样的事情，也愿意为了我而藏住秘密~”

0065.en: Chi Xiaocheng felt her heart pound. She gazed greedily at the WeChat ID named "Peach," as if seeing Su Tao, conflicted and confused, on the other side of the phone.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 池小橙感觉心跳得厉害，贪恋地看着名为“桃子”的微信ID，好似看到了手机对面纠结又迷茫的苏桃。

0065.en: "She doesn't dare to confide in the people around her, so she can only keep it to herself. There aren't many netizens, and the only Doctor Cheng she can rely on, who is also a stranger, is me."
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: “身边的人不敢去倾诉，只能憋在心里，网上的网友不多，唯一可以依赖，又互不相识的成医生还是我。”

0065.en: "This is simply wonderful!"
0065.speaker: 池小橙
0065.cn: “这实在是太棒了！”

0065.en: Doctor Orange, I, of course, must treat my sick Tao Tao well.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 橙医生我呀，当然要好好治疗生病的桃桃了

0065.en: Chi Xiaocheng naturally wouldn't talk about the flaws. She pretended to be ignorant, "Miss Peach, how did she lock you up? Haven't you been chatting with me these past few days? Did she take your phone?"
0065.speaker: 池小橙
0065.cn: 破绽池小橙自然不会去聊，一副装懵的样子，“桃子小姐，她怎么把你关起来了，这些天你不是都在和我聊天吗，难道手机被她拿了？”

0065.en: "Yes, yes, yes, that's right!"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: “对对对，就是这样！”

0065.en: Su Tao was in the dormitory, her face filled with relief and excitement.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 苏桃在宿舍中，脸上多了一丝宽慰和激动。

0065.en: Doctor Cheng was indeed a psychological expert who understood yanderes. He easily deduced her situation.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 成医生不愧是懂病娇的心理专家，轻易推测出了自己的情况。

0065.en: She continued typing: "Three days ago, I went to test if she was really a yandere, and then she knocked me out. I couldn't access any outside information, and I was only released just now."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 继续敲字：“三天前我去试探她是不是真的病娇，结果就被她弄晕了，接触不到外面的信息，一直到现在才被放出来。”

0065.en: Peach: "Doctor, what should I do? Is Xiaocheng still curable?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“医生你说要怎么办啊，小橙她还有救吗？”

0065.en: Even now, she still hadn't given up on the possibility of treatment.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 直至现在，她心底依旧没放弃治疗的可能。

0065.en: What if?
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 万一呢？

0065.en: Right.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 对吧。

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "I'm not sure about that either. Theoretically, there's still a chance for treatment, but I don't know the specific situation of your friend Orange, so I can't make a conclusion."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“这点我也不确定，理论上是还有治疗的机会的，但是我不清楚你那位橙子朋友的具体情况，无法下定论。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "She can still release you from the dark room. From your description, it doesn't seem that serious."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“她还能把你从小黑屋里放出来，听你的描述倒也没那么严重。”

0065.en: Peach: "Doctor Cheng, I'm in Jiuzhou City. How about you take some time to observe Xiaocheng? I'll reimburse you for any expenses incurred."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“成医生，我在九州市，要不您抽个时间过来观察一下小橙怎么样，中途需要的费用由我来报销。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "Uh..."
0065.speaker: 成医生

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "Sorry, I have a very serious patient on hand right now, so I can't spare any time."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“抱歉哈，我手头上也有一个很严重的病人，暂时抽不开身。”

0065.en: Peach: "Is it also a yandere?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“也是病娇吗？”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "Yes, the person she liked couldn't stand her yandere tendencies and abandoned her. Yesterday, she threatened to jump off a building, and I just rescued her."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“嗯，她喜欢的人受不了她的病娇于是抛弃了她，昨天闹着跳楼，刚救下来。”

0065.en: Peach: "That serious? Did she really jump?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“这么严重，真的跳了吗？”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "Yes, 12 floors high. Although I caught her, she still broke a leg. I'm getting a headache taking on this patient."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“是啊，12楼那么高，虽然接住了，但还是摔折了一条腿，接手这个病人我也感到头疼。”

0065.en: Peach: "This..."
0065.speaker: 苏桃

0065.en: Doctor Cheng's words reminded Su Tao of the rooftop at that time.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 成医生的话让苏桃回忆起了那会儿的天台。

0065.en: If there had been a slight accident then, and she hadn't taken it seriously, the person who would have been in trouble would have been Xiaocheng.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 如果当时出现了一点意外，她将这件事情不当作一回事，这个出事的人，就是小橙了吧。

0065.en: Peach: "What should I do now?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“那现在我该怎么办？”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "I suggest you don't let her suffer any stimulation. Yanderes usually don't know they are yanderes. The blackening of such people is incremental. It starts mildly, and then gets heavier and heavier as they fall deeper."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“我建议是你别让她遭受任何刺激，病娇通常不会知道自己是病娇，这类人的黑化是递增的，一开始比较轻缓，在越陷越深后，就会越来越重。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "Similarly, the general treatment method is to watch over her, pay attention to your own behavior, and stand by her no matter what happens, without stimulating her."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“同理，通用的治疗方式是，在她身边看着她，注意自己的行为，无论发生什么事情都站在她身边，不去刺激她。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "After her emotions stabilize for a long time, she will treat it as normal. At that time, you can try to gradually contact people other than her, starting from the lightest and gradually deepening her bottom line, supplemented by medication, until she returns to normal."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“她的情绪稳定久了之后，会将那当作日常，届时你就可以去尝试一点点接触她以外的人，从最轻开始一点点加深她的底线，配以药物的辅助，直至恢复正常。”

0065.en: Peach: "Is that the only way?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“只能这样了吗？”

0065.en: Peach: "Doctor Cheng, when will you be free?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“成医生，您什么时候有时间呀？”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "I might have some time in about three months."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“大概三个月后能腾出时间吧。”

0065.en: Three months, that's too long.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 三个月，太久了啊。

0065.en: Su Tao sighed. Given Chi Xiaocheng's current state, she might have another conflict with Ye Liang later.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 苏桃叹了口气，以池小橙当今的状态，之后没准还会和叶良再起一次争执。

0065.en: Thinking of Ye Liang, Su Tao's eyebrows subtly furrowed.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 想到叶良，苏桃秀眉便微不可察地皱了皱。

0065.en: If the two of them met, Xiaocheng would definitely enter a yandere state.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 他们俩要是见面的话，小橙绝对会进入病娇状态。

0065.en: This must not happen!
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 绝不能让这种事情发生！

0065.en: Su Tao: "Doctor Cheng, do you know any other doctors in this field? I'd like to ask one to examine Xiaocheng."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 苏桃：“成医生，你认识其他这方面领域的医生吗，我想请一个帮小橙看看。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "I don't recommend it unless it's a psychologist who specializes in the niche field of yanderes. If you categorize your friend as having a normal psychological illness and treat her, then she's truly beyond saving."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“如果不是专门研究过病娇这一冷门类型的心理医生我并不建议，要是将你那位朋友归结为正常的心理疾病并治疗，才是真正地没救了。”

0065.en: Sitting at home, Chi Xiaocheng had a bit of a headache.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 坐在家里，池小橙有些头疼。

0065.en: As Doctor Cheng, she could only exist online.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 自己作为成医生始终只能在网络。

0065.en: It was reasonable for Su Tao to think of finding a doctor to help.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 苏桃会想到找一个医生帮忙看也合理。

0065.en: But she wasn't a yandere, so she couldn't really let a doctor examine her.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 但她又不是病娇，不能真的让医生看啊。

0065.en: Si Chen, with his half-baked psychology knowledge, saw through her acting. If a legitimate, licensed psychologist came, wouldn't her intermediate and unstable acting skills be completely exposed?
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 司辰那半桶水心理学专业都看破了自己的演技，来个正经有执照的心理医生，中级且不稳定的演技技能岂不是无所遁形？

0065.en: Peach: "Thank you, Doctor. I think I understand now. I have a wealthy friend with extensive connections. I'll ask him if he can find a suitable doctor."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“谢谢医生，我大概明白了，我有一个比较有钱的朋友，他人脉广，我去问问他能不能找到专业对口的医生。”

0065.en: Oh no, is the truth that I'm not a yandere about to be exposed?!
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 坏了，该不会真的要被照妖镜照了吧！

0065.en: A wealthy friend?
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 有钱的朋友？

0065.en: Exclude that little b*stard Ye Liang first.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 先排除叶良那小逼。

0065.en: Is it Dongfang Yang or Si Chen?
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 剩下是东方阳还是司辰？

0065.en: Before Chi Xiaocheng could think further, she received another message from Su Tao: "By the way, Doctor Cheng, are there any special medicines that can keep the appearance of food the same, but make it taste rotten?"
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 池小橙来不及多想，就又收到了苏桃发来的消息：“对了成医生，有什么特殊的药物，能将饭菜外表不变，但味道变得像是腐烂了一样吗？”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "This... I'm a psychologist, so I don't really know much about that."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“这……我是心理方面的医生，还真没怎么了解过这些。”

0065.en: Peach: "Okay."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“好吧。”

0065.en: Doctor Cheng: "However, if you're sure it's not a problem with your taste buds, it might not be medicine. It could also be related to the raw ingredients of the food. You can ask some chef friends."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 成医生：“不过你要是确认不是你味蕾出问题的话，也不一定是药物，可能也跟食材的原材料有关，你可以找点厨师朋友问问。”

0065.en: Su Tao sighed. She didn't have many friends to begin with.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 苏桃叹了口气，她本身就没太多朋友。

0065.en: Indeed, thinking about such things was too troublesome.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 果然想那种事情还是太麻烦了吧。

0065.en: Anyway, it's all in the past. In the dark room... besides the bad memories, there were other feelings too.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 反正事情已经过去了，小黑屋里……除了那不好的回忆外，倒也不是没其他感觉。

0065.en: Su Tao's fingertips rubbed her lips, as if recalling Chi Xiaocheng's softness.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 苏桃指尖摩挲了一下嘴唇，好似在回忆池小橙的柔软。

0065.en: Peach: "Doctor Cheng, thank you for all your trouble during this time."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“成医生，这段时间都麻烦您了。”

0065.en: A 200 yuan red packet was sent.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 一个200块的红包发了过来。

0065.en: Peach: "Sorry, I don't have much money right now. I'll pay you back after I get my part-time job salary at the end of the month."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“抱歉，我暂时还没什么钱，等月末我兼职的钱发下来后，再补给您。”

0065.en: Chi Xiaocheng naturally accepted the 200 yuan, "Didn't I tell you? You don't need to do this until it shows results. This 200 yuan is enough for a month's consultation fee. I'll feel more at ease if I accept it, and you can still come to me with any questions later."
0065.speaker: 成医生
0065.cn: 池小橙自然地将200块领走，“我不是说过了吗，在没起成效之前，都不需要这样的，这200当接下来一个月的咨询费够了，我收了你也会安心点吧，之后有任何问题依旧可以来找我。”

0065.en: Peach: "Thank you, Doctor. I'll ask my friends if they know any doctors in this field first."
0065.speaker: 苏桃
0065.cn: 桃子：“谢谢医生，我找朋友问问有没有这方面的医生先。”

0065.en: As she finished speaking, Chi Xiaocheng gasped.
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 话落，池小橙便倒吸了一口凉气。

0065.en: Oh no, is the truth that I'm not a yandere about to be exposed?!
0065.speaker: 旁白
0065.cn: 完蛋，我不是病娇的真相该不会要被拆穿了吧？

0066.en: Chapter 66 Brother Returns
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 第66章 哥哥回归

0066.en: Night fell like ink. While Chi Xiaocheng was worried about the psychologist, in Lizhi City, Chi Song had already bought a high-speed rail ticket back to Jiuzhou City.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 夜色如墨，就在池小橙因为心理医生的这个事而担忧的时候，另一边的荔枝市，池松已经买好了回九州市的高铁票。

0066.en: "Brother Long, I'm here to say goodbye."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “龙哥，我是来道别的。”

0066.en: Chi Song walked into the hall wearing a jacket, shaking off the snowflakes from his head. His scarred face looked somewhat eerie.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 池松披着一件夹克衫走入厅堂，又抖了抖头上的雪花，疤痕累累的脸有些渗人。

0066.en: Brother Long had only one ear, and like Chi Song, his face was also scarred.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 龙哥只有一只耳朵，和池松一样的是他的脸也是一片疤。

0066.en: He turned to look at Chi Song, then handed him a cigarette, "Are you really going back? To be honest, after this job, I planned to promote you to the Fourth Hall. If you leave now, others might criticize you."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: 转头看了眼池松后，递过去一支烟，“真的要回去么，说实话干完这次的活我打算将你提到四堂里去的，你这样就走可能会遭其他人诟病。”

0066.en: Chi Song took the cigarette. When he reached for his lighter, Brother Long offered him a light.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 池松接过烟，伸手想掏打火机时，又见龙哥将火递了过来。

0066.en: He exhaled a puff of smoke, "Brother Long, to be honest, I don't care about that position. You know I'm working hard here for my little sister. She usually doesn't tell me when she's in trouble. This is the first time she's asked for my help. As her brother, I have to go back."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 他吐了口烟雾，“龙哥，说实话我也不在乎那个位置，你也知道我在这打拼是为了我小妹，她平时遇到麻烦都不和我说的，第一次找我帮忙，当哥的怎么说也得回去。”

0066.en: His fierce face revealed a simple smile, "Years ago, I wronged my parents and broke ties with them to join the underworld. She's my only sister now."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 他凶悍的脸露出了憨厚的笑容，“早些年我对不起我父母，和他们决裂了跑出来混社会，就这一个妹妹了。”

0066.en: "That's true." Brother Long flicked his cigarette, "How long will you be gone?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “说得也是。”龙哥抖了抖烟，“回去多久？”

0066.en: "Not sure. I should be back within half a month." Chi Song smiled, "Just let Little Four take my place. He's more clever. But there's one thing, Brother Long, you need to pay attention to."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “不太清楚，半个月内我应该会回来的。”池松笑了笑，“让小四喜接我位置就行了，他比较机灵，不过有一点龙哥你要注意一下。”

0066.en: Chi Song's expression became a little more serious, "Didn't we take down a batch of Ye family's underground businesses last time? Their hands haven't retracted yet. Recently, someone named Si contacted me and provided me with a lot of information about the Ye family."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 池松脸色变得严肃了一些，“上次我们不是端了一批姓叶的地下产业吗，他们的伸过来的手还没缩回去，最近有一个姓司的联系了我，给我提供了不少那叶家的信息。”

0066.en: Brother Long raised an eyebrow, "Trying to use us as a weapon?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: 龙哥挑了挑眉，“想拿我们当枪使？”

0066.en: Chi Song nodded, "Probably. This batch of Ye family people were sent by Ye Liang. You need to consider whether to kill them, Brother Long."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 池松点头，“估计是了，这批姓叶的是那个叶良派来的人，要不要下死手龙哥你得斟酌一下。”

0066.en: Brother Long sneered, "In Lizhi City, even a tiger has to lie low for me. Even if we agree, other gangs won't just watch their share of the pie being taken. You just go back. Don't worry about these things."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: 龙哥冷笑一声，“在这荔枝市，是虎也得给我卧着，就算咱们同意，其他帮派也不会看着自己的蛋糕被人分走的，你回去就行了，不用担心这些。”

0066.en: "Alright." Chi Song nodded, "I'll take ten people back. I'll contact you, Brother Long, if anything happens."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “那行。”池松点头，“我带十个人回去，有什么事情我再联系龙哥你。”

0066.en: "Leaving directly this late?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “这么晚了直接走？”

0066.en: "Yes, I've bought a high-speed rail ticket."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “是啊，买了高铁票了。”

0066.en: Brother Long looked at Chi Song in surprise, "Songzi, I haven't treated you badly these past two years, have I? Isn't a few million enough for you to buy a car?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: 龙哥诧异地看着池松，“松子，哥这两年没亏待你吧，大几百万还不够你买一辆车？”

0066.en: Chi Song scratched his head awkwardly, "My little sister has always been very weak. She suffered several mental traumas years ago. Didn't I meet a great doctor in my hometown before? He said the treatment would cost a lot of money, so I've been giving him all my money these past two years to help treat my little sister."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 池松不好意思地挠了挠头，“我小妹身子一直很虚弱，早些年受过几次精神创伤，之前不是在我老家认识了个厉害的医生嘛，他说治疗要很多钱，这两年的钱都给他去帮忙治疗我小妹了。”

0066.en: Brother Long frowned, "What kind of injury costs millions? You weren't scammed, were you?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: 龙哥皱了皱眉，“什么伤需要几百万，你该不会是被骗了吧？”

0066.en: "Probably not. He often tells me about my little sister's situation, and he has photos too. Last time I video called my little sister, she looked quite energetic."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “应该不会，他经常跟我说一些小妹的情况，各种照片也有的，上次我和小妹视频通话，看她挺精神的。”

0066.en: "Besides, money is meant to be spent, isn't it? My little sister's good complexion proves that the money was well spent, no harm done."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “况且钱不就是拿来花的嘛，小妹她气色不错证明这钱花得值，不碍事。”

0066.en: "Alright." Brother Long saw this and said no more. Instead, he picked up a key from the table and threw it over, "Also, you're already a boss, and you have many subordinates. What kind of image is it to take your subordinates back home by high-speed rail?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “行吧。”龙哥见状，也不多说，而是拿起桌子上的一把钥匙扔了过去，“还有啊，你都当老大了，手底下你也有不少小弟，回家带小弟坐高铁像什么样？”

0066.en: "Take my car back, and then have your subordinates pick up two more cars. You don't have to rush back. Spend more time with your sister."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “开我的车回去吧，再让你小弟去提两辆车，也不用急着回来，多陪陪你妹。”

0066.en: "Okay, thank you, Brother Long!"
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “好，谢谢龙哥！”

0066.en: "Thank me for what? If you hadn't blocked a knife for me back then, I wouldn't have just lost an ear. Now get lost. If you're in a hurry to go back, don't be sentimental with me here."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “谢啥，当年要不是你替我挡一刀，我就不止丢一只耳朵那么简单了，快滚吧，着急回去就别在这给老子煽情了。”

0066.en: After sending Chi Song away, Brother Long lit another cigarette and tapped on the table.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 打发走池松后，龙哥又点了一支烟，敲了敲桌子。

0066.en: Soon, another subordinate came in, "Brother Long, what are your orders?"
0066.speaker: 小弟
0066.cn: 没多时又一个小弟进来，“龙哥，有什么吩咐？”

0066.en: "Send someone to investigate that doctor Chi Song contacted, see what he's about. Also, aren't there a few disabled guys in the gang who keep saying they want to find some work?"
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “派人去查一下池松联系的那个医生，看看是什么门道，另外帮里不是有几个残废的家伙，一直说什么想找点活干？”

0066.en: "Yes." The subordinate nodded, "You sent them to guard the warehouse, but they said it was too boring and they wanted to continue mixing with the gang like Deputy Hall Master Chi. Missing hands and feet doesn't matter."
0066.speaker: 小弟
0066.cn: “是的。”小弟点头，“他们被您派去看仓库了，但他们说那样太无聊了，想像池副堂主一样继续混着，缺手断脚不碍事。”

0066.en: "A bunch of stubborn donkeys." Brother Long flicked his cigarette ash, "Send them to Chi Song's hometown. Let them find a piece of land there to farm and retire. Tell them their mission is to protect Chi Song's parents. Go."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “一群倔驴。”龙哥抖了抖烟灰，“打发他们去池松老家，让他们在那找块地耕着养老，任务就说是保护池松的父母，下去吧。”

0066.en: After saying that, Brother Long smoked and looked out the window, his face heavy.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 说罢，龙哥又吸着烟看向窗外，脸色沉重。

0066.en: "Jiuzhou City is the Ye family's base... it's not easy to deal with."
0066.speaker: 龙哥
0066.cn: “九州市可是叶家大本营...不好搞啊。”

0066.en: Time gradually passed. After a seven-hour journey, Chi Song and ten subordinates drove into Jiuzhou City.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 时间渐渐流逝，经过七小时的长途，池松也和十个小弟开车入了九州市境内。

0066.en: It was already 3 AM. Although the three subordinates in Chi Song's car were tired, their faces still showed a hint of anticipation.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 至此已经凌晨3点，和池松坐一车的三个小弟虽然疲惫，但脸上还是有着些许期待。

0066.en: "Brother Song, we'll be at your house in half an hour. What's your sister's name? Orange, right? Will I be able to call her sister then?"
0066.speaker: 小弟
0066.cn: “松哥，还有半小时内就要到你家了，你妹妹叫啥，橙子是吗，到时候俺是不是也能被她喊一声哥哥啊。”

0066.en: The dark-skinned man driving was in a good mood.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 开车的汉子黝黑，心情显得很是不错。

0066.en: Chi Song chuckled, "Old Hei, if you dare to have any ideas about my little sister, I'll break your legs."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 池松笑着打趣，“老黑你要是敢对我小妹有想法，看我不打断你的腿。”

0066.en: "Hey, what are you saying?" Liang Hei shrugged, "We're brothers. Your little sister is naturally my little sister. I'm old and don't have a family. I probably won't find a wife. Can't I even fulfill this small wish of hearing our sister call me brother?"
0066.speaker: 梁黑
0066.cn: “嘿，这话说的。”梁黑耸了耸肩，“咱们是兄弟，你小妹自然是我小妹了，我一把年纪了也没个家人，老婆怕是讨不到咯，听咱妹妹喊一声哥这小愿望都不能满足？”

0066.en: "Get lost. You're old enough to be an uncle."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “滚蛋，你的年纪，当叔都够了。”

0066.en: "I'm only 28, what uncle? I'm still young!"
0066.speaker: 梁黑
0066.cn: “老子才28，当什么叔，年轻着呢！”

0066.en: Chi Song said seriously, "Let's agree beforehand, if you really see her, don't mention anything about the gang, okay? We brothers all met while working and moving bricks."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: 池松正色道，“事先说好啊，如果真见到了人，不要提帮派的事情知道了吗，兄弟几个都是干活搬砖时认识的。”

0066.en: "But speaking of which, I haven't seen my little sister in almost three years. I wonder how she's doing now. I hope she doesn't despise me for being disabled."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “不过说起来，我也有快三年没见过小妹了，也不知道她现在怎么样了，希望别嫌弃我一个残废。”

0066.en: While chatting, they soon arrived at the community gate.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 闲话间，很快就回到了小区大门口。

0066.en: Ever since Brother Long gave him this house, Chi Song had never lived in it. He just let Chi Xiaocheng keep a room for herself, filling it with a few daily necessities, waiting for him to return.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 自从龙哥送这一套房子给他，池松连一次都没住过，只是让池小橙留了一个自己的房间，填充了一点生活物品等他回来。

0066.en: Who knew he hadn't returned even once until now.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 谁知到现在，一次都没回来过。

0066.en: "Brother Song, we're going to the hotel first."
0066.speaker: 小弟
0066.cn: “松哥，兄弟们先去酒店了。”

0066.en: "Wait!"
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “等会儿！”

0066.en: Chi Song sat in the car, squinting his eyes, and stopped Liang Hei, who was about to get out.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 池松坐在车里眯了眯眼睛，叫停了想下车的梁黑。

0066.en: Liang Hei noticed Chi Song's serious expression and flashed the car lights twice. The doors of the other two cars, which had just opened, closed again.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 梁黑注意到池松严肃的表情，打了两下车灯，另外两辆车刚打开的车门又关了上去。

0066.en: "This place is being watched."
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “这里被盯上了。”

0066.en: Chi Song turned his head and looked at the two burly men eating late-night snacks at a roadside stall not far away.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 池松侧头，看向了不远处一个路边摊吃宵夜的两个壮汉。

0066.en: Across the road, there was another guy wrapped in a cotton coat sleeping on a bench.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 马路对面，还有个裹着棉衣的家伙睡长椅。

0066.en: At first glance, they were amateurs. Their eyes and heads occasionally turned towards them.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 一看就是门外汉，视线和脑袋都时不时侧向这边。

0066.en: Liang Hei's voice deepened slightly, "There are only three people visible on the surface. We just arrived and they're already watching us. We just got to Jiuzhou City, and we're already being targeted? That fast?"
0066.speaker: 梁黑
0066.cn: 梁黑声音沉了一丝，“明面上能看到的只有三个人，咱们刚到就看过来了，刚来九州市就被盯上，这么快？”

0066.en: "My little sister is being targeted!"
0066.speaker: 池松
0066.cn: “被盯上的是我小妹！”

0066.en: Chi Song's face darkened. He originally thought that his little sister's "being bullied" meant some thugs were bothering her.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 池松脸色一沉，他本以为池小橙口中的被欺负就是一些社会混混找上她。

0066.en: He didn't expect the situation to be much more serious than he thought.
0066.speaker: 旁白
0066.cn: 没想到事态比自己想的要严重很多。

0066.en: "Brother Song, what should we do?"
0066.speaker: 梁黑
0066.cn: “松哥，要怎么做？”

0067.en: Chapter 67 Who Would You Save If I and Ye Liang Fell into the Water? (Bonus for x-Melody)
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 第67章 我和叶良掉水里，你救谁（为x旋律-加更）

0067.en: Chi Song sat in the passenger seat, deep in thought.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池松坐在副驾驶，低头沉思。

0067.en: He wasn't sure why these people were watching his little sister, or to what extent the "being bullied" in the WeChat message meant.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 他不清楚这些人盯着自己小妹到底是为什么，微信消息中的“被欺负”，又到怎样的程度。

0067.en: Thinking this, he looked up, his eyes suddenly cold.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 如是想着，他抬起头，眼神骤然寒冷。

0067.en: In any case, these people must have ill intentions towards his little sister and could not be left alone!
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 总归无论如何，这群人肯定是对小妹不轨，断不能留！

0067.en: "I'll get off the car for a while. You guys move the car and see if there are any hidden sentries. If not, take care of these three!"
0067.speaker: 池松
0067.cn: “我下车站一会儿，你们把车挪走看看还有没有暗哨，没有就把这三个人给端了！”

0067.en: "Alright!"
0067.speaker: 梁黑

0067.en: Liang Hei nodded, and the few of them quickly began to act.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 梁黑点了点头，几人迅速开始行动

0067.en: Chi Song stood at the community entrance, lit a cigarette, and looked at his phone.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池松站在小区门口点了支烟，拿着手机看了起来。

0067.en: He wanted to call Chi Xiaocheng to ask, but then he thought it would be bad to disturb her sleep.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 想给池小橙打个电话问一下，可转念一想打扰到睡眠就不好了。

0067.en: So he just stood there, enduring the cold wind.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 索性就这么站着，吹着冷风。

0067.en: Fortunately, it wasn't snowing at the moment, and his jacket was barely enough to withstand the cold.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 好在此时没下雪，他一件夹克倒也勉强顶得住寒冷。

0067.en: After standing for about half an hour, Liang Hei sent a message, "Brother Song, no hidden sentries found."
0067.speaker: 梁黑
0067.cn: 就这么站了差不多半小时，梁黑发来了消息，“松哥，没找到暗哨。”

0067.en: Chi Song's eyes turned cold, "Then silence them all and interrogate them to find out who sent them!"
0067.speaker: 池松
0067.cn: 池松眼神一寒，“那就把他们全闷了，审一下到底是谁派来的。”

0067.en: Liang Hei: "Won't that alert the enemy?"
0067.speaker: 梁黑
0067.cn: 梁黑：“会不会打草惊蛇？”

0067.en: Chi Song: "They've already sent people to watch, so the situation won't get any better. It's better to just eliminate them than give them a chance to report back!"
0067.speaker: 池松
0067.cn: 池松：“都派人盯着了，事态怎么都好不到哪去，给他们回去报信的机会不如直接做掉！”

0067.en: Liang Hei: "What if it's a misunderstanding? What if they're not watching Orange?"
0067.speaker: 梁黑
0067.cn: 梁黑：“万一是误会呢，他们要不是盯着橙子的咋办？”

0067.en: "Wouldn't that be even better?" Chi Song chuckled, "I'm not here to find my little sister. I'm just passing by. Remember to pay attention to the cameras on the roadside."
0067.speaker: 池松
0067.cn: “那不是更好？”池松笑了一声，“我又不是来找小妹的，我就路过这里而已，记得注意路边的摄像头。”

0067.en: "Understood, Brother Song."
0067.speaker: 梁黑
0067.cn: “明白了松哥。”

0067.en: No matter what, just do it!
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 不管三七二十一，干就完了！

0067.en: Chi Song glanced at the burly men again and walked into the community.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池松又瞥了眼那几个壮汉，往小区内走去。

0067.en: He trusted his subordinates to handle things.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 几个小弟办事，他放心。

0067.en: If those people were really sent to watch his little sister, and things got so big, it would be dangerous here. It would be better to take her to Lizhi City, where it would be safer on his territory.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 如果那些人真的是派来盯着小妹，事情闹这么大了在这里也是危险，还不如他接到荔枝市去，起码那边是自己的地盘安全些。

0067.en: Without waking the old security guard who was slacking off, Chi Song climbed over the gate and soon found his way home.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 没有惊醒摸鱼睡着的门卫大爷，池松翻身过门，没一会儿就找到了家门口。

0067.en: He entered the electronic password and opened the door.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 输入电子密码开门。

0067.en: Chi Song didn't turn on the lights and quietly walked in like a thief.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池松没开灯，做贼一样悄悄地走了进去。

0067.en: He turned on his flashlight and found a thermos cup on the table, with a note tucked underneath.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 亮起手电，发现桌上有一个保温杯，下面还压着一张字条。

0067.en: The handwriting was beautiful.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 字迹娟丽。

0067.en: "Brother, there's hot water in the thermos, and rice is still warm in the rice cooker..."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “哥哥，保温杯里有热水，电饭煲里还热了饭......”

0067.en: The living room was empty, but looking at the air conditioner, it was clear that Chi Xiaocheng had already gone to sleep.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 客厅没人，但看着空调，显然池小橙已经去睡觉了。

0067.en: Chi Song went into the kitchen and lifted the lid of the rice cooker. He found that not only was there warm rice inside, but also a few sausages and vegetables on a plate, warming on top of the rice.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池松又进厨房掀开了电饭煲，发现里面不仅热着饭，还有几根腊肠和青菜放在碟子里，一同在饭的上面热着。

0067.en: Returning in the middle of the night after several hours of driving, how could he not be hungry?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 深更半夜回来，又连续坐车几个小时，怎能不饿？

0067.en: Holding the thermos cup, Chi Song felt his eyes redden.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 握着那只保温杯，池松只感觉眼睛一红。

0067.en: He, who hadn't shed a tear even when stabbed, now felt a lump in his throat.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 被捅一刀都没掉过眼泪的他，此刻却感觉有些哽咽。

0067.en: He picked up the rice cooker directly and walked out the door.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 直接将电饭煲抱了起来便往门外走去。

0067.en: He found his subordinates.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 找上自己那群小弟。

0067.en: And went to a restaurant to eat together.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 又找了个餐馆一起吃饭。

0067.en: He proudly boasted: How did you know my sister left me food?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 自豪吹嘘：你怎么知道我妹妹给我留了饭？

0067.en: Meanwhile, Chi Xiaocheng enjoyed the air conditioning in her room and slept until dawn.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 而池小橙，享受着空调在房间一觉睡到天亮。

0067.en: Last night, she sent a message to Si Chen. This morning, as soon as she woke up, she saw Si Chen's reply.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 昨夜给司辰发去了消息，今早一起床，就见到司辰回了信息。

0067.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, what did you do to Su Tao these past three days? I feel like she's in a bad state mentally, and she even told me to find a psychologist for you. What's going on?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: “池小橙，你这三天对苏桃做了什么，我感觉她精神很差，还跟我说要找个心理医生给你看看，怎么回事？”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng huddled in her blanket, hugging a panda pillow, "Did you reply to her?"
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙缩在被窝，又抱着一个大熊猫抱枕，“你回她了没？”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Not yet. I just saw the message after waking up. I feel like something's wrong with you, so I asked you first."
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰：“还没，起床才看到的消息，我感觉是你这里出了点问题，所以先问一下你。”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng saw the message and breathed a sigh of relief.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池小橙看到消息，松了口气。

0067.en: That's great. It seems Su Tao is asking Si Chen for help.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 太好了，看来苏桃是找司辰帮忙。

0067.en: If that's the case...
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 如果是这样的话

0067.en: "It's nothing. Just find a psychologist for her as she said. But during the examination, your doctor will have to cooperate with me and give her a fake medical report."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “没事，你就根据她的话请个心理医生吧，不过检查的时候，你的那个医生得配合我一下，开个假的病例给她。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Are you sure? Su Tao's request when she asked me to find a doctor was about your... uh... some mental problems."
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰：“你确定？苏桃问我找医生时的要求可是，关于你...额......精神上的一些问题。”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "I know. She just wants to find a psychologist to see if my yandere tendencies can be cured."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“我知道，不就是想请个心理医生，来看看我的病娇还能不能治嘛。”

0067.en: Si Chen was also one of her own, and he had come to test her last time.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 司辰也算十分之一个自己人，上次他就是来测试自己的。

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng knew it well, so she just spoke frankly.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 池小橙心里门清，索性也说开了来。

0067.en: But Si Chen was no longer calm, "Wait a minute, you know you're a yandere?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 但司辰不淡定了，“等会儿，你知道你自己是病娇？”

0067.en: Didn't they say yanderes don't know they're yanderes?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 不是说病娇不知道自己是病娇的吗？

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Of course I'm not a yandere."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“我当然不是病娇了。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Huh?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰：“啊？”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Now that we're on the same side, I won't hide anything from you. The last time I was with you, I was acting."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“现在咱们统一战线，你需要我帮忙我也就不瞒你，上次跟你一起时我是演的。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Huh???"
0067.speaker: 司辰

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Why are you so surprised? If I were really a yandere, it wouldn't have been as simple as just scratching your face last time."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“你那么惊讶干嘛，我要是真的病娇，上次就不是划伤你的脸那么简单了。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "???"
0067.speaker: 司辰

0067.en: No, sister!
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 不是，姐们！

0067.en: If I hadn't dodged in time last time, my face would have been scratched up, okay? And you were acting like a madwoman, and you're telling me you're not a yandere?
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 上次要不是哥们躲得及时，脸都得被划烂了好不好，而且你那像疯了一样的状态，你跟我说你不是病娇？

0067.en: Si Chen was silent for a while.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 司辰沉默了一会儿。

0067.en: He really wanted to call Chi Xiaocheng again and tell her he liked Su Tao to see her reaction.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 他很想再打个电话给池小橙，说一声自己喜欢苏桃看看反应。

0067.en: But feeling the lingering sting on his back, he extinguished that thought.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 但感受了一下背后现在还没淡去的刺痛，他又熄灭了这个想法。

0067.en: Yanderes don't know they're yanderes.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 病娇不知道自己是病娇。

0067.en: It seems this statement is correct. This guy is a yandere herself, and she actually thinks she's acting?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 看来这个说法没错，这家伙本身就是病娇，居然认为自己是演的？

0067.en: Sitting in front of his computer at home, Si Chen's expression changed rapidly.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 坐在家中电脑前，司辰脸色迅速变换。

0067.en: Finally, he sent a message, "So your idea is that I find a psychologist for you, and then in front of Su Tao, say that you're actually a yandere, a very serious one?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 最后发消息道，“所以你的想法是，我找个心理医生给你看看，然后当着苏桃的面说你其实是个病娇，病得很严重的那种？”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Yes, it's best to give me some kind of mental trauma case, to make Su Tao feel like I'll die in front of her if she leaves me, just like a yandere, you know?"
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“对，最好给我整点什么精神创伤的病例出来，给苏姚一种离开了我我就会死在她面前的感觉，就像病娇一样，你懂的吧？”

0067.en: Si Chen: "..."
0067.speaker: 司辰

0067.en: I can't tell, I really can't tell!
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 分不清，我真的分不清啊！

0067.en: Si Chen sighed, "I think I understand your idea. Besides Su Tao, is there anything else?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰叹了一口气，“我大概明白你的想法了，除了苏桃那边，还有什么其他事吗？”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Oh, yes."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“哦，有的。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Tell me."
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰：“你说。”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Ye Liang and I broke up. Go kill him."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“我跟叶良闹掰了，你去把他做掉吧。”

0067.en: "Huh?"
0067.speaker: 司辰

0067.en: I haven't seen you guys for a few days, how did such a big thing happen?!
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 我才几天没看你们，怎么就闹出这样的大事了！

0067.en: Si Chen looked at the chat history and couldn't help but doubt life. Was choosing Chi Xiaocheng really the right thing to do?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 司辰看着聊天记录，不禁怀疑人生，之前选择池小橙真的是一件正确的事情吗？

0067.en: He felt like he had boarded a pirate ship.
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 他感觉，上了贼船。

0067.en: Helplessly, he replied faintly, "I'm almost kicked out of the family. My influence and connections are only a little. How can I fight Ye Liang?"
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 无奈，只得幽幽地回了一句，“我都快要被逐出家族了，有势力和关系也只是一点，哪里斗得过叶良。”

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Then you guide Su Tao, belittle Ye Liang and praise me."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙：“那你就引导一下苏桃，贬低叶良抬高我。”

0067.en: Si Chen: "Okay, okay, I know what to do."
0067.speaker: 司辰
0067.cn: 司辰：“okok，我晓得怎么做了。”

0067.en: Hmph, even the psychologist is my person. Tao Tao, how will you escape my grasp?
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 哼哼，连心理医生都是我的人，桃桃呀，你要怎么逃脱我的手掌心呢？

0067.en: First, give her a shot, something strong!
0067.speaker: 旁白
0067.cn: 先打根针，来点狠的！

0067.en: Chi Xiaocheng immediately opened Su Tao's WeChat contacts, "Tao Tao, good morning~"
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: 池小橙立马翻开了苏桃的微信联系，“桃桃，早上好呀~”

0067.en: "It's really not easy to wake up without you by my side."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “睡醒的时候没有你在身边，果然不太习惯呢。”

0067.en: "The day you left, Ye Liang also found me, and we had a little spat."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “你走的那天，叶良也找到了我，我们闹了一点小别扭。”

0067.en: "So... I... I have a question for you."
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “所以...就是...我有个问题想问你。”

0067.en: "If I and Ye Liang both fell into the water, who would you save?"
0067.speaker: 池小橙
0067.cn: “如果我和叶良同时掉进水里，你会救谁？”

0068.en: Chapter 68 Tao Tao, I've Been Watching You
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 第68章 桃桃，我一直在看着你哦

0068.en: "Qianqian! Qianqian!"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: “倩倩！倩倩！”

0068.en: In the dormitory, Su Tao jumped out of bed early in the morning and quickly went to Chen Qian's side, handing over her phone, "Why would Xiaocheng ask me such a question?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 宿舍中，苏桃一大早就从床上跳了起来，连忙来到陈倩身边，将手机中的内容递了过去，“你说小橙为什么会问我这种问题啊？”

0068.en: —If I and Ye Liang fell into the water, who would you save?
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: ——我和叶良掉水里你救谁？

0068.en: Isn't this the classic "who would you save, your mother or your girlfriend" question?!
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 这不就是经典的你妈和你女朋友掉水里问题吗！

0068.en: Compared to Su Tao's panic and confusion, Chen Qian just glanced at it indifferently and continued to rub her face mask.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 对比苏桃的惊慌不解，陈倩只是淡淡地瞥了眼，便继续搓面膜。

0068.en: Her tone was calm, "What else could it be? Chi Xiaocheng is having an episode."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 语气平静，“还能是什么原因，池小橙发病了呗。”

0068.en: "This..." Su Tao's voice was conflicted. For her, it was truly one wave after another.
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: “这......”苏桃语气纠结，对于她而言真的是一波未平，一波又起。

0068.en: She had just come out of the dark room yesterday.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 昨天才从小黑屋出来。

0068.en: Today, Chi Xiaocheng had another new question.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 今天池小橙就又来了新的问题。

0068.en: Wave after wave of pressure, making her feel a suffocating sensation like being wrapped by a python.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 一波压力接着一波压力，让她感受到了如蟒蛇缠绕一样的窒息感。

0068.en: She couldn't make up her mind, "Then Qianqian, what should I answer?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 她拿捏不定主意，“那倩倩，你说我该怎么回答啊？”

0068.en: "Do you like Ye Liang?" Chen Qian glanced at Su Tao.
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “你喜欢叶良吗？”陈倩瞥了眼苏桃。

0068.en: Su Tao pursed her lips, first shaking her head, but then pausing halfway through.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 苏桃抿了下唇，先是摇头，可摇头到一半又顿了一下。

0068.en: She had a good impression, but it wasn't love.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 有点好感，但谈不上喜欢。

0068.en: Chen Qian inwardly "tsk"ed in displeasure, but didn't show it. Following Chi Xiaocheng's previous instructions, she said as usual, "You're foolish too. What's the use of caring so much about Ye Liang?"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩内心不爽地“啧”了一声，但表面没发作，根据池小橙之前的吩咐，如常说道，“你也是傻，那么在意叶良有什么用呢？”

0068.en: Su Tao looked at her in confusion.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 苏桃不解地看着她。

0068.en: Chen Qian turned around and gently peeled off the mask from her face, saying very sincerely, "Logically, I shouldn't interfere with your choices, but as your best friend, I really can't stand to see you like this anymore. I just don't understand what's so good about Ye Liang."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩转过身，将脸上的面膜轻轻撕下，很是真诚道，“按理说，我不应该干涉你的选择，但作为闺蜜，我实在是看不下去你这样了，我就不明白叶良有什么好的。”

0068.en: Chen Qian counted on her fingers, "Look, he orders you around."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩掰着手指，“你看啊，他对你呼来喝去。”

0068.en: "He never gave you a good look."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “一直没给过你好脸色。”

0068.en: "Every time, I hear you say Ye Liang is looking for you, so you take a taxi to find him with your phone."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “每次我都是听你说叶良找你，所以你拿着手机就打车去找他了。”

0068.en: "Why doesn't he come in person when he's looking for you? Dongfang Yang even drives his sports car to the dormitory building to find you. What about his attitude?"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “他找你为什么不亲自过来，人家东方阳找你还开他的跑车到宿舍楼下呢，他的态度呢？”

0068.en: "He doesn't even reimburse you for the taxi fare!"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “甚至打车的钱都不给你报销！”

0068.en: "Oh, he says he likes you, he says he'll give you whatever you want, but what about his actions?"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “哦，说着喜欢你，说着你要什么都给你，可是行动呢？”

0068.en: "What kind of domineering CEO is he? Besides being handsome, what else does he have?"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “什么狗屁高冷霸总，除了长得帅点还有啥？”

0068.en: "I really don't know what you like about Ye Liang."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “真不知道你喜欢叶良他哪点。”

0068.en: As she spoke, a roommate who was still sleeping reached out and responded, "Taozi, Ye Liang really isn't worth your attention. You're so perfect, you can choose any wealthy family you want, okay?"
0068.speaker: 舍友
0068.cn: 说着，一个还在睡觉的舍友伸出手应了一句，“桃子啊，叶良真的不值得你上心，你这么完美，豪门随便你挑得好不好。”

0068.en: Chen Qian glanced at her roommate, feeling that she herself was becoming abnormal.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 陈倩瞥了眼那舍友，觉得自己都变得不对劲了。

0068.en: She couldn't help but fall into thought.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 心中不禁陷入思考。

0068.en: Speaking of which, why did she used to like Ye Liang so much, even to the point of opposing Su Tao?
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 说起来，自己曾经又为什么那么喜欢叶良，甚至要和苏桃作对的呢？

0068.en: After experiencing the power of Chi Xiaocheng's blackhead removal pill last time, Chen Qian had completely sided with Chi Xiaocheng and became a member of the "Orange Faction."
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 尝过池小橙上次那颗去黑头小药丸的厉害后，陈倩就已经彻底倒向了池小橙，成了“橙派”。

0068.en: She let go of her entanglement with Ye Liang and slowly felt that something was wrong.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 放下了对叶良的纠结，慢慢就觉得不对劲了。

0068.en: In high school, she had always been fawning over Ye Liang, and there was no earth-shattering encounter. Why did she like him so much, as if she had been cursed?
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 自己高中也是一直热脸贴他叶良的冷屁股，也没什么惊天邂逅，怎么就跟被下了降头一样疯狂喜欢他呢？

0068.en: As soon as she saw Su Tao, she would become obsessed and want to confront her.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 一见苏桃就魔怔了一样想要怼她。

0068.en: Something was wrong.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 有点不对劲。

0068.en: However, after thinking about it, she didn't care too much. Now, seeing Su Tao struggling and conflicted with Chi Xiaocheng, she was happy.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 不过想了想，她就没在意那么多了，现在她看着苏桃在池小橙那里吃瘪纠结，乐得开心。

0068.en: Reaching out to pat her best friend's shoulder, Chen Qian said earnestly, "Sister, face reality. You say Chi Xiaocheng is terrifying as a yandere, but at least she truly loves you, right? She's so cute and popular with both genders. I can't even imagine how comfortable it would be to hug her to sleep."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 伸手拍了拍好闺蜜的肩膀，陈倩语重心长道，“姐妹，认清现实吧，你说池小橙病娇多可怕，人家起码真的爱你是不是，长得那么可爱也男女通杀，那小身子抱着睡觉有多爽我都不敢想。”

0068.en: As soon as these words came out, Su Tao faintly looked at Chen Qian, "Are you serious?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 此话一出，苏桃就幽幽地看了眼陈倩，“你认真的？”

0068.en: Chen Qian smiled, "Just a joke from your perspective."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩笑了笑，“站在你的角度开个玩笑而已。”

0068.en: Su Tao felt a little uncomfortable inside.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 苏桃心底有点不是滋味。

0068.en: Chi Xiaocheng had done that to her, she should stay away from her.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 池小橙都那样对自己了，应该远离她才是。

0068.en: But hearing Chen Qian say she wanted to hug her to sleep, she felt a strange displeasure.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 可听陈倩说想把她抱着睡觉，又有些莫名的不爽。

0068.en: It was as if her own possession had been snatched away.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 好像自己的东西被人抢走了。

0068.en: Su Tao didn't want to delve deeper into this topic and shifted the conversation to her phone, "Then how should I reply to Xiaocheng?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 苏桃不想去深入纠结这个话题，将内容转移到手机上，“那我要怎么回复小橙啊？”

0068.en: "Isn't this a death question?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: “这不是送命题吗？”

0068.en: But it seemed to be Ye Liang's life that was being sent.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 只不过送的好像是叶良的命。

0068.en: Chen Qian said, "Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere. If you want to manage her emotions, you have no choice but to say you'll save her. But you can choose how deeply you commit."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩道，“池小橙是病娇，你要照顾她的情绪就没得选，只能说救她，不过可以选的是程度深不深。”

0068.en: "What do you mean?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: “什么意思？”

0068.en: Chen Qian: "The standard answer is to save her and not Ye Liang, but you can also reply that you choose to save Ye Liang. That way, there will only be the two of you in the river of love."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩：“标准答案是，救她而不救叶良，但你也可以这样回复，你选择救叶良，这样的话爱河里才会只有你们两个人。”

0068.en: Saying that, Chen Qian snapped her fingers, "This way, Chi Xiaocheng will like you even more."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 说着，陈倩打了个响指，“这样池小橙就会对你更喜欢了。”

0068.en: Su Tao was dumbfounded, "Qianqian, you've never been in a relationship, how do you know so much?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
