0068.cn: 苏桃听得目瞪口呆，“倩倩，你都没谈过恋爱，怎么这么懂啊？”

0068.en: "Thanks, I've been hit by a car." Chen Qian chuckled, "I usually read a lot of novels, and these are all answers copied from the comment section."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “谢谢，有被车到。”陈倩呵呵一笑，“我平时看小说比较多，都是评论区抄的答案。”

0068.en: Su Tao: "This..."
0068.speaker: 苏桃

0068.en: She hesitated.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 她犹豫不决。

0068.en: Chen Qian reminded her, "The key is the sentence above. Chi Xiaocheng and Ye Liang had a spat. If they both like you and want to compete, the question below is for you to choose."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩提醒道，“重点是上面一句话吧，池小橙和叶良闹了别扭，他们两个都喜欢你要分个胜负的话，下面这个问题，就是让你选择。”

0068.en: Su Tao swallowed, "But she only said a small... small spat, right?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫，“可她说的只是小...小别扭吧？”

0068.en: "In front of a yandere, even the smallest spat will be magnified."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “在病娇面前，再小的别扭都会放大。”

0068.en: Chen Qian sighed, "Do you remember what my uncle told you last time?"
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩叹了口气，“还记得上次我叔叔跟你说的话吗？”

0068.en: "Doctor Cheng?"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: “成医生？”

0068.en: "Yes." Chen Qian nodded, "Either send Chi Xiaocheng to a mental hospital for treatment, or try to accept and appease her."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: “对啊。”陈倩点头，“要么把池小橙送进精神病院接受治疗，要么就尝试着去接受并安抚她。”

0068.en: The sleeping roommate poked her head out again, "Mental hospitals are not good. Didn't the news say that a child sent to an internet addiction school was beaten to death, and the parents earned 1.4 million with tears in their eyes? Mental hospitals are probably the same, right?"
0068.speaker: 舍友
0068.cn: 睡觉的舍友又探出了个脑袋，“精神病院可不好，上次不是有新闻说孩子送去戒网瘾的学校结果被打死，父母含泪赚140万吗，精神病院也是一个性质的吧？”

0068.en: It seemed to offer two choices.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 看似给出了两个选择。

0068.en: But in reality, there was no choice at all.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 实际上根本就没得选。

0068.en: Seeing Su Tao lower her head in pain and struggle, Chen Qian gave her roommate a thumbs up.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 见苏桃低头痛苦纠结，陈倩对那位舍友竖了个大拇指。

0068.en: The roommate smiled, everything unspoken.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 舍友勾嘴一笑，一切尽在不言中。

0068.en: And at this moment, Su Tao's phone suddenly vibrated again.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 而就在此时，苏桃手机忽然又震了一下。

0068.en: Chen Qian took it and glanced at it, making a "tsk tsk" sound, "Here, Taozi, Ye Liang is looking for you."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩拿过来看了眼，发出了“啧啧”的咋舌声，“喏桃子，叶良来找你了。”

0068.en: It was a message from Ye Liang: Su Tao, what happened last time was my fault. I have something to tell you. I'm at the company. Come to my place.
0068.speaker: 叶良
0068.cn: 是叶良发来的消息：苏桃，上次的事情是我的错，我有点事想和你说，我在公司，你来我这里一趟吧。

0068.en: Chen Qian shrugged and sighed, "He's making you run to him again. An apology is just 'my fault.' Ah~ he's truly a domineering CEO."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩耸肩感慨，“又是让你跑去他那里，道歉就一句我的错，啊~啊真不愧是霸总。”

0068.en: Su Tao bit her lower lip, her hand clutching the phone seemingly tightening a little.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 苏桃咬住下唇，攥着手机的手似乎用力了一点。

0068.en: Chen Qian added fuel to the fire, "Alright, stop hesitating. Ye Liang is a young master, and he has many beautiful women around him. Maybe he's just playing with you and doesn't care about you at all."
0068.speaker: 陈倩
0068.cn: 陈倩又加了把火，“行了别纠结了，叶良是大少爷，身边美女多的是，没准他只是玩玩你，根本就不在意你。”

0068.en: For any girl, the words "he doesn't care about you" are extremely damaging.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 放在任何女生身上，“他不在意你”这种话的杀伤力都是极大的。

0068.en: Long-term verbal manipulation, pressure from the external environment, and the commonality of topics among those around her, every point stimulated Su Tao's nerves.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 长期的言语诱导，外部环境带来的压力，身边人的话题共性，每一点都在刺激苏桃的神经。

0068.en: When all the eruptions converged and were pointed out.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 当所有的爆发汇聚一处被点出来后。

0068.en: Memories blew like the wind.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 回忆如风般吹起。

0068.en: The beautiful ones were subconsciously blocked.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 美好的，被下意识屏蔽。

0068.en: The topics discussed around her gradually emerged.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 周遭话题聊的，渐渐涌出。

0068.en: Yes, maybe Ye Liang didn't care about her at all.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 是啊，没准叶良根本就不在乎自己。

0068.en: He ordered her around, never showed any concern. She was locked in a dark room by Xiaocheng for three days, and he did nothing. Instead, he scolded her as soon as they met.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 对自己呼来喝去，从来没有过关心，自己被小橙关在小黑屋三天，他也没任何行动，反而一见面就骂自己。

0068.en: If he cared about me, why didn't he come looking for me then?
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 他要是在意我，为什么当时不来找我呢？

0068.en: Not to mention now, his apology is so flimsy, and he's making me go to his company like a servant!
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 更别说现在，道歉一句轻飘飘，又让我像仆人一样去他公司！

0068.en: How did Xiaocheng apologize when she did something wrong?
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 小橙做了对不起的事情是怎样道歉的？

0068.en: Tears welled up in her eyes, she clutched her sleeve, always blaming herself, and humbly begging her not to abandon her.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 泪眼摩挲，拽紧自己的衣袖，永远都在自责，并卑微地祈求自己不要抛弃她。

0068.en: The tall shadow that vaguely occupied a corner of her heart was completely severed.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 隐约占据一点心房的高大影子，被彻底割裂。

0068.en: Su Tao heavily typed two words in reply to Ye Liang: "Not going!"
0068.speaker: 苏桃
0068.cn: 苏桃重重敲下了两个字回复叶良：“不去！”

0068.en: Chen Qian and that roommate quietly watched her, a sinister smile playing on their lips.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 陈倩和那位舍友，就这样在苏桃身边静静看着她，唇角无一不勾起一丝阴冷的笑容。

0068.en: Behind them, there seemed to be a small figure with tea-colored hair.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 她们的背后，好似有一个茶色秀发的小小身影。

0068.en: Like a shadowy ghost, lingering nearby.
0068.speaker: 旁白
0068.cn: 如阴影鬼魂，缭绕在旁。

0069.en: Chapter 69 Let's Go on a Date~
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 第69章 去约会吧~

0069.en: "Not going!"
0069.speaker: 苏桃
0069.cn: “不去！”

0069.en: Two large words appeared heavily on Ye Liang's phone.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 两个大字重重出现在了叶良的手机上。

0069.en: It was as if Su Tao herself stood before him and slapped him.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 就好像苏桃本人，站在他面前甩了他一巴掌。

0069.en: His face was burning.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 脸上火辣火辣的。

0069.en: "Chi Xiaocheng... it must be her!"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “池小橙...肯定是她！”

0069.en: Ye Liang's face darkened. He subconsciously clutched his waist. He was just a hair's breadth away from having his kidney removed.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 叶良沉着脸，下意识地捂了一下自己的腰，当时就差那么一点，腰子就被嘎掉了。

0069.en: Although he was lucky to escape, he couldn't understand where Chi Xiaocheng got such strength!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 虽然幸运地跑了，可他怎么也想不明白，池小橙哪来那么大的力气！

0069.en: If it weren't for her, Su Tao wouldn't be like this now!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 如果不是因为她，苏桃也不会变成现在这样！

0069.en: "Yandere..."
0069.speaker: 叶良

0069.en: At that time, he thought Chi Xiaocheng became a yandere because she liked him. He never expected that, as a girl, she had always liked Su Tao!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 当时他还以为，池小橙是喜欢自己才病娇化的，万万没想到，作为一个女生，她竟然一直喜欢的是苏桃！

0069.en: Thinking this, her actions over the past two months suddenly made sense.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 这么一想，前面两个月她所作所为也就合理了起来。

0069.en: Because this guy was already crazy.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 因为这家伙，本来就疯了。

0069.en: "Young Master."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: “少爷。”

0069.en: A bodyguard walked in from outside the door, lowering his head to report, "Something happened. The three sentries sent to watch Chi Xiaocheng's neighborhood were all taken out."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: 门外一个保镖走了进来，低头报告，“出事了，派过去盯着池小橙小区的三个哨子全被端了。”

0069.en: "Taken out?" Ye Liang frowned, "Did Chi Xiaocheng not leave the house since I left?"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “被端了？”叶良皱眉，“难道自从我走了之后，池小橙就一直没出过门吗？”

0069.en: "Yes, Young Master." The bodyguard replied, "You also know that if she went out, it would be fine to abduct her, but forcibly breaking into the community might escalate things."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: “是的少爷。”保镖回答，“您也知道，她要是出门掳走她还好，但强行闯入小区内恐怕会把事情闹大。”

0069.en: "Who took care of those three sentries?"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “谁把那三个暗哨解决的？”

0069.en: "Still under investigation. The roadside surveillance cameras were already dealt with beforehand because we also wanted to abduct Chi Xiaocheng, so we haven't found any specific information yet. But their license plates are from Lizhi City."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: “还在调查中，路边的监控因为咱们也想要掳走池小橙所以提前解决掉了，暂时没查到具体信息，但他们的车牌，是荔枝市的。”

0069.en: "Lizhi City..." Ye Liang frowned again when he heard these three words, "Is the expansion of our business there not going smoothly either?"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “荔枝市......”叶良听到这三个字，又皱了皱眉，“那边的产业扩展也不顺利吗？”

0069.en: "Yes, the local gangs are very resistant, and money can't solve it. If we want to infiltrate, we'll have to use some extraordinary means."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: “是的，本地帮派抵抗态度很坚决，用钱都解决不了，如果想渗透进去，得用些非常手段才行。”

0069.en: "Then how many people can we spare now?"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “那现在，能腾出多少人手来？”

0069.en: "Uh..." The bodyguard hesitated, then slowly said, "To be honest, we can't spare anyone. The main family in the capital is watching, and there are unknown forces in Lizhi City obstructing us. We need to send more people. We can only spend money to hire some amateurs to try."
0069.speaker: 保镖
0069.cn: “额......”保镖犹豫了一下，缓缓道，“老实说腾不出人手，京城本家那边盯着，荔枝市也有不明势力阻碍我们，得多派些人才行，只能花钱雇点门外汉试试。”

0069.en: "What a bunch of useless people!" Ye Liang was furious, "They can't even deal with a college student."
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “真是一群废物！”叶良恼怒无比，“一个大学生都解决不了。”

0069.en: A college student, logically, shouldn't be a threat.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 一个大学生，按理来说没威胁才是。

0069.en: But every time he touched his injuries, Ye Liang couldn't help but get angry.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 可每次摸到自己身上的伤，叶良就不由恼火。

0069.en: Chi Xiaocheng, this guy is better off gone!
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 池小橙，这家伙还是消失的好！

0069.en: Ye Liang picked up his phone and made a call.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 叶良拿起手机，拨打了一个电话。

0069.en: "A rare guest. Is there something you need from me?"
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: “稀客啊，给我打电话有什么事情吗？”

0069.en: From the other end of the phone, Si Chen's voice came.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 手机对面，传来了司辰的声音。

0069.en: As one of the "Three Young Masters" of Jiuzhou City, Ye Liang, Si Chen, and Dongfang Yang naturally had connections with each other.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 作为九州市“三大少爷”之一，叶良和司辰和东方阳，自然相互有所联系。

0069.en: Ye Liang didn't beat around the bush and directly said, "Su Tao has looked for you a few times. You know about Chi Xiaocheng, right?"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 叶良也不绕弯子，直言道，“苏桃找过你几次，你知道池小橙的事情吧？”

0069.en: Si Chen: "Yes, what's wrong?"
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: 司辰：“知道啊，怎么了？”

0069.en: Ye Liang said seriously, "Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere. She's very dangerous. Letting her stay by Su Tao's side will hurt her!"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 叶良严肃说道，“池小橙是病娇，她很危险，放任她在身边会伤到苏桃的！”

0069.en: Si Chen, at home, listened to Ye Liang's words, and his expression became strange.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 司辰在家，听着叶良的话，脸色变得奇怪了起来。

0069.en: It was true that Chi Xiaocheng was a yandere.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 池小橙是病娇不假。

0069.en: She would hurt Su Tao?
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 她会伤到苏桃？

0069.en: Si Chen touched the scar on his face, then felt the weight of the words "Never love Tao" on his back. He sighed and lit a cigarette, "So what do you want from me?"
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: 司辰摸了摸脸上的伤疤，又感受了一下背后“永不爱桃”四个字的含金量，惆怅地点了支烟，“所以你找我有什么事吗？”

0069.en: Ye Liang said in a deep voice, "Don't you need money and connections to help you regain your position as the Si family heir? I can help you!"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 叶良沉声道，“你不是需要钱和人脉，来帮你夺回司家的继承人位置吗，我可以帮你！”

0069.en: Si Chen raised an eyebrow, "What's the condition?"
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: 司辰挑眉：“条件呢？”

0069.en: Ye Liang: "The condition is, you go and get rid of Chi Xiaocheng."
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 叶良：“条件是，你去把池小橙给做掉。”

0069.en: "Huh?"
0069.speaker: 司辰

0069.en: Si Chen's mouth twitched continuously. Why did this sentence sound familiar?
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 司辰嘴角不断抽搐，这句话为什么好像在哪听过。

0069.en: He couldn't help but retort, "You, Ye Liang, control everything in Jiuzhou City, and you can't even deal with a college student. Are you serious asking me?"
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: 他不由反驳道，“你叶良在九州市一手遮天，连一个大学生都做不掉，找我好意思吗？”

0069.en: Ye Liang chuckled, "I'm helping you. Besides me, no one else can help you regain your position as the Si family heir. As you said, Chi Xiaocheng is just a college student. You can easily deal with her."
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: 叶良呵呵一笑，“我这是在帮你，除了我，没人能帮你夺回司家继承人的位置了吧，正如你所说池小橙就一个大学生，你做掉她轻轻松松。”

0069.en: He was confident that Si Chen would agree.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 他自信司辰一定会答应。

0069.en: He knew this outwardly reserved man with glasses too well.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 他太了解这个眼镜闷骚男了。

0069.en: He was very rational, always prioritizing interests and goals. If the benefits were sufficient, this person could even betray friends and family.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 很理智，一切以利益和目的优先，只要利益足够，这人连朋友甚至亲人都能背叛掉。

0069.en: When I deal with the matters in Lizhi City and free up my hands, helping you regain your position as the Si family heir is my promise, Ye Liang!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 等我搞定荔枝市的事情，腾出手来，帮你夺回司家继承人的位置，就是我叶良的承诺！

0069.en: After dealing with Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao will definitely return to my side, right?
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 解决池小橙，苏桃一定就会回到自己身边的吧？

0069.en: At that time, controlling Si Chen, marrying Su Tao, and returning to the Ye family in the capital, from the peak of life to another peak!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 届时掌控司辰，迎娶苏桃，重归京城叶家，从人生的巅峰，走到另一个巅峰！

0069.en: However, just as he began to fantasize, he heard Si Chen's mocking voice, as if talking to an idiot, "Come on, if I get rid of Chi Xiaocheng, I'll completely break up with Su Tao. What will I do if you stab me in the back? Don't treat me like an idiot."
0069.speaker: 司辰
0069.cn: 然而，他刚开始幻想，就听到司辰与傻子对话般嘲弄的声音，“得了吧，我要是干掉池小橙，就彻底和苏桃决裂了，你反手捅我一刀我怎么办，别把我当傻子。”

0069.en: "Click—"
0069.speaker: 旁白

0069.en: "Beep beep beep—"
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: “嘟嘟嘟——”

0069.en: Ye Liang's smile froze. He never thought Si Chen would refuse him.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 叶良笑容僵住，他完全没想过司辰竟然会拒绝自己。

0069.en: "An uncooperative fellow!"
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “不识时务的家伙！”

0069.en: Ye Liang took a deep breath and made another call.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 叶良深吸了一口气，又打了个电话。

0069.en: "Hello, Dongfang Yang? Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere. She likes Su Tao. Su Tao is very dangerous. You..."
0069.speaker: 叶良
0069.cn: “喂，东方阳吗，池小橙是病娇，她喜欢苏桃，苏桃很危险，你......”

0069.en: Dongfang Yang: "Haha, Ye Liang, did a donkey kick you in the head? Chi Xiaocheng clearly likes me. Get lost!"
0069.speaker: 东方阳
0069.cn: 东方阳：“哈哈，叶良你被驴撞傻了吧，池小橙分明喜欢的是我，我滚你丫的吧！”

0069.en: "Beep beep beep—"
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: “嘟嘟嘟——”

0069.en: The call was hung up again.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 电话又挂断了。

0069.en: Ye Liang stood there dumbfounded, only feeling his nose redden.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 叶良呆愣在原地，只觉得鼻子红红的。

0069.en: Then, a burst of impotent rage erupted in the office.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 接而办公室中，传出阵阵无能狂怒。

0069.en: At the same time, Su Tao, who had been continuously manipulated by Chen Qian and her roommate, also replied to Chi Xiaocheng's message.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 与此同时，被陈倩和舍友接连PUA的苏桃，也给池小橙回复了消息。

0069.en: She didn't use the cheesy love words Chen Qian prepared, but replied naturally, "Of course I'll save you, Xiaocheng!"
0069.speaker: 苏桃
0069.cn: 没有说陈倩准备的土味情话，而是很自然地回复道，“我当然会救小橙你呀！”

0069.en: After all, it was an easy question. A little mental pressure was enough.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 毕竟是送分题，上点精神压力也就够了。

0069.en: Chi Xiaocheng was still huddled in her blanket, her warm fingers typing cold words, "Is it because I'm more important than Ye Liang that you'd save me?"
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: 池小橙依旧缩在被窝中，温热的手指敲出冰冷的文字，“是不是因为我比叶良重要，所以才救我呀？”

0069.en: Peach: "Xiaocheng, why are you still saying such things? Of course you're the most important to me."
0069.speaker: 苏桃
0069.cn: 桃子：“小橙怎么到现在还说这种话呢，你对我来说当然是最重要的。”

0069.en: Orange: "Hehe, I knew Tao Tao liked me the most. I like Tao Tao the most too."
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: 橙子：“嘿嘿，我就知道桃桃最喜欢我了，我也最喜欢桃桃了。”

0069.en: As always, a confession.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 一如既往的表白。

0069.en: Even though she had said it many times, Chi Xiaocheng remained tireless.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 即便说过很多次了，池小橙也依旧孜孜不倦。

0069.en: However, after sending this message, Su Tao didn't reply immediately.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 然而这一句发出去，苏桃没有立刻回复。

0069.en: She still chose to avoid it.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 她依旧选择了回避。

0069.en: But it didn't matter. Chi Xiaocheng knew that Su Tao's mind must be in chaos, otherwise, by this time, she would have replied with some irrelevant words.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 不过没关系，池小橙知道，苏桃心肯定是乱了，不然以往这个时候，就应该回复自己一些无关紧要的话了。

0069.en: Three days in the dark room, the harvest was good!
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 三天的小黑屋，收获甚好啊！

0069.en: Orange: "Tao Tao, I miss you. We haven't seen each other for a long time. Are you free today?"
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: 橙子：“桃桃，我想你了，我们已经好久没见了，今天有空吗？”

0069.en: Peach: "What do you mean a long time? We just met yesterday, okay?"
0069.speaker: 苏桃
0069.cn: 桃子：“哪里是很久，我们昨天才见面好不好。”

0069.en: Not only met, but even slept together in a hug.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 不止见面，甚至抱在一起睡了一觉。

0069.en: Orange: "For me, every moment Tao Tao isn't by my side can be described as a year."
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: 橙子：“对我来说，桃桃不在身边的每一刻，都可以用度日如年来形容。”

0069.en: Orange: "How about we go out later?"
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: 橙子：“我们一会儿出门怎么样？”

0069.en: Peach: "What for?"
0069.speaker: 苏桃
0069.cn: 桃子：“出门去做什么？”

0069.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the message and didn't type a direct reply.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 池小橙看着消息，没有直接打字回复。

0069.en: Instead, she brought her small mouth close to the phone's microphone and clicked on the voice message.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 而是将小嘴凑到了手机麦克风的旁边，点击了一下语音。

0069.en: "Of course... to go on a date~"
0069.speaker: 池小橙
0069.cn: “当然是...去约会呀~”

0069.en: A warm breath exhaled, her voice soft and sweet, like a succubus enticing hearts.
0069.speaker: 旁白
0069.cn: 一口热气呼出，声音软软糯糯，如魅魔勾引人心。

0070.en: Chapter 70 Cooked Rice
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 第70章 生米煮成熟饭（为茅台不好喝加更）

0070.en: The playful voice message was released, and Su Tao felt as if she had been electrocuted.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 俏皮的语音放出，苏桃感觉整个人都被电了一下。

0070.en: An indescribable tingling sensation spread throughout her body.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 说不清的酥麻感传递全身。

0070.en: Chen Qian, who was beside her, naturally heard the message as well.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 她旁边的人是陈倩，自然也听到了这句话。

0070.en: Her eyes, full of meaning, assisted, "Oh, a date~ Look how sincere Xiaocheng's invitation is. The soft and sweet anticipation is overflowing. Then look at Ye Liang, he only tells you to go to his company."
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: 眼神意味深长地助攻，“哟，约会啊~你看看人家小橙的邀请多实在，软软糯糯的期待感拉满了，再看叶良，只会让你过去公司一趟。”

0070.en: Su Tao smiled bitterly and shook her head, typing a reply, "Sorry, I have classes all day today. Xiaocheng also has to go to class, right? Skipping classes every day is not good."
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: 苏桃苦笑着摇头，打字回复，“抱歉哦，今天一整天满课呢，小橙也要去上课的吧，天天翘课可不行。”

0070.en: She tried to change the subject.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 她企图扯开话题。

0070.en: However, the next voice message that came was a mournful sound of disappointment.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 然而发来的下一条语音，却是幽怨的失望声。

0070.en: "So that's it. So Tao Tao doesn't like going on dates with me."
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: “这样呀，原来桃桃不喜欢和我一起去约会。”

0070.en: Pressure +10.
0070.speaker: 旁白

0070.en: Su Tao gasped.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 苏桃倒吸一口凉气。

0070.en: She quickly replied, "No... I mean, besides classes and homework, sometimes teachers also look for me, right? How about Saturday? Saturday we can... we can go on a date all day!"
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: 连忙回复道，“不是...我的意思是，平时除了上课还有作业，偶尔也会有老师来找我是不是，不如我们到周六怎么样，周六可以...可以约会一整天哦！”

0070.en: Before long, Su Tao heard Chi Xiaocheng's surprised reply, "Really?! I love Tao Tao the most!"
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: 没一会儿，苏桃就听到了池小橙惊喜的回复，“真哒！最喜欢桃桃了！”

0070.en: Her arm dropped, and Su Tao suddenly put down her phone, sighing, "My heart is so tired, my head hurts so much. It feels like I'm coaxing a child."
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: 手臂垂下，苏桃陡然放下手机，叹气道，“心好累，头好痛，感觉就像是在哄孩子。”

0070.en: Chen Qian said lightly, "But I thought you slept well last night?"
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: 陈倩淡淡道，“可我看你昨晚不是睡得挺好的吗？”

0070.en: Su Tao was stunned for a moment.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 苏桃怔了一下。

0070.en: Indeed, even though she felt tired when she woke up, it was because the accumulated fatigue from the past few days hadn't dissipated yet.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 确实，即便醒来的时候还是觉得累，但这是几天下来积累的疲惫还没散去。

0070.en: She hadn't had such a good night's sleep in half a month.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 她已经有半个月没睡过这样的好觉了。

0070.en: "Perhaps... it's the psychological effect of this sachet?"
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: “可能...是这个香囊的带给我的心理作用吧？”

0070.en: Su Tao reached out and touched the sachet tied to her waist, which was covered with cartoon orange patterns.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 苏桃伸手摸了摸系在腰间的香囊，上面布满了卡通橙子的图案。

0070.en: The scent was very fragrant and a little familiar, refreshing.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 味道很香并有点熟悉，沁人心脾。

0070.en: Saturday.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 周六。

0070.en: Date.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 约会

0070.en: Su Tao sighed again, "Forget it, it's not a date anyway. Let's just treat it as ordinary shopping."
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: 苏桃又叹了口气，“算了，也不是什么约会，就当作是普通的逛街吧。”

0070.en: "Tsk, I think you don't know what's good for you."
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: “切，我看你是身在福中不知福。”

0070.en: Chen Qian replied, then stood up to leave, "I'm going to get breakfast. What do you want me to bring?"
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: 陈倩回了一句后，起身就要出门，“我去吃早餐，需要带什么？”

0070.en: The roommate who was sleeping suddenly stretched out a hand, "Anything, but not too greasy, and no rice noodles. Anything else is fine~"
0070.speaker: 舍友
0070.cn: 本来睡觉的舍友，陡然伸直了一只手，“我随便，但不要太油腻的，也不要米粉，其他都随便~”

0070.en: Chen Qian rolled her eyes at her roommate, then looked at Su Tao, "What about you?"
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: 陈倩白了一眼舍友，又看向苏桃，“你呢？”

0070.en: "I'll listen to you."
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: “听你的。”

0070.en: Su Tao gave her a grateful look.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 苏桃投去了一个感激的眼神。

0070.en: Chen Qian: "Then I'll bring you some steamed buns."
0070.speaker: 陈倩
0070.cn: 陈倩：“那给你带点小笼包吧。”

0070.en: "Wait!" Su Tao quickly covered her mouth, looking as if she wanted to vomit but couldn't, "No steamed buns, anything else is fine!"
0070.speaker: 苏桃
0070.cn: “等一下！”苏桃连忙捂住了嘴，一副欲吐又止的神色，“不要小笼包，其他听你的！”

0070.en: In the dark room, what she ate the most were steamed buns, but the taste was the worst!
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 在小黑屋，她吃得最多的就是小笼包，然而那味道也是最差的！

0070.en: And Chi Xiaocheng, after receiving the signal for a Saturday date, excitedly got out of bed.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 而池小橙，在得到周六约会的信号后，也兴冲冲地起了床。

0070.en: She opened the door and went out, but strangely smelled a strong fragrance.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 开门出去，却奇异地闻到了一股浓郁的香味。

0070.en: "Brother?"
0070.speaker: 池小橙

0070.en: Chi Xiaocheng came to the living room and found her brother wearing an apron, struggling to carry the cooked millet porridge to the table with one arm.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 池小橙来到客厅，发现哥哥正穿着围裙，艰难地用一只手臂将煮好的小米粥端到桌面。

0070.en: Chi Song heard the sound and turned around. Seeing the confused and cute Chi Xiaocheng, he was first stunned, then slightly timidly loosened his neck and shoulders.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 池松听到声音转身，见到迷糊可爱的池小橙后先是一愣，又稍许胆怯地松了松脖子和肩膀。

0070.en: His scarred, fierce face showed a hint of awkwardness, "Little sister, long time no see."
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: 一张疤痕断续的凶狠面庞露出了些许局促，“小妹，好久不见啊。”

0070.en: Although he had a fierce face, his expression at this moment was like a child who had done something wrong and was at a loss.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 明明长了一张凶恶的脸，此时的表情却像极了做错事而不知所措的小孩。

0070.en: Even before she transmigrated, the original owner and her brother hadn't seen each other for three years.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 即便是自己未穿越来前，原主也和哥哥三年未见了。

0070.en: This villainous brother couldn't relax in front of his sister!
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 这位反派哥哥，面对妹妹都放不开啊！

0070.en: Chi Xiaocheng put her hands on her hips, looking very cool, and said with a slight seriousness, "Close your eyes."
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: 池小橙双手叉腰，一副很拽的样子，语气略带严肃道，“闭上眼睛。”

0070.en: "Ah? Oh."
0070.speaker: 池松

0070.en: Chi Song didn't understand, but he still made a military stance.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 池松不知所云，但还是摆了个军训立正的手势。

0070.en: Then Chi Xiaocheng brought a small stool and placed it in front of Chi Song.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 然后池小橙搬来了一张小凳子，放在池松面前后。

0070.en: Standing on the stool, she was still a head taller than her 1.8-meter tall brother.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 站在了凳子上，才比这位1米8的哥哥高出一截。

0070.en: Then she reached out her small hand and gently touched his head.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 然后伸出小手，轻轻摸了一下他的脑袋。

0070.en: "Brother, welcome home."
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: “哥哥，欢迎回家。”

0070.en: Gentle movements, reassuring and dependent tone. Chi Xiaocheng could easily do all of these with her intermediate acting skills.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 柔和的动作，安心而又依赖的语气，这些池小橙都可以轻易地用中级演技做出来。

0070.en: Logically, it should be the sister being patted on the head by the brother.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 按理说，应该是妹妹被哥哥摸头的。

0070.en: But sorry, only Tao Tao can touch my head.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 但抱歉呢，只有桃桃能摸我的头哦

0070.en: Just a short sentence, but it broke through the barrier in Chi Song's heart.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 短短的一句话，却是击破了池松心中的隔阂。

0070.en: His tense body suddenly relaxed, and the big boy showed a foolish smile, his expression filled with happiness, "Mm, brother is back."
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: 紧绷的身子陡然放松，大男孩露出了一丝傻笑，神色幸福，“嗯，哥回来了。”

0070.en: After breakfast, Chi Xiaocheng chatted with her brother.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 吃完早餐，池小橙便陪这位哥哥聊起了天。

0070.en: Chi Song wasn't very good at communicating. Most of the time, Chi Xiaocheng was talking, and he was listening. No matter what the topic was, his eyes were always on that small figure.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 池松不怎么善于交流，绝大部分都是池小橙在讲，他在听，无论是什么话题，他的眼中都是那个娇小的身影。

0070.en: In the original novel, at this point in time, the original owner had already been beaten to the brink of death and was about to be drowned.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 在原著中，现在这个时间点原主已经被打得奄奄一息，即将被溺死了。

0070.en: And Chi Song, as her biological brother, would receive this death message on New Year's Eve.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 而池松作为亲哥哥，将会在除夕夜的时候，得到这个死亡讯息。

0070.en: At that time, he had become one of the four hall masters of the Fierce Dragon Gang, truly becoming Brother Long's confidant.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 那时的他成了猛龙帮四堂主之一，真正成为了龙哥心腹。

0070.en: Although he wasn't a public figure, he was considered successful in his career.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 虽然上不得台面，但也算事业有成。

0070.en: He hadn't returned for three years. He took a long-awaited leave for the New Year, only to receive the news of his sister's death.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 三年未归，趁着过年请个假期待已久，结果就得到了妹妹的死讯。

0070.en: After blackening, something unexpected happened to the Fierce Dragon Gang, and the brother was forced to become the new leader of the Fierce Dragon Gang.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 在黑化后，不知猛龙帮发生了什么意外，哥哥被迫成为了猛龙帮的新一任帮主。

0070.en: Then, he led the remaining forces of Brother Long and frantically pursued Ye Liang, fighting from Lizhi City to Jiuzhou City. In the end, as a villainous male supporting character, he still couldn't defeat one of the male leads with a halo.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 而后带着龙哥的残余势力，疯了似地扑杀叶良，从荔枝市打到了九州市，最后身为反派男配的他，还是敌不过有着光环的小说男主之一。

0070.en: This time, calling her brother back early also disrupted the original plot of the book.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 这次提前喊哥哥回来，又断了书中原本的剧情。

0070.en: The butterfly's wings flapped faster and faster, also causing a hint of anxiety in Chi Xiaocheng's heart.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 蝴蝶的翅膀扇动越来越快，也让池小橙心中有了一丝的焦急感。

0070.en: During their casual chat, they again discussed Ye Liang's information.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 在闲聊中，二人又对上了叶良的信息。

0070.en: After listening, Chi Song slammed his fist on the table, "Damn Ye Liang, he's simply too much! Not only does he want to snatch my designated sister-in-law, but he also wants to hurt you!"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: 池松听完，重重的一拳砸向桌子，“该死的叶良，简直是欺人太甚，不仅想抢老子钦定的妹媳，竟然还想伤害你！”

0070.en: "Xiaocheng, you just sit here. Brother will go and blow him up!"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: “小橙你就坐在这里，哥去跟他爆了！”

0070.en: "Hey, wait, wait!" Chi Xiaocheng quickly pulled back the irrational Chi Song, "He's a young master, and he has countless bodyguards with halos. Brother, you just need to protect me and Tao Tao a little. Don't be so impulsive!"
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: “诶等等等！”池小橙连忙拉住失去理智的池松，“人家是大少爷啊，有光环还保镖无数，哥你就稍微保护我和桃桃就好了，不用那么冲动！”

0070.en: "But this isn't a solution either!" Chi Song sat down again, scratching his hair, "How about you, little sister, and Xiao Tao come with me to Lizhi City? We'll have a wedding banquet tomorrow, and after the wedding night, Ye Liang should give up."
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: “可这也不是办法啊！”池松又坐了下来，挠着头发，“要不小妹你和小桃跟我一起去荔枝市吧，明天就办酒席，洞房了那叶良也该死心了。”

0070.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Chi Song's anxious expression and couldn't help but retort, "Brother, Tao Tao doesn't necessarily like me."
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: 池小橙看着池松着急的模样，不禁吐槽道，“哥，桃桃都不一定喜欢我呢。”

0070.en: "Oh, what do you know!" Chi Song lectured, "Even if Xiao Tao doesn't agree, just tie her up and throw her on the bed, and then the rice will be cooked. Will Xiao Tao's personality allow her to ignore you?"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: “哎呀你懂什么！”池松教育道，“就算小桃不同意，直接把她绑了扔床上不就行了，到时候生米成了熟饭，小桃的性格会放任你不管？”

0070.en: "In three to five days, Xiao Tao will self-strategize and accept this matter with comfort. After that, you just keep pestering her, and won't you easily win her over?"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: “不出个三五天，小桃就会自我攻略并安慰地去接受这事了，之后你再缠着她，还不是轻松拿下？”

0070.en: "Brother knows you too well." Chi Song earnestly advised, "Listen to brother, we'll leave for Lizhi City tomorrow."
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: “哥太了解你们了。”池松语重心长地劝道，“听哥的，咱们明天就出发去荔枝市。”

0070.en: If it were that simple, why would she have to rack her brains to play a yandere and formulate a yandere plan?!
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 要真那么简单，自己哪里还用那么绞尽脑汁地扮演病娇，并拟定病娇计划啊！

0070.en: Chi Xiaocheng directly rejected Chi Song's proposal.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 池小橙直接否决了池松的提议。

0070.en: Chi Song spread his hands like a bear, "Then what should we do?"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: 池松小熊摊手，“那咋办嘛。”

0070.en: "Anyway, brother, just listen to me. I have a plan. The main thing now is to make Tao Tao fall in love with me. You just need to put some pressure on her through WeChat when you're free."
0070.speaker: 池小橙
0070.cn: “总之哥你先听我的，我有办法的，现在主要是要让桃桃爱上我，你没事就和她多在微信聊聊上点压力就行了。”

0070.en: Chi Song: "Okay, I'll listen to you!"
0070.speaker: 池松
0070.cn: 池松：“好，听你的！”

0070.en: He had no other skills besides fighting. He was just obedient.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 他混到现在除了能打以外没什么本事，就一个听话。

0070.en: Whatever big brother said, he would do. Wherever big brother pointed, he would fight.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 大哥说啥就是啥，大哥指哪就打哪。

0070.en: What's more, this was his little sister. Chi Song would listen to anything she said.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 更何况这是自己小妹，无论是什么话池松都听。

0070.en: Time flew by, and soon it was the weekend.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 时间飞逝，很快到了周末。

0070.en: Early in the morning, Chi Xiaocheng changed into a cute outfit.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 大清早，池小橙就换上了一套可爱的衣服。

0070.en: Tao Tao.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 桃桃。

0070.en: Date time.
0070.speaker: 旁白
0070.cn: 约会时间到

0071.en: Chapter 71 What I Like Is Not the Steamed Bun, But You
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 第71章 喜欢的不是包子，而是你

0071.en: At 8 AM, Chi Xiaocheng deliberately skipped breakfast, planning to leave early to find Su Tao at school, sneak into her dorm, and give her a surprise hug.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 早上8点，池小橙特意没吃早餐，打算早早地就出门去学校找苏桃，偷偷到她宿舍然后给她一个惊喜的拥抱。

0071.en: But what she didn't expect was.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 但让她没想到的是。

0071.en: Su Tao was even earlier than her.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 苏桃竟然比她还要早。

0071.en: Just as she arrived in the living room and took a sip of hot water, the doorbell rang.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 刚来到客厅喝了口热水，门铃便响了起来。

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't even need to open the door. Su Tao, who had already registered her fingerprint, opened the door and walked in.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 都不用池小橙去开门，早早录了指纹的苏桃自己便开门走进。

0071.en: "Xiaocheng, I'm here."
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: “小橙，我来了哦。”

0071.en: She had promised to go on a date on Saturday, and she was more punctual than anyone.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 说好了周六去约会，她比任何人都要准时。

0071.en: Su Tao tapped the fine snow off her boots, and just as she was about to enter, she paused, "Brother Chi Song?!"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃点了点靴子上的细雪，刚准备入门便愣了一下，“池松哥？！”

0071.en: Su Tao's voice was filled with surprise and joy. When she saw Chi Song's single arm, her heart couldn't help but tighten.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 苏桃的声音又惊又喜，瞥见池松的独臂时又不免心中一紧。

0071.en: Chi Song smiled faintly, "I had a small accident while working outside, it's nothing. It's been many years, Xiao Tao, you've become even more beautiful."
0071.speaker: 池松
0071.cn: 池松淡淡地笑了一下，“出去打拼出了点意外，不碍事，好多年没见了，小桃你也是越来越好看了。”

0071.en: Su Tao's face showed a hint of embarrassment, "Brother Chi Song, don't tease me. How can I be considered beautiful? I'm just..."
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃脸上出了一抹不好意思，“池松哥你就别调侃我了，我这哪里算好看，也就......”

0071.en: Before she could finish, she saw Chi Song nod in satisfaction again, "You're so beautiful, and little sister is so cute. You two look very compatible."
0071.speaker: 池松
0071.cn: 话音未落，就又见池松满意地点头，“你那么漂亮，小妹也可可爱爱的，看着就很搭啊。”

0071.en: Girl and loli.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 少女与萝莉。

0071.en: The scene was also quite beautiful.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 画面也挺美的。

0071.en: Many things had happened these past few days, and Su Tao had almost forgotten what Chi Song had asked her last time.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 这些天发生的事情比较多，苏桃都要忘了池松上次发来询问的那句话了。

0071.en: Do you like my little sister?
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 喜欢我小妹吗？

0071.en: How could a brother try to set up two sisters?!
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 哪有当哥的去撮合两个妹妹的啊！

0071.en: But Su Tao knew that Chi Song was a super straight man, so maybe he really thought that way.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 但苏桃知道池松是个超级大直男，没准他就是真那么想的。

0071.en: Her smile suddenly became a little awkward.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 笑容顿时变得有些尴尬了起来。

0071.en: Chi Song laughed, "Didn't you two grow up together like this? What's wrong with that? Alright, you two chat first. I have something to do, so I'm going out."
0071.speaker: 池松
0071.cn: 池松哈哈一笑，“你们从小不都是这么过来的嘛，有什么不好的，好了你们先聊吧，我还有事就出门了。”

0071.en: Watching Chi Song leave, Su Tao finally turned her attention back to the living room, only to find that Chi Xiaocheng had already appeared in front of her at some point.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 看着池松出了门，苏桃这才重新将视线头投回客厅，却又发现，池小橙不知何时已经到了自己面前。

0071.en: She was looking down, staring intently at the thick tights she wore for warmth.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 正低着头，目不转睛地看着腿上保暖用的厚裤袜。

0071.en: Today, considering she was going out, she wore a light pink woolen coat with a simple white turtleneck sweater inside, warm and comfortable.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 今天她考虑到要出门，穿了一件淡粉色的毛呢外套，内搭是一件简约的白色高领毛衣，温暖而舒适。

0071.en: Her lower body was a pair of beige warm tights paired with brown short boots, the smooth lines making her legs appear long.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 下身则是一条米色的保暖裤袜搭配棕色短靴，流畅的线条让她的双腿显得修长。

0071.en: After confirming her gaze, it was food-grade.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 确认过眼神，是食品级。

0071.en: Su Tao felt a little uncomfortable under Chi Xiaocheng's gaze, "Xia... Xiaocheng, what's wrong?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃被池小橙这样的眼神看得有些不自在，“小...小橙，怎么了吗？”

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked up faintly at Su Tao, "Are you going out like this?"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 池小橙幽幽地抬头看向苏桃，“你就这样出门？”

0071.en: "Is there... something wrong?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: “有...有什么问题吗？”

0071.en: Although not very fashionable, this was a relatively normal outfit for the current season.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 虽说不上很时尚，可这也是当下比较正常的打扮。

0071.en: Unexpectedly, Chi Xiaocheng very seriously pointed to her thigh, covered by thick stockings, "This, cannot be shown to others!"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 谁知，池小橙却是很认真地指了指穿着厚厚丝袜的大腿，“这个，不能给别人看！”

0071.en: "Huh?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng took a step closer, almost pressing against Su Tao's body, "Above the neck, hands, and no short skirts. This is the maximum outside!"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 池小橙一步迈近，几乎贴住了苏桃的身子，“脖子以上，手，裙子也不能穿短裙，在外面这就是最大限度！”

0071.en: Seeing the crimson eyes gradually fill with resentment, Su Tao swallowed and nodded slightly.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 眼看着那赤红的眸子渐渐幽怨，苏桃咽了一口唾沫，轻轻点头。

0071.en: This was the possessiveness of a yandere!
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 这就是病娇的占有欲！

0071.en: And also the sickness of a yandere.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 同时也是病娇的病。

0071.en: The next second, Chi Xiaocheng showed the cuteness of a yandere.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 下一秒，池小橙就又表现了病娇的娇。

0071.en: She cupped her face with both hands, her ears slightly red, and said shyly, "O-of course, if we're at home, Tao Tao can wear anything you want. I... I'll like it all."
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 双手捧住脸蛋，耳根微红，害羞地说道，“当...当然，如果是在家里的话，桃桃怎么样穿都可以哦，我...我都会喜欢的。”

0071.en: The huge difference before and after made it feel like it wasn't the same person.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 前后巨大的差异让人感觉不是同一个人。

0071.en: However, it was undeniable that the contrast of fiercely speaking sweet nothings one moment and then blushing shyly the next was very cute.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 然而不可否认的是，上一秒恶狠狠地说着情话，下一秒却脸红得害羞的反差，很是可爱。

0071.en: The pressure dissipated, and Su Tao couldn't help but smile.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 压力散去，苏桃唇角不禁勾起一抹笑容。

0071.en: She put her hands on her hips and pointed at Chi Xiaocheng, "Then what about you, Xiaocheng? Aren't you dressed like this too?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 双手叉腰地指着池小橙，“那小橙你呢，你不也是这样的打扮吗？”

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng was wearing a newly bought down coat today, its hem reaching her calves. She also wore thick warm stockings on her legs.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 池小橙今天是一件新买的羽绒大衣，下摆长度直直到了小腿，腿上同样是一条厚厚的保暖袜。

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked up and giggled, "I'm wearing it for you to see, Tao Tao. Do you like it?"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 池小橙抬头嘻嘻一笑，“我是穿给桃桃你看的呀，喜欢吗？”

0071.en: She lifted the hem of her coat and twirled around lightly, as if she wasn't wearing a coat, but a skirt.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 她提起大衣下摆，轻快地原地转了一圈，穿的好似不是大衣，而是裙子。

0071.en: Su Tao hummed softly, "Since you won't let me wear this out, then I won't let you wear this out either!"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃轻轻哼了一下，“既然你不许我这样穿出去，那我也不许你这样穿出去！”

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng paused, then raised her cute smiling face, revealing her sharp little fangs, "Okay~ Tao Tao is mine, and I am Tao Tao's!"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 池小橙顿了一下，扬起可爱的笑脸，露出了尖尖地小虎牙，“好~桃桃是我的，我也是桃桃的！”

0071.en: The two looked at each other.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 二人对视一眼。

0071.en: Neither could hold back, and they both laughed lightly.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 都没忍住，一同轻快地笑了出声。

0071.en: In the joy, one was extremely satisfied, and the other was a little shy.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 欢乐中，一方无比满足，一方带了点点羞涩。

0071.en: This was just shopping, just pretending to be on a date with her.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 这只是逛街，假装和她约会而已。

0071.en: Su Tao thought to herself, and changed into a pair of long pants with Chi Xiaocheng.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 苏桃心底如是想着，和池小橙一同换了条长裤。

0071.en: Her precious legs were hidden.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 瑰宝般的双腿被藏了起来。

0071.en: Su Tao turned her head and asked, "Xiaocheng, where are you planning to go today?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃转头问道，“小橙今天打算去哪？”

0071.en: "I'll listen to Tao Tao~"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: “我听桃桃的~”

0071.en: "I knew you'd say that." Su Tao took out her phone and looked at the arrangements and plans she had made last night.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: “就知道你会这么说。”苏桃拿出手机，看了眼昨晚就已经做好的安排和攻略。

0071.en: She walked into the elevator with Chi Xiaocheng and said, "You haven't had breakfast yet, have you? How about we go have breakfast together first, then go to Dongfang Yang's cafe and sit for the morning? You can't keep skipping work there."
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 与池小橙一同走进电梯，同时说道，“早餐还没吃吧，那我们先一起去吃个早餐，然后去东方阳的咖啡厅坐一个上午，你在那边打工可不能一直不去。”

0071.en: "What then?"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: “之后呢？”

0071.en: "The weather forecast says it will snow in the afternoon. How about we go to a cat cafe in the afternoon? I feel like Xiaocheng and cats are a good match. Then in the evening, we'll go shopping at the commercial center."
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: “天气预报说下午会下雪，下午去一家猫咖怎么样，感觉小橙和猫咪很配呢，等晚上我们再去商业城那边逛街。”

0071.en: "Okay~"
0071.speaker: 池小橙

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng naturally didn't mind Su Tao's arrangements. With a smile, she took Su Tao's hand and walked out.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 池小橙自然不会介意苏桃的安排，挂着笑容，牵着苏桃的手往外去。

0071.en: On the street, she walked ahead, pointing her index finger at a snowy scene in front and talking about something.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 街道上，她走在前面，食指指着前方的某处雪景讲述着什么。

0071.en: Su Tao was half-dragged behind, occasionally nodding, her face full of indulgence and helplessness.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 苏桃在后面被半拽着走，时而点头，一脸的宠溺与无奈。

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng seemed to be constantly aware of what was behind her. Whenever Su Tao looked at her, she would turn around at the right moment.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 池小橙似乎时刻关注身后一样，每当苏桃看向她时，都会在恰当的一刻转身。

0071.en: She smiled.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 抿出笑容。

0071.en: Pure and healing.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 纯真而治愈。

0071.en: As if ripples flowed through her eyes, Su Tao had a vision of scenes from her childhood.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 宛如有涟漪淌过双眼，苏桃幻视到了儿时的一幕幕。

0071.en: Wasn't Chi Xiaocheng just like this now, preparing gifts, then holding her hand and leading her to various mysterious places, as if guiding her forward?
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 池小橙不正是现在这样，准备了礼物后，牵着她的手去各种神秘的地方，就好似指引她前进的方向。

0071.en: In reality, those so-called gifts.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 实际上，那所谓的礼物。

0071.en: Perhaps it was a flower crown she wove, a small clay figure she molded, a lollipop she secretly bought, or sometimes, just a smile.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 可能是她编织的花环，是她用泥巴捏的小人，是她偷偷买的一根棒棒糖，或者是有的时候，就只是一个笑容。

0071.en: To be moved by the scene, it was indeed so.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 触景生情，当是如此。

0071.en: In a blink of an eye.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 一眨眼。

0071.en: It seemed like everything had changed, and yet nothing had changed.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 好像什么都变了，又好像什么都没变。

0071.en: She had grown up.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 她长大了。

0071.en: In her eyes, there was more love and affection.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 眼中，多了喜欢和爱。

0071.en: "Steamed bun, want some?"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: “包子，要吃吗？”

0071.en: In a trance, Chi Xiaocheng held a bamboo skewer, offering a small steamed bun.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 恍惚间，池小橙拿着一根竹签，上面递过来了一个小笼包。

0071.en: Su Tao smiled easily, brushed the hair from her cheek, and leaned in to take a bite.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 苏桃抿出轻松的笑容，撩起脸颊边的秀发，凑过去咬了一口。

0071.en: A shallow row of teeth marks appeared.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 一排浅浅的银印贴了上去。

0071.en: She ate half.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 她吃了半个。

0071.en: And Chi Xiaocheng, humming a little tune, put the other half into her mouth.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 而池小橙，哼着小曲，将另外半只送进嘴里。

0071.en: She ate with great enjoyment.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 吃得很享受。

0071.en: Su Tao smiled, "Xiaocheng, do you really like steamed buns?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: 苏桃莞尔，“小橙，你很喜欢吃小笼包吗？”

0071.en: Chi Xiaocheng gently shook her head, "Not really. This shop's soup is too much, and the taste is too strong."
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: 池小橙轻轻摇头，“不算很喜欢，这家店的汤汁比较多，味道太浓了。”

0071.en: "Then why are you eating it with such relish? Are you hungry?"
0071.speaker: 苏桃
0071.cn: “那怎么还吃得这么津津有味，饿了？”

0071.en: "Silly Tao Tao." Chi Xiaocheng turned around helplessly, looking at her with tender eyes, "What I've always liked is not the steamed bun, but you~"
0071.speaker: 池小橙
0071.cn: “笨蛋桃桃。”池小橙无奈转身，眼神柔情地看着她，“我喜欢的一直都不是小笼包，而是你呀~”

0071.en: Suddenly, Su Tao was stunned.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 霎时，苏桃呆了一下。

0071.en: A gentle breeze swept by, carrying tiny snowflakes, blowing Su Tao's hair.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 一阵微风拂过，带起点点细雪，吹动了苏桃的发丝。

0071.en: And stirring her heart.
0071.speaker: 旁白
0071.cn: 也撩动了她的心。

0072.en: Chapter 72 First Heartbeat
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 第72章 第一次心动

0072.en: Her heart beat a little faster, her pores opened. The biting cold wind did not make her shiver; instead, it dispelled a hint of warmth in her heart.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 心跳有些许加速，毛孔舒张，刺骨的寒风并未让她颤抖，反倒驱散了心中的一丝热意。

0072.en: Both mentally and physically, she was relaxed, enjoying this moment.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 无论是精神还是身体，都很放松地享受着这一刻。

0072.en: What was this feeling?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 这是什么感觉？

0072.en: Was it a heartbeat?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 心动吗？

0072.en: Her smile, her small face, her delicate nose, her small mouth, her hair, all so cute.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 她的笑颜、她的小脸、她的琼鼻、小嘴、秀发，都好可爱。

0072.en: But I myself am a girl, and I'm actually... having a heartbeat for another girl?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 可我本身就是一个女生，竟然会对其他女孩......心动？

0072.en: Su Tao looked away. This was purely a subconscious self-protection.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 苏桃侧开了目光，这是纯粹是下意识的自我保护。

0072.en: No, perhaps it was because Xiaocheng's actions reminded me of things from my childhood.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 不，兴许是因为小橙的动作让我想到了小时候的事情。

0072.en: Falling into memories and a trance, that's why I'm reacting like this.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 陷入了回忆和恍惚，才会有这样的反应。

0072.en: At this moment, Chi Xiaocheng's voice suddenly sounded in her ear, "Do you like it?"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 这时，池小橙的声音陡然在耳边响起，“喜欢吗？”

0072.en: "What?"
0072.speaker: 苏桃
0072.cn: “什么？”

0072.en: Su Tao paused, then became flustered again.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 苏桃顿了一下，再一度慌乱了起来。

0072.en: What did Xiaocheng mean?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 小橙问的是什么意思？

0072.en: Does she like her?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 喜不喜欢她？

0072.en: Not just this time, she had asked several times before.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 不仅仅是这次，之前也问过了好几次。

0072.en: Would she demand an answer? What if she showed her yandere side again?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 她会不会要求我必须回答，要是再展示病娇的一面要怎么办？

0072.en: Her mind raced. Chi Xiaocheng's voice sounded again, "Steamed bun, Tao Tao, do you like it?"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 脑子思绪乱了起来，池小橙的声音再度响起，“小笼包，桃桃你喜欢吗？”

0072.en: What? So she was asking about the steamed bun.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 什么啊，原来问的是小笼包啊。

0072.en: Su Tao quickly nodded, "Mm-hmm, I like it."
0072.speaker: 苏桃
0072.cn: 苏桃连忙点了点头，“嗯嗯，喜欢。”

0072.en: "Is that so? As long as Tao Tao likes it~"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: “这样呀，桃桃喜欢就好了呢~”

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled back and walked forward again.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 池小橙回眸一笑，又迈步向前走去。

0072.en: Her strange tone, slightly elongated ending, Chi Xiaocheng's actions always left Su Tao a little puzzled.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 奇怪的语气，稍稍拉长的尾音，池小橙所作所为一直都让苏桃有些不解。

0072.en: She was just talking about steamed buns, what did she mean by that?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 说的只是小笼包，她这又是什么意思呢？

0072.en: Following Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao's gaze was on Chi Xiaocheng. After walking a few steps, she suddenly paused.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 跟在池小橙身侧，苏桃视线放在池小橙身上，走了两步后忽然顿了一下。

0072.en: Her gaze lingered on her chest for a few seconds, then quickly moved away.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 视线在她心口前停留了几秒，又迅速挪开

0072.en: Her steps became hurried.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 脚步，变得匆忙了起来。

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't know how much Su Tao was thinking. She was very happy right now.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 池小橙可不知道苏桃想了多少，现在的她就很开心。

0072.en: Only because the system had just sent a notification she had been waiting for.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 只因系统刚刚传来了一道她等候已久的提示。

0072.en: [Detected female lead Su Tao experiencing a heartbeat emotion towards the host.]
0072.speaker: 系统
0072.cn: 【检测到女主苏桃对宿主产生了心动的情绪】

0072.en: [Emotion points +100...]
0072.speaker: 系统

0072.en: Since it was the first time such an emotion had occurred, the emotion points gained were undoubtedly a huge sum.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 由于是第一次产生这样的情绪，获得的情绪值无疑是巨款。

0072.en: And it was worth her half a month of effort. She had finally made Tao Tao change her mind!
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 也不免自己努力了半个月，终于是让桃桃有所改观了啊！

0072.en: If she could deal with Ye Liang next, she would have even more time.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 接下来要是能解决叶良的话，她的时间就更多了。

0072.en: But for the current Tao Tao, such a date could only be a seasoning.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 不过对于现在的桃桃而言，这样的约会还是只能当调味剂啊。

0072.en: She had to do something drastic.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 得整点狠活才行。

0072.en: At least, she had to put more pressure on her, like that night on the rooftop, or in the dark room.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 至少也要像当初天台，或者小黑屋时那样，给她多上点压力。

0072.en: —What should she do?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: ——该怎么办才好呢？

0072.en: They didn't chat along the way as before. Both had their own thoughts, and soon arrived at the Moonlight Cafe.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 一路没和之前一样闲聊，二人各怀心思，很快到了月色咖啡厅。

0072.en: Perhaps the cafe's air conditioning was constantly on. Compared to its usual desertedness, it finally had several customers.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 兴许是咖啡厅空调不断，相比往日的冷清，终于有了好几个客人。

0072.en: Butler Chu saw the two approaching and greeted them with a smile, "Miss Chi, Miss Su, what coffee would you like to drink?"
0072.speaker: 褚三
0072.cn: 褚三看到二人走近，微笑着打招呼，“池小姐、苏小姐，要喝什么咖啡？”

0072.en: "Coffee starting at 100 yuan, I can't afford it." Chi Xiaocheng shivered, squinting at the air conditioner blowing warm air.
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: “100起步的咖啡，喝不起啊。”池小橙抖了抖身子，面对吹暖风的空调眯起了眼睛。

0072.en: Shopping in winter was indeed a suffering.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 冬天逛街，果然遭罪。

0072.en: Then, a clear voice sounded in her ear, "I'll treat you to coffee, but Chi Xiaocheng, aren't you too lazy? You're supposed to be watching the cafe, but you've skipped work three out of five days."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 紧接着，耳边就传来了一个爽朗的声音，“咖啡我请你们喝了，不过池小橙，你是不是太怠惰了，让你来看咖啡厅，五天有三天是翘班的。”

0072.en: Dongfang Yang walked down from the second floor of the cafe, his arms crossed, pretending to be displeased as he looked at Chi Xiaocheng.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 东方阳从咖啡的二楼走下，双手环胸，故作不满地看着池小橙。

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng saw Dongfang Yang. Her intermediate acting skills made her restrain a hint of the dependence she showed towards Su Tao, and instead, she timidly replied, "I was sick those few days. If you don't believe me, ask Tao Tao. She was taking care of me."
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 池小橙见东方阳在，中级的演技让她收敛了一丝表现在苏桃身上的依赖，转而怯生生地回答道，“那几天我生病了，不信你问桃桃，她在照顾我呢。”

0072.en: Su Tao's smile stiffened.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 苏桃笑容僵了一下。

0072.en: These days she skipped work, wasn't it in the dark room?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 翘班的这几天，可不就是在小黑屋里？

0072.en: "Is that so, Su Tao?"
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: “是这样吗苏桃？”

0072.en: Su Tao didn't dare to meet Dongfang Yang's gaze and nodded slightly, "Mm... Xiaocheng... has always been a bit frail."
0072.speaker: 苏桃
0072.cn: 苏桃不敢和东方阳对视，轻轻点头，“嗯...小橙她...一直都比较体弱。”

0072.en: She wasn't good at lying. If it were Si Chen, he could easily tell Su Tao was hiding something by paying attention to her micro-expressions.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 她其实不擅长撒谎，如果是司辰，稍微注意一下她的微表情，就能判断出苏桃在掩饰。

0072.en: Then Dongfang Yang just looked at Chi Xiaocheng helplessly, not suspecting Su Tao's cover-up at all, "Although it's the same whether you're at the cafe or not, next time you need to take time off, remember to report to Butler Chu in advance, understood?"
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 然后东方阳只是无奈地看向池小橙，不对苏桃的掩饰做一丝怀疑，“虽说咖啡厅有你没你都一样，但是下次有事情请假，记得提前报备褚三，知道了吗？”

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded like a pecking chick, then cautiously asked, "Boss, are you concerned about me?"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 池小橙如小鸡啄米般点头，又小心翼翼地问道，“老板你这是在关心我？”

0072.en: "Huh?" Dongfang Yang's tone was mocking, "I'm just afraid that if something really happens to you, you'll turn around and extort me. People who don't know might think I'm a black-hearted boss."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: “哈？”东方阳语气嘲弄，“只是怕你真的出问题反手讹我一笔而已，不知道的还以为我是黑心老板呢。”

0072.en: At these words, both Chi Xiaocheng and Su Tao looked at him strangely.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 此话一出，池小橙和苏桃都奇怪地看着他。

0072.en: Dongfang Yang's face froze, a little awkward, "W-why are you looking at me like that? I'm just telling the truth."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 东方阳脸色一顿，有些局促，“这...这么看我干嘛，我说的本来就是实话。”

0072.en: He quickly changed the subject, "I heard Ye Liang is bullying you two?"
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 他连忙转移话题，“听说叶良在欺负你俩？”

0072.en: Su Tao gently shook her head, "Not really, just a small spat with him."
0072.speaker: 苏桃
0072.cn: 苏桃轻轻摇头，“也没有，只是和他闹了点小别扭。”

0072.en: "He's bullying me!" Chi Xiaocheng mustered her courage, looking like she was complaining to her parents, "Boss, you don't know, Ye Liang actually said he wanted to snatch Tao Tao away. I... I wish I could beat him to death!"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: “在欺负我！”池小橙鼓起勇气，一副向家长告状的样子，“老板你是不知道，叶良他竟然说想抢走桃桃，我...我恨不得打死他！”

0072.en: A hint of bloodlust flashed in her eyes. Her intermediate acting skills made Chi Xiaocheng soft and cute.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 眸中腥芒一闪而逝，中级的演技让池小橙变得软糯可爱。

0072.en: Dongfang Yang was greatly moved when he saw this.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 东方阳见状，心中大为感动。

0072.en: That little b*stard Ye Liang, still saying Chi Xiaocheng likes Su Tao and would be dangerous?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 叶良那小逼，还说什么池小橙喜欢苏桃，会有危险？

0072.en: It's clear that Chi Xiaocheng likes me, Young Master!
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 这一看池小橙喜欢的就是本少爷啊！

0072.en: She knows I like Su Tao, and she's even willing to sacrifice herself to prevent Ye Liang from getting close to Su Tao!
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 她知道我喜欢苏桃，甚至不惜牺牲自己，阻止叶良去接触苏桃！

0072.en: What is this if not love for me?
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 这不是喜欢我是什么？

0072.en: Really, I'm crying.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 她那么喜欢我，却依旧将自己藏在身后，支持我和苏桃的感情。

0072.en: Dongfang Yang's heart ached. Ever since he confirmed that Chi Xiaocheng's true nature was a clumsy little idiot, he found her more and more pleasing to the eye.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 真的，我哭死。

0072.en: Emotions surged in his heart. Dongfang Yang immediately clenched his fist and pounded his chest, "Chi Xiaocheng, you're my employee. Next time Ye Liang dares to bully you, report him to me. He's got some nerve bullying my people!"
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 东方阳心中酸涩，自从确认了池小橙的本性是呆萌小蠢蛋后，看她是越来越顺眼。

0072.en: Then he looked at Su Tao, "Su Tao, you too. Next time Ye Liang yells at you, just ignore him. I've got your back."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 情绪涌上心头，东方阳当即握住拳头捶了一下胸口，“池小橙你是我的员工，下次叶良敢欺负你就报我，给他脸了欺负我的人！”

0072.en: After saying that, he quickly added, "Of course, don't misunderstand. I don't care that much about you two. I just don't like that guy Ye Liang. As your boss and friend, I'm just supporting you incidentally."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 说着又看向苏桃，“苏桃你也是，叶良下次再对你吆三喝四你就别管他，一切有我呢。”

0072.en: "That's it. If anything happens, message me on WeChat. I have something else to do, so I'm leaving first."
0072.speaker: 东方阳
0072.cn: 说完，又迅速补了一句，“当然，你们别误会啊，我不是有多在意你们，我只是看叶良那家伙不顺眼，作为老板和朋友，顺便支持一下你们而已。”

0072.en: Dongfang Yang put his hands in his pockets and walked out of the cafe with light steps, humming a cheerful tune.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: “就这样了，有什么事发我微信，我还有事先走了。”

0072.en: Clearly, he was in a very good mood.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 东方阳双手插兜，迈着轻快的步伐，一边乐呵地哼歌一边走出咖啡厅。

0072.en: Looking at his retreating figure, Chi Xiaocheng's acting subsided, and she couldn't help but sigh, "Dongfang Yang is truly a good person!"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 显然，他的心情极好。

0072.en: Su Tao nodded beside her, "He's always been a warm-hearted tsundere."
0072.speaker: 苏桃
0072.cn: 看着他离去的背影，池小橙的演技收敛，不禁感叹道，“东方阳真是个好人呐！”

0072.en: Seeing his young master praised by two beauties, Butler Chu, sitting at the counter, couldn't help but smile proudly, "Young Master has always been like this. He usually donates a lot of money to mountainous areas from the large sums his family gives him."
0072.speaker: 褚三
0072.cn: 苏桃在一旁点点头，“他一直是个热心肠的傲娇。”

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded gently.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 自家少爷被两位美女夸赞，坐在柜台前的褚三不由露出自豪的笑容，“少爷他一直都是这样的性格，平时家族给他一大笔钱，他都会拿出不少捐给山区的。”

0072.en: If such a character wasn't on the opposing side, there would indeed be nothing to criticize.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头。

0072.en: However, although Dongfang Yang was a bit foolish, he seemed to still have some good feelings for Tao Tao.
0072.speaker: 旁白
0072.cn: 这样的人设如果不是在对立面，确实没得黑。

0072.en: Chi Xiaocheng ordered a cup of coffee from Butler Chu, then leaned close to Su Tao's ear and asked, "Tao Tao, you don't like Dongfang Yang, do you?"
0072.speaker: 池小橙
0072.cn: 不过呢，这东方阳虽然傻了点，但他似乎还对桃桃有些好感呢。

0073.en: Chapter 73 Setting the Trap (Bonus for Luye Lin)
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 第73章 设局（为鹿野凛加更）

0073.en: Xiaocheng always overthinks things like this.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 小橙总是会这样，胡思乱想。

0073.en: Su Tao, who had been asked this question many times, gradually developed resistance to such words.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 已经被问过很多次了的苏桃，对于这样的话渐渐有了抗性。

0073.en: Anyway, she was just humoring her, appeasing her, pretending to like her.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 反正也只是在敷衍她，安抚她，假装去喜欢她。

0073.en: Su Tao naturally smiled, "Xiaocheng, don't worry, you're the one I care about."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 苏桃很自然地抿出笑容，“小橙放心吧，我在意的是你。”

0073.en: She didn't directly say she liked her.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 倒也没直接说喜欢。

0073.en: Using rhetoric to avoid responding.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 用话术，来逃避回应。

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng understood Su Tao's thoughts and didn't expose them. Instead, she continued to cling to her, her warm breath fanning Su Tao's earlobe, "Tao Tao can only like me. Whether it's Dongfang Yang, Si Chen, or Ye Liang, Tao Tao absolutely cannot like them~"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 池小橙清楚苏桃的想法，也不戳破，而继续附在她身边，呼出的热气拍打着她的耳垂，“桃桃只能喜欢我哦，不管是东方阳还是司辰，又或者是叶良，桃桃绝对不能去喜欢他们呢~”

0073.en: "Otherwise..."
0073.speaker: 池小橙

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled sweetly, not continuing. Instead, she sat on the sofa stool, swinging her two small legs, waiting for her coffee.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙嫣然一笑，没有继续说下去，而是坐在沙发凳上，晃着两条小腿等候咖啡。

0073.en: The ambiguous and harmonious relationship between the two had cooled considerably due to Dongfang Yang's arrival and Chi Xiaocheng's change of expression.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 二人间原本还算暧昧和谐的关系，因为东方阳的到来和池小橙的变脸，冷了许多。

0073.en: Su Tao couldn't help but wonder, if Chi Xiaocheng was always like this, would her interpersonal relationships become a mess?
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 苏桃不禁心想，如果池小橙一直都是这样，那么她身边的人际关系，会不会因此变得一团糟呢？

0073.en: Just a few words, and she developed hostility towards Dongfang Yang.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 只是聊了几句话，就产生了对东方阳的敌意。

0073.en: The relaxation she felt from recalling her childhood because of the steamed buns quietly turned into pressure.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 原本因为小笼包回忆到儿时的放松，悄然又转为了压力。

0073.en: The coffee was served.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 咖啡端上。

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng added a spoonful of sugar, then watched Su Tao add two and a half spoonfuls.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙加了一勺糖，又看着苏桃加了两勺半糖。

0073.en: Sure enough, Tao Tao's favorite was sweets.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 果然桃桃最喜欢的是甜食。

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng noted this detail and watched Su Tao with her hands cupped under her chin.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙记下了这点细节，就这样双手托腮注视着苏桃。

0073.en: Smiling silently.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 含笑不语。

0073.en: Perhaps it was the pressure from Chi Xiaocheng's gaze, but Su Tao drank cup after cup of coffee, appearing somewhat impatient.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 兴许是被池小橙看得有些压力，苏桃一杯接一杯的咖啡入肚，显得好像有些急躁。

0073.en: They spent the entire morning in the warm cafe, enjoying a wonderful and cozy time.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 就这样在温暖的咖啡厅待了一个上午，享受美妙的温馨时光。

0073.en: At noon, after the two had lunch.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 中午，二人又吃了个饭后。

0073.en: Tiny snowflakes began to fall from the sky.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 天空下起了点点细雪。

0073.en: The temperature seemed to drop a few degrees at this moment.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 温度似乎都在这一刻降了几度。

0073.en: Su Tao clasped her hands together and exhaled a warm breath, "This weather is really uncomfortable."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 苏桃双手合拢哈了口热气，“这样的天气真让人难受啊。”

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng, with her hands in her pockets, responded, "Yes, I heard it's going to be especially cold this year. You usually don't turn on the air conditioning in the dorm at night, do you?"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 池小橙在一边，双手插在口袋，应和道，“是呀，听说今年会格外的冷哦，在宿舍晚上一般不开空调的吧？”

0073.en: Su Tao nodded, "It's fine to use the air conditioning in summer, but the heating in winter can be very stuffy, I can't stand it."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 苏桃点头，“平时夏天开冷气还好，冬天暖气会很闷，受不了。”

0073.en: "Then..." Chi Xiaocheng jumped in front of her, her eyes sparkling with anticipation, "How about coming to my place? It's not far anyway, and we can sleep together!"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: “那......”池小橙跳到了她的面前，目光闪烁期待，“到我家来怎么样，反正也不远，我们一起睡！”

0073.en: "S-sleep together?"
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: “一...一起睡？”

0073.en: "Yes!" Chi Xiaocheng shook her head, "I want to sleep holding Tao Tao. Tao Tao is soft and fragrant, I like it~"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: “是呀！”池小橙晃了晃脑袋，“我想抱着桃桃睡，桃桃软软的，香香的，喜欢~”

0073.en: But the one who is truly soft, fragrant, and small enough to be easily embraced, is you, Xiaocheng!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 可真正软软的，香香的，娇小到能轻易拥入怀中的人，是小橙你啊！

0073.en: Su Tao's heart fluttered a little at Chi Xiaocheng's suggestion.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 苏桃听到池小橙的提议，有些心动。

0073.en: She and Chen Qian were used to waking up early. The other two roommates in the dorm were the type who slept until 11 AM and ate breakfast and lunch together, so she always tiptoed when she got up and left.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 她和陈倩习惯早起，宿舍另外两个舍友都是没课睡到11点，早餐午餐一起吃的类型，每次她起床出门都蹑手蹑脚的。

0073.en: But then she thought of Chi Xiaocheng's yandere state.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 但一想到池小橙的病娇状态。

0073.en: Su Tao still avoided it, making an excuse, "Applying for an overnight stay is quite troublesome, and I have many early morning classes. It's not good to run back and forth from the classroom."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 苏桃还是逃避了，找借口道，“申请外宿也挺麻烦的，而且我早八比较多，教室远来回跑不太好。”

0073.en: "Okay..."
0073.speaker: 池小橙

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng was a little disappointed, but she didn't have an episode, which made Su Tao secretly relieved.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙有些失落，但没有发病，这让苏桃暗暗松了口气。

0073.en: So she quickly changed the subject, "Let's go to the cat cafe first. It's a bit remote, so we'll have to walk a bit."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 于是她连忙转换话题，“先去猫咖吧，那边有点偏僻，得走一段路呢。”

0073.en: "Can a remote cat cafe make money?"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: “偏僻的猫咖能赚钱吗？”

0073.en: "It's Dongfang Yang's business. I heard he settled a few high school students who couldn't afford to study due to family reasons. He picked up a lot of stray cats from his other businesses, tamed them, and then sent them to the cat cafe to be raised."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: “东方阳的产业，据说安置了几个因为家庭原因没书读的高中生，他其他地方的产业捡了不少流浪猫，驯服后就送到猫咖养着了。”

0073.en: Su Tao had a small expectation, "He told me about it last time, but I haven't been there yet."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 苏桃有些小小的期待，“他上次跟我说了我还没去过。”

0073.en: Sure enough, Tao Tao is a cat lover.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 果然桃桃是个猫奴。

0073.en: She had to remember this too.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 这一点也要记下来。

0073.en: They walked together towards the cat cafe, but halfway there, Su Tao blushed and said to Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, wait for me here for a moment. I'm going to the nearby public restroom. I drank too much coffee."
0073.speaker: 苏桃
0073.cn: 一同往猫咖的位置走去，却又到半途，苏桃红着脸对池小橙道，“小橙你先在这等我一会儿吧，我去一趟附近的公共厕所，咖啡喝多了。”

0073.en: "Okay~"
0073.speaker: 池小橙

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng responded with a nod, extremely obedient.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙应声点头，乖巧无比。

0073.en: She had already made up her mind to ask a few times whether she liked cats or her when she got there.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 她已经做好了打算，去到那边就问几遍喜欢猫猫还是喜欢我。

0073.en: Then she would pretend to be a cat to win Su Tao's affection.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 然后假扮成猫咪讨苏桃喜欢。

0073.en: If she got close to those high school girls, she would act pathological again.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 如果她亲近那些女高中生的话，就再扮演一下病态的语气。

0073.en: Still the same goal, continue to put pressure on Su Tao.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 还是那一个目标，继续给苏桃上压力。

0073.en: She had to make her realize.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 要让她意识到。

0073.en: She must be completely devoted to me, Xiaocheng.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 必须全身心在小橙我这里才行呢

0073.en: However, fate had other plans.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 然而，天不合人怨。

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng had already planned everything, but an accident happened.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙计划都打算好了，意外却发生了。

0073.en: A sports car roared past on the road beside them.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 一辆跑车从身旁的公路呼啸而过。

0073.en: Nothing happened at first, but after a while, the sports car reversed.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 本来没发生什么，可没一会儿，跑车却倒了车回来。

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow, put away her phone, and watched the sports car warily.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙挑眉，收起手机警惕地看着这辆跑车。

0073.en: A tall figure stepped out of the sports car.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 一个高大的身影，从跑车上走了下来。

0073.en: "Chi Xiaocheng, what a small world!"
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: “池小橙，真是冤家路窄！”

0073.en: It was Ye Liang!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 是叶良！

0073.en: Instantly, Chi Xiaocheng pulled her hand out of her pocket and took out a fruit knife from the system space.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 瞬间，池小橙就将手从口袋掏出，从系统空间里拿了一把水果刀出来。

0073.en: Her eyes were vigilant and cold.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 眼神警惕且冰冷。

0073.en: The driver was his bodyguard. As soon as he got out of the car, he stood tall beside Ye Liang, flexing his arm muscles, "Young Master, is that her? There are no cameras here. Should I kill him?"
0073.speaker: 保镖
0073.cn: 开车的司机是他的保镖，一下车就高高站到叶良身边，紧了紧手臂的肌肉，“少爷，就是她吧，这里一块地没摄像头，要我干掉他吗？”

0073.en: "Don't!" Ye Liang looked at the fruit knife with lingering fear, "Don't be impulsive, you might not be able to beat her."
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: “别！”叶良心有余悸地看着那柄水果刀，“别冲动，你可能打不过。”

0073.en: "Huh?" The bodyguard looked at Ye Liang in surprise, "Me, with 20 years of experience, once killed a tiger with a single slide tackle. Young Master, you're saying I can't beat this 1.5-meter tall girl? Seriously?"
0073.speaker: 保镖
0073.cn: “哈？”保镖惊讶地看着叶良，“我，从业20年，曾经一个滑铲杀死了一头老虎，少爷你说我打不过这1米5的小女孩，认真的？”

0073.en: Ye Liang glanced at the bodyguard, "I don't care if you want to risk your life for a few thousand yuan salary. Now call for backup, just in case!"
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: 叶良瞥了眼保镖，“几千块的工资你想拼命我没意见，现在打电话喊人过来，以防万一！”

0073.en: Ye Liang cautiously observed Chi Xiaocheng, and soon noticed that she was not acting as she usually did.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 叶良谨慎地观察着池小橙，很快发现了她和当初的不对劲。

0073.en: It seemed... she was quite rational?
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 好像...有不少理智？

0073.en: Yes, this guy is a yandere. If you don't deliberately provoke her, she won't go crazy!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 对，这家伙是病娇，不故意刺激她的话，她不会疯的！

0073.en: Thinking of this, Ye Liang was no longer in a hurry. He just watched Chi Xiaocheng, "What a coincidence, you're alone. You can't escape this time."
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: 想到这里，叶良不着急了，就在一旁看着池小橙，“真是不凑巧呢，落单了，这次你可逃不了了。”

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng narrowed her eyes, "Ye Liang, you're not trying to trap me here and wait for someone, are you?"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 池小橙眯了眯眼睛，“叶良，你该不会是想把我堵在这里等人来吧？”

0073.en: "So what?"
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: “是又怎样？”

0073.en: His thoughts exposed, Ye Liang was not anxious. No matter how powerful she was, could she beat his group of professionally trained bodyguards?
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 被看破念头，叶良也不急，再怎么厉害的她，打得过自己一堆专业训练的保镖？

0073.en: However, what he didn't expect was that Chi Xiaocheng actually walked towards him step by step, "Ye Liang, you've already targeted me. Why would you still think I'm just wandering around alone?"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 然而他没料到的是，池小橙竟然一步步走了过来，“叶良，你已经盯上我了，为什么还会觉得我是一个人出来闲逛呢？”

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly, "I'm on a date with Tao Tao~"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 池小橙浅浅笑道，“我是和桃桃出来约会的哦~”

0073.en: Date!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 约会！

0073.en: Ye Liang's anger flared up instantly.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 叶良怒火“噌”地一下烧了起来。

0073.en: His face grew even darker, "Where's Su Tao?!"
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: 脸色更阴沉了，“苏桃呢！”

0073.en: Could it be that she was locked up by her again?!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 难不成是又被她关着了！

0073.en: At this moment, Chi Xiaocheng had already arrived in front of Ye Liang, not at all afraid of him trying to capture her.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 而这时，池小橙已经来到了叶良的面前，丝毫不怕他出手擒住自己。

0073.en: A faint smile played on her lips, "Tao Tao went to the restroom."
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 浅浅笑容抿出，“桃桃去厕所了。”

0073.en: "Then what do you mean?!"
0073.speaker: 叶良
0073.cn: “那你什么意思！”

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng extended her small knife, making Ye Liang quickly take a step back.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 池小橙小刀伸出，激得叶良赶忙后退了一步。

0073.en: But Chi Xiaocheng didn't stab him. Instead, she gently held it in her backhand.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 但池小橙却没有捅出去，而是反手轻轻握住。

0073.en: She seemed to be about to stab herself!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 她好像要刺向自己！

0073.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was deep, unnaturally tinged with pathology, "Tao Tao will be back soon. And at this moment, there's an easily enraged adult man, and a delicate, harmless little loli."
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: 池小橙语气幽深，不自然地带上了一抹病态，“桃桃很快就会回来，而此时此刻，一个容易暴怒的成年男人，一个娇弱且人畜无害的小萝莉。”

0073.en: "Tell me~ if I get hurt, or stabbed, who did it?"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: “你说~我要是受伤了，或者被捅了一刀，是谁干的呢？”

0073.en: "Ye Liang, it just so happens that I can't make Tao Tao stay away from you and hate you. You came... just in time~"
0073.speaker: 池小橙
0073.cn: “叶良，正巧我没办法让桃桃远离并讨厌你，你来得...正好呢~”

0073.en: The tip of the knife, avoiding vital points, rested on Chi Xiaocheng's own abdomen.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 刀尖，避开要害的同时，抵在了池小橙本人的腹部。

0073.en: Ye Liang's scalp tingled, and he was drenched in cold sweat.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 叶良头皮发麻，汗流浃背。

0073.en: This guy, she's even so ruthless to herself!
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 这家伙，竟然对自己也这么狠！

0073.en: If he were to act now, wouldn't it be exactly what Chi Xiaocheng wanted?
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 他此刻要是动手，岂不是真如了池小橙所愿？

0073.en: When he explained later, would Su Tao really side with him?
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 到时候解释，苏桃真的会倾向自己这边吗？

0073.en: The two remained in a stalemate, but they didn't notice that behind a tree not far away, a figure heard every word clearly.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 二人就这样相互僵持，却没注意到，不远处的一棵树后，一个倩影将这些话，听得一清二楚。

0073.en: Su Tao stood there dumbfounded, her eyes filled with disbelief.
0073.speaker: 旁白
0073.cn: 苏桃呆愣地站在原地，瞳孔尽是难以置信。

0074.en: Chapter 74 Accept Her, or Abandon Her
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 第74章 接受她，或者抛弃她

0074.en: This early winter was colder than previous years.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 今年的初冬，比往年都要冷。

0074.en: Stepping out of the warm, air-conditioned cafe, facing the cold wind and fine snow, even with her hands in her pockets, she couldn't resist the biting damp cold of Jiangnan.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 从有空调的温暖咖啡厅走出，面对寒风细雪，即便是将手藏在口袋，也抵不住这江南刺骨的湿冷。

0074.en: But bidding farewell to Chi Xiaocheng and facing the cold wind alone, Su Tao felt a strange sense of ease.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 但道别池小橙，独自迎着寒风时，苏桃却感觉到一丝别样的轻松。

0074.en: Her nerves were too taut.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她的神经太紧绷了。

0074.en: Ever since that scene in the basement, everything seemed to have changed.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 自从地下室的那一幕开始，一切都好像变得不一样了。

0074.en: Her love, her madness, her obsession.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她的喜欢，她的疯狂，她的偏执。

0074.en: The light and shadow from scattered words in conversations gradually overlapped with the rooftop and basement scenes.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 光影从聊天中的只言片语，渐渐与天台和地下室的交替重合。

0074.en: The taste of orange juice still made her feel nauseous, but her body had unconsciously gotten used to it.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 橙汁的味道依旧让人心理反胃，可身体却不知不觉习惯了下来。

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng was contradictory.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 池小橙是矛盾的。

0074.en: When she was indulged, she would show a healing and cute smile, and her dependence was delightful.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 顺着她时，会展现治愈可爱的笑容，她的依赖让人欣喜。

0074.en: But her sensitivity far outweighed this cuteness.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 可她的敏感，却远远盖过了这份可爱。

0074.en: A movement, a word, or even a glance, would trigger her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 一个动作，一句话，甚至是一个眼神，她都会应激。

0074.en: She was clearly the one who was seriously ill, and she was the one at fault, but unconsciously, everyone around her sided with her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 明明病得不轻的是她，错的也是她，但不知不觉，身边的人却都倾向她。

0074.en: Doctor Cheng, Si Chen, Chen Qian, her roommate, and even Liu Guijia who bullied her. Everyone who knew a part of her relationship with Chi Xiaocheng sided with her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 成医生、司辰、陈倩、舍友，甚至欺负了她的刘桂嘉，凡是知道了自己和池小橙一部分关系的人，都偏向了她。

0074.en: The key was that in their eyes, comparing Ye Liang and Chi Xiaocheng.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 关键是在他们的视野中，叶良和池小橙对比。

0074.en: Gender aside, Chi Xiaocheng's attitude towards Su Tao seemed to completely overwhelm Ye Liang.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 抛开性别不谈，池小橙对她苏桃的态度似乎完爆叶良。

0074.en: —Even though she was seriously ill.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: ——即便她病得不轻。

0074.en: If it's not Xiaocheng who's wrong, then am I?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 既然错的不是小橙，错的难道是我？

0074.en: Pressure, like a large hand, squeezed her neck, tightening little by little, making it difficult for her to breathe, and increasingly painful.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 压力如一只大手掐住了她的脖子，一点一点地用力，让她难以呼吸，愈发痛苦。

0074.en: Her physical fatigue was relieved, but what about her mental state?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 身体上的疲惫得以缓解，可精神上呢？

0074.en: Like a thin thread hanging over her head, extremely taut.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 如一根细线悬在脑门，紧绷无比。

0074.en: When normal, Chi Xiaocheng was lively, cute, docile, and refined.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 正常时的池小橙活泼、可爱、温顺、斯文。

0074.en: She could keenly perceive Su Tao's mood and provide emotional value, making her happy.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 能很细心地觉察到她苏桃的心情，并给予一定的情绪价值，讨她开心。

0074.en: She seemed perfect and very relaxing, didn't she?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 看起来很完美，很让人放松，不是吗？

0074.en: But by her side, Su Tao had to constantly keep her nerves taut, pay attention to her words and actions, and constantly think about how to soothe her stress, always ready for her seemingly insecure abrupt questions.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 可在她身边，苏桃却要时刻紧绷着神经，注意言辞与行动，脑袋要不停地思考如何才能安抚她的应激，要时刻准备她那似乎没有安全感的突兀询问。

0074.en: Saying things she didn't mean to like her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 违心地说着喜欢她的话。

0074.en: Not only Chi Xiaocheng, but even her surroundings were putting pressure on her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 不仅仅是池小橙，甚至周遭的生活，都在给予她压力。

0074.en: Her school mentor's overly high expectations, her classmates' enthusiastic affection for her, being praised highly for her beauty, and her every action being watched by numerous students.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 学校导师对她过高的期待、身边同学对她热心肠的喜欢、因为长得漂亮被捧得高高在上，万众瞩目下一板一眼的行动都被诸多学生看在眼里。

0074.en: And working, earning money, studying, living.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 还有打工、赚钱、学习、生活

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng exerted the most pressure, but she was also the only one who could relieve it.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 池小橙给的压力最大，但唯一能够缓解压力的，也是她。

0074.en: By her side, she could occasionally recall the past and enjoy peaceful warmth.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 在她身边，偶尔还能忆起从前，享受平静的温馨。

0074.en: Cold water cupped in her hands, splashed onto her face.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 冰冷的清水自双手捧起，拍在脸上。

0074.en: Su Tao walked out of the public restroom, feeling much lighter.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 苏桃从公共厕所走出，感觉轻松了不少。

0074.en: She didn't know how to deal with Chi Xiaocheng, and she didn't dare to truly follow Doctor Cheng's advice to enjoy the yandere.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她不知如何应对池小橙，又不敢真的听成医生的话去享受病娇。

0074.en: She was afraid, so how could she enjoy it?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她都在害怕，又谈何享受？

0074.en: "Is not dealing with it the best way to deal with it?"
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: “不处理，会是最好的处理吗？”

0074.en: The thought of escaping arose in her heart. Su Tao put her slightly reddened hands, numb from the cold, into her pockets and slowly walked towards Chi Xiaocheng.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 逃避的心思从心中升起，苏桃将冻得微红的双手揣进兜里，缓缓往池小橙所在的方向前去。

0074.en: She wanted time to think.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她想要时间思考。

0074.en: But fate had other plans.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 可上天并不如她愿。

0074.en: Ye Liang arrived.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 叶良到了。

0074.en: And got into an argument with Chi Xiaocheng.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 和池小橙起了争执。

0074.en: The gleaming small knife emitted a cold light.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 明晃晃的小刀散发寒芒。

0074.en: She hid behind a tree, in the blind spot of their vision, and saw everything clearly.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她藏在二人视角死角的树后，将这一切都看得清清楚楚。

0074.en: "Tell me~ if I get hurt, or stabbed, who did it?"
0074.speaker: 池小橙
0074.cn: “你说~我要是受伤了，或者被捅了一刀，是谁干的呢？”

0074.en: "Ye Liang, it just so happens that I can't make Tao Tao stay away from you and hate you. You came... just in time~"
0074.speaker: 池小橙
0074.cn: “叶良，正巧我没办法让桃桃远离并讨厌你，你来得...正好呢~”

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice became hoarse and frenzied.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 池小橙的声音变得嘶哑癫狂。

0074.en: Su Tao knew that Chi Xiaocheng had entered a yandere state.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 苏桃清楚，池小橙已经进入了病娇状态。

0074.en: Ye Liang had provoked her, and her rationality was gone.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 叶良刺激到她了，理智不复。

0074.en: Is Xiaocheng waiting for me to appear, then hurt herself, frame Ye Liang, and gain my sympathy?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 小橙在等我出现，然后伤害自己，并嫁祸叶良，夺取我的同情吗？

0074.en: What would happen if I didn't show up?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 如果我不出去的话，又会怎样呢？

0074.en: Su Tao leaned against the tree, looking up at the sky. Fine snow fell on her lips, bringing a bitter smile.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 苏桃靠在树旁，抬头看着天空，细雪飘在她的唇角，带起一抹苦笑。

0074.en: "So that's what Qianqian and Doctor Cheng meant by choice."
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: “原来倩倩和成医生说的选择，是这个意思啊。”

0074.en: It wasn't a choice between Ye Liang and Chi Xiaocheng.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 不是在叶良和池小橙中二选一。

0074.en: But...
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 而是。

0074.en: —Accept her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: ——接受她。

0074.en: Or...
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 亦或者。

0074.en: —Abandon her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: ——抛弃她。

0074.en: If I just ran away like this, what would become of them?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 如果我就这样直接逃走的话，他们会发展成什么样呢？

0074.en: Maybe I shouldn't appear at all.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 要不还是不要出现了吧。

0074.en: Yes, she always gives such choices. Once is countless times. Just run away.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 对，她总是会给这样的选择，有一次就有无数次，只要逃走就好了。

0074.en: Just run away!
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 逃走就好了！

0074.en: Running away would end this painful struggle.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 一走了之，就不会再有这样痛苦的纠结。

0074.en: Taking a step, Su Tao suddenly stopped.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 一只脚迈出，苏桃又呆呆地止住了动作。

0074.en: It was as if a voice in her heart was asking her.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 心底好似有一个声音在向她询问。

0074.en: Do you really want to run away like this?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 你真的要这样逃走吗？

0074.en: But isn't she your most cherished sister?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 可她，不是你最在意的妹妹吗？

0074.en: Isn't she the only one who accompanied you throughout your childhood and supported you in moving forward?
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她不是陪伴了你整个童年，支撑着你不断前进的唯一吗？

0074.en: Suddenly, Ye Liang's grim roar came from her ear, "Chi Xiaocheng, are you crazy?!"
0074.speaker: 叶良
0074.cn: 骤然间，耳边传来了叶良狰狞的吼声，“池小橙，你疯了吗！”

0074.en: Little time left for choice.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 选择的时间，所剩无几。

0074.en: Su Tao mechanically poked her head out, her pupils suddenly contracting.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 苏桃动作机械地探出头来，瞳孔骤然收缩。

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng stood in front of Ye Liang, clutching her abdomen in pain. Crimson blood continuously dripped onto the ground, melting the fine snow.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 只见池小橙站在叶良身前，痛苦地捂住了腹部，艳红的血液不断落到地上，将细雪融化。

0074.en: Whether it was intentional by Chi Xiaocheng or the movement was too large, Ye Liang, who was close to her, was inevitably splashed with a lot of crimson.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 不知是池小橙故意的，还是动作的幅度太大，靠近她的叶良都不免溅到了不少珠红。

0074.en: From afar, it really looked like he had acted ruthlessly, intending to leave Chi Xiaocheng in this snowy field forever.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 远远看去，就真的像是他下狠手，要把池小橙永远留在这片雪地。

0074.en: The clouds covered the last bit of sun, and gloom climbed onto Ye Liang's face, "You lunatic, do you think you can catch Su Tao like this? With such a frail appearance in front of me, aren't you afraid I'll just kill you right here?!"
