0074.speaker: 叶良
0074.cn: 云层遮住了最后一点太阳，阴沉攀上了叶良的脸，“你这疯子，你以为这样就能抓住苏桃了吗，这样一副孱弱的样子在我面前，你就不怕我直接将你给杀死在这里吗！”

0074.en: He reached out his hand, seemingly about to snatch the fruit knife from Chi Xiaocheng's hand.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 他伸出了手，似乎就要抢夺池小橙手里的水果刀。

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng's smile became even more eerie, and she was about to speak.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 池小橙笑容愈发妖异，正要开口。

0074.en: Suddenly, the system's voice sounded in her mind.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 脑海中忽然响起了系统的声音。

0074.en: [Host, calm down. Su Tao is back, watching from the side!]
0074.speaker: 系统
0074.cn: 【宿主，冷静点，苏桃已经回来了，就在旁边看着！】

0074.en: Chi Xiaocheng's pupils contracted slightly. The pain, which even the pain reduction skill couldn't completely alleviate, made her even calmer.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 池小橙瞳孔微微收缩，痛感减弱技能都无法完全缓解的疼痛让她更加冷静。

0074.en: She had a sudden inspiration and changed her original statement.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她灵机一动，改变了原本的说辞。

0074.en: Instead, she glared fiercely at Ye Liang, "Don't think I don't know, Ye Liang. You know Tao Tao's true identity, right? You're approaching her just to use her!"
0074.speaker: 池小橙
0074.cn: 而是恶狠狠地盯着叶良，“别以为我不知道，叶良你知道桃桃的真实身份对吧，你接触她不就是想利用她！”

0074.en: "What are you talking about..."
0074.speaker: 叶良

0074.en: Before he could finish, he was interrupted by Chi Xiaocheng's even more furious voice, "I will never allow you to harm Tao Tao, and I will never allow you to get close to her!"
0074.speaker: 池小橙
0074.cn: 话未出口，就被池小橙更戾斥的声音打断，“我绝不会允许你伤害桃桃的，更不会允许你接近她！”

0074.en: Ye Liang's anger increased, and he sneered, instructing the bodyguard beside him, "Go find Su Tao and stop her. Don't let her come here."
0074.speaker: 叶良
0074.cn: 叶良怒意增加，嘴角狞笑，对身旁的保镖吩咐道，“你去找苏桃，把她给我拦住了，绝不能让她过来这里。”

0074.en: "As for you, Chi Xiaocheng!" Ye Liang clenched his fist, "Since you want to threaten me with injury so much, I'll let you stay here forever!"
0074.speaker: 叶良
0074.cn: “至于你池小橙！”叶良攥紧了拳头，“既然你这么想以伤来要挟我，我就让你永远留在这里！”

0074.en: The furious voice reached Su Tao's ears.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 暴怒的声音传入苏桃耳里。

0074.en: She knew she couldn't wait any longer.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她知道，已经不能继续等下去了。

0074.en: "Xiaocheng, is your love really that heavy?"
0074.speaker: 苏桃
0074.cn: “小橙，你的爱，难道就那么沉重吗？”

0074.en: Her chapped lips parted slightly, and Su Tao slowly walked out from behind the tree.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 冻得干裂的嘴唇轻轻开合，苏桃缓缓从树旁走出。

0074.en: As if she had just arrived, her extremely haggard face showed an unusually poor acting.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 就像是刚赶到这里，无比憔悴的脸上，是异常差劲的演技。

0074.en: Su Tao's lips trembled, and she asked softly, "Ye Liang... what are you doing?"
0074.speaker: 苏桃
0074.cn: 苏桃颤抖着唇，轻声问道，“叶良...你在做什么？”

0074.en: From beginning to end, she had no choice.
0074.speaker: 旁白
0074.cn: 她自始至终，就没有选择。

0075.en: Chapter 76 Collapse, Confusion, Pain (Bonus for Xunyin Lingtu)
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 第76章 崩坏、迷茫、痛苦（为迅音玲兔加更）

0075.en: She no longer controlled her emotions. Tears streamed from her eyes, one hand clutched the clothes on her chest, and her hair was disheveled.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 她不再控制自己的情绪，泪水自双眼涌出，一手拽紧了胸前的衣服，发丝缭乱。

0075.en: "Ye Liang, are you forcing me?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “叶良，你非要逼我是不是！”

0075.en: Her trembling voice was no longer calm, but filled with suppressed roars, "You make me choose, you make me choose! Do I have a choice? What else can I choose besides accepting Xiaocheng?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 颤抖的声音不再平静，而是充斥压抑地嘶吼，“你让我选，你让我选！我有得选吗，我除了接受小橙我还能选什么！”

0075.en: Su Tao smiled through her tears, "Just as you said, she's a yandere, very dangerous, and I know that. But what do you want me to do? Abandon Xiaocheng? Or ignore her? Or send her to a mental hospital?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃泪中带笑，“就像你说的，她是病娇，很危险，我也知道，但你要我怎么做呢，抛弃小橙？还是不理会她？亦或者把她送进精神病院？”

0075.en: "Ye Liang, originally, if we just broke off our relationship, we could still be strangers who nod to each other in the future. If you ever have any trouble, and it doesn't endanger Xiaocheng, perhaps I could even help."
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “叶良，本来我们断绝了关系就可以了，未来遇见还能作为点头之交的陌路人，以后你要是有什么麻烦，不危及到小橙或许我也可以帮忙。”

0075.en: "But why are you forcing me?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “但你为什么要逼我！”

0075.en: "Do you have to make me choose between her and you?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “非要我在她和你之中选一个吗！”

0075.en: Su Tao's chest heaved continuously. Large gulps of cold air entered her lungs, making her extremely uncomfortable.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 苏桃胸口不断起伏，大口大口的冷气吸入肺中，让她无比难受。

0075.en: Her body trembled uncontrollably, unsure of what she was afraid of.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 身子都止不住地去颤抖，不知是在害怕些什么。

0075.en: Yes, it would be fine to just break off the relationship in front of Xiaocheng.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 是的，只要在小橙面前断绝关系就好了。

0075.en: Then, less contact. This way, they could still be ordinary friends, like strangers.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 之后少联系，这样还能做一下如路人般的普通朋友。

0075.en: If it were Si Chen or Dongfang Yang, they might have understood the meaning of Su Tao's words.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 换司辰或东方阳来，兴许就明白了苏桃话语中的意思。

0075.en: But Ye Liang, still pressing, pointed at Chi Xiaocheng and said, "Why can't you choose? Whether a yandere can be cured is debatable, but I have money and resources. I can hire professional psychologists to diagnose and treat her. If you care about her, I can help you too."
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 而叶良，依旧逼迫一般，指着池小橙说道，“为什么不能选，病娇能不能治尚且不说，我有钱，有资源可以请专业的心理医生为她诊断治疗，你在意她我也可以帮你。”

0075.en: "You never believed me, so how could you choose me?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “你根本就没相信过我，又怎么可能选我！”

0075.en: Su Tao chuckled, "How can I believe you?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃呵呵一笑，“你让我怎么相信你？”

0075.en: "How many times have you said those words in front of me? 'If I hadn't stopped it', 'just to save my face', 'if it weren't for me, Chi Xiaocheng would have disappeared long ago'. Do you remember how many times you've said that?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “你在我面前说过多少次那样的话了，‘如果不是我拦着’、‘只是给我面子’‘要不是因为我，早就让池小橙消失了’，这样的话说过多少次了你还记得吗？”

0075.en: "Do you want to say it's for my own good?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “你是不是想说为了我好？”

0075.en: "You like me, and this is how you constantly manipulate me, constantly using Xiaocheng to pressure me?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “你喜欢我，就是这样不断PUA我，不断用小橙来给我压力？”

0075.en: Ye Liang waved his hand, "I didn't!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 叶良大手一甩，“我没有！”

0075.en: Su Tao roared, "Then what you just said, that you wanted Xiaocheng to stay here forever, was that also false?!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃吼道，“那你刚刚说，要让小橙永远留在这里的话，也是假的吗！”

0075.en: "You looked so pathetic reaching for that knife."
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “你伸手去拿刀的样子，真的很狼狈呢。”

0075.en: "An adult man, the crown prince of the Ye family in the capital, a CEO worth hundreds of millions, wanting to kill a little girl because he doesn't like her?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “一个成年男人，京城叶家太子爷，身家过亿的总裁，因为看不惯一个小女孩，而起了杀心？”

0075.en: Su Tao said coldly, "Forget it, Ye Liang. If I had a choice, I wouldn't choose you between you and Chi Xiaocheng either!"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃冷冷一声，“算了吧叶良，如果有得选，你和池小橙之中我也不会选你！”

0075.en: The words were completely spoken.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 话彻底说了开来。

0075.en: Past memories and affections were also severed with Su Tao's sneer.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 昔日的回忆和情分，也伴随着苏桃的冷笑而割裂。

0075.en: If the words just now were merely to break off the relationship in front of Chi Xiaocheng, and there might still be a chance for private contact.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 如果说刚刚的一番话，只是在池小橙面前断绝关系，私下或许还有机会来往的话。

0075.en: Then now, Su Tao was going to completely break ties with Ye Liang!
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 那么现在，苏桃则是要与叶良彻底决裂！

0075.en: Anger, extinguished by Su Tao's words.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 愤怒，被苏桃一席话剿灭。

0075.en: Ye Liang laughed disconsolately, "You had no choice, just because Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 叶良失神地笑出了声，“你没得选，就因为池小橙是病娇？”

0075.en: She's crazy, so she gets all the love?
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 她疯了，所以就能得到一切宠爱？

0075.en: Su Tao shook her head. There was no longer any affection or lingering attachment in her eyes towards Ye Liang, "I said it at the banquet before, didn't I? Xiaocheng and I grew up together, she's my only one. Why do you think that after accompanying me for four or five months, you can replace her?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃摇了摇头，对叶良的眼神中再无好感与留恋，“之前宴会上我也说过的吧，小橙和我一起长大，是我的唯一，你为什么认为陪了我四五个月，就能取代她呢？”

0075.en: No one can replace her!
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 她无人可以取代！

0075.en: "Besides, I've always treated you as a friend."
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “况且，我一直把你当朋友。”

0075.en: Another cold remark escaped her lips, and Ye Liang finally turned from pain to laughter.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 又一句冰冷冷的话吐出，叶良终于是由痛转笑。

0075.en: Then, a little crazed.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 继而有些癫狂。

0075.en: "Haha... hahaha!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “哈哈...哈哈哈！”

0075.en: "So all this time, I've been deluding myself."
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “原来这一切，都是我自作多情。”

0075.en: "I'm not as good as Chi Xiaocheng?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “我还不如池小橙？”

0075.en: "I'm actually not as good as Chi Xiaocheng!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “我竟然不如池小橙！”

0075.en: Ye Liang took a step forward, and the accumulated snow beneath his feet seemed to melt.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 叶良一步踏出，脚下积雪似乎都被融化。

0075.en: His eyes were crimson, a premonition of blackening.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 他双眸通红，似要黑化的前兆。

0075.en: "Su Tao, you don't think a casual breakup can clear everything, do you?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “苏桃，你不会以为一句轻飘飘的断绝关系，就能撇清一切了吧？”

0075.en: Ye Liang stood in front of Su Tao, looking down at her and Chi Xiaocheng in her arms.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 叶良站到苏桃面前，高高在上地看着她和怀中的池小橙。

0075.en: His smile, whether self-mocking or relieved, "I've spent so much on you, invested so much. You've been stringing me along, and now you're telling me to break up?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 笑容不知是自嘲，还是释然，“我在你身上花费了那么多，投资了那么多，你一直吊着我，现在却跟我说，断绝关系？”

0075.en: "How will you compensate me for the reputation, money, and connections I've lost, Ye Liang?!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “我叶良付出的名声、金钱、人脉，你怎么赔！”

0075.en: His aura was dark and surging, as if he was about to blacken from collapse.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 气势黑暗汹涌，一副因为崩溃而要黑化的样子。

0075.en: Su Tao hugged the already unconscious Chi Xiaocheng tightly, her hand hidden in her sleeve, her teeth chattering, "Ye Liang, what do you mean?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: 苏桃抱紧了早已昏过去的池小橙，藏在衣袖下的手，打着牙颤道，“叶良，你到底是什么意思？”

0075.en: "Ten million!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “一千万！”

0075.en: "Wh-what?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃

0075.en: Ye Liang grinned sinisterly, "The banquets, the people I invited, all ruined because of you and Chi Xiaocheng. Do you know how much that cost? At least ten million, right?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 叶良露出狞笑，“好几次的宴会，我请来的人，都因为你和池小橙付之一炬，耗费多少你知道吗，至少也要一千万吧？”

0075.en: "If you don't pay back this ten million, do you think I'll let you go? Or do you two ordinary people want to fight against me, Ye Liang, and the Ye family?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “这一千万你不还清，你认为我会放你走吗，还是说，你们两个普通人，想要对抗我叶良，想对抗叶家？”

0075.en: Ye Liang covered his face with one hand and laughed wildly.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 叶良单手捂住了脸，张狂地笑了出声。

0075.en: It felt good to flip the table!
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 掀桌子的感觉，真好啊！

0075.en: Looking at Su Tao's tightly pursed lips and pained, conflicted expression, Ye Liang couldn't help but feel pleased.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 看着苏桃抿紧唇，一副痛苦纠结的模样，叶良就不禁感到愉悦。

0075.en: Jiuzhou City is my Ye family's territory!
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 这九州市，是我叶家的天下！

0075.en: However, just as he thought he had won, a voice came from afar.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 然而，就在他以为胜券在握时，一个声音远远地传了过来。

0075.en: "Isn't it just ten million? I'll pay it for them!"
0075.speaker: 池松
0075.cn: “不就是一千万吗，我替他们还了！”

0075.en: Ye Liang suddenly looked up and saw a one-armed man with a scarred face slowly approaching.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 叶良猛地抬头，只见一个满是刀疤的独臂男人徐徐走来。

0075.en: The man's face was grim, and his robust body seemed to contain immense power. With every step, the snow beneath his feet melted a little.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 男人阴沉着脸，健壮的身体好似藏有千斤巨力，每一步，都让脚下的积雪融化一分。

0075.en: And beside him were several other men dressed like thugs, their faces covered in scars.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 而他的身边，还有着好几个混混打扮、满脸伤疤的男人。

0075.en: "Who are you?"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: “你是谁？”

0075.en: Ye Liang still walked arrogantly towards the one-armed man, sneering, "Don't you know that Jiuzhou City is my Ye family's territory?!"
0075.speaker: 叶良
0075.cn: 叶良依旧拽拽地走向独臂的男人，嗤笑道，“知不知道，这九州市，是我叶良的天下！”

0075.en: The man's face darkened, and the veins on his remaining right arm bulged. He threw a swift punch directly at Ye Liang's abdomen.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 男人沉着脸，仅剩的右臂青筋暴起，迅猛的一拳重重打在了叶良的腹部。

0075.en: This tall adult man vomited bile all over the ground and flew back a full 10 meters!
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 这个高大的成年男人，胆汁从空中吐了一地，竟是足足飞出10米远！

0075.en: In Chi Song's words, his anger did not diminish, "I'm their brother!"
0075.speaker: 池松
0075.cn: 池松的话语中，怒意不减，“我是她们的哥哥！”

0075.en: Meanwhile, the bodyguards who had been enjoying the show finally reacted.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 而一旁看戏看爽了的保镖，这时才堪堪反应过来。

0075.en: Just as they were about to rush over, they were knocked down by Liang Hei, who had already made his move.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 刚想冲过来，却被早已率先出手的梁黑一拳放倒。

0075.en: But at this moment, several cars drove up, and the bodyguards Ye Liang had called earlier also arrived.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 却在此时，好几辆车开了过来，叶良先前喊的保镖，也刚好赶到。

0075.en: Chi Song clenched his fist and waved to his subordinates behind him, "You dared to hurt my little sister. Leave them all here!"
0075.speaker: 池松
0075.cn: 池松攥紧拳头，对身后的小弟一招手，“敢伤害我小妹，把他们全留在这里！”

0075.en: Chi Song came to Su Tao's side, his eyes suddenly softening, "Don't worry, Xiao Tao, I'll protect you."
0075.speaker: 池松
0075.cn: 池松来到了苏桃身边，眼神陡然柔和了下来，“小桃放心吧，我会保护你们的。”

0075.en: Then his gentleness turned into sharpness as he looked at Ye Liang, who was clutching his stomach, his face contorted in pain.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 而后柔和化作犀利，看向捂着肚子，疼痛到面部扭曲的叶良。

0075.en: His anger burned!
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 怒火中烧！

0075.en: It seemed that due to the arrival of the crowd, the surrounding temperature rose.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 似乎是因为人群的到来，周遭的温度都上升了。

0075.en: Su Tao quietly held Chi Xiaocheng like this, not daring to touch the small knife in her abdomen.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 苏桃就这样静静地抱着池小橙，丝毫不敢去触碰腹部的小刀。

0075.en: Two lines of hot tears flowed from the corners of her eyes again.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 两行热泪，又从眼角流了下来。

0075.en: The screams of flesh meeting fist were incessant, as if turning into the ringing in her ears after a sonic boom, buzzing and gradually fading.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 拳肉交加的惨叫声不绝于耳，仿佛化为音爆后的耳鸣，嗡嗡作响，渐渐淡去。

0075.en: Everything around her seemed to be in slow motion.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 周遭的一切，如同点了慢放。

0075.en: The wind blew.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 风一吹。

0075.en: The snow grew heavier.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 雪更大了。

0075.en: Su Tao lowered her head and reached out to caress Chi Xiaocheng's pretty face. Tears involuntarily dripped onto her face.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 苏桃低下头，伸手抚在池小橙的俏脸，泪水也不由自主地滴到了她的面庞。

0075.en: Her eyes, whether from exhaustion or emptiness, were fixed on Chi Xiaocheng. Her forehead touched Chi Xiaocheng's.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 眼神不知是疲惫还是空洞，额头贴住了池小橙。

0075.en: Su Tao's voice was hoarse, her lips trembling, and she whispered, her tone filled with confusion and fear.
0075.speaker: 旁白
0075.cn: 苏桃声音沙哑，嘴唇发颤，低声呢喃语气中满是迷茫与害怕。

0075.en: "Xiaocheng, is this the choice you wanted, right?"
0075.speaker: 苏桃
0075.cn: “呐小橙，这就是你所想要的选择，对吗？”

0076.en: Chapter 76 Collapse, Confusion, Pain (Bonus for Xunyin Lingtu)
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 第76章 崩坏、迷茫、痛苦（为迅音玲兔加更）

0076.en: She no longer controlled her emotions. Tears streamed from her eyes, one hand clutched the clothes on her chest, and her hair was disheveled.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 她不再控制自己的情绪，泪水自双眼涌出，一手拽紧了胸前的衣服，发丝缭乱。

0076.en: "Ye Liang, are you forcing me?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “叶良，你非要逼我是不是！”

0076.en: Her trembling voice was no longer calm, but filled with suppressed roars, "You make me choose, you make me choose! Do I have a choice? What else can I choose besides accepting Xiaocheng?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 颤抖的声音不再平静，而是充斥压抑地嘶吼，“你让我选，你让我选！我有得选吗，我除了接受小橙我还能选什么！”

0076.en: Su Tao smiled through her tears, "Just as you said, she's a yandere, very dangerous, and I know that. But what do you want me to do? Abandon Xiaocheng? Or ignore her? Or send her to a mental hospital?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃泪中带笑，“就像你说的，她是病娇，很危险，我也知道，但你要我怎么做呢，抛弃小橙？还是不理会她？亦或者把她送进精神病院？”

0076.en: "Ye Liang, originally, if we just broke off our relationship, we could still be strangers who nod to each other in the future. If you ever have any trouble, and it doesn't endanger Xiaocheng, perhaps I could even help."
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “叶良，本来我们断绝了关系就可以了，未来遇见还能作为点头之交的陌路人，以后你要是有什么麻烦，不危及到小橙或许我也可以帮忙。”

0076.en: "But why are you forcing me?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “但你为什么要逼我！”

0076.en: "Do you have to make me choose between her and you?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “非要我在她和你之中选一个吗！”

0076.en: Su Tao's chest heaved continuously. Large gulps of cold air entered her lungs, making her extremely uncomfortable.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 苏桃胸口不断起伏，大口大口的冷气吸入肺中，让她无比难受。

0076.en: Her body trembled uncontrollably, unsure of what she was afraid of.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 身子都止不住地去颤抖，不知是在害怕些什么。

0076.en: Yes, it would be fine to just break off the relationship in front of Xiaocheng.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 是的，只要在小橙面前断绝关系就好了。

0076.en: Then, less contact. This way, they could still be ordinary friends, like strangers.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 之后少联系，这样还能做一下如路人般的普通朋友。

0076.en: If it were Si Chen or Dongfang Yang, they might have understood the meaning of Su Tao's words.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 换司辰或东方阳来，兴许就明白了苏桃话语中的意思。

0076.en: But Ye Liang, still pressing, pointed at Chi Xiaocheng and said, "Why can't you choose? Whether a yandere can be cured is debatable, but I have money and resources. I can hire professional psychologists to diagnose and treat her. If you care about her, I can help you too."
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 而叶良，依旧逼迫一般，指着池小橙说道，“为什么不能选，病娇能不能治尚且不说，我有钱，有资源可以请专业的心理医生为她诊断治疗，你在意她我也可以帮你。”

0076.en: "You never believed me, so how could you choose me?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “你根本就没相信过我，又怎么可能选我！”

0076.en: Su Tao chuckled, "How can I believe you?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃呵呵一笑，“你让我怎么相信你？”

0076.en: "How many times have you said those words in front of me? 'If I hadn't stopped it', 'just to save my face', 'if it weren't for me, Chi Xiaocheng would have disappeared long ago', do you remember how many times you've said that?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “你在我面前说过多少次那样的话了，‘如果不是我拦着’、‘只是给我面子’‘要不是因为我，早就让池小橙消失了’，这样的话说过多少次了你还记得吗？”

0076.en: "Do you want to say it's for my own good?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “你是不是想说为了我好？”

0076.en: "You like me, and this is how you constantly manipulate me, constantly using Xiaocheng to pressure me?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “你喜欢我，就是这样不断PUA我，不断用小橙来给我压力？”

0076.en: Ye Liang waved his hand, "I didn't!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 叶良大手一甩，“我没有！”

0076.en: Su Tao roared, "Then what you just said, that you wanted Xiaocheng to stay here forever, was that also false?!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃吼道，“那你刚刚说，要让小橙永远留在这里的话，也是假的吗！”

0076.en: "You looked so pathetic reaching for that knife."
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “你伸手去拿刀的样子，真的很狼狈呢。”

0076.en: "An adult man, the crown prince of the Ye family in the capital, a CEO worth hundreds of millions, wanting to kill a little girl because he doesn't like her?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “一个成年男人，京城叶家太子爷，身家过亿的总裁，因为看不惯一个小女孩，而起了杀心？”

0076.en: Su Tao said coldly, "Forget it, Ye Liang. If I had a choice, I wouldn't choose you between you and Chi Xiaocheng either!"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃冷冷一声，“算了吧叶良，如果有得选，你和池小橙之中我也不会选你！”

0076.en: The words were completely spoken.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 话彻底说了开来。

0076.en: Past memories and affections were also severed with Su Tao's sneer.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 昔日的回忆和情分，也伴随着苏桃的冷笑而割裂。

0076.en: If the words just now were merely to break off the relationship in front of Chi Xiaocheng, and there might still be a chance for private contact.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 如果说刚刚的一番话，只是在池小橙面前断绝关系，私下或许还有机会来往的话。

0076.en: Then now, Su Tao was going to completely break ties with Ye Liang!
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 那么现在，苏桃则是要与叶良彻底决裂！

0076.en: Anger, extinguished by Su Tao's words.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 愤怒，被苏桃一席话剿灭。

0076.en: Ye Liang laughed disconsolately, "You had no choice, just because Chi Xiaocheng is a yandere?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 叶良失神地笑出了声，“你没得选，就因为池小橙是病娇？”

0076.en: She's crazy, so she gets all the love?
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 她疯了，所以就能得到一切宠爱？

0076.en: Su Tao shook her head. There was no longer any affection or lingering attachment in her eyes towards Ye Liang, "I said it at the banquet before, didn't I? Xiaocheng and I grew up together, she's my only one. Why do you think that after accompanying me for four or five months, you can replace her?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃摇了摇头，对叶良的眼神中再无好感与留恋，“之前宴会上我也说过的吧，小橙和我一起长大，是我的唯一，你为什么认为陪了我四五个月，就能取代她呢？”

0076.en: No one can replace her!
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 她无人可以取代！

0076.en: "Besides, I've always treated you as a friend."
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “况且，我一直把你当朋友。”

0076.en: Another cold remark escaped her lips, and Ye Liang finally turned from pain to laughter.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 又一句冰冷冷的话吐出，叶良终于是由痛转笑。

0076.en: Then, a little crazed.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 继而有些癫狂。

0076.en: "Haha... hahaha!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “哈哈...哈哈哈！”

0076.en: "So all this time, I've been deluding myself."
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “原来这一切，都是我自作多情。”

0076.en: "I'm not as good as Chi Xiaocheng?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “我还不如池小橙？”

0076.en: "I'm actually not as good as Chi Xiaocheng!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “我竟然不如池小橙！”

0076.en: Ye Liang took a step forward, and the accumulated snow beneath his feet seemed to melt.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 叶良一步踏出，脚下积雪似乎都被融化。

0076.en: His eyes were crimson, a premonition of blackening.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 他双眸通红，似要黑化的前兆。

0076.en: "Su Tao, you don't think a casual breakup can clear everything, do you?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “苏桃，你不会以为一句轻飘飘的断绝关系，就能撇清一切了吧？”

0076.en: Ye Liang stood in front of Su Tao, looking down at her and Chi Xiaocheng in her arms.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 叶良站到苏桃面前，高高在上地看着她和怀中的池小橙。

0076.en: His smile, whether self-mocking or relieved, "I've spent so much on you, invested so much. You've been stringing me along, and now you're telling me to break up?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 笑容不知是自嘲，还是释然，“我在你身上花费了那么多，投资了那么多，你一直吊着我，现在却跟我说，断绝关系？”

0076.en: "How will you compensate me for the reputation, money, and connections I've lost, Ye Liang?!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “我叶良付出的名声、金钱、人脉，你怎么赔！”

0076.en: His aura was dark and surging, as if he was about to blacken from collapse.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 气势黑暗汹涌，一副因为崩溃而要黑化的样子。

0076.en: Su Tao hugged the already unconscious Chi Xiaocheng tightly, her hand hidden in her sleeve, her teeth chattering, "Ye Liang, what do you mean?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: 苏桃抱紧了早已昏过去的池小橙，藏在衣袖下的手，打着牙颤道，“叶良，你到底是什么意思？”

0076.en: "Ten million!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “一千万！”

0076.en: "Wh-what?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃

0076.en: Ye Liang grinned sinisterly, "The banquets, the people I invited, all ruined because of you and Chi Xiaocheng. Do you know how much that cost? At least ten million, right?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 叶良露出狞笑，“好几次的宴会，我请来的人，都因为你和池小橙付之一炬，耗费多少你知道吗，至少也要一千万吧？”

0076.en: "If you don't pay back this ten million, do you think I'll let you go? Or do you two ordinary people want to fight against me, Ye Liang, and the Ye family?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “这一千万你不还清，你认为我会放你走吗，还是说，你们两个普通人，想要对抗我叶良，想对抗叶家？”

0076.en: Ye Liang covered his face with one hand and laughed wildly.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 叶良单手捂住了脸，张狂地笑了出声。

0076.en: It felt good to flip the table!
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 掀桌子的感觉，真好啊！

0076.en: Looking at Su Tao's tightly pursed lips and pained, conflicted expression, Ye Liang couldn't help but feel pleased.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 看着苏桃抿紧唇，一副痛苦纠结的模样，叶良就不禁感到愉悦。

0076.en: Jiuzhou City is my Ye family's territory!
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 这九州市，是我叶家的天下！

0076.en: However, just as he thought he had won, a voice came from afar.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 然而，就在他以为胜券在握时，一个声音远远地传了过来。

0076.en: "Isn't it just ten million? I'll pay it for them!"
0076.speaker: 池松
0076.cn: “不就是一千万吗，我替他们还了！”

0076.en: Ye Liang suddenly looked up and saw a one-armed man with a scarred face slowly approaching.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 叶良猛地抬头，只见一个满是刀疤的独臂男人徐徐走来。

0076.en: The man's face was grim, and his robust body seemed to contain immense power. With every step, the snow beneath his feet melted a little.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 男人阴沉着脸，健壮的身体好似藏有千斤巨力，每一步，都让脚下的积雪融化一分。

0076.en: And beside him were several other men dressed like thugs, their faces covered in scars.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 而他的身边，还有着好几个混混打扮、满脸伤疤的男人。

0076.en: "Who are you?"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: “你是谁？”

0076.en: Ye Liang still walked arrogantly towards the one-armed man, sneering, "Don't you know that Jiuzhou City is my Ye family's territory?!"
0076.speaker: 叶良
0076.cn: 叶良依旧拽拽地走向独臂的男人，嗤笑道，“知不知道，这九州市，是我叶良的天下！”

0076.en: The man's face darkened, and the veins on his remaining right arm bulged. He threw a swift punch directly at Ye Liang's abdomen.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 男人沉着脸，仅剩的右臂青筋暴起，迅猛的一拳重重打在了叶良的腹部。

0076.en: This tall adult man vomited bile all over the ground and flew back a full 10 meters!
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 这个高大的成年男人，胆汁从空中吐了一地，竟是足足飞出10米远！

0076.en: In Chi Song's words, his anger did not diminish, "I'm their brother!"
0076.speaker: 池松
0076.cn: 池松的话语中，怒意不减，“我是她们的哥哥！”

0076.en: Meanwhile, the bodyguards who had been enjoying the show finally reacted.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 而一旁看戏看爽了的保镖，这时才堪堪反应过来。

0076.en: Just as they were about to rush over, they were knocked down by Liang Hei, who had already made his move.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 刚想冲过来，却被早已率先出手的梁黑一拳放倒。

0076.en: But at this moment, several cars drove up, and the bodyguards Ye Liang had called earlier also arrived.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 却在此时，好几辆车开了过来，叶良先前喊的保镖，也刚好赶到。

0076.en: Chi Song clenched his fist and waved to his subordinates behind him, "You dared to hurt my little sister. Leave them all here!"
0076.speaker: 池松
0076.cn: 池松攥紧拳头，对身后的小弟一招手，“敢伤害我小妹，把他们全留在这里！”

0076.en: Chi Song came to Su Tao's side, his eyes suddenly softening, "Don't worry, Xiao Tao, I'll protect you."
0076.speaker: 池松
0076.cn: 池松来到了苏桃身边，眼神陡然柔和了下来，“小桃放心吧，我会保护你们的。”

0076.en: Then his gentleness turned into sharpness as he looked at Ye Liang, who was clutching his stomach, his face contorted in pain.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 而后柔和化作犀利，看向捂着肚子，疼痛到面部扭曲的叶良。

0076.en: His anger burned!
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 怒火中烧！

0076.en: It seemed that due to the arrival of the crowd, the surrounding temperature rose.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 似乎是因为人群的到来，周遭的温度都上升了。

0076.en: Su Tao quietly held Chi Xiaocheng like this, not daring to touch the small knife in her abdomen.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 苏桃就这样静静地抱着池小橙，丝毫不敢去触碰腹部的小刀。

0076.en: Two lines of hot tears flowed from the corners of her eyes again.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 两行热泪，又从眼角流了下来。

0076.en: The screams of flesh meeting fist were incessant, as if turning into the ringing in her ears after a sonic boom, buzzing and gradually fading.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 拳肉交加的惨叫声不绝于耳，仿佛化为音爆后的耳鸣，嗡嗡作响，渐渐淡去。

0076.en: Everything around her seemed to be in slow motion.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 周遭的一切，如同点了慢放。

0076.en: The wind blew.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 风一吹。

0076.en: The snow grew heavier.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 雪更大了。

0076.en: Su Tao lowered her head and reached out to caress Chi Xiaocheng's pretty face. Tears involuntarily dripped onto her face.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 苏桃低下头，伸手抚在池小橙的俏脸，泪水也不由自主地滴到了她的面庞。

0076.en: Her eyes, whether from exhaustion or emptiness, were fixed on Chi Xiaocheng. Her forehead touched Chi Xiaocheng's.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 眼神不知是疲惫还是空洞，额头贴住了池小橙。

0076.en: Su Tao's voice was hoarse, her lips trembling, and she whispered, her tone filled with confusion and fear.
0076.speaker: 旁白
0076.cn: 苏桃声音沙哑，嘴唇发颤，低声呢喃语气中满是迷茫与害怕。

0076.en: "Xiaocheng, is this the choice you wanted, right?"
0076.speaker: 苏桃
0076.cn: “呐小橙，这就是你所想要的选择，对吗？”

0077.en: Chapter 77 The Beginning of Dependence
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 第77章 依赖的起始

0077.en: The surrounding clamor lingered in her ears, but Su Tao just held Chi Xiaocheng, her face somewhat blank.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 周遭的嘈杂声萦绕于耳，然而苏桃却只是抱着池小橙，面容有些呆滞。

0077.en: Chi Song came, and they started fighting again.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 池松来了，又打起来了。

0077.en: What he said later, she couldn't quite hear.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 之后他说的什么，有些听不清。

0077.en: She just vaguely got into the car with him, her eyes only seeing the weak, pale little face.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 只是迷迷糊糊地一起上车，眼中只剩下虚弱惨白的小脸。

0077.en: The car wound its way to Dongfang Yang's private hospital. He had clearly just arrived. After having the doctors lift Chi Xiaocheng onto a stretcher, he frowned at Su Tao.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 车兜兜转转，来到了东方阳的私人医院，他显然也是刚刚赶来，让医生将池小橙抬到担架上后，便皱眉看向苏桃。

0077.en: "What happened again? Did she hurt herself again?"
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: “又发生什么事了，她又自己伤害自己？”

0077.en: "Ye Liang did it!" Chi Song stood beside Su Tao, his anger undiminished.
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: “是那个叶良干的！”池松就站在苏桃旁边，眼中怒火未减。

0077.en: Just now, he and his subordinates had a big fight with Ye Liang's bodyguards.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 就在刚刚，他带着小弟和叶良赶来的保镖大战了一场。

0077.en: None of his ten subordinates had been with him for less than two years, fighting their way up. Even though Ye Liang's bodyguards were professionally trained, that group of people was clearly recruited in a standardized manner.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 他的十个小弟，哪个不是两年前就跟着自己，一路打过来的，即便叶良的保镖经过标准的训练，可那群人显然是制式招聘来的。

0077.en: They simply didn't have that ruthlessness.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 根本没有那股狠劲。

0077.en: It didn't even take ten minutes for the whole group to be lying on the ground.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 根本不用十分钟，一群人全趴在了地上。

0077.en: Their wails were incessant.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 哀嚎不断。

0077.en: And Ye Liang, too, was beaten half to death by his anger, covered in bruises. Even so, his pride as a CEO still didn't make him fall or beg for mercy.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 而叶良，也被愤怒的他打了个半死，身上青一块紫一块，即便如此，作为总裁的傲骨依旧没让他倒下和求饶。

0077.en: If Liang Hei hadn't stopped him, saying that the aftermath of Ye Liang's incident would only be worse.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 如果不是梁黑拉住了他，说叶良出事后后续的处理只会更糟糕。

0077.en: Chi Song would have at least crippled him.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 池松最轻也要把他打成废人。

0077.en: Due to the immense pressure from Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao's brain briefly crashed, and she lost her rationality.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 碍于池小橙给的巨大压力，苏桃短暂地大脑宕机，失去理智。

0077.en: Chi Song and his group of subordinates were also rough and careless straight men.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 池松和一群小弟又是粗枝大叶的直男。

0077.en: They didn't even consider the consequences of beating Ye Liang like that. Only belatedly, fearing that Chi Xiaocheng's orange juice would run out, they quickly took her to the hospital.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 根本没考虑过这样揍叶良一顿的后果是什么，后知后觉地怕池小橙橙汁流完，连忙就带着她到了医院。

0077.en: Chi Song looked at Su Tao, who was still a little dazed, and sighed, "Xiao Tao must have been hit pretty hard too."
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: 池松看了眼依旧有些失神的苏桃，叹了口气，“小桃她受到的打击也挺大的吧。”

0077.en: He gently patted her back with his large hand.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 大手放在她的后背轻轻一拍。

0077.en: Su Tao suddenly came back to her senses.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 苏桃才陡然回神。

0077.en: Her haggard face tried to force a smile, but finding it bitter, she lowered her head again.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 憔悴的脸蛋想挤出一抹笑容，发现苦涩无比后，又低下了头。

0077.en: The tiny snowflakes on her shoulders were not wiped away.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 肩头秀发揩上的点点细雪都没有擦去。

0077.en: "Sorry, I zoned out."
0077.speaker: 苏桃
0077.cn: “抱歉，走神了。”

0077.en: Su Tao then turned her head and looked at the doctors and nurses going inside, her mood growing heavier and more complex.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 苏桃又侧过头，看着往里去的医生和护士，心情愈发沉重复杂。

0077.en: Dongfang Yang looked at Su Tao, feeling her expression was familiar.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 东方阳看着苏桃，感觉她的表情似曾相识。

0077.en: That night after the rooftop incident, Su Tao had the same expression for a long time.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 在天台下来的那个夜晚，苏桃有很长一段时间也是这个表情。

0077.en: Like autism, but even more severe than autism.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 像自闭，却又比自闭更要严重。

0077.en: Confused, pained, conflicted, like someone struggling desperately in water.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 迷茫，痛苦，矛盾，如沉溺在水中的人尽力挣扎。

0077.en: Her extremely haggard face made one's heart ache.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 憔悴无比的脸色让人心疼。

0077.en: Her pink, thin lips were chapped, but she didn't even feel it.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 粉嫩的薄唇被冻得干涩她自己都没感受到。

0077.en: After a helpless sigh, Dongfang Yang looked at Chi Song, his gaze flickering from his amputated arm, and asked, "Brother, can you tell me what exactly happened?"
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 无奈叹了口气后，东方阳看向了池松，视线从断臂上闪过，询问道，“这位兄弟，能跟我说说具体发生了什么事吗？”

0077.en: Saying that, Dongfang Yang extended a hand, "My name is Dongfang Yang, and I'm a friend of Chi Xiaocheng and Su Tao."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 说着，东方阳伸出了一只手，“我叫东方阳，是池小橙和苏桃的朋友。”

0077.en: Chi Song was stunned for a moment.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 池松愣了一下。

0077.en: After wiping his hand on his clothes a few times, he shook Dongfang Yang's hand and smiled frankly, "My name is Chi Song, and I'm Xiaocheng's brother."
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: 将自己那只手放在衣服上擦了几下后，握上了东方阳的手，直率地笑道，“我叫池松，是小橙的哥哥。”

0077.en: "I've heard of you." Dongfang Yang glanced at Su Tao, then walked aside with Chi Song, "Su Tao told me that although she's an orphan, she has someone who treats her like a real brother."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: “听说过你。”东方阳瞥了眼苏桃，带着池松往一边走去，“苏桃跟我说，她虽然是孤儿，但有一个人像亲生哥哥一样带她。”

0077.en: Chi Song smiled shyly, "Xiao Tao also told me about you."
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: 池松腼腆地笑了笑，“小桃也跟我说过你来着。”

0077.en: Dongfang Yang raised an eyebrow, "Oh? What did Su Tao say about me?"
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 东方阳眉毛一挑，“哦？苏桃说我什么了？”

0077.en: "She said you're a warm-hearted tsundere, a good person."
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: “她说你是个热心肠的傲娇，是个好人。”

0077.en: Instantly, Dongfang Yang's face froze.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 霎时，东方阳脸色僵住了。

0077.en: No, brother, let's just boast, don't give me a good person card.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 不是哥们，咱们吹就吹，你别给我发好人卡啊。

0077.en: When did I, Dongfang Yang, become a tsundere?!
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 我东方阳什么时候是傲娇了！

0077.en: He clicked his tongue and decisively changed the subject, "Brother Chi, what do you mean by Ye Liang doing it?"
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 他啧了下嘴，果断转移话题，“池兄，你说是叶良干的什么意思？”

0077.en: Chi Song sighed and recounted what had happened there.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 池松叹了一口气，将那边发生的一幕给说了出来。

0077.en: "When I arrived, I saw that Ye Liang stab my sister with a knife, and he even tried to lay hands on Xiao Tao. I respected him as the young master of the Ye family. These past few days, I knew he was targeting my sister, but I didn't bother him."
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: “我到的时候，就见到那叶良捅了我妹妹一刀，还想对小桃下手，我敬他是叶家的少爷，这几天知道他盯上了小妹也没找他麻烦。”

0077.en: "Who would have thought that this guy would go crazy and attack two defenseless girls!"
0077.speaker: 池松
0077.cn: “谁想到，这家伙竟然疯了，对两个手无缚鸡之力的小女生下手！”

0077.en: These two girls looked delicate and tender, and probably wouldn't even dare to kill a chicken.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 这两个小女生细皮嫩肉的怎么看怎么娇弱，没准连一只鸡都不敢杀。

0077.en: Yet Ye Liang still dared to lay hands on them!
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 这样了叶良竟然还要对她们动手！

0077.en: He's truly not human!
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 真不是人子！

0077.en: After listening to Chi Song's description, Dongfang Yang couldn't help but gasp.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 而听完池松的描述，东方阳也不禁倒吸了一口凉气。

0077.en: He only knew that Ye Liang and Chi Xiaocheng had a small conflict.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 他只知道叶良和池小橙产生了一些小矛盾。

0077.en: But he didn't expect it to escalate so much!
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 却没想到，闹得这么大！

0077.en: However, to know what exactly happened, he still had to ask Su Tao.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 不过具体发生了什么，还得去问苏桃才行。

0077.en: Returning to the hospital entrance, Dongfang Yang saw Su Tao still sitting on the chair in a daze. He couldn't help but sigh and put away his intention to ask.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 回到医院门口，东方阳见苏桃依旧迷茫地坐在椅子上，不免叹了口气，收起询问的意思。

0077.en: He looked at her with heartache, "If you're tired, go back and rest, or you can sleep in the hospital. There are many empty rooms here."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 心疼地看着她，“累的话就回去休息吧，或者在医院里睡也行，这里空房间很多。”

0077.en: Su Tao parted her dry lips, "Xiaocheng... is she okay?"
0077.speaker: 苏桃
0077.cn: 苏桃张了张干涩的唇，“小橙她...没事吗？”

0077.en: At this moment, a female doctor walked over, "She's fine. The knife didn't hit any vital organs, and it's not very deep. Her cells are more active than normal people's, so don't worry."
0077.speaker: 医生
0077.cn: 这时，一个女医生走了过来，“她没事，刀子没中要害，也不算很深，她体内的细胞比常人的要活跃，不用担心。”

0077.en: Hearing the doctor's words, both Su Tao and Dongfang Yang breathed a sigh of relief.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 听到医生的话，苏桃和东方阳都松了口气。

0077.en: Su Tao closed her eyes, her voice filled with confusion, "Dongfang Yang, what should I do?"
0077.speaker: 苏桃
0077.cn: 苏桃闭上眼，话语充满迷茫，“东方阳，你说我要怎么办啊？”

0077.en: Dongfang Yang said softly, "Don't think so much. Although I don't know what happened, you should go to sleep first. You look terrible."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 东方阳轻声道，“别想那么多，虽然我不知道发生了什么，但你还是先去睡一觉吧，你脸色很差。”

0077.en: To describe Su Tao as "terrible" was an understatement.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 用“差”来形容苏桃都是轻的了。

0077.en: Her hair was disheveled, her face pale, and her eyes, from prolonged pain and frowning, had tiny wrinkles. Her usually beautiful eyes were now pitifully lacking in color.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 发丝凌乱，脸色惨白，眼角因为长时间的痛苦皱眉拧出丝丝细纹，往日瑰丽的双眸，色彩少得可怜。

0077.en: She looked as if she had been broken, her whole being exuding an aura of desperate melancholy.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 就像被玩坏了一样，整个人散发着绝望的忧郁气息。

0077.en: Su Tao opened her mouth, looking pleadingly at the handsome man in front of her, "Dongfang Yang, can you talk to me for a while?"
0077.speaker: 苏桃
0077.cn: 苏桃张了张嘴，求助般看向眼前面庞帅气的男人，“东方阳，可以陪我聊一会儿天吗？”

0077.en: Dongfang Yang's heart softened, but he still shook his head, "Sorry, Su Tao. You two have caused such a big incident. Not to mention Ye Liang himself, his people will also investigate and target you and Chi Xiaocheng."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 东方阳心中一软，但还是摇了摇头，“抱歉苏桃，你们闹出这样的大事，且不说叶良本人，他身边的人也会去调查和针对你和池小橙的。”

0077.en: "Before things escalate, I must deal with it, otherwise it will affect your future lives."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: “趁现在事情还没闹大，我必须去处理一下，不然会影响到你们之后的生活。”

0077.en: With that, Dongfang Yang looked at Chi Song, "Brother Chi, you were too impulsive earlier. Come with me. At least you need to apologize. With me by your side, they won't make things difficult for you, and this matter might have a chance to turn over a new leaf."
0077.speaker: 东方阳
0077.cn: 说罢，东方阳看向了池松，“池兄你先前还是太冲动了，跟我也走一趟吧，至少你得去道个歉，有我在旁边他们不敢刁难你，这事也才有翻篇的可能性。”

0077.en: Watching Dongfang Yang and Chi Song bid farewell and leave, Su Tao leaned against the wall, slowly got up, and walked aimlessly out of the hospital.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 看着东方阳和池松道别离去，苏桃扶住墙壁，幽幽起身，无神地走向医院外。

0077.en: She called Si Chen's phone.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 用手机打了司辰的电话。

0077.en: The call didn't connect.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 电话未接通。

0077.en: She sent a message to Doctor Cheng.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 发消息给成医生。

0077.en: Doctor Cheng was busy and didn't read it.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 成医生未读在忙。

0077.en: Chen Qian and her roommate were nowhere to be found, unreachable.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 陈倩和舍友不知道去了哪里，联系不上。

0077.en: It was as if everyone who could listen to her and be her support, related to Chi Xiaocheng, had disappeared.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 好似和池小橙有关，能够让她倾诉，成为她支柱的人全都消失不见。

0077.en: Of course, she had other friends, but...
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 她当然还有其他朋友，可是

0077.en: Could she tell them about this? Chi Xiaocheng was already like this towards Ye Liang. Would involving more people hurt them?
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 这种事情能和他们说吗，池小橙对叶良尚且如此，牵扯更多的人进来会伤害到他们吗？

0077.en: Things bottled up in her heart, growing heavier.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 事情憋在心里，愈发沉重。

0077.en: Just walking aimlessly, unconsciously, Su Tao found herself at Chi Xiaocheng's doorstep.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 只是漫无目的地走着，不知不觉间，苏桃发现自己竟是来到了池小橙的家门口。

0077.en: This large door brought back scene after scene from the dark room a week ago.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 这一扇大门，忆起了一周前小黑屋中的一幕又一幕。

0077.en: Breathing... so painful.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 呼吸...好痛苦。

0077.en: Thinking... so uncomfortable.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 思考...好难受。

0077.en: She wanted to give up thinking, give up reality, give up everything.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 想放弃思考，放弃现实，放弃一切。

0077.en: But falling down here, what's the difference from abandoning Xiaocheng?
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 但在这里倒下，和抛弃小橙有什么区别？

0077.en: But if she didn't abandon her, was the current Xiaocheng still Xiaocheng?
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 可不放弃她，现在的小橙还是小橙吗？

0077.en: Fear, terror.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 害怕、恐惧。

0077.en: Conflict, struggle.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 矛盾、挣扎。

0077.en: Su Tao desperately wanted to find something that could be her support, something to relieve her pressure.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 苏桃迫切地想寻找可以成为自己支点，缓解自己压力的东西。

0077.en: No matter what it was, whether it would make her uncomfortable, as long as it could make her forget everything that happened today!
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 无论是什么，会不会让人难受，只要能让自己忘掉今天发生的一切就可以了！

0077.en: She slowly walked into the living room, then suddenly looked at the counter, her Adam's apple bobbing.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 她慢慢走进客厅，陡然看向柜台，喉结滚动。

0077.en: She felt like... having a drink.
0077.speaker: 旁白
0077.cn: 有点......想喝酒了。

0078.en: Chapter 78 Su Tao's "Future"
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 第78章 苏桃的“未来”

0078.en: The moment she thought of the words "drinking alcohol," Su Tao felt an indescribable sense of rejection.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 想到“喝酒”这两个字的瞬间，苏桃就生起一股说不出的拒绝感。

0078.en: But this feeling, surprisingly, made her feel much better mentally!
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 可这生出的感觉，竟是出奇地让她感觉自己精神好了不少！

0078.en: It was as if all negative emotions were less profound than such a strong, tangible sensation.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 好似所有负面的情绪，都不及这样强烈的实感让人深刻。

0078.en: Su Tao reached out without any hesitation and took out a bottle of white wine.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 苏桃伸手，不作任何犹豫，将一瓶白酒拿了出来。

0078.en: Without even caring how strong the white wine was, she directly twisted open the cap, not even needing a glass.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 甚至不顾这白酒本身有多大劲，她直接拧开了盖子，连杯子都不用。

0078.en: It was as if, on the verge of collapse, she had grasped the last straw.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 好似在崩溃前夕，抓住了最后一根稻草。

0078.en: She slowly closed her eyes.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 缓缓闭上眼睛。

0078.en: Her throat bobbed. She had never drunk alcohol with such a high proof before, and her throat felt like it was on fire.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 喉咙滚动，从未喝过度数这么高的酒的她，感到喉咙像火烧一样。

0078.en: While gasping for air, she reached out and wiped away the tears that welled up in her eyes.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 大口大口地喘息同时，又伸手抹了一下眼角泛出的泪水。

0078.en: A large amount of endorphins were secreted, and a strange pleasure made Su Tao feel much more comfortable.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 大量内啡肽分泌，一股异样的快/感让苏桃感觉整个人都舒服了不少。

0078.en: All the previous pressure, struggle, confusion, fear, and other emotions were cast aside at this moment.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 先前的压力，纠结，迷茫，害怕等种种情绪，都在这一刻被抛之脑后。

0078.en: After resting for a while, Su Tao rinsed her mouth and took a bath.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 休息了一下后，苏桃又漱口并洗了个澡。

0078.en: Hot water flowed from above her head, soaking her hair and then flowing over her smooth skin.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 热水自头顶流下，浸湿了发丝，又淌过光滑的肌肤。

0078.en: Su Tao emptied her mind, like a person rescued from drowning, breathing in small gulps, and avoiding the root cause of her current state.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 苏桃放空着大脑，如同溺水得救的人，小口小口地呼吸，并逃避着导致自己成为这样的根源。

0078.en: After bathing, she dried her hair.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 洗完澡，吹干头发。

0078.en: Since things had come to this, she might as well sleep first.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 事已至此，先睡觉吧。

0078.en: She didn't need to think about anything, nor did she need to care about anything.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 什么都不用想，也什么都不需要理会。

0078.en: This feeling was truly relaxing.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 这样的感觉，真是轻松呢。

0078.en: Ever since she drank that glass of wine, her head felt a little dizzy, and Su Tao felt like she had entered an extremely comfortable state.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 自从喝了那杯酒后，脑袋稍微晕乎乎的，苏桃就感觉自己进入了极度畅快的状态。

0078.en: As long as she could stay in this room, in this place full of memories, it would be enough.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 只要能呆在这间屋子，在这充满回忆的地方，就足够了。

0078.en: She threw her phone, watch, and sachet in the living room, and then staggered to Chi Xiaocheng's room.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 她将手机手表还有香囊等东西都扔在了客厅，一个人晃晃悠悠地来到了池小橙房间。

0078.en: She threw herself onto the bed and hugged the large panda pillow that Chi Xiaocheng usually hugged when she slept.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 扑倒上去便抱住了池小橙平时睡觉经常搂的那只大熊猫抱枕。

0078.en: She buried her pretty face in the pillow and took a deep breath.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 俏脸埋到抱枕中，深深吸了一口气。

0078.en: "Xiaocheng's scent."
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: “小橙的味道。”

0078.en: Like.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 喜欢

0078.en: What am I holding now?
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 我现在抱着的是什么？

0078.en: A pillow?
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 枕头吗？

0078.en: That's not right.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 不对吧。

0078.en: I'm holding Xiaocheng.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 我抱着的是小橙。

0078.en: Yes, it's time to sleep with Xiaocheng now.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 是的，现在该和小橙一起睡觉了。

0078.en: It's so comfortable to be with Xiaocheng without having to think about anything.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 什么都不需要去想，就这样和小橙在一起，真舒服呢。

0078.en: She pulled the blanket over with one hand, and her tired eyes gradually closed.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 一手卷过被子，疲惫的双眼渐渐合拢。

0078.en: Her small mouth mumbled to herself in a daze.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 小嘴迷迷糊糊地开合自言自语。

0078.en: "So sleepy... I really want to sleep."
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: “好困...好想睡觉。”

0078.en: "Xiaocheng seems to be in the hospital. Is she waiting for me there?"
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: “小橙好像在医院，她在那等我吗？”

0078.en: "But if I go to the hospital, it will be uncomfortable. Will she show her yandere side to me again?"
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: “可是去医院那边的话，又会不舒服呢，她又会对我展示病娇的一面吧？”

0078.en: "Xiaocheng... is really not as comfortable as here."
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: “小橙什么的......果然没这里舒服。”

0078.en: The scent of the sachet is so good.
0078.speaker: 苏桃
0078.cn: 香囊的味道，真好闻呢。

0078.en: As if all the burdens on her shoulders had been lifted, Su Tao fell into a deep sleep.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 似乎是卸下了肩上所有的担子，苏桃沉沉睡去。

0078.en: She was too tired. After continuous high pressure, Ye Liang forced her to make a choice, finally breaking her last string.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 她太累了，连续不断的高压后，叶良又强迫逼她做出选择，终于崩断了她最后的一根弦。

0078.en: Her subconscious began to protect her body and mind.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 潜意识开始对身体与大脑做出保护。

0078.en: Not thinking.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 不去思考。

0078.en: Escaping reality.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 逃避现实。

0078.en: While Su Tao was asleep, Chi Xiaocheng happened to wake up slowly in the hospital.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 而在苏桃沉睡期间，池小橙恰好在医院幽幽醒来。

0078.en: She opened her eyes and looked for a familiar figure, but saw no one.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 睁眼寻找熟悉的身影，却未见一人。

0078.en: "Tao Tao is not here."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “桃桃不在。”

0078.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was a little regretful. She struggled to reach for her phone on the bedside table and then clicked on a mysterious mini-program.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 池小橙声音有些遗憾，艰难地伸手拿过床头柜的手机，并跟着点开了一个神秘的小程序。

0078.en: [Host, rest first.]
0078.speaker: 系统
0078.cn: 【宿主，先休息吧】

0078.en: "Rest?" Chi Xiaocheng skillfully spent 100 emotion points from the system store to exchange for a healing pill and threw it into her mouth.
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “休息？”池小橙熟练地从系统商城中花费100情绪值兑换一颗治疗药丸扔进嘴里。

0078.en: She slowly said, "I don't like resting in an empty hospital room. The smell of disinfectant here isn't good at all. Of course, I want to sleep in Tao Tao's arms when I rest."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: 缓缓道，“在空荡荡的医院房间休息我可不喜欢，这里消毒水的味道一点都不好闻，休息我当然想在桃桃的怀里睡了。”

0078.en: The mini-program on her phone opened, and a flashing location appeared on a familiar spot on the map.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 手机的小程序打开，上面一个闪烁的定位显示在地图熟悉的地方。

0078.en: "Tao Tao is actually at my house?"
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “桃桃竟然在我家？”

0078.en: This was a mini-program Chi Xiaocheng customized using the simple hacker toolset she got from the system's gacha. She had prepared it early.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 这是池小橙利用系统抽奖送的黑客简易工具组定制的小程序，她早早地就做了准备。

0078.en: With the system's help, no matter where Su Tao was, she could know her location.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 有系统的帮助下，无论苏桃在哪，她都能知道位置。

0078.en: After all, none of the skills given by the system were weak.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 毕竟系统给的技能，没有一个是弱的。

0078.en: However, what puzzled Chi Xiaocheng at this moment was why Su Tao was at her house?
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 不过此时让池小橙不解的是，苏桃为什么会在自己家？

0078.en: At this time, Su Tao was hugging her panda, sleeping soundly.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 此时，苏桃正抱着自己的那个大熊猫，睡得香甜。

0078.en: Chi Xiaocheng took some time to understand the whole process.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 池小橙花时间了解了一下全过程。

0078.en: Instantly, her eyes became eerie and terrifying, "She actually chose to escape. Tao Tao is truly sad~"
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: 霎时，双眸变得妖异可怕了起来，“居然会选择逃避，桃桃真是让人难过呢~”

0078.en: At this moment, the system in her mind spoke.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 这时，脑海中的系统出声。

0078.en: [Host... Host, it's normal for Su Tao to escape. It's not just the pressure you gave her, but also Si Chen, Chen Qian, and Doctor Cheng's alias. With pressure from multiple sides, she had already reached her limit.]
0078.speaker: 系统
0078.cn: 【宿...宿主，苏桃会逃避也很正常吧，不仅仅是你给的压力，司辰、陈倩、还有成医生的马甲，多方施压，她早就已经到极限了】

0078.en: [Ye Liang was the fuse that ignited the dynamite. Actually, I wouldn't be surprised if Su Tao completely collapsed from this.]
0078.speaker: 系统
0078.cn: 【叶良就是点燃炸药的引线，其实就算苏桃会就此崩溃我都不奇怪】

0078.en: "She won't collapse that easily." Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly, "You know, she's the female lead. In the original novel, according to the plot I know, she only collapsed twice in total."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “她才不会那么容易崩溃。”池小橙浅浅笑道，“要知道她可是女主啊，在原著，据我所知的剧情中，她总共也就崩溃了两次。”

0078.en: "The first time was after she learned that the original owner was drowned. Because the original owner had scratched her face and pierced her chest, and her vicious words made her briefly lose her mind and feel despair. With a little instigation from Ye Liang, she let Ye Liang deal with the original owner."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “第一次，是得知原主被溺死的消息后，因为原主划破了她的脸，戳烂她的胸，同时恶毒的话让她短暂地失去了理智并感到了绝望，被叶良稍微怂恿，就任由叶良去处理原主。”

0078.en: "Perhaps the her in the book thought that Ye Liang was just punishing the original owner."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “可能书中的她，想的会是叶良只是惩罚一下原主吧。”

0078.en: "But who would have thought of Ye Liang's ruthlessness? After being beaten to the brink of death for several days, the original owner was drowned in the sea by Ye Liang's subordinate.
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “可谁能想到叶良的狠辣呢，在好几天被打得奄奄一息后，原主又被叶良的小弟溺死在海里。”

0078.en: "Everything from childhood became a memory with the original owner's departure. Su Tao even believed that her neglect of the original owner led to the original owner being corrupted and then killed by Ye Liang. Countless emotions surged into her heart, leading to a breakdown."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “儿时的一切伴随着原主的离去成了回忆，苏桃更认为是她对原主的忽略，才导致原主被带坏，又被叶良杀死，无数情绪涌上心头，进而崩溃。”

0078.en: Chi Xiaocheng had spent a lot of emotion points recently to catch up on the original plot. Although she hadn't finished the entire book, she had read the first fifth, plus the part about Su Tao's ending.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 池小橙这段时间花了不少情绪值去补原著剧情，虽然没看完一整本书，可前面的五分之一，加上苏桃结局的那段，她已经看完了。

0078.en: "And the second collapse was at the very end."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “而第二次的崩溃，是最终结局的时候。”

0078.en: "No matter how much of a white moonlight the female lead was, she couldn't defeat the author's pen."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “再怎么白月光的女主，都敌不过作者的一支笔。”

0078.en: "The sudden appearance of a wealthy female supporting character pressed her step by step. People around her betrayed her one by one. Several times, she went from hope to despair, yet she still bravely endured countless pressures."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “天降富婆女配步步紧逼，身边的人一个又一个地背叛，数次从希望到绝望，即便如此她都坚强地顶住无数压力。”

0078.en: "Only at the very end, when she found an old photo of herself and the original owner in her small rented room, did she suddenly realize."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “只有在最后，呆在狭小的出租屋内翻出曾经和原主的一张合照时，才幡然醒悟。”

0078.en: "The people who cared about her the most were actually the original owner's family."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “最在意她的，其实还是原主一家人。”

0078.en: "And Chi Xiaocheng, including her family, in a sense, died because of her."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “而池小橙，包括她的家人，某种意义上却因她而死。”

0078.en: Chi Xiaocheng leaned against the headboard, looking at the ceiling, "System, do you know, from a results-oriented perspective, from Su Tao's perspective, the original owner probably never hated her."
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: 池小橙靠在床头，看向天花板，“系统你知道吗，就结果论而言，在苏桃的视角上，原主可能从未讨厌过她。”

0078.en: "Not allowing her to contact Ye Liang, because in the middle and late stages, Ye Liang did betray Su Tao. Was the original owner's behavior not protecting Su Tao?"
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “不允许她去接触叶良，因为在中后期，叶良确实背叛了苏桃，原主的行为算不算是在保护苏桃呢？”

0078.en: "Thinking that Ye Liang was only interested in Su Tao because of her looks, so if her face and chest were ruined, would Ye Liang dislike Su Tao?"
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “认为叶良是因为苏桃的颜值才缠上她的，所以戳烂脸和胸，是不是叶良就会不喜欢苏桃了呢？”

0078.en: "Confessing to the various male leads, wasn't there a possibility of getting involved herself?"
0078.speaker: 池小橙
0078.cn: “表白各大男主，何尝没有以身入局的可能？”

0078.en: These were not Chi Xiaocheng's conjectures, but the ending in the original novel. Su Tao only realized and inferred these things after recalling them.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 这些都不是池小橙的猜测，而是原著中的结局，苏桃就是在回忆起这种种事情后，幡然醒悟并推测出来。

0078.en: Every word she said was written in the original novel.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 她说的这每一个字，原著中都有写到。

0078.en: Perhaps it was the author's conscience. While writing Su Tao's death, he whitewashed the original owner, making her Su Tao's only one, so that a female lead who had been written for thousands of chapters wouldn't end up unloved.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 兴许是作者的良心，在写死苏桃的同时，给原主洗了个白，让她成为苏桃的唯一，不至于一个写了上千章的女主，落了个无人去爱的下场。

0078.en: Inferring the process from the result of the original work.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 从原著的结果去推测过程。

0078.en: The original owner, Brother Chi Song, her caring parents, and her war god father. These "cannon fodder supporting characters" who died early were the few people who truly loved her throughout the thousands of chapters of the book.
0078.speaker: 旁白
0078.cn: 原主小姐、池松大哥、照料她的池父池母，她的战神老爹，这些早早死去的“炮灰配角”，才是全书几千章中，为数不多真正爱她的人。

0079.en: Chapter 79 You Can't Escape (Thanks to Wudu Suoqiu for the Gift King)
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 第79章 你逃不掉的哦（谢谢無度索求的礼物之王）

0079.en: Regarding the original owner Xiaocheng's reputation, it was extremely polarized in the original novel.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 关于原主小橙的风评，在原著中极为两极分化。

0079.en: Some readers believed that the original owner deserved to die for all the hateful things she did in the early stages, and that her whitewashing later was purely due to the author's problematic mind.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 部分读者认为，原主前期做的那么多可恶的事情，就该死，后面洗白纯粹就是作者脑子有问题。

0079.en: After all, the original author ruined the entire work for money, so it was normal to write some bad stuff at the end.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 毕竟原作者为了钱，将整部作品都毁了，最后写点烂活很正常。

0079.en: But there were also some readers who were purely Su Tao fans.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 但也有一部分读者是纯粹的苏桃党。

0079.en: Undeniably, "From Sidekick to Center Stage: Winning Over the Male Leads" was a bad work. The author ruined the entire book for money.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 不可否认《炮灰女配全突突，男神全部入我怀》是一部烂作品，作者为了钱毁了整本书。

0079.en: However, in terms of plot coherence, the author's writing skills were still there.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 但在剧情衔接上，作者的笔力还是在的。

0079.en: But from Su Tao's perspective, she was loved by many in the early stages, confused and pained in the middle, and betrayed one after another in the later stages.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 只是站在苏桃的视角，前期被许多人爱，中期迷茫痛苦，后期被相竞背叛。

0079.en: If this novel is viewed as Su Tao's tragic life, rather than the author bowing down for money, the resonance and love for Su Tao will only deepen.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 把这本小说看作苏桃的悲剧人生，而非作者为了钱而低头弯腰的话，对苏桃的共鸣和喜爱只会更深。

0079.en: The character of the original owner Xiaocheng, although she died in the early stages, often appeared in Su Tao's memories, serving as Su Tao's spiritual support, alleviating her pain after being betrayed again and again.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 原主小橙这个角色，在前期虽然死亡，却时常在苏桃回忆中出现，作为苏桃的精神支柱，缓解了她被背叛后一次又一次的痛苦。

0079.en: —If I die like this, how can I face Xiaocheng in the afterlife?
0079.speaker: 苏桃
0079.cn: ——如果我就这样死去的话，又有什么面对九泉之下的小橙？

0079.en: —I killed her, I killed Brother Chi Song. I should bear everything for her, live with regret for the rest of my life, repay her, and fulfill everything she wanted to do before she died.
0079.speaker: 苏桃
0079.cn: ——是我害死了她，害死了池松哥，我应该背负她的一切活下去，用我的一生去后悔，去偿还，去完成她生前想做的一切。

0079.en: It was precisely because of these descriptions that Su Tao's independent thinking and the original owner Xiaocheng's whitewashing in the final deathbed scene seemed much more normal.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 正因为有这些描述，最后的走马灯中，苏桃的独立思考与原主小橙的洗白，就显得了正常许多。

0079.en: Even though she was just a cannon fodder villain, the name "Chi Xiaocheng" ran through the entire 4 million words of the novel with Su Tao.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 即便只是个炮灰反派，但“池小橙”这个名字，却随着苏桃，贯穿了全文的400万字。

0079.en: Su Tao's final despair was only due to a dream she had when she was on her deathbed.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 苏桃最后的绝望，也只是因为她奄奄一息时做的一个梦。

0079.en: It was the inner demon that had plagued her for years.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 是缠绕了她多年的心魔。

0079.en: The original owner Xiaocheng, who had already died, appeared in her dream, apologized to her, forgave her, and confessed to her.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 本就死亡的原主小橙出现在了梦中，道歉了她，原谅了她，告白了她。

0079.en: —Tao Tao, you're not unloved. You still have me. If I could do it all over again, I would, I would definitely fill your surroundings with love. I won't let anyone bully you again!
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: ——桃桃，你不是没人爱，你还有我哦，如果能重来一次的话，我一定、一定会让爱充斥在你的周围，我不会再让任何一个人欺负你！

0079.en: She woke up from her dream.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 梦醒了。

0079.en: Su Tao felt that even if she couldn't be forgiven, perhaps after death, she could repay the mistakes she had made to the original owner Xiaocheng in the afterlife.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 苏桃觉得自己即便得不到原谅，死去没准也能在九泉之下，向原主小橙偿还犯下的过错。

0079.en: The dripping tears wet the photo she held tightly even in her sleep.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 滴落的泪水打湿睡梦都要抓紧的相片。

0079.en: Su Tao hugged the photo tightly.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 苏桃将相片紧紧拥在怀中。

0079.en: "I'm sorry."
0079.speaker: 苏桃
0079.cn: “对不起。”

0079.en: It was unclear whether it was Su Tao apologizing to the original owner Xiaocheng.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 不知是苏桃对原主小橙的道歉。

0079.en: Or the author of the novel apologizing to the vast number of readers.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 还是小说作者对广大读者的道歉。

0079.en: With this last sentence as the ending, Su Tao committed suicide.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 由这最后的一句话作为终局，苏桃自杀。

0079.en: The novel ended.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 小说完结。

0079.en: There were no extra chapters, no epilogues, and no second part to extend this IP for quick money.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 没有番外，没有后日谈，也没有为了恰烂钱而延续这个ip出第二部。

0079.en: The author left all suspense as blank space, allowing readers to discuss.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 作者将一切悬念化作留白，任由读者讨论。

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng's mind replayed the plot she currently knew, bringing the conversation back to the present, "System, that's why I said, Su Tao won't collapse that easily. As long as she still has me in her heart, she will eventually stand up again after confusion."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 池小橙脑海又过了一遍自己目前所知的剧情，将话题引回了当下，“统子，所以我才会说，苏桃她没那么容易崩溃，只要她心中还有我，在迷茫过后最后都会重新站起来。”

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved into a playful smile, "Tao Tao still needs to cure my yandere tendencies and return to how things were before. How could she collapse like this?"
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 池小橙唇角勾起点点玩味的笑容，“桃桃还要治好我的病娇，并回到从前呢，又怎么会就这样崩溃呢？”

0079.en: "But I'm not a yandere, so there's no cure. That's a difficult problem to solve."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “不过我又不是病娇，没得治，真是让人难以解决的问题。”

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the sleeping Su Tao, already understanding why Su Tao was like this.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 池小橙看着熟睡的苏桃，早已明白为什么苏桃会这样。

0079.en: "She's just avoiding it right now. Because I self-harmed to frame Ye Liang, and used that to tie her to my side, the method was too extreme, it washed away her perception of me, making her afraid of me."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “她目前只是在逃避而已，因为我自我伤害去嫁祸叶良，以此将她绑在身边的手段过于极端，冲刷了她对我的认知，因而对我感到害怕。”

0079.en: "She's afraid that I'll use the same method to harm others around her, forcing her to make choices again and again, and even harming myself in the process."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “担心我会用同样的方法，伤害她身边的其他人，一次次逼迫她做选择，甚至以此去伤害我自己。”

0079.en: "She's afraid to make choices, and she doesn't dare to accept the fact that I'm a yandere. Even though I, as Doctor Cheng, have been constantly guiding her, she still hasn't changed her mind about curing me."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “她害怕做出选择，也不敢去接受我是病娇的事实，即便我作为成医生一直在诱导她，她依旧没改变心中要把我治好的想法。”

0079.en: "But that won't do~"
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “但这样不行呢~”

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the monitoring screen on her phone. Su Tao was sleeping soundly, hugging the panda. After letting go of all her burdens and choosing to escape, even without the sachet by her side, she slept peacefully.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 池小橙看着手机中监控的画面，苏桃抱着那大熊猫熟睡，放下一切担子选择逃避之后，即便香囊不在身边，睡得也很安详。

0079.en: Unconsciously, Chi Xiaocheng's gaze towards Su Tao became a little intoxicated, "Tao Tao can't be afraid of me. If she's afraid of me, how can she like me? If she doesn't take the first step, there will never be any progress."
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 不知不觉间，池小橙看着苏桃的眼神就痴醉了些许，“桃桃可不能害怕我，害怕我还怎么喜欢我呢，迈不出第一步就永远不会有进展。”

0079.en: "Even if she's forced, she must actively accept me!"
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: “即便是被逼迫，她也必须去主动接受我才行！”

0079.en: This was the most important part of Chi Xiaocheng's plan!
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 这是池小橙中最重要的一环！

0079.en: The date this morning had already shown initial results. She was confident that Su Tao would fall into her gentle trap after a day.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 原本今天一早的约会已经初见成效了，一天下来她有信心让苏桃陷入自己的温柔乡中。

0079.en: To create the thought that "although Xiaocheng is a little yandere, being with her is truly happy and satisfying."
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 去产生一种“虽然小橙稍微有点病娇，但在她身边真的很幸福满足”的想法。

0079.en: And because of this goal.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 也因为这个目标。

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng put pressure on Su Tao every moment during this period.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 这段时间池小橙每时每刻都给苏桃施压。

0079.en: When she gradually couldn't breathe, she would naturally find that Xiaocheng's embrace was the only place where she could relieve stress and relax.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 等她渐渐不能喘息后，自然就会发现，小橙的怀抱是唯一可以解压舒缓的地方。

0079.en: To like, to yearn for.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 以此去喜欢，眷恋。

0079.en: Just like in the dark room.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 一如小黑屋时的一样。

0079.en: Everything was so strange, so eerie and abnormal.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 所有的东西都是那样的奇怪，那样的诡异和不正常。

0079.en: Only her cuteness was the sweetness that distinguished her from everything else.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 唯有她的可爱，是区别于那之外的甘甜。

0079.en: Then to pursue, to reach out and grasp, and then to begin to enjoy.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 进而去追求，伸手去抓住，然后开始享受。

0079.en: But Ye Liang's appearance disrupted all of Chi Xiaocheng's plans and preparations!
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 但叶良的出现，打乱了池小橙的全部计划和铺垫！

0079.en: The gentle path was no longer viable.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 软的这条路已经行不通了。

0079.en: Tao Tao, if you keep avoiding me like this, when will you ever like me?
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 桃桃啊，你继续这样逃避下去，又要到什么时候才能喜欢上我呢？

0079.en: When will we ever be together?
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 我们又什么时候才能在一起呢？

0079.en: The pressure is not enough.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 压力，还不够多。

0079.en: Chi Xiaocheng lay on the hospital bed, slowly waiting for time to pass.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 池小橙躺在病床，就这么慢慢地等候时间的流逝。

0079.en: She dealt with the doctor, and then with Dongfang Yang and her brother, who took time out of their busy schedules to visit her.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 应付完医生，又应付了百忙之中抽空来关心自己的东方阳和哥哥。

0079.en: Su Tao, who had slept for a full 10 hours from noon to late night, slowly woke up.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 从中午到深夜，足足睡了10个小时的苏桃，才慢慢苏醒。

0079.en: Long periods of drowsiness did not make her feel refreshed; instead, she felt even more tired and listless in a short period of time.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 长时间的嗜睡并不能让自己精神百倍，反而会在短时间内更加疲惫和萎靡。

0079.en: Su Tao was like this, feeling dizzy and a dull pain in her chest.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 苏桃便是如此，觉得头昏脑胀，胸口闷疼。

0079.en: After a while, even though she still felt tired, she no longer had the struggle and pain she felt before going to sleep.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 缓了好一会儿后，即便还是觉得累，却没了睡前的挣扎与痛苦。

0079.en: Su Tao looked at the panda plushie she was still hugging, and said with a smile, "Panda, panda, you're even softer than Xiaocheng."
0079.speaker: 苏桃
0079.cn: 苏桃看向依旧被抱在怀中的大熊猫玩偶抱枕，笑着说道，“大熊猫呀大熊猫，你比小橙还要软呢。”

0079.en: Saying that, she nudged the panda's belly with her face.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 说着，又用脸拱了一下大熊猫的肚子。

0079.en: But after saying that, Su Tao couldn't help but pause.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 可在说出这句话后，苏桃不免又怔了一下。

0079.en: Xiaocheng.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 小橙

0079.en: She's still in the hospital.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 她还在医院。

0079.en: Memories flooded back like a tide.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 回忆如潮水般袭来。

0079.en: Self-harm, seduction, Ye Liang's betrayal, choice.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 自我伤害、引诱、叶良背叛、选择。

0079.en: Scene after scene flashed by, making Su Tao show a pained expression again.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 一幕幕闪过，让苏桃又露出了痛苦的神色。

0079.en: But when she looked up again, her expression showed a hint of retreat.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 但再度抬头时，神色却有了一抹退缩。

0079.en: Perhaps, just let nature take its course?
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 要不，就这样顺其自然吧？

0079.en: As soon as this thought emerged, the phone in the living room rang.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 这个想法刚刚生出来，外面的客厅，手机铃声就响了起来。

0079.en: Su Tao had a bad premonition.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 苏桃心中多了一抹不好的预感。

0079.en: She walked out and looked at the caller ID.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 她走出去看向了来电的名称。

0079.en: She breathed a sigh of relief.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 轻轻松了口气。

0079.en: The call was from Chi Xiaocheng's mother.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 来电话的是池小橙的母亲。

0079.en: She really didn't want to face Chi Xiaocheng right now, and she didn't want to think about Chi Xiaocheng's yandere tendencies.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 她现在实在不想面对池小橙，更不想去思考有关池小橙病娇的事情。

0079.en: This matter seemed to have been hidden deep in her heart.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 这件事，好像已经被她隐藏在心底。

0079.en: Facing Chi's mother, Su Tao showed a relaxed smile, "Hello, Auntie, good evening."
0079.speaker: 苏桃
0079.cn: 面对池母，苏桃露出了轻松的笑容，“喂，伯母晚上好。”

0079.en: The call connected. In the hospital, Chi Xiaocheng listened to the voice coming from the phone, and her lips curved.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 电话接通，在医院的池小橙听着手机传来的声音，唇角勾起。

0079.en: Pseudovoice skill activated.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 伪音技能点亮。

0079.en: Imitating her mother's old and anxious voice, it slowly sounded in Su Tao's ear, "That's great, Xiao Tao, your call went through."
0079.speaker: 池母
0079.cn: 模仿着母亲的苍老的焦急声音缓缓在苏桃耳边响起，“太好了，小桃你的电话打通了。”

0079.en: "Xiao Tao, isn't Xiaocheng with you? I can't get through to her phone."
0079.speaker: 池母
0079.cn: “那个小桃，小橙不在你身边吗，她的电话，我怎么都打不通。”

0079.en: "Xiaocheng... where is she?"
0079.speaker: 池母
0079.cn: “小橙她...在哪？”

0079.en: The old and kind voice in her ear once again evoked beautiful childhood memories.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 耳边苍老的慈祥再度唤起了儿时的美好的回忆。

0079.en: But that beauty now became pressure.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 只是那份美好，现在成了压力。

0079.en: Isn't Xiaocheng with you?
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 小橙不在你身边吗？

0079.en: Didn't you, as her older sister, take good care of her?
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 你这个做姐姐的没照顾好她吗？

0079.en: I entrusted her to you, that's why I let her study in Jiuzhou City with you.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 我可是将她嘱托给你了，才让她和你来九州市读书的。

0079.en: Or rather, Xiao Tao, do you... not want her anymore?
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 还是说，小桃你......不要她了？

0079.en: The suffocating sensation, like being submerged in water, struck again.
0079.speaker: 旁白
0079.cn: 沉入水中般的窒息感，再度袭来。

0079.en: It was as if Chi Xiaocheng's loving voice echoed in her ear: Tao Tao, you can't escape~
0079.speaker: 池小橙
0079.cn: 耳边就宛如响起池小橙满是爱意的声线：桃桃，你逃不掉的哦

0080.en: Chapter 80 Link by Link
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 第80章 一环扣一环

0080.en: Sitting in the hospital room, Chi Xiaocheng waited for a long time but didn't hear Su Tao's reply.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 坐在医院病房，池小橙等了好一会儿都没听到苏桃的回复。

0080.en: She smiled even more happily.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 笑得更开心了。

0080.en: But the old voice, produced by the pseudovoice skill, carried a hint of absentmindedness and disbelief, "Xiao... Xiao Tao, Xiaocheng... did something happen to her?"
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: 但由伪声技能发出那苍老的声音，却有一些失神和难以置信，“小...小桃，小橙她...是不是出什么事了？”

0080.en: A mother regards her daughter as her only one.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 一位母亲将女儿视为唯一。

0080.en: But she couldn't get any news from her daughter.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 却得不到女儿的任何消息。

0080.en: It was as if the sky had fallen.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 好似天塌了。

0080.en: And pressed down on Su Tao.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 并压在苏桃身上。

0080.en: This white moonlight female lead quickly forced a smile, her tone light and comforting, "Auntie, what are you talking about? Of course Xiaocheng is fine. It's very cold here in Jiuzhou City, and Xiaocheng just fell asleep not long ago because of a cold. Her phone is on silent."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 这位白月光女主连忙露出笑容，语气轻快地安慰道，“伯母，您在说什么呢，小橙当然没事呀，现在九州市这边降温严重，小橙感冒了刚睡着没多久，手机静音呢。”

0080.en: The old voice on the phone breathed a sigh of relief, "That's good, that's good. Xiaocheng's brother has been gone for so long and hasn't sent any news. If anything else happens to Xiaocheng... your uncle and I don't know what we'd do."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: 电话中苍老的声音松了口气，“那就好那就好，小橙她哥跑出去那么久了也没回点消息，小橙她...小橙她要是再出什么事，我和你伯父都不知道要怎么办了。”

0080.en: Su Tao's smile gradually stiffened.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 苏桃的笑容，渐渐僵硬。

0080.en: The old voice didn't stop. Old people liked to repeat meaningless words, "Xiao Tao, it's really great that you're by Xiaocheng's side."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: 苍老的声音没有停下，老人家都喜欢说些没营养的话语重复，“小桃，有你在小橙身边实在是太好了。”

0080.en: "This child's personality has always been difficult since she was little, and she's easily bullied. We two old folks only know how to farm. We've already disappointed Xiaocheng's brother. If it weren't for you, we really wouldn't know what to do."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: “这孩子从小性格就不行，又容易被人欺负，我们两个老家伙又只会耕地，已经让小橙她哥失望了，要是没有你，我们真不知道怎么办。”

0080.en: "Xiao Tao, thank you for being a pillar of support and letting Xiaocheng rely on you. I'm relieved to entrust that child to you."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: “小桃，谢谢你能够作为支柱一直在小橙身边让她依赖，那孩子交给你，我放心。”

0080.en: Listening to the relieved tone, Su Tao's stiff smile gradually turned bitter, "You're welcome, Auntie. You and Uncle raised me when I was little. As her older sister, of course I'll take good care of Xiaocheng."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 听着那欣慰的语气，苏桃僵硬的笑容渐渐转为苦涩，“不用谢的伯母，我小时候还是你和伯父带大的，作为姐姐我当然会照顾好小橙。”

0080.en: "Did you just coax Xiaocheng to sleep?"
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: “小橙是刚被你哄睡着了吗？”

0080.en: Su Tao: "Mm."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 苏桃：“嗯。”

0080.en: "That child, she's still the same as before, she won't sleep unless she's hugging you. She's really a girl who won't grow up."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: “那孩子，果然还是和以前一样，非要抱着你才肯睡吧，真是个长不大的丫头。”

0080.en: Every word was filled with memories and happiness, which made Su Tao's heart even more bitter.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 话里话外都是回忆与幸福，这更让苏桃心中感到苦涩。

0080.en: She was afraid.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 她害怕。

0080.en: She wanted to escape.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 她想逃避。

0080.en: She wanted to forget everything and live an easy life alone. That seemed good too.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 想就此忘却一切，一个人轻松的生活，似乎也好。

0080.en: But in her heart, she could never quite let go of that small figure.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 可心中，却始终不太能放下那小小的身影。

0080.en: Like a thorny rose, holding it would constantly prick and sting her.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 就犹如一朵带刺玫瑰，抓在手里，就会时刻被刺伤、刺痛。

0080.en: Even with Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao had thoughts of escaping, but only with Chi's father and mother, she dared not think that way.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 即便是池小橙，苏桃都产生过逃避的心思，唯独池父和池母，让她不敢去那样想。

0080.en: As a low-income household, it was already very difficult for them to raise Chi Song and Chi Xiaocheng.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 作为一个低保的贫困户，家里养池松和池小橙两个人已经非常艰难了。

0080.en: But when Chi Xiaocheng brought her home, the old couple still accepted her without hesitation.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 可当池小橙带着她回家时，二老还是义无反顾地接纳了她。

0080.en: Because of her, the whole family was often talked about by neighbors.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 因为她，整个家都没少被邻里乡亲议论。

0080.en: Even though she was an outsider, the old couple still raised her as their own daughter.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 即便她是外来的，二老依旧将她当作亲女儿一样养。

0080.en: Buying clothes, buying toys, supporting her education, allowing her, an orphan since childhood, to feel the warmth of home and family.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 买衣服，买玩具，供她读书，让打小就是孤儿的她，感受到了家和亲人的温暖。

0080.en: Only Chi's father and mother, Su Tao could not fail, and dared not fail.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 唯有池父池母，苏桃无法辜负，也不敢辜负。

0080.en: In her ear, another heavy male voice sounded.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 耳边，又响起了另外一个沉重男人的声音。

0080.en: It was Chi's father's slightly hoarse, smoky voice: "It's a pity Xiao Tao isn't a boy, otherwise it would be good to marry Xiaocheng off to him."
0080.speaker: 池父
0080.cn: 是池父有些沙哑的烟嗓：“可惜小桃不是男孩，不然把小橙嫁过去也挺好的。”

0080.en: As soon as these words came out, they were met with a scolding from Chi's mother, "Old man, what nonsense are you talking about? Chi Song is here to carry on the family line. Do you really want to marry Xiaocheng off? Even if I have to raise two daughters for the rest of my life, I'm willing!"
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: 此话刚出，就遭到了池母的呵斥，“老东西你懂个屁，传宗接代有池松在，你就这么想把小橙嫁出去吗，两个闺女在一起就算养一辈子我也愿意！”

0080.en: After scolding him, her voice softened towards Su Tao, "Xiao Tao, don't listen to your uncle's nonsense. You two decide your own matters. I won't bother you."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: 呵斥完，到苏桃这边声音又柔和了下来，“小桃你别听你伯父瞎说，你们的事情你们自己做主哈，我就不打扰你了。”

0080.en: "It's okay, no bother."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: “没事，不打扰的。”

0080.en: "Mm-hmm, then I'll hang up first. Xiao Tao, Xiaocheng is entrusted to you."
0080.speaker: 池母
0080.cn: “嗯嗯，那我就先挂了，小桃，小橙就交给你了哦。”

0080.en: With that, the call ended.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 话落，电话随之挂断。

0080.en: Su Tao sat down on the sofa in a daze, her mind filled with Chi's mother's last words.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 苏桃失神地坐倒在沙发，脑海中尽是池母最后说的那句。

0080.en: —Xiaocheng is entrusted to you.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: ——小橙就交给你了哦。

0080.en: The old couple's care, expectations, satisfaction, and happiness were all poured onto her.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 老人家的关怀、期望、满足、幸福，全都倾注在了她的身上。

0080.en: "Tao Tao, with such heavy love, are you really going to ignore me?"
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: “桃桃啊，这么沉重的爱，你真的要置我于不顾吗？”

0080.en: Hanging up the phone, putting it down, Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved into a happy smile.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 挂断电话，放下手机，池小橙唇角笑得很开心。

0080.en: She thought she would soon see Su Tao in this hospital room.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 她想，很快应该就能在这病房见到苏桃了。

0080.en: Although the hacker toolset drawn from the system was not advanced, borrowing the original owner's mother's number was still very simple.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 系统抽出来的黑客工具组虽然不高级，但借用一下原主母亲的号码还是很简单的。

0080.en: Just as the phone call said.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 正如电话所说。

0080.en: I, myself, have entrusted myself to you, Tao Tao.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 我呀，可是把自己交给了桃桃你呢。

0080.en: And Su Tao, sitting in the living room, leaned back on the sofa and closed her eyes. All the complex emotions she had hidden deep in her heart for Chi Xiaocheng were brought out by a single phone call.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 而坐在客厅的苏桃，倚靠沙发闭上了双眼，原本藏在心底对池小橙的种种复杂感情，又因为一通电话引了出来。

0080.en: What should she do now?
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 现在的她，又该怎么办呢？

0080.en: She took out her phone and aimlessly scrolled through the content, not knowing what she was looking at, just scrolling randomly.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 手机拿出，苏桃无神地划着上面的内容，也不知道看的是什么，就一通乱划。

0080.en: Chi Xiaocheng was still watching the confused girl on the monitor.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 池小橙依旧在监控中看着这位迷茫的少女。

0080.en: She took out her phone again, "System, what do you think Tao Tao needs most right now?"
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: 又拿出了手机，“统子，你认为现在的桃桃，最需要的是什么？”

0080.en: [Host, your comfort? Or your normal side?]
0080.speaker: 系统
0080.cn: 【宿主你的安慰？还是你表现得正常的一面？】

0080.en: "I've always been normal." Chi Xiaocheng corrected the system's slip of the tongue and slowly said, "What Tao Tao needs now is a fulcrum, a belief, a goal to move forward."
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: “我一直很正常。”池小橙纠正了一下系统的口误，缓缓道，“现在的桃桃需要的是一个支点，一份信念，一个前进的目标。”

0080.en: "To make her take responsibility for me, the pressure from the original owner's parents isn't enough. Even if she comes to the hospital, she'll only come 'forced' to take care of me."
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: “想让她对我负起责任光是来自原主爸妈的压力还不够，那样她就算会来医院，也只是‘被迫’地过来照顾我。”

0080.en: "She must take the initiative."
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: “她必须主动才行。”

0080.en: [Then what should we do next?]
0080.speaker: 系统
0080.cn: 【那接下来，要怎么做？】

0080.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled faintly, "Next, it's naturally Doctor Orange's turn to appear."
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: 池小橙浅浅笑道，“接下来当然该轮到橙医生出场了。”

0080.en: "Tao Tao has a heart problem, it needs to be treated!"
0080.speaker: 池小橙
0080.cn: “桃桃有心病，得治！”

0080.en: Just as she was feeling confused, with a ding, a familiar person replied.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 正值迷茫之际，叮咚一声，熟悉的人回了消息。

0080.en: Su Tao suddenly sat up, her face filled with joy.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 苏桃猛地直起身，脸色欣喜。

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "Sorry, I've been busy all day. How is your friend Orange doing now?"
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“抱歉，有事情忙了一天，目前你橙子朋友的情况如何？”

0080.en: Peach: "Doctor Cheng, let me tell you what happened first."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 桃子：“成医生，我先跟您说一下发生什么事情吧。”

0080.en: Because they were online and didn't know each other, their realities would never overlap.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 由于是在网络，二者相互又不认识，现实永远不可能重合。

0080.en: Coupled with the fact that Doctor Cheng had helped Su Tao a lot before, she subconsciously trusted him completely.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 加上成医生之前给苏桃的帮助很多，她下意识就完全信任了对方。

0080.en: She told Doctor Cheng the entire process of what happened between Chi Xiaocheng and Ye Liang in great detail.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 事无巨细地将池小橙和叶良事情发生的全过程，告诉了成医生。

0080.en: After she finished speaking, Doctor Cheng stopped replying, as if in silence.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 说完后，成医生就不再回复，好似沉默。

0080.en: The waiting time was agonizing for Su Tao. Three minutes felt like half an hour.
0080.speaker: 旁白
0080.cn: 等待的时间让苏桃很是煎熬，三分钟感觉过去了半个小时一样。

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "So, you don't know what to do now?"
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“所以，你现在不知道怎么做？”
