0080.en: Su Tao: "Mm, I... she's like that, I'm a little scared of her. Doctor Cheng, think about it, this time she hurt herself to make me break up with Ye Liang. What about next time, the time after that?"
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 苏桃：“嗯，我...她那个样子，我有点害怕她，成医生你想啊，这次她伤害自己让我和叶良决裂，那下次，下下次呢？”

0080.en: Su Tao: "I even thought just now, why not just let it go? I can't easily tell others about this, and it's so uncomfortable to keep it bottled up."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 苏桃：“我刚刚甚至会想，不如就这样不管不顾下去得了，这样的事情我又不能轻易地和别人说，憋在心里好难受。”

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "I think I understand what you mean."
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“我大概明白你的意思了。”

0080.en: Su Tao urgently sent a message: "Doctor Cheng, do you have any solutions?"
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 苏桃迫切发去消息：“成医生，你有什么办法吗？”

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "She makes you feel pain, confusion, depression, fear, and even difficulty breathing, right?"
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“她会让你觉得痛苦、迷茫、压抑、恐惧，甚至呼吸困难，对吗？”

0080.en: Su Tao swallowed, "Yes, I know she didn't do it on purpose, but... she just unconsciously puts a lot of pressure on me. I... I don't know what to do."
0080.speaker: 苏桃
0080.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫，“对，我知道她不是故意的，但...她就是会无形中给我很大的压力，我...我不知道怎么办。”

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "(Yellow bean sigh)"
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“（黄豆叹气）”

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "If you continue in your current state, you'll collapse first. I only have one suggestion."
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“如果按照你现在的状况，自己会先垮掉的，我的建议只有一个。”

0080.en: Doctor Cheng: "Send her to a mental hospital."
0080.speaker: 成医生
0080.cn: 成医生：“你把她送去精神病院吧。”

0081.en: Chapter 81 Miss Peach, You Are Also a Yandere
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 第81章 桃子小姐，你也是个病娇

0081.en: "M-mental hospital?"
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: “精...精神病院？”

0081.en: Su Tao looked at the message from Doctor Cheng, and in an instant, many news articles she had seen online flashed through her mind.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 苏桃看着成医生发过来的信息，脑海一瞬间闪过网上看到的诸多新闻。

0081.en: Sending children to internet addiction schools, where students desperately exposed that such schools were actually violent addiction treatments, and even caused many deaths.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 送进网瘾学校，学生拼了命才曝光出来那种学校其实就是暴力戒瘾，甚至闹出过许多死人的事情。

0081.en: Sending people to mental hospitals, where they would be despised, neglected, and abused by various people inside.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 送进精神病院，被里面各种人嫌弃，冷落，虐待。

0081.en: No illness would be treated, but new ones would be created, and existing ones would be treated until death.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 没病治出病，有病治到死。

0081.en: It was as if she was hallucinating. Chi Xiaocheng was sent to a mental hospital by her, and when she came out, she was already demented.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 眼前好似出现幻觉，池小橙被她送进精神病院，出来的时候已经痴傻。

0081.en: Or on the verge of death.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 或者奄奄一息。

0081.en: She typed quickly, her hands trembling.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 她颤抖着手，连忙打字。

0081.en: Peach: "Doctor Orange, this isn't right. Why send her to a mental hospital? You didn't say that before."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 桃子：“橙医生，这不对吧，为什么会是送进精神病院，你之前可不是这么说的。”

0081.en: Peach: "Sorry, Doctor Cheng, I'm too excited. I made a typo."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 桃子：“抱歉成医生，我太激动了，打错字了。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "I don't blame you."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“不怪你。”

0081.en: "Before, I was optimistic because you yourself were optimistic. Your optimism would be conveyed to the patient, and only then would there be a chance for treatment."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “之前我持乐观状态，是因为你本人也很乐观，你的乐观会传递给病人，这样才会有治疗的机会。”

0081.en: "But your current state tells me that you're already at your limit and can't hold on any longer. In this state, being by Orange's friend's side will only have negative effects."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “但你现在的状态却告诉你，你已经要到极限，要坚持不下去了，这样的你在橙子朋友的身边，反而只会有负面效果。”

0081.en: "Moreover, I'm also thinking of you. Your subconscious is already preventing you from contacting Orange. This is an instinctive protection. If you continue, not to mention whether Orange can be cured, you yourself will go crazy."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “而且我也是为了你着想，你的潜意识已经不让你去接触橙子，这是本能做出的保护，再继续下去，不说橙子能不能治好，你自己也得疯掉。”

0081.en: "That's why I recommend you send Orange to a mental hospital. Although the chance of treatment is slim, it's better for both you and her."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “所以我才会推荐你把橙子送去精神病院，虽说治疗的机会比较渺茫，但这对你和她都比较好。”

0081.en: Su Tao replied instantly, "No, Xiaocheng absolutely cannot be sent to a mental hospital!"
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃秒回，“不行，小橙绝对不能送去精神病院！”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "See, you're afraid to face her, and you're anxious when I tell you to send her to a mental hospital."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“你看，让你去面对她你害怕，让你送她去精神病院你又急。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "What exactly do you want?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“你想要的到底是什么呢？”

0081.en: Looking at her phone, Su Tao's lips trembled, "What I want... what is it?"
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 看着手机，苏桃嘴唇发颤，“我想要的...是什么？”

0081.en: Scene after scene flashed through her mind.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 脑海中的画面一幕幕闪过。

0081.en: But she couldn't fix on any of them.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 却始终无法定格。

0081.en: At this moment, Doctor Cheng sent another message, "It's too tiring to explain by typing. Is a phone call convenient?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 这时，成医生又发来了消息，“光是打字解释太累了，方便电话吗？”

0081.en: Su Tao quickly came back to her senses and called Doctor Cheng on WeChat.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 苏桃连忙回神，给成医生打去了微信电话。

0081.en: What she heard was a mature and steady male voice, "Hello, Miss Peach, I'm Doctor Cheng."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 入耳的是成熟稳重的大叔音，“桃子小姐你好，我是成医生。”

0081.en: Such a voice made one feel inexplicably at ease. Su Tao composed herself, "Hello, Doctor Cheng."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 这样的声音让人莫名心安，苏桃定了定神，“成医生您好。”

0081.en: Chi Xiaocheng... oh no, Doctor Orange, was the first to open the conversation with a pseudovoice, "Regarding your question, I just said it. Since you have no clue, how about I ask you, and you answer?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 池小橙...哦不，橙医生率先用伪音打开话题，“关于你的问题我刚刚也说过了，既然你没有头绪的话，我来问你，你来回答怎么样？”

0081.en: "As psychologists, we usually use a question-and-answer method to help patients sort out their situation."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “作为心理医生，我们通常会用问答的方式，去帮病人梳理情况。”

0081.en: Su Tao was already extremely confused and quickly replied gratefully, "I'm fine, Doctor Cheng."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃本就无比迷茫，连忙感激地回应道，“我没问题的成医生。”

0081.en: "Good, first, you don't dislike your friend Orange, even if she likes you, is of the same gender, and is a yandere who does extreme things, but you still don't dislike her and don't want to abandon her, right?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “好，首先，你不讨厌你的橙子朋友，即便她喜欢你，同性，还是病娇会做出极端的事情，但你依旧不讨厌她，不想抛弃她对吗？”

0081.en: Su Tao sat back on the sofa and nodded gently, "Yes, Doctor Cheng. Xiaocheng and I grew up together, and her family entrusted her to me. I can't abandon her."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃又坐回了沙发，轻轻点头，“是的成医生，我和小橙一起长大，她家里人也将她托付给我，我不能抛弃她。”

0081.en: "No, no, no." Doctor Cheng said, "Don't let external factors influence your judgment. It should be based on your own feelings."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “不不不。”成医生道，“不要因为外在因素去影响你的判断，而是基于你的本身。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "Forget it, I'll ask more directly. Do you like her, or do you dislike her?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“算了，我问得更直观一点吧，你是喜欢她，还是讨厌她？”

0081.en: Su Tao was speechless for a moment: "I..."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃一时语塞：“我......”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng smiled and explained, "Don't misunderstand. Liking is not just about romance. It also includes family, friends, admiration, longing, and other factors. If you really don't know if you like her, not disliking her means liking her."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生笑着解释，“不要误会，喜欢不单单是恋情，还包括了亲人、朋友、爱慕、憧憬、向往等其他因素，如果你实在不知道喜不喜欢的话，不讨厌，即是喜欢。”

0081.en: "Not disliking... means liking..."
0081.speaker: 苏桃

0081.en: Su Tao opened her mouth. She instinctively felt something was wrong, but couldn't pinpoint it.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 苏桃张了张嘴，本能地觉得有点不对，但又感觉不出来。

0081.en: She just answered according to Doctor Cheng's words, "Then I like Xiaocheng."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 只是顺着成医生的话回答道，“那我喜欢小橙。”

0081.en: "Very good." Doctor Cheng responded, "Then, extending from the previous two questions, either send her to a mental hospital, or try to accept her yandere tendencies, try to enjoy it."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “很好。”成医生应了一声，“那么由此延伸出之前的两个问题，要么把她送去精神病院，要么尝试着去接受她的病娇，尝试去享受。”

0081.en: "But Doctor Cheng, is there no other way?"
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: “可是成医生，没别的办法了吗？”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "I'm giving you a multiple-choice question, not a fill-in-the-blank."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“我在给你做二选一的选择题，而不是材料题。”

0081.en: Another choice.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 又是选择

0081.en: Su Tao pursed her lips, "If I have to choose, I'll... I'll try to accept her, pretend to like her, and then... then see if I can cure her."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃抿了抿嘴，“如果非要选的话，我会去...会去尝试接受她，假装喜欢她，然后...然后看看能不能治好她。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "Treatment is a later matter. What you're choosing now is to accept her."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“治疗是之后的事情，现在你选的是接受她。”

0081.en: "But Doctor Cheng." Su Tao said anxiously, "That's easy to say, but when I think of her, I'm still scared to face her."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: “但是成医生。”苏桃着急道，“说是这么说，可我想到她的时候，面对她还是会害怕。”

0081.en: "Don't worry, we're here to solve this problem."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “别急，我们下来就是为了解决这个问题的。”

0081.en: "Inferring the process and origin from the result." Doctor Cheng said word by word, "The current result is that Orange has become a yandere and likes you!"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “从结果去推测过程和起始。”成医生一字一字道，“如今的结果是，橙子成了病娇，喜欢你！”

0081.en: "So, Miss Peach, here's our question: How did she become a yandere, and why did she like you after becoming a yandere?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “那么桃子小姐，我们的问题来了，她怎么成为的病娇，为什么成了病娇之后，会喜欢你呢？”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng didn't give Su Tao a chance to think and answered his own question, "The formation of a yandere is deformed and twisted. Such feelings don't appear out of thin air. There must be influences from family factors, environmental factors, and even human factors."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生没给苏桃思考的机会，自问自答，“病娇的形成是畸形、扭曲的，不会凭空冒出这样的感情，一定是有家庭因素、环境因素，甚至人为因素的影响。”

0081.en: "Next, we'll analyze it bit by bit."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “接下来我们一点点地去剖析。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng asked, "Only you know about your friend Orange. Recalling from childhood, what do you think are the family factors that influenced Orange's growth?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生问，“你和橙子朋友的事情只有你自己知道，从儿时开始回忆，你认为影响橙子成长的家庭因素，是什么？”

0081.en: Su Tao was lost in thought, "Family... Xiaocheng comes from a poor farming family. Her parents only knew how to raise children, not educate them. Life was quite difficult."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃怔怔出神，“家庭...小橙她出身贫困的农民家庭，父母只懂养孩子不懂教育孩子，过得比较艰苦。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng added appropriately, "Such children lack proper guidance. They often learn what they see and gravitate towards it. Children who can't distinguish right from wrong are the beginning of deformity."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生适当补充，“这样的孩子缺少正确引导，往往看到什么就会去学，并向那方面去靠拢，孩子分不清对和错，就是畸形的开始。”

0081.en: "Then what about the environmental factors that influenced her growth?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “那么影响她成长的环境因素呢？”

0081.en: Su Tao's breathing became a little rapid, "Because she was small and from a poor background, and not good at communicating, before she met me at school, she was constantly bullied and picked on. Her classmates looked down on her, the teachers didn't care, and the school did nothing..."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: 苏桃呼吸已经有了一丝急促，“因为瘦小、出身又差，性格不善交流，在学校遇到我之前，一直是被霸凌、欺负，同学看不起她，老师不管事，学校不作为......”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng: "See, suppression, extremism, and lack of proper education. The second step of deformity is thus sown. It's already very difficult for such a child to grow up normally."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生：“你看，压抑、极端、又得不到好的教育，畸形的第二步就是这样埋下了种子，这样的孩子能正常成长起来已经很不容易了。”

0081.en: In the hospital, Chi Xiaocheng, with a hint of unbearable sadness, yet filled with excitement and anticipation, continued to ask softly.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 医院中，池小橙带着些许不忍，又怀着诸多兴奋和期待，继续轻声询问。

0081.en: "Then, most importantly, what are the human factors from you, the object of her yandere tendencies?"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “那么，最重要的，被她病娇对象的你的人为因素，是什么呢？”

0081.en: At this moment, Su Tao thought of something extremely terrifying, something she didn't even want to face.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 此时，苏桃想到了极为恐怖，甚至她不想去面对的事情。

0081.en: Her legs trembled, and her lips were bloodless.
0081.speaker: 旁白
0081.cn: 双腿发颤，唇瓣毫无血色。

0081.en: "The human factor is... when she was at her most desperate, helpless, and confused, I appeared by her side, pulled her up, and then..."
0081.speaker: 苏桃
0081.cn: “人为因素是...在她最绝望、无助、迷茫的时候，我出现在了她的身边，拉了她一把，然后......”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng continued her words, "Then, to soothe her anxiety and encourage her, you kept telling her that she was the most important person to you, that you liked her the most, and that you would be together forever."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生接上了她的话，“然后你为了照顾她的不安和鼓励她，一直说她是你最重要的人，你最喜欢她了，永远在一起这样的话。”

0081.en: "Miss Peach, from an adult's perspective, Miss Orange's family background is poor, she didn't receive a good education, she was alone, and no one had ever stood by her side for many years."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “桃子小姐，以我们成年人的角度去看，橙子小姐家境差，受不到良好教育，孤单一人，多年来没有任何一个人出现在她身边站在她的身边。”

0081.en: "And at this time, you came. You subtly guided her thoughts, guided her emotions, made her value you, made her like you, made her believe that you would be with her forever, thus making her hopelessly dependent on you."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “而这个时候，你来了，从小诱导她的思想，引导她的感情，让她重视你，让她喜欢你，让她以为你会和她永远在一起，从而无可救药地依赖上你。”

0081.en: "These are all things you told me before. The naive Miss Orange was like a blank slate, absorbing and filling in all the knowledge she was told, heard, and taught."
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: “这些都是你曾经和我说过的，懵懂的橙子小姐就像一张白纸，将所说、所闻、所教的知识，全部吸收填涂。”

0081.en: Doctor Cheng's voice was deep, "From a results-oriented perspective, Miss Peach... you are also a yandere!"
0081.speaker: 成医生
0081.cn: 成医生声音幽深，“就结果论而言，桃子小姐...你，也是一个病娇！”

0082.en: Chapter 82: The Yandere's Closed Loop (Extra chapter for... I don't know what name to use)
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 第82章 病娇的闭环（为...不知道取啥名加更）

0082.en: "I... I'm a yandere?!"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “我...我是病娇？！”

0082.en: Su Tao's hand holding the phone was trembling uncontrollably.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 苏桃抓着手机的手都在不受控制地颤抖。

0082.en: Just then, a flash of white light lit up the dark window, a bolt of lightning illuminating the entire world, but the delayed thunder never came.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 恰逢此时，幽暗的窗外亮起一道白光，一道闪电照亮了整个世界，但迟来的雷声却并未响起。

0082.en: That clap of thunder resounded in Su Tao's heart.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 那声惊雷，响在了苏桃心中。

0082.en: Before she could say anything, Dr. Cheng's tone suddenly became cheerful, "Of course, I was just kidding. After talking with you for half a month, I know your personality. How could you be a yandere?"
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 她还没来得及说些什么，成医生语气陡然变得轻快了起来，“当然，我就是开个玩笑，和你聊下来的半个月我也清楚你的性格，你又怎么会是病娇呢？”

0082.en: "Don't be so nervous." Dr. Cheng continued, her tone no longer as heavy as before. "If what you told me earlier was the truth, you probably already know it yourself, right?"
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “别太紧张了。”成医生继续说着，语气也没了刚刚的压抑，“如果你先前和我说的是实话，你自己大概也清楚的吧？”

0082.en: "The reason Miss Chengzi became a yandere, and why you are the object of her yandere tendencies."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “橙子小姐变成病娇的原因，还有她为什么病娇的对象是你。”

0082.en: She didn't even need Dr. Cheng to remind her further.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 甚至都不用成医生去继续提醒。

0082.en: Su Tao's mind had already followed her train of thought and completed the final piece of the puzzle.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 苏桃脑子就已经顺着她的想法，去补完了最后一枚拼图。

0082.en: Looking back to the afternoon where it all began.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 回顾一切最开始的那个下午。

0082.en: That basement, which was confusing, incomprehensible, and something she didn't want to remember.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 那让人迷茫又不解，不愿回忆起的地下室。

0082.en: Chi Xiaocheng, like a madwoman, had screamed at her in a breakdown.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 池小橙像疯了一样，对着她崩溃地大喊。

0082.en: —You always told me that I was your most precious friend, your most important person, the person you liked the most!
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: ——你一直跟我说，我才是你最珍贵的朋友，是你最重要的人，是你最喜欢的人！

0082.en: —Since you told me that, why did you betray me!
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: ——既然你都这样跟我说了，为什么又要背叛我！

0082.en: —Ye Liang, Si Chen, Dongfang Yang, you already have me, why do you still have to like them!
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: ——叶良、司辰、东方阳，你已经有我了，为什么还要去喜欢他们！

0082.en: —Taotao, isn't having me enough?
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: ——桃桃，有我一个，还不够么？

0082.en: At that time, Su Tao couldn't understand why Chi Xiaocheng would say such things.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 那时的苏桃，还不能理解池小橙为什么会那样说。

0082.en: She just thought it was the wrong ideas instilled in her by those unfriendly sisters of hers, leading her astray.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 只当那是她那些不友好的姐妹给她灌输的错误思想，带她走向歧路。

0082.en: Recalling it now, with Dr. Cheng's guidance, she gradually understood.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 如今回忆起来，加上成医生的开导，她才渐渐明白。

0082.en: The reason Xiaocheng said those things was all because of her!
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 小橙会说出那样的一番话，都是因为自己啊！

0082.en: But she was only a few months older than Chi Xiaocheng, so how much more could she possibly understand?
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 只是她的年龄也只比池小橙大几个月，又会比池小橙懂多少呢？

0082.en: The two of them had both been in a state of ignorant confusion.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 二人曾经，都处在懵懂无知。

0082.en: And all along, Su Tao had only seen Chi Xiaocheng as her best friend, a younger sister who lacked security and needed encouragement and care.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 而一直以来，苏桃也只将池小橙当作最要好的朋友，总是缺乏安全感，需要鼓励和呵护的妹妹。

0082.en: But she had never looked at her own careless words from Chi Xiaocheng's perspective.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 却从未站在池小橙的视角，去看待她自己所说出的无心之语。

0082.en: Only by clearing the clouds can one see the bright sky.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 拨开云雾，方见天明。

0082.en: The logic wasn't flawed; the past suspense and entanglement formed a closed loop at this moment.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 逻辑没有崩坏，过往的悬念与纠结，在这一刻完成闭环。

0082.en: "So it's because of me that Xiaocheng became a yandere."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “所以是因为我，小橙才会变成病娇。”

0082.en: Su Tao murmured softly.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 苏桃轻声呢喃。

0082.en: "And after Xiaocheng became a yandere, I was scared of her, feared her, and even thought about running away and ignoring her completely..."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “而我又在小橙变成病娇后，害怕她、恐惧她，甚至产生过逃避，从此不管不顾的想法......”

0082.en: Her thoughts became clear, but her brain began to lack oxygen.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 念头变得通达，但大脑却开始缺氧。

0082.en: A tide of guilt and self-blame flooded Su Tao's heart.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 如潮水般的愧疚与自责，淹没了苏桃的心房。

0082.en: Word by word, she uttered, "All this time, I'm the one who has wronged Xiaocheng..."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 一字一字，在她嘴里吐出，“一直以来，都是我对不起小橙......”

0082.en: And Chi Xiaocheng, holding the phone and listening to these murmurs, smiled a strange and satisfied smile.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 而拿着手机听着这些呢喃话语的池小橙，诡异而又满足地笑了。

0082.en: She gently reached out and offered a lifeline.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 轻轻伸手，递上了一根稻草。

0082.en: "Miss Taozi, there's still a chance to save this."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “桃子小姐，还有挽救的机会。”

0082.en: Su Tao snapped back to her senses and hurriedly asked Dr. Cheng, "Can it really be saved?"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 苏桃猛然回神，急促地对成医生说道，“真的还能挽救吗？”

0082.en: Dr. Cheng said with a faint smile, her gentle and mature voice reassuring, "We are just helping you sort out your thoughts and recognize the current situation. The topic of whether it can be saved is meant for the end."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 成医生似笑非笑地说着，温柔的成熟音色让人安心，“我们现在只是在帮你梳理自己的想法，认清楚现状，能不能救的话题，本身就是放在最后的。”

0082.en: Su Tao asked eagerly, "Then... what should I do?"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 苏桃急切问道，“那我...那我应该怎么做？”

0082.en: But Dr. Cheng didn't interfere further, instead saying slowly, "What you do next is not for me to decide, but depends on your own actions."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 但成医生没有继续干涉，而是缓缓说道，“之后怎么做，这不是我能决定的，而是看你自己的行动。”

0082.en: It's the unknown choices and actions that bring surprises, Taotao.
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: 就是要未知的选择和行动，才会有惊喜的呀桃桃

0082.en: Dr. Cheng: "At the same time, returning to the previous topic, after rejecting the option of sending her to a mental hospital, all you can do now is accept her."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 成医生：“同时回到刚刚的话题，否决了把她送去精神病院这一选项后，现在你做的只能去接受她。”

0082.en: "Also, you've already sorted out your own situation. When you face her, will you still be as scared as before?"
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “同时，你已经捋清楚自己的情况了，面对她的时候，还会有之前那么害怕吗？”

0082.en: "I..." Su Tao took a light breath, "It's all my fault that Xiaocheng became like this. I will take responsibility. Even if this hadn't happened, I wouldn't have ignored her."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “我......”苏桃轻轻呼了口气，“都是我的错，才让小橙变成这样，我会负起责任的，即便没有这回事，我也不会放着她不管。”

0082.en: "But Dr. Cheng, do you have other ways to relieve stress and anxiety?" Su Tao pressed, "I must take responsibility, I know that, but Xiaocheng's yandere state still makes my heart pound."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “但成医生，你有其他缓解压力和焦虑的方法吗？”苏桃追问，“我必须负起责任，这点我清楚，只是小橙那病娇的状态还是会让我有些心悸。”

0082.en: "Regarding your problem, what you actually need is a listener." Dr. Cheng said slowly, "Preferably an online friend like me, a stranger you can talk to."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “针对你的问题，你需要的其实是一个倾听者。”成医生缓缓道，“最好是和我一样，素不相识，却又聊得过来的网友。”

0082.en: "Of course, a real-life friend is also an option, but it's best if they are trustworthy, and don't let your friend Chengzi know."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “当然，现实中的朋友也可以，但最好信得过，并且别让你的橙子朋友知道。”

0082.en: "Besides that, it's popular now to find various 'buddies'. You could find a buddy with a common hobby, enjoy the hobby together, and chat."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “此外的话，现在流行找各种搭子，你可以找个有共同爱好的搭子，一块享受爱好的同时聊聊天。”

0082.en: Su Tao hesitated, "Uh... I don't think I have any hobbies."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 苏桃犹豫了一下，“额...我好像没什么爱好。”

0082.en: "Then find a hobby." Dr. Cheng said, "Watching anime, playing games, or just chatting on a voice call are all fine. Exercise can also relieve stress, but in your case, it would be better to have someone to talk to."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “那就找个爱好。”成医生道，“一起看动画，打游戏，没事挂个语音闲聊都行的，此外运动也可以减压，但你的情况有个人和你聊天会更好。”

0082.en: "Okay, I'll try."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “好的，我试试。”

0082.en: Su Tao noted it down very seriously.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 苏桃很认真地记了下来。

0082.en: She asked again, "Then Dr. Cheng, how should I face Xiaocheng? I... have no idea."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 又问道，“那成医生，我要怎么去面对小橙好啊，我...没什么头绪。”

0082.en: "Just act as usual." Dr. Cheng said with a smile, "A yandere is very well-behaved when not provoked, but, I think you can also enjoy it a little."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “和往常一样就好了。”成医生笑着道，“病娇在没受到刺激的时候，是很乖巧的，但是呢，我觉得你也可以去适当享受一下。”

0082.en: "Enjoy?"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: “享受？”

0082.en: "Yes, since you can't resist, why not try to enjoy it during the treatment process? Remember what I said?"
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “是啊，既然无法反抗，那治疗的过程中，为什么不尝试去享受呢，我说的还记得吧？”

0082.en: Dr. Cheng's laugh was alluring, "A yandere's love is one of a kind."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 成医生笑声勾人，“病娇的爱，独一无二。”

0082.en: Su Tao said hesitantly, "But... I'm just pretending to like her. To enjoy something like that is really..."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 苏桃犹豫地说道，“可是...我只是假装喜欢她，这样去享受什么的，实在是......”

0082.en: "It doesn't conflict with you pretending to like her." Dr. Cheng interrupted Su Tao, "This is a process, but ultimately it depends on you. But you must remember one thing: try to accept the things you hate."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “这和你假装喜欢她不冲突。”成医生打断了苏桃的话，“这是一个过程，不过终究取决于你个人，但有一点你要记住，尝试去接受你所厌恶的东西。”

0082.en: Su Tao murmured in confusion, "Accept the things I hate?"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 苏桃不解地呢喃，“接受我所厌恶的东西？”

0082.en: "Yes." Dr. Cheng nodded, "You are afraid of your friend Chengzi and want to escape. If you don't even try to accept her flaws, to accept your aversion to her, then to her, it's as if no one is on her side."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “是的。”成医生点头，“你在害怕橙子朋友，也想逃避，如果你都不尝试去接受她的不好，去接受你所对她的厌恶，那么在她那里就相当于没人站在她的身边。”

0082.en: "This is very important for the treatment!"
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: “这对治疗来说，很重要！”

0082.en: Hearing the word "important" from Dr. Cheng for the first time, Su Tao nodded seriously, "I understand, Dr. Cheng. Thank you for your guidance today!"
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 第一次从成医生口中说出重要两个字，苏桃严肃地点了点头，“我明白了成医生，谢谢您今天的开解！”

0082.en: Dr. Cheng replied, "You're welcome. I told you, as doctors, we often use this method to help patients sort out their thoughts. At most, I can spare some time to chat with you, I can't help you much more."
0082.speaker: 成医生
0082.cn: 成医生应了一下，“不用客气，我说了吧，作为医生，我们面对病人也经常会用这样的方式去梳理病人的想法，我最多抽空陪你聊聊，帮不到你更多。”

0082.en: Of course, as a psychologist, while sorting out thoughts.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 当然，作为心理医生，梳理想法的同时。

0082.en: One can also guide thoughts.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 也可以引导想法。

0082.en: Oh, Taotao, how can you escape from the palm of my hand?
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: 桃桃哟，你又怎么逃得出我的手掌心呢？

0082.en: I, Xiaocheng, am so cute, do you really not like me?
0082.speaker: 池小橙
0082.cn: 小橙我那么可爱，你难道就真的不喜欢吗？

0082.en: The call ended.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 电话挂断。

0082.en: Su Tao let out a long breath. After understanding what she needed to do and think, the depression in her heart eased a lot.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 苏桃长长吐了一口浊气，明白了自己要做的事情和想法后，心中的抑郁空了不少。

0082.en: Recalling Dr. Cheng's words, Su Tao murmured in thought, "Try to accept the things I hate, so that Xiaocheng will be happy..."
0082.speaker: 苏桃
0082.cn: 回忆着成医生说的话，苏桃呢喃思考，“尝试去接受我所厌恶的东西，这样小橙才会开心......”

0082.en: She didn't dislike Chi Xiaocheng, she was just a little afraid of her yandere side. So what was there to hate?
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 她并不讨厌池小橙，只是有些害怕她的病娇，这样又有什么是厌恶的呢？

0082.en: As she was thinking this, Su Tao suddenly thought of something.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 如是想着，苏桃陡然想到了什么。

0082.en: She slowly turned her head and looked at the leftover from yesterday
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 缓缓转头，看向了昨天喝剩下的

0082.en: Half a bottle of white wine.
0082.speaker: 旁白
0082.cn: 半瓶白酒。

0083.en: Chapter 83: A Tribute to the Stress-Resistant Lao Tao
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 第83章 致敬抗压王牢桃

0083.en: Su Tao hated drinking.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 苏桃很讨厌喝酒。

0083.en: The dizziness prevented her from thinking rationally.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 脑袋变晕会让她无法理智地去思考。

0083.en: She also disliked the burning and spicy sensation.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 滚烫和火辣的感觉也不喜欢。

0083.en: But she still poured herself another glass. Su Tao closed her eyes, tilted her head back, and practically pinched her nose to force herself to drink it.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 但她还是重新给自己倒了一杯，苏桃闭上眼睛抬高脑袋，几乎是捏紧鼻子强迫自己给喝下去。

0083.en: Still spicy, incredibly unpleasant.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 依旧火辣，难受无比。

0083.en: Unlike Coke or Sprite, some people can't handle the sour and choking sensation of sparkling water at first, but they get used to it after drinking it more.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 和乐可雪碧不一样，气泡水部分人会接受不了入口时的酸爽呛人感，但喝多了也会觉得还好。

0083.en: But alcohol is something that the vast majority of people can never get used to, no matter how much they drink.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 而酒却是绝大多数人怎么喝都接受不了的。

0083.en: Su Tao found it hard to imagine that she would choose to drink.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 苏桃也很难想象，自己竟然会选择去喝酒。

0083.en: However, it was precisely after taking a sip of alcohol, when she was no longer so clear-headed and rational, that she could think about things she normally wouldn't.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 不过也正是喝了一口酒，自己变得不再那么清醒理智，她就能去思考一些往常想不到的事情。

0083.en: Su Tao leaned against the washstand, resting for a long while.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 苏桃扶在洗漱台边，休息了好一阵子。

0083.en: Panting heavily.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 大口大口地喘着粗气。

0083.en: The white wine was too strong; she was already struggling after just two sips.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 白酒度数太高，光是喝两口她就已经要受不了了。

0083.en: She wanted to use her drunken state to figure out what it was she detested.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 想借着醉酒的状态去思考自己厌恶的又是什么。

0083.en: Was it Chi Xiaocheng's suffocating and heavy love?
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 是池小橙那窒息又沉重的爱吗？

0083.en: Did she hate it, like it, or was she running away from it?
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 自己到底是讨厌，还是喜欢，还是逃避？

0083.en: After rinsing her mouth, Su Tao put away the remaining white wine and picked up her phone to check the time.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 漱了个口后，苏桃将剩下的白酒放好，拿起手机看了眼时间。

0083.en: "At this time, has Xiaocheng already fallen asleep?"
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: “这个时候，小橙会不会已经睡着了？”

0083.en: Su Tao thought for a moment and sent a message to Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, are you asleep?"
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: 苏桃想了想，给池小橙发过去了一条消息，“小橙睡了吗？”

0083.en: Chi Xiaocheng replied in a second, "Not yet, Taotao, what's up?"
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: 池小橙秒回，“还没睡呢，桃桃有什么事吗？”

0083.en: Su Tao: "How is your recovery? Sorry, I had some things to deal with at school today and have been busy. Do you need me to come to the hospital?"
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: 苏桃：“身体恢复得怎么样，抱歉今天学校里有些事情需要我处理，一直在忙，需要我去医院吗？”

0083.en: She had clearly slept at home all day, she really couldn't lie.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 明明是在家睡了一天，真是不会说谎。

0083.en: In the hospital, Chi Xiaocheng leaned against the bed, a helpless smile on her face.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 医院中，池小橙靠在床上，笑容无奈。

0083.en: Of course, she was incredibly eager to see Su Tao.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 她当然无比期望见到苏桃。

0083.en: But a girl who is too straightforward is not cute.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 但太直的女孩子并不可爱。

0083.en: So Chi Xiaocheng replied, "It's okay, Taotao, I can manage on my own. You must be tired after a long day, don't worry about me. Although it's a bit lonely and boring by myself, I can't let my things affect you, Taotao."
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: 于是池小橙回复道，“没事的桃桃，我一个人也行的，你忙了一天也很累吧，不用在意我哦，虽然一个人是有点寂寞无聊，但不能因为我影响到桃桃你的事情呢。”

0083.en: Seeing this message, Su Tao felt much more at ease.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 见到这条消息，苏桃心中安定了许多。

0083.en: Undoubtedly, Xiaocheng had broken out of her yandere state and returned to normal.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 毫无疑问，小橙已经脱离了病娇状态，恢复了正常。

0083.en: A little clingy, but very sensible and caring, and wouldn't cause her too much trouble.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 稍微有些黏人，但很懂事，也很关心自己，不会过多去给自己带来麻烦。

0083.en: Compared to that extreme love, Su Tao definitely preferred the normal Xiaocheng.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 相对那样极端的爱，果然还是这样正常的小橙更让苏桃喜欢。

0083.en: "I should still go to the hospital, just to keep her company and stabilize her emotions."
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: “还是得去一趟医院才行，就当陪陪她稳定一下情绪。”

0083.en: After sending a message to Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao got up and went into her room to put on a down jacket.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 苏桃给池小橙发过去了消息后，起身进房间披了件羽绒服。

0083.en: She returned to the living room and picked up her ladies' watch from the table.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 又回到客厅，从桌面拿起自己的女士腕表。

0083.en: Glancing at the sachet next to the watch, Su Tao couldn't help but be stunned for a moment.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 瞥见腕表边的香囊后，苏桃不禁愣了一下。

0083.en: "Isn't the sachet on my body?"
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: “香囊不是带在身上吗？”

0083.en: Sleeping in Chi Xiaocheng's room, she had clearly smelled the faint fragrance of the sachet before and after she slept.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 睡在池小橙的房间里，她睡前和睡醒，分明都闻到了香囊散发的淡淡清香。

0083.en: Familiar and pleasant.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 熟悉又喜欢。

0083.en: "The stress must be getting to me, I'm starting to hallucinate."
0083.speaker: 苏桃
0083.cn: “果然是压力太大了，都产生幻觉了。”

0083.en: Su Tao shook her head, tied the sachet to her waist, and went out.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 苏桃摇摇头，将香囊系在腰间，出了门。

0083.en: And in the hospital, Chi Xiaocheng leaned against the hospital bed, waiting quietly, and couldn't help but sigh to herself, "What a surprise, Taotao actually chose to use alcohol to numb herself."
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: 而在医院的池小橙，靠在病床上静静等待，心中也不禁感叹，“真是意外，桃桃竟然会选择用酒精去麻痹自己。”

0083.en: It was obvious that she hated drinking.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 看得出来，她讨厌喝酒。

0083.en: But she thought that being drunk would help her better understand her own feelings.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 但她以为醉了后能更好地感觉到自己的心意。

0083.en: But if you get really drunk, you can't think clearly and it's hard to understand what you're doing. You'll just forget everything that happened when you were drunk after you wake up.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 可真地喝醉，不清醒反而难以理解自己在做什么，醒来后照样忘记喝醉后的事情。

0083.en: [Host, you probably don't need to keep pressuring Su Tao anymore, right?]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【宿主，接下来应该就不需要给苏桃继续上压力了吧？】

0083.en: "She's so tired, of course she needs to rest for a while. I wonder how Dongfang Yang and my brother are doing. If Ye Liang doesn't cause trouble, there's no need to put so much pressure on her for a short time."
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: “她都那么累了，自然要先休息一阵子，也不知道东方阳和哥哥那怎么样了，如果叶良不搞事的话，短时间是不用上那么大压力了。”

0083.en: [Just not that much?]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【只是不那么大？】

0083.en: Chi Xiaocheng said, "There has to be some, otherwise how can I keep her thinking about me? If she doesn't take the initiative to de-stress, my next plan can't be executed."
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: 池小橙道，“有自然得要有一点，不然怎么让她一直对我念念不忘呢，她不主动去解压的话，我的下一步计划也无法执行。”

0083.en: The system was silent for a moment upon hearing this.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 系统闻言，沉默了一阵。

0083.en: [A tribute to the legendary stress-resistant Lao Tao]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【致敬传奇抗压王牢桃】

0083.en: It's a good thing the original author of the novel made Su Tao's character so perfect. If it were anyone else being pushed like this step by step, they would have gone crazy long ago.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 得亏小说原作者将苏桃的人设立得完美，换个人来被这样步步紧逼，早该疯了。

0083.en: As a great villain system, even He couldn't help but feel sorry for Su Tao.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 作为一个大反派系统，祂都不禁为苏桃感到可怜。

0083.en: "By the way, how many emotion points do I have now?"
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: “说起来，我情绪值现在有多少了？”

0083.en: [After deducting the 1000 emotion points the host spent on buying the original novel, there are currently 2435 emotion points left]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【扣除宿主购买小说原著又花费的1000情绪值外，目前还剩2435点情绪值】

0083.en: [Among them, the male lead Ye Liang contributed the most emotion points to the host, followed by the female lead Su Tao, and then the supporting characters Chi Song and Dongfang Yang]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【其中，男主叶良为宿主贡献的情绪值最多，其次是女主苏桃，再往后是配角池松和东方阳】

0083.en: Ye Liang already wanted to kill her, so of course he would contribute a lot of emotion points.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 叶良都恨不得杀了自己了，贡献的情绪值能不多吗。

0083.en: As one of the male leads, even without a halo, with his background and power, Chi Xiaocheng couldn't really eliminate him.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 作为男主之一，即便没有光环，就他的背景势力，池小橙也无法真的铲除他。

0083.en: The young master of the Ye family in the capital, and the president of one of the leading enterprises in Jiuzhou City, if a person of such status were to fall, the retaliation from the forces behind him would definitely be stronger than Ye Liang's own retaliation.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 京城叶家的少爷，又是九州市龙头企业之一的总裁，这样身份的人一旦落幕，他背后势力对自己的报复，绝对会比叶良本人的报复还要强。

0083.en: In the world of this female-oriented novel, the connections of these family chaebols are spread all over the Great Zhou Nation, and the law may not even be able to sanction them.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 这女频小说的世界观下，这些家族财阀的关系遍布大周国各处，法律都不一定能制裁他们。

0083.en: Once the fish dies and the net breaks, before the return of her war god father, she and Su Tao would only be lambs to the slaughter.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 一旦鱼死网破，在战神老爹回归之前，她和苏桃都只会是待宰的羔羊。

0083.en: A faint sense of unease still lingered in Chi Xiaocheng's heart.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 淡淡的不安依旧萦绕在池小橙的内心。

0083.en: "System, give me a ten-pull."
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: “系统，来个十连抽吧。”

0083.en: Chi Xiaocheng needed a skill that was stronger than blackening and that she could actively control.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 池小橙需要一个比黑化更强，并且还能主动控制的技能。

0083.en: It would be great if she could draw a Son of Fortune's halo to bless herself.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 能抽个气运之子的光环加持给自己就好了。

0083.en: [Ten-pull in progress, congratulations to the host for obtaining the following items]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【十连抽进行中，恭喜宿主获得以下物品】

0083.en: Nine white and one gold.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 九白一金。

0083.en: This ten-pull didn't have the usual good luck, it hit the pity.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 这次十连抽没有往常的好运，吃了保底。

0083.en: [Obtained Otaku Happy Water*3 (Drinking it can reduce 10 pounds of useless fat, the first choice for weight loss)]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【获得瘦宅快乐水*3（喝了可减10斤无用的脂肪，减肥首选）】

0083.en: [Obtained Snow White's Poisoned Apple*1 (A bad luck poisoned apple cursed by the evil queen, eating it will bring a lifetime of bad luck)]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【获得白雪公主的毒苹果*1（被恶毒皇后施加了诅咒的霉运毒苹果，吃下后将会有霉运伴随一生）】

0083.en: [Obtained Su Tao and Xiaocheng dual figure*1 (A dual figure full of otaku atmosphere, a top-quality handicraft, staring at the figure for a long time will lead to a trance, and it is easy to have lucid dreams when sleeping)]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【获得苏桃小橙双人手办*1（充满二次元气息的双人手办，顶尖工艺制品，长时间凝视手办会陷入恍惚，睡觉的时候容易做清醒梦）】

0083.en: [Chengzi Brand Sanitary Set*4 (A full set of female personal hygiene products, the first choice for menstruation)]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【橙子牌卫生套装*4（全套女生自用卫生用品，生理期首选）】

0083.en: [Congratulations to the host for obtaining the skill: Disguise (Intermediate)]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【恭喜宿主获得技能：易容（中级）】

0083.en: [Disguise (Intermediate): The host can disguise herself as another person, and her appearance, height, bones, etc. can be freely changed, but she cannot violate the basic settings of the human body. It is limited to females, can be used once a week, and the disguise lasts for 3 hours]
0083.speaker: 系统
0083.cn: 【易容（中级）：宿主可以易容伪装成她人，外貌、身高、骨骼等都可以自由变化，但无法违背人体基础设定，仅限女性，每周可用一次，易容伪装持续时间：3小时】

0083.en: Chi Xiaocheng's focus was naturally on the skill first, it wasn't the attack-type skill she was hoping for.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 池小橙的重点，自然是率先放在技能身上，不是她期待的攻击类技能。

0083.en: But the operability of this skill is very high!
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 但这个技能的可操作性却非常高！

0083.en: Unfortunately, it's limited to females, otherwise Chi Xiaocheng's Dr. Cheng persona could be brought to the forefront to further "treat" Su Tao.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 可惜仅限女性，否则池小橙那成医生的马甲，就能走上台面去进一步“治疗”苏桃。

0083.en: Besides that, there was the poisoned apple and the figure.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 此外就是毒苹果，手办

0083.en: Chi Xiaocheng really wanted to take them out and have a look, but the doctor was coming soon. If the doctor thought she wanted to eat the apple and helped her peel it, it would be a huge misunderstanding.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 池小橙很想拿出来看看，但一会儿医生就要来了，万一医生以为她想吃苹果帮忙削给她，这乌龙可就大了。

0083.en: So she suppressed her curiosity and quietly waited for Su Tao to arrive.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 索性按捺好奇的心，池小橙静静等着苏桃到来。

0083.en: The half-open door was finally knocked on gently.
0083.speaker: 旁白
0083.cn: 半遮半掩的房门终于被轻轻敲了一下。

0083.en: Seeing the pretty girl walk in with short boots, Chi Xiaocheng raised a cute smile, "Taotao, good evening~"
0083.speaker: 池小橙
0083.cn: 见俏丽少女迈着短靴走进，池小橙扬起可爱的笑容，“桃桃，晚上好~”

0084.en: Chapter 84: My Love for You is Fake
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 第84章 我对你的喜欢，是装的

0084.en: Her soft, brown hair was draped over her shoulders, and the cool light and shadow intertwined on Chi Xiaocheng's delicate, pale face.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 柔顺的茶色秀发披散肩头，色调微冷的光影交织在池小橙虚弱的小脸上。

0084.en: The moment she saw Su Tao, a smile bloomed, revealing shallow dimples.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 见到苏桃的那一刻，笑颜绽放，展露梨涡浅浅。

0084.en: She looked especially cute like this.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 这样的她，显得尤为可爱。

0084.en: This smile reassured Su Tao greatly. She carried some fruit and sat down beside Chi Xiaocheng, "How are you feeling?"
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 这样的笑容让苏桃安心了许多，她提着一些水果，来到了池小橙身边坐下，“身体怎么样？”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat up a little, her voice lively, "The moment I saw Taotao, my body told me there was nothing wrong!"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙坐直了一点，声线活泼，“在见到桃桃的那一刻，我的身体就已经告诉我没有任何问题了！”

0084.en: Su Tao lowered her head, tucked Chi Xiaocheng's fair, tender feet that were exposed outside the blanket back in, and then looked at her waist with a pained expression.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃低着头，将池小橙露在被子外面的白嫩小脚塞了回去，又心疼地看了眼她的腰部。

0084.en: Almost instinctively, she said with concern, "Xiaocheng, don't hurt yourself next time, okay?"
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 几乎是下意识地关心说道，“小橙，下次别伤害自己了，好吗？”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng blinked, pretending not to understand, "Taotao, what are you talking about? I didn't hurt myself."
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙眨了眨眼睛，假装听不懂，“桃桃你在说什么啊，我没伤害自己呀。”

0084.en: Su Tao paused, a bitter smile flashing across her face, then she put on an indignant expression, "Damn Ye Liang!"
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃顿了一下，苦涩的笑容一闪而逝，转而演出了一副愤然的表情，“该死的叶良！”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded in agreement, "My brother told me. It's a pity he didn't cripple him. He even dared to make Taotao his maid. I curse him to never get out of bed in the hospital!"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙深有所感地点了点头，“我听哥哥说了，可惜没把他打残，他竟然还敢让桃桃你去当女仆，诅咒他永远在医院下不来床！”

0084.en: Su Tao's mouth opened slightly.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃小嘴张了张。

0084.en: Then she lowered her head and said nothing.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 又低下头没有说话。

0084.en: So, it was because of the maid?
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 原来，是因为女仆吗？

0084.en: Although the dark room incident was over, her being Ye Liang's maid was only put on hold.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 小黑屋事件虽然过去了，但她当叶良女仆的事情却只是被搁置。

0084.en: And in Xiaocheng's eyes, even if this was avoided this time, it would still happen next time.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 而在小橙眼中，这件事这一次避免了，下一次依旧会发生。

0084.en: So she decided to go all out.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 所以才一不做二不休

0084.en: Forcing herself to completely break ties with Ye Liang!
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 逼迫自己彻底与叶良断绝关系！

0084.en: Su Tao's eyes were complex.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃眼神复杂。

0084.en: There was no blame in her gaze towards Chi Xiaocheng; this was just another version of self-inflicted suffering.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 看向池小橙时没有责怪的意思，这只是另一个版本的自作孽。

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng becoming a yandere, kidnapping herself in the basement, wanting to jump from the rooftop, and even this self-harm and framing.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 池小橙变成病娇，在地下室绑架自己，想从天台跳下去，甚至这次的自我伤害并嫁祸。

0084.en: All the consequences were caused by her own actions.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 一切的果，都是她自己种的因。

0084.en: Su Tao closed her eyes and slowly emptied her mind.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃闭上了双眼，缓缓放空自己的大脑后。

0084.en: She let out a long sigh.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 长吁一口气。

0084.en: Forget it, what's done is done and can't be undone. Since she had already made a complete decision, she shouldn't think about Ye Liang anymore. His nature wasn't good either.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 算了，事情已经发生无可挽回，既然已经彻底决断就不要再去想叶良了，他的本性，也不是什么好人。

0084.en: The important task now was to...
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 现在重要的任务是。

0084.en: Soothe Xiaocheng's emotions, actively try to accept her yandere side, and take the first step towards gradual treatment.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 安抚小橙的情绪，主动尝试去接受她的病娇，为之后循序渐进的治疗迈出第一步。

0084.en: After Su Tao figured this out, she slowly looked up.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃想通这些后，缓缓抬头。

0084.en: She found that Chi Xiaocheng had been watching her, so their eyes naturally met.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 发现池小橙一直在看着她，于是很自然地就对上了视线。

0084.en: The petite loli tilted her head and smiled, "What are you thinking about, Taotao?"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 娇小的萝莉歪头一笑，“桃桃在想什么？”

0084.en: Su Tao's tone became much lighter, "I'm thinking about what hobbies Xiaocheng usually has."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃语气轻松了许多，“在想小橙平时有什么爱好。”

0084.en: "Are we going to develop common hobbies?" Chi Xiaocheng's eyes lit up, her expectant expression like a child seeing a toy.
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: “要培养共同爱好了吗？”池小橙双眼亮了起来，期待的表情就宛如小孩子看到了玩具。

0084.en: Then she said with a happy face, "This is indeed something couples do."
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 继而一脸幸福地说道，“这确实是情侣间会做的事情呢。”

0084.en: Couple.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 情侣

0084.en: Su Tao naturally wouldn't admit to this identity, but going along with Chi Xiaocheng's meaning to soothe her emotions, she didn't directly deny it.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃自然不会这样承认了这个身份，但顺着池小橙的意思，安抚她的情绪，也就没直接否认。

0084.en: "What do you like to do when you're alone, Xiaocheng?"
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: “小橙一个人的时候，喜欢做什么呢？”

0084.en: "Watch anime!"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: “看动漫！”

0084.en: Su Tao continued to ask, "Then what kind of anime do you like to watch, Xiaocheng?"
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃继续问：“那小橙喜欢看什么类型的动漫呢？”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng answered innocently, "Anime about girls and girls."
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙天真烂漫地回答道，“女孩子和女孩子的动漫。”

0084.en: Instantly, Su Tao's smile froze.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 霎时，苏桃的笑容就僵了一下。

0084.en: How was she supposed to respond to this topic?
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 这样的话题要怎么接？

0084.en: Waiting online, it's urgent.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 在线等，挺急的。

0084.en: The observant Chi Xiaocheng noticed Su Tao's expression and slowly asked, "What's wrong, Taotao? Do you hate girls?"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 细心的池小橙注意到了苏桃的表情，缓缓问道，“怎么了桃桃，难道你讨厌女孩子吗？”

0084.en: Su Tao quickly shook her head, "No, I don't hate them."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃连忙摇头，“没有，不讨厌。”

0084.en: "Exactly." Chi Xiaocheng looked directly at Su Tao and slowly said, "Girls are fragrant, soft, super comfortable to hold, and obedient and well-behaved. They are simply the best treasures in the world!"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: “就是啊。”池小橙直视着苏桃，缓缓说道，“女孩子香香的，软软的，抱在怀里超舒服，又乖巧、听话，简直是世界上最棒的瑰宝！”

0084.en: And the girl who was being stared at by those crimson eyes nervously looked away, "Y-yes."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 而被那双赤瞳直视的少女，心虚地挪开眼睛，“是...是啊。”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng sighed again, "Alas, my brother also told me that boys are clumsy and not good, and that he wants to find a girl to take care of me in the future."
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙又叹了口气，“唉，哥哥还跟我说，男孩子粗枝大叶的不好，说以后想找个女孩子来照顾我来着。”

0084.en: As soon as she said this, it brought up a message Chi Song had asked her last time.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 此话一出，就勾起了上次池松询问她的一条消息。

0084.en: —Xiaotao, do you like my sister?
0084.speaker: 池松
0084.cn: ——小桃，你喜欢我妹妹吗？

0084.en: Brother Chi Song wants to find a girl to take care of Xiaocheng, and be with Xiaocheng.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 池松哥想找个女孩子照顾小橙，和小橙一起。

0084.en: So that's why he messaged me then?
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 所以那时才给我发消息？

0084.en: And just now, Auntie also seemed to imply that she wanted me and Xiaocheng to be together.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 还有刚刚，伯母好像也有让自己和小橙在一起的意思。

0084.en: This...
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 这

0084.en: Su Tao shrank her neck, not daring to think further.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃缩了缩脖子，不太敢继续去往下想了。

0084.en: She also didn't want to continue this topic.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 也不想继续聊这个话题。

0084.en: However, fortunately, Chi Xiaocheng in her normal state was thoughtful and considerate.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 不过好在，常态下的池小橙是细心体贴了。

0084.en: Perhaps sensing her embarrassment, she yawned and lay down, "Taotao, I'm a little sleepy~"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 兴许是看出了她的窘迫，于是打着哈欠躺了下来，“桃桃，我有点困了~”

0084.en: Su Tao came back to her senses, "If you're sleepy, then sleep. Your body hasn't recovered yet, rest is the most important thing."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃回神，“困了就睡觉吧，你身体还没恢复，最重要的还是休息。”

0084.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded and held out a small hand, "Then can Taotao hold my hand? Can you let go after I fall asleep?"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 池小橙点了点头，伸出一只小手，“那桃桃能握着我的手吗，等我睡着了再松开，可以吗？”

0084.en: "Of course."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: “当然可以。”

0084.en: Su Tao took Chi Xiaocheng's right hand, transferring her own warmth.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃牵过池小橙的右手，传递自身的温度。

0084.en: She showed a gentle smile at the right time, and just watched Chi Xiaocheng fall asleep.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 适时露出一个温柔的笑容，就这样看着池小橙入睡。

0084.en: In less than ten minutes, the petite loli on the hospital bed was emitting steady, faint, and adorable snores.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 才十分钟不到，病床上娇小的萝莉，就发出了平稳而又微小可爱的鼾声。

0084.en: Su Tao couldn't help but reach out and smooth her hair.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃情不自禁地伸手，为她顺了一下秀发。

0084.en: She continued to sit there, looking at her face.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 又继续坐在这里，看着她的容颜。

0084.en: Cute.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 可爱。

0084.en: Two words summarized everything about her.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 两个字，概括了她的一切。

0084.en: The warmth transferred from her palm also made Su Tao feel enjoyment.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 掌心传递的温度。也让苏桃感到享受。

0084.en: Normally, with her mind constantly tense, she wouldn't pay attention to so many details related to Chi Xiaocheng. Now, feeling it carefully, she increasingly felt that Chi Xiaocheng's skin was delicate and soft.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 平时精神紧绷的她，根本不会去注意那么多和池小橙有关的细节，现在细细感受下，就愈发觉得，池小橙的肌肤细腻柔软。

0084.en: Her small hand was easy to hold, the back of her hand was smooth, her fingertips were tender, and the warmth it conveyed made her not want to let go.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 小小的手很容易握住，手背柔滑，指尖娇嫩，传递的温暖让人不想松开。

0084.en: However, from her wrist upwards, the part covered by the long sleeve, her smooth arm had some flaws.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 只是自手腕往上，被长袖遮住的部分，光洁的手臂又有些瑕疵。

0084.en: It became even more obvious after gently pulling up the sleeve.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 将袖子轻轻往上提后更为明显。

0084.en: Some of the faded marks, Su Tao recognized at a glance as those left from the rooftop incident, which had almost disappeared by now.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 部分淡去的，苏桃一眼就认出来那是天台时留下的，到现在已经消去得差不多了。

0084.en: But what happened in the past could not be erased.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 可往日发生的事情无法消去。

0084.en: Su Tao's mood sank slightly.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃心情沉下些许。

0084.en: In the dark room, she had vaguely felt it.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 在小黑屋时，她就隐隐感觉到了。

0084.en: Aside from the food always being terrible, every now and then, her sight and hearing would be deprived by Chi Xiaocheng.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 除了每次吃的东西是黑暗料理外，每隔一段时间，自己都会被池小橙剥夺视听。

0084.en: During that time, Xiaocheng didn't know what she was doing.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 那段时间小橙不知道做些什么。

0084.en: But she could feel it.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 但她可以感受得出来。

0084.en: That was Chi Xiaocheng's madness after becoming a yandere.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 那是池小橙病娇后癫狂。

0084.en: After becoming a yandere, she would want to hurt others, hurt herself. Perhaps she just couldn't control it and used pain to try to regain her sanity.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 病娇后会想伤害她人，伤害自己，兴许她就是控制不住，采用疼痛想着夺回理智。

0084.en: It was just that she had never dared to think in that direction and subconsciously avoided it.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 只是她一直不敢往那个方向去想，并下意识地去逃避而已。

0084.en: No wonder the medical report said she was physically weak.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 难怪病例报告会说她身体虚弱。

0084.en: If she tried to accept her, would such things happen again in the future?
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 那自己试着去接受她的话，以后会不会也发生这样的事情？

0084.en: The thought alone was suffocating.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 想想就让人窒息。

0084.en: Su Tao didn't dare to think further and wanted to pull her hand away to rest.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 苏桃不敢往下去想，想将手抽出去休息。

0084.en: Just as she got up, she was suddenly pulled back forcefully by Chi Xiaocheng.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 才起身，却被池小橙猛地用力拉住。

0084.en: She looked at Chi Xiaocheng, but found that the latter was sleeping soundly, and holding her hand was completely an unconscious reluctance.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 她看向池小橙，却发现后者睡得深沉，拉住她的手完全是下意识地不舍。

0084.en: The petite loli murmured in her sleep, "Taotao... don't abandon me..."
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 娇小的萝莉于睡梦中，呢喃轻语，“桃桃...不要抛弃我......”

0084.en: Su Tao's heart softened again upon hearing this, and she sat back down, "Don't worry, Xiaocheng, I won't abandon you, never."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃闻言，心底又是一软，坐了回去，“小橙放心吧，我不会抛弃的，永远不会。”

0084.en: Her voice was very soft, but Chi Xiaocheng seemed to have vaguely heard her words and mumbled in her sleep, "Taotao, I... like you, do you... like me?"
0084.speaker: 池小橙
0084.cn: 她声音很轻，但池小橙好像迷迷糊糊地听到了她的话，梦呓回复，“桃桃，我...喜欢你，你...喜欢我吗？”

0084.en: Su Tao's expression became complicated. She gently patted Chi Xiaocheng's small hand, "Xiaocheng, I like you too."
0084.speaker: 苏桃
0084.cn: 苏桃表情复杂了起来，轻轻拍了一下池小橙的小手，“小橙，我也喜欢你哦。”

0084.en: However, I'm sorry, Xiaocheng, my love for you is fake.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 不过，对不起小橙，我对你的喜欢，是装的。

0084.en: After silently adding this sentence in her heart, the hand that was holding her, not letting her go, loosened.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 她在心底默默补了这一句后，抓住她不让走的手，松了开来。

0084.en: Until Su Tao left, she didn't notice that Chi Xiaocheng's lips had a faint smile from beginning to end.
0084.speaker: 旁白
0084.cn: 直至苏桃离去她都没发现，池小橙的唇角，自始至终都挂着浅浅的笑意。

0085.en: Chapter 85: Tasting Her Yandere Side (Extra chapter for Kongtian Longqing)
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 第85章 品尝她的病娇（为空天垄清加更）

0085.en: Early the next morning, Su Tao woke up early and began her daily routine.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 次日清晨，苏桃早早地就起了床，开始一天的日常。

0085.en: After tiptoeing so as not to wake her roommates and finishing her ablutions, she changed into sportswear and went out.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 蹑手蹑脚地不吵醒舍友洗漱完毕后，换了一套运动装便出了门。

0085.en: Yesterday the sun was out, it didn't snow, and the weather wasn't that cold, so she resumed her usual exercise.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 昨天出了太阳，没下雪，天气没那么冷，她也就恢复了往日的锻炼。

0085.en: While keeping her body from rusting, she also maintained a good figure.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 不让自己身体生锈的同时，也保持良好的身材。

0085.en: After breakfast, she went to the hospital to chat with Chi Xiaocheng for an hour, then returned to school.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 吃过早餐，去医院陪池小橙聊了一小时的天，便回到了学校。

0085.en: Classes, studying, occasionally being asked by classmates to help with trivial matters, or being summoned by the counselor like a workhorse.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 上课、学习、偶尔被同学拜托帮忙做些琐事，或是被辅导员当作牛马呼来唤去。

0085.en: After lunch, she went to a snack supermarket near the school to work a shift until evening, when her time would free up a bit.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 中午吃了饭，去学校附近的一家零食超市接班打工，一直到晚上，她的时间才会闲下些许。

0085.en: After visiting Chi Xiaocheng in the hospital again, Su Tao returned to her dorm, studying for her driving test while thinking about what Dr. Cheng had said.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 又去看望了一下在医院的池小橙后，苏桃回了宿舍，一边刷科目四的题，一边思考成医生说的话。

0085.en: Find like-minded friends, chat, and expand hobbies.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 找志同道合的朋友，聊天、拓展爱好。

0085.en: Thinking of this, she first looked at Chen Qian and her roommate.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 想到这，她先是看了眼陈倩和舍友。

0085.en: Chen Qian was looking in the mirror, humming a song happily.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 陈倩在一旁照镜子，心情畅快地哼着歌。

0085.en: As far as Su Tao knew, ever since her routine became regular and the blackheads and acne on her face and nose decreased, she had become more and more vain, constantly looking in the mirror and taking selfies.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 据苏桃所知，自从她作息规律，脸和鼻子的黑头、痘痘都变少后，就变得越来越臭美，经常照镜子和自拍。

0085.en: Another roommate was sleeping in bed, snoring, but still playing a web drama out loud.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 另一个舍友在床上睡觉，明明在打鼾，却依旧外放着某个网剧的声音。

0085.en: There were only three people in the four-person dorm, and one had rented a room outside because of her boyfriend and rarely came back.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 四人间的宿舍就三个人，还有一个因为男朋友的原因在外租了房，很少回来。

0085.en: Su Tao hesitated for a moment, but decided not to drag the two of them into this.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃犹豫了一下，还是决定不拉二人下水。

0085.en: If Xiaocheng had an episode, they would be in danger.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 万一小橙发病，她们就危险了。

0085.en: Opening WeChat, Su Tao was wondering whether to casually add some online friends when she suddenly found someone had added her.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 点开微信，苏桃寻思要不要随便找点网友加时候，却发现忽然有人加了自己的好友。

0085.en: WeChat ID: Chengcheng.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 微信ID：程程。

0085.en: Avatar: An unknown anime girl with green hair, making a peace sign, winking, and greeting cutely with her head tilted.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 头像：一个二次元绿色头发不认识的小女孩，她比了个剪刀手，睁一只眼闭一只眼歪头可爱地打招呼。

0085.en: Below it was a line of emoticons: Ciallo～(∠・ω＜)⌒☆
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 下面还有一行颜文字：Ciallo～(∠・ω＜)⌒☆

0085.en: Source: People nearby.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 来源：附近的人。

0085.en: Friend request message: Hello, WeChat pushes a nearby person to me every day, and today it's you. Meeting is fate, how about adding each other as friends?
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 加好友留言：哈喽，微信每天都会给我推一个附近的人，今天是你欸，相逢即是有缘，加个好友怎么样？

0085.en: Su Tao clicked on Chengcheng's Moments.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃点了程程的朋友圈。

0085.en: Landscape photos, anime convention return photos, complaints about anime, occasionally saying things like "hungry, need food," almost two posts a day.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 风景照、漫展返图、对二次元动画的吐槽、偶尔说些什么饿饿饭饭之类的话，几乎一天发两条朋友圈。

0085.en: "She seems like a very cheerful girl, and her location is Jiuzhou Art Media Academy?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: “好像是一个非常开朗的女孩子，坐标定位是九州艺术传媒学院？”

0085.en: It was only 20 kilometers away from her Jiuzhou University.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 距离自己九州大学就20公里的路程。

0085.en: And she was also an otaku.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 而且还是个二次元。

0085.en: Xiaocheng also seemed to like anime?
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 小橙似乎喜欢的也是二次元动漫？

0085.en: It fit what Dr. Cheng said about online friends.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 很符合成医生说的，网络朋友。

0085.en: So Su Tao clicked to add her as a friend and took the initiative to say, "Hello, I'm Taozi."
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 于是苏桃点击添加了对方的好友，并主动开口道，“你好呀，我是桃子。”

0085.en: As soon as the message was sent, the other party replied immediately.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 消息一出去，对面立马就回复了。

0085.en: And her tone was very surprised.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 并且口吻很是惊讶。

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Oh my goodness, I actually added a friend!"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“我勒个豆，竟然真的加上好友了！”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "I add a nearby person every day, whoever WeChat pushes to me, I push to them, but 99% of them think I'm looking for a hookup. I finally added a real friend!"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“我每天都会加一个附近的人，微信给我推谁我推谁，但99%的都以为我是来约的，终于是真的加上好友了！”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Miss Taozi, or Brother Taozi? Thank you for adding me!"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“桃子小姐，还是桃子兄弟？谢谢你加我好友！”

0085.en: Su Tao looked at the continuous paragraphs of text and emojis, and couldn't help but feel a little embarrassed.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃看着连续几段的文字外加表情包，不禁微微汗颜。

0085.en: This girl was too enthusiastic.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 这女孩，也太热情了吧。

0085.en: Taozi: "I'm a girl, Miss Chengcheng, why do you add a friend every day?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 桃子：“我是女生来着，程程小姐，你这每天加一个好友是为什么呀？”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Do you believe in fate?"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“你相信缘分吗？”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Before, I went to a master to get a fortune stick, and I asked him, where can I find a soulmate?"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“之前我去找一个大师求了一签，我问他，天涯何处觅知音。”

0085.en: Su Tao raised an eyebrow, "What did the master say?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 苏桃挑了挑眉，“大师怎么说？”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "The master said that the soulmate is right in front of you, and you just need to pay 3000 yuan for the fortune stick."
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“大师说知音就在面前，只需要求签费3000块钱。”

0085.en: Su Tao: "..."
0085.speaker: 旁白

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Then he told me that instead of believing in such mysterious things, it's better to add a few nearby people on WeChat, maybe you'll find one. I've been adding for a week, and so far, you're the only one who has accepted my friend request, it's so sad!"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“然后他就告诉我，信那种玄乎的不如微信加几个附近的人，没准就找到了，我加了一周，目前就桃子你一个通过了我的好友，难受啊！”

0085.en: Taozi: "I'm also looking for a friend, please take care of me."
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 桃子：“我也是奔着找个朋友去的，请多关照。”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Then can I chat with you as much as I want later?"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“那我之后可以尽情找你聊天吗？”

0085.en: Su Tao smiled lightly and typed back, "No problem."
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 苏桃抿出轻快的笑容，敲字回道，“没问题。”

0085.en: So this was the stress-relieving chat Dr. Cheng mentioned.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 原来这就是成医生说的聊天解压。

0085.en: Just a few words, text on a phone screen, and the other party's enthusiasm infected Su Tao.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 仅仅是几句话，是手机屏幕中的文字，对方传递的热情就感染了苏桃。

0085.en: It was also nice to confide in a stranger.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 有个不认识的陌生人倾诉一下也不错。

0085.en: After all, no one knew anyone, and if it felt inappropriate, she could just delete the friend.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 毕竟谁也不认识谁，觉得不妥又可以直接删好友。

0085.en: No responsibility, no impact.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 不用负任何责任，也没有任何影响。

0085.en: But Su Tao still underestimated the other party's enthusiasm.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 只是苏桃还是低估了对方的热情。

0085.en: This person with the ID Chengcheng had a personality almost identical to Chi Xiaocheng's when she was little, like a small sun, her cheerfulness could be felt between the lines.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 这个ID叫程程的，性格几乎就是小时候池小橙的翻版，像是小太阳，字里行间都能感受到她的开朗。

0085.en: They chatted for two hours.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 这一聊就聊了两个小时。

0085.en: Su Tao was already in bed when the other party belatedly sent an apology.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃都躺床上了，对方才后知后觉地发来道歉。

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Sorry, I'm usually a chatterbox, I might have said a bit too much, I'm really sorry for disturbing you!"
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“抱歉哈，我平时就是个话痨，可能说的事情多了一点，打扰到你了非常对不起！”

0085.en: Taozi: "It's nothing, I had a great time chatting too."
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 桃子：“没什么，我聊得也很开心。”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "But I've been talking about my own things, Taozi, you should talk about yours too, or if there's anything I can help you with."
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“不过都是我在说我的事情，桃子你也说说你的呗，或者有什么问题我能帮上忙的。”

0085.en: Her reminder made Su Tao immediately realize.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 她这么一提醒，苏桃顿时反应过来。

0085.en: There really was a problem that needed someone else's opinion.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 还真有个需要别人意见的问题。

0085.en: So Su Tao asked, "I have a friend who is quite extreme, she often hurts herself to please me, but I don't like this behavior, and I can't talk to her about it directly. What do you think I should do?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 于是苏桃问道，“我有一个朋友比较极端，经常会伤害自己来取悦我，但我不喜欢这样的做法，可没办法主动和她开口，你觉得怎么办才好啊？”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Hmm, that's simple, isn't it? You just need to make your friend's uncontrollable behavior controllable."
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“唔姆，这很简单的吧，你只要把朋友不可控的行为变得可控就行了。”

0085.en: Taozi: "Controllable?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 桃子：“变得可控？”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Yes, you don't need to say anything at all. When she has such actions or tendencies, just show extreme annoyance, and then express what you want."
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“是呀，你根本就不需要开口，在她有那样的动作或倾向的时候，表现出极度的厌烦就行了，然后表述出你想要的是什么。”

0085.en: Chengcheng: "Since your friend wants to please you, she will naturally change according to your thoughts."
0085.speaker: 程程
0085.cn: 程程：“你朋友既然是想取悦你，那么她自然而然就会顺着你的思想去改变。”

0085.en: Su Tao looked at these two sentences and thought to herself for a while.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃看着这两句话，独自思考了一会儿。

0085.en: This trick wouldn't work on Xiaocheng.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 这招放在小橙身上，没用。

0085.en: Just like on the rooftop last time.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 就像上次在天台。

0085.en: She said she didn't want the gift Chi Xiaocheng gave her, but the more she said that, the more Chi Xiaocheng would become yandere.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 她说了不想要池小橙送的礼物，然而越是那样说池小橙就越要黑化。

0085.en: She wouldn't listen no matter what she said.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 怎么说她都不听。

0085.en: But Chengcheng's words gave Su Tao a new idea.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 但程程的话，却给了苏桃一个新的思路。

0085.en: To make Xiaocheng's uncontrollable behavior controllable, she could actually use words to guide her!
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 把小橙的不可控变得可控，她其实是可以用语言去诱导的呀！

0085.en: Although it might not make Xiaocheng completely normal.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 虽说不一定能让小橙恢复正常。

0085.en: But it could limit her to the greatest extent!
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 但可以最大程度地限制她！

0085.en: Su Tao's eyes gradually lit up, as if she had found a direction for treating Chi Xiaocheng.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃双眼渐渐亮了起来，好似找到了治疗池小橙的方向。

0085.en: She replied to Chengcheng, "Thank you for your suggestion, I'll try it tomorrow!"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 对程程回复道，“谢谢你的提议，我明天就试试！”

0085.en: They said goodnight to each other, and with the sachet's blessing, Su Tao slept soundly.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 互道晚安，在香囊的加持下，苏桃睡得很安稳。

0085.en: Early the next morning, she arrived at Chi Xiaocheng's hospital.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 第二天一早，就来到了池小橙的医院。

0085.en: "Good morning~"
0085.speaker: 池小橙
0085.cn: “早上好~”

0085.en: Facing Chi Xiaocheng's soft and cute greeting, Su Tao's heart couldn't help but beat faster.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 面对池小橙软腻可爱的问候，苏桃的内心不禁加速跳动了起来。

0085.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao strangely, "What's wrong, Taotao? Your expression is a bit strange."
0085.speaker: 池小橙
0085.cn: 池小橙奇怪地看着苏桃，“怎么了桃桃，你的脸色有点奇怪哦。”

0085.en: Su Tao composed herself, sat down next to Chi Xiaocheng, and tentatively asked, "Um, Xiaocheng, if I said I liked something about you, would you be happy?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: 苏桃定了定神，坐到池小橙的身边，试探地问道，“那个小橙，如果我说喜欢你的某一样东西，你会开心吗？”

0085.en: "Yes!" Chi Xiaocheng squinted and smiled, "Of course I'd be happy if Taotao liked me."
0085.speaker: 池小橙
0085.cn: “会呀！”池小橙眯眼笑道，“桃桃能喜欢我我当然开心了。”

0085.en: "Then what if I said I hated something about you?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: “那我要是说讨厌你的某种东西呢？”

0085.en: Chi Xiaocheng thought for a moment, "Then I'd have to find a way to make Taotao like it, after all, Taotao can't hate me~"
0085.speaker: 池小橙
0085.cn: 池小橙想了想，“那我就要想办法让桃桃喜欢上吧，毕竟桃桃不能讨厌我呢~”

0085.en: Her smile was still cute and sweet, but her eyes subtly emitted a hint of danger.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 笑容依旧可爱甜美，只是她的眼神隐约散发出一丝危险。

0085.en: Yes, she was a yandere.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 是的，她是病娇。

0085.en: She wouldn't change, but would force herself to like it.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 不会去改变，而是会去强迫自己喜欢上。

0085.en: Just as Dr. Cheng said, learning to accept what she hated was an important step in treating her.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 正如成医生说的那样，学会去接受所厌恶的东西，是治疗她的重要步骤。

0085.en: Su Tao swallowed, gathered her courage, and looked at Chi Xiaocheng.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫，鼓足勇气看向了池小橙。

0085.en: She slowly spoke.
0085.speaker: 旁白
0085.cn: 缓缓开口。

0085.en: "Then, Xiaocheng, do you want to play a game with me?"
0085.speaker: 苏桃
0085.cn: “那小橙，你要和我一起玩个游戏吗？”

0086.en: Chapter 86: Taotao, You're So Innocent
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 第86章 桃桃真单纯呢

0086.en: A game?
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 游戏？

0086.en: What kind of game? A new one?
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 什么游戏哦，新游戏吗？

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng knew this was Su Tao's subtle way of distracting her.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 池小橙清楚，这其实是苏桃为了转移她注意力的委婉说法。

0086.en: In reality, Su Tao didn't usually play games, so she wasn't talking about anything on a computer.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 实际上苏桃平时都不玩游戏的，这里提的自然也不会是游戏和电脑上的内容。

0086.en: But she still put on a happy smile, her eyes filled with the joyful and possessive desire of seeing a new toy.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 但她还是扬起的笑容，又些开心，眼神又像是看到玩具时欣喜又神奇的占有欲。

0086.en: "What game do you want to play, Taotao? Rock-paper-scissors?"
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: “桃桃想玩什么游戏吗，猜拳？”

0086.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng's cute smile, Su Tao couldn't help but swallow nervously, feeling a bit scared.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 看着池小橙笑眯眯的可爱，苏桃不禁咽了口唾沫，有些害怕。

0086.en: Behind that sweet smile was a terrifying yandere.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 看似笑眯眯，实际上背后的一面就是无比恐怖的病娇。

0086.en: Suppressing her panic, Su Tao said cautiously, "It's not rock-paper-scissors. I'm going to talk about certain things and people, and you have to promise me you won't get angry."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 制止住慌张的想法，苏桃小心翼翼地说道，“不是猜拳，就是我会说某一些事情和某个人，小橙你听到我的话必须不能生气才行。”

0086.en: "Okay!"
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: “嗯嗯！”

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded eagerly, swaying her body slightly as if she were very happy.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 池小橙用力地点了点头，轻轻摇晃身子好似极为高兴。

0086.en: Then she sat down obediently. "Go ahead, Taotao."
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 然后乖巧坐好，“桃桃你说吧。”

0086.en: Su Tao took a deep breath, her expression turning serious, and then said, "Actually... Si Chen has been secretly messaging me, wanting to ask me out."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 苏桃深呼吸了一口气，眼神变得认真，然后开口，“其实……司辰一直有在偷偷找我聊天，想约我出去。”

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng's smile vanished, and her pupils turned a deep red. "Oh? So Si Chen likes Taotao that much. I'll go have a little chat with him."
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 池小橙笑容陡然收敛了一下下，瞳孔陡然变得殷红，“欸~原来司辰这么喜欢桃桃啊，我去和他谈谈心。”

0086.en: The sudden change made Su Tao break out in a cold sweat. "Wait, Xiaocheng! Didn't I tell you? You have to listen to me, or I'll be upset."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 陡然的变化让苏桃汗流浃背，“等一下小橙！我不是说了吗，要听我的，不然我可就不高兴了。”

0086.en: "I see..." Chi Xiaocheng's eyes seemed to grow vacant, and her voice turned flat. "So Taotao cares more about Si Chen. You'd get upset with me for him..."
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: “这样啊......”池小橙眼神好似要渐渐空洞，声音变得平淡，“原来桃桃更在意司辰，会为了他而对我不高兴……”

0086.en: "No... that's not it!" Su Tao grabbed Chi Xiaocheng's hand and leaned in anxiously. "I meant, it's just a game! I was just saying that. It doesn't mean Si Chen really contacted me. Actually, Si Chen kind of likes you, so he asked me to see if you like him!"
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: “不...不是！”苏桃一把抓住了池小橙的手，凑近她焦急道，“我的意思是，这只是个游戏，我只是那样说而已，不代表司辰真的找我了，其实是司辰有点喜欢你，所以让我试探一下你是不是喜欢他！”

0086.en: Su Tao's mind was racing, and her words were becoming a bit incoherent, but Chi Xiaocheng showed no signs of returning to normal.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 苏桃急得大脑直转，已经有些语无伦次了，然而池小橙却依旧没有恢复正常的趋势。

0086.en: How could she have such a strong reaction to just one sentence!
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 只是一句话反应就那么大嘛！

0086.en: How does Xiaocheng slip into this yandere state so easily? There was no warning at all!
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 小橙的这病娇状态，怎么说进就进啊，一点前兆都没有的？！

0086.en: Right... Dr. Cheng mentioned a way to handle this.
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 对...对了，成医生好像说过处理这样的方法。

0086.en: She had asked, "If Xiaocheng is about to enter that strange yandere state, how can I stop her?"
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 当时她是这样问的，“如果小橙她要进入那奇怪的病娇状态，要怎么阻止啊？”

0086.en: Dr. Cheng: "If she enters that state, something must have triggered her. It could be a word, an action, or even a look. When she's in what you call a yandere state, it's like she's sealed off her heart, and it's very hard to snap her out of it."
0086.speaker: 成医生
0086.cn: 成医生：“要是进入那样的状态，一定是有什么东西刺激到她了，或许是一句话，一个动作，甚至是一个眼神，进入你口中病娇状态时，就相当于把内心给封堵，想喊醒她很难的。”

0086.en: Dr. Cheng: "At that moment, as the person she likes, you should shower her with praise. Make her feel your affection, and her emotions will change, preventing her from entering that dark state."
0086.speaker: 成医生
0086.cn: 成医生：“这个时候，作为她喜欢的对象，你可以去使劲夸她，让她感觉到你对她的喜欢，情绪发生改变，也就不会进入那黑化的状态了。”

0086.en: Su Tao: "What... what if that doesn't work?"
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 苏桃：“万...万一不成呢？”

0086.en: Dr. Cheng: "Don't worry about 'what ifs.' If all else fails, just tickle her. She can't turn dark if she's laughing too hard to move."
0086.speaker: 成医生
0086.cn: 成医生：“哪有那么多万一，实在不行你就挠她的咯吱窝，笑到她没了力气还怎么黑化。”

0086.en: Su Tao: "Is... is that a real therapy method?"
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 苏桃：“这...真的有这样的疗法吗？”

0086.en: Dr. Cheng: "What do you know? This is a therapy method straight out of the 2D world!"
0086.speaker: 成医生
0086.cn: 成医生：“你懂什么，这是二次元才有的疗法！”

0086.en: Considering the 2D world, that actually sounded somewhat logical.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 联想到二次元，这说得好像有点道理。

0086.en: But at the time, Su Tao hadn't taken it seriously.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 但当时苏桃没当回事。

0086.en: Now... it seemed like this was her only option, right?
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 现在...好像只有这个办法了吧？

0086.en: After their interaction, Chi Xiaocheng was no longer in that dark, yandere state.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 一番互动下来，池小橙哪里还有刚刚一副将要病娇的黑化状态。

0086.en: Her slightly narrowed eyes held a hint of a smile.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 微微眯起的眼睛含着笑意。

0086.en: --Haha, Taotao is so innocent. Just by pretending to be a yandere, she became so proactive.
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: ——哈哈，桃桃真是单纯呢，随便假装一下病娇，就主动了起来。

0086.en: Su Tao, on the other hand, felt a mix of enjoyment and conflict, constantly apologizing to suppress certain feelings.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 反观苏桃，内心又是享受又是纠结，不断地以道歉来压抑自己的某些情感。

0086.en: --Sob, Xiaocheng, I'm sorry. I'm only pretending to like you, yet I'm still doing things like this.
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: ——呜呜，小橙对不起，我明明是假装喜欢你，却还做这种事情。

0086.en: Both had their own thoughts, but what they had in common was that they were both enjoying each other's company.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 二者各怀心思，但相同的是，都有些享受彼此。

0086.en: After a long while, Su Tao brushed her hair back and turned her head to the side.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 许久，苏桃撩了一下头发，侧过头。

0086.en: She didn't dare to meet Chi Xiaocheng's eyes. "Sorry, Xiaocheng, I... I..."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 不敢去对视池小橙的眼睛，“抱歉小橙，我...我......”

0086.en: Su Tao's heart was in turmoil.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 苏桃心中一片慌乱。

0086.en: How could she explain that she was trying to stop Xiaocheng from going dark?
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 要怎么解释其实是在压抑小橙要黑化的情况？

0086.en: In her panic, Su Tao blurted out, "I... I wasn't paying attention."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 苏桃心中一急，就嘴瓢道，“我...我没注意。”

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at her with a smile. "If you weren't paying attention, then... maybe you should pay more attention?"
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 池小橙看着她，嘴角含笑，“既然没注意，那就...多注意一下？”

0086.en: Her crimson eyes had lost their demonic look from before she went dark and were now as gentle as water.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 赤红的双眸没了黑化前的妖异，柔情似水。

0086.en: Su Tao froze for a moment, at a loss for what to do.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 苏桃僵了一下身子，一时不知所措。

0086.en: She instinctively turned her head towards the door to escape, only to find a nurse standing there.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 下意识逃避地转头向门口，却发现一个护士小姐不知何时已经站在了那里。

0086.en: The nurse wore a mask, but her slightly narrowed eyes made it almost certain she was smiling like a doting aunt.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 护士小姐戴着口罩，但微微眯起的眼睛几乎可以确认，她的笑容一定是姨母笑。

0086.en: Meeting Su Tao's gaze, the nurse waved her hand. "I'm just passing by, you two continue. The regular rooms don't have cameras, so don't worry~"
0086.speaker: 护士小姐
0086.cn: 对上苏桃的双眼，护士小姐摆了摆手，“我只是路过，你们继续，普通病房的房间是没有摄像头的，请放心~”

0086.en: The nurse said with a smile in her eyes and kindly closed the door for them.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 护士小姐眼神带笑，贴心地为苏桃和池小橙关上了门。

0086.en: Before leaving, she even hung a "Resting, Do Not Disturb" sign on the door.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 并在离开前，挂了一个“休息中，勿扰”的牌子上去。

0086.en: This whole series of actions left Su Tao feeling both embarrassed and shy.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 这一番操作，让苏桃又是尴尬又是害羞。

0086.en: She had been nervously trying to handle Chi Xiaocheng.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 原本还慌张地应付池小橙。

0086.en: Now, the tips of her ears turned red. She covered her face, not even daring to look back at Chi Xiaocheng.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 此时软软的耳根子都红了，她捂住了脸，甚至不敢回头去看池小橙。

0086.en: As the one who had started the yandere act, Chi Xiaocheng naturally looked calm and composed.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 作为扮演病娇的始作俑者，自然一副寻常自得的样子。

0086.en: After spending so much time with Su Tao, this was the first time Chi Xiaocheng had seen her so shy.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 和苏桃一起互动那么久了，池小橙还是第一次看到她这么害羞的模样。

0086.en: So cute.
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 可爱捏

0086.en: Shyness is good. Shyness means her heart is moved, and if her heart is moved, can love be far behind?
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 害羞好啊，害羞代表心动，心动代表好感，有了好感离喜欢还会远吗？

0086.en: Half a month ago, Su Tao probably wouldn't have developed any feelings of affection no matter what.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 换作半个月前，无论怎样恐怕苏桃都不会产生喜欢的情绪。

0086.en: Taotao, love happens without you even realizing it.
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 桃桃呀，喜欢是不知不觉间的呢

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't rush to speak, but quietly waited for Su Tao to calm down.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 池小橙也不急着开口，而是静静地等苏桃平复心情。

0086.en: Su Tao was strong-willed; otherwise, she wouldn't have been able to handle the constant pressure. It took her about 30 seconds to compose herself.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 苏桃是大心脏选手，不然也无法扛下源源不断的压力，花了大概30秒，就调整好了心态。

0086.en: Although her pretty face was still slightly flushed, her voice had calmed down. "Xiaocheng, let's get back to our earlier topic. You... you have to listen to me, okay?"
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 俏脸虽还有些许未褪的红霞，但她的声音已经静了下来，“小橙，还是继续之前的话题吧，这个...要听我的知道吗？”

0086.en: "Okay~"
0086.speaker: 池小橙

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat obediently.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 池小橙乖乖地坐好。

0086.en: Seeing that her "flower kiss therapy" was working and that Chi Xiaocheng was not only obedient but also listening, Su Tao breathed a sigh of relief.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 见自己的花吻疗法奏效，池小橙不仅乖还听话后，苏桃松了口气。

0086.en: She continued slowly, "Actually... it wasn't that dramatic. Si Chen asked me out to discuss some school matters."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 又缓缓道，“其实……刚刚也没有那样离谱，司辰约我出去是想讨论一下学校的一些事情。”

0086.en: Her goal was only to control the extent of Chi Xiaocheng's yandere state.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 本身她的目标，也只是控制池小橙病娇的程度。

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng blinked and nodded without much reaction.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 池小橙听着眨眨眼，然后点头，没什么反应。

0086.en: Su Tao was pleased and continued, "Also, Dongfang Yang also asked me out and... and wanted to give me a gift."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 苏桃一喜，又缓缓道，“还有就是，东方阳也约我出去，还想……还行送礼物给我。”

0086.en: She glanced at Chi Xiaocheng, who seemed a little unhappy, so Su Tao immediately reached out and took her small hand.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 再多看一眼池小橙，好像有点不开心，苏桃立马就伸出抓住了她的小手。

0086.en: It was small and soft, with a texture like a fine gummy candy that made it hard to let go.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 小小的软软的，有着细腻软糖的加持让人爱不释手。

0086.en: After another round of sweet talk, Chi Xiaocheng shyly returned to normal, her cute expression making Su Tao even more excited.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 又是一番情话，池小橙害羞地恢复了正常，可爱的表情让苏桃更加兴奋。

0086.en: Great, the yandere state is controllable, as long as I don't provoke Xiaocheng too much at the beginning!
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 太好了，病娇是可控的，只要别一开始刺激小橙得太厉害了！

0086.en: As she felt happy, being so close to that cute face made Su Tao's heart race for some reason.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 心中开心的同时，因为离这张可爱的俏脸距离有些近，不知为何苏桃的心都跳了起来。

0086.en: Her breathing grew heavier without her realizing it.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 不自觉加重呼吸。

0086.en: She looked up at Chi Xiaocheng nervously. "Um..."
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 她紧张地抬头看了眼池小橙，“那个……”

0086.en: "You can."
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: “可以哦。”

0086.en: Chi Xiaocheng smiled. "I've been so good, I want a little reward from Taotao too~"
0086.speaker: 池小橙
0086.cn: 池小橙抿嘴一笑，“我那么乖，也想要一点桃桃的奖励呢~”

0086.en: So this counts as a reward?
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 原来这就算奖励吗？

0086.en: Inhale.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 吸气

0086.en: Exhale.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 呼气

0086.en: Su Tao slowly reached out her hands as well.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 苏桃也渐渐伸手。

0086.en: She understood her own motive for being so proactive.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 她明白自己这样主动的目的。

0086.en: It wasn't to express her love for Xiaocheng, but to restrain her.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 不是表达对小橙的喜欢，而是为了限制池小橙。

0086.en: This is necessary for treatment, this is necessary for treatment, this is necessary for treatment, this is necessary for treatment.
0086.speaker: 苏桃
0086.cn: 这是治疗必要的，这是治疗必要的，这是治疗必要，这是治疗必要的

0086.en: Constantly giving herself this psychological suggestion, Su Tao hid the trace of affection in her heart.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 不断对自己进行心理暗示，苏桃藏住了心中的一丝丝喜欢。

0086.en: She slowly closed her eyes.
0086.speaker: 旁白
0086.cn: 缓缓闭上眼睛。

0087.en: Chapter 87: What You Want, I Will Give You
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 第87章 你想要的，我会给你

0087.en: Ah, what a complicated scene.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 啊，真是让人复杂的一幕。

0087.en: Perhaps it shouldn't be like this.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 兴许不该这样的。

0087.en: But there's no other way, I have to try what Doctor Cheng said.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 但也没有办法吧，要试试成医生说的情况才行。

0087.en: First her small hand, then her cheek, then the corner of her mouth, and then...
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 先是小手，再是脸颊，然后是嘴角，再到……

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng's crimson eyes were like a mirror, condensing her entire reflection and sealing it within.
0087.speaker: 旁白
