0087.cn: 池小橙的赤红的双眸好似一块镜子，将她整个人的倒影浓缩，并封印在了里面。

0087.en: Su Tao felt very much enjoying it, because such an obedient and compliant Xiaocheng was simply too cute.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 苏桃感觉很是享受，因为这样乖巧、顺从的小橙实在是太可爱了。

0087.en: It wasn't until she stopped for a long time that she looked up at the girl.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 直至停下许久，她才抬头看向女孩。

0087.en: She didn't forget her purpose because of the softness, and asked, "Xiaocheng, are you feeling okay?"
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 没有因为柔软而忘记自己的目的，询问道，“小橙，感觉还好吗？”

0087.en: Although she knew it rationally, it still made her shy.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 虽然理性上清楚，可这还是让人害羞。

0087.en: Her yandere self, even in the dark room, had done this kind of thing many times.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 病娇化的她，包括在小黑屋，没少干这种事。

0087.en: But after all, she had caused it herself.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 但毕竟是自己亲手造成的。

0087.en: Su Tao was even a little worried now that she might make Chi Xiaocheng unhappy because of her inexperience.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 苏桃现在甚至有些担心，会不会因为自己不熟练，而让池小橙不开心。

0087.en: Such strange and abnormal emotions shouldn't have appeared, but she couldn't help but overthink at this moment.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 这样怪异又反常的情绪本不应出现，她却怎么也避免不了此刻的胡思乱想。

0087.en: In the future, should I practice more?
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 以后，要不要多多练习呢？

0087.en: This thought flashed through Su Tao's mind, startling her.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 这样的想法在苏桃脑海中一闪而过，随即将她吓了一跳。

0087.en: Cold sweat broke out.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 冷汗溢出。

0087.en: Just then, Chi Xiaocheng's voice softly echoed in her ear again, "Is this little bit really enough? How about one more time?"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 恰逢此时，池小橙的声音又幽幽响在耳边，“这么一点真的够吗，要不再来一次吧？”

0087.en: Try again?
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 再尝试一次吧？

0087.en: Just for practice.
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 就当练习了。

0087.en: Anyway, there might be many more times in the future.
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 反正以后，没准还有很多次呢

0087.en: Following that sentence, it was as if countless Chi Xiaochengs were blowing and whispering in her ear, extending delicate fingers to pluck at her heartstrings.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 顺着这一句话，耳边仿佛有着无数个池小橙在吹气，在低语，伸出娇嫩的手指勾动她的心弦。

0087.en: Su Tao trembled slightly and quickly chuckled dryly at Chi Xiaocheng, "No... it's fine, didn't I say, just try it, this is enough."
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 苏桃颤栗了一下，连忙对池小橙干笑道，“没...没事的，我不是说了吗，尝试一下，这样就够了。”

0087.en: Yes.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 是的。

0087.en: Just once.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 只是一下。

0087.en: Only once.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 只是一次。

0087.en: If she didn't do that, Xiaocheng might become even more yandere, and then it wouldn't be solved by just a kiss.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 如果不那么做，小橙可能就会病娇得更厉害，到时候就不只是亲一下就能解决的了。

0087.en: With that cute appearance, Su Tao truly didn't want Chi Xiaocheng to become pathological.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 那可爱的样子，苏桃是真不想池小橙变得病态。

0087.en: To stop the topic, Su Tao closed her eyes and grabbed that small hand again.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 为了止住这个话题，苏桃闭上眼睛，又抓住了那只小手。

0087.en: Rubbing her fingertips, she deliberately showed a look of affection.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 摩挲指腹，故意表现出喜欢的样子。

0087.en: Su Tao even thought, if only Xiaocheng wasn't a yandere.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 苏桃甚至想，如果小橙不是病娇就好了。

0087.en: But that was just a wish.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 可那只是奢望。

0087.en: Fortunately, this attempt was something she could control.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 好在，这次的尝试，是自己可以控制的。

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng indeed didn't further darken, which showed that when facing Dongfang Yang and Si Chen, Chi Xiaocheng's darkening could be controlled by herself!
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 池小橙也确实没有进一步黑化，可见面对东方阳和司辰时，池小橙的黑化自己是可以控制的！

0087.en: After that, she just needed to continue testing Chi Xiaocheng's bottom line little by little.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 之后只要一点点继续去试探池小橙的底线就好了。

0087.en: The treatment itself was what Su Tao wanted, but she didn't know that she had already fallen into Chi Xiaocheng's trap.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 治疗本身就是苏桃所想，但她缺不知道自己早已落入了池小橙的圈套之中。

0087.en: Tao Tao is so proactive, how can I not give her some reward?
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 桃桃都这样主动了，不给点奖励那怎么行呢？

0087.en: Since you want to cure me so much.
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 既然那么想治好我。

0087.en: Then I'll pretend your treatment is very effective.
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 那我就假扮你的治疗很有效果吧

0087.en: And then make you fall in love with me.
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 然后让你喜欢上我。

0087.en: After pretending to continue for a while longer, she ended this experience that felt strange to her.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 又假装继续了好一会儿后，结束这次让她感到怪异的体验。

0087.en: She gently looked up, Su Tao met Chi Xiaocheng's happy and satisfied smile, and nervously asked, "Xi... Xiaocheng, that... thanks for the treat?"
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 轻轻抬头，苏桃对上了池小橙开心满足的笑颜，紧张问道，“小...小橙，那个...谢谢款待？”

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded gently, and asked expectantly, "Do you like it?"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头，满怀期待问道，“喜欢吗？”

0087.en: Su Tao swallowed.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 苏桃咽了一口唾沫。

0087.en: She didn't directly say she liked it, but instead tentatively said, "It's not dislike, but... but I still need to get used to it."
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 她没直接说喜欢，反而试探性地说道，“不算讨厌，但...但我还需要适应一下。”

0087.en: Before, as long as she didn't say she liked it, Xiaocheng would probably have an opinion, right?
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 换作之前，只要不是说喜欢，小橙应该都会有意见吧？

0087.en: Now
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 现在

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng just smiled shyly, "It's good that Tao Tao doesn't dislike it~"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 池小橙只是羞涩地笑了笑，“桃桃不讨厌就好~”

0087.en: "Uh... Xiaocheng's body is too weak now." Su Tao changed the subject, "You should recover your strength more, otherwise... you'll get tired easily."
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: “额......小橙现在身体太虚了。”苏桃转移了话题，“还是多恢复一下身体，不然……容易累。”

0087.en: "Mhm!"
0087.speaker: 池小橙

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded seriously, "I will work hard to recover my health!"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 池小橙认真点头，“我会努力养好身体的！”

0087.en: There was no hint of yandere transformation.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 没有丝毫的病娇化。

0087.en: Obedient and cute.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 乖巧又可爱。

0087.en: Su Tao immediately became excited.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 顿时苏桃就激动了起来。

0087.en: Her goal was achieved!
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 她的目标，达到了！

0087.en: She controlled Xiaocheng and made her obedient.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 控制了小橙让她听话。

0087.en: At the same time, she didn't show any yandere tendencies when faced with her probing, this was the first milestone in the treatment!
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 同时她面对自己的试探也没表现出任何病娇化的趋向，这就是治疗中里程碑的第一步啊！

0087.en: Doctor Cheng, Chengcheng, thank you so much.
0087.speaker: 苏桃
0087.cn: 成医生，程程，真是谢谢你们了。

0087.en: Su Tao thanked the two of them inwardly, and after rinsing her mouth, she happily chatted with Chi Xiaocheng.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 苏桃内心感激了一下二人，出去漱了个口后，便开心地和池小橙聊起了天。

0087.en: It wasn't until noon, when she had to go to work, that Su Tao bid farewell to Chi Xiaocheng.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 直至中午要去打工了，苏桃才告别池小橙。

0087.en: It was as if a huge stone had fallen from her heart, feeling incredibly light.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 仿佛心中的一块巨石落下，轻松无比。

0087.en: The past suppression, confusion, and fear were dispelled by hope and the future at this moment.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 昔日的压抑、迷茫、害怕，在这一刻被希望与未来驱散。

0087.en: Pretending to like Xiaocheng and then treating her, as long as she faced it and accepted it patiently, there would definitely be a chance!
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 假装喜欢小橙，然后治疗她，只要耐心去面对、去接受，就一定有机会的！

0087.en: As for Chi Xiaocheng, she successfully completed the discharge procedures in the afternoon.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 而池小橙，也在下午的时候，成功办理了出院手续。

0087.en: "Time to go home, but it's snowing again, so I'll just take a taxi."
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: “该回家了，不过又下雪了，还是打个车吧。”

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the sky, found that the snow wasn't light, and took out her phone to call a taxi.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 池小橙看向天空，发现雪并不算小，拿出手机便打算喊一辆出租车。

0087.en: But the moment she saw her phone balance, her smile stiffened again.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 可看到手机余额的那一刻，笑容又僵了一下。

0087.en: 237 yuan!
0087.speaker: 旁白

0087.en: Her brother had transferred two thousand yuan before, but Chi Xiaocheng hadn't saved a single bit these past few days.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 哥哥之前打了两千块，但池小橙这些天是一点没省。

0087.en: Buying clothes, the camera prepared for the dark room, the air conditioning at home running non-stop for several days resulting in a large electricity bill, plus some scattered frivolous expenses.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 买衣服，小黑屋时准备的摄像头，家里几天空调没停过又交了一大笔电费，加上一些零零散散的花哨。

0087.en: She was once again in a financial crisis.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 她再度陷入了经济危机。

0087.en: "These days, money is becoming less and less valuable!"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: “这年头，钱是越来越不值钱了！”

0087.en: Chi Xiaocheng sighed inwardly and no longer planned to take a taxi.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 池小橙心中感叹，也没打算打车了。

0087.en: The snow wasn't heavy, and taking a shortcut would get her home faster.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 雪不算大，抄小路可以快点到家。

0087.en: Pedestrians hurried along the street, vehicles occasionally drove by, and specks of snow fell on Chi Xiaocheng's brown long hair, elongating her lonely silhouette.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 街道行人匆忙，时而有车辆驶过，点点雪花落到池小橙的茶色长发上，拉长着她孤寂的背影。

0087.en: Entering a deserted alley, in the original owner's memory, there used to be many delinquent girls who couldn't afford school huddling together for warmth here. Now that it was winter, the old houses in the alley couldn't withstand such cold either.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 走入无人的小巷，原主的记忆中这里还有不少曾经没书读的不良少女抱团取暖，如今冬天了，小巷的老房子也顶不住那样的寒冷。

0087.en: But it wasn't completely deserted.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 但也不是完全没人。

0087.en: Turning the corner, Chi Xiaocheng found a small figure huddled in a corner of a wall, a worn-out coat covering her body, but unable to hide her trembling.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 走过拐角，池小橙发现一个矮小的身影缩在一个墙壁的角落，破旧的大衣盖住了身子，却盖不住她的颤抖。

0087.en: The small figure's long hair reached her waist, but it was extremely messy, and unlike Chi Xiaocheng's beautiful hair, her black hair was dry and split, which was caused by long-term malnutrition.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 小身影长发过腰，却散乱无比，并且和池小橙的秀发不一样，她的黑发干涩且分叉，这是长期营养不良所导致的。

0087.en: More importantly, this figure looked somewhat familiar to Chi Xiaocheng.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 更关键的是，这个身影，池小橙看着有些熟悉。

0087.en: She walked over, tilted her head, and curiously said, "Liu Guijia?"
0087.speaker: 池小橙
0087.cn: 她走了过去，歪头好奇地说了一句，“刘桂嘉？”

0087.en: The figure seemed to react, looking up at Chi Xiaocheng in confusion.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 身影好似有了反应，抬头迷茫地看着池小橙。

0087.en: Meeting those eyes, Chi Xiaocheng then confirmed who the person in front of her was.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 对上那双眸子，池小橙这才确信眼前的人是谁。

0087.en: It was the little follower who came to her house with Liu Guijia back then.
0087.speaker: 旁白
0087.cn: 那时同刘桂嘉一起来自己家的那个小跟班。
